T02D3305:48a-1: badzra ts'a rya kri ya sa mu tstsha ya /
T02D3305:48a-3: rdo rje slob dpon gyi bya ba kun las btus pa /
T02D3305:48a-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3305:48a-5: bsam gtan gar mdzad rnga zlum la sogs sgra yis
T02D3305:48a-6: bos pa'i lha rnams kyis ni zhabs la phyag byas
T02D3305:48a-7: pa // 'khyog cing g-yo ba'i sku de yi ni
T02D3305:48a-8: zhabs kyi bkod pa rnam par bskyod cing nges par
T02D3305:48a-9: pa // 'dug pa can // smin ma 'khyog po
T02D3305:48a-10: bris shing mig ni rjes 'gro dpung pa'i kor pa
T02D3305:48a-11: g-yo ba'i lag pa'i sor mo yis //
T02D3305:48a-12: phyag rgya 'ching bar ba 'jug rim g-yo'i gdong ldan
T02D3305:48a-13: he ru ka yis khyod kyi sdig pa 'joms gyur
T02D3305:48a-14: cig /'gro mang mya ngan shin tu sdug bsngal bas
T02D3305:48a-15: // mang po kun nas blta bar mi nus pa //
T02D3305:48a-16: de phyir yang dag bsdus pa'i cho ga 'di //
T02D3305:48a-17: mkha' 'gro'i lam gyur bdag gis nus bzhin bya //
T02D3305:48a-18: bdag gis bya ba kun las btus //
T02D3305:48a-19: nga rgyal gyis ni byas pa min //
T02D3305:48a-20: gang 'dir tshig gi skyon rnams ni //
T02D3305:48a-21: mkhas pa kun gyis bzod par mdzod //
T02D3305:48a-22: sna tshogs rgyud rnams kun nas blangs //
T02D3305:48a-23: sna tshogs slob dpon lugs rnams kyang //
T02D3305:48a-24: me long gis 'dir bri bya ste //
T02D3305:48a-25: kun nas gsol 'debs dbang gis so //
T02D3305:48a-26: rab gnas la sogs bya ba kun //
T02D3305:48a-27: rdo rje slob dpon sngon 'gro ba //
T02D3305:48a-28: de phyir 'jig rten phan don du //
T02D3305:48a-29: de yi mtshan nyid brjod par bya//
T02D3305:48b-0: @48b de la re zhig dang por rdo rje slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02D3305:48b-1: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i kun du spyod pa ston pa ni slob dpon no //
T02D3305:48b-2: gzhan yang sdig ba las ring du song zhing chos la spyod pa dang /
T02D3305:48b-3: nges pa'i tshig gis cho ga bsgrub pa ni slob dpon no //
T02D3305:48b-4: gang yang rdo rje'i lam ston pa po'i slob dpon ni rdo rje slob dpon no //
T02D3305:48b-5: rdo rje'i sgra'i khyad par gyis ni rdo rje gsum
T02D3305:48b-6: mi phyed pa nyid du rab tu rig par bya'o
T02D3305:48b-7: // de 'ang ci ltar gyur pa zhe na /
T02D3305:48b-8: rnyed dang ma rnyed grags dang ma grags rnam par bral zhing smod pa dang ni bstod pa spangs //
T02D3305:48b-9: bde ba dang ni mi bde 'gog cing 'phel ba'i blo gros spro ba dang ldan rab tu mkhas //
T02D3305:48b-10: snying rjes kun nas bskor zhing sngags kyi tshul la ro myang ser sna med cing 'dod pa'ang med //
T02D3305:48b-11: de nyid shes pa thob cing rab tu brtan pa'i blo ldan rtag tu slob dpon rgyal po'o //
T02D3305:48b-12: de yang mchog la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ba 'di lta ste //
T02D3305:48b-13: bde mchog rgya mtsho'i rgyud las ni //
T02D3305:48b-14: ji bzhin gsungs pa'i slob dpon gsum //
T02D3305:48b-15: khyim gnas dge tshul zhes bya dang //
T02D3305:48b-16: dge slong zhes pa rnam gsum 'gyur //
T02D3305:48b-17: slob dpon mchog ni dge slong ste //
T02D3305:48b-18: gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs //
T02D3305:48b-19: 'bring ni dge tshul zhes bya ste //
T02D3305:48b-20: khyim na gnas pa tha ma'i lugs //
T02D3305:48b-21: dbang bskur rnam pa lnga thob pa //
T02D3305:48b-22: khyim na gnas pa tha ma'i lugs //
T02D3305:48b-23: dbang bskur bcu rnams thob pa ni //
T02D3305:48b-24: dge tshul zhes bya 'bring po yin //
T02D3305:48b-25: mchog gi dbang bskur thob pa ni //
T02D3305:48b-26: dge slong mchog yin rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D3305:48b-27: bslab pa'i gnas lnga thob pa dang //
T02D3305:48b-28: bslab pa'i gnas bcu ldan pa dang //
T02D3305:48b-29: mtha' yi bslab pa'i gnas thob pa //
T02D3305:48b-30: de gsum mnyam par brjod ma yin //
T02D3305:48b-31: mtha' yi bslab pa zhes pa ni //
T02D3305:48b-32: mthar thug gnas la slob phyir dang //
T02D3305:48b-34: mchog ni mngon sum yod bzhin du //
T02D3305:48b-35: sngags pa gzhan la bsnyen bkur min //
T02D3305:48b-36: gnas gcig gsum ni yod pa las //
T02D3305:48b-37: gang tshe khyim gnas mchod byed pa //
T02D3305:48b-38: de tshe sangs rgyas chos dang ni //
T02D3305:49a-0: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang 'di la mchod pa mdzad @49a * //
T02D3305:49a-2: dbang bskur mchog thob rdo rje yi //
T02D3305:49a-3: slob dpon la ni de bzhin gshegs //
T02D3305:49a-4: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs rnams //
T02D3305:49a-5: dus gsum byon nas phyag mdzad do //
T02D3305:49a-7: gang las mchog gi dbang bskur ba thob pa de
T02D3305:49a-8: las ni dge slong bcu dang mnyam par don dam
T02D3305:49a-9: pa'i bsnyen pa las gsungs pa /
T02D3305:49a-10: dge tshul bcu las lhag pa'i yon tan dge slong
T02D3305:49a-11: mchog / dge slong bcu las lhag pa'i yon tan
T02D3305:49a-12: sngags pa mchog // dpal ldan tshangs bar spyod pa dang ni ting 'dzin dang //
T02D3305:49a-13: byams pa la sogs de nyid shin tu rig pa'o //
T02D3305:49a-14: dpal ldan tshangs bar spyod pa zhes pa la dpal
T02D3305:49a-15: ldan tshangs par spyod pa ni lang tsho can dang
T02D3305:49a-16: rab tu sbyor ba na 'pho ba mi 'ong zhing
T02D3305:49a-18: dug gi dbang po zos pa na dug gi de kho na nyid grub pa yin gyi /
T02D3305:49a-19: ma zos na yang rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
T02D3305:49a-20: de'i phyir theg pa chen po las mchog gi dbang
T02D3305:49a-21: bskur ba thob pa ni dge slong du mngon par
T02D3305:49a-22: brjod par bya'o // gang gi phyir shes rab dang
T02D3305:49a-23: thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis bla ma'i man ngag las
T02D3305:49a-24: dga' ba la sogs pa'i rim pas 'dod chags la
T02D3305:49a-25: sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa bcom pa 'di ni don
T02D3305:49a-27: de nyid kyi phyir theg pa chen po las dge slong rnam pa lnga gsungs te /
T02D3305:49a-29: tshul khrims las slong ba'i dge slong dang /
T02D3305:49a-30: gos tsam 'dzin pas phye ba'i dge slong dang /
T02D3305:49a-31: gsol ba dang bzhis bsnyen par rdzogs 'di dge slong dang /
T02D3305:49a-32: nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i dge slong ngo zhes pa'o //
T02D3305:49a-33: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D3305:49a-34: dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa bya //
T02D3305:49a-35: gdug pa 'dul ba de ni mchog / ces so //
T02D3305:49a-36: nyon mongs pa bcom pa kho nas gdug pa 'dul
T02D3305:49a-37: bar nus par 'gyur gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin
T02D3305:49a-38: no // gang zhig gsol ba dang bzhis bsnyen par
T02D3305:49a-39: rdzogs pa'i dge slong de rnams ni nyan thos kyi
T02D3305:49a-40: mdo sde'i spyod pa kun du spyod do//
T02D3305:49a-41: de rnams 'dir ni dbang du bya ba nyid med de /
T02D3305:49a-42: gang gis dman pa la mos pa nyid kyi phyir dang skal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3305:49a-43: de nyid kyi phyir dngul chu'i 'du pa las gsungs pa /
T02D3305:49a-44: de las bden pa gnyis kyi lus yongs su gzung rnams dang /
T02D3305:49b-0: tshig mtha' dag gi don yongs su dpyad pa byas pa rnams @49b dang /
T02D3305:49b-1: mchog gi bde ba chen po'i 'bras bu la mngon
T02D3305:49b-2: par dga' ba rnams ni nyan thos ba'i mdo sde'i
T02D3305:49b-3: spyod pa dang ldan pa ma yin no //
T02D3305:49b-4: gang gi phyir nyan thos la sogs pa dman pa
T02D3305:49b-5: la mos pa rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa
T02D3305:49b-6: / bdag nyid sgrub pa dang bral ba sbyin pa
T02D3305:49b-7: dang tshul khrims la sogs pa bya ba'i lam la
T02D3305:49b-8: / mi gnas pa / de kho na nyid shes pa rnams la dad pa med pa /
T02D3305:49b-9: thar pa la ring ba'i 'du shes can /
T02D3305:49b-10: bde ba'i thabs lhag par ma thob pa /
T02D3305:49b-11: sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la sogs pa dka'
T02D3305:49b-12: ba'i spyod pas dus ring por byang chub tshol ba
T02D3305:49b-13: rnams kyis ni / de ltar yang thob par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T02D3305:49b-14: rdzogs pa'i rim pas lhag par 'gro ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02D3305:49b-15: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D3305:49b-16: dge slong dngos por gnas pa gang //
T02D3305:49b-17: gang zhig rgan por gnas gyur kyang //
T02D3305:49b-18: gang yang rtog ge dga' ba'i mi //
T02D3305:49b-19: de la de nyid bstan mi bya //
T02D3305:49b-20: rnam bar snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud las kyang //
T02D3305:49b-21: thabs dang bral ba'i ye shes kyi //
T02D3305:49b-22: bslab pa yang ni bstan bya ste //
T02D3305:49b-23: nyan thos de rnams dpa' chen la //
T02D3305:49b-24: bzhugs pa'i don du nges pa'o //
T02D3305:49b-25: mchog gi dang po'i rnal 'byor chen po'i chen po'i rgyud las kyang //
T02D3305:49b-26: dka' ba'i brtul zhugs mi bzad pas //
T02D3305:49b-27: lus ni skams gyur sdug bsngal can //
T02D3305:49b-28: sdug bsngal rnam par g-yeng ba'i sems //
T02D3305:49b-29: g-yeng phyir dngos grub gzhan du 'gyur //
T02D3305:49b-30: don dam pa'i bsnyen pa las kyang /
T02D3305:49b-31: gos dmar lus la dkris pa dpal ldan bla ma min //
T02D3305:49b-32: 'khar gsil lhung bzed lag thogs dpal ldan bla ma min //
T02D3305:49b-33: phyag dar khrod bas sdug bsngal dpal ldan bla ma min //
T02D3305:49b-34: ljon shing rtsa bar gnas pa dpal ldan bla ma min //
T02D3305:49b-35: zhes pa la sogs pa rgya cher ro //
T02D3305:49b-37: zas mi za bar sgor nyal te byin pa la ni dbang du bya ba med do zhes so //
T02D3305:49b-39: thams cad du dge slong la ni de ltar dbang du bya ba med do //
T02D3305:49b-41: ji ltar sems can gyi don chen po mthar thug pa gzigs nas /
T02D3305:49b-42: bcom ldan 'das dpal sh'akya thub pas 'khor lo sgyur
T02D3305:49b-43: ba'i gzugs kyis sngags kyi tshul gyi spyod pa la
T02D3305:49b-44: rab tu zhugs ba de bzhin du /
T02D3305:50a-0: dge slong tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i brtul zhugs @50a * //
T02D3305:50a-1: la spyod pa yang chos thams cad skyu ma lta
T02D3305:50a-2: bur lhag par rtogs pas dur smrig yongs su dor
T02D3305:50a-3: te / gtsug tor la sogs pa byas nas rim pa ji lta bar phreng ba dang /
T02D3305:50a-4: chu'i dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur zhing /
T02D3305:50a-11: dbugs dbyung ba ji srid ba byin nas rdo rje 'dzin pa byas pa na'o //
T02D3305:50a-12: de ci ltar 'di'i sngar gyi sngom pa las nyams par mi 'gyur ram zhen ma yin te /
T02D3305:50a-13: mchog las kyang mchog gi bslab pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3305:50a-14: ji ltar dge bsnyen las dge tshul du byas pa dang /
T02D3305:50a-15: dge tshul las dge slong du byas pa bzhin no //
T02D3305:50a-16: de yang ji ltar snyam na dge slong gi dngos
T02D3305:50a-17: por yod pa na ni dge bsnyen la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:50a-18: sngom pa'i dngos po yod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3305:50a-19: 'di las gal te de bzhin du mi 'gyur ba
T02D3305:50a-20: de lta na ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs
T02D3305:50a-21: spangs nas mchog tu sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams
T02D3305:50a-22: dang ldan pas 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs su mngon
T02D3305:50a-23: par sprul te / 'dod chags kyis ni de dang
T02D3305:50a-24: 'dra ba'i 'dod chags rab tu nyams pa'i don du
T02D3305:50a-25: bdag gis sngags kyi tshul gyi spyod pa bstan par
T02D3305:50a-26: bya'o zhes pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung snying la
T02D3305:50a-28: de'i phyir dge slong gi gzugs kyis ni rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin par mi rigs te /
T02D3305:50a-29: gang zhig mchog gi 'dod chags chen po'i spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3305:50a-30: dge slong gi gzugs nyid kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pa ste /
T02D3305:50a-31: rnam pa 'di nyid sngags kyi tshul gyi spyod pa la ni rigs pas ma yin no //
T02D3305:50a-32: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin
T02D3305:50a-33: gshegs pa thams cad rab tu gnas pa rnal 'byor
T02D3305:50a-34: chen po'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02D3305:50a-35: sor brgyad la sogs skra dang ni //
T02D3305:50a-36: gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan byas te //
T02D3305:50a-37: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bya ba bya //
T02D3305:50a-39: gzhan rnams su ni nges pa med //
T02D3305:50a-41: gal te 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs kyis kyang
T02D3305:50a-42: de bzhin du 'dir dbang du bya ba thob pa
T02D3305:50a-43: de lta na ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i don
T02D3305:50a-44: du de lta bu'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyi sprul pa
T02D3305:50b-0: bstan / gzhan @50b yang kye rdo rje las byung
T02D3305:50b-1: ba ku ru ku lle'i rtog pa las kyang gsungs
T02D3305:50b-2: bstan / pa / gos med gtsug tor med pa'i lus //
T02D3305:50b-3: de 'dra bla mar mi bya ste //
T02D3305:50b-4: phyag rgya'i dngos grub rnams nyams 'gyur //
T02D3305:50b-6: de'i phyir gang ji srid dge slong gi gzugs kyis
T02D3305:50b-7: sngags kyi tshul gyi spyod pa la rab tu zhugs
T02D3305:50b-8: par gyur ba de rnams kyis ni nyan thos la
T02D3305:50b-9: sogs pa'i spyod pa legs par ma bsrung shing /
T02D3305:50b-10: sngags kyi tshul gyi spyod pa la'ang ma yin no //
T02D3305:50b-11: de nyid kyi phyir de rnams gnyis ka'i sngom pa las nyams par 'gyur te /
T02D3305:50b-12: chags ldan rnams kyis shin tu bde ba la rab
T02D3305:50b-13: tu 'khyud pa bzhin du dbang po 'ba' zhig gi
T02D3305:50b-14: 'dod pa chen pos yum gyi bde ba la sred
T02D3305:50b-15: par gyur nas bza' ba dang btung pa la sogs
T02D3305:50b-16: pa byas par gyur na dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur
T02D3305:50b-18: gang zhig brtul zhugs bzang ma nos nas //
T02D3305:50b-19: legs par srung bar mi byed pa //
T02D3305:50b-20: de ni nges par sha dang rus //
T02D3305:50b-22: gzhan yang gzugs gzhan yid la bya ba gzhan dang 'dra ba ni ma 'brel ba ste /
T02D3305:50b-23: gzugs gang dang 'dra ba yin pa de dang 'dra bar bya ba mchog tu mdzes pa'o //
T02D3305:50b-25: rang ngam gzhan gyi dbang yang rung //
T02D3305:50b-26: gnas skabs gang du ci spyod kyang //
T02D3305:50b-27: bslab par gsungs pa gang yin pa'i /
T02D3305:50b-28: gnas skabs de la 'bad de bslab //
T02D3305:50b-30: rab tu dang ba'i mtshan gyis phyug / de nyid bcu la rnam par mkhas //
T02D3305:50b-31: de ni zhi rgyas la sogs la //
T02D3305:50b-32: slob dpon du ni rnam shes bya //
T02D3305:50b-33: brda shes dang ba'i bdag nyid can //
T02D3305:50b-34: dam tshig thams cad skyong bar byed //
T02D3305:50b-35: bzo yi cha ni thams cad dang //
T02D3305:50b-36: sngags kyi bstan bcos rab 'byam shes //
T02D3305:50b-37: gza' dang skar ma dus sbyor shes //
T02D3305:50b-39: rab tu gnas pa rab tu mdzad //
T02D3305:50b-40: grong khyer gang der nges par ni //
T02D3305:50b-41: 'di yis sangs rgyas bzhugs gsol bas //
T02D3305:50b-42: gang du zhi dang bzlas 'phel zhing //
T02D3305:50b-44: nor dang tshe dang bde ba ster //
T02D3305:50b-45: byed pa po la grags pa dang //
T02D3305:50b-46: phun tshogs bu dang bu mo 'phel //
T02D3305:50b-47: de yi pha yang dga' bar 'gyur //
T02D3305:50b-48: ji srid lha nyid gnas gyur ba //
T02D3305:50b-49: de srid dus su stong phrag gas //
T02D3305:50b-50: dga' ldan du ni de la mchod //
T02D3305:50b-51: lha nyid gnas par gyur pa na //
T02D3305:51a-1: de nas zhi rgyas la sogs la //
T02D3305:51a-2: gzhan gang zhig ni rnam par smad //
T02D3305:51a-3: rgan po dam tshig nyams pa dang //
T02D3305:51a-4: bya rog sgra dang rna ldan can //
T02D3305:51a-5: skams pa yan lag ma tshang lhag / sgur po mi thung 'thing po dang //
T02D3305:51a-6: rnam 'gyur sha bkra can drag po //
T02D3305:51a-7: g-yon can ma rungs ngan par zhugs //
T02D3305:51a-8: sdig can nad pa cung zad shes //
T02D3305:51a-9: lha yi grib nas nye bar 'tsho //
T02D3305:51a-10: mgrin ngan 'on pa sgom pa dang //
T02D3305:51a-11: sen khyon skra ni ngan pa dang //
T02D3305:51a-12: phra ma byed dang rtog ge pa //
T02D3305:51a-13: mi shis dmangs rigs zhing las pa //
T02D3305:51a-14: de bzhin so sto rkang nyeg dang //
T02D3305:51a-15: thams cad chu bur wa ba can //
T02D3305:51a-16: 'di yis sangs rgyas bzhugs gsol na //
T02D3305:51a-17: nor dang tshe dang bu rnams nyams //
T02D3305:51a-18: grong khyer dang ni rgyal po dang //
T02D3305:51a-19: de bzhin byed po skyon bcas 'gyur //
T02D3305:51a-20: 'chi ba rab tu ster bar byed //
T02D3305:51a-21: de ltar byed po ngan par bshad //
T02D3305:51a-22: des ni kun du ma rungs pa'i //
T02D3305:51a-23: las rnams thams cad rab tu bya ;
T02D3305:51a-24: / zhes pa pandi ta chen po dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D3305:51a-25: slob dpon me long gis mdzad pa bya ba kun
T02D3305:51a-26: las btus pa las slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid kyi
T02D3305:51a-28: /'dir bshad pa'i mtshan nyid rnams dang ldan pa'i slob
T02D3305:51a-29: dpon snying rje dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa
T02D3305:51a-30: srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i nang du 'khor zhing lhung ba'i
T02D3305:51a-31: sems can gyi khams rnams rjes su 'dzin zhing 'dod
T02D3305:51a-33: sngags kyi tshul mang du thos shing mkhas pa /
T02D3305:51a-34: blo brtan zhing ser sna med pa /
T02D3305:51a-35: spro ba'i dang tshul can rnams kyis kyis sa yongs su brtag pa dang /

T02D3305:51a-49: lha lhag par gnas pa dang /

T02D3305:51a-53: dkyil 'khor la thig gdab pa dang /

T02D3305:51b-4: sku gzugs la sogs pa'i rab tu gnas pa dang /
T02D3305:51b-5: bgrang phreng rab tu gnas pa dang /
T02D3305:51b-6: bgrang phreng gi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D3305:51b-8: rdzing la sogs pa'i rab tu gnas pa dang /
T02D3305:51b-9: aa mra'i skyed mos tshal la sogs pa'i rab tu gnas pa dang /
T02D3305:51b-10: dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la gnas pa dang /

T02D3305:51b-27: mchod rten gyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D3305:51b-28: rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D3305:51b-29: dril bu dang rdo rje gzung ba dang /

T02D3305:51b-37: gtsug lag khang la sogs pa'i steng du shing dgod pa dang /
T02D3305:51b-38: dri'i gtsang khang la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D3305:51b-39: khang ba brtsegs ma'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D3305:51b-40: rgya phubs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D3305:51b-41: bsam gtan gyi khang pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D3305:51b-42: shi ba'i rus bu dag bar bya ba'i cho ga ste /
T02D3305:51b-43: cho ga drug cu rtsa bzhi bsgrub par bya ba'o //

T02D3305:51b-46: sa yongs su brtag par bya'o //
T02D3305:51b-47: de la dkar po dang dmar po dang ser po dang nag po'i kha dog rnams dang /
T02D3305:51b-55: tsha ba'i ro rnams rim pa bzhin du bram ze la sogs pa'i sar 'gyur ro //
T02D3305:51b-56: dkar po'i sa las ni zhi ba'i 'bras bu ster zhing /
T02D3305:52a-0: dmar po'i kha dog las ni dbang @52a * //
T02D3305:52a-2: de las phyi ma'i sa gnyis ni rgyas pa dang
T02D3305:52a-3: drag po dag ser po dang dkar nag gi kha
T02D3305:52a-4: dog las te gzhan nyid ni ma yin no //
T02D3305:52a-12: grub par byed pa dag ni brgyad po dag gzhol
T02D3305:52a-13: ba'i sa las te rim pas shar la sogs par
T02D3305:52a-14: shes par bya'o // gal te gzhol ba dag par
T02D3305:52a-15: byas pa'i sa ni dge bar byed par bshad cing
T02D3305:52a-16: shes par bya'o // / de las kyang shar dang
T02D3305:52a-17: byang gzhol ba'i sa ni shin tu bzang bar 'gyur
T02D3305:52a-18: shes par bya'o // / ro // grog ma'i mkhar yod pa las ni nang dang /
T02D3305:52a-19: rtsub mo'i sa las ni nor zad pa dang /
T02D3305:52a-20: gas pa las ni mchog gi 'bras bu med pa dang /
T02D3305:52a-21: dma' ba'i sa las ni yang zhing mi 'dod pa rnams byed do //
T02D3305:52a-22: gzhu'i rnam pa dang gru gsum dang chu yod pa dang /
T02D3305:52a-23: yon po rnams spang bar bya zhing rus sbal gyi
T02D3305:52a-24: rgyab la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis yang spang
T02D3305:52a-25: bar bya'o // de nas gzhan yang /
T02D3305:52a-26: shar du aa shvadtha dang ni /
T02D3305:52a-27: de bzhin mer ni aardzu na //
T02D3305:52a-29: srin por pa l'a sha rnams spang //
T02D3305:52a-30: nub kyi phyogs su n+ya gro dha //
T02D3305:52a-31: rlung du shal ma li dang ni //
T02D3305:52a-32: byang gi phyogs su ba ku la //
T02D3305:52a-33: byang shar au dumb'a ra spang //
T02D3305:52a-35: de nas mtho gang tsam brkos nas //
T02D3305:52a-36: sa des myur du bkang ba dang //
T02D3305:52a-37: gal te sa de lhag gyur na //
T02D3305:52a-38: dge bar byed pa nyid yin no //
T02D3305:52a-39: gal te nyung bar gyur na des //
T02D3305:52a-40: skyon bcas rig nas spang bar bya //
T02D3305:52a-41: slar yang dong der song ba'i sa //
T02D3305:52a-42: blangs nas mtho gang tsam chus bkang //
T02D3305:52a-43: bkang ste gom pa brgyar phyin nas //
T02D3305:52a-44: slar yang 'ongs te brtag par bya //
T02D3305:52a-45: chu yis gang na sa bzang ste //
T02D3305:52a-46: dma' na sngags pas spang bar bya //
T02D3305:52a-47: gal te chu de sgra bcas na //
T02D3305:52a-48: klu rnams 'jigs pa yang dag ston //
T02D3305:52a-49: phyi nas cho ga mthong ba yis //
T02D3305:52a-50: bzang ba'i las can yongs su gzung //
T02D3305:52a-51: de ltar sa'i mtshan nyid shes pa'i slob dpon khrus
T02D3305:52a-52: byas zhing gtsang ba'i lus la dri bzang po byugs
T02D3305:52a-53: te // mchod pa'i yo byad rnams yang dag par bshams nas //
T02D3305:52a-54: ji ltar rnyed pa'i gos dang rgyan la sogs pas
T02D3305:52a-55: chas su zhugs la lha'i rnal 'byor legs par bsgom
T02D3305:52a-56: par bya'o // dkyil 'khor khru bzhi'i tshad dang ldan
T02D3305:52a-57: pa gru bzhi pa'i sa der ba las byung ba
T02D3305:52b-0: @52b la sogs pas nye bar byug pa byas la
T02D3305:52b-1: par bya'o // / der dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo
T02D3305:52b-2: bsgoms te yang dag par mchod cing phyogs kyi gtor
T02D3305:52b-3: ma byin nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sar
T02D3305:52b-4: btsugs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
T02D3305:52b-5: thal mo sbyar nas phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams na
T02D3305:52b-6: bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D3305:52b-7: dang 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa rnams las
T02D3305:52b-9: khams gsum gang du mgon po dag / chen pos mchod pa bzhugs rnams dang //
T02D3305:52b-10: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //
T02D3305:52b-11: dri za dang ni lha min sogs //
T02D3305:52b-12: de dang de la 'di gsol gyi //
T02D3305:52b-13: sems can kun gyi don bsgrub phyir //
T02D3305:52b-14: sa yi cha ni bzang po 'dir //
T02D3305:52b-15: gtsug lag khang ni bzhengs gyur nas //
T02D3305:52b-16: thos bsam la sogs mchog bzhugs pas //
T02D3305:52b-17: chos nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D3305:52b-18: che ge bdag ni che ge mo'i //
T02D3305:52b-19: grags pa dam pa bya bar brtson //
T02D3305:52b-20: gal te khyed kyis bzod gnang na //
T02D3305:52b-21: bgyi ste gzhan du ma yin no //
T02D3305:52b-22: rmi lam la sogs mtshan ma yis //
T02D3305:52b-23: sa bzang 'di ni bdag la stsol //
T02D3305:52b-24: zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D3305:52b-26: aom mu tsi li sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:52b-27: aom mo ha ni sva ha /
T02D3305:52b-29: zhes pa rmi lam brtag pa 'dis lag pa g-yon
T02D3305:52b-30: pa'i sor mo rnams khar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
T02D3305:52b-31: bsngags la bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gi
T02D3305:52b-32: mdun du mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas mgo lhor
T02D3305:52b-33: bstan cing gdong shar du phyogs la gos gtsang mas
T02D3305:52b-34: brgyan te ji ltar 'dod par nyal bar bya ste
T02D3305:52b-35: / rmi lam ngan na bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags
T02D3305:52b-36: bzlas pa'am don dam par chos thams cad rang bzhin
T02D3305:52b-38: slar yang rmi lam brtag pa byas nas lha rnams
T02D3305:52b-39: kyis gnang ba'am ma bkag pa'i sa la 'og nas
T02D3305:52b-41: bkag pa la ni ma yin pa kho na'o //
T02D3305:52b-42: rmi lam bzang na nyi ma bzang po gnyis pa
T02D3305:52b-43: la snga dro'i dus su sa gnon gyi phyag rgya
T02D3305:52b-44: dang rdo rje'i skyil krung bcas te rdo rje sems
T02D3305:52b-45: dpa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas aom bhu kham zhes
T02D3305:52b-46: pa'i sngags kyis stong pa nyid dang /
T02D3305:52b-47: h'um lam h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis rdo rje'i rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin du bsgoms la /
T02D3305:52b-48: aom me di n'i badzri bha ba badzra bandha h'um zhes pa dang /
T02D3305:53a-0: rdo rje bsdams pa'i phyag rgyas byin @53a * //
T02D3305:53a-2: lag pa g-yas par zla bal h'um bsams te /
T02D3305:53a-3: lan gsum brjod cing de'i 'od zer dang sor mo'i
T02D3305:53a-4: rtse mos bsnun pas de dag gi sgra rnams kyis
T02D3305:53a-5: bskul bar gyur pa las sa'i lha mo ser mo
T02D3305:53a-6: lus phyed dam thams cad 'thon pa /
T02D3305:53a-7: phyag gnyis na gser gyi bum pa dang /
T02D3305:53a-9: mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa la zhabs bsil dang /
T02D3305:53a-11: mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba'i me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D3305:53a-12: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D3305:53a-13: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang //
T02D3305:53a-14: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02D3305:53a-15: lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur //
T02D3305:53a-16: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02D3305:53a-17: ji ltar bdud kyi dpung bcom pa //
T02D3305:53a-18: bcom nas gtsug lag khang sogs bgyi //
T02D3305:53a-19: zhes lan gsum gsol ba btab pas kyis shig ces
T02D3305:53a-20: gsungs nas de nyid du thim ste sa'i lha mo
T02D3305:53a-21: sa'i ngo bor gnas bar bsam mo //
T02D3305:53a-22: de nas der bhr'um las byung ba'i 'khor lo dang
T02D3305:53a-23: bh'um las byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa bsgom par
T02D3305:53a-24: bya'o // de nas khang pa brtsegs par dri'i mandala
T02D3305:53a-25: byas par rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od
T02D3305:53a-26: zer gyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang phyogs skyong
T02D3305:53a-27: la sogs pa spyan drangs la zhabs bsil la sogs
T02D3305:53a-28: pa'i mchod pa dang gtor ma dbul ba sngon du
T02D3305:53a-29: 'gro bas lce h'um las rdo rjer byas nas spos
T02D3305:53a-30: phor bzung ste dril bu dkrol zhing /
T02D3305:53a-31: bcom ldan rdo rje che ge mchog //
T02D3305:53a-32: rig pa'i rgyal po khyed la 'dud //
T02D3305:53a-33: yang dag thugs rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02D3305:53a-35: slob ma rnams la brtse don dang //
T02D3305:53a-36: khyed rnams la yang mchod phyir dang //
T02D3305:53a-37: sems can bsod nams 'phel don dang //
T02D3305:53a-38: byang chub sems ni bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02D3305:53a-39: de bas bcom ldan bdag gus la //
T02D3305:53a-40: bka' drin gnang bar mdzad par rigs //
T02D3305:53a-42: byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang //
T02D3305:53a-43: gzhan yang gang dag gsang sngags lha //
T02D3305:53a-44: lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang //
T02D3305:53a-45: 'byung po byang chub brtan gnas dang //
T02D3305:53a-46: sems can bstan la mngon dga' dang //
T02D3305:53a-47: gang gzhan lha yi spyan ldan rnams //
T02D3305:53b-0: bdag la yang dag @53b dgongs su gsol //
T02D3305:53b-1: rdo rje can chen che ge bdag / che ge'i mchod yon dbul ba ni //
T02D3305:53b-2: bgyi'o des na khyed rnams kyis //
T02D3305:53b-3: nye bar gnas par mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02D3305:53b-4: zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D3305:53b-5: de nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rnam par rgyal ba
T02D3305:53b-6: la sogs pa'i bum pa'am de dag med na gzhan
T02D3305:53b-7: gyi yang nya gson po nang du bcug pa rnams
T02D3305:53b-8: rim pa bzhin du bzhag nas lhag par gnas par
T02D3305:53b-9: bya'o // las byed pa rnams bgegs mthar byed la
T02D3305:53b-10: sogs pa las thams cad pa'i lha'i rnam par sprul
T02D3305:53b-11: bya'o // te / de dag gi khung bu gru
T02D3305:53b-12: bzhi pa rgyar khru do pa zabs su de'i phyed
T02D3305:53b-13: khru gang pa brko bar bya'o //
T02D3305:53b-14: de'i dbang ldan du zlum po de'i tshad dam de'i phyed pa yang ngo //
T02D3305:53b-15: de gnyis ka yang sa dang ba las byung bas byug par bya'o //
T02D3305:53b-16: de nas khung bu gru bzhi par mchod yon gyi
T02D3305:53b-17: snod nas me tog dkar po'i snying por d'ur ba
T02D3305:53b-18: dang bcas pa nyid mdzub mo dang mthe bong gi
T02D3305:53b-19: rtse mos mthong bar blangs te yongs su bskor zhing
T02D3305:53b-20: 'gying ba'i tshul gyis mdzub mo dang gung mo dang
T02D3305:53b-21: ming med dang mthe chung rnams rim gyis dgrol la
T02D3305:53b-22: / aom a'a:hr'i:pra wa ra satk'a aargham pra t'i tstsha h'um sva h'a /
T02D3305:53b-24: aom bhr'um ha: hri: pra t'i tstsha bhu wa sva:/
T02D3305:53b-25: zhes pa'i sngags kyis rim pa bzhin du rnam par
T02D3305:53b-26: rgyal ba la sogs pa'i bum pa'i chu blugs pas
T02D3305:53b-27: gru bzhi pa ji lta ba bzhin du bkang la
T02D3305:53b-28: de'i rgyun gyis zlum po dgang bar bya ste /
T02D3305:53b-29: de'i rjes su nya lcibs dang nya gson po bcug
T02D3305:53b-30: la g-yas su 'khyil bar blta zhing shing 'o ma
T02D3305:53b-31: can gyi 'dab ma bcug nas bdag nyid dzam las
T02D3305:53b-32: skyes pa'i rdo rje dang dzam las dzam gu li
T02D3305:53b-33: ser mo rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i
T02D3305:53b-34: zhal gsum ser ba dang gnag pa dang dkar ba
T02D3305:53b-35: gdengs ka bdun dang ldan pa rin po che'i cod
T02D3305:53b-36: pan can phyag drug gi g-yas pa gnyis kyis rdo
T02D3305:53b-38: g-yon pa dag gis gzhu dang zhags pa dang bcas
T02D3305:53b-39: pa'i sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa phyag lhag ma dag gis
T02D3305:53b-40: rang 'od kyi thabs la 'khyud pa sna tshogs pa'i
T02D3305:53b-41: na bza' dang sbrul gyis brgyan pa /
T02D3305:53b-42: sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
T02D3305:53b-43: nyi ma 'od can du bsgoms te pad kor lan
T02D3305:53b-44: lnga byas la dbang chen gyi mthar thug par bltas
T02D3305:54a-0: pas gzhi sna tshogs rdo rje'i @54a * //
T02D3305:54a-2: ltad mo pa'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyang so rtsi
T02D3305:54a-3: dang me tog gi phreng ba dang tsandan la sogs
T02D3305:54a-4: pas yang dag par tshim par bya'o zhes pa gtsug
T02D3305:54a-5: lag khang la sogs pa bya ba'i don du sa
T02D3305:54a-6: yongs su brtag pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:54a-8: // / de nas phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i
T02D3305:54a-9: skyon thams cad dang bral bar shes pa'i sa'i dum
T02D3305:54a-10: bu der nas btab ste skyes nas sngon por gyur
T02D3305:54a-11: pa la ba lang rnams longs spyod du gzhug par
T02D3305:54a-12: bya zhing / de nas de rnams kyi chu dang
T02D3305:54a-13: lci ba dang 'o ma rnams bsres nas gtor bas
T02D3305:54a-14: zhi ba'i bdag nyid can gtsang mar gyur pa'i sa'i
T02D3305:54a-15: 'og gi skabs mtha' dag tu klu la sogs pa
T02D3305:54a-16: bya zhing / blta bar bya'o // de'i rjes la
T02D3305:54a-17: gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten spong khang khang bzangs
T02D3305:54a-18: khad brtsegs lha khang la sogs byed 'dod pa //
T02D3305:54a-19: de yis sa bdag klu ni brtag par bya ste sa yi dum bu gang de gru bzhir bya //
T02D3305:54a-20: phyogs kyi sa yi cha rnams so sor zla ba gsum dang nyi ma yi ni grangs rnams 'dir //
T02D3305:54a-21: dbang ldan nas ni me yi mthar thug shar gyi sa yi cha ni dgu bcur rnam par dbye //
T02D3305:54a-22: de bzhin me nas bden bral phyogs kyi mthar thug
T02D3305:54a-23: bden bral nas ni rlung gi phyogs kyi mthar thug
T02D3305:54a-24: dang // rlung nas 'byung po'i bdag po'i phyogs kyi mthar thug rnams //
T02D3305:54a-25: de bzhin du ni cha ni dgu bcu nyid du bya //
T02D3305:54a-26: ston zla ra ba 'bring dang tha ma'i bar //
T02D3305:54a-27: ji srid dbang ldan zur gyi phyogs su mgo //
T02D3305:54a-28: bden bral zur gyi phyogs char mjug ma ste /
T02D3305:54a-29: sa yi dum bu'i dbus su gsang gnas gzhag //
T02D3305:54a-30: lte ba'i 'og gi cha ni lag 'gro'i lus //
T02D3305:54a-31: steng du gdengs ka dang ldan mi yi lus //
T02D3305:54a-32: gshin rje'i gdong ldan lag g-yon rna ba g-yon //
T02D3305:54a-33: g-yas pa'ang rin chen dang bcas rked par gzhag / sa yi cha dgu rnams su khyab par nyal //
T02D3305:54a-34: phyogs der klu yi mgon po nyid de gnas //
T02D3305:54a-35: sa yi dum bu'i snying po'i tshad ji bzhin //
T02D3305:54a-36: srog shing shar nas nub mtha' sogs 'gro'i lus //
T02D3305:54a-37: tshes gcig gi ni nyi ma la sogs pa //
T02D3305:54a-38: nyin mtshan re re la ni cha re 'gro //
T02D3305:54a-39: shar nas ji ltar rigs par cha re spyod //
T02D3305:54a-40: lho dang nub dang byang phyogs de bzhin no //
T02D3305:54a-41: dgun zla rab 'bring mtha'i dkar phyogs sogs //
T02D3305:54a-42: chu bdag phyogs su kha bltas yang dag gnas //
T02D3305:54b-0: me yi phyogs su yan lag @54b mchog 'gro zhing //
T02D3305:54b-1: rlung gi zur la sogs par mjug ma 'gro //
T02D3305:54b-2: dpyid zla ra ba 'brid dang tha mar de //
T02D3305:54b-3: gnod sbyin bdag po'i phyogs su kha bltas nas //
T02D3305:54b-4: bden bral zur sogs yan lag mchog 'gro zhing //
T02D3305:54b-5: dbang ldan zur sogs char ni mjug ma 'gro //
T02D3305:54b-6: dbyar zla ra ba 'bring dang tha ma'i dus //
T02D3305:54b-7: de ni shar gyi phyogs su kha bltas gnas //
T02D3305:54b-8: rlung gi zur sogs yan lag mchog 'gro zhing //
T02D3305:54b-9: me yi phyogs cha ru ni mjug ma 'gro //
T02D3305:54b-10: lo re na ni sa kun khyab pa ste //
T02D3305:54b-11: lan gcig tsam gyis legs par 'khor ba yin //
T02D3305:54b-12: khyad par shes na zla ba zla ba yi //
T02D3305:54b-13: dbye bas lag 'gro'i bdag po yang dag rgyu //
T02D3305:54b-14: klu yi bdag nyid dkar po mdzes pa'i gzugs //
T02D3305:54b-15: bsgoms nas mjug ma sogs la rim pa bzhin //
T02D3305:54b-16: de lus gnas pa'i klu bdag rgyal po la //
T02D3305:54b-17: 'o ma'i ro sogs nyer spyod rnams kyis mchod //
T02D3305:54b-18: mjug ma'i cha la rigs ldan shin tu sngo //
T02D3305:54b-19: gsang gnas sngo bsangs mdog can stobs kyi rgyu //
T02D3305:54b-20: lte bar dung skyod padma'i sdong bu 'dra //
T02D3305:54b-21: dpung par padma chen po gser gyi mdog //
T02D3305:54b-22: d'ur ba dang mtshungs nor rgyas snying gar gnas //
T02D3305:54b-23: 'jog po zhes bya dmar po mgrin par gnas //
T02D3305:54b-24: rna bar padma dkar po 'od dkar can //
T02D3305:54b-25: spyi bor klu ni mtha' yas sngon po'o //
T02D3305:54b-26: las byed bgegs mthar byed pa rnams bsgoms nas //
T02D3305:54b-27: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i tog rtse brtan pos gzung //
T02D3305:54b-28: tshim par byas nas bdud sde skrod byed pa //
T02D3305:54b-29: de yis dang por lag g-yon bzung nas ni //
T02D3305:54b-30: lha dbang nor dbang phyogs su kha bltas la //
T02D3305:54b-31: yang dag bskor nas kham bzhi brko bar bya //
T02D3305:54b-32: sa de zhing bar snying po'i sar gnas pas //
T02D3305:54b-33: me sogs zur du'ang phyi rol ngor bar bya //
T02D3305:54b-34: de nas 'bad pas sa ni kham lnga brko //
T02D3305:54b-35: sa yi dum bu'i dbus su me tog dgram //
T02D3305:54b-36: lnga po de dag las rnams byed pa yis //
T02D3305:54b-37: phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams su du mar gtor //
T02D3305:54b-38: yang dag gnas pa'i sa nas cha ni nyi shu gcig //
T02D3305:54b-39: dor ba'i mthar ni cha dgu 'ba' zhig brko bar bya //
T02D3305:54b-40: de ni mchan khung mdun gyi cha yin dge ba'i sa //
T02D3305:54b-41: chos don 'dod pa yon tan 'phel zhing dngos grur ster //
T02D3305:54b-42: gal te cha dgu'i re mig rnams su nges par gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:55a-2: bu mo bu dang sbun zla chung ma mna' ma dang //
T02D3305:55a-3: pha tshan gnyen dang grogs po'i skye po 'chi bar 'gyur //
T02D3305:55a-4: gal te rgyab tu brkos na rang nyid nyams pa'am //
T02D3305:55a-5: rang gi gnas las g-yo ba'am nyung min nor zad 'gyur //
T02D3305:55a-6: mjug ma la ni glang bo rta dang ma he ra //
T02D3305:55a-7: ba la da phyugs dang 'khor dang 'bangs dang stobs nyams 'gyur //
T02D3305:55a-8: gal te kham lnga brkos sar shing dang grog sbur dang //
T02D3305:55a-9: skra dang sen mo thal ba byung na 'tshe ba byed //
T02D3305:55a-10: rdo las rlung 'jigs sbun pa dang ni mgal dum las //
T02D3305:55a-11: sna tshogs rims 'byung rus pa la ni zug nad do //
T02D3305:55a-12: dge dang mi dge mtshan ma du ma'i gzugs shes nas //
T02D3305:55a-13: slob dpon bzo bo'i sbyin bdag gi ni skye bo yis //
T02D3305:55a-14: sel med byas pa bzhi yi khung bu thams cad ni //
T02D3305:55a-15: dag pa'i sa yis kun nas myur du dgad bar bya //
T02D3305:55a-16: de phyir gang zhig sa bdag klu dbus kyi tshangs
T02D3305:55a-17: thig de srid du nyal bar 'dzin pa de rnams
T02D3305:55a-18: ni gsung rab kyi don ma rtogs pas rgol bar
T02D3305:55a-19: byed pa'o // dbang ldan gyi zur nas brtsams te
T02D3305:55a-20: ston zlar ba la sogs pa zla ba gsum gsum
T02D3305:55a-21: nyi ma'i rim pas sel yod pas bdag pos bskrad
T02D3305:55a-22: nas rtag tu khang pa de stong par rig pa
T02D3305:55a-23: rnams kyi'o zhes pa sa bdag klu yongs su brtag
T02D3305:55a-25: / sel dang bcas pa'i sa la gtsug lag khang
T02D3305:55a-26: la sogs pa byas na skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir
T02D3305:55a-27: sa sel dbyung ba brjod par bya'o //
T02D3305:55a-28: dang por re zhig slob dpon gyis mtshan nyid dang
T02D3305:55a-29: ldan pa'i gzhon nu ma rigs ldan las byung ba'am
T02D3305:55a-30: / de med na rigs gzhan las byung ba yang rung /
T02D3305:55a-31: re mig dgu byas pa'i dbus kyi cha la shin
T02D3305:55a-32: tu 'jam pa'i stan la bzhag nas mnyam par gzhag
T02D3305:55a-33: pa'i sems kyis de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs
T02D3305:55a-34: su 'bad pas bsgoms te yang dag par mchod nas
T02D3305:55a-35: rim pa la tshig gang dris pa'i lan gyi yi
T02D3305:55a-36: ge byin pa rnams nges par brtag par bya'o //
T02D3305:55a-38: ba ka tsa ta ae h'a sha ya y'a /
T02D3305:55a-39: gang du dris par gyur pa na yi ge 'di rnams so //
T02D3305:55a-40: sa gzhi cha dgur byas pa der shar la sogs pa'i sel rig par bya ste /
T02D3305:55a-41: dris pa'i tshe ba zhes pa na dbang po'i phyogs
T02D3305:55a-42: kyi khru phyed dang gnyis na mi'i sel yod pas
T02D3305:55a-43: der gnas pa'i mi rnams nges par 'chi bar byed
T02D3305:55b-0: do // dris pa'i tshe ka @55b zhes pa na
T02D3305:55b-1: me'i phyogs kyi rked pa tsam na bong bu'i sel
T02D3305:55b-2: yod pas sa der gnas pa rnams la rgyal po'i
T02D3305:55b-3: chad pa dang brad 'gro'i 'jigs pa dang mi mnyam
T02D3305:55b-4: do // pa byed do // dris pa'i tshe tsa
T02D3305:55b-5: zhes pa na lho phyogs kyi rked pa tsam na
T02D3305:55b-6: mi'i sel yod pas sa der gnas pa rnams kyi
T02D3305:55b-7: khyim bdag 'chi ba des par byed do //
T02D3305:55b-8: dris pa'i tshe ta zhes pa na srin po'i phyogs
T02D3305:55b-9: kyi khru phyed dang do tsam na rus pa yod
T02D3305:55b-10: pas khang pa der gnas pa rnams kyi byis pa
T02D3305:55b-11: zad par nges par byed do //
T02D3305:55b-12: dris pa'i tshe ai zhes pa chu bdag gi phyogs
T02D3305:55b-13: kyi khru phyed dang don gyis pa'i sel yod pas
T02D3305:55b-14: bdag pos bskrad nas rtag tu khang pa de stong
T02D3305:55b-15: bar byed do // dris pa'i tshe h'a zhes pa
T02D3305:55b-16: na rlung gi phyogs kyi khru bzhi na skyes pa'i
T02D3305:55b-17: sel yod par rig pas rmi lam ngan pa rab
T02D3305:55b-18: tu mthong ba dang de'i grogs po rnam par nyams
T02D3305:55b-19: bar byed do // par byed do // dris pa'i
T02D3305:55b-20: tshe sha zhes pa na lus dan po'i phyogs kyi
T02D3305:55b-21: rked pa tsam de na gnyis skyes kyi sel yod
T02D3305:55b-22: pas khyim der gnas pa rnams ni nor sbyin lta
T02D3305:55b-23: bu'ang nges par myur du nor med par byed do

T02D3305:55b-27: sa der gnas pa rnams kyi ba lang dang nor
T02D3305:55b-28: nyams par byed par the tshom med do //
T02D3305:55b-29: dris pa'i tshe na y'a zhes pa na /
T02D3305:55b-30: dbus na mi'i skra dang thod pa dang thal ba
T02D3305:55b-31: dang lcags kyi sel te 'di rnams yod pas gang
T02D3305:55b-32: khyim der gnas pa rnams kyi so so'i rigs zad
T02D3305:55b-33: par byed par shes par bya'o //
T02D3305:55b-34: de ltar sel rnams skyon dang ldan par shes nas
T02D3305:55b-35: rab tu 'bad pas bton te slar yang dag pa'i
T02D3305:55b-36: sa gzhi dga' ba der phur bus gdab par bya'o
T02D3305:55b-37: // dngul dang zangs dang zha nye nag po dang
T02D3305:55b-38: zha nye dkar bo dang lcags rnams las brdungs pa
T02D3305:55b-39: dang rdo ba dang shing dang rus pa rnams kyis
T02D3305:55b-41: rigs nges pa med pa dang /
T02D3305:55b-42: mthu dang brtan pa dang phun sum tshogs pa rnams
T02D3305:55b-43: zad pa dang nad ster bar byed pa'i phyir ro
T02D3305:55b-44: // gser gyi thur ma ni skye bo dang stobs
T02D3305:55b-45: dang bde ba dang nor dang grub pa rab tu
T02D3305:55b-47: phur bu ni rgun 'brum gyi shing las byas pa
T02D3305:55b-48: ste lcags kyis brdung bar bya'o zhes pas sel dbyung
T02D3305:55b-50: / de la thig ni gdab par bya ste cho
T02D3305:55b-51: ga bzang pos mnyam par byas pa'i sa gzhi la
T02D3305:56a-0: // ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid rnam dag @56a * //
T02D3305:56a-1: bsgril ba mdud med lte ba'i steng du gnas pa dang //
T02D3305:56a-2: brtan pa'i bsam gtan dang ldan bla ma dam pa'i sna rtse'i dbus su mig ni blta ba dang //
T02D3305:56a-3: bkra shis glu dang dril bu dang ni dung dang gling bu'i sgra rnams sgrogs shing bstod pas so //
T02D3305:56a-4: bud med bzo mo'i lag pa'i 'dab mas blangs pa'i chu dang bsres shing rab rgyas 'bar ba yi //
T02D3305:56a-5: me tog gser bzang dang mtshungs dri ldan mchod yon sbyin bdag gis ni yang dag dbul bar bya //
T02D3305:56a-6: mtshan ma yang ni nges par brtag par bya ste thig skud chad par gyur na bla ma 'chi //
T02D3305:56a-7: ce spyang dang ni bya rgod bya bang ngu bar gyur na rje bo nges par 'chi bar 'gyur //
T02D3305:56a-8: gang gis rigs kyi khyad par las skyes sems can rnams kyis thig skud las ni 'goms gyur na //
T02D3305:56a-9: de yi rigs kyi rus pa der ni nges par thig skud kyi ni 'og gi sa la ste //
T02D3305:56a-10: thig byed pa ni sbyin bdag gzhogs su 'ongs nas gang gi ming ni yang dag sgrogs byed pa //
T02D3305:56a-11: de yi ming dang rjes 'gro'i sems can keng rus sbyin bdag gnas pa'i sa yi dum bu la'o //
T02D3305:56a-12: rang gi lus la reg na cho ga'i dbang las de yi tshad kyis myur du brko bar bya //
T02D3305:56a-13: de nas sel yod rnam mang po yi mtshan ma gsungs pa 'dir ni yang dag bsdus pa tsam //
T02D3305:56a-14: re zhig ba lang 'ongs nas lci ba gtong bar byed na de yi tshad kyi gser gnas shing /
T02D3305:56a-15: byis pa dang ni gzhon nu ma gang phyis gtong na de yi tshad kyi dngul yod do //
T02D3305:56a-16: sbal pa'i sgra las khyim la chu yis 'jigs byed du ba las ni sems la sdug bsngal te //
T02D3305:56a-17: nad pa lus nyams mdze bo las ni rang dbang med pa bud med mthong na nad dang ldan //
T02D3305:56a-18: shang shang dang ni rma bya khu byug ne tso dag dang ngur ba dang ni ngang pa'i sgra //
T02D3305:56a-19: de rnams mgrin pa sgrog pa mthong na dge ba 'phel bar byed cing phun sum tshogs par byed //
T02D3305:56a-20: seng ge dang ni chu 'dzin rgyal po glang po'i sgra las nor thob 'bru ni 'phel ba ste //
T02D3305:56a-21: byis pa rtse ba la ni dung dang bkra shis sgra las de yi khyim du rdzas rnams 'ong //
T02D3305:56a-22: gdugs dang chu skyes mkha' dang snye ma rgyal mtshan bum pa rgyan dang rgyal po'i chung ma dang //
T02D3305:56a-23: nya dang 'o ma zho yi dbang po chang dang me 'bar 'bras bu rnams las rgyal ba'o //
T02D3305:56a-24: 'bru dang nor dang bu sogs 'phel te mnyam med bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa de yi tshe //
T02D3305:56b-0: dge slong bram ze blo ldan phyug po dam @56b
T02D3305:56b-1: ba'i skye bo yang dag mthong na chos dang ldan
T02D3305:56b-2: // sa la thig rnams gdab pa'i cho ga rab
T02D3305:56b-3: tu brtsams nas lha rnams yang dag bkod pa na
T02D3305:56b-4: // // de tshe mchog gi rtags ni 'di dag
T02D3305:56b-5: phan pa 'phel bar byed pas yongs su brtag par
T02D3305:56b-6: // // bya // bzo bo slob dpon rnam dpyod
T02D3305:56b-7: dang ldan mdzes shing mkhas bas mi dge ba rnams
T02D3305:56b-8: // // bya // kun du spangs // gang zhig
T02D3305:56b-9: gnas rnams kun du gnas pa'i skye bo rgyal po
T02D3305:56b-10: sbyin bdag rnams la ji lta bar //
T02D3305:56b-11: bkra shis dang ni dge 'phel ba yi ched du dang por shin tu rnam par spyad nas des //
T02D3305:56b-12: dam pa'i skar ma gza' dang sbyor ba nyi ma dge ba dag la bya ba yang dag brtsam //
T02D3305:56b-13: zhes pas sel la thig gdab pa'i mtshan ma'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:56b-15: // / mchod rten la sogs sa yi gzhi la gnas pa'i mtha' dag lha rnams dang //
T02D3305:56b-16: phyogs skyong ba dang klu dang nor 'dzin rgyal dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02D3305:56b-17: phyi yi chogs mchod par bya ste yid chos shes pa yis //
T02D3305:56b-18: sa yi dum bu'i snying po yongs su dag pa'i dbus su gnas pas so //
T02D3305:56b-19: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams kyi ni dkyil 'khor mtha' dag las //
T02D3305:56b-20: yang dag byung ba'i ri rab steng gi rtse mor sna tshogs rdo rje ste //
T02D3305:56b-21: de yi 'od zer dra ba'i tshogs rnams kyis ni mda' yi dra ba dang //
T02D3305:56b-22: rdo rje'i ra ba gur dang bla res mtha' dag legs par bsrung bar bya //
T02D3305:56b-23: dpal ldan seng ge rnam par gnon ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bar snang du //
T02D3305:56b-24: bh'um yig dang ni 'khor lo rgyal ba'i 'od zer las byung gzhal yas khang //
T02D3305:56b-25: gtsug lag khang dang khang bzangs khyim dang 'gron khang dang ni lha khang rnams //
T02D3305:56b-26: mtha' dag dge 'dun gyis ni legs par yongs su gang ba sems kyis bsam //
T02D3305:56b-27: bhr'um yig 'od kyis phra rab rdul gyi tshogs gyur so phag la sogs pa //
T02D3305:56b-28: mtha' dag padma'i dbus su gnas pa rnams ni yang dag mchod bya zhing //
T02D3305:56b-29: yongs su rdzogs shing chos la mchog tu 'bar bas mdzes shing zur ldan rnams //
T02D3305:56b-30: dri yi chu dang tsandan dmar po gur gum gyis ni byug par bya //
T02D3305:56b-31: grog tshang can dang 'bu yi tshogs kyis zos pa dang ni chag pa dang //
T02D3305:56b-32: zur nyams pa dang mtha' dag phyugs kyi rkang rjes can dang yon por gyur //
T02D3305:56b-33: 'di rnams spangs te phri yang ku dang me tog rnams dang le brgan rtsi //
T02D3305:57a-1: po'i tshangs skud til la sogs pas kyang //
T02D3305:57a-2: yang dag tshim par bya ste rtsig mkhan bzo bo'i tshogs ni mkhas pa rnams //
T02D3305:57a-3: gser gyi gdu bu rnams dang rna rgyan lag pa yi ni sor gdub dang //
T02D3305:57a-4: gos dang gser dang bza' ba btung ba go yu dang ni me tog gis //
T02D3305:57a-5: ltad mo ba dang mi yi bdag po'ang yang dag yongs su tshim par bya //
T02D3305:57a-6: shar dang byang du kha phyogs de bzhin gshegs dang
T02D3305:57a-7: zla ba nyi ma dag / bltas nas rgyas pa'i
T02D3305:57a-8: sems kyis bla ma dang ni bzo bo'i gtso bo
T02D3305:57a-9: yis // zla ba dang ni nyi ma'i lam nas 'dzin ma'i rlung ni rgyu ba na //
T02D3305:57a-10: brtsams pas pha gu dngul dang gser gyi rus sbal steng du gzhag par bya //
T02D3305:57a-11: dbang po dang ni byang du gnas pas dang por brtan pa'i yid kyis ni //
T02D3305:57a-12: de rnams me yi zur gyi phyogs la sogs par rim pa ji bzhin du //
T02D3305:57a-13: g-yas su bskor ba'i rim pas nges par sbyar na rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste //
T02D3305:57a-14: stong phrag phyogs kyi khor yug dag tu pha gu rnams ni bzhag pas so //
T02D3305:57a-15: yid bzang gis ni dril bu dkrol zhing g-yas pa'i phyag tu rdo rje ni //
T02D3305:57a-16: legs par gnas pas de nas yongs su bzlas te sngon la phyogs bral rnams //
T02D3305:57a-17: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs bum pa chu yis mngon par gtor bya zhing //
T02D3305:57a-18: nye bar spyod pa lnga yi cho ga slob mas yongs su gzung bar bya//
T02D3305:57a-19: bde gshegs sras kyi tshogs kyis gang bar dam pa'i chos ni bklag bya zhing //
T02D3305:57a-20: skye bo rab tu dga' bas 'dus shing kun nas dga' ba tshogs pa'i dus //
T02D3305:57a-21: gos med pa dang lus dman gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu grol ba na //
T02D3305:57a-22: dge ba'i tshes dang dus sbyor la ni dang por rol mo glu dbyangs bya //
T02D3305:57a-23: pha gu la sogs pa bzhag pa rnams la sbyin
T02D3305:57a-24: bdag dang mkhas pa la sogs pa rnams kyis yang
T02D3305:57a-25: dag par spro ba dang bcas pas dge ba'i chu'i
T02D3305:57a-26: rgyun sbrengs te phyogs mtha' dag tu gram par bya'o
T02D3305:57a-27: // gtsug lag khang mig gi rings su phyed lhag
T02D3305:57a-28: pa'i tshad de zhing du che ba ni mchog go
T02D3305:57a-29: // // zhing gi bzhi cha gsum dang mnyam pa
T02D3305:57a-30: ni stegs bu dang myos pa bsrung ba'i rtse mo'o
T02D3305:57a-31: // // // dong dgang ba ni de bzhin du
T02D3305:57a-32: ska rags tsam me dang mda' dang thub par gsungs
T02D3305:57a-33: shing gang yang chu dang rdo'i mthar thug par bya
T02D3305:57a-34: // // // ste / rtsig pa ni gros su bya'o //
T02D3305:57a-35: ma them gyi ni gdung gi mthar thug pa'i tshad
T02D3305:57b-0: gang yin pa ste de bzhin @57b du rtse mo'i
T02D3305:57b-1: mthar thug pa'i rings su ni cha gsum gyi tshad
T02D3305:57b-2: du 'gyur zhing / cha re re ni cha chen po'o //
T02D3305:57b-3: ka ba dang nang gi dra ba ni cha lnga'i cha gsum du gsungs so //
T02D3305:57b-4: cha dang cha'i dum bu yongs su rdzogs pa'i khor
T02D3305:57b-5: yug gi phreng bar shing gi las ka mnyam pa'o
T02D3305:57b-6: // stegs bu la lnga cha'i cha gnyis ni rtsig pa chen po'i zheng ngo //
T02D3305:57b-7: rtsig pa de la cha lnga'i cha gnyis ni pha gu'i rings kyi tshad do //
T02D3305:57b-8: de'i rings su yang cha lnga ste /
T02D3305:57b-9: zhing du ni cha gsum dang ldan pa pha gur bstan to //
T02D3305:57b-10: de'i cha gsum gyi cha gcig ni dpangs te khang bzangs kyi cha thams cad du'o //
T02D3305:57b-11: aom bhr'um sarba ta th'a ga t'a sarba buddha a'a la yam aa dhi tishtha ntu sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:57b-12: zhes pa so so'i zur la lan bdun gyis pha gu byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D3305:57b-13: de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis phyogs skyong la
T02D3305:57b-14: sogs pa rnams kyang yang dag par mnyes par byas
T02D3305:57b-15: nas sa'i bdag po dang sbyin pa'i bdag po la
T02D3305:57b-16: yang zhi bar bya zhing lhag ma'i gtor ma sbyin
T02D3305:57b-17: par bya'o // snga ma dang 'dir yang cho ga
T02D3305:57b-18: rnams spro bas nus pa bzhin byas te dge 'dun
T02D3305:57b-19: gyi ston mo dang bla ma la yon dbul bar
T02D3305:57b-20: bya'o zhes pa gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten dang
T02D3305:57b-21: dri'i gtsang khang dang grong khang spong khang gi mchod
T02D3305:57b-24: // / rdzing dang chu mig dang khron pa la sogs
T02D3305:57b-25: pa byed pa na gtor ma dang mchod pa sngon
T02D3305:57b-26: du 'gro bas mchod yon la sogs pa byas la
T02D3305:57b-27: rnam par snang mdzad nyid aom bam badzra ba ru
T02D3305:57b-28: na h'um zhes pa 'dis rdo rje chu bdag gi
T02D3305:57b-29: gzugs su bsams nas de yongs su gyur pa las
T02D3305:57b-30: skyes te klu rigs brgyad kyi gnas ye shes kyi
T02D3305:57b-31: bdud rtsi'i chus bkang la aom badzra satva sa ma
T02D3305:57b-32: ya stvam / zhes brjod cing me tog gtor nas
T02D3305:57b-33: dbang chen gyis gzhi la thug par yan lag brgyad
T02D3305:57b-34: dang ldan pa'i chus gang bar blta'o zhes pa rdzing
T02D3305:57b-35: la sogs pa'i mchod yon gyi cho ga'o /
T02D3305:57b-37: // / lugs ma dang brdungs ma dang bris ma la
T02D3305:57b-38: sogs pa'i sku gzugs byed pa na mchod pa dang
T02D3305:57b-39: gtor ma sngon du 'gro bas bzo bo rnams byed
T02D3305:57b-40: par 'gyur ba'i lha'i rigs kyi bdag po'i gzugs su
T02D3305:57b-41: byas te / snying ga dang mgrin pa dang mgo
T02D3305:57b-42: bo rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D3305:57b-43: rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor lo la gnas pa'i
T02D3305:57b-44: h'um dang a'a: dang aom gyi yi ge rnams dang
T02D3305:57b-45: byas te / / g-yon pa dang cig shos kyi
T02D3305:57b-46: lag pa dag la zla ba dang rdo rje dag
T02D3305:58a-1: cig gis rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D3305:58a-2: de rnams kyi snying ga la sogs pa rnams su
T02D3305:58a-3: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa g-yas pas reg
T02D3305:58a-4: cing / h'um a'a: aom zhes pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D3305:58a-5: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sbyang ba'i cho gas shing dang
T02D3305:58a-6: 'jim pa dang rdo ba la sogs pa'i rdzas kyi
T02D3305:58a-7: dngos po gtsang ma rnams stong pa nyid dang /
T02D3305:58a-8: phyi nas snying ga'i sa bon gyis byed par 'gyur
T02D3305:58a-9: ba'i lha'i gzugs su skad cig gis rnam par bsams
T02D3305:58a-10: la / bcom ldan zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
T02D3305:58a-11: nye bar gnas par mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02D3305:58a-12: zhes pa'i mthar thug ba 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams brjod par bya'o //
T02D3305:58a-13: thams cad du'ang 'dir bsgoms pa'i lha rnams gshegs su
T02D3305:58a-14: gsol bar bya'o zhes pa sku gzugs la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:58a-17: // / dam pa'i chos 'dri bar byed pa na mchod
T02D3305:58a-18: pa dang gtor ma sngon du 'gro bas ye shes
T02D3305:58a-19: lnga'i bdag nyid kyi shog bu rnams dhi: yig tu
T02D3305:58a-20: rnam par bsgoms te de'i 'od zer gyis spyan drangs
T02D3305:58a-21: pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje chos kyi bdag
T02D3305:58a-22: nyid du'o // yan lag dgu'i dam pa'i chos rnams
T02D3305:58a-23: ni so so'i sgra'i bdag nyid phan tshun rjes su
T02D3305:58a-24: chags pa ste snga ma las mi 'gyur ba'i a'a:
T02D3305:58a-26: bris mkhan rnams ni snga bar rnam par sbyangs te
T02D3305:58a-27: 'od dpag med kyi gzugs su rnam par bsgom mo
T02D3305:58a-28: // rang nyid kyis kyang aom badzra satva h'um zhes pa 'dis smyu gu dang /
T02D3305:58a-29: aom a'a: bighn'a nta kri ta h'um /
T02D3305:58a-30: zhes pa 'dis snag tsha'i snod lan nyi shu rtsa
T02D3305:58a-31: gcig tu byin gyis brlab cing bris mkhan gyi lag
T02D3305:58a-32: pa g-yon par snag cha'i snod chos kyi 'byung gnas
T02D3305:58a-33: dang g-yas par myu gu rdo rje'i rang bzhin can
T02D3305:58a-34: byin la / aom dh'i: shru ti smri ti bi
T02D3305:58a-35: dza ye sarba aadzny'a na pa ta la aa pa
T02D3305:58a-36: h'a ri ni hr'i: sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:58a-37: zhes pa'i sngags kyis rab tu gzhag ste /
T02D3305:58a-38: snag tsha'i snod dang smyu gu dag sbyar nas gang
T02D3305:58a-39: zhig shes rab dang ye shes rnam par 'phro bas
T02D3305:58a-40: gang bris pa de rnams de yongs su rdzogs pa'o
T02D3305:58a-42: bsgoms pa'i lha rnams kyang gshegs su gsol bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D3305:58a-43: rked gsog can dang tshangs skud can //
T02D3305:58a-44: snag tsha sku dang ral pa can //
T02D3305:58a-45: ngan pas 'tsho dang gya gyu'i bdag //
T02D3305:58a-46: dam chos don la yongs su spang //
T02D3305:58b-0: brtsams te dang po'i 'dab ma @58b la ;
T02D3305:58b-1: / rtsa ba'i cha yis legs bri zhing //
T02D3305:58b-2: phyi nas rtse mos yang dag bri //
T02D3305:58b-3: bris mkhan phan par gtogs pas so //
T02D3305:58b-4: ku la'i rgyab kyi rim pa ltar //
T02D3305:58b-5: de bzhin phreng ba de yis bya //
T02D3305:58b-6: cha lnga mnyam par byas nas ni //
T02D3305:58b-7: g-yas pa la ni cha gsum dor //
T02D3305:58b-8: g-yon la cha gnyis dor ba yi //
T02D3305:58b-9: dbus su bug pa dge ba thob //
T02D3305:58b-10: ces pa ni bug pa gcig pa ni mtshan nyid do //
T02D3305:58b-11: cha gsum mnyam par byas nas ni //
T02D3305:58b-12: bug pa gnyis pa dge ba 'phel //
T02D3305:58b-13: zhes pa dam pa'i chos 'dri ba'i mchod yon gyi cho ga'o /
T02D3305:58b-15: // / gtsug lag khang dang khang brtsegs khang mig gnas pa gang //
T02D3305:58b-16: mchod rten la sogs sku gzugs rnying pa shing rul dang //
T02D3305:58b-17: chag dang tshig dang dum bur song dang cha shas gas //
T02D3305:58b-18: de rnams sbyin bdag rgyal po rnams la shis pa min //
T02D3305:58b-19: de phyir skye dgu'i sbyin bdag rgyal po rnams //
T02D3305:58b-20: mchog gi don dang bsod nams grol don du //
T02D3305:58b-21: yang dag rnyings par gyur rnams gso zhing bsgrub bya ste //
T02D3305:58b-22: gtso bo'i slob dpon mchog rnams kyis ni 'bad pas so //
T02D3305:58b-23: thub pa'i dbang po'i tshogs la me tog la sogs pa'i //
T02D3305:58b-24: nyer spyod rnams kyis mchod nas gsol ba gdab bya zhing //
T02D3305:58b-25: dpang du byas nas phyogs skyong rnams dang lha kun dang //
T02D3305:58b-26: gnas kyi bdag por sbyin sreg gtor ma rab tu spyad //
T02D3305:58b-27: tshim par byas nas skar ma gza' dang dus tshigs ni //
T02D3305:58b-28: dge ba nyid dang gtsang ba nyid la nges par
T02D3305:58b-29: brtag / dpal ldan rdo rje sems sogs rnam bsgoms
T02D3305:58b-30: bdag nyid can // slob dpon nang gi sde dang bcas pas las rnams bsgrub //
T02D3305:58b-31: rang gi gsang sngags brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas nas ni //
T02D3305:58b-32: rdo rjes phyag mtshan brtan zhing dpa' ba'i slob dpon gyis //
T02D3305:58b-33: phreng ba dang ni skud pa lnga la rnam bcings te //
T02D3305:58b-34: sku gzugs ye shes rigs de'i snying nas myur ba yis //
T02D3305:58b-35: bkug nas sa bon yi ge'i phreng skyes gnas pa rnams //
T02D3305:58b-36: ho yig snying por byas nas 'od kyi phreng ba ni //
T02D3305:58b-37: nyer spyod la sogs sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga yis //
T02D3305:58b-38: gnas las rjes su mthun pa min pa bsgom par bya //
T02D3305:58b-39: mtshan mas rab brgyan mdzes shing gsar pa rnam dag pa'i //
T02D3305:58b-40: bum par bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pas rab rdzogs bya //
T02D3305:59a-0: bum pa'i nang du gnas pa @59a * //
T02D3305:59a-2: brtan pa'i bdag nyid can gyis rtag tu yang dag mchod //
T02D3305:59a-3: 'khrul 'khor rnams kyis bzo bo'i skye bos rnam bskyed de //
T02D3305:59a-4: rdo ba dang ni sa yi rang bzhin rnying pa'i gzugs //
T02D3305:59a-5: 'di rnams mu stegs can gyi chu bo ru ni dor bya zhing //
T02D3305:59a-6: ci ste na yang ri phug zab mo'i nang sogs su'o //
T02D3305:59a-7: gal te shing gi bdag nyid yin na gos gsar bcing //
T02D3305:59a-8: til mar bskus te cho ga shes bar bsreg par bya //
T02D3305:59a-9: rdzas kyi bdag nyid can rnams bzhu bar byas nas ni //
T02D3305:59a-10: de yang bdag nyid yongs su rdzogs par blugs par bya //
T02D3305:59a-11: sngar gyi tshad la myur du gzugs ni mdzes pa'am //
T02D3305:59a-12: sngar bas lhag pa'i yongs rdzogs sku ni bzhengs bya ste //
T02D3305:59a-13: snying stobs ldan pa'i bdag nyid kyis ni 'bad pa yis //
T02D3305:59a-14: mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa bsgrub par bya //
T02D3305:59a-15: bum pa'i lto nas rang gi sa bon phyung nas ni //
T02D3305:59a-16: ye shes rigs ni sku gzugs la gnas rab tu bya ;
T02D3305:59a-17: / mchod 'gyur mchod pa dam pa de la rim pa ste //
T02D3305:59a-18: myur bas cho ga ji bzhin rab tu gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:59a-19: so phag rang bzhin dang ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnying gyur pa'i //
T02D3305:59a-20: mtha' dag mchod rten dngos rnams de bzhin yongs dag byas nas ni //
T02D3305:59a-21: snying por byas te mchog gi dngos grub byed pa'i skye bo yis //
T02D3305:59a-22: shing yang de bzhin nyid de gser sogs blugs par bya //
T02D3305:59a-23: gtsug lag khang dang khang bzang khyim dang 'gron khang lha khang rnams //
T02D3305:59a-24: rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin du ni nges par rab bsgoms nas //
T02D3305:59a-25: yang dag gnas nas legs par bkug ste bum pa'i nang du ni //
T02D3305:59a-26: gzhag nas sngar gyi cho ga bzhin du yang dag spyad par bya //
T02D3305:59a-27: sbyin sreg nyer spyod gtor ma bza' ba bkra shis byas nas ni //
T02D3305:59a-28: rab 'byams thub pa'i gang zag rnams ni shin tu mnyes byas te //
T02D3305:59a-29: bsnyen bkur dang ni mchod pa'i rgyan rnams rnam par bsgrub //
T02D3305:59a-30: de ltar byas na mtha' dag 'jig rten phan pa thob par 'gyur //
T02D3305:59a-31: zhes pa rnying pa gso ba'i mchod yon gyi cho ga'o /
T02D3305:59a-33: // /'dir ji ltar rigs par 'chad bzhin pa'i cho ga rnams su /
T02D3305:59a-34: gser dang dngul dang zangs dang rdo dang shing //
T02D3305:59a-35: sa bya nya lcibs dung dang ni //
T02D3305:59a-36: 'dab ma'i kyong bu zhabs bsil dang //
T02D3305:59b-0: bsang gtor zhal @59b bsil mchod yon snod //
T02D3305:59b-1: de la snod gcig tu nas dang 'o ma dang me tog dkar po dang /
T02D3305:59b-2: ku sha dang til dang 'bras yos bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'i dri dkar po'i chu blugs la /
T02D3305:59b-3: aom a'a: h'um zhes pa'i sngags dang rang gi bdag
T02D3305:59b-4: po'i sngags dang 'khyil pa'i sngags rnams kyis lan bdun
T02D3305:59b-5: nam brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags par bya ste zhi
T02D3305:59b-6: ba'i don du'o // rgyas pa'i don du ni til
T02D3305:59b-7: dang zho dang me tog ser po dang d'ur ba
T02D3305:59b-8: dang bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'i dri ser po'i chu
T02D3305:59b-9: blugs la de bzhin du bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3305:59b-10: de nas rang gi g-yon logs su mchod yon gyi snod dang zhabs bsil gyi snod dang /
T02D3305:59b-12: bsang gtor gyi snod rnams gzhag par bya'o //
T02D3305:59b-13: de rnams kyi mdun du bzed zhal gyi snod 'ba' zhig pa gsum yang ngo //
T02D3305:59b-14: de la zhabs bsil gyi snod nas khu tshur g-yas
T02D3305:59b-15: pa'i mthe bong dang mdzub mo'i skam pas 'gying ba'i
T02D3305:59b-16: tshul gyis so rnams bskor zhing chu dang me tog
T02D3305:59b-17: blangs la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sngags kyis mdzub mo
T02D3305:59b-18: dang gung mo dang ming med dang mthe'u chung rnams
T02D3305:59b-19: rim gyis dgrol zhing snod du lan gsum dbul bar
T02D3305:59b-20: bya'o // snod gnyis pa'i chu lag pa g-yas par
T02D3305:59b-21: gnas pa'i ku sha'i chun po'i rtse mos blangs nas
T02D3305:59b-22: bzed zhal gyi snod gnyis par lan gsum bsang gtor
T02D3305:59b-23: bya ste las thams cad pa'i bum pa'i chu yis
T02D3305:59b-24: bsang gtor bya ste yang de bzhin no //
T02D3305:59b-25: snod gnyis pa nyid nas g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis
T02D3305:59b-26: mthe bong dang mdzub mo'i skam pas chu dang me
T02D3305:59b-27: tog bzung la zhal bsil gyi phyir bzed zhal gnyis
T02D3305:59b-28: pa nyid du 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sngags brjod cing
T02D3305:59b-29: / kha 'og tu phyogs pa'i khu tshur gyis mthe
T02D3305:59b-30: chung dang ming med dang gung mo dang mdzub mo
T02D3305:59b-31: rnams rim gyis dgrol zhing lan gsum du dbul bar
T02D3305:59b-32: / bya'o // gsum ba mchod yon gyi snod kyi chu la sogs pa rnams snyim par bzung la /
T02D3305:59b-33: aom a'a: hr'i: pra wa ra satk'a ra aargham pra t'itstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:59b-34: zhes brjod cing rdo rje thal mo kha phye bas
T02D3305:59b-35: snod gsum par lan gsum du so sor dbul bar
T02D3305:59b-36: bya'o // sngar gyi las gsum la ni aargham gyi
T02D3305:59b-37: gnas su p'a dyam dang proksha dang a'anytsa ma nam
T02D3305:59b-38: rnams brjod par bya'o zhes pa mchod yon la sogs
T02D3305:59b-39: pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'o /
T02D3305:60a-1: khang la sogs pa rdzogs pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i
T02D3305:60a-2: don dam dbang bskur ba'i don du gsol pa btab
T02D3305:60a-3: pas sam / rang ngam gzhan gyi dngos grub bsgrub pa la sogs pa don du gnyer bas sam /
T02D3305:60a-4: sems can gyi don chen po mthong bas sam /
T02D3305:60a-5: gzhan gyis bskul bas kyang rung ste dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir dang tshogs bsag pa'i phyir dang /
T02D3305:60a-6: bgegs nyams par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D3305:60a-7: bdud gzhom par bya ba'i phyir sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o //
T02D3305:60a-8: gal te kun mkhyen lam shes ni //
T02D3305:60a-9: bsnyen pa med na 'grub pa mi 'gyur //
T02D3305:60a-10: de phyir gnyis med gnas nas ni //
T02D3305:60a-11: rim gnyis de nyid rig pa yis //
T02D3305:60a-12: lha yi 'khor lo yang dag bsgom //
T02D3305:60a-13: skyon de yi gsang sngags bzlas //
T02D3305:60a-15: yang na rang gi lha yi 'bum //
T02D3305:60a-16: dkyil 'khor ba yi khri nyid de //
T02D3305:60a-17: 'di ni sngon du bsnyen par brjod //
T02D3305:60a-18: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum la mkhas pa'i rnal
T02D3305:60a-19: 'byor pas ji lta bar dkyil 'khor dang rjes su
T02D3305:60a-20: mthun pa'i sngon du bsnyen pa'i bcu'i cha shas kyi
T02D3305:60a-21: sbyin sreg kyang bya'o zhes pa sngon du bsnyen pa'i
T02D3305:60a-22: nges pa dang dgos pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:60a-24: // / de'i rjes la rab gnas kyi don du zla ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D3305:60a-25: mchu dang dbo yi zla ba de bzhin nges par sa ga snron dang chu stod zla ba dang //
T02D3305:60a-26: mgo ste de srid 'di rnams dge ba gcig pu'i 'bras bu ster ba'i zla ba drug tu gsungs //
T02D3305:60a-27: gza' yi mchog gyur bzhi ste gza' lhag bla ma pas zla ba rnams dang ldan gyur na //
T02D3305:60a-28: gza' rnams thams cad bde dang rjes chags nor rnams ster bar gsungs te rab gnas don du'o //
T02D3305:60a-29: dang por bshad pa'i gnyis pa la ni rjes su
T02D3305:60a-30: dge ba'i 'bras bur gsungs te gang zhig gsum pa
T02D3305:60a-31: dang // de las dpal ldan lnga par 'gyur ba
T02D3305:60a-32: gang yin nges par bcu pa bdun pa zla ba
T02D3305:60a-33: dang // nya ba dang // gang zhig thams cad
T02D3305:60a-34: grub pa la ni 'thab mo sdig pa nyams par
T02D3305:60a-35: gsungs te tshes kyi grangs rnams bdun //
T02D3305:60a-36: bshad pa la ni don kun grub par thub pas
T02D3305:60a-37: bstan te sangs rgyas bya ba la ni spro bar
T02D3305:60a-38: bya // rgyal dang me bzhi lha mtshams de yi
T02D3305:60a-39: rjes su mgo dang snar ma dag dang dbo dang
T02D3305:60a-40: bya // lag rnams dang // snron dang snrubs dang
T02D3305:60b-0: rjes mthun gro bzhin rkang @60b par ldan pa'i khrums
T02D3305:60b-1: dang chu stod chu smad ces bya ba //
T02D3305:60b-2: bu la sogs pa 'phel bar 'gyur te nges pa nyid du dbo la 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'gyur //
T02D3305:60b-3: me bzhi la ni ye shes 'thob cing nam mkhar
T02D3305:60b-4: dbang du bya ba dag ste lag la de bzhin
T02D3305:60b-5: nyid // snar ma la ni nor rnams 'phel zhing rjes su mgo la zhi ba'o//
T02D3305:60b-6: chu stod chu smad rgyal po la //
T02D3305:60b-7: tshe ring ba dang bu dang rab gsal mkhas pa dag dang blo ste khrums la dngos grub 'phel //
T02D3305:60b-8: rgyal la rtag tu rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur zhing
T02D3305:60b-9: bde ba dang ni mthu ste snon la don rnams
T02D3305:60b-10: 'grub // lha mtshams la ni bde ba'o rjes su
T02D3305:60b-11: mthun pa'i gza' tshogs mtha' dag la ni mchod sbyin
T02D3305:60b-12: 'grub // bya ba bsgrub // myur du rdzogs pa tsam nyid la //
T02D3305:60b-13: rab tu gnas pa mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D3305:60b-14: 'khor los sgyur rgyal dbang phyug ni //
T02D3305:60b-15: thob pa 'di la the tshom med //
T02D3305:60b-16: tshes dang gza' dang skar ma med //
T02D3305:60b-17: bgegs dang log par 'dren pa'ang med //
T02D3305:60b-18: bgegs dang skar ma lha rnams dang//
T02D3305:60b-19: gza' rnams thams cad rjes su mthun //
T02D3305:60b-20: zhes gal te yang gsungs pa de lta na'ang 'jig
T02D3305:60b-21: rten pa'i kun rdzob la brten nas byed pa po
T02D3305:60b-22: la rjes su mthun zhing dge ba'i dus sbyor la
T02D3305:60b-23: sogs pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D3305:60b-24: de bas na zla ba bcu gnyis po rnams la
T02D3305:60b-25: yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rim pas yud
T02D3305:60b-26: tsam bzang po la sogs pa thams cad la bya
T02D3305:60b-27: ba rnams bya'o // de'i rjes su gang gi tshe
T02D3305:60b-28: slob mas lan gsum du gsol ba btab par gyur
T02D3305:60b-29: ba rnams bya'o // pa dang / dkyil 'khor bri
T02D3305:60b-30: ba'i don du gal te de la nye bar mkho
T02D3305:60b-31: ba'i yo byad rnams tshogs nas de'i tshe slob ma
T02D3305:60b-33: de'i lte bar nyi ma la h'um yig gi rnam
T02D3305:60b-34: par bsgoms te de'i 'od zer gyis snying gar gnas
T02D3305:60b-35: pa'i kam yig las byung ba'i sdig pa gnag cing
T02D3305:60b-36: rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can gcer bu 'bras bu
T02D3305:60b-37: 'phyang ba skra ser po gyen du bgreng [*bgrod?] ba
T02D3305:60b-38: rkang pa gsum pa sna rtse nas phyung la h'um
T02D3305:60b-39: yig de yang snying gar 'ongs shing yongs su gyur
T02D3305:60b-40: pa las 'chad par 'gyur ba'i khro bo chen po
T02D3305:60b-41: rdo rje h'um mdzad du rnam par bsgoms nas phyir
T02D3305:60b-42: 'thon te / aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um h'um phat /
T02D3305:60b-43: aom grihna grihna h'um h'um phat /
T02D3305:60b-44: aom grihna pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02D3305:60b-45: aom a'a na ya ho: bha ga w'a na bi
T02D3305:60b-46: dy'a r'a dza che ge mo'i sarba p'a pam n'a
T02D3305:61a-0: @61a * // sha ya h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:61a-1: zhes brjod cing phyag na gnas pa'i rdo rje 'bar
T02D3305:61a-2: bas phyung ba'i sdig pa rnams stong par mdzad par
T02D3305:61a-3: bsam / slob ma'i sems kyi bgegs rnams bdud rtsi
T02D3305:61a-4: 'khyil pa'i lte ba'i 'og phur bu'i rnam pa can
T02D3305:61a-5: la aom badzra k'i la ya aa sya sarba bighna
T02D3305:61a-7: ces brjod de h'um mdzad kyis bka' bsgo ba dang
T02D3305:61a-8: rang gis kyang brjod cing phur bus gdab par bya
T02D3305:61a-9: ste / phur bu'i 'od zer drag po rnams kyis gdug pa can rnams bsreg par yang bya'o //
T02D3305:61a-10: slob ma de yang pam yig las kun du bzang po'i gzugs su bsams te /
T02D3305:61a-11: srung ba'i don du snying gar aa yig las skyes
T02D3305:61a-12: pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang aa:yig las skyes pa'i
T02D3305:61a-13: sna tshogs rdo rjes byin gyis brlab par bsgom zhing
T02D3305:61a-14: mgo bor zla ba la gnas pa'i h'um las byung
T02D3305:61a-15: ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa gyen du 'greng ba'i
T02D3305:61a-16: dbus su m'a ma k'i bzhugs par bsgoms la ye
T02D3305:61a-17: shes kyi lha mo de'i thugs kar zla ba la
T02D3305:61a-18: gnas pa'i rdo rje'i lte ba'i nang du chud pa'i
T02D3305:61a-19: sngags kyi phreng ba las byung ba rdo rje ser
T02D3305:61a-20: po phra mo'i 'od zer 'phros pas lus thams cad
T02D3305:61a-21: la go cha bgos par bsams te /
T02D3305:61a-22: aom a'a:sham ka re sh'anti ka re ghu ta ghu
T02D3305:61a-23: ta ghu ti ni gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya
T02D3305:61a-24: gh'u ta ni che ge mo la raksha sv'a h'a
T02D3305:61a-25: / zhes brjod pa'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D3305:61a-26: 'khyil pa'i sngags kyang bzlas pa'i ched du 'di la sbyin no //
T02D3305:61a-27: de ltar byas na 'di la bgegs rnams kyis ni
T02D3305:61a-28: mi tshugs shing nye bar mkho ba'i yo byad rnams
T02D3305:61a-29: kyang bde bar rnyed par 'gyur ro zhes pa slob
T02D3305:61a-30: ma yang dag par bsdu ba'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:61a-33: // / de nas nye bar mkho ba rnams yang dag par
T02D3305:61a-34: tshogs pa dang grogs shin tu yid gzhungs pa dang
T02D3305:61a-35: ldan pas dge ba'i tshes dang dus sbyor la sogs
T02D3305:61a-36: pa'i snga dro'i dus su rig ma dang bcas pa'i
T02D3305:61a-37: shin tu phan pa byed pas 'khor lo'i dbang phyug
T02D3305:61a-38: gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang sngon du bsnyen pa byas
T02D3305:61a-39: te / grong rdal dang grong khyer dang grod dang
T02D3305:61a-40: skyed mos tshal dang gtsug lag khang dang khyim rnams
T02D3305:61a-41: kyi dbang ldan gyi phyogs sam gang du yid la
T02D3305:61a-42: 'thad par gyur pa der dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa
T02D3305:61a-43: te / bya'o // shar phyogs su dkyil 'khor byas na sa'i bdag po 'chi ba dang /
T02D3305:61b-0: skye bo rnams la nye bar 'tshe @61b ba sna tshogs 'byung ngo //
T02D3305:61b-1: lho phyogs su ni gang gi don du dkyil 'khor byed pa de 'chi'o //
T02D3305:61b-3: lus ngan por ni der zhugs pa'o //
T02D3305:61b-5: bden bral du ni mu ge'o //
T02D3305:61b-6: rlung du ni char rlung ngo //
T02D3305:61b-7: phal pa'i ring bsrel can gyi mchod rten dang nye bar ni 'chi'o //
T02D3305:61b-8: klu gnas pa'i chu dang nye bar ni chu 'byung ngo //
T02D3305:61b-9: shing gi grib ma can du ni byis pa 'chi'o
T02D3305:61b-10: zhes shes par byas nas thams cad yongs su dor
T02D3305:61b-11: te shar dang byang gzhol ba rab tu shis pa'i
T02D3305:61b-12: dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi nges par brtags nas der
T02D3305:61b-13: dri bzang po la sogs pas mandala bya'o //
T02D3305:61b-14: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams yang dag par mchod cing gtor ma phul nas nam mkha' la bteg ste /
T02D3305:61b-15: der gnas pa'i zhing skyong la sogs pa rnams gtor ma dang nye bar spyod pas mchod la /
T02D3305:61b-16: gang dag 'dir gnas lha dang klu //
T02D3305:61b-17: gnod sbyin srin po'am gzhan dag la //
T02D3305:61b-18: sa 'di bdag gis bslang bar bgyi//
T02D3305:61b-19: dkyil 'khor don du khyed kyis stsol //
T02D3305:61b-20: zhes lan gsum du gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D3305:61b-21: rmi lam la sogs par gnang ba'am ma bkag par
T02D3305:61b-22: shes nas nyi ma gzhan gyi snga dro nam mkha'i
T02D3305:61b-23: dkyil na bzhugs pa'i dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang la
T02D3305:61b-24: sogs pa rnams la yid kyis gsol ba gdab cing
T02D3305:61b-25: rjes su gnang ba zhus te /
T02D3305:61b-26: nyi ma'i gung la bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dang bgegs la phur bus gdab par bsgoms pas sam /
T02D3305:61b-27: drag po'i sbyin sreg gis bgegs bskrad par bya'o //
T02D3305:61b-28: sbyin sreg gi phyogs la slob ma srung ba'i don
T02D3305:61b-29: du phyi dro'i tshe me'i phyogs la gnas pa'i thab
T02D3305:61b-30: khung du zhi ba'i sbyin sreg kyang byas la sa
T02D3305:61b-31: de yang aom a'a:bighn'anta kri ta h'um zhes pa 'dis
T02D3305:61b-32: las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i yungs kar dang chu
T02D3305:61b-33: dang thal ba rnams kyis bsang bar bya'o //
T02D3305:61b-34: der rdo rje skyil krung bcas te sa'i lha mo
T02D3305:61b-35: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can bsams la zhabs
T02D3305:61b-36: bsil dang zhal bsil dang mchod yon dang mchod pa
T02D3305:61b-38: lha mo khyod ni zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs
T02D3305:61b-39: pa'i tshigs su bcad pas lan gsum du gsol ba
T02D3305:61b-40: btab pa dang / de ltar gyis shig ces brjod
T02D3305:61b-41: pa can yid kyi btegs [*btogs?] nas nam mkha' la
T02D3305:62a-0: @62a * // de nas sa gzhi bgegs med par rig nas gtor
T02D3305:62a-1: ma byin te snga ma bzhin du sa bdag klu'i
T02D3305:62a-2: mchan khung du mgrin pa tsam mchu la thug par
T02D3305:62a-3: ram rdol thug par dngos grub dman pa dang 'bring
T02D3305:62a-4: dang mchog gi dbye bas bus mo 'am dku 'am
T02D3305:62a-5: lte ba tsam du brko bar bya'o //
T02D3305:62a-6: de nas rdo ba dang rus pa dang skra dang
T02D3305:62a-7: sol ba la sogs pa skyon gyi phyogs su gyur
T02D3305:62a-8: pa thams cad med par byas nas sa de nyid
T02D3305:62a-9: dri bzang po'i chus gtor te /
T02D3305:62a-10: khung bu dgang bar bya zhing ma khengs na gzhan gyis kyang ngo //
T02D3305:62a-11: h'um mdzad kyi bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i
T02D3305:62a-12: dri'i chus gtor la brdung bar bya zhing khru phyed
T02D3305:62a-13: kyi dpangs dang ldan pa gru bzhi pa khru bcu
T02D3305:62a-14: drug gi tshad dang ldan pa 'am /
T02D3305:62a-15: yang na khru bcu gnyis kyi tshad dang ldan pa
T02D3305:62a-16: mnyam pa'i sa la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i thig gdab
T02D3305:62a-17: pa'i cho gas thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D3305:62a-18: de'i dbus su khru bcu gnyis sam khru brgyad pa'i
T02D3305:62a-19: zla ba'i gdan zlum po mtho gang gi tshad kyi
T02D3305:62a-20: dpangs dang ldan pa dbus cung zad mtho ba shar
T02D3305:62a-22: de'i 'og tu sor brgyad pa'i tshad dang sor bzhi
T02D3305:62a-23: pa'i dpangs dang ldan pa padma'i 'dab ma'i rnam pa
T02D3305:62a-24: ge sar dang bcas pa'i ska rags bya zhing /
T02D3305:62a-25: 'od zer phreng ba'i mthar thug par khru bcu gnyis
T02D3305:62a-26: pa'i dkyil 'khor de khru nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i tshang
T02D3305:62a-27: dang ldan pa'i gru bzhir thig bzhi gdab bar bya
T02D3305:62a-28: zhing / de las khru bzhi bzhi yongs su dor bar slar yang thig bzhi gdab par bya'o //
T02D3305:62a-29: dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas bzung nas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i thig la ka ba rnams te /
T02D3305:62a-30: stegs bu la ka ba bcu gnyis so //
T02D3305:62a-31: de'i steng du thog bzhi po rnams te zur bzhi pa'i thog byas la /
T02D3305:62a-32: ka ba chud du bzhi gzhag cid zur gyi mthar thug par gdung bzhi gzhag par bya'o //
T02D3305:62a-33: de 'am gzhan gyi lugs la yang ral pa la
T02D3305:62a-34: sogs pa'i skyon med cing legs par gnas par bya
T02D3305:62a-35: ste / yan lag brgyad kyi sgo bzhi dang ldan pa bum pa bzang po dang /
T02D3305:62a-36: phyogs skyong ba'i mdog can gyi rgyal mtshan dang ldan
T02D3305:62a-37: ba gtsug tor du rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan
T02D3305:62a-38: dkar po can chu shing gi ka bas nye bar
T02D3305:62a-40: mchod sbyin gyi shing gi rigs kyis sgo bzhi'i rgyan byas la /
T02D3305:62a-41: mthar zla ba'i gdugs kyis mdzes pa /
T02D3305:62b-0: phreng @62b ba dang rnga yab la sogs pas brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa bya'o //
T02D3305:62b-2: sa sel nyes pa thams cad ni //
T02D3305:62b-3: gal te dbyung bar mi nus na //
T02D3305:62b-4: lag pas reg la sngags bzlas bya //
T02D3305:62b-5: de nyid dag pa chen po yin //
T02D3305:62b-6: khang bzangs brag steng ba lang lhas //
T02D3305:62b-7: gtsug lag khang sogs chu 'gram mam //
T02D3305:62b-8: sngon du byas pa'i gnas dag tu //
T02D3305:62b-9: ma brkos na yang dag pa yin //
T02D3305:62b-10: de'i phyir sa 'di rnams dang brkos shing brdung ba byas pa rnams la yang /
T02D3305:62b-11: aom bhu kham zhes brjod pas nam mkha' bya zhing /
T02D3305:62b-12: de nas h'um lam zhes pa 'dis rdo rje'i rang bzhin du rnam par bsgoms te /
T02D3305:62b-13: aom me di n'i badzri bha wa bandha h'um /
T02D3305:62b-14: aom ha na ha na badzra kro dha h'um phat /
T02D3305:62b-15: aom a'a: h'um sho dha ya sho dha ya raksha raksha h'um /
T02D3305:62b-17: lag pas reg cing sa gzhi byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D3305:62b-18: sa de'i dbus su ji ltar 'os par 'khyil pa
T02D3305:62b-19: bzlas pa'i rin po che dang sman dang 'bru lnga
T02D3305:62b-20: rnams bcug la / de bzlas pa'i dri'i chu yis
T02D3305:62b-21: byug par nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sa'i lha mo
T02D3305:62b-22: la gtor ma dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul
T02D3305:62b-23: rnams bcug la / nas bstim ste / aom a'a:
T02D3305:62b-24: h'um zhes brjod cing pad kor byas la yi ge
T02D3305:62b-26: sna tshogs stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'o zhes
T02D3305:62b-27: lhag par mos pas sa gzhi shin tu rnam par
T02D3305:62b-28: dag pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin du mos
T02D3305:62b-29: par bya ba ni bla na med pa'i rnam par
T02D3305:62b-30: dag pa'o zhes pa dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa la
T02D3305:62b-34: rnga dang ting shags la sogs pa //
T02D3305:62b-35: snyan pa'i sgra ldan rab tu bya ;
T02D3305:62b-36: / de nas mnyam pa'i glu blang zhing //
T02D3305:62b-37: rdo rje can des gar brtsam mo //
T02D3305:62b-38: slob dpon lnga dang lha mo bzhi //
T02D3305:62b-39: mi g-yo'i bdag nyid bzhad gad mkhan //
T02D3305:62b-40: dkyil 'khor khang par nges gnas nas //
T02D3305:62b-41: gar bya sangs rgyas zlos gar bya //
T02D3305:62b-42: zhes pa 'di'i rjes su rim pas bri bar bya'o//
T02D3305:62b-43: de la cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bya ste /
T02D3305:62b-44: dkyil 'khor khang pa la sogs pa glu dang rol
T02D3305:62b-45: mo la sogs pa yang dag par ldan par dkyil
T02D3305:62b-46: 'khor la nye bar mkho ba dang /
T02D3305:62b-47: bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa na //
T02D3305:62b-48: 'dri bar 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i rdo rje can gyis /
T02D3305:63a-2: slob ma ma yin gzhug mi bya //
T02D3305:63a-3: zhes pa'i gsung gi phyir rang gi slob ma med par gyur na'ang /
T02D3305:63a-4: gzhan gyi slob ma la yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
T02D3305:63a-5: sngom pa sbyin zhing gsol ba brjod pa sngon du
T02D3305:63a-6: 'gro ba lhag par gnas par byas nas rab tu
T02D3305:63a-8: de ltar slob ma bzhi rang rang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa dang /
T02D3305:63a-9: de bzhin du rnal 'byor ma bzhi rang rang gi
T02D3305:63a-10: 'khor los sgyur ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kun nas bsams
T02D3305:63a-11: pa dang bud med med na skyes pa nyid bud
T02D3305:63a-12: med kyi cha lugs dang yang dag par ldan pa
T02D3305:63a-13: dang / de bzhin du mi g-yo ba bdud thams cad sdigs par byed pa'i mchog rnams so //
T02D3305:63a-14: de la dkyil 'khor gyi dbang ldan gyi mtshams gzhan gyi phyogs nas kyang rung /
T02D3305:63a-15: yol ba'i nang du rang rang gi lha'i mdog dang
T02D3305:63a-16: mtshungs par gdong lus la snag tsha la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:63a-18: h'um yig las byas pa'i mig 'bras 'bar ba'i lta
T02D3305:63a-19: ba can khro bo chen po khro gnyer g-yo zhing
T02D3305:63a-20: rnam par 'gyur ba'i spyan dang ldan pa 'jig pa'i
T02D3305:63a-21: dus kyi bskal pa'i me dang 'dra bar bzod par
T02D3305:63a-22: dka' ba'i lta bas bdud rnams bskrad par bya ba
T02D3305:63a-23: dang / sems can thams cad gnyis su med pa'i
T02D3305:63a-24: de bzhin nyid du ro gcig pa'i bde ba chen
T02D3305:63a-25: po la rab tu gzhag par bya ba'i ched du
T02D3305:63a-26: byas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rdo rje can nag
T02D3305:63a-28: de bzhin du ri rab ltar brtan cing mi 'gul
T02D3305:63a-29: ba'i spyan gyis byams par lta ba can aom yig
T02D3305:63a-30: las mig 'bras byas pa bsil ba'i bdud rtsi'i 'od
T02D3305:63a-31: zer dkar po'i phreng ba'i lta bas phun sum tshogs
T02D3305:63a-32: pa dang bral ba rnams dang med pa'i brtul zhugs
T02D3305:63a-33: 'dzin pa rnams sangs rgyas gti mug mi gnas pa'i
T02D3305:63a-34: mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu gzhag pa'i
T02D3305:63a-35: ched du byas pa'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i rtag pa
T02D3305:63a-36: dkar po ni shar gyi sgo ru'o //
T02D3305:63a-37: de bzhin du g-yon par brten cing g-yon du rjes
T02D3305:63a-38: su song ba'i lta ba can hr'i:yig las mig 'bras
T02D3305:63a-39: byas pa'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyus rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D3305:63a-40: chub tu bsgyur bar bya ba'i nyan thos la sogs
T02D3305:63a-41: pa rnams 'dod chags chen po'i byang chub la rnam
T02D3305:63a-42: par gzhag pa'i ched du rjes su chags pa dmar
T02D3305:63b-0: po'i mdog can byas pa'i padma 'dzin @63b pa'i gar
T02D3305:63b-1: gyi dbang phyug ni nub kyi sgo ru'o //
T02D3305:63b-2: de bzhin du ji lta bar kham yig las mig
T02D3305:63b-3: 'bras byas pa 'bar ba'i lcags kyus thams cad mkhyen
T02D3305:63b-4: pa'i lam la brten nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa
T02D3305:63b-5: thob pa'i dngos grub mthong ba rnams dang /
T02D3305:63b-6: nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam la mos pas sna
T02D3305:63b-7: tshogs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa mthong ba rnams
T02D3305:63b-8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges par
T02D3305:63b-9: bya ba'i ched du byas pa'i ral gri 'dzin ba'i
T02D3305:63b-10: rta mchog ljang gu ni byang gi sgo ru'o //
T02D3305:63b-11: de bzhin du dza yig las skyes pa ser po'i
T02D3305:63b-12: mig g-yas su bteg cing steng du lta ba'i lcags
T02D3305:63b-13: kyus nga rgyal dang gdug pa can rnams ser sna
T02D3305:63b-14: med par bya ba'i phyir dang mnyam pa nyid kyi
T02D3305:63b-15: ye shes la nges par sbyar ba'i ched du byas
T02D3305:63b-16: pa'i rin po che 'dzin pa'i rdo rje nyi ma
T02D3305:63b-17: ser po ni lho'i sgo ru ste /
T02D3305:63b-18: shar dang nub dang byang dang lho yi phyogs //

T02D3305:75b-42: rdo rje gnyis ni gdong du bslang //
T02D3305:75b-43: rdo rje gar gyis bskor ni //
