T02D3305:78b-1: aom tsandra na ksha tra aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:78b-2: zhes pa ni changs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya'i sngags so //
T02D3305:78b-3: aom aa dhv'a: pri thi byee sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:78b-4: aom aa su re bhya: sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:78b-6: zhes pa ni sa'i lha mo la sogs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya'i sngags so //
T02D3305:78b-7: de ltar sgyu 'phrul dra ba las gsungs pa ste
T02D3305:78b-8: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi thun mong pa'i 'dug stangs
T02D3305:78b-9: dang phyag rgya dang sngags kyi tshig rnams kyis nges
T02D3305:78b-11: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi dri'i chus byugs la me tog dang spos la sogs pa dang /
T02D3305:78b-12: zur bzhi dang sgo bzhir spos phor la sogs pa
T02D3305:78b-13: dang gar dang glu la sogs pas yang dag par
T02D3305:78b-14: mchod nas lag pas reg cing dkyil 'khor gyi bdag
T02D3305:78b-15: po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dang yi ge brgya pa
T02D3305:78b-16: lan bdun yongs su bzlas te de nyid du lha'i
T02D3305:78b-17: 'khor lo spro zhing bsdu bas nyal bar bya'o zhes
T02D3305:78b-18: pas yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:78b-20: // / de nas snga bar langs la rdo rje 'chang
T02D3305:78b-21: gi go 'phang la dgod pa'i ched du slar yang
T02D3305:78b-22: bgegs med par bya'o zhes rnam par bsam ste skad
T02D3305:78b-23: cig gis stong pa nyid kyi rjes la /
T02D3305:78b-24: re phas sngon du nyi ma rnams par bsgoms nas //
T02D3305:78b-25: nyi der h'um byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste //
T02D3305:78b-26: rdo rje de nyid las ni ra ba dang //
T02D3305:78b-27: gur bcing ba yang rnam par bsgom pa nyid //
T02D3305:78b-28: ces pa 'dis rdo rje'i grul sogs pa bsgoms te /
T02D3305:78b-29: de'i dbus su rang nyid dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug
T02D3305:78b-30: gi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas snying gar gnas pa'i
T02D3305:78b-31: h'um yig las rnam par spros pa'i 'od zer gyis
T02D3305:78b-32: phyogs bcu'i bgegs thams cad bkug nas h'um yig las
T02D3305:78b-33: spros pa'i khro bo bcu la gtad par bya'o //
T02D3305:78b-34: khro bo de rnams kyang srid du sor bco brgyad pa'am /
T02D3305:78b-36: sor brgyad pa rim pa ji lta ba bzhin sboms su sor drug pa dang /
T02D3305:78b-37: bzhi pa dang gsum pa seng ldeng ngam rus pa'am
T02D3305:78b-38: lcags las byas pa'i phur bu snod gsar par gnas
T02D3305:78b-39: shing yungs kar dang tsandan dkar po byugs pa tshon
T02D3305:78b-40: sna lnga'i srad bus dkris shing yang dag par mchod
T02D3305:78b-41: pa yi ge gsum gyis sngags shing /
T02D3305:79a-0: me tog dmar po'i phreng ba bcings pa'i phur bu bcu po de rnams lte ba'i @79a * //
T02D3305:79a-1: 'og man chad rtse gcig pa'i rnam par rno ba dang /
T02D3305:79a-2: steng du bdag nyid kyi gzugs brnyan khro bo'i rnam
T02D3305:79a-3: pa bskal pa'i mtha'i me ltar 'bar ba rnam par
T02D3305:79a-4: bsgoms te / g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis
T02D3305:79a-5: bzung zhing phyag g-yas pas gtso bo'i mtshan ma yongs
T02D3305:79a-6: su gyur pa'i rdo rje'i thob me tog dmar po'i
T02D3305:79a-7: phreng bas spras pa bzung ste /
T02D3305:79a-8: sgra ring por brjod pa'i h'um las byung ba'i khron
T02D3305:79a-9: pa bcur dbang po la sogs pa bcu'i gzugs brnyan
T02D3305:79a-10: gyi bgegs 'khor dang bcas ba rnams rab tu bcug
T02D3305:79a-11: la spyi bor phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02D3305:79a-13: aom a'a: h'um ya m'a nta kri ta sarba dushta aindra au pendra'a na /
T02D3305:79a-14: sa pa ri w'a r'a na ka'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D3305:79a-15: aom a'a: h'um pra dzny'a nta kri ta sarba du
T02D3305:79a-16: shta ya m'a na sa pa ri w'a r'a na
T02D3305:79a-18: aom a'a: h'um padm'a nta kri ta sarba dushta n'a
T02D3305:79a-19: g'a na sa pa ri w'a r'a na k'i la
T02D3305:79a-20: ya h'um phat / aom a'a:h'um bighn'anta kri ta sarba
T02D3305:79a-21: dushta ku be r'a na sa pa ri w'a r'a
T02D3305:79a-22: na k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D3305:79a-23: aom a'a:h'um aa tsi la sarba dushta a'i sha n'a
T02D3305:79a-24: na sa pa ri w'a r'a na k'i la ya
T02D3305:79a-25: h'um phat / aom a'a:h'um takki r'a dza sarba dushta
T02D3305:79a-26: aagni na sa pa ri w'a r'a na k'i la
T02D3305:79a-27: h'um phat / ya h'um phat / aom a'a:h'um n'i
T02D3305:79a-28: la danda sarba dushta nee ri ty'a na sa pa
T02D3305:79a-29: ri w'a r'a na k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D3305:79a-30: aom a'a:h'um ma h'a ba la sarba du shta b'a
T02D3305:79a-31: yun sa pa ri w'a r'a na k'i la ya
T02D3305:79a-32: h'um phat / aom a'a: h'um aushna'i sha tsakra brtin
T02D3305:79a-33: sarba du shta aa rka tsandra pa ti ma h'a
T02D3305:79a-34: na sa pa ri w'a r'a na ka'i la ya
T02D3305:79a-35: h'um phat / h'um phat / aom a'a: h'um su
T02D3305:79a-36: mbha r'a dza sarba dushta be ma tsi pri thi
T02D3305:79a-37: bi de ba t'a:sa pa ri w'a r'a na ka'i
T02D3305:79a-39: ces pa'i sngags rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i
T02D3305:79a-40: phyi'i phyogs bcu po rnams su 'jim pa'i gong bu
T02D3305:79a-41: byas par slob dpon gyis gdab cing brdung bar bya
T02D3305:79a-42: ste / mi nus na sgo'i slob dpon rnams kyis so //
T02D3305:79a-43: gtsug tor gyi ni shar gyi phur bu las shar du ste /
T02D3305:79a-44: gnod mdzes kyi ni nub kyi phur bu las nub tu gdab cing brdung bar bya'o //
T02D3305:79a-45: phur bu'i gzugs brnyan gyi khro bo rnams gdugs dang
T02D3305:79a-46: rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pas mnyes par
T02D3305:79a-47: bya zhing / nyi ma so so la thun gsum
T02D3305:79a-48: du gtor ma dang lha ba shos dang rol mo
T02D3305:79a-49: dang me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pa rnams
T02D3305:79b-0: @79b yang na seng ldeng la sogs pa'i phur bu
T02D3305:79b-1: med na yang ji ltar brjod pa'i bsgom pa kho
T02D3305:79b-2: nas phur bu gdab pa dang brdung bar bya ste
T02D3305:79b-3: lag pa gnas rkyal du gnas pa bsgyur nas aom
T02D3305:79b-4: badzra h'um zhes brjod cing sa gzhir bgegs la bsnun
T02D3305:79b-5: te de ltar lhag par mos par bya'o zhes pa
T02D3305:79b-6: bgegs la phur bus gdab pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:79b-8: // / de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor la 'chad par 'gyur
T02D3305:79b-9: ba'i cho gas dkyil 'khor ji lta ba'i rjes su
T02D3305:79b-10: 'brangs te thig 'debs pa dang 'bri ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:79b-11: gyis gzhir bsdad la dbas su dri'i mandala byas par
T02D3305:79b-12: pam las byung ba'i sa'i lha mo rnam par bsgoms
T02D3305:79b-13: nas lag pa g-yas par zla ba la h'um gsum
T02D3305:79b-14: bsams te / sor mo'i rtse mo sa la lan
T02D3305:79b-15: gsum bsnun pa dang de'i sgra dang h'um gi 'od
T02D3305:79b-16: zer rnams kyis yang dag par bskul ba las 'thon
T02D3305:79b-17: pa'i sa'i lha mo ye shes sems dpa' dang gcig
T02D3305:79b-18: tu gyur pa dgyes pa'i thugs can ser mo zhi
T02D3305:79b-19: zhing gos dkar mo mnabs pa rgyan thams cad dang
T02D3305:79b-20: bsams te / ldan pa / zhal gcig phyag gnyis
T02D3305:79b-21: ma g-yon pas bum pa bzang po 'dzin cing cig
T02D3305:79b-22: shos kyis mi 'jigs pa mdzad pa mdun du gnas
T02D3305:79b-23: pa la mchod yon la sogs pa sngon du 'gro
T02D3305:79b-24: bas yang dag par mchod pas de ma thag tu
T02D3305:79b-25: bsams te / ldan pa / / aom tshur byon tshur byon sa yi ni //
T02D3305:79b-26: lha mo chen mo 'jig rten yum //
T02D3305:79b-27: rin chen kun gyis rab gang ma //
T02D3305:79b-28: bzang po'i rgyan gyis rnam brgyan ma //
T02D3305:79b-29: do shal rkang gdub sgra ldan ma //
T02D3305:79b-30: rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchod ma //
T02D3305:79b-31: mchod yon 'di ni bzhes nas su //
T02D3305:79b-33: hri h'i h'i h'i ham sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:79b-34: zhes lan gsum brjod la lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D3305:79b-35: de yang de bzhin du gyis shig ces gsungs nas
T02D3305:79b-36: de nyid du thim par bsam mo zhes pa nor
T02D3305:79b-37: 'dzin ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:79b-39: // / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhir bdud rtsi
T02D3305:79b-40: lnga dang bcas pa'i dri bzangs la aom a'a:h'um gis
T02D3305:79b-41: sngags pas nye bar byugs cing me tog bzang po
T02D3305:79b-42: gcal du bkram du bcug ste /
T02D3305:79b-44: khrus dang gtsang spra dri zhim lus //
T02D3305:79b-45: sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D3305:79b-46: dkar po gsar ba'i gos 'dzin pa //
T02D3305:80a-0: @80a * // de yi gtsug tor rnam par brgyan //
T02D3305:80a-1: zhes pa'i gsung gi phyir sbyin pa'i bdag pos phul
T02D3305:80a-2: ba'i do shal dang rkang gdub dang dpung rgyan dang
T02D3305:80a-3: lag gdub dang / rked rgyan dang /
T02D3305:80a-4: sor gdub la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan nas /
T02D3305:80a-5: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du aom a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:80a-6: aom badzra au shn'i sha h'um phat /
T02D3305:80a-7: ces pa dag lan bdun bzlas pa'i gser gyi dbu rgyan dag gos la sogs pas brgyan cing /
T02D3305:80a-8: dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la shar du
T02D3305:80a-9: mngon par phyogs pa'am phyogs gzhan la ni dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:80a-10: gyi shar nub tu mngon par phyogs pas 'dug ste
T02D3305:80a-11: / 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor dang ldan
T02D3305:80a-12: pas lha rnams kyi gnas su tsandan la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:80a-13: / mandala byas la / ji lta bar dam tshig gi 'khor lo rnam par bsgoms nas /
T02D3305:80a-14: der snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan
T02D3305:80a-15: drangs pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu bcug
T02D3305:80a-16: ste / mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba ji snyed pa bya'o //
T02D3305:80a-17: bsgoms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du shar la
T02D3305:80a-18: sogs pa'i phyogs su gnas pa'i bum pa rnams sam
T02D3305:80a-19: / phyogs gzhan la ni byang du phyogs pas dbang
T02D3305:80a-20: ldan gyi mtshams na gnas pa'i bum pa rnams lhag
T02D3305:80a-22: de la zhi ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas de rnams kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02D3305:80a-23: de ltar yang zhi ba dang rgyas pa dag gi
T02D3305:80a-24: bum pa'i lto ba'i zlums su ni sor bcu drug
T02D3305:80a-25: go // lto ba'i 'og nas kha dang mchu'i bar ji srid par dpangs su ni sor nyi shu'o //
T02D3305:80a-26: 'og tu 'phyar ba'i mchu'i tshad ni sor gnyis so //
T02D3305:80a-27: mgrin pa ni sor drug go //
T02D3305:80a-28: mchu'i mtha' nas mchu'i mtha'i bar ji srid pa'i kha ni sor brgyad do //
T02D3305:80a-29: sor brgyad kyi cha gnyis ni kha'i bug pa'o //
T02D3305:80a-30: cha gcig gis ni mchu gnyis kyi zheng ngo //
T02D3305:80a-31: dbye ba dang bskrad pa dag gi bum pa'i lto ba'i zlum po ni sor bcu gnyis so //
T02D3305:80a-32: dpangs su ni sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D3305:80a-33: mgrin pa yon po ste sor brgyad do //
T02D3305:80a-35: mchu dag ni sor re re'o //
T02D3305:80a-36: dbang dang dgug pa dag gi bum pa ni /
T02D3305:80b-0: bzo @80b pos ji ltar byas pa'o //
T02D3305:80b-1: rengs pa'i bum pa ni thung ba ste zlums dang dpangs su sor bcu drug go //
T02D3305:80b-4: mchu ni sbom zhing sor gnyis pa'o //
T02D3305:80b-5: las thams cad pa la ni zhi ba la sogs
T02D3305:80b-6: pa'i las la brjod pa'i bum pa rnams gzung bar
T02D3305:80b-7: bya'o // rtsa ba dang ni nag po med //
T02D3305:80b-8: mchu 'phyang mgrin rings lto ba che //
T02D3305:80b-9: zhes rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa yang sor bcu drug pa la sogs pa rnams la rig par bya'o //
T02D3305:80b-10: de'i phyir mtshan nyid dang ldan pa gsungs pa /
T02D3305:80b-11: gser ram dngul lam zangs ma 'am //
T02D3305:80b-12: yang na sa las byas pa nyid //
T02D3305:80b-13: ji ltar rnyed pa'i bum pa ni //
T02D3305:80b-14: brtul zhugs can gyis dkyil 'khor dgod //
T02D3305:80b-15: byi ru dang ni gser dang dngul //
T02D3305:80b-16: padma r'a ga mu tig ste //
T02D3305:80b-17: rin chen lngar ni ldan pa rnams //
T02D3305:80b-18: bum pa'i lto bar rab tu gzhug / nas dang gro dang mon sran dang //
T02D3305:80b-19: til dang de bzhin so ba ste //
T02D3305:80b-20: 'bru lnga rnams su bstan pa ni //
T02D3305:80b-21: bum pa'i lto bar gzhag par bya //
T02D3305:80b-22: bri ha ti dang kanda ka ri //
T02D3305:80b-23: ha sa de ba aa pa ra dzi ta //
T02D3305:80b-24: dando da pa la'i rtsa ba ste //
T02D3305:80b-25: sman lnga rnams kyang gzhug par bya //
T02D3305:80b-26: aa mra au dumb'a ra dang //
T02D3305:80b-27: aa sho ka dang aa shva dtha //
T02D3305:80b-28: de bzhin n'a ga ge sar te //
T02D3305:80b-29: yal 'dab lnga rnams byin pa yis //
T02D3305:80b-30: bum pa'i kha ni brgyan par bya //
T02D3305:80b-31: bum pa rnams kyi mgrin pa ni //
T02D3305:80b-32: gos dkar chen pos bcings bar bya //
T02D3305:80b-33: cho ga mkhas pas gos steng du //
T02D3305:80b-34: srad bu lnga rnams dgod par bya //
T02D3305:80b-35: dkyil 'khor pa ni thams cad kyi //
T02D3305:80b-36: sa bon yang na mtshan ma 'ang rung //
T02D3305:80b-38: mkhas pas bum pa'i logs la bri //
T02D3305:80b-39: rin chen la sogs ldan par 'dir //
T02D3305:80b-40: rang rang rgyud las mngon bsngags pa'o //
T02D3305:80b-41: chu dang ldan pa blo ldan gyis //
T02D3305:80b-42: lha yi grang bzhin dgod par bya //
T02D3305:80b-43: zhes pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi bum
T02D3305:80b-44: pa rnams bla re'i 'og tu 'chad par 'gyur ba'i
T02D3305:80b-45: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la mtshan ma dgod pa'i
T02D3305:80b-46: rim pas so sor re rer dri bzang po la
T02D3305:80b-47: sogs pa'i mandala gyi steng du rjes su mthun pa'i
T02D3305:81a-0: gdan la dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa'am @81a * //
T02D3305:81a-2: aom badzra shi kha ra ru ta ma ta di
T02D3305:81a-3: sham bandha h'um zhes lan bdun bzlas pa'i srad bu
T02D3305:81a-4: dkar po sogs kyis mgrin par dkris nas mdun du
T02D3305:81a-6: dang por stong pa nyid du byas pa'i mthar bam
T02D3305:81a-7: gyi yi ge las rin po che'i rang bzhin du
T02D3305:81a-8: bsgom par bya'o // ji skad gsungs pa'i rin po
T02D3305:81a-9: che lnga rnams med na rin po che gzhan rab
T02D3305:81a-11: kha cig tu ni so ba'i gnas su sran ma
T02D3305:81a-12: ste yal 'dab lnga rnams med na cho ga rjes
T02D3305:81a-13: su shes pa rnams kyis byang chub kyi shing gi
T02D3305:81a-14: yal 'dab gcig pus kyang ngo zhes bcom ldan 'das
T02D3305:81a-15: kyis gsungs so // ji skad gsungs pa'i sman rnams
T02D3305:81a-16: med na sman gzhan dag rab tu gzhug par bya'o
T02D3305:81a-17: kyis gsungs so // // 'byor pa chung na rnam
T02D3305:81a-18: par rgyal ba dang las thams cad pa dag la
T02D3305:81a-19: rin po che'i snying por bya'o //
T02D3305:81a-20: der yang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la ni nges par rin po che'i snying por bya'o //
T02D3305:81a-21: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la ni chos kyi
T02D3305:81a-22: 'byung gnas kyi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes la
T02D3305:81a-23: gnas pa'i zla ba 'am nyi ma la ji ltar
T02D3305:81a-24: rigs par bdag po'i mtshan ma'am sa bon /
T02D3305:81a-25: de las gzhan ba'i bum pa rnams la ni sna
T02D3305:81a-26: tshogs chu skyes la gnas pa'i zla ba'am nyi mar
T02D3305:81a-27: rang gi mtshan ma'am sa bon nam /
T02D3305:81a-28: lha rnams ji lta bar bri bar bya'o //
T02D3305:81a-29: dkyil 'khor gang du lha ji snyed pa de srid de rnams kyi bum pa'o //
T02D3305:81a-30: yang na pho brang gi snying por gnas rnams kho na'i'o //
T02D3305:81a-31: de la rigs kyi yum rnams kyi ni bzhi'o //
T02D3305:81a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ni lnga'o //
T02D3305:81a-33: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kho na'i lnga'o //
T02D3305:81a-34: yang na bdag po'i gcig dang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i gcig dang /
T02D3305:81a-35: rigs kyi yum bzhi'i gcig dang /
T02D3305:81a-36: gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug gi gcig dang /
T02D3305:81a-37: khro bo bzhi'i gcig ste lnga'o //
T02D3305:81a-38: yang na gtso bo kho na'i gcig go //
T02D3305:81a-39: phyogs 'di rnams la ni las thams cad pa'i bum
T02D3305:81a-40: par lhag por bya ste slob ma la sogs pa
T02D3305:81a-42: kha cig ni 'di mi 'dod cing bum pa gnyis yang med na /
T02D3305:81a-43: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la gtso bo'i mchan
T02D3305:81b-0: ma'i g-yon du las thams cad pa'i @81b mtshan ma
T02D3305:81b-1: bri bar bya'o zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan te //
T02D3305:81b-2: de'i mtshan ma ni bgegs mthar byed kyi'o //
T02D3305:81b-3: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i yang mtshan ma
T02D3305:81b-4: bzhi phyogs bzhir bri'o zhes pa'i phyogs la ni gtso
T02D3305:81b-5: bo'i mtshan ma rnam par snang mdzad kyi mtshan ma'i
T02D3305:81b-6: steng du'o // kha cig tu ni der gnas pa nyid mchu'i steng du'o zhes bshad do //
T02D3305:81b-7: spyan ma la sogs pa rnams kyi'ang phyogs bral bzhin du'o zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no //
T02D3305:81b-9: sangs rgyas lnga dang lha mo bzhi //
T02D3305:81b-10: khro bo bzhi yi bum pa rnams //
T02D3305:81b-11: so so'i 'khyil pa'i gcig dang ni //
T02D3305:81b-12: gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs drug la //
T02D3305:81b-13: gcig ste mtshan ma ldan pa'o //
T02D3305:81b-15: de ltar brjod pa'i phyogs rnams las phyogs gzhan du
T02D3305:81b-16: 'ga' zhig brjod pa de dag ni rig pa ma
T02D3305:81b-17: yin no // de ltar 'jam pa'i rdo rje la dkyil 'khor nyi shu dang /
T02D3305:81b-21: gcig dang bco lnga ste bum pa'i grangs rnam par gzhag pa'o //
T02D3305:81b-22: bsdus pa'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor du lnga pa gnyis
T02D3305:81b-23: kyi phyogs la ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
T02D3305:81b-24: gcig dang / yum rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02D3305:81b-25: gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa bzhi'i gcig dang /
T02D3305:81b-26: byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi gcig dang /
T02D3305:81b-27: khro bo bcu'i gcig go zhes pa ni khyad par ro //
T02D3305:81b-29: rang phyogs sras gnyis dag gi gcig / khro drug btsun mo rnams kyi yang //
T02D3305:81b-30: snying por gnas dang sgo skyong dang //
T02D3305:81b-31: bgegs dgra'i re re nyi shu'o //
T02D3305:81b-33: kha sbyor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du phyogs gnyis pa'i lnga pa ni /
T02D3305:81b-34: pho brang gi snying por gnas pa rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02D3305:81b-35: pho brang gnyis par gnas pa rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02D3305:81b-36: phyogs brgyad kyi lha mo rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02D3305:81b-37: zur gyi lha mo rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02D3305:81b-38: sgo skyong rnams kyi gcig go zhes pa ni khyad par ro //
T02D3305:81b-39: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02D3305:81b-40: rigs kyi yum rnams dang sgo skyong rnams kyi bum pa re re dang /
T02D3305:81b-41: rim pa gnyis pa'i phyogs kyi lha mo rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02D3305:82a-0: phyogs bral gyi lha mo rnams @82a * //
T02D3305:82a-2: rim pa gsum pa'i phyogs kyi g-yon na gnas pa rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02D3305:82a-3: g-yas na gnas pa rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02D3305:82a-4: zur na gnas pa rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02D3305:82a-5: de'i phyi rol gyi zur na gnas pa rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02D3305:82a-6: las thams cad pa'i gcig ste /
T02D3305:82a-7: de ltar nyi shu'o zhes pa ni kha cig gi'o //
T02D3305:82a-8: dpal bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor la ni 'khor lo lnga la so sor re re ste lnga'o //
T02D3305:82a-9: yang na snying po'i pho brang du gnas pa kho na'i lnga'o //
T02D3305:82a-10: yang na 'di rnams kyi rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D3305:82a-12: yang na dbus kyi pho brang dang dam tshig gi
T02D3305:82a-13: 'khor lo la gnas pa rnams kyi gcig ste bcu
T02D3305:82a-14: gsum mo // thugs kyi 'khor lo la phyogs su gnas pa rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02D3305:82a-15: phyogs bral du gnas pa rnams kyi gcig go //
T02D3305:82a-16: de bzhin du gsung gi 'khor lo dang sku'i 'khor lo la yang ste bcu dgu'o //
T02D3305:82a-17: phyogs 'di rnams su lha so so'i dgod pa yang
T02D3305:82a-18: las thams cad pa dum skyes ma'i lhag par dgod
T02D3305:82a-19: par bya'o // 'di'i rjes su 'brangs nas dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:82a-20: gzhan rnams la yang ji ltar rigs par bum pa'i
T02D3305:82a-22: de la gtso bo yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D3305:82a-23: bya ba mang ba'i phyir rnam rgyal bum pa'i steng du /
T02D3305:82a-24: aom badzra aa mri ta au da ka h'um zhes
T02D3305:82a-25: pa 'di dang yi ge gsum gyis kyang lan bdun
T02D3305:82a-26: bsngags pas ye shes kyi bdud rtsir bya zhing /
T02D3305:82a-27: rdo rje'i rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin dang /
T02D3305:82a-28: ji ltar rnyed pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang /
T02D3305:82a-29: dri bzang po'i chu dang ldan pa h'um gyis bsngags
T02D3305:82a-30: nas dud chos sam padma'i snod du me tog gi
T02D3305:82a-31: phreng ba bcings pa'i rdo rje dang bcas pa bzhag
T02D3305:82a-32: la nang du / aom ta pte ma h'a tapte sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:82a-33: zhes pas bkug pa'i gong gi lha'i chu'i ngo bo
T02D3305:82a-34: las lha'i 'khor lo gdan dang bcas pa skad cig
T02D3305:82a-35: gis rnam par bsams te rang gi snying ga'i sa
T02D3305:82a-36: bon gyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi spyan drangs pa'i
T02D3305:82a-38: zhal bsil dang mchod yon rnams dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3305:82a-39: de nas dam tshig gi 'khor lo la rab tu bcug ste /
T02D3305:82a-40: chags pa chen pos zhu bar gyur nas sngar blugs
T02D3305:82a-41: pa'i chu dang byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bor
T02D3305:82a-42: ro gcig tu gyur par bsgom mo //
T02D3305:82b-0: mtshan ma yang dam tshig gi @82b lha ye shes kyi lha dang gcig tu gyur par bsam mo //
T02D3305:82b-1: de nas rdo rje dang 'brel ba'i me tog gi
T02D3305:82b-2: mthar g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung nas h'um gis
T02D3305:82b-3: bsngags te 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi snying po brgya
T02D3305:82b-4: rtsa brgyad dam / aom badzra au da ka h'um /
T02D3305:82b-5: zhes pa 'dis chu la mngon par bsngags la der
T02D3305:82b-6: 'khyil pas bsngags pa'i me tog dkar po gsum gzhug
T02D3305:82b-7: par bya'o // gzhan yang bum pa gang zhig lha gang gi yin pa de la ni /
T02D3305:82b-8: de'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam bdun gyis bsngags par bya ste /
T02D3305:82b-9: rdo rje'i me tog gi phreng ba'i mthar bzung nas so //
T02D3305:82b-10: de bzhin du me tog kyang gzhug par bya'o //
T02D3305:82b-11: de nas rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i bum
T02D3305:82b-12: pa rnams me tog la sogs pas yang dag par
T02D3305:82b-13: mchod la / srung ba'i don du las thams cad pa'i chus de'i yal 'dab kyis bsangs te /
T02D3305:82b-14: 'dir ji srid dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba ma rdzogs
T02D3305:82b-15: pa de srid du bgegs rnams bzlog par mdzod cig
T02D3305:82b-16: ces brjod cing gtor ma phul nas nye bar reg
T02D3305:82b-17: la / mi bskyod rdo rje zhes pa la sogs
T02D3305:82b-18: pa'i bstod pa sngon du 'gro bas dril bu dkrol
T02D3305:82b-19: la / bar bya'o // bum pa de rnams las
T02D3305:82b-20: chu nyung zad nyung zad blangs la dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D3305:82b-21: khang pa'i shar sgo'i byang gi char man 'ji la
T02D3305:82b-22: gnas pa'i dung chos la sogs pa gzhag par bya
T02D3305:82b-23: la / bar bya'o // ste / bdag nyid dang
T02D3305:82b-24: slob ma rnams la bsang gtor bya ba'i don du'o
T02D3305:82b-25: la / bar bya'o // ste / // las thams
T02D3305:82b-26: cad pa'i bum pa nyid ku sha'i chun po dang
T02D3305:82b-27: ldan pa de'i don du der gzhag par bya'o zhes
T02D3305:82b-29: bum pa rnams la mngon par bsngags pa dang mchod
T02D3305:82b-30: pa la sogs pa rnams ni nyi ma so sor
T02D3305:82b-31: thun gsum mam gcig tu bya'o //
T02D3305:82b-32: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la sogs pa'i sngags ni dkyil
T02D3305:82b-33: 'khor so so'i sgrub thabs la sogs pa rnams su
T02D3305:82b-34: blta bar bya'o // mdor bsdus pa ni slar yang 'di nyid du 'chad par 'gyur ba ste /
T02D3305:82b-35: dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gzugs dang kha dog dang mtshan ma la sogs pa brjod pa'i dus su'o //
T02D3305:82b-36: 'di dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i las la nye bar
T02D3305:82b-37: mkho ba'i don du dang por rdul tshon dkar po
T02D3305:82b-38: la sogs pas padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris pa'i
T02D3305:83a-1: rgyal ba'i bum pa'am las thams cad pa'i bum pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02D3305:83a-2: shar gyi 'dab ma la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho
T02D3305:83a-3: gas lhag par gnas pa byas pa'i tshon sna lnga'i
T02D3305:83a-4: thig skud gser la sogs pa'i snod du gnas pa'o
T02D3305:83a-6: byang du rdo rje'i dril bu'o //
T02D3305:83a-7: nub dang zur gyi 'dab ma rnams la ji ltar rigs par rdul tshon lnga'i snod rnams so //
T02D3305:83a-8: der 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas te bum pa'i chus rdul
T02D3305:83a-9: tshon dang thig skud rnams bsang gtor bya'o zhes pa
T02D3305:83a-10: bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:83a-12: // / de nas dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi dri bzangs la
T02D3305:83a-13: sogs pas byugs shing me tog gcal du 'grems su
T02D3305:83a-14: bcug ste / der ji ltar 'byung ba'i bdag po
T02D3305:83a-15: lnga'i le tshe rnams su mandala gru bzhi pa bya
T02D3305:83a-16: zhing lha gzhan rnams la zlum po ste /
T02D3305:83a-17: bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i dri bzang po rnams kyis bya'o //
T02D3305:83a-18: nub tu phyogs pas mandala de rnams su rang gi
T02D3305:83a-19: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis 'dri bar
T02D3305:83a-20: 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ji ltar rigs
T02D3305:83a-21: par chu skyes la gnas pa'i zla ba'am nyi ma
T02D3305:83a-23: zhabs bsil la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa dang /
T02D3305:83a-24: bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba byas te /
T02D3305:83a-25: bus mo g-yas pa sa la btsugs shing lce h'um
T02D3305:83a-26: las skyes pa'i rdo rje rtse gcig par byas pa
T02D3305:83a-27: h'um bkod nas lag pa g-yas pas sbos phor thogs
T02D3305:83a-28: te / g-yon pas rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing /
T02D3305:83a-29: bcom ldan rdo rje che ge mchog / rig pa'i rgyal po khyod la 'dud //
T02D3305:83a-30: mgon po thugs rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02D3305:83a-32: slob ma rnams la brtse don dang //
T02D3305:83a-33: khyed rnams la yang mchod phyir dang //
T02D3305:83a-34: sems can bsod nams spel don dang //
T02D3305:83a-35: byang chub sems ni bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02D3305:83a-36: de pas bcom ldan bdag gus la //
T02D3305:83a-37: bka' drin gnang bar mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02D3305:83a-39: byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang //
T02D3305:83a-40: gzhan yang gang dag gsang sngags lha //
T02D3305:83a-41: lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang //
T02D3305:83a-42: 'byung po byang chub bstan gnas dang //
T02D3305:83a-43: sems can bstan la mngon dga' dang /
T02D3305:83b-0: @83b gang su rdo rje'i spyan ldan rnams //
T02D3305:83b-1: bdag la yang dag dgongs su gsol //
T02D3305:83b-2: bdag ni che ge rdo rje che //
T02D3305:83b-4: ji ltar nus par nyer spyod pas //
T02D3305:83b-5: 'gro ba sbyang phyir bri bar bya //
T02D3305:83b-6: zhes don mngon du byed cing lan gsum brjod pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o//
T02D3305:83b-7: zhes pa lha lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:83b-9: // / de'i rjes la ye shes kyi thig la sogs
T02D3305:83b-10: pa'i don du dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi'i steng gi
T02D3305:83b-11: nam mkhar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo blos bkod nas
T02D3305:83b-12: yang dag par mchod de shar du mngon par phyogs
T02D3305:83b-13: shing dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor dang
T02D3305:83b-14: ldan pas gzhon nu ma ma nyams pas bkal ba'am
T02D3305:83b-15: dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i skud pa lnga pa
T02D3305:83b-16: lnga snod lngar gnas pa rnams dri zhim po dang
T02D3305:83b-17: ldan pa'i kha dog dkar po dang ser po dang
T02D3305:83b-18: dmar po dang ljang gu dang nag po rnams dang
T02D3305:83b-19: yungs kar gyi phye ma dang bdud rtsi lnga bsres
T02D3305:83b-20: pa rnams kyis so sor kha bsgyur la lag pa
T02D3305:83b-21: g-yon pa'i mthil du sor mo'i rtse mo nas brtsams
T02D3305:83b-22: te mthe bong gi bar ji srid par rnam par
T02D3305:83b-23: bkod la / bhr'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um gi yi
T02D3305:83b-24: ge rnams las bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i
T02D3305:83b-25: ngo bor gyur par bsgoms te /
T02D3305:83b-26: nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol ba'i rang rang gi
T02D3305:83b-27: phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa bsdus par gyur pa
T02D3305:83b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i thugs kar bhr'um yig la
T02D3305:83b-29: sogs pa las grub pa'i ye shes kyi skud pa
T02D3305:83b-30: 'od zer dang bcas par blta zhing /
T02D3305:83b-31: aom a'a: sh'a shva ta badzra s'u tra mme pra
T02D3305:83b-32: ya tstsha ma h'a mandala s'u tra n'a ya h'um
T02D3305:83b-33: / zhes pa 'dis rnam par snang mdzad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D3305:83b-34: ming yongs su bsgyur nas rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa la yod do //
T02D3305:83b-35: mig gnyis dza: yig las skyes pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma ser po'i rang bzhin du byas te /
T02D3305:83b-36: aom d'i pta drishti aam ku sha dza: zhes brjod
T02D3305:83b-37: cing rab tu myur bar g-yo ba'i mig gi rdzi
T02D3305:83b-38: ma 'degs shing 'gugs pa 'bar ba'i lta stangs lcags
T02D3305:83b-39: kyu lta bus rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
T02D3305:83b-40: bskul bas de rnams rang gi kha dog can gyi
T02D3305:83b-41: thig skud lag par gnas pa rnams la thim par
T02D3305:84a-0: bsgom mo // de nyid kyi phyir de rnams ni me long lta bu la @84a * //
T02D3305:84a-1: sogs pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin can no zhes /
T02D3305:84a-2: rnam pa brgya'i dbye bas phye bar gyur pa'i thig skud rnams so //
T02D3305:84a-3: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs
T02D3305:84a-4: sam bgegs mthar byed la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis slob
T02D3305:84a-5: ma thig skud 'dzin pa dang lhan cig dang por
T02D3305:84a-6: skud pa lnga lnga re re bsgril ba'i thig skud
T02D3305:84a-7: bya zhing / de'i rjes la de bzhin du lnga rnams gcig tu bsgril ba'i thig skud bya ste /
T02D3305:84a-8: aom a'a: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga t'a: sarba dharm'a: bar sp'a ra /
T02D3305:84a-9: aa nu pra bishta sarba dharma: aa di aanta aa
T02D3305:84a-10: nu pra bishta: sarba dharm'a: aom a'a: h'um zhes brjod
T02D3305:84a-11: cing bsgril ba'i thig skud slob dpon dang slob ma'i
T02D3305:84a-12: lag pa g-yon pa dag gi mdzub mo nas brtsams
T02D3305:84a-13: te sor mo bzhi'i nang du bcug cing rgyab nas
T02D3305:84a-14: dkris la slar yang bcug cing dkris nas rdo rje
T02D3305:84a-15: khu tshur byas pa'i mthe bong dang mdzub mo'i rgyab
T02D3305:84a-17: mnan pa'i bar gyi lhag ma ma gtogs pa ji
T02D3305:84a-18: lta bar srid du dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur dang
T02D3305:84a-19: sboms su nas nyi shu chas lhag pa'i slob dpon
T02D3305:84a-20: gyi nas kyi tshad du 'gyur ro //
T02D3305:84a-21: nas bdun gyis sor tshigs so zhes chos mngon pa las bshad pa'o //
T02D3305:84a-22: sboms su 'khor lo'i brgyad cha'i nyi shu char bshad
T02D3305:84a-23: pa ni sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid khru
T02D3305:84a-24: gang ba'i dkyil 'khor kho na'i yin te /
T02D3305:84a-25: khru gnyis la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad kyang
T02D3305:84a-26: des nye bar mtshon nas tshad dang ldan par rig
T02D3305:84a-27: par bya'o // de bzhin du khru drug pa'i tshad
T02D3305:84a-28: can gyi dkyil 'khor la ni thig skud sboms su
T02D3305:84a-29: mthe'u chung gi tshad du bya zhing gzhan du rjes
T02D3305:84a-30: su mthun pa bya'o zhes pa ni kun dga' snying
T02D3305:84a-32: thig skud bsgril ba'i mthar dkyil 'khor gyis gzhir dri'i
T02D3305:84a-33: chu dang bdud rtsi lnga dang tsandan la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:84a-34: dri bzangs kyis byugs la yi ge gsum gyis byin
T02D3305:84a-35: gyis brlabs te / gser la sogs pa'i snod gtsang mar bzhag cing /
T02D3305:84a-36: me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D3305:84a-37: yang dag par mchod nas lag pas reg la las
T02D3305:84a-38: thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D3305:84a-39: g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi mig dag ma dang
T02D3305:84a-40: ta'i yi ge dag las nyi ma dang zla ba
T02D3305:84b-0: sngar gsungs pa'i badzra drishti ma zhes pas brtan par @84b byas la /
T02D3305:84b-1: 'khyil pa bzlas pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu dang yungs kar
T02D3305:84b-2: dang dri'i chus gtor nas rdo rje dang bsam pa'i
T02D3305:84b-3: lag pa g-yas pas yang dag par reg cing /
T02D3305:84b-4: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra
T02D3305:84b-5: ma h'um zhes pa 'dis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
T02D3305:84b-6: bzlas te lhag par gnas pa bya'o zhes pa /
T02D3305:84b-7: thig skud lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:84b-9: // / slar yang dkyil 'khor gyis la aom sarba sam sho dha ni h'um phat /
T02D3305:84b-10: ces pa'i sngags kyis bum pa thams cad kyi chus
T02D3305:84b-11: bsang gtor byas pa'i gtsang mar dris byugs nas me
T02D3305:84b-13: nam mkha'i mthil du gnas par yang 'dri bar 'gyur
T02D3305:84b-14: ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par dmigs te mchod yon
T02D3305:84b-15: dbul ba sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par mchod
T02D3305:84b-16: cing bstod nas rang nyid de'i rnal 'byor dang ldan
T02D3305:84b-17: pas bsgrub pa'i grogs po rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D3305:84b-18: sogs pa'i gzugs su bsgom zhing /
T02D3305:84b-19: rang dang de'i g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi mig
T02D3305:84b-20: dag dzdza:yig las skyes pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma
T02D3305:84b-21: 'od zer ser po can du bsam mo //
T02D3305:84b-22: mnyam pa'i rkang stabs kyis thig skud de g-yon pa'i
T02D3305:84b-23: rdo rje khu tshur gyis gzung ba lte bar gzung
T02D3305:84b-24: zhing / bsgrub pa'i grogs po de de ltar thig

T02D3305:84b-29: du mngon du phyogs shing gnas pas nub phyogs su

T02D3305:85a-0: thams cad du yang slob dpon dang sgrub pa'i grogs po g-yas skor gyis 'gro zhing dpal @85a * //
T02D3305:85a-1: bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor dang dpal rdo rje phag

T02D3305:85a-3: thams cad mnyam pa nyid du lhag par mos par
T02D3305:85a-4: bya'o zhes pa nam mkha' la thig gdab pa'i cho

T02D3305:85a-7: bya ba brtsam pa'i dus su yongs su dag pa'i

T02D3305:85a-9: brtan par byas te btab la phyi nas zla ba'i
T02D3305:85a-10: gdan la mtshan ma bya zhing /

T02D3305:85a-13: dang po phur bu mnyam par gzugs//

T02D3305:85a-17: tshad de de bzhin gzhan du yang //

T02D3305:85a-19: bya rog rjes der mtshan ma bya //

T02D3305:85a-21: slar yang lto dang byang dag tu //
T02D3305:85a-22: mkha' yi thig le bzhin du der //
T02D3305:85a-23: tshangs pa'i thig gnyis 'gro bar bya //
T02D3305:85a-24: de dag mnyam par smad pa yi //

T02D3305:85a-33: slob ma lhan cig blo ldan gyis //
T02D3305:85a-34: dkyil 'khor thig gdab rdo rje can //

T02D3305:85a-43: grogs po med pa dang mi dga' bar gyur na

T02D3305:85a-46: der yang shin tu mnyam gzhag pa'i //
T02D3305:85a-47: slob dpon slob ma lhan cig tu //
T02D3305:85a-48: rim 'dis blo dang ldan pa yis //

T02D3305:85b-0: chu @85b bdag gnas pa'i slob dpon dang //
T02D3305:85b-1: mngon par phyogs pa'i slob ma ni //
T02D3305:85b-2: dbang po'i phyogs su gnas pas kyang //
T02D3305:85b-3: 'dir ni tshangs pa'i thig gdab bya //
T02D3305:85b-4: gshin rje'i phyogs dang lus ngan por //
T02D3305:85b-5: gnas pa'i gsang sngags rig pa dang //
T02D3305:85b-6: lhan cig pa yi slob ma yis //

T02D3305:85b-10: lhag pa'i lha yi sbyor ldan pas //

T02D3305:85b-12: dbang ldan phyogs nas bla ma dang //

T02D3305:85b-14: zur gyi thig ni gnyis pa yang //
T02D3305:85b-15: yang dag pa ni gdab par bya //
T02D3305:85b-16: me mtshams gnas pa'i slob ma dang //
T02D3305:85b-17: nges par mngon phyogs slob ma ni //
T02D3305:85b-18: dbang lhan mtshams su gnas pa yis //
T02D3305:85b-19: rtsa ba'i thig gnyis gdab par bya //

T02D3305:85b-21: bden bral du ni gnas pa'i bu //
T02D3305:85b-22: mkhas pa thig rnams shes pa yis//
T02D3305:85b-23: lho yi thig ni gdab par bya //
T02D3305:85b-24: de nyid du gnas slob ma dang //
T02D3305:85b-25: rlung du gnas pa'i sngags pa dag //
T02D3305:85b-26: bden bral rlung du gnas pa yi //
T02D3305:85b-27: gsum pa'i thig ni gdab par bya //
T02D3305:85b-28: de nyid du gnas rdo rje can //
T02D3305:85b-29: zhi ba'i phyogs su gnas pa'i bu //

T02D3305:85b-31: rtsa thig bzhi pa gdab par bya //

T02D3305:85b-33: dang por tshangs pa'i thig yin te //
T02D3305:85b-34: gnyis pa zur gyi thig yin no //
T02D3305:85b-35: gsum pa la ni ngos bzhi ru //
T02D3305:85b-36: thig bzhi rab tu gdab par bya //
T02D3305:85b-38: de la 'dir rtsa ba'i thig gi brgyad cha ni sgo'o//
T02D3305:85b-39: sgo'i cha ni cha chung ste cha chung dang po
T02D3305:85b-40: dang kri sha dang cha shas zhes rnam grangs so
T02D3305:85b-41: // cha chung gnyis kyi bdag nyid ni cha ste cha chung bzhi ni cha chen no //
T02D3305:85b-42: zhi ba zhes pa ni cha chung phyed la rnam
T02D3305:85b-43: par blta bar bya'o zhes pa dkar pos thigs gdab
T02D3305:85b-44: pa'i cho ga'o // da ni dkyil 'khor thams cad
T02D3305:85b-45: la thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig brjod par
T02D3305:85b-46: pa'i cho ga'o // bya ste / cha gcig dang ni cha chung bdun //
T02D3305:85b-47: gsum pa'i mthar ni bzhi pa la //
T02D3305:85b-49: cha chung re re mnyam par bri //
T02D3305:85b-50: ra yi rtse mo'i mthar thug pa //
T02D3305:85b-51: de nas gser zlum po'i thig //
T02D3305:86a-2: rdo rje phreng ba'i cha chung gnyis //
T02D3305:86a-3: 'od zer phreng ba'i cha chung bzhi //
T02D3305:86a-4: thams cad kyang ni zlum por bya //
T02D3305:86a-5: de ltar brkyang ba'i thig bar cha //
T02D3305:86a-7: lha yi dbye ba cung zad kyis //
T02D3305:86a-8: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor nang du ni //
T02D3305:86a-9: thig gi dbye dang phyi rol du //
T02D3305:86a-10: dbyer med blo ldan gyis reg bya //
T02D3305:86a-11: nga ni rim pa ji lta bar //
T02D3305:86a-12: sgo sogs dbye ba brjod par bya //
T02D3305:86a-13: steng du bdun te gnyis ngos su //
T02D3305:86a-14: gnyis ni steng du ngos gnyis su'o //
T02D3305:86a-15: steng du gsum gsum stong pa la //
T02D3305:86a-16: bzhi ni steng du de bzhin slar //
T02D3305:86a-17: stegs bur drug kyang de bzhin dbyi //

T02D3305:86a-19: tshangs pa'i gnyis su re kh'a bzhi //

T02D3305:86a-21: gos kyi mthar yang de bzhin dbyi //
T02D3305:86a-22: rin chen dra phyed dbus gnas dang //

T02D3305:86a-24: tshon dang stegs bu'i sar de bzhin //
T02D3305:86a-25: zur las lhag pa'i re kh'a yi //
T02D3305:86a-26: thig rnams thams cad kun nas dbyi //
T02D3305:86a-28: sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ste //
T02D3305:86a-29: stegs bu dang ni bral bar 'dod //
T02D3305:86a-30: sgo yi tshad kyis sgo khyud re //
T02D3305:86a-31: de bzhin lha yi snam bu'o //
T02D3305:86a-32: stegs bu kun nas sgo yi phyed //
T02D3305:86a-33: de bzhin 'gram dang logs dang ni //

T02D3305:86a-35: me tog phreng ba'i snam bu'o //
T02D3305:86a-36: tshon gyi sa ni de phyed de //

T02D3305:86a-40: stegs bu la ni gzungs kyi snam bu dang bar gyi snam bu zhes kyang brjod do //
T02D3305:86a-41: 'phags pa klu'i blo'i zhabs ni mig sman gyi snam
T02D3305:86a-42: bu bar gyi snam bu dang ya phubs kyi snam
T02D3305:86a-45: sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ste //
T02D3305:86a-46: lha yi snam bu de bzhin no //
T02D3305:86a-47: sgo yi tshad kyi sgo khyud de //
T02D3305:86a-48: 'gram dang logs kyang de bzhin no //
T02D3305:86a-50: 'dir ni sgo dang rta babs dag gi dbus su
T02D3305:86a-51: bar gyi sa la bar gyi snam bu dang mun
T02D3305:86a-52: pa'i snam bu dang stong pa zhes kyang brjod do
T02D3305:86a-53: // rta babs sgo las sum 'gyur te //

T02D3305:86a-55: bre phul shar bu rin chen dang //
T02D3305:86a-56: rmig pa rnams ni cha chung bzhi //
T02D3305:86a-57: mun pa'i cha chung phyed dang gnyis //
T02D3305:86b-0: ba ran la ni cha chung gcig / de @86b bzhin slar yang mun pa ste //
T02D3305:86b-1: shar bu de bzhin nor bu dang //
T02D3305:86b-2: rmig pa cha chung re rer 'gyur //
T02D3305:86b-3: mnga' yab kyang ni de bzhin no //
T02D3305:86b-4: 'di rnams dpangs kyi tshad du ni //
T02D3305:86b-5: bshad de rgyar yang brjod par bya //
T02D3305:86b-6: bcu drug bre phul tshad du 'gyur //
T02D3305:86b-7: shar bu la ni bco brgyad bshad //
T02D3305:86b-8: rin chen rmig pa de bzhin bya //
T02D3305:86b-9: mun pa la ni bcu bzhir 'gyur //
T02D3305:86b-10: ba ran la ni bcu drug yin //
T02D3305:86b-11: slar yang mun pa bcu gnyis yin //
T02D3305:86b-12: shar bu la ni bcu bzhi dang //
T02D3305:86b-13: nor bu rmig pa de bzhin nyid //
T02D3305:86b-14: mda' yab la ni bcur 'gyur te //
T02D3305:86b-15: chos kyi 'khor lo cha chung gnyis //
T02D3305:86b-16: ra la cha chung gnyis de rnams //
T02D3305:86b-18: cha chung phyed dang bzhi pa'i thig / tshangs pa la ni gzung byas nas //
T02D3305:86b-19: cha chung bdun pa'i zlum po der //
T02D3305:86b-20: 'khyog po'i don du rab mdzes bya //
T02D3305:86b-21: tshangs pa'i g-yas dang g-yon dag tu //
T02D3305:86b-22: slar yang cha chung gsum gyi bar //
T02D3305:86b-23: de bzhin nyid du zlum po bskor //
T02D3305:86b-24: zla phyed lta bur mdzes pa bya //
T02D3305:86b-25: de nyid nang du zlum po ni //
T02D3305:86b-26: slar yang cha chung phyed kyi bar //
T02D3305:86b-27: rin chen la sogs bri don du //
T02D3305:86b-28: blo bzang kyis [*gis] ni de bzhin bskor //
T02D3305:86b-29: nang du lhag pa'i re kh'a kun //

T02D3305:86b-31: snam bu rnams kyi steng 'og tu //
T02D3305:86b-32: thig ni sbyin bya gnyis pa las //
T02D3305:86b-33: mdzes pa'i don du 'bad pas der //
T02D3305:86b-34: 'khyog po yi ni nang du yang //
T02D3305:86b-35: tshangs pa la ni cha chung bzhir //
T02D3305:86b-36: bzung nas slar yang sgo gsum bar //
T02D3305:86b-37: rva yi don du mdzes ba'i thig / zla ba phyed pa lta bur bskor //
T02D3305:86b-38: de nyid g-yas dang g-yon dag tu //
T02D3305:86b-39: cha chung gsum gyi bar du yang //
T02D3305:86b-40: de bzhin nyid du zlum po bskor //
T02D3305:86b-41: rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pas so //
T02D3305:86b-42: chu srin kha las thon pa'i rva //
T02D3305:86b-43: 'bar ba'i phreng bas brgyan par bya //
T02D3305:86b-44: rta babs steng du 'khor lo'i ngos //
T02D3305:86b-45: gnyis su ri dags ri dags mo //
T02D3305:86b-46: cha chung phyed las ring bar ni //
T02D3305:86b-47: mgrin pa gyen du 'greng ba bri //
T02D3305:86b-48: de dag gi ni mjug ma ru //
T02D3305:86b-49: mdzes pa'i gdugs gnyis bri bar bya //
T02D3305:86b-50: rta babs 'og tu bla re ni //
T02D3305:86b-51: dril bur bcas shing rnga yab ldan //
T02D3305:86b-53: snying por mkha' 'gro ma nyid gnyis //
T02D3305:86b-54: lag par mchod rdzas 'dzin pa dag / slar yang dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya //
T02D3305:87a-2: seng ge la sogs rab mdzes bya //
T02D3305:87a-3: snam bu rnams kyi mthar bri zhing //
T02D3305:87a-4: de bzhin ba dan phra mo rnams //
T02D3305:87a-5: rva yi g-yas dang g-yon du yang //
T02D3305:87a-6: bum par gnas pa'i dpag bsam shing //
T02D3305:87a-7: rin chen brgyad dang mnyam par ldan //
T02D3305:87a-8: 'khri shing rnams kyis yongs su gang //
T02D3305:87a-9: sna tshogs me tog 'bras bu dang //
T02D3305:87a-10: sna tshogs bya kun sgra sgrogs dang //
T02D3305:87a-11: grub pa rig pa 'dzin rnams kyis //
T02D3305:87a-12: kun nas yongs su bskor ba dang //
T02D3305:87a-13: sprin la nges par gnas pa'i gzugs //
T02D3305:87a-14: de rnams thams cad bri bya zhing //
T02D3305:87a-15: sgo rnams su ni rgyal mtshan bya //
T02D3305:87a-16: bum pa gnas pa'i g-yas g-yon du //
T02D3305:87a-17: seng ge dad pa rma bya dang //
T02D3305:87a-18: chu srin nya rnams kyis mtshan cing //
T02D3305:87a-19: ba dan sna tshogs g-yo ba can //
T02D3305:87a-20: dril bu sil sil sgrogs pa'o //
T02D3305:87a-21: zur rnams su ni gdugs bya zhing //
T02D3305:87a-22: gzhan yang ba dan phra mo rnams //
T02D3305:87a-23: mtshan ma sogs dang bral ba ste //
T02D3305:87a-24: sna tshogs mdog can kun nas bya //
T02D3305:87a-25: gzhan yang dur khrod rnams kyi ni //
T02D3305:87a-26: khyad par dkyil 'khor rnams la yang //
T02D3305:87a-27: 'od zer phreng ba cha chung gnyis //
T02D3305:87a-28: rdo rje phreng ba cha chung gcig / padma'i phreng ba de bzhin bya //
T02D3305:87a-29: dur khrod la ni cha chung bzhi //
T02D3305:87a-30: skal ldan mnyam par 'ongs pa na //
T02D3305:87a-31: rab tu 'bad pas bri bya ste //
T02D3305:87a-32: skal med yang dag 'ongs pa na //
T02D3305:87a-33: dam tshig bsrung bas mi bya nyid //
T02D3305:87a-34: de ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las kyang gsungs te //
T02D3305:87a-35: tshon gyi sa yi nyis 'gyur tshad //
T02D3305:87a-37: 'khor sa de yi phyi rol du //
T02D3305:87a-38: shing sogs dur khrod brgyad po'o //
T02D3305:87a-40: gzhan yang kun dga' snying po'i rta babs kyang brjod par bya ste /
T02D3305:87a-41: mi bdag nyes pa gsum nyi ma //
T02D3305:87a-42: mi bdag phyogs dang mi bdag gsum //
T02D3305:87a-43: phyogs te thad kar cha chung rnams //
T02D3305:87a-44: rta babs snam bu'i rim pa yin //
T02D3305:87a-45: zhes pa'ang kun du grol ba'o //
T02D3305:87a-46: gzhan yang phyogs gang la sgo 'khor lo'i bcu cha'am 'khor lo'i dgu char 'gyur ba la ni /
T02D3305:87a-47: dkyil 'khor la yang mda' yab kyi mthar thug pa la cha chung drug cu rtsa bzhi ste //
T02D3305:87a-48: phyogs de la ni rta babs kyi rgyar cha chung bcu gnyis dang /
T02D3305:87a-49: dpangs su cha chung bzhir 'gyur ro //
T02D3305:87b-0: 'on kyang snam bu ni bcu @87b gcig ste /
T02D3305:87b-2: shar bu rin chen gnas dang gser //

T02D3305:87b-4: gnas dang rin chen yang dag gnas //
T02D3305:87b-5: gser dang mda' yab de dag go //
T02D3305:87b-6: gnas zhes bya ba ni rmig pa'i rnam grangs so //
T02D3305:87b-7: cha chen cha yi dbye ba yis //
T02D3305:87b-8: dpangs kyi tshad rnams zhes bya ste//
T02D3305:87b-9: nor dang nor dad nyi ma dang //
T02D3305:87b-10: rgyal ba nor dang rgyal ba dang //

T02D3305:87b-12: rgyal ba nor rnams rim pa bzhin //
T02D3305:87b-13: dpangs kyi tshad du bshad pa ste //
T02D3305:87b-14: rgyar ni 'di rnams brjod par bya //
T02D3305:87b-15: tshangs pa'i g-yas dang g-yon dag tu //
T02D3305:87b-16: cha chung phyed bcas chu gter mthar //
T02D3305:87b-17: cha chung phyed dang gnyis pa'i thig //
T02D3305:87b-18: de bzhin cha chung gnyis nas ni //
T02D3305:87b-19: snam bu gnyis pa gsum pa dag / cha chung gnyis dang cha chung bzhi //
T02D3305:87b-20: cha chung bzhi dang bzhi pa ni //
T02D3305:87b-21: cha chung gnyis te phyed dang ni //
T02D3305:87b-22: bzhi nas phyed dang gsum pa dang //
T02D3305:87b-23: gsum nas drug pa cha chung gsum //
T02D3305:87b-24: de nas cha chung brgyad pa gsum //
T02D3305:87b-25: bdun pa gcig dang mthar drug pa'o //
T02D3305:87b-26: de'i phyir cha chung rig byed mthar //
T02D3305:87b-27: zlum po cha chung gnyis de bzhin //
T02D3305:87b-28: cha chung gnyis pa zlum po'i thig / de ni cha chung bzhi pa'i mthar //
T02D3305:87b-29: zhes pa rgyar rta babs sgo las sum 'gyur gyi phyogs kyang ngo //
T02D3305:87b-30: de ltar phyogs gnyis ka yang bdag gis brjod do //
T02D3305:87b-31: phyogs gnyis pa la snying po'i dkyil 'khor las nyis 'gyur du phyi'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa ni //
T02D3305:87b-32: padma'i ge sar gyi zlum po'i thig tshun chad do //
T02D3305:87b-33: phyogs dang po las ni 'khor dang bcas pa'i snying
T02D3305:87b-34: po'i dkyil 'khor las 'od zer phreng ba'i bar ji
T02D3305:87b-35: srid pa'o // rta babs kyi ka ba las pha
T02D3305:87b-36: rol padma'i ge sar zlum po'i thig las tshu rol
T02D3305:87b-37: du cha chung bzhi pa'i rta babs so zhes pa
T02D3305:87b-38: ni phyogs gnyi ga dang yang mi mthun pas spangs
T02D3305:87b-39: srid pa'o // so // 'dir sgo dang sgo khyud
T02D3305:87b-40: kyi mtshams su cha chung gcig la zla tshes la
T02D3305:87b-41: gnas pa'i rin po che dmar po 'am ser po
T02D3305:87b-42: 'am ljang gu 'am nag po yang rung ste //
T02D3305:87b-43: steng du rdo rje phyed pas mtshan pa 'am yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdo rjes mtshan pa bri'o //
T02D3305:87b-45: tshon gyi sa las phyi yi zur //
T02D3305:87b-46: sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su //
T02D3305:87b-47: zla ba rin chen rdo rjes mtshan //
T02D3305:87b-48: kun nas yongs su 'bar ba yin //
T02D3305:88a-1: rta babs kyi ka ba rnams ni stegs bu gru
T02D3305:88a-2: bzhi pa la gnas pa'i bum pa la gnas pa'o
T02D3305:88a-4: chu srin kha nas ra yi bar //
T02D3305:88a-5: rta babs sgo las sum 'gyur te //
T02D3305:88a-6: stegs bu bum pa las byung ba'i //
T02D3305:88a-7: rta babs ka ba nges par gnas //
T02D3305:88a-9: de rnams kyi rtsa ba dang rtse mo la nor bus spras pa'o //
T02D3305:88a-10: dbus su glang po che'i steng du dpung pas bteg pa'i seng ge'o //
T02D3305:88a-11: rta babs kyi gdung las 'phyang ba'i rin po che'i
T02D3305:88a-12: pa tra 'phro ba las ji ltar mdzes par dpyangs
T02D3305:88a-13: pa'i kha dog dmar po dang ser po la sogs
T02D3305:88a-14: pa'am / sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po che'i yu ba can gyi rnga yab rnams so //
T02D3305:88a-15: kha cig tu ni dar dpyangs kyi snam bu la
T02D3305:88a-16: glang po che'i steng du seng ge'i kha nas 'phyang
T02D3305:88a-17: ba'i do shal dang ka ba'i dbus su me long
T02D3305:88a-19: rin po che'i snam bu la ni zur la gru gsum dang /
T02D3305:88a-22: zlum po rnams go rims bzhin du rin po ches spras pa ni ka ba so so'i gzhogs su'o //
T02D3305:88a-23: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i snam bu la
T02D3305:88a-24: ni gser gyi ska rags kyi phyi ngos su chu
T02D3305:88a-25: srin gyi kha nas byung ba'i mu tig gi do
T02D3305:88a-26: shal skud pa dmar pos brgyus shing ngos gnyis dang
T02D3305:88a-27: steng dang 'og tu gser gyis sbras pa'i nor bu
T02D3305:88a-29: do shal gyi ngos dag tu cung zad 'phyang ba'i
T02D3305:88a-30: rin po che'i phreng ba 'phyang zhing rtse mo la
T02D3305:88a-31: gser gyis bcings pa'i nor bu sbom po dang ldan
T02D3305:88a-32: zhing mdzes pa'i dra ba phyed pa'o //
T02D3305:88a-33: kha cig tu ni rin po che'i yu ba can
T02D3305:88a-34: gyi rnga yab dang dril bu'i mthar rnga yab 'phyang
T02D3305:88a-35: ba'o // kha cig tu ni dra ba phyed pa'i
T02D3305:88a-36: dos dag tu yid du 'ong ba'i me tog gi
T02D3305:88a-37: phreng ba'i dra ba phyed pa 'phyang zhing /
T02D3305:88a-38: de'i ngos su sna tshogs pa'i gos kyi dra ba phyed pa'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D3305:88a-39: gzhan ni zur rnams su yid du 'ong ba'i me tog gi phreng ba'i do shal phyed pa dang /
T02D3305:88a-40: dar gyi chun po'i do shal rnams so //
T02D3305:88a-41: kha cig tu ni do shal gyi nang du padma
T02D3305:88a-42: la zla tshes dang rdo rje phyed pas mtshan pa'i
T02D3305:88a-44: kha cig tu ni rin po che'o //
T02D3305:88a-45: kha cig tu ni padma la gnas pa'i rdo rje'o //
T02D3305:88a-46: de lta bu 'di ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor las
T02D3305:88a-47: phyi rol du thig gdab cing bri ba'i rim pa
T02D3305:88a-48: ste / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi thun mong ba'o //
T02D3305:88b-0: da ni @88b nang gi khyad par rnams brjod par bya ste /
T02D3305:88b-1: sngar gyi thig rnams rab brkyang la //
T02D3305:88b-2: tshangs las cha chung thub pa nas //
T02D3305:88b-3: zlum po cig ni sbyin bya ste //

T02D3305:88b-5: der ni rdo rje'i phreng ba bya //
T02D3305:88b-6: 'od zer mthar ni cha chung nyid //
T02D3305:88b-7: tshangs pa'i g-yas dang g-yon dag tu //
T02D3305:88b-8: cha chung gnyis gnyis bar du slar //
T02D3305:88b-9: ka ba'i snam bu cha chung re //
T02D3305:88b-10: yang dag bsrungs nas gzhan rnams dbyi //
T02D3305:88b-11: re mig rnams kyi snying po ni //
T02D3305:88b-12: gru bzhi'o phyogs rnams de nyid ni //
T02D3305:88b-13: phyogs bral spyan ma la sogs pa'i //
T02D3305:88b-14: gru gsum du yang 'gyur ba yin //
T02D3305:88b-15: gang zhig mthar ni lha snam la //
T02D3305:88b-16: gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs //
T02D3305:88b-17: lhag pa'i re kh'a gang yin pa //
T02D3305:88b-18: de rnams thams cad kun nas dbyi //
T02D3305:88b-19: de lta bu yi rim pa yis //
T02D3305:88b-21: gtso bo gzhan du 'god pa'i thig kyang 'di'o //
T02D3305:88b-23: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D3305:88b-24: rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa ste //
T02D3305:88b-25: thig bzhi dang ni mnyam par ldan //
T02D3305:88b-26: phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya //

T02D3305:88b-28: dkyil 'khor brgyad pa lta bu yin //
T02D3305:88b-29: phyi yi 'khor lo'i phyed du ni //

T02D3305:88b-31: 'khor lo'i ka ba sogs kyis brgyan //
T02D3305:88b-32: rdo rje phreng bas bskor zhing mdzes //
T02D3305:88b-33: 'khor lo'i ka sogs thig rnams kyi //

T02D3305:88b-35: zhes pa'ang bshad pa yin no //
T02D3305:88b-36: bsdus pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang thig gi tshul 'di nyid do //
T02D3305:88b-37: slar yang khyad par brjod par bya ste //
T02D3305:88b-38: snying por zlum po gnyis byin nas //
T02D3305:88b-39: tshangs dang zur gyi thig dag gi / bar du ka ba cha chung re //
T02D3305:88b-40: nam mkha'i thig gis brgyad du 'gyur //
T02D3305:88b-41: phyogs dang mtshams su gru gsum mo //

T02D3305:88b-43: gzugs kyi rdo rje ma sogs dang //

T02D3305:88b-51: tshangs pa'i g-yas dang g-yon dag tu //

T02D3305:89a-22: rdo rje bdud rtsi bzhi dang dpag med ma //
T02D3305:89a-23: ku ru ku lle'i dkyil 'khor rnams la ni //
T02D3305:89a-24: tshangs pa'i thig las phyi ngos su //
T02D3305:89a-25: zlum po'i thig bzhi sbyin bya ste //

T02D3305:89a-27: cha chung phyed dang gsum mtha' dang //
T02D3305:89a-28: rkang par bcas pa'i cha chung lngar //
T02D3305:89a-29: 'dab ma'i don du gnyis pa dang //
T02D3305:89a-30: gsum pa rdo rje'i phreng ba ni //

T02D3305:89a-32: bzhi pa 'od phreng cha chung ngo //

T02D3305:89a-34: zur gyi thig rnams dbyi bar bya //
T02D3305:89a-35: kye yi rdo rje dgu yi bdag nyid can //

T02D3305:89a-44: sangs rgyas thod pa'i sku dang ni //

T02D3305:89a-46: de mnyam dkyil 'khor rab gsungs te //
T02D3305:89a-47: tshad 'di la ni lhag chad med //

T02D3305:89a-54: de nas cha chung yongs dor te //

T02D3305:89b-21: sngags pas thig bzhi sbyin par bya //
