T02D3305:93b-5: gsung gi dkyil 'khor bya ba ste //
T02D3305:93b-6: thugs kyi nyis 'gyur tshad kyis ni //
T02D3305:93b-7: de yi tshad rnams rab tu brtag /
T02D3305:93b-8: so so'i phyogs kyi cha rnams su //
T02D3305:93b-9: de la cha chung bcu gnyis ni //
T02D3305:93b-10: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rtsig sogs dang //
T02D3305:93b-11: mda' yab rnams kyis bsgribs pa'o //
T02D3305:93b-12: de yi phyi rol thig gcig ni //
T02D3305:93b-13: cha chung bdun gyi bar du slar //
T02D3305:93b-14: cha chung dag ni bzhi rnams kyis //
T02D3305:93b-15: slar yang lha yi snam bu'o //
T02D3305:93b-17: de yi phyogs su gyur pa yang //
T02D3305:93b-18: thugs kyi rta babs 'og rnams su //
T02D3305:93b-19: shes par bya ste mdor bsdu na //
T02D3305:93b-20: myos pa bsrung ba'i snam bu sogs //
T02D3305:93b-21: brtsegs ma gnyis pa dag la yang //
T02D3305:93b-22: cha chung bzhi yi bar du ni //
T02D3305:93b-23: kun nas 'bad pas bri bar bya //
T02D3305:93b-24: ka ba gnyis kyi bar la yang //
T02D3305:93b-25: cha chung phyed dag bsnur nas so //
T02D3305:93b-26: lha yi snam bu'i thig las ni //
T02D3305:93b-27: phyi rol cha chung bar rnams su //
T02D3305:93b-28: rtsa thig rab tu sbyin bya ste //
T02D3305:93b-29: zur thig gnyis kyi bar du'o //
T02D3305:93b-30: sgo dang rta babs dag kyang der //
T02D3305:93b-31: sngar gyi rim pas bri bar bya //
T02D3305:93b-33: nyis 'gyur gyi ni tshad kyis so //
T02D3305:93b-34: gsung gi dkyil 'khor rtsa ba las //
T02D3305:93b-35: phyi rol sgra yi dkyil 'khor mchog / de la gnyis 'gyur tshad kyis ni //
T02D3305:93b-36: de yi tshad rnams rab gzhal bya //
T02D3305:93b-37: so so'i phyogs kyi cha rnams su //
T02D3305:93b-38: cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni //
T02D3305:93b-39: gsung gi dkyil 'khor thig sogs dang //
T02D3305:93b-40: mda' yab rnams kyis bsgribs pa'o //
T02D3305:93b-41: cha chung drag po der spangs nas //
T02D3305:93b-42: thig ni zur gnyis bar du ste //
T02D3305:93b-43: slar yang cha chung nyi ma ni //
T02D3305:93b-44: spangs nas lha rnams de bzhin no //
T02D3305:93b-45: snam bu 'di de nyid la ni //
T02D3305:93b-46: padma yang ni bcu gnyis te //
T02D3305:93b-47: de rnams cha chung bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02D3305:93b-48: de las yang ni cha chung gi / dbus kyi cha yi lte ba ste //
T02D3305:93b-49: de yi g-yas dang g-yas min du //
T02D3305:93b-50: 'dab ma rnams ni bzhi bya zhing //
T02D3305:93b-51: de yi g-yas dang g-yon dag tu //
T02D3305:93b-52: 'dab ma rnams ni brgyad du bya //
T02D3305:94a-3: de yang rim pa gsum pa ste //
T02D3305:94a-4: rim pa gsum du gyur pas kyang //
T02D3305:94a-5: 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
T02D3305:94a-6: lha yi snam bu'i thig las ni //
T02D3305:94a-7: phyi rol du yang rtsa ba'i thig / cha chung bar nas sbyin bya ste //
T02D3305:94a-8: zur gyi thig gi bar du'o //
T02D3305:94a-9: sgo dang rta babs dag gi tshad //
T02D3305:94a-10: sngar brjod ji bzhin 'dir yang ste //
T02D3305:94a-12: nyis 'gyur dag gis rab gzhal bya //
T02D3305:94a-13: chu yi khor yug phyed du yang //
T02D3305:94a-14: rta bab kyis kyang khyab pa'o //
T02D3305:94a-15: gsung gi dkyil 'khor rta babs las //
T02D3305:94a-16: phyi rol sku yi dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02D3305:94a-17: sgo yi dbus su shing rta ni //
T02D3305:94a-18: cha chung bcu gnyis pa rnams bya //
T02D3305:94a-19: sa yi khor yug la yang ni //
T02D3305:94a-20: cha chung dag ni bcu gnyis bya //
T02D3305:94a-21: de yi phyi nas chu yi ni //
T02D3305:94a-22: khor yug cha chung nyer bzhi ste //
T02D3305:94a-23: de phyir me yi khor yug la //
T02D3305:94a-26: de nas rlung gi khor yug la //
T02D3305:94a-27: cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'gyur //
T02D3305:94a-28: de las phyi rol nam mkha' yi //
T02D3305:94a-29: khor yug cha chung bcu gnyis so //
T02D3305:94a-30: sa sogs khor yug drug po yi //
T02D3305:94a-31: dang por zlum po rab tu sbyin //
T02D3305:94a-32: 'od phreng mthar yang zlum po ste //
T02D3305:94a-33: zlum po bdun du 'gyur ba yin//
T02D3305:94a-34: thugs kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor te //
T02D3305:94a-35: dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid mchog /'di yi thig skud khru brgyad de //
T02D3305:94a-36: 'dzin ma'i zlum po ji srid du'o //
T02D3305:94a-37: zhes pa ni phyogs gcig go //
T02D3305:94a-38: gang gi tshe 'dir thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i
T02D3305:94a-39: tshad dang gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad bsdoms
T02D3305:94a-40: nas sgo cha chung bco brgyad du yongs su brtags
T02D3305:94a-41: te de'i drug cha la cha chung gi tha snyad
T02D3305:94a-42: byed pha de'i tshe cha chung des gtso bo'i padma'i
T02D3305:94a-43: lte ba la sogs pa nas 'od kyi khor yug
T02D3305:94a-44: gi mthar thug par cha chung gi grangs bya'o //
T02D3305:94a-45: de'i tshe ni thugs rdo rje gtso bo ste dkyil
T02D3305:94a-46: 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la khru
T02D3305:94a-47: bcu gnyis dang / de'i nyis 'gyur gyi thig skud
T02D3305:94a-48: khru nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni sa'i 'khor yug gi
T02D3305:94a-51: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rje gsung
T02D3305:94a-52: rdo rje'i gnas su gyur na gsung rdo rje ni
T02D3305:94a-53: gtso bo ste / de las gzhan pa'i lha la
T02D3305:94b-0: sogs @94b pa dgod pa ni phyogs dang po bzhin
T02D3305:94b-1: gtso bo ste / no // gang gi tshe yang
T02D3305:94b-2: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor khru bzhi pa dang de'i nyis
T02D3305:94b-4: de'i nyis 'gyur gsum ba yin pa de'i tshe khru
T02D3305:94b-5: bcu drug gi dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid gsung
T02D3305:94b-7: de'i nyis 'gyur gyi thig skud khru sum cu so
T02D3305:94b-8: gnyis ni sa'i khor yug gi dang po ji srid
T02D3305:94b-9: du'o zhes pa phyogs gsum pa'o //
T02D3305:94b-10: gang gi tshe dang por brjod pa'i thugs kyi dkyil
T02D3305:94b-11: 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad dang por brjod ba'i sku'i dkyil
T02D3305:94b-12: 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad bsdoms nas sgo cha chung sum
T02D3305:94b-13: cur yongs su brtags te de'i drug cha la cha
T02D3305:94b-14: chung du tha snyad byed pa de'i tshe cha chung
T02D3305:94b-15: nges gtso po'i padma'i lte ba la sogs pa nas
T02D3305:94b-16: 'od kyi khor yug gi mthar thug par cha chung
T02D3305:94b-18: bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rje yang sku rdo rje'i gnas su bya'o //
T02D3305:94b-19: sku rdo rje ni gtso bo ste de las gzhan
T02D3305:94b-20: pa'i lha la sogs pa dgod pa ni phyogs dang
T02D3305:94b-21: po bzhin no // de'i tshe sku rdo rje ni
T02D3305:94b-22: gtso po'i dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil
T02D3305:94b-23: 'khor la khru nyi shu dang de'i nyis 'gyur gyi
T02D3305:94b-24: thig skud khru bzhi bcu ni sa'i khor yug gi
T02D3305:94b-25: dang po ji srid du'o zhes pa phyogs bzhi pa'o
T02D3305:94b-26: po bzhin no // // de ltar yang dri ma
T02D3305:94b-27: med pa'i 'od las thig skud khru brgyad pa zhes
T02D3305:94b-28: pa ni rtsa ba la khru brgyad ces bya ba
T02D3305:94b-29: po bzhin no // // ste / dkyil 'khor gyi ni nyis 'gyur ro //
T02D3305:94b-30: zhes rnam par bkral nas de la dang po'i sangs
T02D3305:94b-31: rgyas sus thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la khru bcu gnyis
T02D3305:94b-32: bya zhing / de nyis 'gyur gyi thig skud ni khru nyid shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D3305:94b-33: de bzhin du gsung gi dkyil 'khor la khru bcu drug go //
T02D3305:94b-34: sku'i dkyil 'khor la khru nyi shu'o zhes pa ni
T02D3305:94b-35: des pa ste thig skud ni de'i nyis 'gyur ro
T02D3305:94b-36: zhes gsungs so // dbang gi don du ni dbus
T02D3305:94b-37: kyi dkyil 'khor tsam yang bskor bar rjes su gnang
T02D3305:94b-38: zhes gsungs so // ste / ji skad du /
T02D3305:94b-39: dbang gi don du dkyil 'khor ram ni rigs kyi
T02D3305:94b-40: dbang gis phyi yi 'khor los rab tu dman par
T02D3305:94b-42: gang yang khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las /
T02D3305:94b-44: dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i rgyud las /
T02D3305:94b-45: sgo 'khor lo'i bcu char gsungs pa de dag ni /
T02D3305:94b-46: slob dpon rnams da lta tha snyad mi mdzad mod /
T02D3305:94b-47: bdag gis ni yongs su byas so //
T02D3305:95a-1: 'khor gyi chad rnams kyang rab tu grags pa brjod kyi 'di tsam kho na ni ma yin no //
T02D3305:95a-2: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02D3305:95a-3: 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbang phyug gam //
T02D3305:95a-4: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yis //
T02D3305:95a-5: phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri bya ste //
T02D3305:95a-6: kun nas dpag tshad rab tu'o //
T02D3305:95a-7: gdul bya'i skye bo'i bsam pa la //
T02D3305:95a-8: mkhas pas mnyam par bltas nas ni //
T02D3305:95a-9: 'dod pas tshad ni byas pa la //
T02D3305:95a-10: nyes pa cung zad yod ma yin //
T02D3305:95a-12: lag pa'i mthil du bris byas nas //
T02D3305:95a-13: bstan bcos las gsungs don byed de //
T02D3305:95a-14: sa stengs sogs su smos ci dgos //
T02D3305:95a-16: dpag tu med pa'i dbye bas tha dad pa'i dkyil
T02D3305:95a-17: 'khor rnams 'ji tsam zhig mngon par brjod par bya
T02D3305:95a-18: bar nus / gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D3305:95a-19: dkyil 'khor ji lta de bzhin du //
T02D3305:95a-20: rab tu brtags pa su yis nus //
T02D3305:95a-21: rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D3305:95a-23: zhes pa dkyil 'khor la thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:95a-25: // / de nas gtor ma byin la /
T02D3305:95a-26: bam lam ram yam ham rnams kyis bon las grub
T02D3305:95a-27: pa'i dkar po dang ser po dang dmar bo dang
T02D3305:95a-28: ljang gu dang nag po'i tshon rnams rim pa ji
T02D3305:95a-29: lta ba bzhin du zla ba chu shel dang /
T02D3305:95a-32: aindra n'i la las byung ba rnams sam yang na
T02D3305:95a-33: mu tig dang gser dang byi ru dang bsres pa
T02D3305:95a-34: mu men las byung ba rnams sam /
T02D3305:95a-35: bsres pa ni 'dir mu tig la sogs pa bzhi po rnams so //
T02D3305:95a-36: yang na khams las byung ba'am /
T02D3305:95a-39: ji ltar rigs par sol ba dang so phag dang rus ba'i phye ma la sogs pas kyang rung /
T02D3305:95a-40: legs par 'dus byas pa'i bzung bo rnams bhr'um aam
T02D3305:95a-41: hr'im kham h'um rnams las grub pa'i rnam bar snad
T02D3305:95a-42: mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bor bsams nas /
T02D3305:95a-43: nam mkha' la bkod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D3305:95a-44: cad thugs kar bhr'um la sogs pa las grub pa'i
T02D3305:95a-45: ye shes kyi tshon rnams thig skud 'du bya bar
T02D3305:95a-46: brjod pa'i 'bar ba'i lta stangs kyis bkug ste bcugs
T02D3305:95a-47: bas ye shes kyi tshon dang lhan cig ro gcig
T02D3305:95a-48: tu gyur pa rnams la phr'um zhes pa la sogs
T02D3305:95b-1: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes ba'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags so //
T02D3305:95b-2: de bzhin du 'bar ba'i lta bas yang dag par gzi brjid bskyed cing /
T02D3305:95b-3: re re la h'i: yig bkod nas /
T02D3305:95b-4: bden pa gang gis sems can rnams rdul tshon mang
T02D3305:95b-5: zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi sems can
T02D3305:95b-6: rnams la chags pas rjes su chags par gyur pa'i
T02D3305:95b-7: bden ba des rdul tshon rnams 'bar bar gyur cig
T02D3305:95b-8: / ces bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sbar bar
T02D3305:95b-9: bya ste / lha sgom pa phul du byung ba la ni 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3305:95b-10: dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod nas snod
T02D3305:95b-11: gsar par gzhag par bya'o zhes pa rdul tshon gyi
T02D3305:95b-14: // / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar gnas pa'i
T02D3305:95b-15: phur bu dkyil 'khor ji lta bar 'chad par 'gyur
T02D3305:95b-16: pa'i la / thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bton nas
T02D3305:95b-17: rang gi lag pa'i rdo rje la bstim ste phur
T02D3305:95b-18: bu'i khung bu rin po che lnga dang tshon sna
T02D3305:95b-19: lngas bkang bas mnyam por byas la /
T02D3305:95b-20: dril bu'i sgra dang rdo rje'i glus mtshan ma ngan pa bsal bar bya'o //
T02D3305:95b-21: chos dbyings 'di ni dag pa ste //
T02D3305:95b-22: sems can khams ni rab grol mdzad //
T02D3305:95b-23: rang nyid rgyal po rdo rje 'chang //
T02D3305:95b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02D3305:95b-25: nyes pa kun las rnam grol ba'i //
T02D3305:95b-26: 'khor lo'i nang du yang dag zhugs //
T02D3305:95b-27: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D3305:95b-28: dkyil 'khor bdag gis bri bar bya //
T02D3305:95b-29: zhes pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag par mos la /
T02D3305:95b-30: lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje mtshan zhing g-yon pa'i
T02D3305:95b-31: khu tshur gyis aom badzra ram ga sa na ya
T02D3305:95b-33: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes brjod
T02D3305:95b-34: cing dkyil 'khor gyi nang du shar du phyogs par
T02D3305:95b-35: 'dug pas dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams te g-yas
T02D3305:95b-36: skor du tshon dgye bar bya'o //
T02D3305:95b-37: phyi nas ji lta ba bzhin du sgo'i slob dpon la sogs pa gzhan gyis kyang ngo //
T02D3305:95b-38: sboms su sgo yi nyi shu cha'i //
T02D3305:95b-39: re kh'a yang dag drang bya ste //
T02D3305:95b-40: mnyam zhing drang po ma chad ba //
T02D3305:95b-41: ji ltar rigs pa'o phan tshun gyi //
T02D3305:95b-42: bar gyi tshad ni nas tsa la //
T02D3305:95b-43: 'og dang steng ni ci mdzes bya //
T02D3305:95b-44: sbom por bkye na nad 'byung ste //
T02D3305:95b-45: phra mo yi ni nor rnams nyams //
T02D3305:95b-46: yon po yis ni rnam par sdang //
T02D3305:96a-0: @96a * // chad na bla ma slob ma 'chi //
T02D3305:96a-1: g-yas skor min par bkye na ni //
T02D3305:96a-2: tshon rnams phur bus btab par 'gyur //
T02D3305:96a-3: phur bus btab pa ni dngos grub kyi rgyu ma yin pa ste /
T02D3305:96a-4: phan tshun 'dres pas ni rigs 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D3305:96a-5: nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D3305:96a-6: de nyid med pa'i bsam sbyor las //
T02D3305:96a-7: gang zhig tshon bkye'i nyes pa ste //
T02D3305:96a-8: bzang po de nyid bsam sbyor las //
T02D3305:96a-9: sus kyang bar chad bya mi nus //
T02D3305:96a-10: dkyil 'khor ji lta ba de bzhin //
T02D3305:96a-11: ji srid du ni de nyid brtag / ces so //
T02D3305:96a-12: tshon gyi re kh'a rnams kyang rin po che dkar
T02D3305:96a-13: po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi thur ma la
T02D3305:96a-14: sogs pa'i ngo bor lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02D3305:96a-15: 'jug pa dang 'byung ba la thig dang tshon la
T02D3305:96a-16: 'goms pa'i sdig pas 'jigs pa'i phyir rdo rje shugs
T02D3305:96a-17: kyi ye shes kyi tshon gyi re kh'a yid kyis
T02D3305:96a-19: aom badzra be g'a kra ma h'um zhes bzla zhing /
T02D3305:96a-20: rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir 'jug pa dang 'byung bar bya'o //
T02D3305:96a-21: de la dang por lha thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:96a-22: la phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi spyi'i kha
T02D3305:96a-23: dog gi rim pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D3305:96a-24: shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi phyogs kyi
T02D3305:96a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa dang dbus kyi gtso bo'i kha
T02D3305:96a-26: dog gi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyi'i
T02D3305:96a-28: nang gi re kh'a'i bar du tshon sna nga'i rtsig pa'i re kh'a rnams kyi kha dog go //
T02D3305:96a-29: phyogs dang dbus su lha gzhan 'god pa na rgyas
T02D3305:96a-30: 'debs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog gi rim
T02D3305:96a-31: pa'o // bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor la rtsig pa lnga
T02D3305:96a-32: po 'di dag rin po che kha dog lnga las
T02D3305:96a-33: grub cing bar ni nas tsam mo zhes pa kha
T02D3305:96a-34: pa'o // cig go // rtsig pa 'di ni gcig
T02D3305:96a-35: nyid rim gyis steng nas steng du kha dog lnga'i
T02D3305:96a-36: rin po che las byas pa'o zhes pa ni gzhan
T02D3305:96a-38: pa dang po la rin po che'i snam bu'i sa
T02D3305:96a-39: gzhi dmar po dang dra ba dang dra ba phyed
T02D3305:96a-41: 'dod pa gnyis pa la ni dang po'i kha dog
T02D3305:96a-42: gi rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi cha nyid rnam
T02D3305:96a-43: par bkra ba'i rin po che'i snam bu ste /
T02D3305:96a-44: yang na de la kha dog gzhan gyis rin po
T02D3305:96a-45: che las grub ba bkod pa ni rin po che'i
T02D3305:96b-0: snam bu'o // lnga pa'i kha dog gi @96b rin
T02D3305:96b-1: po che'i rang bzhin gyi cha nyid sna tshogs pa'i
T02D3305:96b-2: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i snam bu'am yang
T02D3305:96b-3: na de la kha dog gzhan gyi rin po che
T02D3305:96b-4: las grub pa bkod pa ni dra ba dang dra
T02D3305:96b-6: phyogs gzhan brjod pa ni de'i steng du rin po che'i snam bu do shal gyi snam bu'o //
T02D3305:96b-7: 'dod pa gnyis ka la yang stegs bu ni shel
T02D3305:96b-8: lam gser gyi rang bzhin nam padma r'a g'a'i rang
T02D3305:96b-9: bzhin nam / rin po che gzhan yang rung ste ji ltar mdzes pa'o //
T02D3305:96b-10: rin po che'i shar bu dang mda' yab rnams ni dkar po'o //
T02D3305:96b-11: rin po che'i shar bu dang mnga' yab dang dar dpyangs kyi bar gyis gzhi ni sngon po ste /
T02D3305:96b-12: nam mkha'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3305:96b-13: de nyid kyi phyir bar gyi snam bu la mun pa'i snam bu zhes brjod do //
T02D3305:96b-14: gdung ni ji ltar mdzes pa'i rin po che las byas pa ste /
T02D3305:96b-15: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i pa tra 'phro ba la sogs pas brgyan pa'o //
T02D3305:96b-16: rta babs kyi ka ba rnams ni rang rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog go //
T02D3305:96b-17: kyog po'i nang gi bla re'i 'og gi yang de
T02D3305:96b-18: rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog gi 'od
T02D3305:96b-19: kyis spras pa'i nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
T02D3305:96b-20: rta rmig dang ba ran gyi kha dog ni ji
T02D3305:96b-21: ltar mdzes pa ste chu srin gyi snam bu yang
T02D3305:96b-22: ngo // 'khor lo rnams ni gser gyi kha dog
T02D3305:96b-23: ste rin po che gzhan las kyang byas pa'o zhes
T02D3305:96b-24: ngo // kha cig go // ri dags dang ri
T02D3305:96b-25: dags mo ni gser gyi rang bzhin la rin po
T02D3305:96b-27: sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba ni nag po ste /
T02D3305:96b-28: kha cig tu ni gtso bo'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go //
T02D3305:96b-29: ra dbus ma rnams ni rang rang gi phyogs kyi
T02D3305:96b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog ste de las gzhan
T02D3305:96b-31: pa rnams ni de dag gi ngos kyi de bzhin
T02D3305:96b-33: ra lnga pa las ni de las gzhan pa'i phyogs
T02D3305:96b-34: dang dbus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog ste ji
T02D3305:96b-36: phyogs gcig gi ra thams cad kyang rang gi phyogs
T02D3305:96b-37: kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go zhes pa kha
T02D3305:96b-38: cig ste / 'khor lo'i dbang po zhal bzhi pa
T02D3305:96b-39: nyid la rang rang gi phyogs kyi zhal gyi mdog
T02D3305:96b-40: go zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no //
T02D3305:96b-41: bum pa bzang po rnams ni gser las byas pa'o //
T02D3305:96b-42: dpag bsam gyi shing rnams ni de las gzhan pa'i shing lta bu'o //
T02D3305:97a-0: padma'i lte ba ni ljang gu @97a * //
T02D3305:97a-1: ste ge sar ni ser po yin la 'dab ma rnams ni sna tshogs pa'i mdog go //
T02D3305:97a-2: de'i sa gzhi ni dmar po shas che ba'i dkar
T02D3305:97a-3: po ste chos 'byung gi cha'i re kh'a ni dkar
T02D3305:97a-4: po'o // khor yug gi phyogs la yang shel nyid
T02D3305:97a-5: yin na re kh'a dkar po'am gser gyi mdog yin
T02D3305:97a-6: po'o // na ser po'o // rdo rje rnams dang
T02D3305:97a-7: de'i re kh'a yang nag po ste gzhan du dkar
T02D3305:97a-8: po'am ser po zhes gsungs so //
T02D3305:97a-9: rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i mdog ni ji ltar mdzes pa ste /
T02D3305:97a-10: bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor la 'og rlung gi dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:97a-11: gyi mtha' nas steng du yang 'og min gyi mtha'
T02D3305:97a-12: ji srid par rdo rje'i rab gnas pa'i phyir dang
T02D3305:97a-13: / rlung la sogs pa rnams kyang ji ltar rigs
T02D3305:97a-14: par kha dog sna tshogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro
T02D3305:97a-15: / // 'od zer rnams ni kha dog lnga pa ste 'phro ba'i tshul lo //
T02D3305:97a-17: rdzogs sangs ye shes sku yin phyir //
T02D3305:97a-18: ngag dbang rdo rje'i rigs su brjod //
T02D3305:97a-19: chos sku'i bdag nyid legs dag pa //
T02D3305:97a-22: dkar po ser po de bzhin dmar //
T02D3305:97a-23: ljang gu dang ni nag po nyid //
T02D3305:97a-24: rtsig pa yi ni tshon yin no //
T02D3305:97a-27: chos rnams rang bzhin gyis ni dkar //
T02D3305:97a-28: des na ngag dbang 'di dkar nyid //
T02D3305:97a-30: gsung rdo rje dkar po gtso bor gyur pa de'i tshe ni /
T02D3305:97a-31: dkar po dang ser po dang nag po dang ljang gu dang dkar po'i tshon gyi re kh'a'o //
T02D3305:97a-32: kha sbyor du gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' dkar
T02D3305:97a-33: po yin na'ang mi bskyod pa dang lhan cig ro
T02D3305:97a-34: gcig pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir nang gi rtsig
T02D3305:97a-36: gzhan du ni dkar po kho na yin te /
T02D3305:97a-37: ji ltar gsung rdo rje gtso bor gyur pas kha
T02D3305:97a-38: cig tu dkar po nyid du 'gyur ro zhes so
T02D3305:97a-39: // rtsa ba'i thig gi nang gi dkyil 'khor du
T02D3305:97a-40: yang zur thig gnyis gnyis kyis yongs su bcad pa'i
T02D3305:97a-41: phyogs bzhi'i sa gzhi rnams rang rang gi phyogs kyi
T02D3305:97a-42: de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog go //
T02D3305:97a-43: bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi'i thog rnams kyang de bzhin no //
T02D3305:97a-44: ka ba rnams kyang de bzhin te rang rang gi
T02D3305:97a-45: re mig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ma'i phreng
T02D3305:97a-46: bas mtshan pa'o // gtso bo'i sa gzhi ni gtso bo'i mdog go //
T02D3305:97b-0: bden bral ljang @97b gu dbang ldan gnag / me dang rlung ni ser po ste //
T02D3305:97b-1: phyogs rnams kyi ni dmar po'o //
T02D3305:97b-2: gtso bo'i snam bu la ni gtso bo'i mtshan ma'i
T02D3305:97b-3: phreng ba ste re kh'a gzhan gyi legs pa'i yon
T02D3305:97b-4: tan dang kha dog ni ji ltar mdzes pa'o //
T02D3305:97b-5: dpal ldan bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor la ni thugs kyi 'khor lo nag po'o //
T02D3305:97b-6: de'i rtsibs kyi bar rnams ni dmar po ste gsung gi 'khor lo'i lte ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3305:97b-7: gsung gi 'khor lo ni dmar po'o //
T02D3305:97b-8: de'i rtsibs kyi bar rnams ni dkar po ste /
T02D3305:97b-9: sku'i 'khor lo'i lte ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3305:97b-11: de'i rtsibs kyi bar rnams ni shar la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:97b-12: phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de
T02D3305:97b-13: bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog go //
T02D3305:97b-14: mu khyud gsum ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje nag po dang /
T02D3305:97b-15: padma dmar po dang 'khor lo dkar po'i phreng ba rnams kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D3305:97b-16: de'i phyi rol nas brtsams te nang gi bar du
T02D3305:97b-17: ljang gu dang dkar po dang dmar po dang ser
T02D3305:97b-18: po dang nag po'i kha dig gi re kh'a lnga'o
T02D3305:97b-19: // shar dang byang dang nub dang lho dang dbus
T02D3305:97b-20: kyis gzhi dang thog rnams kyang dkar po dang ljang
T02D3305:97b-21: gu dang dmar po dang ser po dang nag po'i
T02D3305:97b-22: // kha dog go // gzhan dag ni re kh'a
T02D3305:97b-23: ljang dang sa gzhi dang thog rnams nag po dang
T02D3305:97b-24: ljang gu dang dmar po dang ser po dang dkar
T02D3305:97b-25: po dang bsres pa'i sngon po'i mdog go zhes zer
T02D3305:97b-26: // kha dog go // ro // de ltar snga
T02D3305:97b-27: ma dang phyi mar kha dog gi rim pa yongs
T02D3305:97b-28: su bsams nas rngul tshon dgye bar bya'o //
T02D3305:97b-29: de la skal bar mi ldan pa 'dus pa na
T02D3305:97b-30: mtshan ma dang phyag rgya nyid ji ltar rigs par
T02D3305:97b-31: bri bar bya'o // skal ba dang ldan pa 'dus pa na ni lha'i sku bri bar bya zhing /
T02D3305:97b-32: bris sku'am lugs ma'am 'bur du btod pa'am legs par 'dus pa byas pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02D3305:97b-33: da ltar yang klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis /
T02D3305:97b-34: ji ltar nus pas dkyil 'khor du //
T02D3305:97b-35: sa bon dgod bya yang na ni //
T02D3305:97b-36: mtshan ma'am lha yi gzugs nyid de //
T02D3305:97b-37: lugs ma'am 'bur ma bzhag par bya //
T02D3305:97b-39: phyag rgya bri bar ni mngon par brjod pa bla ma'i rgyud las gsungs so //
T02D3305:97b-40: mi nus na ni bris pa'i phyag rgya'am mtshan ma gzhag par bya ste /
T02D3305:97b-41: tshon nam yang na pir rnams kyis //
T02D3305:97b-42: bris pa rnams kyis rnam par spras //
T02D3305:98a-1: phyir 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni lte
T02D3305:98a-2: bar zla ba la bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo
T02D3305:98a-3: rje'i ral gri sngo bsangs so //
T02D3305:98a-4: shar du zla ba la rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa'o //
T02D3305:98a-5: lhor nyi ma la rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rin po che ljang gu cha dgu pa'o //
T02D3305:98a-6: nub tu nyi ma la 'od dpag med kyi padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'o //
T02D3305:98a-7: byang du nyi ma la don yod grub pa'i ral gri ljang gu'o //
T02D3305:98a-8: mer zla ba la spyan ma'i mig 'bras nag po
T02D3305:98a-9: can gyi mig dkar po gnyis sprin la gnas pa'o
T02D3305:98a-10: // bden bral du zla ba la m'a ma k'i'i
T02D3305:98a-11: rdo rje nag po rtse lnga pa ste rgyud du
T02D3305:98a-12: de ltar gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3305:98a-13: rlung du zla ba la gos dkar mo'i padma dmar
T02D3305:98a-14: po kha bye zhing yu ba rtsa ba dang bcas
T02D3305:98a-15: pa'o // dbang ldan du zla ba la sgrol ma'i autpala kha dog sngo ser ro //
T02D3305:98a-16: me la sogs pa'i zur bzhi dang shar sgo'i g-yon
T02D3305:98a-17: dang g-yas su cha chung gnyis spangs pa'i 'gram dag
T02D3305:98a-18: tu zla ba rnams la rim pa ji lta ba
T02D3305:98a-19: bzhin du gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang
T02D3305:98a-20: reg bya dang chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma
T02D3305:98a-21: rnams kyi me long dkar po dang dri za'i pi
T02D3305:98a-23: dri ser po'i dud dang ro'i snod dmar po dang /
T02D3305:98a-24: sna tshogs pa'i gos dang chos 'byung dkar po rnams so //
T02D3305:98a-25: shar la sogs pa'i sgor nyi ma rnams la gshin rje mthar byed dang /
T02D3305:98a-28: bgegs mthar byed rnams kyi go rims ji lta ba
T02D3305:98a-29: bzhin du rdo rje'i tho ba nag po dang rdo
T02D3305:98a-30: rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang padma dmar
T02D3305:98a-31: po dang rdo rje khya gyes pa sngon po'o //
T02D3305:98a-32: 'dir zla ba dang nyi ma bcu dgu ni sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:98a-33: mtshan ma thams cad ni 'od zer dang bcas pa
T02D3305:98a-34: rang rang gi phyogs su mgo bstan nas gnas te
T02D3305:98a-35: / 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi ni nub tu mgo bstan pa'o //
T02D3305:98a-36: de ltar phyi ma rnams su yang ngo //
T02D3305:98a-37: rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor lo'i dbang phyug nyid la ni /
T02D3305:98a-38: dbus su chu skyes dang zla ba la zhi ba'i rdo rje sngon po'o //
T02D3305:98a-39: kha cig ni sna tshogs rdo rje'o zhes so //
T02D3305:98a-40: dbus kyi 'od zer gyi thig zlum po la tshon
T02D3305:98a-41: gyi re kh'a mi bya'o zhes pa man ngag go
T02D3305:98a-42: // zlum po'i thig gi phyi rol du tshangs thig
T02D3305:98a-43: gi ngos so sor cha chung bzhi spangs nas bum
T02D3305:98a-44: pa cha chung bzhi pa ste bdud rtsis gang ba'i
T02D3305:98b-0: @98b gser gyi bum pa brgyad do zhes phyogs gcig
T02D3305:98b-1: // gi ste / gzhan dag ni rin po che'i
T02D3305:98b-2: rang bzhin rang rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs
T02D3305:98b-3: pa'i kha dog go zhes pa'o //
T02D3305:98b-4: 'di dang phyi ma rnams la yang dbus su de
T02D3305:98b-5: bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyi mtshan ma 'god nas de'i
T02D3305:98b-6: gnas su dbus kyi mtshan ma bri bar bya'o //
T02D3305:98b-7: bsdus pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor la dbus
T02D3305:98b-8: su nyi ma la mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje rtse
T02D3305:98b-9: lnga pa kha gyes pa aindra n'i la lta bu
T02D3305:98b-10: dang / reg bya rdo rje ma'i sna tshogs pa'i gos so //
T02D3305:98b-11: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rim pa dang
T02D3305:98b-12: gnyis par gnas pa bcu gnyis po rnams kyi mtshan
T02D3305:98b-13: ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D3305:98b-14: rim pa gsum par sgo'i 'gram gyi snam bu la
T02D3305:98b-15: tshangs pa'i thig las cha chung bzhi spangs par g-yon
T02D3305:98b-16: du byams pa'i klu shing me tog 'khor lo dang
T02D3305:98b-17: bcas pa dang / g-yas su sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa'o //
T02D3305:98b-18: lhor de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje dang nam
T02D3305:98b-19: mkha'i snying po'i rdo rje dang cha dgu pa'i rin
T02D3305:98b-21: nub tu 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi padma dmar po dang ral gri'o //
T02D3305:98b-22: byad du de bzhin du sgrib pa rnam par sel
T02D3305:98b-23: ba dang kun du bzang po'i ral gri dang rdo
T02D3305:98b-24: rje'o // shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rim
T02D3305:98b-25: pa ji lta ba bzhin du gshin rje gshed la
T02D3305:98b-26: sogs pa rnams kyi rdo rje tho ba dang rdo
T02D3305:98b-27: rje mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang padma dmar
T02D3305:98b-28: po dang sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D3305:98b-29: me la sogs pa'i zur rnams su mi g-yo ba
T02D3305:98b-30: dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang dbyug pa sngon po
T02D3305:98b-31: dang stobs po che rnams kyi ral gri dang rdo
T02D3305:98b-32: rje dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon po
T02D3305:98b-33: dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa nag po'o //
T02D3305:98b-34: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i rdo rje sngon po
T02D3305:98b-35: ni gshin rje gshed kyi mtshan ma'i phyi ngos su
T02D3305:98b-36: ste / gzhan dag ni 'khor lo ser po'o zhes so //
T02D3305:98b-37: gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje ni padma mthar byed kyi mtshan ma'i phyi ngos su'o //
T02D3305:98b-38: byams pa la sogs pa brgyad kyi mtshan ma ni zla ba la gnas pa ste /
T02D3305:98b-39: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bcu'i mtshan ma ni nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:98b-40: 'dir nyi ma dang zla ba sum cu rtsa gcig
T02D3305:98b-41: ni sna tshogs padma la gnas pa ste bum pa
T02D3305:98b-42: bri ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D3305:99a-1: gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la dbus
T02D3305:99a-2: su zla ba sems dpa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa
T02D3305:99a-3: sngon po'o // shar du zla ba la rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor lo dang /
T02D3305:99a-4: lhor nyi ma la rin chen dbang po'i rin po che dang /
T02D3305:99a-5: nub tu nyi ma la snang ba mtha' yas kyi mda' dang /
T02D3305:99a-6: byang du nyi ma la don yod grub pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D3305:99a-7: spyan ma'i sprin la gnas pa'i mig dang /
T02D3305:99a-8: m'a ma k'i'i mda' dang gos dkar mo'i mda' dang sgrol ma'i autpala dmar po'o //
T02D3305:99a-9: rim pa gnyis pa la shar phyogs su drag mo'i mda' dang /
T02D3305:99a-10: bden bral du sgra rdo rje ma'i sha kti dang /
T02D3305:99a-11: rlung du sa rdo rje ma'i bum pa dkar ljang ngo //
T02D3305:99a-12: rim pa gsum pa la shar phyogs su bzhad ma'i rdo rje dang /
T02D3305:99a-13: lhor sgeg mo'i rdo rje dang /
T02D3305:99a-14: nub tu glu ma'i 'khor rnga dang /
T02D3305:99a-15: byang du gar ma'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa ljang gu dang /
T02D3305:99a-16: dbang ldan du gling bu ma'i gling bu dang /
T02D3305:99a-17: mer pi wa nga ma'i pi wang dang /
T02D3305:99a-18: bden bral du rnga zlum ma'i rda zlum dang /
T02D3305:99a-19: rlung du rdza nga ma'i rdza rnga'o /
T02D3305:99a-20: phyi'i snam bu la mer me tog ma'i me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02D3305:99a-21: bden bral du bdug spos ma'i smos med dang /
T02D3305:99a-22: rlung du mar me ma'i mar me'i mchod sdong dang /
T02D3305:99a-23: dbang ldan du der ma'i dri'i dud chos dang /
T02D3305:99a-24: shar du me long ma'i mi long dang /
T02D3305:99a-25: lhor ro ma'i ro'i snod dang /
T02D3305:99a-26: nub tu reg bya ma'i gos sna tshogs dang /
T02D3305:99a-27: byang du chos ma'i chos 'byung dkar po'o //
T02D3305:99a-28: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rim pa ji
T02D3305:99a-29: lta ba bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang
T02D3305:99a-30: / rdo rje zhags pa ma dang /
T02D3305:99a-31: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang /
T02D3305:99a-32: rdo rje dril bu ma rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
T02D3305:99a-34: rdo rje phreng ba'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje lcags
T02D3305:99a-35: sgrog dang rdo rje dril bu rnams te nyi ma
T02D3305:99a-36: la gnas pa'o // 'dir brjod pa'i nyi ma'i gdan
T02D3305:99a-37: la gnas pa'i mchan ma bdun las gzhan pa'i mtshan
T02D3305:99a-38: ma rnams ni zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa ste
T02D3305:99a-39: la gnas pa'o // / nyi ma dang zla ba
T02D3305:99a-40: sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs
T02D3305:99a-41: padma'i steng du thod pa rnams la gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:99a-42: bum pa bri ba ni snga ma bzhin te thig
T02D3305:99a-43: zlum po drug pa las phyi rol du'o zhes pa
T02D3305:99a-45: ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor la dbus dang
T02D3305:99b-0: shar dang byang dang nub dang lho rnams su @99b
T02D3305:99b-1: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes mkha'
T02D3305:99b-2: 'gro ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang mi
T02D3305:99b-3: bzad mkha' 'gro ma dang ro langs ma dan gtum
T02D3305:99b-4: mo rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha tv'am ga rnams so
T02D3305:99b-5: // dbang ldan dang me dang bden bral dang rlung
T02D3305:99b-6: rnams su seng ge mo dang stag mo dang ce
T02D3305:99b-7: spyang mo dang 'ug pa mo rnams kyi rdo rje
T02D3305:99b-9: shar dang byang dang nub dang lho'i sgo rnams su /
T02D3305:99b-10: rgyal dbang mo dang gsal byed mo dang 'jib byed
T02D3305:99b-11: mo dan 'dra byed mo rnams kyi rim pa ji
T02D3305:99b-13: lag pa gnyis snyim pa phye ba dang snyim pa
T02D3305:99b-14: khrag gis bkang ba dang rdo rje thal mo las
T02D3305:99b-15: mthe bo'i rtse mo gnyis dang mdzub mo'i rtse mo
T02D3305:99b-16: gnyis sbyar ba'o // 'dir mtshan ma dang phyag rgya
T02D3305:99b-17: rnams ni sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la gnas
T02D3305:99b-18: gnyis sbyar ba'o // pa'o // bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:99b-19: la ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i sna
T02D3305:99b-20: tshogs padma rnams ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin
T02D3305:99b-21: gnyis sbyar ba'o // pa'o // du / seng ge
T02D3305:99b-22: lnga dang so ldan dkar po dang rin po che
T02D3305:99b-23: sna bdun gyi phung po dang ma he dang gdengs
T02D3305:99b-24: can gyi dbang po brgyad kyi mjug ma dang ro
T02D3305:99b-26: so so'i rngul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du ni skal
T02D3305:99b-27: ba dang mi ldan pa 'dus pa na bri bar
T02D3305:99b-28: mi bya'o // gzhan du ni ngal bas 'jigs pa'i
T02D3305:99b-29: phyir dang sbyin bdag bsdus pa la dga' bas so
T02D3305:99b-30: mi bya'o // // skal ba ldan pa rab tu
T02D3305:99b-31: dang bar bya ba'i don dang sbyin bdag gi dbang
T02D3305:99b-33: de bzhin du phyi ma rnams la yang ji ltar
T02D3305:99b-34: 'byung bar bri ba dang mi bri bar rig par
T02D3305:99b-35: bya'o // phyi ngos kyi thig zlum po'i phyi rol du bum pa bri'o //
T02D3305:99b-36: bcu bdun gyi bdag nyid kye'o rdo rje gsum gyi
T02D3305:99b-37: dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar
T02D3305:99b-38: khro bo'i rdo rje sngon po'o //
T02D3305:99b-39: shar dang lho la sogs pa dang byang dang me
T02D3305:99b-40: la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la rim pa ji
T02D3305:99b-41: lta ba bzhin du rdo rje drag mo dang rdo
T02D3305:99b-42: rje gzugs ma dan rdo rje 'dod chags ma dang
T02D3305:99b-43: rdo rje zhe ba mo dang rdo rje gnod sbyin
T02D3305:99b-44: mo dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang sgra rdo
T02D3305:99b-45: rje ma dang sa rdo rje ma rnams kyi /
T02D3305:99b-46: gling bu dang pi wang dang rnga zlum dang rdza rnga rnams so //
T02D3305:99b-47: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang rdo rje zhags pa ma dang /
T02D3305:99b-48: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang rdo rje dril bu
T02D3305:99b-49: ma rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang rdo rje
T02D3305:99b-50: zhags pa dan rdo rje lcags sgrog dang rdo rje
T02D3305:100a-0: @100a * // mtshan ma bcu bdun po 'di rnams ni thod pa dang nyi ma la gnas pa ste /
T02D3305:100a-1: gling bu ma la sogs pa brgyad kyi ni thod pa'i 'og tu sna tshogs pa padma'o //
T02D3305:100a-2: phyag gnyis pa dan phyag bzhi pa la ni thod pa med do //
T02D3305:100a-3: phyag bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs padma'i lte bar khro bo'i rdo rje sngon po'o //
T02D3305:100a-4: shar la sogs pa dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:100a-5: 'dab ma rnams la go rims ji lta ba bzhin
T02D3305:100a-6: du goo r'i dang tsoo r'i dang ro langs ma
T02D3305:100a-7: dang ghasma r'i dang pukka s'i dang ri khrod ma
T02D3305:100a-8: dang gtum mo dang rab tu rmongs byed ma rnams
T02D3305:100a-9: kyi do rje dang thod pa khrag dang bcas pa
T02D3305:100a-10: la gnas pa'i rus sbal dang /
T02D3305:100a-11: tshil gyis gang ba'i thod pa la gnas pa'i sprul
T02D3305:100a-12: dang shas gang ba'i thod pa la gnas pa'i seng
T02D3305:100a-13: ge dang khu ba dang bcas pa'i thod pa la
T02D3305:100a-14: gnas pa'i dge slong dang khrag dang bcas pa'i thod
T02D3305:100a-15: pa la gnas pa'i stag dang chang gi snod rnams
T02D3305:100a-16: so // rim pa gnyis pa'i zur rnams su gling
T02D3305:100a-17: bu ma la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams ni snga
T02D3305:100a-18: so // ma bzhin no // shar la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:100a-19: sgo rnams su rta gdong ma dan phag gdong ma
T02D3305:100a-20: dan gyi gdong ma dang seng ge mo rnams kyi
T02D3305:100a-21: rdo rje lcags kyu dang rdo rje zhags pa dan
T02D3305:100a-22: rdo rje lcags sgrog dang rdo rje dril bu rnams
T02D3305:100a-23: so // ma bzhin no // so // mtshan ma
T02D3305:100a-24: bcu bdun po 'di rnams ni nyi ma la gnas
T02D3305:100a-25: so // ma bzhin no // so // pa ste
T02D3305:100a-26: / gling bum la sogs pa brgyad kyi ni nyi
T02D3305:100a-27: ma'i 'og tu sna tshogs padma rnams so //
T02D3305:100a-28: dbus kyi 'od zer gyi phyi rol du bum pa rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D3305:100a-29: bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs padma'i lte
T02D3305:100a-30: ba dang shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la
T02D3305:100a-31: go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bdag med ma
T02D3305:100a-32: dang rdo rje ma dang dkar mo dang chu ma
T02D3305:100a-33: dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang /
T02D3305:100a-34: rim pa gnyis par phyag bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:100a-35: du brjod pa'i dkar mo la sogs pa rnams kyi
T02D3305:100a-36: rdo rje'o // gling bu ma la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni snga ma bzhin te //
T02D3305:100a-37: rta gdong ma la sogs pa'i gri gug rnams so //
T02D3305:100a-38: rta gdong ma'i phyi ngos su mkha' spyod ma'i rdo
T02D3305:100a-39: rje ste khyi gdong ma la sogs pa'i phyi ngos
T02D3305:100a-40: su sa spyod ma'i rdo rje'o //
T02D3305:100a-41: 'dir gri gug bzhi ni nyi ma la gnas pa
T02D3305:100a-42: ste mtshan ma gzhan ni zla ba dang nyi ma
T02D3305:100a-43: ni sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:100a-44: gling bu ma la sogs pa brgyad med pa na
T02D3305:100a-45: lhag ma lha mo bco lnga po rnams kyi ni
T02D3305:100b-0: zla ba la gri gug @100b rnams so //
T02D3305:100b-1: dkar mo'i phyi ngos su mkha' spyod ma'i mtshan ma
T02D3305:100b-2: ste ro langs ma'i phyi ngos su sa spyod ma'i'o
T02D3305:100b-3: // de bzhin du ku ru ku lle'i dkyil 'khor la yang yin te /
T02D3305:100b-4: khyad par ni zla ba la yu ba dang bcas
T02D3305:100b-5: pa'i autpala dmar po kha 'bus pa yod pa'i mda'o
T02D3305:100b-6: // 'dir lha mo bco lnga po rnams kyang ku ru ku lle'i bzhin du kha dog dmar po'o //
T02D3305:100b-7: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor dang po la sna
T02D3305:100b-8: tshogs chu skyes kyi lte ba dang shar la sogs
T02D3305:100b-9: pa dag dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams
T02D3305:100b-10: la go rims ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje
T02D3305:100b-11: bcud rtsi dang zhi ba mo dang /
T02D3305:100b-12: zhi ba gdong ma dang zla ldan ma dan ri
T02D3305:100b-13: bong can ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ma dang
T02D3305:100b-14: zla tshes ma dang yid 'ong ma dang yid tshim
T02D3305:100b-15: par byed pa rnams kyi rdo rje'o //
T02D3305:100b-16: khyad par ni zla tshes ma'i zla ba cha gcig go //
T02D3305:100b-17: rim pa gyis pa la dbang ldan la sogs pa
T02D3305:100b-18: rnams su me tog ma dang bdud sbos ma dang
T02D3305:100b-19: mar me ma dang dri cha ba ma rnams kyi
T02D3305:100b-20: me tog gi za ma tog dang spos pho dang
T02D3305:100b-21: mar me'i mchod sdong dang dri'i dung chos rnams so
T02D3305:100b-22: // shar la sogs pa'i snam ba la gling bu
T02D3305:100b-23: ma la sogs pa rnams kyi gling bu la sogs
T02D3305:100b-24: // pa bzhi'o // shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams
T02D3305:100b-25: su khro gnyer rim par ldan dang 'jigs bsdigs dang
T02D3305:100b-26: rtag gzugs dang tshogs kyi gtso bo rnams kyi rdo
T02D3305:100b-27: rje lcags kyu dan rdo rje zhags pa dang rdo
T02D3305:100b-28: rje lcags sgrog dang rdo rje dril bu rnams so
T02D3305:100b-29: // pa bzhi'o // // mtshan ma nyi shu rtsa
T02D3305:100b-30: gcig po 'dir nams ni zla ba la gnas pa
T02D3305:100b-31: // pa bzhi'o // // ste / me tog ma
T02D3305:100b-32: la sog sa bcu gnyis kyi zla ba'i 'og tu
T02D3305:100b-34: yang na dkyil 'khor pa thams cad la chos 'byung bri bar bya'o //
T02D3305:100b-35: 'di nyid kho na bri bar bya'o zhes pa ni gzhan dag go //
T02D3305:100b-36: rdo rje bdud rtsi gzhan gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D3305:100b-37: mtshan ma ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud du rig
T02D3305:100b-38: par bya'o // dgu'i bdag nyid kyi kye'i rdo rje
T02D3305:100b-39: gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs chu skyes kyi
T02D3305:100b-40: lte bar nyi ma la rdo rje sngon po kha
T02D3305:100b-41: par bya'o // gyes pa'o // shar la sogs pa
T02D3305:100b-42: dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab mar zla ba
T02D3305:100b-43: rnams la go rims ji lta ba bzhin du goo
T02D3305:100b-44: r'i dang chom rkun ma dang ro langs ma dang
T02D3305:100b-45: gha sma r'i dan pukka s'i dan ri khrod ma
T02D3305:100b-46: dang gtum mo dang g-yung mo rnams kyi gri gug
T02D3305:100b-47: dang cang te'u dan rus sbal dang sprul dan seng
T02D3305:100b-48: ge dang dge slong dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje
T02D3305:101a-0: par bya'o // gyes pa'o // @101a * // rnams so //
T02D3305:101a-1: phyag bcu drug pa'i nyi ma la sna tshogs rdo
T02D3305:101a-2: rjes mtshan pa'i thod pa dkar po'o zhes pa ni
T02D3305:101a-3: khyad par ro // de'i zlum po las phyi rol du bum pa rnams so //
T02D3305:101a-4: sgyu ma chen mo'i dkyil 'khor la padma dmar po'i
T02D3305:101a-5: lte bar nyi ma la bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma
T02D3305:101a-6: chen mo'i ngo bo padma'i snod do //
T02D3305:101a-7: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab mar zla ba rnams la
T02D3305:101a-8: g-yas skor du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang rin
T02D3305:101a-9: chen mkha' 'gro ma dang padma mkha' 'gro ma dang
T02D3305:101a-10: sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi rdo rje dang
T02D3305:101a-11: rin po che'i snye ma dang sna tshogs chu skyes
T02D3305:101a-12: dang ral gri'o // sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma ni
T02D3305:101a-13: rdo rje sems dpa' la 'khyud nas gnas pa'i phyir
T02D3305:101a-14: de'i mtshan ma tha dad du mi dgod do //
T02D3305:101a-15: dgu'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas thod pa'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D3305:101a-16: sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar nyi ma la
T02D3305:101a-17: cang te'u'o // shar dang byang dang nub dang dbang
T02D3305:101a-18: ldan dang me dang bden bral dang rlung gi 'dab
T02D3305:101a-20: sna tshogs sde ma dang 'dod ma dang sa 'og
T02D3305:101a-21: gnas ma dang legs bzang ma dang chang 'tshong ma
T02D3305:101a-22: dang 'byung mo dang phyag bzhi ma dang nam mkha'
T02D3305:101a-23: la gnas ma rnams kyi gri gug go //
T02D3305:101a-24: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor la dbus su rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rdo rje'o //
T02D3305:101a-25: shar la sogs par g-yas skor du rdo rje dbyug
T02D3305:101a-26: pa dang rdo rje me dang rdo rje gtsug tor
T02D3305:101a-27: dang rdo rje 'khyil pa rnams dang me la sogs
T02D3305:101a-28: par g-yas skor du rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo
T02D3305:101a-29: rje dus dang nag po chen po dang rdo rje
T02D3305:101a-30: bsdigs pa dang gtsug tor dang rdo rje sa 'og
T02D3305:101a-31: rnams kyi rdo rje tho ba dang rdo rje dbyug
T02D3305:101a-32: pa dang chu skyes dmar po dang sna tshogs rdo
T02D3305:101a-33: rje dang lcags kyu dang dgra sta dang rtse gsum
T02D3305:101a-34: dang ral gri dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje gtun
T02D3305:101a-35: shing rnams te / mtshan ma thams cad ni sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:101a-36: yang na shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su g-yas skor du gshin rje mthar byed dang /
T02D3305:101a-37: shes rab mthar byed dang padma mthar byed dang bgegs
T02D3305:101a-38: mthar byed rnams kyi rdo rje tho ba dang rdo
T02D3305:101a-39: rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dang padma dmar po dang
T02D3305:101a-41: me la sogs pa'i mtshams su mi g-yo ba dang
T02D3305:101a-42: 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang dbyug sngon can dang stobs
T02D3305:101a-43: po che rnams kyi ral gri dang rdo rje dang
T02D3305:101a-44: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang rdo
T02D3305:101b-0: @101b gshin rje gshed kyi mtshan ma las phyi ngos
T02D3305:101b-1: su gtsug tor 'khor lo can gyi rdo rje ste
T02D3305:101b-2: / padma mthar byed kyi mtshan ma las phyi ngos su gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje'o //
T02D3305:101b-3: mtshan ma bcu gcig po 'di rnams kyi sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:101b-4: yang na bgegs dgra'i rdo rje kha gyes pa'o//
T02D3305:101b-5: me la sogs pa rnams su 'dod pa'i rgyal po
T02D3305:101b-6: dang dbyug sngon can dang stobs po che dang mi
T02D3305:101b-7: g-yo ba rnams kyi lcags kyu dang rdo rjes mtshan
T02D3305:101b-8: pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang rtse gsum dang ral
T02D3305:101b-9: gri'o // gtsug tor can gyi 'khor lo ni ser
T02D3305:101b-10: po ste gzhan rnams ni bshad ma thag pa snga
T02D3305:101b-11: gri'o // ma bzhin no // yang na gshin rje
T02D3305:101b-12: gshed la sogs pa bzhi po rnams kyi rdo rje
T02D3305:101b-13: lcags kyu dang rdo rje zhags pa dang rdo rje
T02D3305:101b-14: lcags sgrog dang rdo rje dril bu rnams te gzhan
T02D3305:101b-15: ni bshad ma thag pa snga ma bzhin no /
T02D3305:101b-17: // / dpal bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs
T02D3305:101b-18: chu skyes kyi lte bar nyi ma la gnas pa'i
T02D3305:101b-19: dpal bde mchog gi rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon
T02D3305:101b-21: phyogs bzhi'i 'dab ma la mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a
T02D3305:101b-22: ma dang du ma skyes ma dang gzugs can ma
T02D3305:101b-24: mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la padma'i snod rnams so //
T02D3305:101b-25: bum pa'i steng du'o zhes pa ni kha cig go //
T02D3305:101b-26: thugs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rtsibs nyi shu
T02D3305:101b-27: bzhi la rab gtum ma dang gtum mig ma dang
T02D3305:101b-30: dpa' bo'i blo can ma dang /
T02D3305:101b-49: brtson 'grus chen mo rnams kyi gri gug go //
T02D3305:101b-50: dpa' bo rnams kyi mtshan ma ni gtso bo ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir bri bar mi bya'o //
T02D3305:101b-51: sgo rnams su khva gdong ma dang 'ug gdong ma
T02D3305:101b-52: dang khyi gdong ma dang phag gdong ma rnams dang
T02D3305:101b-53: / mtshams rnams su gshin rje brtan ma dang gshin
T02D3305:101b-54: rje pho nya mo dang gshin rje mche ba ma
T02D3305:102a-1: rnams kyi sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gri gug go //
T02D3305:102a-2: 'dir shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su g-yon skor dang /
T02D3305:102a-3: me la sogs pa'i mtshams su g-yas skor gyi mtshan ma dgod par bya'o //
T02D3305:102a-4: phyi ngos kyi zlum po'i thig las phyi rol gyi mtshams kyi char bum pa rnams bri'o //
T02D3305:102a-5: de las gzhan pa'i 'khor lo sdom pa dang rdo
T02D3305:102a-6: rje phag mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan ma rnams ni
T02D3305:102a-7: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i lha bsgom pa'i skabs su rig
T02D3305:102a-8: par bya'o // nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid can
T02D3305:102a-9: sangs rgyas thod pa'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su sna
T02D3305:102a-10: tshogs padmar nyi ma la ta ma ru'o //
T02D3305:102a-11: lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gri gug rnams te
T02D3305:102a-12: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su g-yon skor dang
T02D3305:102a-13: / me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su g-yon skor gyis so //
T02D3305:102a-14: de la 'khor lo nag po'i rtsibs kyi steng du
T02D3305:102a-15: phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams la legs phreng can ma
T02D3305:102a-16: dang thod pa can ma dang 'jigs ma dag mi
T02D3305:102a-17: thub ma rnams kyi'o// mtshams kyi 'dab ma la thod pa rnams so //
T02D3305:102a-18: rdo rje sngon po'i phreng ba'o //
T02D3305:102a-19: rim pa gnyis par rtsibs brgyad dmar po la gnas
T02D3305:102a-20: pa'i chu skyes kyi 'dab ma brgyad la phyogs rnams
T02D3305:102a-21: su mdzes pa'i ska rags can ma dang gzugs can
T02D3305:102a-22: ma dang rnam par rgyal ma dang 'dod can ma
T02D3305:102a-23: rnams kyi'o // mtshams rnams su dus can ma dang
T02D3305:102a-24: mtsho can mo dang byed ma dang gsod ma rnams
T02D3305:102a-25: rnams kyi'o // kyi'o // de nas rdo rje dmar po'i phreng ba'o //
T02D3305:102a-26: rim pa gsum par rtsibs brgyad dkar po la gnas
T02D3305:102a-27: pa'i padma'i 'dab ma brgyad la phyogs rnams su sgrol
T02D3305:102a-28: ma dang 'jigs mthong ma dang legs mthong ma dang
T02D3305:102a-30: mtshams rnams su dge ma dang grib gnon ma dang mtshan mo dang grags chen mo rnams kyi'o //
T02D3305:102a-31: de nas rdo rje dkar po'i phreng ba'o //
T02D3305:102a-32: sgo'i padma rnams la mdzes ma dang nor 'dzin ma
T02D3305:102a-33: dang skal bzang ma dang mthong dga' ma rnams kyi'o
T02D3305:102a-34: // padma nyi shu'i steng du nyi ma la gri gug rnams so zhes gdams so //
T02D3305:102a-35: dpal rnal 'byor nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la gtso bo'i
T02D3305:102a-36: sna tshogs padma dang zla bar rdo rje sngon po
T02D3305:102a-37: rtse lnga pa'o // shar dang byang dang nub dang
T02D3305:102a-38: lho'i re mig rnams su padma dang nyi ma la
T02D3305:102a-39: gnas pa'i kha tv'am ga rnams so //
T02D3305:102b-0: dbang ldan dang me la sogs pa'i re mig @102b
T02D3305:102b-1: rnams su kha tv'am ga dang lcags kyu dang dgra
T02D3305:102b-3: shar la sogs pa'i re mig gi kha tv'am ga
T02D3305:102b-4: rnams kyi phyi rol du rim pa ji lta ba
T02D3305:102b-5: bzhin du khar bsdus pa'i lag pa gnyis dang thal
T02D3305:102b-6: mo sbyar ba dang khrag gi snyim pa dang /
T02D3305:102b-7: gtun shing ste kha tv'am ga la sogs pa'i mtshan
T02D3305:102b-8: ma rnams ni padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o
T02D3305:102b-9: // 'od zer gyi khor yug gi phyi rol du
T02D3305:102b-10: shar phyogs su bdud rtsi'i thod pa gsum dang byang
T02D3305:102b-11: du sgrol ma'i thod pa gsum dang nub tu gtor
T02D3305:102b-12: ma'i thod pa gsum dang lhor btung ba'i thod pa
T02D3305:102b-13: // gsum mo // dbang ldan du bsnyems pa'i lag pa dang dri'i snod do //
T02D3305:102b-14: mer pi wang dang me tog gi za ma tog go //
T02D3305:102b-15: bden bral bral du sdigs mdzub kyi lag pa dang spos kyi snod do //
T02D3305:102b-16: rlung du thal mo dang mar me'o //
T02D3305:102b-17: de nas rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol du shar
T02D3305:102b-18: la sogs pa'i snam bu rnams la so sor bzhi
T02D3305:102b-19: bzhi dang sgo dang mtshams rnams su brgyad de kha
T02D3305:102b-20: tv'am ga nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D3305:102b-21: bdud rtsi'i thod pa la sogs pa rnams ni mtsho skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:102b-22: gshin rje bshed kyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs rdo
T02D3305:102b-23: rje'i lte ba'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das gshin rje
T02D3305:102b-24: gshed kyi rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa kha
T02D3305:102b-25: gyes pa'o // shar dang lho la sogs pa'i ra'i
T02D3305:102b-26: rtsa ba rnams su rtag pa dang rin chen dbang
T02D3305:102b-27: po dang snang ba mtha' las dang don yod grub
T02D3305:102b-28: pa rnams kyi 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa
T02D3305:102b-29: dang rin po che cha dgu pa dang padma dmar
T02D3305:102b-30: po 'dab ma brgyad pa dang ral gri ljang gu
T02D3305:102b-31: gyes pa'o // rnams so // sna tshogs rdo rje'i
T02D3305:102b-32: me dang bden bral la sogs pa'i zur rnams su
T02D3305:102b-33: rdo rje tsa rtsi ka dang rdo rje phag mo
T02D3305:102b-34: dang dbyangs can ma dang goo r'i rnams kyi 'khor
T02D3305:102b-35: lo dang rdo rje dang padma dang ral gri'o //
T02D3305:102b-36: de nas rdo rje'i phreng ba ste de nas sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyogs so sor ra lnga'o //
T02D3305:102b-37: shar dang lho la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su tho
T02D3305:102b-38: ba gshin rje gshed dang dbyug pa gshin rje gshed
T02D3305:102b-39: dang padma gshin rje gshed dang ral gri gshin rje
T02D3305:102b-40: gshed rnams kyi rdo rje rtse mo nyi shus mtshan
T02D3305:102b-41: pa'i tho ba dang dbyug pa dkar po dang padma
T02D3305:102b-42: dang ral gri'o // 'dir rtag pa dang lha mo
T02D3305:102b-43: rnams kyi mtshan ma ni zla ba la gnas pa
T02D3305:102b-44: ste gzhan rnams ni nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:102b-45: nyi ma dang zla ba rnams kyi 'og tu sna tshogs padma'o //
T02D3305:103a-0: dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su padma la gnas pa'i thod pa bzhi ste ngos @103a * //
T02D3305:103a-1: gzhan du ni bum pa rnams so //
T02D3305:103a-2: rdo rje sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs padma'i
T02D3305:103a-3: lte bar zla ba la rdo rje rtse dgu pa
T02D3305:103a-5: shar dang lho la sogs pa'i 'dab mar zla ba
T02D3305:103a-6: rnams la me tog sgrol ma dang bdug spos sgrol
T02D3305:103a-7: ma dang snang gsal sgrol ma dang dri'i sgrol ma
T02D3305:103a-8: rnams kyi me tog gi phreng ba dang spos phor
T02D3305:103a-9: dang snang gsal gyi kong bu dang dri'i snod rnams
T02D3305:103a-10: so // me la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams su
T02D3305:103a-11: rtag pa dang mi bskyod pa dang snang ba mtha'
T02D3305:103a-12: yas dang don yod grub pa rnam par dag pa'i
T02D3305:103a-13: 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang padma dang ral gri
T02D3305:103a-14: so // rnams so // shar dang lho la sogs
T02D3305:103a-15: pa'i sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang
T02D3305:103a-16: rdo rje zhags pa ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog
T02D3305:103a-17: ma dang rdo rje dril bu ma rnams kyi lcags
T02D3305:103a-18: kyu la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te sna tshogs
T02D3305:103a-19: chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:103a-20: rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i phyi ngos su gtug tor
T02D3305:103a-21: ma'i 'khor lo ni sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma
T02D3305:103a-23: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i phyi ngos su sna tshogs
T02D3305:103a-24: chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnod mdzes ma'i sprul
T02D3305:103a-25: zhags ni sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la'o
T02D3305:103a-26: // me la sogs pa'i zur rnams su chu skyes
T02D3305:103a-27: la spyan ma dang m'a ma k'i dang gos dkar
T02D3305:103a-28: mo dang sgrol ma'i rnam par dag pa'i byang sems
T02D3305:103a-29: kyi bum pa dang ri rab dang me thab dang
T02D3305:103a-31: padma'i phyi rol du bum pa rnams so //
T02D3305:103a-32: 'od zer can gyi dkyil 'khor la dbus su sna
T02D3305:103a-33: tshogs padmar zla ba 'am nyi ma la mda' ste
T02D3305:103a-34: mtshan mo zla ba la gnas shing nyin par nyi
T02D3305:103a-35: ma la gnas pas lha mo rnam par rgyu ba'i
T02D3305:103a-36: phyir / shar dang lho la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams
T02D3305:103a-37: su aarga ma si dang marga ma si dang aandhardh'a
T02D3305:103a-38: ma si dang te dzo ma si'i lha mo rnams
T02D3305:103a-39: kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du khab dang
T02D3305:103a-40: skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab dang mya ngan med
T02D3305:103a-41: pa'i shing gi yal ga dang mda' rnams so //
T02D3305:103a-42: me dang srin po la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su
T02D3305:103a-43: au da ya ma si dang gu la ma si
T02D3305:103a-44: dang na ba ma si dang tsi ba ra ma
T02D3305:103a-45: si rnams kyi go rims bzhin du aarga ma si
T02D3305:103a-46: la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bzhin no //
T02D3305:103a-47: phyi'i pho brang si snam bu'i shar du ma h'a
T02D3305:103a-48: tsi wa ra ma si dang ba r'a h'a mu
T02D3305:103a-49: kha'i lha mo dag gi rdo rje dang lcags kyu
T02D3305:103a-50: dag go // lhor pa d'a kra ma si dang
T02D3305:103a-51: wa ra li'i lha mo dag gi mya ngan med
T02D3305:103b-1: nub tu ba ra kra ma si dang ba da la'i lha mo dag gi mda' dag go //
T02D3305:103b-2: byang du aurma si dang ba ra li'i lha mo dag gi khab dag go //
T02D3305:103b-3: me la sogs pa'i zur rnams su batt'a li dan
T02D3305:103b-4: ba d'a li dang ba r'a li dag ba r'a
T02D3305:103b-5: h'a mu khi rnams kyi khab dang skud pa dang
T02D3305:103b-6: bcas pa'i khab dang mya ngan med pa'i lo ma
T02D3305:103b-8: shar sgor a'a lo'i lha mo'i lcags kyu dang /
T02D3305:103b-9: lho sgor t'a lo'i lha mo'i rdo rje zhags pa dang /
T02D3305:103b-10: nub tu k'a lo'i lha mo'i rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /
T02D3305:103b-11: byang du sad sa lo'i sa ma murta ri'i lha mo'i rdo rje dril bu'o //
T02D3305:103b-12: 'dir sgo skyong ma rnams kyi mtshan ma ni padma
T02D3305:103b-13: dang nyi ma la ste gzhan rnams ni padma dang
T02D3305:103b-14: zla ba la'o // srung ba lnga'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D3305:103b-15: dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar zla
T02D3305:103b-16: ba la so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i rin po
T02D3305:103b-17: zla ba la'o // che'i chun po'o // shar du
T02D3305:103b-18: sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la stong chen
T02D3305:103b-20: lhor sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i rdo rje'o //
T02D3305:103b-21: nub tu sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la bsil ba'i tshal chen mo'i padma'o //
T02D3305:103b-22: byang du sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la rma bya chen mo'i rma bya'i mjug sgro'o //
T02D3305:103b-23: rim pa gnyis par me la sogs pa'i mtshams su
T02D3305:103b-24: nag mo dang dus ma dang nag mo'i rna ba
T02D3305:103b-25: mo dang dkar mo rnams kyi dung dang rdo rjes
T02D3305:103b-26: mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan dang dgra sta dang rtse gsum
T02D3305:103b-27: rnams so // snam bu rnams la bum pa'o //
T02D3305:103b-28: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su sna tshogs chu
T02D3305:103b-29: skyes dang nyi ma rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu
T02D3305:103b-30: la sogs pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa
T02D3305:103b-31: bzhi'o // rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sna
T02D3305:103b-32: tshogs padma'i lte bar zla ba la bcom ldan 'das
T02D3305:103b-33: rdo rje dbyings kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar
T02D3305:103b-34: bzhi'o // bo'o // lte ba'i shar la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:103b-35: phyogs kyi 'dab mar zla ba rnams la go rims
T02D3305:103b-36: ji lta ba bzhin du g-yas skor gyis sems ma
T02D3305:103b-37: rdo rje ma dang rin chen rdo rje ma dang
T02D3305:103b-38: chos kyi rdo rje ma dang las kyi rdo rje
T02D3305:103b-39: ma rnams kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po
T02D3305:103b-40: dang rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i rtse mo can gyi
T02D3305:103b-41: rin po che dang rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan
T02D3305:103b-42: pa'i chu skyes 'dab brgyad dkar zhing dmar ba dang
T02D3305:103b-43: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i kha dog can gyi sna
T02D3305:103b-44: bzhi'o // bo'o // tshogs rdo rje'o // shar la
T02D3305:104a-0: sogs pa'i padma'i lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor @104a
T02D3305:104a-2: rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi
T02D3305:104a-3: bskyod pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag
T02D3305:104a-4: med dang don yod grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje
T02D3305:104a-5: rtse lnga pa sngon po dang rdo rje rin po
T02D3305:104a-6: che dang rdo rje padma dang sna tshogs rdo rje
T02D3305:104a-8: rnams so // mi bskyod pa'i padma'i shar la sogs
T02D3305:104a-9: pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab mar zla ba rnams la rdo
T02D3305:104a-10: rje sems dpa' dang rdo rje rgyal po dang rdo
T02D3305:104a-11: rje chags pa dang rdo rje legs pa rnams kyi
T02D3305:104a-12: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje rtse
T02D3305:104a-13: lnga pa dang rdo rje lcags kyu dang mda' dang
T02D3305:104a-15: rnams so // rdo rje'o // rin chen 'byung ldan
T02D3305:104a-16: gyi chu skyes la rdo rje rin po che dang
T02D3305:104a-17: rdo rje gzi brjid dang rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang
T02D3305:104a-18: rdo rje bzhad pa rnams kyi rdo rje rtse lnga
T02D3305:104a-19: pa sngon po gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i
T02D3305:104a-20: phreng ba dang nyi ma dang yid bzhin gyi nor
T02D3305:104a-21: bu'i rgyal mtshan dang so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i
T02D3305:104a-23: rnams so // rdo rje'o // rdo rje'o // 'od
T02D3305:104a-24: dpag med kyi chu skyes kyi 'dab mar rdo rje
T02D3305:104a-25: chos dang rdo rje chen po dang rdo rje rgyu
T02D3305:104a-26: dang rdo rje smra ba rnams kyi padma dmar po
T02D3305:104a-27: dang ral gri dang 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dang
T02D3305:104a-28: rdo rje rtse gcig pas mtshan pa'i lce'o //
T02D3305:104a-29: don yod pa'i chu skyes la rdo rje las dang
T02D3305:104a-30: rdo rje srung ba dang rdo rje gnod sbyin dang
T02D3305:104a-31: rdo rje khu tshur rnams kyi sna tshogs rdo rje
T02D3305:104a-32: dang rdo rje'i go cha dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i
T02D3305:104a-33: mche ba dang rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o //
T02D3305:104a-34: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa so so'i byang chub
T02D3305:104a-35: sems dpa' gsum pa'i mtshan ma ni byang gi 'dab
T02D3305:104a-36: ma dang bzhi pa'i mtshan ma ni nub kyi 'dab
T02D3305:104a-38: me la sogs pa'i padma'i lte bar zla ba rnams
T02D3305:104a-39: la rdo rje sgeg mo dang rdo rje phreng ba
T02D3305:104a-40: ma dang rdo rje glu ma dang rdo rje gar
T02D3305:104a-41: ma rnams kyi rdo rje dang rin po che'i phreng
T02D3305:104a-42: ba dang pi wang dang rdo rje'o //
T02D3305:104a-43: snying po'i gzhal yas khang las phyi rol gyi snam
T02D3305:104a-44: bu rnams la shar du byams pa dang mthong ba
T02D3305:104a-45: don yod dang ngan song kun 'dren dang mya ngan
T02D3305:104a-46: dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo
T02D3305:104a-47: gros rnams kyi padma dang zla ba la rdo rje
T02D3305:104a-49: lhor spos kyi glang po dang dpa' bar 'gro ba
T02D3305:104a-50: dang nam mkha'i mdzod dang ye shes tog rnams kyi
T02D3305:104a-51: chu skyes dang zla ba la rdo rje rin po
T02D3305:104a-52: che rnams so // nub tu 'od dpag med dang
T02D3305:104a-53: zla 'od dang bzang skyong dang dra ba can gyi
T02D3305:104a-54: 'od rnams kyi chu skyes dang zla ba la rdo
T02D3305:104a-56: byang du rdo rje snying po dang blo gros mi
T02D3305:104a-57: zad pa dang spobs pa brtsegs pa dang kun du
T02D3305:104b-0: bzang po rnams @104b kyi chu skyes dang zla ba
T02D3305:104b-1: la sna tshogs chu skyes rnams so //
T02D3305:104b-2: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi me la sogs pa'i zur rnams
T02D3305:104b-3: su chu skyes dang zla ba la rdo rje bdug
T02D3305:104b-4: spos ma dang rdo rje me tog ma dang rdo
T02D3305:104b-5: rje mar me ma dang rdo rje dri chab ma
T02D3305:104b-6: rnams kyi mtshan ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D3305:104b-7: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su padma dang zla
T02D3305:104b-8: ba la rdo rje lcags kyu dang rdo rje zhags
T02D3305:104b-9: pa dang rdo rje lcags sgrog dang rdo rje dril
T02D3305:104b-11: snam bu la ni bum pa rnams so //
T02D3305:104b-12: bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid can 'jam pa'i
T02D3305:104b-13: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig
T02D3305:104b-14: pa lnga ni sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar
T02D3305:104b-15: po dang ljang gu dang ser po ste shar la
T02D3305:104b-16: sogs pa'i phyogs rnams dang dbus kyi sa gzhi thams
T02D3305:104b-17: cad kyang ngo // dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la sngon
T02D3305:104b-18: po dang dkar po dang ser po'i rtsig pa gsum
T02D3305:104b-19: cad kyang ngo // ste / 'khor lo gsum la ni dkar po'i rtsig pa gcig go //
T02D3305:104b-20: de la dbus kyi sa gzhi ser por sna tshogs
T02D3305:104b-21: padma dang zla ba la 'jam dpal gyi ral gri
T02D3305:104b-22: yu ba ser po can no //
T02D3305:104b-23: shar la sogs pa'i re'u mig tu nyi ma rnams
T02D3305:104b-24: la mi bskyod pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang
T02D3305:104b-25: snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa rnams
T02D3305:104b-26: kyi rdo rje sngon po dang rin po che dang
T02D3305:104b-27: padma dkar po dang ral gri'o //
T02D3305:104b-28: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i re'u mig tu zla ba
T02D3305:104b-29: rnams la spyan ma dang m'a ma k'i dang gos
T02D3305:104b-30: dkar mo dang sgrol ma rnams kyi rdo rje ser
T02D3305:104b-31: po dang rdo rje sngon po dang rdo rje dkar
T02D3305:104b-32: po dang rdo rje ljang gu'o //
T02D3305:104b-33: rim pa gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor la shar la sogs
T02D3305:104b-34: pa'i phyogs su zla ba rnams la sems ma rdo
T02D3305:104b-35: rje ma dang rin chen rdo rje ma dang chos
T02D3305:104b-36: kyi rdo rje ma dang las kyi rdo rje ma
T02D3305:104b-37: rnams kyi mtshan ma ni mi bskyod pa la sogs
T02D3305:104b-38: pa'i bzhin no // dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams
T02D3305:104b-39: su zla ba rnams la byams pa dang 'jam dpal
T02D3305:104b-40: dang spos kyi glang po dang ye shes tog rnams
T02D3305:104b-41: kyi me tog dang bcas pa'i klu shing gi yal
T02D3305:104b-42: ga dang ral gri dang bum pa la gnas pa'i
T02D3305:104b-43: lag ldan dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu ser po'o
T02D3305:104b-44: pa'i bzhin no // // lhor zla ba rnams la
T02D3305:104b-45: bzang skyong dang blo gros rgya mtsho dang blo gros
T02D3305:104b-46: mi zad pa dang spobs pa brtsegs pa rnams kyi
T02D3305:104b-47: mda' dmar po dang dkar po dang ser po dang
T02D3305:104b-48: pa'i bzhin no // // ljang gu'o // nub tu
T02D3305:105a-0: zla ba rnams la mthu chen thob dang ngan @105a
T02D3305:105a-2: song kun 'dren dang mya ngan dang mun pa thams
T02D3305:105a-3: cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang dra ba
T02D3305:105a-4: can gyi 'od rnams kyi padma dkar po dang mda'
T02D3305:105a-5: dkar po dang mda' ser po dang autpala la gnas
T02D3305:105a-7: pa'i nyi ma'o // byang du zla ba rnams la
T02D3305:105a-8: zla 'od dang 'od dpag med dang nam mkha'i mdzod
T02D3305:105a-9: dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba rnams
T02D3305:105a-10: kyi autpala la gnas pa'i zla ba la bum pa
T02D3305:105a-11: dmar po dang mda' ser po dang mda' sngon po'o
T02D3305:105a-13: pa'i nyi ma'o // // 'dir go rims ji lta
T02D3305:105a-14: ba bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams kyi
T02D3305:105a-15: ngos gnyis kyi snam bu rnams la mtshan ma gnyis
T02D3305:105a-17: pa'i nyi ma'o // // gnyis so // shar la

T02D3305:105a-19: byed dang gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang rta mgrin
T02D3305:105a-20: dang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rnams kyi ral gri yu
T02D3305:105a-21: ba nag po can dang rdo rje ser po dang
T02D3305:105a-22: rdo rje dbyug pa dmar po dang ral gri yu

T02D3305:105a-26: dbyug sngon can dang stobs po che rnams kyi ral
T02D3305:105a-27: gri dang rdo rje sngon po dang rdo rje'i dbyug
T02D3305:105a-28: pa sngon po'o // gshin rje gshed kyi mtshan ma'i
T02D3305:105a-29: phyi ngos su nyi ma la gnod mdzes kyi ral
T02D3305:105a-30: pa sngon po'o // gri ste / rta mgrin gyi
T02D3305:105a-31: mtshan ma'i phyir ngos su nyi ma la rdo rjes
T02D3305:105a-33: zla ba dang nyi ma thams cad kyi 'og tu

T02D3305:105a-36: kyi mtshan ma'i phyi ngos su nyi ma la gtsug
T02D3305:105a-37: tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'khor lo dang /

T02D3305:105a-39: chos kyi dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:105a-40: la nang gi 'khor lo rdul tshon dkar pos dgang
T02D3305:105a-41: bar bya ste / gzhan rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //

T02D3305:105a-43: lte bar zla ba la 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ral
T02D3305:105a-44: gri yu ba ser po can no //
T02D3305:105a-45: shar la sogs pa dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:105a-46: 'dab mar zla ba rnams la rim pa ji lta
T02D3305:105a-47: ba bzhin du g-yas skor gyis gtsug tor chen po

T02D3305:105a-49: rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang 'od zer rnam
T02D3305:105a-50: par 'phro ba dang 'phags pa dang cher 'phags dang
T02D3305:105a-51: rgyal ba rnams kyi 'khor lo ser po rnams so
T02D3305:105b-0: // shar @105b gyi re'u mig gi dbus su sna
T02D3305:105b-1: tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la mi bskyod pa'i
T02D3305:105b-2: rdo rje sngon po ste dbang ldan la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:105b-3: mtshams su sna tshogs padma dang zla ba rnams la

T02D3305:105b-7: // dang rdo rje'o // lho'i re'u mig gi dbus
T02D3305:105b-8: su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la rin
T02D3305:105b-9: 'byung ldan gyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu ser po
