T02D3305:105b-12: skyes dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje rin chen
T02D3305:105b-13: dang rdo rje nyi ma dang rdo rje rgyal mtshan
T02D3305:105b-14: dang rdo rje bzhad pa rnams kyi rdo rje rtse
T02D3305:105b-15: lnga pa gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng
T02D3305:105b-16: ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang yid bzhin yi
T02D3305:105b-17: nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang so'i phreng ba dang ldan
T02D3305:105b-18: pa'i rdo rje'o // nub kyi re'u mig gi dbus
T02D3305:105b-19: su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la snang
T02D3305:105b-20: ba mtha' yas kyi padma dmar po ste dbang ldan
T02D3305:105b-21: la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs chu skyes dang
T02D3305:105b-22: zla ba rnams la rdo rje chos dang rdo rje
T02D3305:105b-23: rnon po dang rdo rje rgyu dang rdo rje smra
T02D3305:105b-24: ba rnams kyi padma dang ral gri dang chos kyi
T02D3305:105b-25: 'khor lo dang rdo rje rtse gcig pas mtshan pa'i
T02D3305:105b-26: pa'i rdo rje'o // lce'o // byang gi re'u mig
T02D3305:105b-27: gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma
T02D3305:105b-28: la don yod grub pa'i ral gri ste dbang ldan
T02D3305:105b-29: la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs chu skyes dang
T02D3305:105b-30: zla ba rnams la rdo rje las dang rdo rje
T02D3305:105b-31: srung ba dang rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje
T02D3305:105b-32: khu tshur rnams kyi rdo rje gsum dang rdo rje
T02D3305:105b-33: go cha dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i mche ba dang
T02D3305:105b-35: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi re'u mig rnams
T02D3305:105b-36: su chu skyes dang zla ba rnams la spyan ma
T02D3305:105b-37: dang m'a ma k'i dang gos dkar mo dang sgrol
T02D3305:105b-38: ma rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams ni 'jam dbyangs dang
T02D3305:105b-39: mi bskyod pa dang snang ba mtha' yas dang don
T02D3305:105b-40: yod grub pa'i mtshan ma bzhin no //
T02D3305:105b-41: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su sna tshogs chu
T02D3305:105b-42: skyes dang nyi ma rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu
T02D3305:105b-43: dang rdo rje zhags pa dang rdo rje lcags sgrog
T02D3305:105b-44: dang rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i lcags
T02D3305:105b-46: snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di las dkyil 'khor gnyis par
T02D3305:105b-47: shar du sna tshogs padma dang za ba rnams las
T02D3305:105b-48: bcu gnyis po mos pas spyod pa dang rab tu
T02D3305:105b-49: dga' ba dang dri ma med pa dang 'od byed
T02D3305:105b-50: pa dang 'od 'phro ba dang sbyang dka' ba dang
T02D3305:106a-1: gyur pa dang ring du song ba dang mi g-yo
T02D3305:106a-2: ba dang legs pa'i blo gros dang chos kyi sprin
T02D3305:106a-3: dang kun du 'od rnams kyi rim pa ji lta
T02D3305:106a-4: ba bzhin du g-yas skor gyis padma dmar po ngang
T02D3305:106a-5: yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang padma dkar po dang
T02D3305:106a-6: sna tshogs chu skyes la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang
T02D3305:106a-7: autpala dang nor bu ma ra ka ta dang padma
T02D3305:106a-8: la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D3305:106a-9: pa'i glegs bam dang sna tshogs chu skyes kyi steng
T02D3305:106a-10: du sna tshogs rdo rje dang yu ba dang bcas
T02D3305:106a-11: pa'i padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje
T02D3305:106a-12: rtse lnga pa dmar po dang autpala'i steng du ral
T02D3305:106a-13: gri dang chos kyi sprin gyis yongs su bskor ba'i
T02D3305:106a-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti
T02D3305:106a-15: dang padma la bzhugs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T02D3305:106a-17: lhor sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba rnams la
T02D3305:106a-18: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gnyis pa rin po
T02D3305:106a-19: che padma dang sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod
T02D3305:106a-20: pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab
T02D3305:106a-21: dang thabs dang stobs dang smon lam dang ye shes
T02D3305:106a-22: dang rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D3305:106a-23: rnams kyi padma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang
T02D3305:106a-24: 'bru sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i snye ma dang
T02D3305:106a-25: lo ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan med pa'i me
T02D3305:106a-26: tog gi chun po dang padma dkar po dang autpala
T02D3305:106a-27: sngon po dang padma dkar po dang padma la gnas
T02D3305:106a-28: pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po
T02D3305:106a-29: ti dang chu skyes ser po la gnas pa'i rdo
T02D3305:106a-30: rje dang autpala la gnas pa'i ral gri dang shes
T02D3305:106a-31: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang
T02D3305:106a-32: rin po che sna tshogs pa'i 'bras bus brgyan pa'i
T02D3305:106a-33: byang chub kyi shing gi yal ga dang autpala la
T02D3305:106a-34: gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D3305:106a-35: nub tu sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba rnams
T02D3305:106a-36: la bcu gnyis po tshe dang sems dang yo byad
T02D3305:106a-37: dang las dang skye ba dang rdzu 'phrul dang mos
T02D3305:106a-38: pa dang smon lam dang ye shes dang chos dang
T02D3305:106a-40: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la dbang ba rnams kyi
T02D3305:106a-41: nor bu padma r'a ga la gnas shing ting nge
T02D3305:106a-42: 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas tshe
T02D3305:106a-43: dpag tu med pa'i sku gzugs dang rdo rje dmar
T02D3305:106a-44: po rtse lnga pa dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i
T02D3305:106a-45: rgyal mtshan dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang sna tshogs
T02D3305:106a-46: pa'i mdog can gyi dz'a ti'i 'khri shing dang padma
T02D3305:106a-47: la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang pri yang
T02D3305:106a-48: ku'i me tog gi snye ma dang autpala sngon po
T02D3305:106a-49: dang autpala la gnas pa'i ral gri dang padma la
T02D3305:106b-0: gnas pa'i bum pa @106b bzang po dang 'dam skyes
T02D3305:106b-1: dkar po dang chu skyes ser po la gnas pa'i
T02D3305:106b-3: byang du sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba rnams
T02D3305:106b-4: la gzugs bcu gnyis po dbyig gi blo gros ma
T02D3305:106b-5: dang rin chen skar mda' ma dang gtsug tor rnam
T02D3305:106b-6: par rgyal ma dang 'od zer can dang ri khrod
T02D3305:106b-7: lo ma can dang dug sel ma dang sgo mtha'
T02D3305:106b-8: yas ma dang / tsunda dang shes rab 'phel ma
T02D3305:106b-9: dang las kyi sgrib pa rnam par sel ma dang
T02D3305:106b-10: ye shes mi zad pa'i za ma tog dang sangs
T02D3305:106b-11: rgyas thams cad kyi mdzod ldan ma rnams kyi 'bras
T02D3305:106b-12: kyi snye ma dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal
T02D3305:106b-13: mtshan dang nor bu zla ba chu shel gyi bum
T02D3305:106b-14: pa dang skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab dang rma
T02D3305:106b-15: bya'i mjug sgro dang dug gi me tog gi chun
T02D3305:106b-16: po dang padma dmar po la gnas pa'i mi zad
T02D3305:106b-17: pa'i gter chen po'i bum pa dang ril ba spyi
T02D3305:106b-18: blugs phreng ba dpyangs pa dang autpala sngon po la
T02D3305:106b-19: gnas pa'i ral gri dang rdo rje rtse gsum pas
T02D3305:106b-20: mtshan pa'i padma dkar zhing dmar ba dang rin po
T02D3305:106b-21: che'i za ma tog dang padma la gnas pa'i rin
T02D3305:106b-22: po che sna tshogs pa'i dpe sgrom mo //
T02D3305:106b-23: shar la sogs pa'i sgor chu skyes dang nyi ma
T02D3305:106b-24: rnams la chos so so yang dag par rig pa
T02D3305:106b-25: dang don so so yang dag par rig pa dang
T02D3305:106b-26: / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig
T02D3305:106b-27: pa dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig
T02D3305:106b-28: pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang rin po
T02D3305:106b-29: che'i zhags pa dang mtha' gnyis su padmas mtshan pa'i
T02D3305:106b-30: lcags sgrog dang rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i
T02D3305:106b-31: / dril bu'o // me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams
T02D3305:106b-32: su sgeg mo dang phreng ba ma dang glu ma
T02D3305:106b-33: dang gar ma rnams kyi rdo rje rin po che'i
T02D3305:106b-34: phreng ba dang pi wang dang rdo rje'o //
T02D3305:106b-35: dkyil 'khor gsum par shar phyogs su padma dang zla
T02D3305:106b-36: ba rnams la kun du bzang po'i autpala la gnas
T02D3305:106b-37: pa'i ral gri dang sa'i snying po'i padma la gnas
T02D3305:106b-38: pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing dang nam mkha'i snying po'i
T02D3305:106b-39: rin po che'o // lhor nam mkha'i mdzod kyi yid
T02D3305:106b-40: bzhin gyi nor bu dang phyag na rin chen gyi
T02D3305:106b-41: rin po che dang blo gros rgya mtsho'i dung dang
T02D3305:106b-42: rdo rje snying po'i rdo rje'o //
T02D3305:106b-43: nub tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi padma dang
T02D3305:106b-44: mthu chen thob kyi ral gri dang zla ba'i 'od
T02D3305:106b-45: kyi rdo rje dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo dang dra
T02D3305:106b-47: byang du padma dang zla ba rnams la 'od dpag
T02D3305:106b-48: med dang spobs pa brtsegs pa dang mya ngan dang
T02D3305:107a-1: par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang sgrib pa thams cad
T02D3305:107a-2: rnam par sel ba rnams kyi sna tshogs padma dang
T02D3305:107a-3: padma la gnas pa'i ral gri dang rdo rje rtse
T02D3305:107a-5: shar la sogs pa'i sgor chu skyes dang nyi ma
T02D3305:107a-6: rnams la gshin rje mthar byed dang shes rab mthar
T02D3305:107a-7: byed dang padma mthar byed dang bgegs mthar byed rnams
T02D3305:107a-8: kyi lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang lcags sgrog dang
T02D3305:107a-10: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs chu
T02D3305:107a-11: skyes dang nyi ma rnams la 'jig rten gsum las
T02D3305:107a-12: rnam par rgyal ba dang rdo rje nyi ma me
T02D3305:107a-13: ltar 'bar ba dang he ru ka rdo rje dang
T02D3305:107a-14: rta mchog rnams kyi ral gri dang rdo rje dang
T02D3305:107a-16: gshin rje mthar byed kyi mtshan ma'i phyi rol du
T02D3305:107a-17: gtsug tor 'khor lo can gyi 'khor lo ser po
T02D3305:107a-18: ste padma mthar byed kyi mtshan ma'i phyi rol du
T02D3305:107a-20: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba la sogs
T02D3305:107a-21: pa'i mtshan ma bzhi'i phyi ngos dkyil 'khor gsum pa
T02D3305:107a-22: kho na'i zur gyi nang du re kh'a sbyin par
T02D3305:107a-23: bya'o // de'i phyi rol gyi gnas kyi me la
T02D3305:107a-24: sogs pa'i zur thig rnams kyi g-yas logs su gnas
T02D3305:107a-25: pa'i padma dang zla ba rnams la me tog ma
T02D3305:107a-26: dang bdug spos ma dang mar me ma dang dri
T02D3305:107a-27: chab ma rnams kyi me tog gi snod dang spos
T02D3305:107a-28: phor dang mar me'i mchod sdong dang dung chos so
T02D3305:107a-29: bya'o // ; / g-yon logs su gnas pa'i padma
T02D3305:107a-30: dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje gzugs ma dang
T02D3305:107a-31: rdo rje sgra ma dang rdo rje ro ma dang
T02D3305:107a-32: rdo rje reg bya ma rnams kyi me long dang
T02D3305:107a-33: pi wang dang ro'i snod dang sna tshogs pa'i gos
T02D3305:107a-34: bya'o // ; so // phyi rol rdo rje rigs
T02D3305:107a-35: kyi dkyil 'khor du padma rnams la shar la sogs
T02D3305:107a-36: pa'i phyogs rnams su dbang po dang gshin rje dang
T02D3305:107a-37: chu bdag dang lus ngan po rnams kyi rdo rje
T02D3305:107a-38: dang dbyug pa nag po dang zhags pa dang lcags
T02D3305:107a-39: bya'o // ; so // kyu'o // dbang ldan la
T02D3305:107a-40: sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su dbang ldan dang me lha
T02D3305:107a-41: dang bden bral dang rlung rnams kyi rtse gsum dang
T02D3305:107a-42: blugs gzar dang ral gri dang rlung ras so //
T02D3305:107a-43: de nas dbang ldan gyi phyi ngos su nye bar
T02D3305:107a-44: dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams nas mtshan ma rnams
T02D3305:107a-46: de la tshangs pa'i bgrang phreng dang khyab 'jug gi
T02D3305:107a-47: 'khor lo dang dbang phyug chen po'i rtse gsum dang
T02D3305:107a-48: gdong drug pa'i shakti dang tshangs ma'i phreng ba dang
T02D3305:107b-0: drag mo'i rtse gsum dang khyab @107b 'jug ma'i 'khor
T02D3305:107b-1: lo dang gzhon nu ma'i shakti dang dbang mo'i rdo
T02D3305:107b-2: rje dang phag mo'i nya ro hi ta dang /
T02D3305:107b-3: tsa mund'i'i gri gug dang bhringgi ni'i breng ba dang
T02D3305:107b-4: tshogs bdag gi dgra sta dang nag po chen po'i
T02D3305:107b-5: rtse gsum dang dga' byed dbang phyug gi rdza rnga
T02D3305:107b-6: dang nyi ma'i padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D3305:107b-7: 'khor dang zla ba'i ku mu da la gnas pa'i
T02D3305:107b-8: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang mig dmar gyi gri gug
T02D3305:107b-9: dang gza' lhag gi mda' dang phur bu'i bgrang phreng
T02D3305:107b-10: dang pa sangs kyi phreng ba dang spen pa'i dbyug
T02D3305:107b-11: pa nag po dang sgra gcan gyi zla ba dang
T02D3305:107b-12: mjug rings kyi klu'i zhags pa dang stobs bzangs kyi
T02D3305:107b-13: gshol dang rgyal bar byed pa'i me tog gi phreng
T02D3305:107b-14: ba dang sbrang rtsir byed pa'i chu srid kyi rgyal
T02D3305:107b-15: mtshan dang dpyid kyi lha'i mda' dang mtha' yas dang
T02D3305:107b-16: nor rgyas dang 'jog po dang stobs kyi rgyu dang
T02D3305:107b-17: padma dang padma chen po dang dung skyong dang rigs
T02D3305:107b-18: ldan rnams kyi thal mo sbyar ba ste yang na
T02D3305:107b-19: rang gi pha'i mtshan ma dang 'dra ba'i mtshan ma'o
T02D3305:107b-20: // de la mtha' yas dang rigs ldan gyi rigs ni bram ze ste me lha'i bu'o //
T02D3305:107b-21: nor rgyas dang dung skyong ni rgyal rigs te dbang po'i'o //
T02D3305:107b-22: 'jog po dang padma chen po ni rje'u rigs te rlung lha'i'o //
T02D3305:107b-23: stobs kyi rgyu dang padma ni dmangs rigs te chu lha'i'o //
T02D3305:107b-24: thags bzang ris dang stobs ldan dang rab tu tshim
T02D3305:107b-25: byed dang rnam par snang byed la sogs pa lha
T02D3305:107b-26: ma yin gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi ni
T02D3305:107b-27: ral gri la sogs pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs pa'o
T02D3305:107b-28: // nam mkha'i lding gi dbang po'i thal mo sbyar
T02D3305:107b-29: ba dang mi 'am ci'i dbang po ljon pa'i pi
T02D3305:107b-30: wang dang dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa'i
T02D3305:107b-31: pi wang dang rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po don
T02D3305:107b-32: thams cad grub pa'i me tog gi phreng ba'o //
T02D3305:107b-33: gang ba bzang po dang nor bu bzang po dang
T02D3305:107b-34: nor sbyin dang rnam thos kyi bu dang rtsi bi
T02D3305:107b-35: kunda li dang ki li m'a li dang sgo'i dbang
T02D3305:107b-36: po dang spyod pa'i dbang po ste gnod sbyin gyi
T02D3305:107b-37: dbang po rnams kyi shing tog b'i dza p'u ra
T02D3305:107b-38: ka rnams so // 'phrog ma'i ni chang bu gnyis so //
T02D3305:107b-39: tha skar dang bra nye dang smin drug dang snar
T02D3305:107b-40: ma dang mgo dang lag dang nab so dang rgyal
T02D3305:107b-41: dang skag dang mchu dang gre dang dbo dang me
T02D3305:107b-42: bzhi dang nag pa dang sa ri dang sa ga
T02D3305:107b-43: dang lha mtshams dang snron dang snums [?] dang chu
T02D3305:107b-44: stod dang chu smad dang gro bzhin dang mon gre
T02D3305:107b-45: dang mon gru dang mog gru dang khrums stod dang
T02D3305:107b-46: khrums smad dang nam gru dang byi bzhin rnams kyi
T02D3305:107b-47: lag pa thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya rnams so
T02D3305:108a-0: // @108a * // 'dir yang sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu la
T02D3305:108a-1: sogs pa ste dkyil 'khor bzhi pa la bum pa
T02D3305:108a-2: rnams so // ngan song yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil
T02D3305:108a-3: 'khor la rdo rje'i phreng ba sngon po'i nang du
T02D3305:108a-4: 'khor lo ser po rtsibs brgyad pa'i ste bar chos
T02D3305:108a-5: kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ser po'o //
T02D3305:108a-6: shar la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams su gnod sbyin gyi
T02D3305:108a-7: phyag rgya dkar po dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya
T02D3305:108a-8: sngon po dang bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya dmar po
T02D3305:108a-9: dang mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya ljang gu rnams so
T02D3305:108a-10: // me la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams su nyi ma
T02D3305:108a-11: dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po mtshan dang
T02D3305:108a-12: ral gri dang gdugs rnams so //
T02D3305:108a-13: rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol gyi me la sogs
T02D3305:108a-14: pa'i mtshams rnams su sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mtshan
T02D3305:108a-15: ma'o // shar la sogs pa'i snam bu rnams la
T02D3305:108a-16: sgo'i g-yon du mtshan ma gnyis te g-yas su yang
T02D3305:108a-17: ma'o // ngo // de la klu shing gi me
T02D3305:108a-18: tog dang spyan dang bcas pa'i chu skyes dang lcags
T02D3305:108a-19: kyu dang dbyug pa dang ral gri dang padma la
T02D3305:108a-20: gnas pa'i chos kyi sgrom dang yid bzhin gyi nor
T02D3305:108a-21: bu'i rgyal mtshan dang bdud rtsi'i bum pa dang padma
T02D3305:108a-22: la gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs dang rin po che
T02D3305:108a-23: dang rdo rje'i gur dang rdo rje dang bcas pa'i
T02D3305:108a-24: autpala dang bdud rtsi'i bum pa dang chu skyes la
T02D3305:108a-25: gnas pa'i rin po che dang rin po tshe'i snye
T02D3305:108a-26: ma'o // ngo // ma'o // me la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:108a-27: mtshams su me tog ma la sogs pa'i mtshan ma
T02D3305:108a-28: ste sgo rnams su ni rdo rje lcags kyu la
T02D3305:108a-29: ma'o // ngo // ma'o // sogs pa'o // mtshan
T02D3305:108a-30: ma sum cu rtsa bdun po rnams kyang sna tshogs
T02D3305:108a-31: chu skyes dang zla ba la gnas pa ste /
T02D3305:108a-32: mgrin pa sngon po la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni mi bri ba yang ngo //
T02D3305:108a-33: 'byung po 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor la rtsig pa
T02D3305:108a-34: lnga dang shar la sogs pa'i sa gzhi ni dkar
T02D3305:108a-35: po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ldang gu
T02D3305:108a-36: dang nag po'o // thig gi re k'a gsum ni
T02D3305:108a-37: dkar po dang dmar po dang nag po'i kha dog
T02D3305:108a-38: ste thig gi re kh'a gcig dang rdo rje phreng
T02D3305:108a-39: ba'i re kh'a ni nag po'o//
T02D3305:108a-40: snying po'i pho brang gi dbus kyi re'u mig tu
T02D3305:108a-41: sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la bcom ldan 'das
T02D3305:108a-42: 'byung po 'dul byed kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa
T02D3305:108a-43: sngon po'o / shar du nyi ma la dbang phyug
T02D3305:108a-44: chen po'i rtse gsum dang lhor nyi ma la khyab
T02D3305:108a-45: 'jug gi 'khor lo dang nub tu zla ba la
T02D3305:108b-0: tshangs pa'i bgrang phreng dang byang du @108b nyi ma
T02D3305:108b-1: la smin drug gi bu'i shakti dang dbang ldan du
T02D3305:108b-2: zla ba la tshogs bdag gi dgra sta dang mer
T02D3305:108b-3: nyi ma la gnyi ma'i padma la gnas pa'i dkyil
T02D3305:108b-4: 'khor dang bden bral du nyi ma la sgra gcan
T02D3305:108b-5: gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang rlung du zla ba
T02D3305:108b-6: la dga' byed dbang phyug gi da ma ru'o //
T02D3305:108b-7: rim pa gnyis par shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams
T02D3305:108b-8: su dpal mo dang thig le mchog ma dang zla
T02D3305:108b-9: ba mo dang dka' zlog ma rnams kyi zla ba
T02D3305:108b-10: la padma dkar po dang spos phor dang mar me'i
T02D3305:108b-11: mchod sdong dang gdengs ka'i rnam pa'i lag pa'o //
T02D3305:108b-12: me la sogs pa rnams su rin chen dpal mo
T02D3305:108b-13: dang dbyangs can ma dang lha'i mdzes ma dang kun
T02D3305:108b-14: du 'byor ma rnams kyi zla ba la rim pa
T02D3305:108b-15: ji lta ba bzhin du dri'i dung chos dang pi
T02D3305:108b-16: wang dang rin po che'i phreng ba dang rdo rje
T02D3305:108b-17: rtse gsum pa'o // rim pa gsum par shar la
T02D3305:108b-18: sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su dbang po dang gshin tu
T02D3305:108b-19: dang gshin rje dang chu lta dang lus ngan po
T02D3305:108b-20: rnams kyi zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje dang
T02D3305:108b-21: nyi ma la gnas pa'i thod pas mtshan pa'i dbyug
T02D3305:108b-22: pa dang zla ba la gnas pa'i klu'i zhabs pa
T02D3305:108b-23: dang zla ba la gnas pa'i dbyug to'o //
T02D3305:108b-24: me la sogs mtshams su me lha dang bden bral
T02D3305:108b-25: dang rlung lha dang zla ba rnams kyi nyi ma
T02D3305:108b-26: la gnas pa'i phreng ba dang nyi ma la gnas
T02D3305:108b-27: pa'i ral gri dang zla ba la gnas pa'i rlung
T02D3305:108b-28: ras dang ku mu da la gnas pa'i zla ba'o
T02D3305:108b-29: // zla pa'i mtshan ma dang nye bar dbang ldan gyi nyi ma la rtse gsum mo //
T02D3305:108b-30: rim pa bzhi par shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams
T02D3305:108b-31: su seng ge'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin ma dang rnam par
T02D3305:108b-32: 'byor ma dang pad chen ldan ma dang chang 'phrog
T02D3305:108b-33: ma rnams kyi zla ba la seng ge'i rgyal mtshan
T02D3305:108b-34: dang lcags kyu dang mda' dang yid bzhin gyi nor
T02D3305:108b-35: bu'o // dbang ldan la sogs pa rnams su mchog
T02D3305:108b-36: 'phrog ma dang rin chen dbang phyug ma dang rgyan
T02D3305:108b-37: ma dang 'gro skyong ma rnams kyi zla ba rnams
T02D3305:108b-38: la me tog gi snod dang spos phor dang dri'i
T02D3305:108b-39: dung chos dang mar me'i mchod sdong ngo //
T02D3305:108b-40: 'dir nyi ma dang zla ba thams cad sna tshogs
T02D3305:108b-41: padma la gnas pa ste rim pa bzhi par ni
T02D3305:108b-43: mkha' 'gro lnga'i dkyil 'khor la dbus kyi gzhal yas
T02D3305:108b-44: khang gi dbus su shes rab dang bcas pa'i kye'i
T02D3305:108b-45: rdo rje'i gri gug dang thod pa'o //
T02D3305:109a-0: shar la sogs pa'i sgor dkar mo dang chom rkun ma @109a * //
T02D3305:109a-1: dang ro langs ma dang ghasma r'i rnams kyi rdo
T02D3305:109a-2: rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang lcags sgrog dang
T02D3305:109a-3: dril bu'o // dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su
T02D3305:109a-4: pukka s'i dang ri khrod ma dang gtum mo dang
T02D3305:109a-5: g-yung mo rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi bum
T02D3305:109a-6: pa dang ri rab dang me thab dang rgyal mtshan
T02D3305:109a-8: de las shar gyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su
T02D3305:109a-9: rtag pa'i thob pa la gnas pa'i rma bya ste
T02D3305:109a-10: shar la sogs pa'i sgor skam /
T02D3305:109a-11: pa ma dang zhags pa ma dang dol zlum ma
T02D3305:109a-12: dang lcags kyu 'dzin ma rnams kyi skam pa dang
T02D3305:109a-13: zhags pa dang dol zlum dang lcags kyu'o /
T02D3305:109a-14: dbang ldan la sogs par me tog ma dang bdug
T02D3305:109a-15: spos ma dang mar ma ma dang dri chab ma
T02D3305:109a-16: rnams kyi me tog gi snod dang spos phor dang
T02D3305:109a-17: mar me'i mchod sdong dang dir ser pos gang ba'i
T02D3305:109a-18: dung chos so // lha'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus
T02D3305:109a-19: su rdo rje nyi ma'i thod pa la gnas pa'i
T02D3305:109a-20: bya ka randa pa ste shar la sogs pa'i sgor
T02D3305:109a-21: nyi lag ma dang mar me dang rin chen skar
T02D3305:109a-22: mda' ma dang phyag na glog thogs ma rnams kyi
T02D3305:109a-23: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang mar me'i mchod sdong dang
T02D3305:109a-24: rin po che dang glog gi phreng ba'o //
T02D3305:109a-25: dbang ldan la sogs par sgeg mo dang phreng ba
T02D3305:109a-26: ma dang glu ma dang gar ma rnams kyi rdo
T02D3305:109a-27: rje dang rin po che'i phreng ba dang 'khar rnga
T02D3305:109a-28: dang rdo rje'o // nub kyi gzhal yas khang gi
T02D3305:109a-29: dbus su padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi thod ba
T02D3305:109a-30: la gnas pa'i dom ste shar la sogs pa'i sgor
T02D3305:109a-31: padma dang chos 'byung ma dang lcags sgrog ma dang
T02D3305:109a-32: rang 'khyud ma rnams kyi padma dang chos 'byung dang
T02D3305:109a-34: dbang ldan la sogs par gling bu ma dang pi
T02D3305:109a-35: wang ma dang rnga zlum ma dang rdza rnga ma
T02D3305:109a-36: rnams kyi rang rang gi rol mo rnams so //
T02D3305:109a-37: byang gi ga zhal yas khang gi dbus su rta
T02D3305:109a-38: mchog gi thod pa la gnas pa'i gza' lhag ste
T02D3305:109a-39: shar la sogs pa'i sgor sgo lcags ma dang lde
T02D3305:109a-40: kyog ma dang sgo glegs ma dang yol ba 'dzin
T02D3305:109a-41: ma rnams kyi sgo lcags dang lde kyog dang sgo
T02D3305:109a-43: dbang ldan la sogs par spyan ma dang m'a ma
T02D3305:109a-44: k'i dang gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma rnams kyi
T02D3305:109a-45: 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang padma dang autpala'o //
T02D3305:109a-46: phyi'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo rnams su dkar mo
T02D3305:109a-47: la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams te dbang ldan la
T02D3305:109b-0: sogs pa'i mtshams @109b su pukka s'i la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:109b-2: mtshan ma 'di rnams thams cad ni sna tshogs padma
T02D3305:109b-3: dang nyi ma la gnas pa ste rtag pa kho
T02D3305:109b-4: na'i zla ba'i gdan pa la gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:109b-5: dkyil 'khor so so la bdud rtsi'i bum pa rnams
T02D3305:109b-6: te kha cig ni dkyil 'khor chen po kho na
T02D3305:109b-7: la'o zhes so // 'khor los sgyur ba drug gi
T02D3305:109b-8: dkyil 'khor la mtshan ma rnams ni sna tshogs padma
T02D3305:109b-9: dang nyi ma la gnas pa ste sangs rgyas mkha'
T02D3305:109b-10: 'gro kho na'i zla ba la gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:109b-11: gzhal yas khang drug po rnams kyi zur rnams su
T02D3305:109b-12: sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i thod pa rnams so
T02D3305:109b-13: // de la snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi padma la rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje ste /
T02D3305:109b-14: mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la mkha' 'gro ma dang
T02D3305:109b-15: l'a ma dang dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma
T02D3305:109b-16: rnams kyi cang te'u rnams so //
T02D3305:109b-17: 'dir dgod pa'i rim pa ni shar la sogs pa
T02D3305:109b-18: sgo rnams su g-yon skor dang me la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:109b-19: mtshams rnams su g-yas skor gyis so //
T02D3305:109b-20: sgo'i chu skyes rnams la thod pa'i dum bum dang
T02D3305:109b-21: rab gtum mo dang keng rus chen mo dang gtum
T02D3305:109b-22: pa'i mig can ma dag dang keng rus dang 'od
T02D3305:109b-23: ldan ma dang mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang
T02D3305:109b-24: sna chen ma dag gi rdo rje bhi ste 'khor
T02D3305:109b-25: yug gi dbus su rdo rje'i phreng ba'o //
T02D3305:109b-26: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su 'khor
T02D3305:109b-27: lo dang sgo'i chu skyes rnams la chang dgra dang
T02D3305:109b-28: dpa' bo'i blo can ma dag dang 'od dpag med
T02D3305:109b-29: dang mi'u thung ma dang rdo rje'i 'od dang langka'i
T02D3305:109b-30: dbang phyug ma dang rdo rje'o //
T02D3305:109b-31: sku dang shing grib ma dag gi 'khor lo rnams
T02D3305:109b-32: te 'khor yug gi dbus su 'khor lo'i phreng ba'o
T02D3305:109b-33: // rin chen mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su
T02D3305:109b-34: rin po che dang sgo'i chu skyes rnams la myug
T02D3305:109b-35: gu can dang su srung ma dang rdo rje ral
T02D3305:109b-36: pa can dang 'jigs byed chen mo dag dang dpa'
T02D3305:109b-37: bo chen po dang rlung shugs ma dag dang rdo
T02D3305:109b-38: rje h'um mdzad dang chang 'thung ma dag gi rin
T02D3305:109b-39: po che rnams te khor yug gi dbus su rin
T02D3305:109b-41: padma mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su padma dang
T02D3305:109b-42: sgo'i chu skyes rnams la shin tu bzang po dang
T02D3305:109b-43: sngo bsangs lha mo dag dang rdo rje bzang po
T02D3305:109b-44: dag dang shin tu bzang mo dag dang 'jigs byed
T02D3305:109b-45: chen po dang rta rnam dag dang mig mi bzang
T02D3305:109b-46: dang bya gdong ma dag gi padma rnams te khor
T02D3305:110a-2: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su rdo rje dang /
T02D3305:110a-3: sgo'i chu skyes rnams la stobs po che dang 'khor
T02D3305:110a-4: lo'i shugs can ma dag dang rin chen rdo rje
T02D3305:110a-5: dang dum skyes ma dag dang rta mgrin dang chang
T02D3305:110a-6: 'tshong ma dag dang nam mkha'i snying po dang 'khor
T02D3305:110a-7: lo'i go cha ma dag gi rdo rje rnams te
T02D3305:110a-8: khor yug gi dbus su rdo rje'i phreng ba'o //
T02D3305:110a-9: sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su sna
T02D3305:110a-10: tshogs rdo rje dang sgo'i chu skyes rnams la he
T02D3305:110a-11: ru ka dang shin tu dpa' mo dag dang padma
T02D3305:110a-12: gar gyi dbang phyug dang stobs chen mo dag dag
T02D3305:110a-13: rnams par snang mdzad dang 'khor los sgyur ma dag
T02D3305:110a-14: dang rdo rje sems dpa' dang brtson 'grus chen mo
T02D3305:110a-15: dag gi sna tshogs rdo rje ste khor yug gi
T02D3305:110a-16: dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'o //
T02D3305:110a-17: gzhal yas khang chen po'i sgo rnams su khva gdong
T02D3305:110a-18: ma dang 'ug gdong ma dang khyi gdong ma dang
T02D3305:110a-19: phag gdong ma rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyus dang
T02D3305:110a-20: rdo rje zhags pa dang rdo rje lcags sgrog dang
T02D3305:110a-21: rdo rje dril bu rnams te /
T02D3305:110a-22: mtshams rnams su ni gshin rje brtan ma dang gshin
T02D3305:110a-23: rje pho nya ma dang gshin rje mche ba ma
T02D3305:110a-24: dang gshin rje 'joms ma rnams kyi me long dang
T02D3305:110a-25: pi wang dang dri'i dung chos dang ro'i snod rnams
T02D3305:110a-26: so // bum pa rnams ni ri ltar rigs par ro //
T02D3305:110a-27: de ltar brjod pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:110a-28: gzhan rnams la yang rdul tshon dgye ba shes par
T02D3305:110a-29: bya ste / 'dir ni gzhung mangs pas 'jigs nas ma bris so //
T02D3305:110a-30: dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la ni tshon gyi
T02D3305:110a-31: kha dog gi rim pa bshad pa rnams dang phal
T02D3305:110a-32: chen mi mthun pas rdul tshon gyi kha dog gi
T02D3305:110a-34: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i rdo rje phreng ba gnyis pa'i
T02D3305:110a-35: mthar thug pa'i nang gi sa gzhi thams cad ni
T02D3305:110a-36: nag go // thugs dang gsung dang sku'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:110a-37: gyi shar gyi sa gzhi thams cad nag po dang
T02D3305:110a-38: nag go // / lho'i dmar po dang /
T02D3305:110a-41: stegs bu rnams ni dkar po'o //
T02D3305:110a-42: rin po che'i snam bu ni dmar po ste de la rin po che sna tshogs pas spras pa'o //
T02D3305:110a-43: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i sa gzhi ni
T02D3305:110a-44: nag po ste der dra ba dang dra ba phyed
T02D3305:110a-46: sa gzhi nag po la rin po che'i shar bu
T02D3305:110a-47: rnams ni dkar po dang sa gzhi nag po la
T02D3305:110b-0: mda' yab @110b rnams kyang dkar po'o //
T02D3305:110b-1: rta babs kyi ka ba rnams ni ser po'o //
T02D3305:110b-2: thugs kyi 'khor lo la gtso bo'i gdan padma ljang
T02D3305:110b-3: gu ste zhi ba la sogs pa la ni dkar
T02D3305:110b-4: po la sogs pa'i kha dog tu 'gyur ro //
T02D3305:110b-5: rdo rje'i phreng ba dang ka ba bcu drug ni
T02D3305:110b-6: nag po ste shar du ral gri nag po dang
T02D3305:110b-7: lhor rin chen dmar po dang nub tu 'khor lo
T02D3305:110b-8: ser po dang byang du padma dkar po rnams dang
T02D3305:110b-9: ldan pa'o // bum pa brgyad ni dkar po ste padma la gnas shing padmas kha brgyad pa'o //
T02D3305:110b-10: thams cad du padma'i gdan rnams kyi sum cha ni lte ba'o //
T02D3305:110b-11: rdo rje'i phreng ba gnyis pa ni ljang gu ste lha snam ni dkar po'o //
T02D3305:110b-12: rtsig pa'i re kh'a gsum ni nang nas brtsams te
T02D3305:110b-13: dkar po dang dmar po dang nag po'i kha dog
T02D3305:110b-14: go // de rnams kyi sa ni cha dgur bya
T02D3305:110b-15: ste de la cha gcig dor nas cha gnyis la
T02D3305:110b-17: sgo dang sgo khyud kyi mtshams rnams su rdo rje dang rin po ches spras pa'o //
T02D3305:110b-18: rta babs bcu gnyis ni sna tshogs pa'i kha dog go //
T02D3305:110b-19: gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha snam ni dkar po
T02D3305:110b-20: ste de'i padma brgyad ni zla ba dang nyi ma
T02D3305:110b-21: dang bral ba phyogs su dmar po dang mtshams su
T02D3305:110b-22: dkar po'o // re kh'a ni nang nas brtsams te
T02D3305:110b-23: ljang gu dang nag po dang dmar po dang dkar
T02D3305:110b-24: po dang ser po'i mdog can rnams so //
T02D3305:110b-25: de rnams kyi sa gzhi cha bco lngar bya la der snga ma bzhin du re kh'a bya'o //
T02D3305:110b-26: sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha snam ni dkar po ste
T02D3305:110b-27: de'i padma rnams ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang
T02D3305:110b-28: bral ba'o // re kh'a lnga ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor bzhin no //
T02D3305:110b-29: rta babs kyi ka ba'i 'og gi stags bu'i klu'i
T02D3305:110b-30: gdan rnams te re re zhing cha chung bcu gnyis
T02D3305:110b-31: pa'o // de la shar phyogs su zlum po nag po gnyis kyi steng du rgyal mtshan dag dang /
T02D3305:110b-32: lhor gru gsum dmar po gnyis la bkra shis kyi mtshan pa dang /
T02D3305:110b-33: nub tu gru bzhi ser po gnyis la rdo rjes mtshan pa dang /
T02D3305:110b-34: byang du zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa dkar po gnyis la padmas mtshan pa'o //
T02D3305:110b-35: shar gyi g-yas kyi zlum po'i g-yas su klu'i rgyal
T02D3305:110b-36: po rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i bdud rtsi'i bum pa
T02D3305:110b-37: ste nub kyi g-yon gyi gru bzhi'i g-yon du rnams
T02D3305:110b-38: par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i bdud rtsi'i bum pa'o
T02D3305:110b-39: // rta babs rnams kyi rim pa dang po'i myos
T02D3305:110b-40: ba bsrung ba'i steng gi dbus kyi gru bzhi las
T02D3305:111a-1: 'khor lo nag po ste de'i g-yas dang g-yon du ri dags dang ri dags mo nag po'o //
T02D3305:111a-2: lhor bum pa bzang po dmar po'i mdog can te
T02D3305:111a-3: de'i g-yas dang g-yon du dung dang padma dmar po'o
T02D3305:111a-4: // nub tu byang chub kyi shing ser po ste
T02D3305:111a-5: de'i g-yas dang g-yon du mi'am ci dang mi'am ci
T02D3305:111a-6: // ser po'o // byang du rnga bo che dkar
T02D3305:111a-7: po ste de'i g-yas dang g-yon du dbyug pa dang
T02D3305:111a-9: mda' yab dang khor yug gi bar gyis ni nag
T02D3305:111a-10: po ste de la ji ltar rigs par mchod pa'i
T02D3305:111a-11: yo byad rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02D3305:111a-12: sa'i khor yug ni ser po ste de la dbang
T02D3305:111a-13: ldan gyi mtshams nas 'char bzhin pa'i zla ba nya
T02D3305:111a-14: ba'i cha chung bcu gnyis pa dang bden bral du
T02D3305:111a-15: nub bzhin pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor cha chung bcu
T02D3305:111a-16: gnyis pa'o // chu'i khor yug dkar po dang me'i
T02D3305:111a-17: khor yug dmar po dang rlung gi khor yug nag
T02D3305:111a-18: gnyis pa'o // po'o // me dang rlung gi khor
T02D3305:111a-19: yug de dag gi dbus su so sor cha chung
T02D3305:111a-20: bcu gnyis pa rtsibs brgyad pa'i dur khrod kyi 'khor
T02D3305:111a-21: gnyis pa'o // po'o // lo brgyad de / phyogs rnams su dmar po dang mtshams su dkar po'o //
T02D3305:111a-22: shar gyi 'khor lo'i phyi ngos su stong pa'i dkyil
T02D3305:111a-23: 'khor te nub kyi 'khor lo'i phyi ngos su yang
T02D3305:111a-25: stong pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis po bri ba ni sgrub
T02D3305:111a-26: thabs kyi le'ur gsungs pa'i tshul gyis te bcu char
T02D3305:111a-27: la yang mtshan ma ni gri gug go //
T02D3305:111a-28: rlung gi khor yug la ni sna tshogs pa'i mtshan
T02D3305:111a-29: ma bri bar bya ste 'dir 'dod pas spyod pa
T02D3305:111a-31: nam mkha'i khor yug ni nag po'o //
T02D3305:111a-32: de'i logs gnyis su cha chung gsum gsum byas par
T02D3305:111a-33: re kh'a'i zlum skor gnyis te dbus kyi cha chung
T02D3305:111a-34: drug la rdo rje'i phreng ba ljang gu bya'o //
T02D3305:111a-35: 'od zer 'bar ba rnams ni kha dog lnga pa'o //
T02D3305:111a-36: yang snying po'i dkyil 'khor la shar phyogs kyi rdul
T02D3305:111a-37: tshon nag po'i dpangs ni nas kyi rkang pa gcig
T02D3305:111a-38: ste lho'i dmar po ni gnyis dang nub kyi ser
T02D3305:111a-39: po ni bzhi dang byang gi dkar po ni gsum
T02D3305:111a-40: mo // rtsig pa'i re kh'a rnams kyi dpangs ni
T02D3305:111a-41: rdul tshon ser po'i sum 'gyur te rdo rje phreng
T02D3305:111a-43: re kh'a gzhan rnams ni rdul tshon ser po las
T02D3305:111a-44: nyis 'gyur te padma rnams snam bu las nyis 'gyur
T02D3305:111b-0: nyid do // zla ba dang nyi ma dag gi @111b chu skyes kyi re kh'a las so //
T02D3305:111b-1: de ltar brjod pa'i dpangs las nyis 'gyur ni gsung
T02D3305:111b-2: gi dkyil 'khor gyi dpangs te de rnams las nyis
T02D3305:111b-4: mda' yab las phyi rol gyi mchod pa'i sa gzhi
T02D3305:111b-5: la ni nas gcig ste sa la sogs pa'i khor
T02D3305:111b-6: yug dang re kh'a zlum po gnyis kyi dpangs ni
T02D3305:111b-7: sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig pa'i re kh'a'i tshad du'o
T02D3305:111b-8: // gzhan rdul tshon dgye ba ni thams cad du
T02D3305:111b-9: nyis 'gyur gyi dbye ba mtshungs pa ste sa gzhi
T02D3305:111b-10: // thams cad la'o // de la gtso bo'i lte
T02D3305:111b-11: bar lte ba dang mnyam pa'i dkar po dang dmar
T02D3305:111b-12: po dag nag po dang dmar po'i zla ba dang
T02D3305:111b-13: nyi ma dang sgra gcan dang dus me'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:111b-14: gyi steng du bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D3305:111b-15: rdo rje sngon po rtse gsum pa'o //
T02D3305:111b-16: shar gyi 'dab ma la spos phor nag po dang
T02D3305:111b-17: lhor mar me dmar po dang nub tu dung ser
T02D3305:111b-18: po dang byang du bshos dkar po dang /
T02D3305:111b-19: me la sogs pa rnams su nag po dang dmar
T02D3305:111b-20: po dang ser po dang dkar po'i rnga yab rnams
T02D3305:111b-21: so // de'i phyi rol gyi dbang ldan du chos kyi dung dkar po dang /
T02D3305:111b-22: mer yid bzhin gyi nor bu nag po dang bden
T02D3305:111b-23: bral du chos kyi ganda'i dmar po dang rlung du
T02D3305:111b-24: dpag bsam gyi shing ser po'o //
T02D3305:111b-25: rim pa gnyis par shar du chu skyes dkar po dang nyi ma la ral gri nag po dang /
T02D3305:111b-26: mer chu skyes dmar po dang zla ba la autpala sngon po dang /
T02D3305:111b-27: lhor chu skyes dkar po dang nyi ma la rin po che cha dgu pa dmar po dang /
T02D3305:111b-28: bden bral du chu skyes dmar po dang zla ba la padma dmar po dang /
T02D3305:111b-29: nub tu chu skyes dkar po dang nyi ma la
T02D3305:111b-30: 'khor lo ser po dang rlung du chu skyes dmar
T02D3305:111b-31: po dang zla ba la 'khor lo ser po dang
T02D3305:111b-32: / byang du chu skyes dkar po dang nyi ma la padma dkar po dang /
T02D3305:111b-33: dbang ldan du chu skyes dmar po dang zla ba la autpala dkar po'o //
T02D3305:111b-34: rim pa gsum pa'i snam bu la sgo so so'i ngos dag tu gnyis zhes pas padma brgyad de /
T02D3305:111b-35: de'i drug la ni nyi ma dang nub dang byang gi sgo'i g-yon dag tu zla ba'o //
T02D3305:111b-36: mtshams rnams su padma dang zla ba bzhi'o //
T02D3305:111b-37: de rnams su dbang ldan nas brtsams nas me long
T02D3305:111b-38: dang rdo rje dang ral gri dang gos dang rdo
T02D3305:111b-39: rje dang rin po che dang ro'i snod dang chos
T02D3305:111b-40: 'byung ba dang 'khor lo dang dri'i dung dang pi
T02D3305:112a-0: dkar po dang sngon po dang nag @112a * //
T02D3305:112a-1: po dang ljang gu dang dmar po dang dmar po
T02D3305:112a-2: dang ljang gu dang ser po dang sor po dang
T02D3305:112a-4: shar gyi sgor padma dang nyi ma la ral gri
T02D3305:112a-5: nag po dang lhor dbyug pa dmar po dang nub
T02D3305:112a-6: tu padma ser po dang byang du tho ba dkar
T02D3305:112a-7: po'o // 'dir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni chu
T02D3305:112a-8: skyes dkar po la gnas shing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:112a-9: rnams ni chu skyes dmar po la gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:112a-10: stegs bu la rta babs kyi rtsa bar shar gyi
T02D3305:112a-11: g-yon du dung chos nag po dang g-yas su me
T02D3305:112a-12: tog gi phreng ba sngon po ste /
T02D3305:112a-13: lhor spos phor dmar po dang mar me'i mchod sdong
T02D3305:112a-14: dang nub tu cod pan ser po dang do shal
T02D3305:112a-15: ser po'o // byang du 'bras bu dkar po dang bdud rtsis gang ba'i snod dkar po'o //
T02D3305:112a-16: stegs bu thams cad du ni mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa'i lha mo rnams so //
T02D3305:112a-17: rta babs kyi mchod pa'i lha mo'i gnas la shar
T02D3305:112a-18: gyi dbus su gos dang lhor padma dang nub tu
T02D3305:112a-19: rnga pa ta ha dang byang du rdo rje'o //
T02D3305:112a-20: gsung gi dkyil 'khor du ni padma'i lte ba dang
T02D3305:112a-21: 'dab ma rnams la shar du gri gug nag po
T02D3305:112a-22: rnams dang mer 'khor lo nag po rnams dag gshin
T02D3305:112a-23: rjer dbyug pa dmar po rnams dang bden bral du
T02D3305:112a-24: shakti dmar po rnams dang nub tu rdo rje ser
T02D3305:112a-25: po rnams dang rlung du tshangs pa'i dbyu gu rtse
T02D3305:112a-26: mo ser po can rnams dang byang du rtse gsum
T02D3305:112a-27: dkar po rnams dang dbang ldan du padma dkar po
T02D3305:112a-28: rnams so // sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu la
T02D3305:112a-29: yang padma'i lte ba dang 'dra ba ma rnams la
T02D3305:112a-30: mtshan ma rnams te de la shar sgo'i g-yas su
T02D3305:112a-31: ral gri rnams dang mer dpag bsam gyi shing rnams
T02D3305:112a-32: dang lho sgo'i g-yon du rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug
T02D3305:112a-33: pa rnams dang g-yas su shakti rnams dang bden bral
T02D3305:112a-34: du shakti'am yang na mdung rnams dang /
T02D3305:112a-35: nub sgo'i g-yon du rin po che'i dbyug to rnams
T02D3305:112a-36: dang g-yas su rdo rje rnams dang rlung du khab
T02D3305:112a-37: rnams dang byang sgo'i g-yon du mdud rtse gsum pa
T02D3305:112a-38: rnams dang g-yas su zhags pa rnams dang dbang ldan
T02D3305:112a-40: shar sgo'i g-yon du 'khor lo rnams so //
T02D3305:112a-41: shar sgor dbyug pa dang de'i phyi rol du rdo rje ljang gu dang /
T02D3305:112a-42: lho sgor mda' dmar po dang /
T02D3305:112a-43: nub sgor dbyug to ser po dang /
T02D3305:112a-44: de'i phyi rol du rtse gsum sngon po dang /
T02D3305:112b-0: byang sgor gtun shing dkar @112b po ste dbyug pa
T02D3305:112b-1: la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'di rnams ni padma dang
T02D3305:112b-3: gsung dang sku'i dkyil 'khor dag gi phyogs kyi padma
T02D3305:112b-4: rnams ni dmar po ste mtshams kyi padma rnams ni
T02D3305:112b-5: dkar po'o // 'dir gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi stegs
T02D3305:112b-6: bu la shar sgo'i g-yas su autpala dang gos dang
T02D3305:112b-7: gri gug dang 'khor lo dang kha tv'am ga nag
T02D3305:112b-8: po rnams te g-yon du gri gug dang ral gri
T02D3305:112b-9: dang gri gug dang gri gug nag po'o //
T02D3305:112b-10: lho sgo'i g-yas su padma dang ro'i snod dang dbyug pa dang shakti dang padma rnams dmar po ste /
T02D3305:112b-11: g-yon du mda' dang dgra sta dang gri gug dang gri gug dmar po'o //
T02D3305:112b-12: nub sgo'i g-yas su 'khor lo dang dri'i dung chos
T02D3305:112b-13: dang rdo rje dang khab dang 'khor lo rnams ser
T02D3305:112b-14: po ste g-yon du chos 'byung ljang gu dang gri
T02D3305:112b-15: gug dang gri gug rnam ser po'o //
T02D3305:112b-16: byang sgo'i g-yas su autpala dang me long dang rtse
T02D3305:112b-17: gsum dang padma dang autpala rnams dkar po ste g-yon
T02D3305:112b-18: du pi wang sngon po dang thob dang gri gug
T02D3305:112b-19: dang gri gug rnams dkar po'o //
T02D3305:112b-20: de ltar mtshan ma sum cu rtsa drug po rnams
T02D3305:112b-21: ni sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi stegs bu rnams la yang
T02D3305:112b-22: ngo // de nas 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs
T02D3305:112b-23: pa gang yang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor bris pa rnam
T02D3305:112b-24: pa thams cad du gsal bar gyur par shes nas
T02D3305:112b-25: h'um yig dang 'khyil pa bzlas pa'i bdud rtsi dang
T02D3305:112b-26: bcas pa'i dri'i chus dkyil 'khor gyi phyi ngos su
T02D3305:112b-27: byugs la tshad des 'khor lo bsang zhing /
T02D3305:112b-28: rdul tshon lhag ma rnams la aom a'a:h'um badzra mu:zhes
T02D3305:112b-29: pas ye shes pa gshegs su gsol te snod na
T02D3305:112b-30: gnas pa'i tshon rnams dben par gzhag par bya'o zhes
T02D3305:112b-31: pa tshon dgye ba'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:112b-33: // / de'i rjes su sngar lhag par gnas pa byas
T02D3305:112b-34: pa'i bum pa rnams g-yas skor du dgod par bya'o
T02D3305:112b-35: // de la 'khor lo'i dbang po'i rnam par rgyal
T02D3305:112b-36: ba'i bum pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i g-yas
T02D3305:112b-37: phyogs nas bskor te rdo rjer ba'i bdag nyid kyi
T02D3305:112b-38: khor yug dang 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i sa gzhi'i phyi
T02D3305:112b-39: rol du dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgo'i thad ka'i gnas
T02D3305:112b-40: las cung zad g-yas su gzhag par bya'o //
T02D3305:112b-41: g-yon logs su ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin
T02D3305:112b-42: du g-yas skor gyis rnam par snang mdzad dang spyan
T02D3305:112b-43: ma dang las thams cad pa'i bum pa ste g-yas
T02D3305:113a-0: su gzugs rdo rje dang chos @113a * //
T02D3305:113a-1: dbyings rdo rje ma dang gshin rje mthar byed rnams kyi'o //
T02D3305:113a-2: lho'i g-yon du rin chen 'byung ldan dang m'a ma
T02D3305:113a-3: k'i dang g-yas su sgra rdo rje ma dang shes
T02D3305:113a-5: nub kyi g-yon du snang ba mtha' yas dang gos
T02D3305:113a-6: dkar mo dag dang g-yas su dri rdo rje ma
T02D3305:113a-7: dang / padma mthar byed dag gi'o //
T02D3305:113a-8: byang gi g-yon du don yod grub pa dang /
T02D3305:113a-10: g-yas su rdo rje ma dang /
T02D3305:113a-11: reg bya rdo rje ma dang /
T02D3305:113a-13: gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa khro bo rnams
T02D3305:113a-14: kyi ni me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su'o zhes
T02D3305:113a-15: pa kha cig gis te de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D3305:113a-16: cad kyi de ma thag tu khro bo rnams kyi
T02D3305:113a-17: dang rigs kyi yum rnams kyi ni sgo'i g-yas rnams
T02D3305:113a-18: su'o zhes pa gzhan dag gis so //
T02D3305:113a-19: 'di'i rjes su 'brangs nas phyogs gzhan rnams su yang dgod par shes par bya'o //
T02D3305:113a-20: 'dod pa gzhan yang yod mod des ci zhig bya /
T02D3305:113a-21: de ltar 'di ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la bum pa dgod pa'o //
T02D3305:113a-22: bsdus pa'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor la g-yon du rigs
T02D3305:113a-23: kyi yum gyi de ma thag tu yang g-yas su
T02D3305:113a-24: dang por byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po rnams kyi'o
T02D3305:113a-25: // zur gyi khro bo rnams kyi zur rnam su
T02D3305:113a-26: dang gshin rje mthar byed kyi rjes la gtsug tor
T02D3305:113a-28: padma mthar byed kyi rjes la gnod mdzes kyi ste khyad par ro //
T02D3305:113a-29: 'di dag gi rjes su 'brangs te dkyil 'khor gzhan
T02D3305:113a-30: rnams la bum pa dgod pa ni rtogs sla bas
T02D3305:113a-32: zur bzhi'i bum pa rnams la ni sgro dang bcas pa'i mda' bzhi ste /
T02D3305:113a-33: aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis dgod par bya'o //
T02D3305:113a-34: dus kyi 'khor lo la ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil
T02D3305:113a-35: 'khor las phyi rol du shar la sogs pa'i phyogs
T02D3305:113a-36: rnams su bum pa brgyad dang /
T02D3305:113a-37: nub kyi bum pa las phyi rol du sor gnyis spangs par rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang /
T02D3305:113a-38: shar gyi bum pa las phyi rol du sor gnyis spangs par rgyal ba'i bum pa ste /
T02D3305:113a-39: de'i steng du rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i bum pa dung chos ni bcu gcig pa'o //
T02D3305:113a-40: shar du rgyal ba'i bum pa yang ste lnga pa'o //
T02D3305:113b-0: de'i steng du rnam par rgyal ba'i @113b bum pa
T02D3305:113b-1: ni dung chos te drag pa'o zhes pa bum pa
T02D3305:113b-3: bum pa bcu'i phyogs la ni phyogs brgyad du bum pa brgyad dang /
T02D3305:113b-4: nub kyi bum pa las phyi rol du sor gnyis spangs par rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang /
T02D3305:113b-5: shar gyi bum pa las phyi rol du sor gnyis
T02D3305:113b-6: spangs par rgyal ba'i bum pa ste de'i steng du
T02D3305:113b-7: rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i dung chos ni bcu
T02D3305:113b-8: gcig pa'o // de bzhin du brgya phrag stong gi
T02D3305:113b-9: bum pa rnams la yang rnam par rgyal ba chen
T02D3305:113b-10: po ni dung chos te zhi ba dang rgyas pa
T02D3305:113b-11: dang la thams cad pa la yang ngo zhes pa
T02D3305:113b-12: bum pa dgod pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:113b-14: // / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du phyogs
T02D3305:113b-15: bzhir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T02D3305:113b-16: sogs pa'i dam pa'i chos bzhi bklag par bya'o //
T02D3305:113b-17: ga bur dang aa ka ru dang tu rushka la sogs pa'i spos phor brgyad gzhag par bya'o //
T02D3305:113b-18: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i na bza' stong la sogs
T02D3305:113b-19: pa 'am lha so so re re la sogs pa
T02D3305:113b-20: ji ltar nus pa yang rung slob ma la sogs
T02D3305:113b-21: par gzhag pa dang gdug dang rgyal mtshan dang ba
T02D3305:113b-22: dan rnams h'um yig dang bdag po'i sngags kyis bzlas
T02D3305:113b-23: pa aom spha ra na kham zhes pas phul nas
T02D3305:113b-24: gnas ji lta bar gzhag par bya ste /
T02D3305:113b-25: rta babs dang gos bzang po dang dril bu dang
T02D3305:113b-26: bcas pa'i rnga yab dang bum pa gdab dang lo
T02D3305:113b-27: ma dang bcas pa'i chu shing gi sdong bu'i ka
T02D3305:113b-29: de nas khrus byas shing dri zhim po'i lus stod
T02D3305:113b-30: g-yogs dang gtsug tor dang rgyan dang bcas pas 'khyil
T02D3305:113b-31: pa bzlas pa'i chus dkyil 'khor bsangs te yi ge
T02D3305:113b-32: gsum dang 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis bsrungs nas rdo rje
T02D3305:113b-33: dang dril bu bzung ste shar gyi sgo dang nye
T02D3305:113b-34: bar nub tu gdong phyogs pas 'dug la 'khor lo'i
T02D3305:113b-35: dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor dang ldan pa bris pa'i
T02D3305:113b-36: dkyil 'khor slad cig gis stong pa nyid kyi rjes
T02D3305:113b-37: su srung ba'i 'khor lo dang bgegs la phur bus
T02D3305:113b-38: gdab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga 'khor dang bcas
T02D3305:113b-39: pas bsgom par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin
T02D3305:113b-41: btsun mo mdzes shing ltas bzang ba //
T02D3305:113b-42: lo grangs bcu drug lon rnyed nas //
T02D3305:113b-43: dri dang me tog gis brgyan te //
T02D3305:113b-44: de yi dbus su 'dod pa bya //
T02D3305:113b-45: yon tan ska rags m'a ma k'ir //
T02D3305:114a-2: zhi ba spro bya sangs rgyas gnas //
T02D3305:114a-3: nam mkha'i dbyings ni rab tu brgyan //
T02D3305:114a-4: zhes gsungs pas rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir phyi rol gyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par 'jug pa'am /
T02D3305:114a-5: de med na ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang snyoms
T02D3305:114a-6: par 'jug pas yang dag par bskyod pa'i dga' ba'i
T02D3305:114a-7: sgras / ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs la /
T02D3305:114a-8: zhabs bsil dang zhal bsil dang mchod yon dbul ba
T02D3305:114a-9: sngon du 'gro bas rang gi gnas su bcug nas
T02D3305:114a-10: 'dod chags chen po zhu bar gyur pa rdo rje'i
T02D3305:114a-11: lam nas padmar phyung ba'i ye shes kyi lha'i 'khor
T02D3305:114a-13: dam tshig gi 'khor lo la ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs par bsams nas /
T02D3305:114a-14: mig dang sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs shing
T02D3305:114a-15: de ma thag rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi
T02D3305:114a-16: 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang
T02D3305:114a-17: lha mo rnams kyis dbang bskur nas ji ltar rigs
T02D3305:114a-18: par rgyas gdab ste rigs mi shes pa rnams ni
T02D3305:114a-19: mi bskyod pa'am rdo rje sems dpas so //
T02D3305:114a-20: de nas lha mo spros pa rnams kyis yid kyi rang bzhin gyi mchod pas mchod cing /
T02D3305:114a-21: bsil ba'i ras dang ras zung bla re la dbyangs pa dang gos dang /
T02D3305:114a-22: yi ge gsum gyis bsngags pa'i bza' ba dang bca'
T02D3305:114a-23: ba dang bldag ba dang btung ba'i nye bar spyad
T02D3305:114a-25: gser dang bu mo dang glang po che dang rta
T02D3305:114a-26: dang ba lang la sogs pa phul la gzugs rdo
T02D3305:114a-27: rje ma la sogs pa'i ngo bo phyi rol gyi
T02D3305:114a-28: rnal 'byor ma bcu drug gam brgyad dam bzhis rang
T02D3305:114a-29: rang gi mchod pas mchod nas dril bu dkrol zhing
T02D3305:114a-30: mi bskyod rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pas bstod
T02D3305:114a-31: de / rang dang shes rab kyi me tog dang
T02D3305:114a-32: bcas pa'i byang chub kyi sems padma'i snod du bcug
T02D3305:114a-33: pa bdud rtsi dang bcas pa phul bas /
T02D3305:114a-34: de rnams bdud rtsi myangs pas tshim par gyur cing
T02D3305:114a-35: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du mos par byas
T02D3305:114a-36: la 'khor lo'i dbang po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dang
T02D3305:114a-37: / de las gzhan dkyil 'khor ba'i sngags nyi shu
T02D3305:114a-38: rtsa gcig dang yi ge brgya pa bzlas par bya'o
T02D3305:114a-39: / // 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho gas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma gtang bar bya ste /
T02D3305:114a-40: yod na sgrub pa'i grogs po dkyil 'khor du bzhag
T02D3305:114b-0: nas phyi rol du phyung la shar la @114b sogs
T02D3305:114b-1: pa'i phyogs su 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho gas 'byung
T02D3305:114b-2: po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i cho gas rang gi
T02D3305:114b-3: 'dod pa'i lha dang dbang po la sogs pa la
T02D3305:114b-5: de nas lag pa g-yas pa gan rkyal du byas
T02D3305:114b-6: la gung mo dang ming med cing zad bkug pa
T02D3305:114b-7: kha la mngon du phyogs par gzung bar bya'o //
T02D3305:114b-8: de'i rtse mos lag pa gnyis pus mo'i nang du
T02D3305:114b-9: byas nas tsog tsog por 'dug ste mi smra bar
T02D3305:114b-10: de'i rtse mos lag pa'i ze'u 'bru'i chas kha la
T02D3305:114b-11: lan mang du bya ba cing /
T02D3305:114b-12: lan gnyis sam gsum du rna ba'i bug pa gnyis
T02D3305:114b-13: dang mig dag dang kha dang lag pa dag dang
T02D3305:114b-14: lte ba dang mgo bo rnams la reg par bya'o
T02D3305:114b-15: zhes pa nye reg gi cho ga bya'o //
T02D3305:114b-16: de nas grub na lhag pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir zhi ba dang /
T02D3305:114b-17: dkyil 'khor tshim par bya ba'i phyir zhi ba dang
T02D3305:114b-18: rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg 'chad par 'gyur ba byas nas
T02D3305:114b-19: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan
T02D3305:114b-20: pas me tog gi phreng ba blangs te /
T02D3305:114b-21: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um h'um phat /
T02D3305:114b-22: aom grihna grihna h'um h'um phat /
T02D3305:114b-23: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02D3305:114b-24: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga w'an bidy'a r'a dza h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:114b-25: zhes dpal kha sbyor du gsungs pa'i khams gsum rnam
T02D3305:114b-26: par rgyal ba'i sngags zlos shing rdo rje shugs kyis
T02D3305:114b-27: dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa la rdo rje gsor zhing
T02D3305:114b-28: dril bu dkrol te rdo rje'i rkang pas de kho
T02D3305:114b-29: na bzhin du aom a'a:h'um phat ces pa dang /
T02D3305:114b-30: aom h'um a'a:phat ces pa dang /
T02D3305:114b-31: aom h'um a'a:a'a:phat ces pa dang /
T02D3305:114b-32: aom h'um ha na m'a ra ya dusht'a na gh'a
T02D3305:114b-33: ta ya gh'a ta ya a'a:a'a:h'um hr'i:phat ces pa'i sngags
T02D3305:114b-34: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du zlos pa'i shar
T02D3305:114b-35: dang lho la sogs pa'i sgo'i slob dpon rnams dang
T02D3305:114b-36: lhan cig tu g-yas skor byas nas lhag pa dang
T02D3305:114b-37: ma tshang ba'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir
T02D3305:114b-38: 'khor lo la bltas te phreng ba bcom ldan 'das
T02D3305:114b-39: la dbul zhing bskor ba'i grangs ji lta ba bzhin
T02D3305:114b-40: du nub sgo la sogs pa bzhir gnas pas shar
T02D3305:114b-41: sgo la sogs pa bzhi aom badzrodha ta sa ma
T02D3305:114b-42: ya pra be sha ya h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis
T02D3305:114b-44: aom sa ma yam pra be sh'a mi zhes brjod
T02D3305:114b-45: nas gar byed cing phreng ba blangs la rang gi
T02D3305:114b-46: mgo la bcings te 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal nas
T02D3305:115a-1: la dngos grub kyi skal ba thams cad stsol cig
T02D3305:115a-2: ces gsol ba gdab cing bsgom pa dang bzlas pa
T02D3305:115a-3: bya'o // 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa las phyi
T02D3305:115a-4: rol du rnam par snang mdzad dang de'i rigs kyi
T02D3305:115a-5: lha rnams kyi ba dan ni mer dgod par bya'o
T02D3305:115a-6: bya'o // // rin chen dbang po dang de'i rigs kyi lha rnams ni bden bral du'o //
T02D3305:115a-7: snang ba mtha' yas dang de'i rigs las byung ba rnams kyi rlung du'o //
T02D3305:115a-8: don yod grub pa dang de'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyi dbang ldan du'o //
T02D3305:115a-9: 'khor lo'i dbang po'i shar phyogs su ste de'i rigs
T02D3305:115a-10: kyi lha rnams kyi ni rang rang gi phyogs su'o
T02D3305:115a-12: dbang por ni khyab 'jug gi nag po dang zla
T02D3305:115a-13: ba'i dkar po dang nyi ma'i dmar po dang me'i
T02D3305:115a-14: ser po ste nub tu sa'i lha mo'i ser po
T02D3305:115a-15: dang thags bzangs ris kyi nag po'o //
T02D3305:115a-16: dbang ldan du ni tshogs kyi bdag po'i dkar po
T02D3305:115a-17: ste ma 'byor na ji ltar nus pa'i ba dan
T02D3305:115a-18: dbul bar bya'o zhes pa dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa 'khor
T02D3305:115a-21: // /'dir brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi kha
T02D3305:115a-22: dog la sogs pa bsgom pa'i rim pa shes par
T02D3305:115a-23: bya ba'i phyir yang dag par bsdus nas mchog tu
T02D3305:115a-24: gyur pa'i sems can rnams la bshad par bya'o //
T02D3305:115a-25: 'dir gang gi phyir chung ngu dang 'bring po'i rim
T02D3305:115a-26: pa dag gi ting nge 'dzin legs par bsgom pa
T02D3305:115a-27: las shes rab mchog tu gyur pa rnams la bcom
T02D3305:115a-28: ldan 'das kyis / rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa //
T02D3305:115a-29: spro zhing sdud pa'i byed pa po //
T02D3305:115a-30: skad cig gis ni ye shes rdzogs //
T02D3305:115a-31: rnal 'byor rdzogs par bshad par bya //
T02D3305:115a-32: zhes gsungs pa de'i phyir rang dang sems can thams
T02D3305:115a-33: cad rdo rje 'chang nyid thob par 'dod pa'i mngon
T02D3305:115a-34: par spro ba dang ldan pas phung po dang khams
T02D3305:115a-35: dang skye mched la sogs pa gzugs can gyi rang
T02D3305:115a-36: bzhin stong pa nyid dang ro gcig par nges par
T02D3305:115a-37: byas nas 'od gsal bar zhugs pa las skad cig
T02D3305:115a-38: gis yan lag dang bcas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi
T02D3305:115a-39: dbus su dkyil 'khor pas yongs su bskor zhing rigs
T02D3305:115a-40: kyi bdag po'i dbu rgyan dang thugs ka'i sa bon
T02D3305:115a-41: dang ldan pa stong pa nyid dang snying rje ro
T02D3305:115a-42: gcig pa bden pa chen po'i rang bzhin can dpal
T02D3305:115a-43: rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'jam pa'i rdo rje la
T02D3305:115b-0: sogs pa'i sku dpag tu med pa'i de bzhin @115b
T02D3305:115b-1: gshegs pa dang lha mo dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D3305:115b-2: dang khro bo la sogs pa spros te chos ston
T02D3305:115b-3: pa la sogs pas skal ba ji lta ba bzhin
T02D3305:115b-4: du gzhan la phan pa mdzad nas bsod nams kyi
T02D3305:115b-5: tshogs mthar phyin pa la 'jog cing sdud pa bsam
T02D3305:115b-6: gyis mi khyab pa'i skur 'char bar bya'o //
T02D3305:115b-7: de la yan lag la sogs pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D3305:115b-8: sa 'og gi mthar thug par ji ltar mngon par
T02D3305:115b-9: 'dod pa'i rgyar gcig tu sra zhing mkhregs la 'bar
T02D3305:115b-10: ba'i rdo rje'i sa gzhi bskal pa'i mtha'i me ltar
T02D3305:115b-11: 'bar ba 'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng bas mtshams bcings
T02D3305:115b-12: pa dang sa 'og nas steng gi bar du shin
T02D3305:115b-13: tu mtho ba mthug cing mkhregs la sra zhing 'bar
T02D3305:115b-14: ba'i rdo rje'i rab dang rdo rje'i ra ba'i steng
T02D3305:115b-15: du bar mtshams med par dum bu gcig tu gyur
T02D3305:115b-16: pa'i steng rdo rje'i dra ba dang 'og rdo rje'i
T02D3305:115b-17: bla res brgyan pa'i rdo rje'i gur 'bar ba'o //
T02D3305:115b-18: de'i nang du gnas par sna tshogs chu skyes dang
T02D3305:115b-19: nyi ma la gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa
T02D3305:115b-20: ser po g-yas skor tu 'khor ba'o //
T02D3305:115b-21: de'i rtsibs la shar du gshin rje mthar byed nag
T02D3305:115b-22: po dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can rdo rje
T02D3305:115b-23: thob nag po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang
T02D3305:115b-24: padma 'dzin pa'o // lhor shes rab mthar byed dkar
T02D3305:115b-25: po nag po dang dmar po'i zhal can rdo rjes
T02D3305:115b-26: mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang ral gri dang
T02D3305:115b-28: nub tu padma mthar byed dmar po sngon po dang dkar po'i zhal can /
T02D3305:115b-29: padma dmar po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:115b-30: byang du bgegs mthar byed nag po dkar po dang
T02D3305:115b-31: dmar po'i zhal can rdo rje kha gyis pa dang
T02D3305:115b-32: ral gri dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:115b-33: mer 'dod pa'i rgyal po sngon po dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can /
T02D3305:115b-34: lcags kyu dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:115b-35: bden bral du dbyug sngon can nag po dkar po
T02D3305:115b-36: dang dmar po'i zhal can dbyug pa sngon po dang
T02D3305:115b-37: ral gri dang nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o
T02D3305:115b-38: // rlung du stobs po che nag po dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can /
T02D3305:115b-39: rtse gsum dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:115b-40: dbang ldan du mi g-yo ba sngon po dkar po
T02D3305:115b-41: dang dmar po'i zhal can ral gri dag rdo rje
T02D3305:115b-42: dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:115b-43: steng du gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ser po
T02D3305:115b-44: sngon po dang dmar po'i zhal can 'khor lo ser
T02D3305:116a-0: po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang @116a *
T02D3305:116a-2: 'og tu gnod mdzes rgyal po sngon po dkar po
T02D3305:116a-3: dang dmar po'i zhal can rdo rje dang ral gri
T02D3305:116a-4: dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:116a-5: de la gtsug tor dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang
T02D3305:116a-6: mi g-yo ba dang gnod mdzes rnams ni rin po
T02D3305:116a-8: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po ches brgyan cing
T02D3305:116a-9: 'gying bar gyur pa mche ba cung zad gtsigs par
T02D3305:116a-10: ston cing khros pa'i sma ra dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3305:116a-11: de las gzhan pa rnams ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i
T02D3305:116a-12: gzugs can smin ma 'khyog pa dang bcas pa dbu
T02D3305:116a-13: skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa smin ma dang
T02D3305:116a-14: smar ser ba mche ba gtsigs shing zhal gdangs pa
T02D3305:116a-15: ljags 'gyur ba gad rgyangs dang ldan pa drag po'i
T02D3305:116a-16: klu brgyad kyis brgyan pa sku bong thung zhing rags
T02D3305:116a-18: bcu po 'di dag ni g-yon brkyang zhing g-yas bskum
T02D3305:116a-19: pa rtsibs kyi rtse mo la cung zad ma reg
T02D3305:116a-20: pa'i sna tshogs chu skyes nyi ma dang bcas pa'i
T02D3305:116a-21: gdan la brtan par gnas pa /
T02D3305:116a-22: nyi ma'i 'od can rab tu khro ba dang 'bar
T02D3305:116a-23: bas shin tu 'jigs pa dus mtha'i me lta bu'i
T02D3305:116a-24: 'od dang ldan pa'i rang gi sprul pa dpag tu
T02D3305:116a-25: med pa'i tshogs kyis kyang khams gsum mtha' yas pa
T02D3305:116a-26: na gnas pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs ma lus pa yang
T02D3305:116a-27: dang yang du rlag par byed pa phyag drug pa
T02D3305:116a-28: rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis rang dang 'dra ba'i shes
T02D3305:116a-30: zhal gsum pa rtsa ba'i zhal sku mdog lta bu
T02D3305:116a-31: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa ni brjod zin pa ji
T02D3305:116a-33: zhal re re la yang dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum gsum mo //
T02D3305:116a-34: 'khor lo yang rgyun mi 'chad par drag tu 'khor
T02D3305:116a-35: bas brtan par gnas pa lta bu ste 'bar ba'i
T02D3305:116a-36: tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phro ba'o //
T02D3305:116a-37: de'i lte ba'i nang 'og gi rtsibs kyi steng du
T02D3305:116a-38: chos 'byung gru gsum pa dkar po shin tu yangs
T02D3305:116a-39: pa'i nang du 'og gi zur la gnas ba'i sna
T02D3305:116a-40: tshogs padma'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje dang bcas
T02D3305:116a-41: pa'o // rdo rje de'i phyogs kyi ra rnams dang
T02D3305:116a-42: lte ba ni ji ltar rigs par rnam par snang
T02D3305:116a-43: mdzad la sogs pa'i sku mdog dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D3305:116a-44: der rin po che kha dog lnga las yongs su
T02D3305:116a-45: rdzogs shing 'od gsal ba'i thub pa'i dbang bo'i dkyil
T02D3305:116a-46: 'khor sna tshogs pa'i 'od kyis phyogs kyi 'khor lo
T02D3305:116a-47: thams cad khyab pa'i gzhal yas khang ngo //
T02D3305:116b-0: de'i dbus su @116b bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
T02D3305:116b-1: dpa' 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sku gur kum gyi mdog
T02D3305:116b-2: lta bu g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal nag po dang
T02D3305:116b-3: dkar po rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis rang dang 'dra
T02D3305:116b-5: ral gri dad mda' dang autpala dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02D3305:116b-6: rin po che'i cod pan can sna tshogs pa'i rin
T02D3305:116b-7: po che la sogs pas brgyan cing 'od zer mtha'
T02D3305:116b-8: yas pa'o // de'i shar phyogs su rnam par snang
T02D3305:116b-9: mdzad dkar po g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal
T02D3305:116b-11: phyag rnams na 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dkar po
T02D3305:116b-12: dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o
T02D3305:116b-13: // lhor rin chen 'byung ldan ser po rin po
T02D3305:116b-14: che cha dgu pa'i ma ra ka ta dang ral
T02D3305:116b-15: gri dang 'khor lo dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:116b-16: nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dmar po padma dmar
T02D3305:116b-17: po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang 'khor lo
T02D3305:116b-18: 'dzin pa'o // byang du don yod grub pa ljang
T02D3305:116b-19: gu ral gri dang 'khor lo dang nor bu dang
T02D3305:116b-21: g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal ni nag po
T02D3305:116b-22: 'dzin pa'o // padma 'dzin pa'o // dang dkar po'o
T02D3305:116b-23: // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rin po che'i
T02D3305:116b-24: cod pan dang ldan zhing rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
T02D3305:116b-26: mer spyan ma rnam par snang mdzad dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D3305:116b-27: bden bral du m'a ma k'i mi bskyod pa lta
T02D3305:116b-28: bu autpala dmar po dang ral gri dang nor bu
T02D3305:116b-29: dang chu skyes 'dzin pa ste sgrub thabs thams cad
T02D3305:116b-30: las de ltar bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3305:116b-31: rlung du gos dkar mo snang ba mtha' yas dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D3305:116b-32: dbang ldan du sgrol ma rin chen 'byung ldan lta
T02D3305:116b-33: bu autpala ser po dang ral gri dang nor bu
T02D3305:116b-35: de nas dbus kyi rim pa las phyi rol du
T02D3305:116b-36: me'i mtshams su gzugs rdo rje ma rnam par snang
T02D3305:116b-37: mdzad lta bu me long dmar po dang ral gri
T02D3305:116b-38: dang nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:116b-39: bden bral du sgra rdo rje ma mi bskyod pa
T02D3305:116b-40: lta bu pi wang sngon po dang ral gri dang
T02D3305:116b-41: nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:116b-42: rlung du dri rdo rje ma rin chen 'byung ldan
T02D3305:116b-43: lta bu dri'i dud chos ser po dang ral gri
T02D3305:116b-44: dang 'khor lo dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:116b-45: dbang ldan du ro rdo rje ma snang ba mtha'
T02D3305:116b-46: yas lta bu ro'i snod dmar po dang ral gri
T02D3305:116b-47: dang nor bu dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:116b-48: shar sgo'i g-yon logs su reg bya rdo rje ma
T02D3305:116b-49: don yod grub pa lta bu gos sna tshogs pa
T02D3305:117a-1: dang nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:117a-2: shar sgo'i g-yas logs su chos dbyings rdo rje ma
T02D3305:117a-3: rdo rje sems dpa' lta bu chos 'byung dkar po
T02D3305:117a-4: dang ral gri dang nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin
T02D3305:117a-5: pa'o / 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha
T02D3305:117a-6: 'di rnams ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa phyag mtshan
T02D3305:117a-7: dang po gnyis g-yas pa dag gis dang gzhan pa
T02D3305:117a-8: gnyis g-yon pa dag gis 'dzin pa ste thams cad
T02D3305:117a-9: kyi rtsa ba'i zhal ni sku mdog bzhin no //
T02D3305:117a-10: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su gshin rje mthar
T02D3305:117a-11: byed dang shes rab mthar byed dang padma mthar byed
T02D3305:117a-12: dang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rnams so //
T02D3305:117a-13: 'dir 'jam pa'i rdo rje dang rnam par snang mdzad
T02D3305:117a-14: dang lha mo bcu drug po rnams ni zla ba'i
T02D3305:117a-15: dkyil 'khor la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa
T02D3305:117a-16: ste / gzhan rnams ni nyi ma la'o //
T02D3305:117a-17: zla ba dang nyi ma rnams kyi 'og tu sna tshogs 'dam skyes so //
T02D3305:117a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rtsa ba'i phyag dag
T02D3305:117a-19: gis rang 'od kyi shes rab la 'khyud pa ste
T02D3305:117a-20: lha mo rnams kyang rang 'od kyi thabs la'o //
T02D3305:117a-21: dbu la rigs kyi bdag po ste 'jam pa'i rdo
T02D3305:117a-22: rje la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang
T02D3305:117a-23: m'a ma k'i dang sgra rdo rje ma dang srung
T02D3305:117a-24: ba'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'i khro bo brgyad la
T02D3305:117a-25: mi bskyod pa'o // spyan ma dang gzugs rdo rje
T02D3305:117a-26: ma dang gshin rje mthar byed rnams la rnam par
T02D3305:117a-27: mi bskyod pa'o // snang mdzad de / dri rdo rje ma la ni rin rin chen dbang po'o //
T02D3305:117a-28: gos dkar mo dang ro rdo rje ma dang padma
T02D3305:117a-29: mthar byed rnams la 'od dpag med de sgrol ma
T02D3305:117a-30: dang reg bya rdo rje ma la ni don yod
T02D3305:117a-31: grub pa'o // chos dbyings rdo rje ma la rdo
T02D3305:117a-32: rje 'dzin pa ste gzhan rnams la ni mi bskyod
T02D3305:117a-33: grub pa'o // pa'o // 'dir rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D3305:117a-34: ni sku mdog dkar po la cung zad dmar ba'i
T02D3305:117a-35: mdangs dang ldan pa g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi
T02D3305:117a-36: zhal ni sngon po dang dmar po //
T02D3305:117a-37: rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis rang 'od kyi shes rab la 'khyud pa /
T02D3305:117a-38: rdo rje sngon po dang ral gri dang nor bu
T02D3305:117a-39: dang padma 'dzin pa sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i
T02D3305:117a-40: gdan la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa zla
T02D3305:117a-41: ba'i 'od can rin po che'i cod pan dang rin
T02D3305:117a-42: po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa mi bskyod pas rgyas
T02D3305:117a-43: btab pa'o // 'dir 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i thugs kar
T02D3305:117a-44: dam tshig sems dpa' lta bu'i ye shes sems dpa'
T02D3305:117b-0: ste da'i thugs @117b ka'i zla bar ral gri'i yu
T02D3305:117b-1: bar gnas pa'i zla ba la sa bon mam mo
T02D3305:117b-2: btab pa'o // // rtag pa dang rin chen dbang
T02D3305:117b-3: po dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa
T02D3305:117b-4: dang mi bskyod pa rnams kyi thugs kar phyag mtshan
T02D3305:117b-5: la ji ltar rigs par zla bar nyi ma la
T02D3305:117b-6: bh'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um do //
T02D3305:117b-7: spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams la l'am
T02D3305:117b-8: m'am b'am tam dza: h'um bam ho: kham ri mo
T02D3305:117b-9: // khro bo rnams la ni h'um ngo zhes pa
T02D3305:117b-10: sa bon te 'khor lo'i dbang po la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:117b-11: thugs kar sngags rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02D3305:117b-12: aom a'a: mam h'um 'khor lo'i dbang po mi bskyod pa dang lhan cig dbyer med pa'i'o //
T02D3305:117b-13: aom a'a: dz'in dzik h'um rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02D3305:117b-14: aom a'a: ratna bhrik h'um rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02D3305:117b-15: aom a'a: a'a ro li ka h'um 'od dpag med kyi'o //
T02D3305:117b-16: aom a'a: pradzny'a dhrik h'um don yod grub pa'o //
T02D3305:117b-17: aom a'a: mo har ti h'um spyan ma'i'o //
T02D3305:117b-18: aom a'a: dr'e sha ra ti h'um m'a ma k'i'i'o //
T02D3305:117b-19: aom a'a: r'a ga ra ti h'um gos dkar mo'i'o //
T02D3305:117b-20: aom a'a: badzra ra ti h'um sgrol ma'i'o //
T02D3305:117b-21: aom a'a: r'u pa badzri dza: h'um gzugs rdo rje ma'o //
T02D3305:117b-22: aom a'a sha bta badzre h'um h'um sgra rdo rje ma'i'o //
T02D3305:117b-23: aom a'a: ga ndha ba dzre bam h'um dri rdo rje ma'i'o //
T02D3305:117b-24: aom a'a: ra sa badzre ho: h'um ro rdo rje ma'i'o //
T02D3305:117b-25: aom a'a: sparshe badzre kham h'um reg bya rdo rje ma'i'o //
T02D3305:117b-26: aom a'a: dharma dh'a tu badzre ram h'um chos dbyings rdo rje ma'i'o //
T02D3305:117b-27: aom a'a: ya m'anta kri ta h'um gshin rje mthar byed kyi'o //
T02D3305:117b-28: aom a'a: pradzny'anta kri ta h'um shes rab mthar byed kyi'i'o //
T02D3305:117b-29: aom a'a: bi ghn'anta kri ta h'um phat bgegs mthar byed kyi'o //
T02D3305:117b-30: gang gi tshe 'jam pa'i rdo rje dang dbyer med
T02D3305:117b-31: pa'i mi bskyod pa 'khor lo'i dbang por gyur pa
T02D3305:117b-32: de'i tshe aom a'a: badzra dhrik h'um /
T02D3305:117b-34: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor la mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D3305:117b-35: ye shes sems dpa' bzhugs pa la sogs pa ni ma bshad do //
T02D3305:117b-36: de'i rjes la mig gi mngon par shes pa la
T02D3305:117b-37: sogs pa yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med cing
T02D3305:117b-38: bsam gyis mi khyab pas mdzes par byas pa'i yi
T02D3305:117b-39: dam gyi lha'i sku legs par yongs su dag cing
T02D3305:117b-40: rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa la rgyun
T02D3305:117b-41: mi 'chad par yang dang yang du lhag par mos
T02D3305:118a-0: snying po'i sngags la sogs pa bstan pa ni bum pa lhag @118a * //
T02D3305:118a-1: par gnas pa la sogs pa la nye bar sbyar ba'i don du'o //
T02D3305:118a-2: gang gi tshe dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan
T02D3305:118a-3: gtso bor gyur pa de'i che dbus su gnas pa
T02D3305:118a-4: de gzhan de'i gnas su dgod do //
T02D3305:118a-5: 'od dpag tu med pa dkar por yang 'gyur ro //
T02D3305:118a-6: chos rnams dkar po'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02D3305:118a-7: 'dir ni gsung gi dbang phyug dkar //
T02D3305:118a-9: 'di dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams su
T02D3305:118a-10: gang gi dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i gtso bo'i gnas dag
T02D3305:118a-11: gong du bshad pa de'i tshe gtso bo de nyid
T02D3305:118a-12: dkyil 'khor gyi dbang po la mngon par phyogs shing
T02D3305:118a-13: / de dang 'khyud pa ni de la mngon par
T02D3305:118a-14: phyogs pa nyid de gzhan gyi gnas su phyin pa'i
T02D3305:118a-15: / phyir ro // 'dir gzhal yas khang gi yan lag ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D3305:118a-16: rdo rje'i sa gzhi la sogs pas yongs su bskor
T02D3305:118a-17: ba'i rdo rje'i gur dang srung ba'i 'khor lo dang
T02D3305:118a-19: de la rdo rje'i gur ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzhal yas khang thams cad la ste /
T02D3305:118a-20: srung ba'i 'khor lo dang chos kyi 'byung gnas ni 'ga' zhig kho na la 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D3305:118a-21: bri bar bya ba'i gzhal yas khang rnams la ni
T02D3305:118a-22: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo chos 'byung dam chos
T02D3305:118a-23: kyi dbyings kyi khongs su chud pa mtshon pa'i ched
T02D3305:118a-24: du rdo rje'i phreng ba bri bar bshad do //
T02D3305:118a-25: ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang //
T02D3305:118a-26: zhes pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor rtogs par
T02D3305:118a-27: bya ba'i phyir du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor
T02D3305:118a-28: yug mtshon pa'i rdo rje'i phreng ba bri ba ni
T02D3305:118a-29: nges par ro // 'dir srung ba'i 'khor lo ni de lta ma yin pas bri mi dgos te /
T02D3305:118a-30: bgegs zlog pa ni gzhan gyis kyang byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3305:118a-31: gzhan yang stong pa nyid kho na bcom ldan 'das
T02D3305:118a-32: ma ste bgegs kyi tshogs ma lus pa rtsa ba
T02D3305:118a-33: dang bcas pa rlag par byed pa'i nus pa rab
T02D3305:118a-34: tu gyur pas de la lhag par mos pa brtan
T02D3305:118a-35: pa nyid bskyed pa'i ched du bri bar bya ba'i
T02D3305:118a-36: dkyil 'khor la srung ba'i 'khor lo bri bar ma
T02D3305:118a-37: bstan to // bsgom par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D3305:118a-38: yang kha cig tu bsgom par gsungs kyi thams cad
T02D3305:118a-40: bgegs bsal ba'i rjes la stong pa nyid du rab
T02D3305:118a-41: tu zhugs pas bsgom par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D3305:118b-1: de'i phyir mi bri'o zhe na de lta na khor
T02D3305:118b-2: yug mtshon pa'i rdo rje'i rab yang mi bri bar
T02D3305:118b-3: 'gyur ro // yang gzhal yas khang bskyed pa'i dus
T02D3305:118b-4: su de yang bskyed do zhe na ma yin te
T02D3305:118b-5: 'gyur ro // / bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i
T02D3305:118b-6: ra ba lan gnyis bskyed par gang nas kyang ma
T02D3305:118b-7: gsungs pas lan gnyis bskyed pas ci zhig bya //
T02D3305:118b-8: cig car rdzogs pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i sa gzhi
T02D3305:118b-9: dang mtshams bcing ba dang rdo rje'i rab la sogs
T02D3305:118b-10: pa ma lus pa kun brtags pa stong pa nyid
T02D3305:118b-11: kyi rang bzhin sgyur ma'i ngo bor gnas pa nyid
T02D3305:118b-12: kyi phyir ro // de ltar srung ba'i 'khor lo
T02D3305:118b-13: yod kyang dkyil 'khor du mi bri ba nyid kyi
T02D3305:118b-15: kha cig ni srung ba'i 'khor lo bri bar bya'o
T02D3305:118b-16: zhes kyang 'dod do zhes pa 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D3305:118b-17: dkyil 'khor ro // bsdus ba'i rim par gsungs pa'i
T02D3305:118b-18: dkyil 'khor la yang gzhal yas khang gi mthar thug
T02D3305:118b-19: pa ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02D3305:118b-20: khro bo rnams kyi khyad par ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D3305:118b-21: gzhal yas khang gi dbus su mi bskyod pa nag
T02D3305:118b-22: po drag po g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal
T02D3305:118b-23: dkar po dang dmar po phyag g-yas pa rnams kyis
T02D3305:118b-24: khro bo'i rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma rnams
T02D3305:118b-25: dang g-yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang yid bzhin
T02D3305:118b-26: gyi nor bu dang ral gri 'dzin pa dang 'dra
T02D3305:118b-27: ba'i reg bya rdo rje mas 'khyud pa'o //
T02D3305:118b-28: de'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste /
T02D3305:118b-29: me la sogs pa'i mtshams su spyan ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D3305:118b-30: de la rnam par snang mdzad ni dkar po zhi ba /
T02D3305:118b-31: dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po'i zhal can
T02D3305:118b-32: 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang padma dkar po dang
T02D3305:118b-33: dril bu dang nor bu dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o
T02D3305:118b-34: // bshad zin pa dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag
T02D3305:118b-35: mtshan rnams ni rim ba bzhin du phyag g-yas par
T02D3305:118b-36: dang por steng nas 'og tu dang g-yon par 'og
T02D3305:118b-37: nas steng du rig par bya'o //
T02D3305:118b-38: rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i rim pas zhal gyi kha dog gsum yang rig par bya'o //
T02D3305:118b-39: rin chen 'byung ldan ni ser po ste ser po
T02D3305:118b-40: dang nag po dang dmar po'i zhal can nor bu
T02D3305:118b-41: dang rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang dril bu dang
T02D3305:118b-42: padma ser po dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:119a-0: snang ba mtha' yas ni dmar po dang nag po dang dkar ba'i zhal can phyag g-yon @119a * //
T02D3305:119a-1: pas dril bu dang bcas pa'i padma dmar po'i yu
T02D3305:119a-2: ba thugs kar bzung ba phyag g-yas pas kha 'byed
T02D3305:119a-3: pa ste gzhan rnams kyis rdo rje dang 'khor lo
T02D3305:119a-4: dang rin po che dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:119a-5: don yod grub pa ni ljang gu ste ljang gu
T02D3305:119a-6: dang nag po dang dkar po'i zhal can ral gri
T02D3305:119a-7: dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang dril
T02D3305:119a-8: bu dang padma ljang gu dang nor bu 'dzin pa'o
T02D3305:119a-9: // de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po 'di dag dang
T02D3305:119a-10: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i kun du bzang po'i bar ni
T02D3305:119a-11: ral ba'i thor cog dang rin po che'i cod pan
T02D3305:119a-12: can rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan
T02D3305:119a-13: // gyis brgyan pa'o // spyan ma ni rnam par snang mdzad dang mtshungs pa ste /
T02D3305:119a-14: 'on kyang padma dkar po'i gnas su autpala dkar po'o //
T02D3305:119a-15: m'a ma k'i ni mi bskyod pa dang mtshungs pa
T02D3305:119a-16: ste 'on kyang padma'i gnas su autpala sngo dmar ro
T02D3305:119a-17: // gos dkar mo ni snang ba mtha' yas dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D3305:119a-18: sgrol ma ni don yod grub pa dang mtshungs pa ste /
T02D3305:119a-19: sna tshogs rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang autpala sngo
T02D3305:119a-20: ser dang dril bu dang rin po che dang ral
T02D3305:119a-21: gri 'dzin pa'o // rim pa gnyis pa la me'i
T02D3305:119a-22: mtshams su gzugs rdo rje ma spyan ma lta bu
T02D3305:119a-23: ste 'on kyang phyag dang po dag gis me long
T02D3305:119a-25: bden bral du sgra rdo rje ma ser mo ser
T02D3305:119a-26: po dang nag po dang dkar po'i zhal can rtsa
T02D3305:119a-27: ba'i phyag gnyis kyis pi wang sngon po bsgreng ba
T02D3305:119a-28: ste phyag lhag ma rnams kyis rdo rje dang autpala
T02D3305:119a-29: sngon po dang rin po che dang ral gri 'dzin
T02D3305:119a-30: pa'o // rlung du dri rdo rje ma gos dkar
T02D3305:119a-31: mo lta bu rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis dri'i dung
T02D3305:119a-32: pa'o // chos ser po'o // dbang ldan du ro
T02D3305:119a-33: rdo rje ma ljang gu ldan gu dang nag po
T02D3305:119a-34: dang dkar ba'i zhal can phyag dang po dag gis
T02D3305:119a-35: ro'i snod dmar po 'dzin pa ste lhag ma rnams
T02D3305:119a-36: kyis rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rin po che
T02D3305:119a-38: rim pa gsum pa'i shar gyi snam bu la byams pa dang sa'i snying po'o //
T02D3305:119a-39: lhor phyag na rdo rje dang nam mkha'i snying bo'o //
T02D3305:119a-40: nub tu 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs so //
T02D3305:119a-41: byang du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang kun du bzang po'o //
T02D3305:119a-42: brgyad po 'di rnams ni rtsa ba'i rigs kyi bdag
T02D3305:119a-43: po dang mtshungs pa ste 'on kyang byams pa ni
T02D3305:119a-44: rtsa ba'i phyag gis yal ga dang bcas pa'i klu
