T02D3305:128a-25: dang gshin rje dang nor sbyin rnams 'dzin pa /
T02D3305:128a-26: 'khor lo dang rna cha dang mgul rgyan dang lag
T02D3305:128a-27: gdub dang ska rags dang thal chen rnams dang mi
T02D3305:128a-28: mgo rlon ba khrag 'dzag pa lnga bcu'i do shal
T02D3305:128a-29: can dpung rgyan dang rkang gdub rnams kyis brgyan pa'o
T02D3305:128a-30: // 'di'i yum ni bdag med ma nag mo gcer
T02D3305:128a-31: bu gri gug dang thod par ldan pa'i phyag g-yas
T02D3305:128a-32: pa dang g-yon pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
T02D3305:128a-34: g-yas bskum zhing g-yon brkyang ba'i gar stabs can phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:128a-35: zhal gcig ma mche ba gtsigs ma dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:128a-36: dbu skra dmar ser 'bar zhing gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D3305:128a-37: dpral ba'i mtshams su thod pa ldas brgyan pa /
T02D3305:128a-38: mgrin par mi mgo skam po'i phreng ba 'phreng ba rkang gdub la sogs pas brgyan pa'o //
T02D3305:128a-39: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab mar gnas pa'i
T02D3305:128a-40: tshangs ba dang dbang po dang nye dbang dang drag
T02D3305:128a-41: bo rnams kyi snying ga'i steng du zla ba la
T02D3305:128b-0: goo r'i la sogs pa ste dbang ldan la @128b
T02D3305:128b-1: sogs pa'i 'dab mar gnas pa'i gshin rje dang lus
T02D3305:128b-2: ngan dang srin po dang thags bzangs ris rnams kyi
T02D3305:128b-3: snying ga'i steng du zla ba la pukka s'i la
T02D3305:128b-4: sogs pa'o // de la goo r'i nag mo g-yas
T02D3305:128b-5: pa na gri gug dang g-yon pa na nya ro
T02D3305:128b-7: chom rkun ma dmar mo phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon
T02D3305:128b-8: pa dag gis ta ma ru dang phag pa 'dzin
T02D3305:128b-9: pa'o // ro langs ma gser gyi mdog can phyag
T02D3305:128b-10: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis rus sbal dang
T02D3305:128b-12: ghasma r'i ljang gu phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon pa
T02D3305:128b-13: dag gis sprul dang rnal 'byor gyi snod 'dzin pa'o
T02D3305:128b-14: // pukka s'i sngon mo phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon bdag gis seng ge dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:128b-15: ri khrod ma dkar mo phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon
T02D3305:128b-16: pa dag gis dge slong dang gsil byed 'dzin pa'o
T02D3305:128b-17: // gtum mo nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs phyag g-yas
T02D3305:128b-18: pa dang g-yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang thong
T02D3305:128b-19: // gshol 'dzin pa'o // g-yung mo sna tshogs pa'i
T02D3305:128b-20: mdog can phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dang gis
T02D3305:128b-21: rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:128b-22: brgyad po 'di rnams ni skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs pa ste /
T02D3305:128b-23: khyad par gzhan rnams ni sngar brjod pa'i bdag med ma bzhin no //
T02D3305:128b-24: rigs kyi bdag po ni he ru ka dang bdag med ma dag gi mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D3305:128b-25: goo r'i la sogs pa rnams kyi mi bskyod pa
T02D3305:128b-26: dang rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan
T02D3305:128b-27: dang snang ba mtha' yas te pukka s'i la sogs
T02D3305:128b-29: yang phyag gnyis pa dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gyur
T02D3305:128b-30: pa na g-yas pas rdo rje gyen du 'phyar zhing
T02D3305:128b-31: g-yon pas rdo rje thod pa 'dzin pas bdag med
T02D3305:128b-33: kha tv'am ga yang dpung pa g-yon pa la brten pa'o //
T02D3305:128b-34: yang phyag bzhi pa 'khor lo'i dbang phyug tu gyur pa na /
T02D3305:128b-35: phyag g-yas pas rdo rje sngon po dang g-yon pas khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02D3305:128b-36: phyag lhag ma dag gis rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D3305:128b-37: yang phyag drug pa 'khor lo'i dbang por gyur pa
T02D3305:128b-38: na rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal
T02D3305:128b-39: gsum sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po phyag
T02D3305:128b-40: g-yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang gri gug dang
T02D3305:128b-41: g-yon pa dag gis rtse gsum dang dril bu 'dzin
T02D3305:129a-0: pa / lhag ma dag gis rdo rje @129a * //
T02D3305:129a-1: lu gu rgyud ma la 'khyud pa ste /
T02D3305:129a-2: rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma ni sku mdog dang
T02D3305:129a-3: zhal dang phyag la sogs pa bdag med ma dang
T02D3305:129a-4: mtshungs par yan lag med pa'i rdo rje'i zhabs kyis
T02D3305:129a-5: gsungs pa'o // phyag gnyis pa la sogs pa 'di
T02D3305:129a-6: rnams sna tshogs chu skyes kyi ze'u 'bru la ro'i
T02D3305:129a-7: snying gar nyi ma la skyil krung phyed pa'i gar
T02D3305:129a-8: gsungs pa'o // stabs mdzad pa / mi bskyod pas
T02D3305:129a-9: rgyas btab pa sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbu
T02D3305:129a-10: skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D3305:129a-12: smin ma 'khyog pa dang bcas pa'i khro gnyer can /
T02D3305:129a-14: phyag bcu drug pa rim pa bzhin du 'khor lo la sogs pas brgyan pa'o //
T02D3305:129a-15: goo r'i la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D3305:129a-16: lha mo thams cad ni thabs dang bral ba ste
T02D3305:129a-17: rdo rje phag mo dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud
T02D3305:129a-18: la ni mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D3305:129a-19: kye'i rdo rje rnam pa bzhi'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni h'um ngo //
T02D3305:129a-20: aom de ba pi tsu badzra h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:129a-21: zhes pa ni phyag bcu drug pa'i snying po'o //
T02D3305:129a-22: aom tree lokya a'akshe pa h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:129a-23: zhes pa ni phyag gnyis pa'o //
T02D3305:129a-24: aom dzva la dzva la bhyo h'um h'um h'um phat ces pa phyag bzhi pa'i'o //
T02D3305:129a-25: aom ki ti ki ti badzra h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:129a-27: aom a'a: badzra ghasma r'i aom h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:129a-28: zhes pa ni ghasma r'i'i ste las thams cad pa'o //
T02D3305:129a-29: sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur
T02D3305:129a-30: gyi nang du gnas pa ni chos 'byung gi dbus
T02D3305:129a-32: kha cig ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung med par gzhal yas khang ngo zhes so //
T02D3305:129a-33: gzhal yas khang gi dbus su padma dmar po 'dab
T02D3305:129a-34: ma brgyad pa'i lte bar nyi ma la sgyu ma
T02D3305:129a-35: chen po las byung ba'i he ru ka nag po
T02D3305:129a-36: nyi ma'i 'od zer can 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs
T02D3305:129a-37: pa 'gying ba'i khro bo dbu skra dmar ser 'bar
T02D3305:129a-39: thod pa'i cod pan can rtsa ba dang g-yas pa
T02D3305:129a-40: dang rgyab dang g-yon pa'i zhal bzhi sngon po dang
T02D3305:129a-41: ser po dang dkar po dang ljang gu zhal re
T02D3305:129a-42: re la dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum gsum pa
T02D3305:129a-43: phyag bzhi pa g-yas pa dag gis thod pa dang
T02D3305:129a-44: mda'/ g-yon pa dag gis kha tv'am ga dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02D3305:129a-46: mi'i pags pa'i na bza' 'dzin pa /
T02D3305:129b-0: skyil krung phyed pa'i @129b gar gyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3305:129b-1: dpal ldan sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma ni sku mdog
T02D3305:129b-2: dmar mo dmar po dang ser po dang dkar po
T02D3305:129b-3: dang ljang gu'i zhal can gtso bo lta bu'i mtshon
T02D3305:129b-4: cha 'dzin pa / phyag gnyis kyis de'i mgul nas 'khyud pa'o //
T02D3305:129b-5: 'dab ma rnams la shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro
T02D3305:129b-6: ma sngon mo sngon po dang ser po dang dkar
T02D3305:129b-7: po dang ljang gu'i zhal can rdo rje dang thod
T02D3305:129b-8: pa dang dril bu dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o
T02D3305:129b-9: // lhor rin chen mkha' 'gro ma ser mo ser
T02D3305:129b-10: po dang sngon po dang dkar po dang ljang gu'i
T02D3305:129b-11: // zhal can / rin po che'i pa tra dang
T02D3305:129b-12: rtse gsum dang mgrin pa btsir ba'i ce spyang dang
T02D3305:129b-14: nub tu padma mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo dkar po
T02D3305:129b-15: dang ser po dang sngon po dang ljang gu'i zhal
T02D3305:129b-16: can sna tshogs padma dang mda' dang thod pa dang
T02D3305:129b-17: gzhu 'dzin pa'o // byang du sna tshogs mkha' 'gro
T02D3305:129b-18: ma ljang gu ljang gu dang ser po dang dkar
T02D3305:129b-19: po dang sngon po'i zhal can ral gri dang ta
T02D3305:129b-20: ma ru dang zhags pa dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o
T02D3305:129b-21: gzhu 'dzin pa'o // // thams cad phyag rgya lnga
T02D3305:129b-22: dang ldan pa zla ba'i gdan dang 'od can te
T02D3305:129b-23: gzhu 'dzin pa'o // // / 'di rnams kyi khyad par rnams ni gtso mo lta bu'o //
T02D3305:129b-24: rigs kyi bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mi bskyod pa ste /
T02D3305:129b-25: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyi
T02D3305:129b-26: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtag pa dang
T02D3305:129b-27: mi bskyod pa dang rin chen dbang po dang gsung
T02D3305:129b-28: gi dbang phyug dang don yod grub pa rnams so
T02D3305:129b-29: // bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni h'um ngo //
T02D3305:129b-31: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yang aom aom h'um /
T02D3305:129b-34: aom a'a: h'um aom h'a h'um zhes pa ste sna
T02D3305:129b-35: tshogs mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags ni las thams cad pa'i'o
T02D3305:129b-36: // bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thod pa'i lha dgu'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ni /
T02D3305:129b-37: rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung la gnas
T02D3305:129b-38: pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs chu
T02D3305:129b-39: skyes kyi lte ba la la ngo'i snying gar nyi
T02D3305:129b-40: ma la shes rab ma dang bral ba'i bcom ldan
T02D3305:129b-41: 'das te sku mdog la sogs pa ni 'chad par
T02D3305:129b-42: 'gyur ba'i 'khor lo gsum la gnas pa'i dpal sangs
T02D3305:129b-44: shar dang byang dang nub dang lho'i 'dab ma rnams
T02D3305:129b-45: la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sna tshogs
T02D3305:129b-46: sde ma dang 'dod ma dang sa 'og na gnas
T02D3305:130a-0: pa ma dang legs bzangs ma @130a * //
T02D3305:130a-1: rnams ni sku mdog sngon mo g-yas bskum zhing g-yon brkyang ba /
T02D3305:130a-2: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02D3305:130a-3: phyag g-yas pa dag gis gri gug dang thod pa /
T02D3305:130a-4: g-yon pa dag gis kha tv'am ga dang ta ma ru 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:130a-5: dbang ldan dang me lha dang bden bral dang rlung
T02D3305:130a-6: gi 'dab ma rnams la chad 'tshong ma dang 'byung
T02D3305:130a-7: mo dang phyag bzhi ma dang nam mkha' la gnas
T02D3305:130a-8: ma rnams ni ser mo na bza' ser po gyon
T02D3305:130a-10: zhabs gnyis g-yas brkyang zhing g-yon bskum pa klu brgyad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3305:130a-11: phyag g-yas pa dag gis gri gug dang ta ma ru /
T02D3305:130a-12: g-yon pa dag gis kha tv'am ga dang padma'i snod 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:130a-13: brgyad po 'di rnams kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gar gyi tshul gyis gnas pa /
T02D3305:130a-14: dbu skra dmar ser 'bar zhing gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D3305:130a-15: dbu la thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:130a-16: phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan pa /
T02D3305:130a-17: mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu mgul du 'chang ba /
T02D3305:130a-18: mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi ba'o //
T02D3305:130a-19: bcom ldan 'das la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas lngas rgyas btab pa ste /
T02D3305:130a-20: sna tshogs sde ma la sogs pa rnams la mi
T02D3305:130a-21: bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen
T02D3305:130a-22: 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas rnams kyis so
T02D3305:130a-23: // chang 'tshong ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yang de rnams nyid do //
T02D3305:130a-24: yang na bcom ldan 'das 'di dang phyogs kyi lha
T02D3305:130a-25: mo rnams kyang dkar po ste mtshams kyi lha mo
T02D3305:130a-26: rnams dmar mo'o // 'di ni yum dang bral ba 'am yum dang bcas pa'o //
T02D3305:130a-27: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje
T02D3305:130a-28: gur gyi nang du chos 'byung la gzhal yas khang
T02D3305:130a-29: gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma'i
T02D3305:130a-30: steng du g-yon bskum zhing g-yas brkyang ba'i zhabs dag
T02D3305:130a-31: gis 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan mnan pa'i bcom ldan
T02D3305:130a-32: 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba khro
T02D3305:130a-33: bo bsal ba'i dus kyi me ltar 'od zer 'bar
T02D3305:130a-34: zhing 'gro ba ma lus pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs thams
T02D3305:130a-35: cad rab tu gsol bar mdzad pa /
T02D3305:130a-36: sku mdog sngon po rnam par 'gyur zhing gdangs pa'i zhal gsum pa /
T02D3305:130a-37: rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal rnams
T02D3305:130a-38: sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu mche ba
T02D3305:130a-39: gtsigs shing rab tu gtum pa /
T02D3305:130b-0: ljags 'dril @130b zhing shin tu 'jigs su rung ba
T02D3305:130b-1: zhal re re zhing dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum
T02D3305:130b-2: gsum pa smin ma g-yo ba dang bcas pa'i khro
T02D3305:130b-3: gnyer can dpral ba'i steng na thod pa lnga'i phreng
T02D3305:130b-5: khrag 'dzag pa'i mi mgo lnga bcu'i phreng ba mgul bar 'phyang ba /
T02D3305:130b-6: phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:130b-7: klu mtha' yas sngon pos dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba bcings pa /
T02D3305:130b-8: 'jog po dmar pos rna rgyan byas pa /
T02D3305:130b-9: padma chen po padma'i rtsa ba lta bu dkar pos mgul rgyan byas pa /
T02D3305:130b-10: stobs kyi rgyu d'ur ba lta bu ljang gus mchod phyir thogs byas pa /
T02D3305:130b-11: nor rgyas dkar pos ska rags byas pa /
T02D3305:130b-12: padma dkar po kunda'i me tog ltar mdzes pas rkang gdub byas pa /
T02D3305:130b-13: dung skyong ser pos lag gdub byas pa /
T02D3305:130b-14: rigs ldan du ba lta bu khra bos dpung rgyan byas pa /
T02D3305:130b-15: rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pa /
T02D3305:130b-16: rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag dang gis
T02D3305:130b-17: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya
T02D3305:130b-18: mdzad pas rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la
T02D3305:130b-20: phyag g-yas pa dag gis lcags kyu dang zhags pa /
T02D3305:130b-21: g-yon pa dag gis thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:130b-22: 'di'i shar phyogs su rdo rje dbyug pa sngon po
T02D3305:130b-23: rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal rnams
T02D3305:130b-24: sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu /
T02D3305:130b-25: phyag g-yas pa dag gi rdo rje tho ba dang
T02D3305:130b-26: sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gyen du 'phyar
T02D3305:130b-27: ba / g-yon pa dag gis thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:130b-28: byang du rdo rje nyi ma ser po dang sngon po dang ljang gu'i zhal can /
T02D3305:130b-29: phyag dang pos rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:130b-30: rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan rnams ni rdo
T02D3305:130b-31: rje dbyug pa'i lta bu ste 'chad par 'gyur ba
T02D3305:130b-33: nub tu rdo rje gtsug tor dmar po dmar po
T02D3305:130b-34: dang dkar po dang ljang gu'i zhal can phyag na
T02D3305:130b-35: padma dmar po'o // lhor rdo rje 'khyil pa ljang
T02D3305:130b-36: gu ljang gu dang dkar po dang ser po'i zhal
T02D3305:130b-37: can phyag na sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan ba'o //
T02D3305:130b-38: mer rdo rje gnod sbyin du ba'i mdog can du
T02D3305:130b-39: pa'i mdog dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal can
T02D3305:130b-41: bden bral du rdo rje dus dmar po dmar po
T02D3305:130b-42: dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal can phyag na
T02D3305:130b-43: dgra sta'o // rlung du nag po chen po sngon
T02D3305:130b-44: po sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal
T02D3305:131a-2: dbang ldan du rdo rje 'jigs rung nag po mig
T02D3305:131a-3: yon nag po dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal
T02D3305:131a-5: rdo rje dbyug pa la sogs pa brgyad po 'di
T02D3305:131a-6: rnams ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin gshin rje
T02D3305:131a-7: mthar byed dang shes rab mthar byed dang padma mthar
T02D3305:131a-8: byed dang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang 'dod pa'i rgyal
T02D3305:131a-9: po dang dbyug sngon can dang stobs po che dang
T02D3305:131a-10: mi g-yo ba rnams kyi ming gzhan no //
T02D3305:131a-11: steng du gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dkar po
T02D3305:131a-12: dkar po dang sngon po dang ljang gu'i zhal can
T02D3305:131a-14: 'og tu rdo rje sa 'og ma gnod mdzes kyi
T02D3305:131a-15: ming gi rnam grangs can sngon po sngon po dang
T02D3305:131a-16: ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal can phyag na rol
T02D3305:131a-17: pa dang bcas pa'i rdo rje'i gtun shing ste /
T02D3305:131a-18: 'di'i phyag g-yon pa na klu'i zhags pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa dang kha tv'am ga'o //
T02D3305:131a-19: rdo rje dbyug pa la sogs pa'i khro bo 'di
T02D3305:131a-20: rnams phyag mtshan gyi gtso bo dang thod pas mtshan
T02D3305:131a-21: pa'i phyag dag gis rang 'od kyi shes rab ma
T02D3305:131a-22: la 'khyud pa / dbu skra dmar ser 'bar zhing
T02D3305:131a-23: gyen du 'khyil pa rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag
T02D3305:131a-24: po'i cod pan mdzes par brgyan pa /
T02D3305:131a-25: smin ma g-yo ba dang bcas pa'i khro gnyer can /
T02D3305:131a-27: zhal re re la dmar zhing zlum pa'i spyan gsum pa /
T02D3305:131a-28: mi mgo'i phreng ba dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa dang klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3305:131a-29: sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma rnams la gnas pa'i phyogs skyod brgyad dang /
T02D3305:131a-30: steng du tshangs pa dang 'og tu thags bzangs ris
T02D3305:131a-31: rnams mnan pa'i g-yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa rang gi
T02D3305:131a-32: rigs kyi bdag pos rgyas btab pa ste /
T02D3305:131a-33: 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsibs bcu pa'i 'khor lo ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02D3305:131a-34: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni h'um ngo //
T02D3305:131a-35: aom kha badzra dhri ka badzra h'um phat ces pa ni snying po'o //
T02D3305:131a-36: aom badzra kunda li badzra h'um phat ces pa ni
T02D3305:131a-37: rdo rje 'khyil pa'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o
T02D3305:131a-38: // yang na shar la sogs pa'i phyogs dang mtshams
T02D3305:131a-39: dang steng dang 'og tu sna tshogs padma dang nyi
T02D3305:131a-40: ma rnams la g-yas skor gyis gshin rje mthar byed
T02D3305:131a-41: la sogs pa'i khro bo bcu ste 'di dag thams
T02D3305:131a-42: cad kyi gnas dang sku mdog la sogs pa ni
T02D3305:131a-43: bsdus pa'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa ji
T02D3305:131b-0: yang na @131b 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D3305:131b-1: rtsibs bcu pa'i 'khor lo ji lta ba bzhin no
T02D3305:131b-2: // yang na dpal kun du kha sbyor gyi rdo
T02D3305:131b-3: rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin no
T02D3305:131b-4: // // phyogs 'di gsum ka la yang aom a'a: bighn'anta krita h'um phat /
T02D3305:131b-5: ces pa ni bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags te las thams cad pa'o //
T02D3305:131b-7: / bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi
T02D3305:131b-8: nang ri rab kyi steng du sna tshogs chu skyes
T02D3305:131b-9: kyi ze'u 'bru la sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte bar
T02D3305:131b-10: gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su bcom ldan
T02D3305:131b-11: 'das te g-yas brkyang gi zhabs dag gis sna tshogs
T02D3305:131b-12: padma'i lte ba'i steng du nyi ma la gnas pa'i
T02D3305:131b-13: 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan mnan pa /
T02D3305:131b-14: sku mdog nag po shar dang byang la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:131b-15: zhal ni nag po dang ljang gu dang dmar po
T02D3305:131b-16: dang ser po'o // zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum pa /
T02D3305:131b-17: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can phyag bcu gnyis
T02D3305:131b-18: pa rdo rje dang dril bur bcas pa'i phyag gis
T02D3305:131b-19: rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa /
T02D3305:131b-20: phyag gnyis kyis rgyab tu glang po che dkar po'i
T02D3305:131b-21: pags pa khrag dang bcas pa brgyangs nas 'dzin pa
T02D3305:131b-22: / de dag las gzhan pa'i phyag g-yas pa rnams
T02D3305:131b-23: kyis da ma ru dang dgra sta dang gri gug
T02D3305:131b-25: g-yon pa rnams kyis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha tv'am
T02D3305:131b-26: ga dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang rdo
T02D3305:131b-27: rje zhags pa dang tshangs pa'i mgo bo 'dzin pa
T02D3305:131b-28: / 'dzag pa'i mi mgo lnga bcu'i phreng ba mgul du 'phyang pa /
T02D3305:131b-29: phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa mi'i rgyus pas mchod
T02D3305:131b-30: phyir thogs byas pa dpral ba'i steng du thod pa
T02D3305:131b-32: nor bu dang g-yon ngos su gnas pa'i zla ba
T02D3305:131b-33: phyed pa dang sna tshogs rdo rje rnams kyis mnan
T02D3305:131b-34: pa'i ral pa'i thor cog nag po can /
T02D3305:131b-35: rnam par 'gyur zhing gdangs pa'i zhal mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D3305:131b-36: gar gyi nyams dgu'i tshogs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3305:131b-37: rdo rje phag mo ni dmar mo zhal gcig ma
T02D3305:131b-38: spyan gsum pa skra'i tshogs grol pa gcer bu thod
T02D3305:131b-39: pa'i dum bus rked pa'i rgyan byas pa /
T02D3305:131b-40: 'khyud pa'i phyag gis gzung ba'i thod pa khrag gis
T02D3305:131b-41: gang ba 'dzag pa'i rgyun gtso bo'i zhal du stobs
T02D3305:131b-42: pa / sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i rdo rje steng du 'phyar bas gdug pa can rnams bsdigs pa /
T02D3305:131b-43: khrag dang bral ba'i mi mgo skam po'i phreng ba can /
T02D3305:132a-1: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:132a-2: cung zad bzhad pa zla mtshan 'bab pa dang bcas shing ba spu gyen du langs pa'o //
T02D3305:132a-3: de nas shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams la g-yon skor gyis dang /
T02D3305:132a-4: me la sogs ba'i mtshams rnams la g-yas skor gyis dgod par bya'o//
T02D3305:132a-5: de la phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams su mkha' 'gro
T02D3305:132a-6: ma dang l'a ma dang dum skyes ma dang gzugs
T02D3305:132a-7: can ma rnams ni nag mo dang ljang gu dang
T02D3305:132a-8: dmar mo dang ser mo'i mdog can zhal gcig ma
T02D3305:132a-9: spyan gsum ma skra grol ba /
T02D3305:132a-10: phyag bzhi ma g-yon bdag gis kha tv'am ga dang thod pa dang /
T02D3305:132a-11: g-yas pa dag gis da ma ru dang gri gug 'dzin pa g-yas brkyang gis gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:132a-12: mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la byang chub kyi sems
T02D3305:132a-13: dang khrag dang bdud rtsi dang sgron ma lnga rnams
T02D3305:132a-14: grub pa'i dngul chu lta bu'i bdud rtsir gyur pas
T02D3305:132a-15: gang ba'i padma'i snod rnams te /
T02D3305:132a-16: yang na bzhi char yang bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'o //
T02D3305:132a-17: de nas thugs kyi 'khor lo la rtsibs rnams su
T02D3305:132a-18: shar du thod ba'i dum pu dang rab tu gtu
T02D3305:132a-19: ma mo / byang du keng rus chen po dang gtum pa'i mig can ma /
T02D3305:132a-20: nub tu keng rus dang 'od ldan ma /
T02D3305:132a-21: lhor mche ba rnam par gtsigs ma dang sna chen mo /
T02D3305:132a-22: mer chang dgra dang brtan pa'i blo can ma /
T02D3305:132a-23: bden bral du 'od dpag med dang mi'u thung ma /
T02D3305:132a-24: rlung du rdo rje'i 'od dang langka'i dbang phyug ma /
T02D3305:132a-25: dbang ldan du rdo rje'i sku dang shing grib ma'o //
T02D3305:132a-26: rim pa de bzhin du gsung gi 'khor lo la myu gu can dang sa srung ma dang /
T02D3305:132a-27: rdo rje ral pa can dang 'jigs byed chen mo
T02D3305:132a-28: dang dpa' bo chen mo dang rlung gi shugs can
T02D3305:132a-29: ma dang rdo rje h'um mdzad dang chad 'thung ma
T02D3305:132a-30: dang shin tu bzang mo dang sngo bsangs lha mo
T02D3305:132a-31: dang rdo rje bzang po dang shin tu bzang mo
T02D3305:132a-32: dang 'jigs byed chen po dang rta rna ma dang
T02D3305:132a-33: mig mi bzang dang bya gdong ma'o //
T02D3305:132a-34: de bzhin du sku'i dkyil 'khor la stobs po che
T02D3305:132a-35: dang 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dang rin chen rdo
T02D3305:132a-36: rje dang dum skyes ma dang rta mgrin dang chang
T02D3305:132a-37: 'tshong ma dang nam mkha'i snying po dang 'khor lo'i
T02D3305:132a-38: go cha ma dang dpal he ru ka dang shin
T02D3305:132a-39: tu dpa' mo dang padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang
T02D3305:132a-40: stobs chen ma dang rnam par snang mdzad dang 'khor
T02D3305:132a-41: los sgyur ma dang rdo rje sems dpa' dang brtson
T02D3305:132b-1: de la thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i dpa'
T02D3305:132b-2: bo rnams ni zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa ral
T02D3305:132b-3: pa'i thor gtsugs [*gtsug] can dpral bar gnas shing /
T02D3305:132b-4: rdo rje mtshan pa'i dpa' bo'i dar dpyad dang ldan
T02D3305:132b-5: pa phyag bzhis 'khyud pa'i phyag gnyis rdo rje dang
T02D3305:132b-7: g-yon pas kha tv'am ga dang g-yas pas da ma ru 'dzin pa /
T02D3305:132b-8: tshangs pa'i skud pa can dpung rgyan dang ldan pa
T02D3305:132b-9: mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal can phyag rgya lnga dang
T02D3305:132b-10: ldan pa g-yas brkyang gis gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:132b-11: rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams
T02D3305:132b-12: ni zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa drag po'i gzugs
T02D3305:132b-13: can ma / skra grol ba gcer bu phyag gnyis
T02D3305:132b-14: ma 'khyud pa'i phyag gis thod pa dang g-yas pas
T02D3305:132b-15: gdug pa can bsdigs par byed pa'i gri gug 'dzin
T02D3305:132b-16: can ma / pa'o // sgo rnams la khva gdong
T02D3305:132b-17: ma dang 'ug gdong ma dang khyi gdong ma dang
T02D3305:132b-18: phag gdong ma la sogs pa rnams ni mkha' 'gro
T02D3305:132b-19: ma la sogs pa bzhin te 'di rnams kyi zhal
T02D3305:132b-20: ni ming dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
T02D3305:132b-21: mtshams rnams su gshin rje brtan ma dang gshin rje
T02D3305:132b-22: pho nya mo dang gshin rje mche ba mo dang
T02D3305:132b-23: gshin rje 'joms ma rnams ni mi'i zhal can te
T02D3305:132b-24: / g-yas dang g-yon gyi sku phyed de g-yas dang
T02D3305:132b-25: g-yon gyi lha mo rnams kyi sku dang 'dra ba'o
T02D3305:132b-26: / // brgyad po 'di rnams ni ro'i gdan can nyid do //
T02D3305:132b-27: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i lha mo thams cad
T02D3305:132b-28: kyang 'dzag pa'i mi mgo'i phreng ba mgul du 'chang
T02D3305:132b-29: ba / rdo rje'i phreng bas dpral ba mtshan pa /
T02D3305:132b-30: phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa ska rags la sgra
T02D3305:132b-31: dang bcas pa'i g-yer kha la sogs pas brgyan pa'o
T02D3305:132b-32: // rigs kyi bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D3305:132b-33: mi bskyod pa ste rdo rje phag mo'i rnam par
T02D3305:132b-34: snang mdzad dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i rin
T02D3305:132b-36: thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo rnams kyi mi
T02D3305:132b-37: bskyod pa dang snang ba mtha' yas dang rtag pa
T02D3305:132b-38: rnams te dam tshig gi 'khor lo la gnas pa
T02D3305:132b-39: rnams kyi ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02D3305:132b-40: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni h'um ngo //
T02D3305:132b-41: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um
T02D3305:132b-42: phat d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ram sv'a h'a
T02D3305:132b-44: aom khanda ro he h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:132b-45: zhes pa ni dum skyes ma'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o //
T02D3305:133a-1: lo'i dbang phyug la sogs pa nas gshin rje 'joms
T02D3305:133a-2: ma'i mthar thug pa thams cad zhal gcig pa phyag
T02D3305:133a-3: gnyis pa'o // de la dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa
T02D3305:133a-4: lnga thams cad ni 'khyud pa'i g-yas dang g-yon gyi
T02D3305:133a-5: phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa'o
T02D3305:133a-6: gnyis pa'o // // mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa
T02D3305:133a-7: bzhi dang khva gdong ma la sogs pa rnams ni
T02D3305:133a-8: g-yon pas thod pa dang dpung pa la brten pa'i
T02D3305:133a-10: g-yas pas da ma ru 'dzin pa ste gzhan thams cad ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D3305:133a-11: yang na 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la sogs pa phyag
T02D3305:133a-12: gnyis pa nyid kyi phyogs la ni dpal bde mchog
T02D3305:133a-13: dang rdo rje phag mo gser gyi mdog can nam
T02D3305:133a-15: bcom ldan 'das ni phyag g-yas pas rdo rje gsor ba mchog tu brtson pa /
T02D3305:133a-16: g-yon pas thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'am
T02D3305:133a-17: yang na rdo rje dang dril bu'i phyag gnyis kyis
T02D3305:133a-19: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhin ni ser mo g-yas bas da ma ru 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:133a-20: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams ni nag po rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa ste /
T02D3305:133a-21: dpa' mo rnams ni dkar mo phyag g-yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub can no //
T02D3305:133a-22: gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams ni dmar po
T02D3305:133a-23: padma dang padma'i dril bu 'dzin ba ste mkha' 'gro
T02D3305:133a-24: ma rnams ni nag mo g-yas pa padma dang bcas
T02D3305:133a-26: sku'i 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams ni dkar po 'khor
T02D3305:133a-27: lo dang 'khor lo'i dril bu 'dzin pa ste lha
T02D3305:133a-28: mo rnams ni dmar mo g-yas pa sdigs mdzub dang
T02D3305:133a-30: dpa' bo thams cad yum la 'khyud par brtson zhing
T02D3305:133a-31: g-yas brkyang zhing bzhugs pa ste dpa' mo rnams ni
T02D3305:133a-32: de'i brla gnyis la 'khril ba'i tshul lo //
T02D3305:133a-33: khra gdong ma la sogs pa ni g-yas pa sdigs
T02D3305:133a-34: mdzub dang bcas pa'i gri gug 'dzin pa ste lha
T02D3305:133a-35: mo thams cad phyag g-yon pas thod pa 'dzin pa'o
T02D3305:133a-36: // gshin rje brtan ma la sogs pa ni g-yas pas da ma ru dang /
T02D3305:133a-37: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pas mi mgo 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:133a-38: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams dang khva gdod
T02D3305:133a-39: ma la sogs pa rnams kyi g-yon pa na kha
T02D3305:133a-40: tv'am ga'o // bcu gnyis po 'di rnams ni skyil
T02D3305:133a-41: krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas pa ste gzhan rnams
T02D3305:133b-0: ni @133b snga ma bzhin no zhes pa bde mchog
T02D3305:133b-1: gi dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum mo //
T02D3305:133b-2: gang gi tshe 'di rnams la dpa' bo nyi shu
T02D3305:133b-3: rtsa lnga mi bsgom par rdo rje phag mo dkyil
T02D3305:133b-4: 'khor gyi gtso mor gyur pa de'i tshe rdo rje
T02D3305:133b-6: rdo rje phag mo'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni bam mo //
T02D3305:133b-7: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um h'um phat ces pa ni snying po'o //
T02D3305:133b-8: bde mchog phyag gnyis pa la sogs pa'i lha 'di
T02D3305:133b-9: rnams kyi phyag g-yas su gnas pa'i phyag mtshan ni
T02D3305:133b-10: bri bya'i dkyil 'khor la yang bri bar bya'o //
T02D3305:133b-11: bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thod pa lha nyi shu
T02D3305:133b-12: rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo
T02D3305:133b-13: rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi snying por
T02D3305:133b-14: gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su 'khor lo
T02D3305:133b-15: rtsibs brgyad pa la gnas pa'i sna tshogs chu skyes
T02D3305:133b-16: kyi lte bar ro gan rkyal gyi snying gar nyi
T02D3305:133b-17: ma'i dkyil 'khor la bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru
T02D3305:133b-18: ka sku mdog nag po skyil krung phyed pa can
T02D3305:133b-19: gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pas gar mdzad pa
T02D3305:133b-20: zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa dmar la zlum pa
T02D3305:133b-21: phyag bzhi pa g-yas pa dag gis da ma ru
T02D3305:133b-22: dang gri gug / g-yon pa dag gis thod pa
T02D3305:133b-23: dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa phyag rgya drug dang
T02D3305:133b-24: ldan pa mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu'i do shal
T02D3305:133b-26: gnyis 'thung gi pags pa'i sham thabs rgyab na cung zad dpyangs pa /
T02D3305:133b-27: sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba phyed pas mtshan
T02D3305:133b-28: pa'i ral pa nag po'i thor cog can dpral ba'i
T02D3305:133b-29: mthar thod pa lngas brgyan pa /
T02D3305:133b-30: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can no //
T02D3305:133b-31: mnga' bdag 'di'i dga' ma ni sna tshogs sde ma /
T02D3305:133b-32: na bza' med pa mi mgo'i phreng ba can dbu
T02D3305:133b-33: skra sil bur grol zhing gyen du 'bar ba thod
T02D3305:133b-34: pa lngas dbu la mtshan pa /
T02D3305:133b-35: mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa sku mdog dmar mo
T02D3305:133b-36: zhal gcig ma spyan gsum pa phyag g-yon pa bdag
T02D3305:133b-37: po'i mgrin par 'khyud pas khrag gi 'dzag pa'i thod
T02D3305:133b-39: phyag g-yas pa na gri gug rdeg pa'i tshul can no //
T02D3305:133b-40: rtsibs nag po'i steng gi 'dab ma rnams la shar du legs phreng can ma dang /
T02D3305:133b-41: byang du thod pa can ma dang nub tu 'jigs ma dang lhor thub dka' ma'o //
T02D3305:133b-42: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la g-yas
T02D3305:133b-43: skor gyis khu ba dang rdul dang bdud rtsi dang
T02D3305:133b-44: sgron ma lngas gang ba'i padma'i snod de rim pa
T02D3305:134a-1: 'di ni rdo rje sngon po'i khor yug can no //
T02D3305:134a-2: de nas rim pa gnyis ba'i rtsibs brgyad dmar po
T02D3305:134a-3: la gnas pa'i padma brgyad ni rdo rje'i phreng ba
T02D3305:134a-5: de'i rtsibs rnams la shar du dge ba'i ska rags can ma dang /
T02D3305:134a-6: byang du gzugs can ma dang /
T02D3305:134a-7: nub tu rnam par rgyal ma dang /
T02D3305:134a-9: dbang ldan du dus can ma dang /
T02D3305:134a-11: bden bral du phyed ma dang /
T02D3305:134a-13: de nas rim pa gsum pa'i rtsibs brgyad dkar po
T02D3305:134a-14: la gnas pa'i padma brgyad ni rdo rje'i phreng ba
T02D3305:134a-16: de'i rtsibs rnams la shar du sgrol ma dang byang du 'jigs mthong ma dang /
T02D3305:134a-17: nub tu legs mthong ma dang /
T02D3305:134a-19: dbang ldan du dge ma dang /
T02D3305:134a-21: bden bral du dus mtshan ma dang /
T02D3305:134a-23: sgo rnams su shar gyi padma la mdzes ma dang /
T02D3305:134a-24: byang gi padma la nor 'dzin ma dang /
T02D3305:134a-25: nub kyi padma la skal bzang ma dang /
T02D3305:134a-27: 'di rnams thams cad g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag dag gis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:134a-28: so cung zad sto ba zhal gcig ma spyan gsum ma /
T02D3305:134a-29: rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan ma /
T02D3305:134a-30: mi mgo'i phreng ba dang bral ba /
T02D3305:134a-31: dbu skra sil bu dmar ser gyi tshogs gyen du 'bar ba byang sems 'dzag pa /

T02D3305:140a-4: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo bslang

T02D3305:140a-6: ni byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D3305:140a-7: 'dab ma rnams la mdun du sems ma rdo rje
T02D3305:140a-8: ma sngon mo g-yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa
T02D3305:140a-9: dmar po dang g-yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i
T02D3305:140a-11: g-yas su rin chen rdo rje ma ser mo g-yas
T02D3305:140a-12: pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i rtse mor rin po
T02D3305:140a-14: g-yon pas sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o //
T02D3305:140a-15: rgyab tu chos kyi rdo rje ma dmar mo g-yas
T02D3305:140a-16: pas rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i padma 'dab
T02D3305:140a-17: brgyad dkar dmar dang g-yon pas padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:140a-18: g-yon du las kyi rdo rje ma ljang gu g-yas
T02D3305:140a-19: pas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i mdog can sna tshogs
T02D3305:140a-20: rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa 'dzin zhing g-yon
T02D3305:140a-22: de nas shar phyogs su glang po che'i dbang po'i
T02D3305:140a-23: steng du sna tshogs padma'i lte ba la mi bskyod
T02D3305:140a-24: pa sngon po rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa
T02D3305:140a-25: / phyag g-yas ba'i sor mo gung mos rdo rje
T02D3305:140a-26: rtse lnga pa sngon po bzung nas sa gnon gyi
T02D3305:140a-27: / tshul mdzad cing / phyag g-yon pa gan rkyang pang du bzhag pa'o //
T02D3305:140a-28: 'dab ma rnams la mdun du rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D3305:140a-29: dkar po phyag g-yas pa'i ser mo gung mos thugs
T02D3305:140a-30: kar gtod pa'i tshul du rdo rje 'dzin pa g-yon

T02D3305:140a-34: par gnas pa'i rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs pa'i tshul
T02D3305:140a-35: mdzad cing g-yon pas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:140a-36: kha cig ni phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags kyu

T02D3305:140a-38: // g-yon du rdo rje chags pa dmar po g-yon
T02D3305:140a-39: pa dang cig shos dag gis gzhu dang mda' 'dzin

T02D3305:140a-42: phyag gnyis kyis thugs kar legs so sbyin pa'i tshul
T02D3305:140a-43: // pa'o // mdzad pa'o // lhor rta'i steng du
T02D3305:140a-44: sna tshogs padma'i lte bar rin chen 'byung ldan ser

T02D3305:140b-0: 'dab ma rnams la mdun du rdo rje @140b rin
T02D3305:140b-1: chen ser po g-yas pas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i

T02D3305:140b-3: mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba rang gi dbang
T02D3305:140b-4: bskur ba'i gnas su 'ching bar mdzad cing /

T02D3305:140b-6: g-yas su rdo rje gzi brjid dmar po phyag gnyis

T02D3305:140b-10: rgyal mtshan 'dzin zhing g-yon gyi dpung pa'i gnas su
T02D3305:140b-11: bar mdzad ba'o // 'phyang ba'o // rgyab tu rdo
T02D3305:140b-12: rje bzhad pa dkar po g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i
T02D3305:140b-13: phyag dag gis so'i phreng ba rdo rje gnyis dang

T02D3305:140b-15: bar mdzad ba'o // 'phyang ba'o // // nub tu
T02D3305:140b-16: rma bya'i steng du sna tshogs padma'i lte ba la
T02D3305:140b-17: snang ba mtha' yas dmar po rdo rje'i skyil krung
T02D3305:140b-18: bar mdzad ba'o // 'phyang ba'o // // gis bzhugs
T02D3305:140b-19: pa / phyag g-yon dang g-yas pa gan rkyal du

T02D3305:140b-21: phyag rgya mdzad de g-yas ba'i sor mo gung mos
T02D3305:140b-22: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i sor mo 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:140b-23: 'dab ma rnams la mdun du rdo rje chos dkar
T02D3305:140b-24: dmar g-yon pas bsnyems pa dang bcas pas padma'i yu

T02D3305:140b-47: g-yon sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu dkur brten pa ste /

T02D3305:141a-3: g-yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin nag po phyag dag

T02D3305:141a-8: gyi mtshams su rdo rje ste rdo rje khu tshur
T02D3305:141a-9: dag gis 'tshir ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bzung
T02D3305:141a-10: ba'o // dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi me'i padma
T02D3305:141a-11: la rdo rje sgeg mo dkar mo rdo rje dkur
T02D3305:141a-12: brten pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i phyag gis rdo
T02D3305:141a-14: bden bral gyi padma la phreng ba ma ser mo
T02D3305:141a-15: phyag dag gis rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o
T02D3305:141a-16: // rlung gi padma la glu ma dmar mo phyag dag gis pi wang sgrogs pa'o //
T02D3305:141a-17: dbang ldan gyi padma la gar ma ljang gu rdo
T02D3305:141a-18: rje rtse gsum pa bzung ba'i phyag dag gis gar
T02D3305:141a-19: mdzad pa'o // dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi phyi
T02D3305:141a-20: rol gyi snam bu'i shar gyi padma rnams la byams
T02D3305:141a-21: pa dang mthong ba don yod dang ngan song kun

T02D3305:141a-24: mdzad pa'o // // lho'i padma rnams la spos kyi
T02D3305:141a-25: glang po dang dpa' bar 'gro ba dang nam mkha'i
T02D3305:141a-26: mdzod dang ye shes tog rnams ni rin chen 'byung
T02D3305:141a-27: mdzad pa'o // // ldan lta bu'o // nub kyi
T02D3305:141a-28: padma rnams la 'od dpag med dang zla ba'i 'od
T02D3305:141a-30: dra ba can gyi 'od rnams ni snang ba mtha' yas lta bu'o //

T02D3305:141a-37: yis ma tshang ba bsgom par bya'o //

T02D3305:141a-44: rlung gi padma la rdo rje mar me ma dkar dmar dang /
T02D3305:141a-45: dbang ldan gyi padma la rdo rje dri chab ma ljang gu ste /

T02D3305:141b-2: rdo rje zhags pa dang rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /
T02D3305:141b-3: rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams ni rim pa bzhin du
T02D3305:141b-4: dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang
T02D3305:141b-5: gu ste sngar dang 'dra ba'i phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o
T02D3305:141b-6: // 'dir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings las gzhan
T02D3305:141b-7: pa'i lha thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sna
T02D3305:141b-8: tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po ches brgyan pa /

T02D3305:141b-10: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ma gtogs pa
T02D3305:141b-11: ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs
T02D3305:141b-12: pa ste / rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:141b-13: byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug ni rang rang gi
T02D3305:141b-14: bdag po'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon du phyogs
T02D3305:141b-15: pa ste / pa'o // rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D3305:141b-16: sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i

T02D3305:141b-20: / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga las gzhan pa'i lha
T02D3305:141b-21: bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad ni sems dpa'i skyil krung gis
T02D3305:141b-22: bzhugs pa'o // 'dir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings
T02D3305:141b-23: rnam par snang ba shin tu rnam par dag pa
T02D3305:141b-24: chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid la rang dang 'dra
T02D3305:141b-25: ba'i rdo rje sems dpas rgyas gdab po //
T02D3305:141b-26: me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i bdag
T02D3305:141b-27: nyid mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs
T02D3305:141b-28: pa bzhi'i rigs kyi bdag po ni rnam par snang
T02D3305:141b-29: mdzad do // sems ma rdo rje ma dang rdo
T02D3305:141b-30: rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzhi dang sgeg mo
T02D3305:141b-32: byams pa la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D3305:141b-33: rdo rje lcags kyu rnams kyi mi bskyod pa'o //

T02D3305:141b-36: glang po la sogs pa bzhi dang rdo rje zhags

T02D3305:141b-40: ma dang 'od dpag med la sogs pa bzhi dang
T02D3305:141b-41: / rdo rje lcags sgrog ma rnams kyi snang ba mtha' yas so //

T02D3305:141b-43: la sogs pa bzhi dang gar ma dang dri chab
T02D3305:141b-44: ma dang rdo rje snying po la sogs pa bzhi

T02D3305:142a-1: la rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bsgom par bya'o zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no //

T02D3305:142a-3: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a yo g'i shva ra h'um zhes pa ni snying po'o //
T02D3305:142a-4: aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi ste las thams cad pa'i sngags so //

T02D3305:142a-6: rnams su rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang lha'i rnam pa'i
T02D3305:142a-7: khyad par gsungs pa de dag ni mngas pas 'jigs

T02D3305:142a-11: pa nas gzhal yas khang gi bar du dang por

T02D3305:142a-31: mchog sbyin dang mda' g-yon pa rnams kyis shes rab

T02D3305:142a-33: autpala sngon po dang gzhu 'dzin pa /

T02D3305:142a-36: du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la mi
