T02D3305:145b-19: 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni mu:'o //
T02D3305:145b-20: aom a'a:zhes pa ni snying po'o //
T02D3305:145b-21: aom aa mri ta kundala bighn'anta ka h'um /
T02D3305:145b-22: zhes pa las thams cad pa'o //
T02D3305:145b-23: chos kyi dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:145b-24: la rdo rje gyur la sogs pa bsgom pa'i rnam
T02D3305:145b-25: par gzhag pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:145b-26: bzhin no // gzhan 'dir gshin rje gshed la sogs
T02D3305:145b-27: pa'i khro bo rnams ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzugs
T02D3305:145b-28: can te mchod rten 'di la med do //
T02D3305:145b-29: gzhal yas khang gi lte bar sna tshogs chu skyes
T02D3305:145b-30: kyi ze'u 'bru la gnas pa'i seng ge'i steng du
T02D3305:145b-31: padma dang zla ba la 'jam pa'i dbyangs rdo rje'i
T02D3305:145b-33: nyi ma gzhon nu'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od dang ldan
T02D3305:145b-34: pa gser gyi mdog can aindra n'i la lta bu'i
T02D3305:145b-36: rdo rje dang rin po che dang padma dang sna
T02D3305:145b-37: tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'i cod pan gyi steng su
T02D3305:145b-38: sangs rgyas lnga 'phro ba'i rin po che'i cod pan
T02D3305:145b-39: can / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i
T02D3305:145b-40: rgyan dag na bza' can sgeg pa la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:145b-41: nyam gyi tshogs dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:145b-42: rtsa ba dang g-yas dang rgya ba dang g-yon gyi
T02D3305:145b-43: zhal rnams ni ser po dang sngon po dang dmar
T02D3305:145b-45: phyag brgyad kyi gnyis kyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad pa /
T02D3305:145b-46: g-yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang mda' dang rdo
T02D3305:145b-47: rje g-yon pa rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol
T02D3305:145b-48: tu phyin pa'i to ti dang gzhu dag rdo rje
T02D3305:146a-0: 'dab ma brgyad la gnas pa'i seng ge'i steng @146a * //
T02D3305:146a-1: du padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la shar
T02D3305:146a-2: la sogs pa'i phyogs su gtsug tor chen po dang
T02D3305:146a-3: gdugs dkar po dang gzi brjid phung po dang rnam
T02D3305:146a-4: par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor rnams dang dbang ldan la
T02D3305:146a-5: sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su 'od zer rnam par 'phro
T02D3305:146a-6: ba dang 'phags pa dang cher 'phags dang rgyal ba
T02D3305:146a-7: rnams te / gtsug tor brgyad po 'di rnams ni
T02D3305:146a-8: rdo rje'i skyil krung dang rin po che'i cod pan
T02D3305:146a-9: rnams te / can / sku mdog ser po phyag
T02D3305:146a-10: gnyis kyi g-yas pas 'khor lo gyen du gzung ba
T02D3305:146a-11: g-yon pa rang gi gdan la brten pa'o //
T02D3305:146a-12: de nas shar gyi re'u mig gi dbus su glang
T02D3305:146a-13: po che'i rgyal po la mi bskyod pa sngon po
T02D3305:146a-14: zhal ba zhing rtsa ba'i zhal sngon po khro zhing
T02D3305:146a-15: sgeg pa dang bcas pa g-yas pa dkar po gdangs
T02D3305:146a-16: shing drag pa / rgyab ma ser po dpa' ba
T02D3305:146a-17: g-yon pa dmar po mche ba gtsigs shing ma mchu
T02D3305:146a-18: shing drag pa / mnan pa / phyag brgyad kyi
T02D3305:146a-19: g-yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang mda' dang lcags
T02D3305:146a-20: shing drag pa / mnan pa / kyu 'dzin zhing
T02D3305:146a-21: / g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang dril bu
T02D3305:146a-22: dang gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa /
T02D3305:146a-23: rdo rje sems dpa' dang rdo rje rgyal po dang
T02D3305:146a-24: rdo rje chags pa dang rdo rje legs pa rnams
T02D3305:146a-26: lho'i re'u mig gi dbus su rta'i rgyal po la
T02D3305:146a-27: rin chen 'byung ldan ser po ser po dang sngon
T02D3305:146a-28: po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can phyag
T02D3305:146a-29: brgyad kyi g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral
T02D3305:146a-30: gri dang mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin zhing /
T02D3305:146a-31: g-yon pa rnams kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02D3305:146a-32: rdo rje dril bu dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:146a-33: rdo rje rin chen dang rdo rje gzi brjid dang
T02D3305:146a-34: rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang rdo rje bzhad pa rnams
T02D3305:146a-36: nub kyi re'u mig gi dbus su rma bya la
T02D3305:146a-37: snang ba mtha' yas dmar po dmar po dang nag
T02D3305:146a-38: po dang dkar po dang ser po'i zhal bzhi pa
T02D3305:146a-39: phyag brgyad kyi g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang
T02D3305:146a-40: mda' dang ral gri dang lcags kyu 'dzin zhing /
T02D3305:146a-41: g-yon pa rnams kyis padma dang gzhu dang zhags pa dang dril bu 'dzin pa /
T02D3305:146a-42: rdo rje chos dang rdo rje rnon po dang rdo
T02D3305:146a-43: rje rgyu dang rdo rje srung ba rnams kyis yongs
T02D3305:146a-44: su bskor ba'o // byang gi re'u mig gi dbus
T02D3305:146a-45: su nam mkha' lding la don yod grub pa ljang
T02D3305:146a-46: gu zhal bzhi'i rtsa ba ljang gu mche ba gtsigs
T02D3305:146a-47: su bskor ba'o // pa / g-yas pa ser po zhi ba /
T02D3305:146a-48: rgyab ma dmar po rnam par sgeg pa /
T02D3305:146a-49: g-yon pa dkar po zhi ba /
T02D3305:146b-0: @146b phyag brgyad kyi g-yas pa rnams kyis ral gri
T02D3305:146b-1: dang rdo rje dang mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin zhing
T02D3305:146b-2: / g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa /
T02D3305:146b-3: rdo rje las dang rdo rje srung ba dang rdo
T02D3305:146b-4: rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje khu tshur rnams kyis
T02D3305:146b-5: bskor ba'o // mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de
T02D3305:146b-6: bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rang rang gi bzhon pa'i
T02D3305:146b-7: steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la
T02D3305:146b-9: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang gos dang cod pan can no //
T02D3305:146b-10: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bcu drug po
T02D3305:146b-11: rnams ni dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su gnas
T02D3305:146b-12: pa'i sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la rdo
T02D3305:146b-13: rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i sku mdog
T02D3305:146b-15: 'di dag kyang phyogs su gnas pa'o zhes pa'i phyogs kyang yod do //
T02D3305:146b-16: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su gnas pa'i sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba rnams la /
T02D3305:146b-17: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis spyan ma dang m'a ma
T02D3305:146b-18: k'i dang gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma rnams ni
T02D3305:146b-19: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jam pa'i dbyangs
T02D3305:146b-21: snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa lta bu'o //
T02D3305:146b-22: sgo rnams la shar du rdo rje lcags kyu dmar
T02D3305:146b-23: ser rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa
T02D3305:146b-24: / g-yas brkyang gis gnas pa dang /
T02D3305:146b-25: lhor rdo rje zhags pa ser po rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin pa /
T02D3305:146b-26: g-yon brkyang gis gnas pa dang /
T02D3305:146b-27: nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa /
T02D3305:146b-28: sa ga'i stabs kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D3305:146b-29: byang du rdo rje 'bebs pa ljang gu rdo rje
T02D3305:146b-30: bsdams pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin
T02D3305:146b-31: pa zlum po'i stabs kyis gnas pa ste /
T02D3305:146b-32: bzhi po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma gnas pa zhal gcig pa /
T02D3305:146b-33: phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa /
T02D3305:146b-34: dbu skra dang sma ra ser po gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D3305:146b-35: klu brgyad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D3305:146b-36: snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di las phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la /
T02D3305:146b-37: shar phyogs su dbang ldan nas brtsams nas g-yas skor gyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02D3305:146b-38: sa ma bcu gnyis ni phyag gnyis ma g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje 'dzin zhing /
T02D3305:146b-39: g-yon pa rnams kyis rang rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste /
T02D3305:147a-0: de la mos pas spyod pa'i sa ma padma dmar @147a * //
T02D3305:147a-1: po lta bu chu skyes dmar po 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:147a-2: rab dga' ma dmar mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:147a-3: dri med ma dkar mo chu skyes dkar po 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:147a-4: 'od byed ma dmar mo sna tshogs chu skyes la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:147a-5: 'od 'phro ma mar ka ta'i mdog can autpala sngon po 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:147a-6: sbyang dka' ma ser mo pang par gnas pa'i phyag
T02D3305:147a-7: gan rkyal gyis ma ra ka ta'i nor bu 'dzin
T02D3305:147a-8: pa dang / mngon du gyur ma gser gyi mdog
T02D3305:147a-9: can padma'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D3305:147a-10: phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:147a-11: ring du song ma nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs sna
T02D3305:147a-12: tshogs chu skyes la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje
T02D3305:147a-13: 'dzin pa dang / mi g-yo ma zla ba'i mdog
T02D3305:147a-14: can zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga
T02D3305:147a-15: pa dmar pos mtshan pa'i padma'i yu ba khengs pa
T02D3305:147a-17: legs pa'i blo gros ma dkar mo ral gris mtshan pa'i autpala 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:147a-18: chos kyi sprin ma ser mo chos kyi sprin gyis
T02D3305:147a-19: yongs su bskor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D3305:147a-20: phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:147a-21: kun du 'od ma nyin gung gi nyi ma'i mdog
T02D3305:147a-22: can padma'i steng du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D3305:147a-23: chub mtshon par byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs
T02D3305:147a-24: 'dzin pa'o // lhor pha rol tu phyin ma bcu
T02D3305:147a-25: gnyis ni phyag gnyis ma g-yas pa rnams kyi yid
T02D3305:147a-27: g-yon pas rang rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste /
T02D3305:147a-28: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ni phyag gnyis kyis lhag pa'o //
T02D3305:147a-29: de la rin po che padma'i pha rol tu phyin
T02D3305:147a-30: ma dmar mo padma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil
T02D3305:147a-32: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ma dkar dmar gyi
T02D3305:147a-33: mdog can sna tshogs pa'i so ba'i snye ma 'dzin
T02D3305:147a-34: pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D3305:147a-35: ma dkar mo yal gdang bcas pa'i mya ngan med
T02D3305:147a-36: pa'i me tog gi chun po 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:147a-37: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin ma ser mo chu skyes dkar po 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:147a-38: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ma ra
T02D3305:147a-39: ka ta'i mdog can autpala la sngon po 'dzin pa
T02D3305:147a-40: dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin ma
T02D3305:147a-41: nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs pa padma dkar po 'dzin
T02D3305:147a-42: dang / pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
T02D3305:147a-43: tu phyin ma gser gyi mdog can padma la gnas
T02D3305:147a-44: pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po
T02D3305:147a-45: dang / pa dang / ti 'dzin zhing / phyag
T02D3305:147b-0: gnyis kyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i @147b phyag rgya mdzad
T02D3305:147b-1: dang / pa dang / ti 'dzin zhing / pa
T02D3305:147b-2: dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin ma pri
T02D3305:147b-3: yang ku ltar ljang gu chu skyes ser po la
T02D3305:147b-4: gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa dang smon lam gyi
T02D3305:147b-5: pha rol tu phyin ma autpala sngon po'i mdog can
T02D3305:147b-6: dang / pa dang / ti 'dzin zhing / pa
T02D3305:147b-7: dang / / autpala la sngon po la gnas pa'i
T02D3305:147b-9: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dmar mo shes
T02D3305:147b-10: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin
T02D3305:147b-11: pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D3305:147b-12: ma dkar mo sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i 'bras
T02D3305:147b-13: bus brgyan pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi yal ga
T02D3305:147b-14: pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje las
T02D3305:147b-15: kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sna tshogs mdog can
T02D3305:147b-16: autpala la sngon po la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo
T02D3305:147b-17: pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / rje 'dzin pa'o // nub tu dbang ma bcu gnyis ni /
T02D3305:147b-18: phyag gnyis ma g-yas pa rnams kyis autpala la 'dzin zhing /
T02D3305:147b-19: g-yon pas bsnyems pa dang bcas pas rang rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste /
T02D3305:147b-20: de la tshe la dbang ma dkar dmar gyi mdog
T02D3305:147b-21: can nor bu padma r'a ga la gnas shing ting
T02D3305:147b-22: nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya can gyi sangs rgyas tshe
T02D3305:147b-23: dpag tu med pa'i sku gzugs 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:147b-24: sems la dbang ma dkar mo rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:147b-25: yo byad la dbang ma ser mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:147b-26: las la dbang ma ljang gu sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:147b-27: skye pa la dbang ma sna tshogs mdog can rnam
T02D3305:147b-28: pa sna tshogs pa'i mdog can gyi dz'a ti'i 'khri
T02D3305:147b-30: rdzu 'phrul la dbang nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs padma
T02D3305:147b-31: gnas pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin
T02D3305:147b-32: pa dang / mos pa la dbang ma padma'i rtsa
T02D3305:147b-33: ba ltar dkar ba pri yang ku'i me tog gi
T02D3305:147b-35: smon lam la dbang ma ser mo autpala sngon po 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:147b-36: ye shes la dbang ma sngon mo autpala la sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:147b-37: chos la dbang ma dkar mo padma la gnas pa'i bum pa bzang po 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:147b-38: de bzhin nyid ma dkar mo phyag g-yas pas padma dkar po 'dzin zhing /
T02D3305:147b-39: g-yon pas rdo rje rin po che'i snye ma 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:147b-40: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ma gser zhun ma lta
T02D3305:147b-41: bu g-yas pas chu skyes ser po la gnas pa'i
T02D3305:147b-42: rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin zhing /
T02D3305:147b-43: g-yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi steng du 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:147b-44: byang du gzugs ma bcu gnyis ni /
T02D3305:148a-1: ma g-yas pa rnams kyis sna tshogs rdo rje dang /
T02D3305:148a-2: g-yon pas bsnyems pa dang bcas pas rang rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste /
T02D3305:148a-3: de la nor gyi blo gros ma ser mo 'bras kyi snye ma 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:148a-4: rin chen skrar mda' ma dmar mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:148a-5: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma dkar mo nor bu
T02D3305:148a-6: zla ba chu shel gyi bum pa 'dzin pa dang
T02D3305:148a-7: / 'od zer can ma dkar dmar skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:148a-8: ri khrod lo ma can ma ljang gu rma bya'i mjug sgro 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:148a-9: dug sel ma dkar mo dug gi me tog gi chun po 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:148a-10: sgo mtha' yas ma me tog pri yang ku ltar
T02D3305:148a-11: ljang gu chu skyes dmar po la gnas pa mi
T02D3305:148a-12: zad pa'i gter chen po'i bum pa 'dzin pa dang
T02D3305:148a-13: / tsunda ma dkar mo bgrang phreng 'chang ba'i ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:148a-14: shes rab 'phel ma dkar mo autpala sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:148a-15: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ma
T02D3305:148a-16: ljang gu rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i padma
T02D3305:148a-18: ye shes mi zad pa'i za ma tog dmar mo rin po che'i za ma tog 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:148a-19: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod ma ser
T02D3305:148a-20: mo padma la gnas pa'i rin po che sna tshogs
T02D3305:148a-22: sgo rnams la shar du chos so so yang dag
T02D3305:148a-23: par rig ma dkar dmar phyag gnyis kyis lcags kyu
T02D3305:148a-25: lhor don so so yang dag par rig ma ma
T02D3305:148a-26: ra ka ta'i mdog can g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i
T02D3305:148a-27: phyag dag gis rin po che'i zhags pa 'dzin pa
T02D3305:148a-28: dang / nub tu nges pa'i tshig so so yang
T02D3305:148a-29: dag par rig ma dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis mtha'
T02D3305:148a-30: gnyis su padmas mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog 'dzin pa dang
T02D3305:148a-31: dang / / byang du spobs pa so so yang
T02D3305:148a-32: dag par rig ma mar ka ta ltar ljang gu
T02D3305:148a-33: phyag gnyis rdo rje rtse gsum pa mtshan pa'i dril
T02D3305:148a-34: dang / / bu 'dzin pa'o // mtshams rnams su
T02D3305:148a-35: mer sgeg mo ser mo sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i
T02D3305:148a-36: phyag dag gis rdo rje gnyis 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:148a-37: bden bral du phreng ba ma dmar ser phyag gnyis kyis rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:148a-38: rlung du glu ma dmar mo phyag dag gis pi wang 'dzin zhing sgra sgrogs pa dang /
T02D3305:148a-39: dbang ldan du gar ma ljang gu phyag gnyis gar
T02D3305:148a-40: gyi tshul gyis rdo rje rtsa gsum pa dang dril
T02D3305:148b-1: mos pas spyod pa'i sa ma la sogs pa'i lha
T02D3305:148b-2: mo 'di rnams thams cad ni rnam pa sna tshogs
T02D3305:148b-3: pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang /
T02D3305:148b-5: rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02D3305:148b-6: cung zad 'dzum zhing sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:148b-7: sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa ste /
T02D3305:148b-8: khyad par sgo skyod ma rnams ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D3305:148b-9: gzhan dag ni de rnams kyang zla ba la gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:148b-10: dkyil 'khor gsum pa la dbang ldan nas brtsams nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
T02D3305:148b-11: de la snam bu rnams kyi shar du kun du
T02D3305:148b-12: bzang po ser po g-yas pas mchog sbyin dang g-yon
T02D3305:148b-13: pas autpala la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa dang
T02D3305:148b-14: / blo gros mi zad pa ser po g-yas pas
T02D3305:148b-15: ral gri dang g-yon pas mi 'jigs pas padma 'dzin
T02D3305:148b-16: / pa dang / sa'i snying po ser po g-yas
T02D3305:148b-17: pas sa gnon mdzad cing g-yon pas padma la gnas
T02D3305:148b-18: pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:148b-19: nam mkha'i snying po ljang gu g-yas pas rin po che thams cad kyi char 'bebs shing /
T02D3305:148b-20: g-yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:148b-21: lhor nam mkha'i mdzod ser po g-yas pas yid bzhin
T02D3305:148b-22: gyi nor bu dang g-yon pas bum pa bzang po
T02D3305:148b-23: las 'phyangs pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing 'dzin pa dang
T02D3305:148b-24: / phyag na rin chen ljang gu g-yas pas rin po che dang /
T02D3305:148b-25: g-yon pas chu skyes la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:148b-26: blo gros rgya mtsho dkar po g-yas pas dung dang g-yon pas ral gri 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:148b-27: rdo rje snying po autpala sngon po'i mdog can g-yas pas rdo rje dang /
T02D3305:148b-28: g-yon pas sa bcu pa'i glegs bam 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:148b-29: nub tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkar po g-yas pas mchog sbyin dang /
T02D3305:148b-30: g-yon pas chu skyes 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:148b-31: mthu chen thob pa ser po g-yas pas ral gri dang g-yon pas padma 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:148b-32: zla 'od dkar po g-yas pas 'khor lo dad g-yon
T02D3305:148b-33: pas chu skyes la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:148b-34: 'dzin pa dang / dra ba can gyi 'od dkar
T02D3305:148b-35: dmar g-yas pas ral gri dang g-yon pas chu skyes
T02D3305:148b-36: la gnas pa'i nyi ma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:148b-37: byang du 'od dpag med dkar po g-yas pas sna tshogs chu skyes dang /
T02D3305:148b-38: g-yon pas chu skyes la gnas pa'i bum pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:149a-1: po g-yas pas se gol gtogs shing g-yon pas padma la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:149a-2: mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms
T02D3305:149a-3: pa'i blo gros gur gum gyi mdog g-yas rdo rje
T02D3305:149a-6: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sngon po
T02D3305:149a-7: g-yas pas ral gri dang g-yon pas sna tshogs rdo
T02D3305:149a-8: rjes mtshan pa'i ba dang 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:149a-9: bcu drug po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs padma dang
T02D3305:149a-10: zla ba'i dkyil la sems dpa'i skyil krung can rin
T02D3305:149a-11: po che'i cod pan dang sna tshogs pa'i rin po
T02D3305:149a-12: che dang na bzas brgyan pa /
T02D3305:149a-13: zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa rnams so //
T02D3305:149a-14: sgo rnams la shar du ma he la gshin rje
T02D3305:149a-15: mthar byed nag po gsus pa 'phyang pa zhal drug
T02D3305:149a-16: pa phyag drug pa g-yas pa rnams kyis lcags kyu
T02D3305:149a-17: dang / ral gri dang mda' dang /
T02D3305:149a-18: g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang dril bu dang gzhu 'dzin pa ste /
T02D3305:149a-19: zhal dang zhabs kyi khyad par ni snga ma bzhin no//
T02D3305:149a-20: lhor shes rab mthar byed ser po zhal bzhi pa
T02D3305:149a-21: rtsa ba'i zhal sgeg pa dang bcas pa g-yas pa
T02D3305:149a-22: gdangs pa / rgyab ma drag po chen po //
T02D3305:149a-24: yang na 'di rnams rim pa ji lta bar ser
T02D3305:149a-25: po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang ljang gu'o
T02D3305:149a-26: // 'di'i phyag brgyad kyi g-yas pa rnams kyis zhags pa dang /
T02D3305:149a-27: rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' dang /
T02D3305:149a-28: g-yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang shakti dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:149a-29: nub tu padma mthar byed dmar po zhal dmar po
T02D3305:149a-30: bzhi'i rtsa ba dang g-yas dang rgyab dang g-yon gyi
T02D3305:149a-31: zhal rnams sgeg pa dang drag pa dang bzhad pa
T02D3305:149a-32: dang zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:149a-33: yang na 'di rnams dmar po dang nag po dang ser po dang dkar po'o //
T02D3305:149a-34: phyag brgyad kyi gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /
T02D3305:149a-35: g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda'/
T02D3305:149a-36: g-yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa ste /
T02D3305:149a-37: gsum pa 'di dag ni rol pa'i kun du bskyod pas gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:149a-38: byang du bgegs mthar byed sngon po zhal sngon po bzhi pa /
T02D3305:149a-39: yang na 'di rnams sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu /
T02D3305:149a-40: phyag brgyad kyi gnyis kyis rdo rje bsdams pa'i tshul gyis dril bu dang /
T02D3305:149a-41: g-yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang mda' dang lcags kyu /
T02D3305:149b-0: g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas @149b pa'i
T02D3305:149b-1: zhags pa dang gzhu dang dril bu 'dzin pa g-yon
T02D3305:149b-2: brkyang gis log 'dren mnan nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3305:149b-3: mtshams rnams la dbang ldan du 'jig rten gsum na
T02D3305:149b-4: rnam par rgyal ba sngon po zhal sngon po bzhi'i
T02D3305:149b-5: rtsa ba khro zhing sgeg pa dang bcas pa g-yas
T02D3305:149b-7: g-yon mi sdug pa'i nyams can /
T02D3305:149b-8: yang na 'di rnams sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po'o //
T02D3305:149b-9: phyag brgyad kyi gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu
T02D3305:149b-10: thugs kar bzung nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag
T02D3305:149b-11: rgya mdzad pa / g-yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang lcags kyu dang mda'/
T02D3305:149b-12: g-yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02D3305:149b-13: zhabs g-yon brkyang bas dbang phyug chen po'i mgo dang /
T02D3305:149b-14: g-yas bskum pas au ma'i nu ma mnan pa'o //
T02D3305:149b-15: mer rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba nag
T02D3305:149b-16: po sgeg pa dang dpa' ba dang 'jigs su rung
T02D3305:149b-17: ba snying rje'i nyams dang ldan pa'i zhal bzhi pa
T02D3305:149b-18: / yang na 'di rnams sngon po dang dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po /
T02D3305:149b-19: 'di'i phyag brgyad kyi g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje
T02D3305:149b-20: dang ral gri dang mda' dang 'khor lo 'dzin zhing
T02D3305:149b-21: / g-yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang zhags pa
T02D3305:149b-22: dang gzhu dang kha tv'am ga dang 'brel ba'i ba
T02D3305:149b-23: / dang 'dzin pa / chung ma dang bcas pa'i khyab 'jug g-yas brkyang gis mnan nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3305:149b-24: bden bral du he ru ka sngon po zhal sngon po bzhi'i rtsa ba drag po //
T02D3305:149b-25: g-yas pa rab tu dga' bas bzhad pa /
T02D3305:149b-26: rgyab ma za bar rngam pa /
T02D3305:149b-27: g-yon pa sgeg pa dang bcas pa /
T02D3305:149b-28: yang na 'di rnams sngon po dang dmar po dang
T02D3305:149b-29: ljang gu dang dkar po phyag brgyad kyi g-yas pa
T02D3305:149b-30: rnams kyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang mda' dang
T02D3305:149b-31: khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa /
T02D3305:149b-32: g-yon pa rnams kyis snying gar padma kha bye ba
T02D3305:149b-33: dang gzhu dang kha tv'am ga dril bu ba dang
T02D3305:149b-35: gnyis kyis 'jigs byed chen po'i pags pa rlung ras lta bu 'dzin pa /
T02D3305:149b-36: chung ma dang bcas pa'i tshangs pa g-yon brkyang gis mnan nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3305:149b-37: rlung du rta mchog ljang gu zhal ljang gu bzhi'i rtsa ba khro zhing sgeg pa dang bcas pa /
T02D3305:149b-38: g-yas pa drag po g-yon pa tshangs pa'i gdong can /
T02D3305:149b-39: yang na 'di rnams ljang gu dang sngon po dang
T02D3305:149b-40: dkar po ste spyi bor rta mgo ljang gu 'di'i
T02D3305:149b-41: phyag brgyad kyi g-yas pa sna tshogs rdo rje ba
T02D3305:149b-42: dan dang ldan pas bsgreng ba'i tshul dang /
T02D3305:149b-43: gnyis pas ba dan gsum pa'i tshul dang /
T02D3305:150a-3: g-yon pas phub dang bcas pa'i phyag gis sna tshogs chu skyes dang /
T02D3305:150a-4: gsum gyis shakta dang dbyug pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02D3305:150a-5: g-yas brkyang pa dang g-yon brkyang ba ste zhabs bzhi pa /
T02D3305:150a-6: g-yas pa gcig gis dbang mo dang dpal mo //
T02D3305:150a-7: gnyis pas dga' ma dang rangs ma g-yon pa gcig gis dbang po dang sbrang rtsir byed pa /
T02D3305:150a-8: gnyis pas rgyal bar byed pa dang dpyid kyi lha mnan nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3305:150a-9: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi steng gi nam mkhar gtsug
T02D3305:150a-10: tor 'khor los sgyur ba ser po zhal ser po
T02D3305:150a-11: bzhi pa / yang na ser po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po'i zhal bzhi pa /
T02D3305:150a-12: phyag brgyad kyi g-yas pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang lcags kyu dang ral gri dang mda'/
T02D3305:150a-13: g-yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang zhags pa dang bgrang phred dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02D3305:150a-14: rol pa'i kun du bskyod pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3305:150a-15: 'og tu gnod mdzes rgyal po nag po drag po
T02D3305:150a-16: dang zhi ba dang bzhad pa dang sgeg pa'i nyams
T02D3305:150a-17: dang ldan pa'i zhal nag po bzhi pa yang na
T02D3305:150a-18: nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po dang ser
T02D3305:150a-20: phyag g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang lcags kyu
T02D3305:150a-21: dang ral gri dang mda' g-yon pa rnams kyis dril
T02D3305:150a-22: bu dang zhags pa dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa
T02D3305:150a-25: khro bo bcu po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa /
T02D3305:150a-26: zhal re re zhing dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum pa /
T02D3305:150a-27: smin ma 'khyog pa dang bcas pa /
T02D3305:150a-28: stag gi pags pa'i gos dang smad g-yogs can /
T02D3305:150a-29: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:150a-30: dbu skra dmar ser 'bar ba gyen du bcings pa
T02D3305:150a-31: smar dmar ser can gdengs can gyi dbang po brgyad
T02D3305:150a-32: dang ldan pa 'jigs su rung ba'o //
T02D3305:150a-33: dkyil 'khor gsum pa gnyis kyi grva bzhi'i nang du
T02D3305:150a-34: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba la sogs
T02D3305:150a-35: pa'i khro bo bzhi'i phyi'i re kh'a'i phyi rol gyi
T02D3305:150a-36: gnas su me la sogs pa'i zur thig bzhi po
T02D3305:150a-37: rnams kyi g-yas logs su ma tog ma la sogs
T02D3305:150a-38: pa bzhi dang g-yon logs su rdo rje gzugs ma
T02D3305:150a-39: la ste / de la me tog ma ser mo phyag na me tog gi snod can dang /
T02D3305:150a-40: bdug spos ma nag mo phyag na sbos phor can dang /
T02D3305:150a-41: mar me ma dmar mo phyag na rin po che'i sgron ma'i mchod sdong can dang /
T02D3305:150b-0: dri cha ba ma @150b ljang gu phyag na dri'i dung can dang /
T02D3305:150b-1: rdo rje gzugs ma ser mo phyag na me long can dang /
T02D3305:150b-2: rdo rje sgra ma ljang gu phyag na pi wang can dang /
T02D3305:150b-3: rdo rje ro ma dmar mo phyag na dri'i snod can dang /
T02D3305:150b-4: rdo rje reg bya ma sna tshogs pa'i mdog can phyag na gos sna tshogs can no //
T02D3305:150b-5: brgyad po 'di rnams ni phyag gnyis ma rin po
T02D3305:150b-6: che'i cod pan can rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin
T02D3305:150b-7: po che dang gos kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3305:150b-8: padma dang zla ba la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3305:150b-9: bzhi pa rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la dbang
T02D3305:150b-10: po'i phyogs su sa srung dkar po la gnas pa'i
T02D3305:150b-11: dbang po ser po rdo rje dang nu ma 'dzin
T02D3305:150b-12: pa dang / gshin rjer ma he la gshin rje nag po da byug pa dang mdung 'dzin pa /
T02D3305:150b-13: chur chu srin la chu bdag dkar po gdengs ka
T02D3305:150b-14: bdun pa klu'i zhags pa dang drung 'dzin pa dang
T02D3305:150b-15: / lus ngan du mi la gnas pa'i lus nang
T02D3305:150b-16: po ser po lcags kyu dang dbyug to 'dzin pa
T02D3305:150b-17: / dang / dbang ldan du glang la gnas pa'i
T02D3305:150b-18: dbang ldan dkar po rtse gsum dang thod pa 'dzin
T02D3305:150b-19: / dang / pa / ral pa'i thor cog la
T02D3305:150b-20: thod pa dang zla ba phyed pas brgyan zhing sprul
T02D3305:150b-21: gyi mchod phyir thogs pa mgrin pa sngon po dang
T02D3305:150b-22: / dang / pa / / mer ra la me
T02D3305:150b-23: ha dmar po blugs gzar dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa
T02D3305:150b-25: du rol srin po'i bdag po bden bral sngon po
T02D3305:150b-26: ral gri dang phub 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:150b-27: rlung du ri dag sa la rlung lha sngon po rlung ras 'dzin pa ste /
T02D3305:150b-28: brgyad po 'di rnams ni phyag bzhi pa /
T02D3305:150b-29: g-yas pas phyag mtshan dang po dang /
T02D3305:150b-30: g-yon pas gnyis pa 'dzin zhing rang snang gi btsun mo la 'khyud pa /
T02D3305:150b-31: gnyis kyis spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas 'dud pa'o //
T02D3305:150b-32: dbang ldan dang nye ba'i phyi rol du dbang ldan
T02D3305:150b-33: gyi phyogs nas brtsams nas rim pas tshangs pa la
T02D3305:150b-34: sogs pa ste / de yang dang pa la tshangs pa ser po zhal bzhi pa /
T02D3305:150b-36: bgrang phreng dang chu skyes 'dzin zhing g-yas pa dang
T02D3305:150b-37: cig shos dag thal mo sbyar bas dbyug pa dang
T02D3305:150b-39: mkha' lding la khyab 'jug nag po phyag bzhi pa
T02D3305:150b-40: dang po gnyis 'khor lo dang dung 'dzin zhing g-yas
T02D3305:150b-41: pa dang g-yon pa dag gis thal mo sbyar bas
T02D3305:150b-42: dbyug to dang s'a ram ga'i gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:150b-43: glang la dbang phyug dkar po ri bong gis mtshan pa'i ral pa'i thor cog can /
T02D3305:150b-44: phyag bzhi pa spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba dang rtse gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:151a-0: rma bya la gdong drug dmar po @151a * //
T02D3305:151a-1: zhal drug pa phyag drug pa g-yas pa dag gis shakti dang rdo rje dang /
T02D3305:151a-2: g-yon pa dag gis khyim bya dang dril bu 'dzin zhing gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02D3305:151a-3: 'di rnams kyang snga ma bzhin du rang snang gi btsun mo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D3305:151a-4: tshangs ma ni tshangs pa dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D3305:151a-5: drag mo ni drag po dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D3305:151a-6: khyab 'jug ma ni khyab 'jug dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D3305:151a-7: gzhon nu ma ni gzhon nu dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D3305:151a-8: dbang mo ni dbang po dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D3305:151a-9: phag mo nag mo 'ug pa la gnas ma phyag
T02D3305:151a-10: bzhi ma g-yas pa dang cig shos dag gis ro
T02D3305:151a-11: hi ta dang thod pa 'dzin zhing gnyis kyis thal
T02D3305:151a-12: mo sbyar ba'o // yi dags kyi steng du tsa
T02D3305:151a-13: mundi dmar mo phyag bzhi ma g-yas pa dang g-yon
T02D3305:151a-14: pa dag gis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin zhing
T02D3305:151a-15: gzhan pa dag gis thal mo sbyar pa'o //
T02D3305:151a-16: bhri nggi ni ma nag mo shin tu skem pa
T02D3305:151a-17: bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin zhing gnyis kyis thal
T02D3305:151a-18: mo sbyar ba'o // byi ba la tshogs bdag dkar
T02D3305:151a-19: po glang po che'i gdong ba can sprul gyi mchod
T02D3305:151a-20: phyir thogs pa dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:151a-21: phyag bzhi pa g-yas pa dag gis rtse gsum dang la du /
T02D3305:151a-22: g-yon pa dag gis dgra sta dang la phug 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:151a-23: nag po chen po nag po rtse gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:151a-24: dga' byed dbang phyug nag po rdza rnga la zhon zhing rdza rnga brdung par brtson pa'o //
T02D3305:151a-25: rta bdun pa'i shing rta la nyi ma dmar po
T02D3305:151a-26: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis padma la gnas
T02D3305:151a-28: dang pa la zla ba dkar po g-yas pa dang
T02D3305:151a-29: g-yon pa dag gis ku mu ta la gnas pa'i
T02D3305:151a-31: ral bkra shis dmar po g-yas pas chu gri dang
T02D3305:151a-32: g-yon pas mi'i mgo bo zla ba'i tshul gyis 'dzin
T02D3305:151a-33: pa'o // padma la gza' lhag ser po mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:151a-34: sbal pa 'am thod pa la phur bu dkar po bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:151a-35: padma la pa sangs dkar po bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:151a-36: rus sbal la spen pa nag po dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:151a-37: sgra gcan dmar nag phyag dag gis nyi ma dang zla ba 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:151a-38: mjug rings nag po ral gri dang klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:151a-39: glang po la stobs bzangs dkar po ral gri dang gshol 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:151a-40: khu byug gi shing rta la rgyal bar byed pa
T02D3305:151b-0: ljang gu phyag bzhi pa @151b g-yas pa dag gis
T02D3305:151b-1: me tog gi phreng ba dang mda'/
T02D3305:151b-2: g-yon pa dag gis btung ba'i snod dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:151b-3: ne tso'i shing rta la sbrang rtsir byed pa dkar
T02D3305:151b-4: po phyag bzhi pa g-yas pa dag gis chu srin
T02D3305:151b-5: gyi rgyal mtshan dang mda'/ g-yon pa dag gis btung
T02D3305:151b-7: spre'u la dpyid kyi lha dkar po phyag bzhi pa g-yas pa dag gis mda' dang ral gri /
T02D3305:151b-8: g-yon pa dag gis gzhu dang btung ba'i snod 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:151b-9: mtha' yas dang nor rgyas dang 'jog po dang stobs
T02D3305:151b-10: rgyud dang padma dang padma chen po dang dung skyong
T02D3305:151b-11: dang / rigs ldan rnams ni sbrul gyi gdengs ka bdun dang ldan pa thal mo sbyar ba ste /
T02D3305:151b-12: yang na rang rang gi yab kyi phyag mtshan gtso bo dang ldan pas thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02D3305:151b-13: thags bzangs ris dang stobs ldan dang tshim byed la
T02D3305:151b-14: sogs pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams ni
T02D3305:151b-15: nag po g-yul 'gyed pa'i go cha gyon pa ral
T02D3305:151b-16: gri dang phub la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshon
T02D3305:151b-18: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po gshog pa rab tu brkyang ba pus mo'i bar du dkar pa /
T02D3305:151b-19: de'i steng nas lte ba'i bar du ser po lte ba'i steng nas mgrin pa'i bar du dmar po //
T02D3305:151b-20: de'i steng nas spyi bo'i bar nag po //
T02D3305:151b-21: phyag dag gis thal mo sbyar pa'o //
T02D3305:151b-22: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po dmar ser pi wang gi sgra sgrogs par brtson pa'o //
T02D3305:151b-23: dri za'i rgyal po zur phung lnga pa ser po pi wang gi sgra sgrogs pa'o //
T02D3305:151b-24: rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po don thams cad grub
T02D3305:151b-25: pa dkar po me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o
T02D3305:151b-26: // gang ba bzang po sngon po dang /
T02D3305:151b-27: nor bu bzang po ser po dang /
T02D3305:151b-29: rnam thos sras ser po dang /
T02D3305:151b-30: tsi bi kunda li dmar po dang /
T02D3305:151b-31: ki li ma l'i ljang gu dang sgo'i dbang po
T02D3305:151b-32: ser po dang spyod pa'i dbang po ser po ste
T02D3305:151b-33: / gang ba bzang po la sogs pa gnod sbyin
T02D3305:151b-34: gyi dbang po 'di rnams ni g-yas pa dang g-yon
T02D3305:151b-35: pa'i phyag dag gis b'i dza p'u ra ka'i 'bras
T02D3305:151b-37: 'phrog ma ser mo chad bu gnyis 'dzin pa bu dang bcas pa'o //
T02D3305:152a-2: gre me tog bri yang ku ltar ljang ser dang /
T02D3305:152a-20: tha skar la sogs pa'i lha 'di rnams ni g-yo
T02D3305:152a-21: ba dang bcas pa'i stod g-yogs yongs su 'dzin pa
T02D3305:152a-23: gzhan yang lha rnams ni 'khor los 'dren pa'i khang brtsegs la gnas par shes par bya ste /
T02D3305:152a-24: dbang po la sogs pa'i lha 'di rnams padma la gnas pa /
T02D3305:152a-25: re re 'ang 'khor dpag tu med pas bskor ba /
T02D3305:152a-26: 'byor ba ji lta ba bzhin du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po ches brgyan pa /
T02D3305:152a-27: dkyil 'khor gyi dbang po bcom ldan 'das la phyag
T02D3305:152a-28: 'tshal zhing bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra
T02D3305:152a-29: phyogs thams cad du sgrogs pa'o //
T02D3305:152a-30: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags
T02D3305:152a-31: kyu ma la sogs sgo skyong rnams ni snying po'i
T02D3305:152a-32: dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02D3305:152a-33: 'dir bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i
T02D3305:152a-34: rang bzhin 'jam pa'i dbyangs shin tu rnam par dag
T02D3305:152a-35: pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la rang dang
T02D3305:152a-36: 'dra pa'i rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D3305:152a-37: me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D3305:152a-38: rang bzhin mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin
T02D3305:152a-39: gshegs pa bzhi dang gtsug tor brgyad dang /
T02D3305:152a-40: spyan ma rnams la 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis so //
T02D3305:152a-41: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D3305:152a-44: sa ma bcu gnyis dang chos so so yang dag
T02D3305:152a-45: par rig pa dang sgeg mo dang kun du bzang
T02D3305:152a-46: mo la sogs pa bzhi dang khro bo bcu dang
T02D3305:152a-47: me tog ma dang gzugs ma dang shar phyogs na
T02D3305:152a-48: gnas pa'i lha rnams la mi bskyod pas so //
T02D3305:152a-49: rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa bzhi dang rdo
T02D3305:152a-50: rje zhags pa dang pha rol tu phyin ma bcu
T02D3305:152a-51: gnyis dang / don so so yang dag par rig ma dang /
T02D3305:152a-52: phreng ba ma dang nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa
T02D3305:152a-53: bzhi dang bdug spos ma dang sgra ma dang lho
T02D3305:152b-0: phyogs na gnas pa'i @152b lha rnams la rin chen
T02D3305:152b-2: rdo rje chos la sogs pa bzhi dang gos dkar
T02D3305:152b-3: mo dang rdo rje lcags sgrog dang tshe dang dbang
T02D3305:152b-4: ma bcu gnyis dang nges pa'i tshig so so yang
T02D3305:152b-5: dag par rig ma dang glu ma dang spyan ras
T02D3305:152b-6: gzigs la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D3305:152b-7: mar me ma dang ro ma dang nub phyogs na
T02D3305:152b-8: gnas pa'i lha rnams la 'od dpag med kyis so
T02D3305:152b-9: // rdo rje las rab la sogs pa bzhi dang sgrol ma dang rdo rje 'bebs pa dang /
T02D3305:152b-11: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig ma dang /
T02D3305:152b-12: gar ma dang 'od dpag med la sogs pa bzhi
T02D3305:152b-13: dang dri chab ma dang reg bya rdo rje ma
T02D3305:152b-14: dang byang phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la don
T02D3305:152b-15: yod grub pas rgyas btab po //
T02D3305:152b-16: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni mu:'o //
T02D3305:152b-17: aom aa aa: sarba ta th'a ga t'a hri da ya ha ra ha ra /
T02D3305:152b-18: aom h'um hr'i: bha ga w'a na dzny'a na m'u rti w'a g'i shva ra /
T02D3305:152b-20: sarba dha rma ga ga na aa ma la su
T02D3305:152b-21: pa ri shuddha dha rma dh'a tu dzny'a na grbha
T02D3305:152b-22: aa: zhes pa snying po'i sngags so //
T02D3305:152b-23: aom aa mri ta kunda li bhi ghn'anha ka h'um /
T02D3305:152b-24: zhes pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o //
T02D3305:152b-25: ngan song yongs su spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo
T02D3305:152b-26: rje gur gyi nang du rlung dang me dang chu
T02D3305:152b-27: dang sa dang ri rab kyi steng gi gzhal yas
T02D3305:152b-29: nang gi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa ser po//
T02D3305:152b-30: rdo rje phred ba sngon pos yongs su bskor ba
T02D3305:152b-31: ste 'ga' zhig 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa sngon por
T02D3305:152b-32: gsungs la / gzhan du ni 'di'i 'khor lo'i lte ba sngon po dang /
T02D3305:152b-33: rtsibs rnams kyi shar dkar po dang /
T02D3305:152b-36: byang ljang gu'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D3305:152b-37: 'khor lo'i lte par sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i seng ge'i steng du /
T02D3305:152b-38: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya ser ge rnam par snang mdzad
T02D3305:152b-39: chen po gser gyi mdog can chos kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D3305:152b-41: shar gyi rtsibs la rdo rje gtsug tor dkar po sa gnon gyi phyag rgya can no //
T02D3305:152b-42: lho'i rtsibs la rin chen gtsug tor sngon po mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya can no //
T02D3305:152b-43: nub kyi rtsibs la padma gtsug tor dmar po bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya can no //
T02D3305:152b-44: byang gi rtsibs la sna tshogs gtsug tor ljang gu mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'o //
T02D3305:152b-45: me'i rtsibs la gzi brjid gtsug tor dkar dmar 'dres
T02D3305:152b-46: pa'i mdog can phyag g-yas pas nyi ma 'dzin cing
T02D3305:153a-2: bden bral gyi rtsibs la rgyal mtshan gtsug tor dmar
T02D3305:153a-3: po dang 'dres pa'i nag po phyag dag gis yid
T02D3305:153a-4: bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:153a-5: rlung gi rtsibs la rnon po'i gtsug tor nam mkha'
T02D3305:153a-6: ltar sngo bsangs phyag g-yas pa ral gri dang g-yon
T02D3305:153a-8: dbang ldan gyi rtsibs la gdugs can gtsug tor dkar po phyag dag gis gdugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:153a-9: rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol me la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:153a-10: mtshams rnams su sgeg mo dang phreng ba dang glu
T02D3305:153a-11: ma dang gar ma rnams ni /
T02D3305:153a-12: dkar mo dang ser mo dang dmar mo dang /
T02D3305:153a-13: sna tshogs kyi mdog can phyag gnyis ma'o //
T02D3305:153a-14: snam bu rnams la sgo'i g-yon du byang chub sems dpa' gnyis dang g-yas gnyis te /
T02D3305:153a-15: de yang shar gyi snam bu la byams pa ser po g-yas pas klu shing gi me tog dang /
T02D3305:153a-16: g-yon pas spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:153a-17: mthong pa don yod ser po phyag g-yas pas spyan dang bcas pa'i padma 'dzin zhing /
T02D3305:153a-18: g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang /
T02D3305:153a-19: ngan song kun 'dren dkar po phyag gnyis kyis lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:153a-20: mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms
T02D3305:153a-21: pa'i blo gros dkar ser bsres pa'i mdog can phyag
T02D3305:153a-23: g-yon pa'i khu tshur bkur brten pa'o //
T02D3305:153a-24: lho phyogs su spos kyi glang po dkar ljang g-yas pas dri'i dung chos 'dzin zhing /
T02D3305:153a-25: g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang /
T02D3305:153a-26: dpa' bar 'gro ba dkar po g-yas pa ral gri 'dzin zhing /
T02D3305:153a-27: g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang /
T02D3305:153a-28: nam mkha'i mdzod dkar ser g-yas pa padma la gnas pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin zhing /
T02D3305:153a-29: g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang /
T02D3305:153a-30: ye shes tog sngon po phyag g-yas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin zhing /
T02D3305:153a-31: g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa'o //
T02D3305:153a-32: nub tu bdud rtsi'i 'od dkar po g-yas pa cod
T02D3305:153a-33: pan gyi steng du bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin zhing
T02D3305:153a-34: / g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang /
T02D3305:153a-35: zla ba'i 'od dkar po g-yas pa padma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs 'dzin zhing /
T02D3305:153a-36: g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang /
T02D3305:153a-37: bzang skyong dkar po g-yas pa 'bar ba'i 'od can gyi rin po che 'dzin zhing /
T02D3305:153a-38: g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang dra ba
T02D3305:153b-0: @153b can gyi 'od dkar po g-yas pa rdo rje'i
T02D3305:153b-1: gur 'dzin zhing / g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa'o //
T02D3305:153b-2: byang du rdo rje snying po sngo skya g-yas pa
T02D3305:153b-3: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i autpala sngon po 'dzin zhing
T02D3305:153b-4: / g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang /
T02D3305:153b-5: blo gros mi zad pa dkar po phyag gnyis kyis
T02D3305:153b-6: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin pa dang
T02D3305:153b-7: / spobs pa brtsegs pa dmar po g-yas pa chu
T02D3305:153b-8: skyes la gnas pa'i rin po che brtsegs pa 'dzin
T02D3305:153b-9: / zhing / g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang /
T02D3305:153b-10: kun du bzang po gser gyi mdog can phyag g-yas
T02D3305:153b-11: pa rin po che'i snye ma 'dzin pa'i khu tshur
T02D3305:153b-12: 'khur brten pa'o // dkyil 'khor gyi me la sogs
T02D3305:153b-13: pa'i mtshams rnams su me tog ma dang bdug spos
T02D3305:153b-14: ma dang mar me ma dang dri chab ma rnams
T02D3305:153b-15: ni dkar mo dang nag mo dang dmar mo dang
T02D3305:153b-16: ljang gu ste me tog la sogs pa 'dzin pa'o
T02D3305:153b-17: 'khur brten pa'o // // sgo rnams la shar du
T02D3305:153b-18: rdo rje lcags kyu dkar po phyag gnyis kyis lcags
T02D3305:153b-20: lhor rdo rje zhags pa sngon po phyag gnyis kyis zhags pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:153b-21: nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:153b-22: byang du rdo rje 'bebs pa ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:153b-23: lha sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di rnams kyang rnam
T02D3305:153b-24: pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po ches brgyan
T02D3305:153b-25: pa rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02D3305:153b-26: spyan gnyis pa phyag gnyis pa sna tshogs chu skyes
T02D3305:153b-27: dang zla ba rnams la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis
T02D3305:153b-28: bzhugs pa'o // 'dir rnam par snang mdzad chen po
T02D3305:153b-29: la rang dang 'dra ba'i rnam par snang mdzad kyis
T02D3305:153b-30: bzhugs pa'o // rgyas btab pa'o // rdo rje gtsug
T02D3305:153b-31: tor la sogs pa bzhi la rnam par snang mdzad
T02D3305:153b-32: bzhugs pa'o // rgyas btab pa'o // chen pos so
T02D3305:153b-33: // shar phyogs dang me mtshams na gnas pa'i lha
T02D3305:153b-34: rnams la rdo rje gtsug tor gyis so //
T02D3305:153b-35: lho phyogs dang bden bral gyi mtshams na gnas pa rnams la rin chen gtsug tor gyis so //
T02D3305:153b-36: nub phyogs dang rlung gi mtshams na gnas pa rnams la padma gtsug tor gyis so //
T02D3305:153b-37: byang phyogs dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams na gnas pa rnams la sna tshogs gtsug tor gyis so //
T02D3305:153b-38: 'dir phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gnas kyi snam bu
T02D3305:153b-39: la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa brgyad po
T02D3305:153b-40: blta bar bya'o zhes sbyong rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyir
T02D3305:154a-1: la byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug dgod pa ni yang dag par rigs so //
T02D3305:154a-2: kha cig ni nang gi dkyil 'khor zhes rgyud las
T02D3305:154a-3: gsungs pas phyi'i gzhal yas khang gi nang du gzhal
T02D3305:154a-4: yas khang gnyis pa'o zhes smra'o //
T02D3305:154a-5: 'ga' zhig tu ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po
T02D3305:154a-6: la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgu po gtsug
T02D3305:154a-7: tor dang bcas pa dge slong gi cha lugs 'dzin
T02D3305:154a-9: de ni mi rigs te chags pa dang ldan pa'i
T02D3305:154a-10: gzugs can 'khor los sgyur pa'i gzugs su mngon par
T02D3305:154a-11: sprul ba'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i phyir
T02D3305:154a-12: ro // padma'i phreng bas yongs su bskor pa dang /
T02D3305:154a-13: khor yug gi nang du dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas
T02D3305:154a-14: brtsams te g-yas skor gyis mgrin ba sngon po la
T02D3305:154a-15: sogs pa dgod par bya ste /
T02D3305:154a-16: de nas dbang ldan nas glang la mgrin pa sngon
T02D3305:154a-17: po dkar po sprul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can
T02D3305:154a-18: / phyag g-yas pa dag na rdo rje dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D3305:154a-19: g-yon pa dag na rtse gsum dang ral gri'o //
T02D3305:154a-20: nam mkha' lding la khyab 'jug nag po g-yas pa dag na dbyug to dang rdo rje dang /
T02D3305:154a-21: g-yon pa dag na dung dang 'khor lo'o //
T02D3305:154a-22: rdo rje gser ma khyab 'jug lta bu ste khyad par ni gser gyi mdog can no //
T02D3305:154a-23: rma bya la rdo rje dril bu zhal drug pa
T02D3305:154a-24: dmar po g-yas pa dag na shakti dang rdo rje
T02D3305:154a-25: dang / g-yon pa dag na khyim bya dang rdo rje dril bu'o //
T02D3305:154a-26: rdo rje gzhon nu ma ni rdo rje dril bu lta bu'o //
T02D3305:154a-27: ngang pa la mi smra rdo rje ser po zhal bzhi pa /
T02D3305:154a-28: g-yas pa dag na rdo rje dang bgrang phreng dang /
T02D3305:154a-29: g-yon pa dag na dbyug pa dang spyi blugs so //
T02D3305:154a-30: rdo rje zhi ba ma ni tshangs pa lta bu'o //
T02D3305:154a-31: so ldan gyi dbang po dkar po mche ba drug pa dang /
T02D3305:154a-32: zla ba rdo rje mtshon cha ser po phyag g-yas
T02D3305:154a-33: pas rdo rje 'dzin zhing g-yon pas rdo rje dkur
T02D3305:154a-34: brten pa'o // lha mo rdo rje khu tshur ma ni rdo rje mtshon cha lta bu'o //
T02D3305:154a-35: rta bdun gyi shing rta la rdo rje 'khyil pa
T02D3305:154a-36: khro bo dmar po phyag g-yas pa na padma dang
T02D3305:154a-37: / g-yon pa na padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D3305:154a-38: rdo rje bdud rtsi ma ni rdo rje 'khyil pa lta bu'o //
T02D3305:154a-39: ngang pa la rdo rje'i 'od khro bo dkar po //
T02D3305:154a-40: g-yas pa na rdo rje dang g-yon pa na padma
T02D3305:154a-41: la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang
T02D3305:154a-42: / rdo rje mdog ma ni rdo rje'i 'od lta bu'o //
T02D3305:154a-43: ral rdo rje dmar ser khro bo dmar po phyag
T02D3305:154a-44: g-yas na rdo rje dang g-yon pas mi bzung nas
T02D3305:154b-0: rdo rje ska rags ma ni rdo rje @154b dmar ser lta bu'o //
T02D3305:154b-1: padma la rdo rje zhi ba khro bo ser po mda' dang gzhu can no //
T02D3305:154b-2: rdo rje zhi ba ma ni rdo rje zhi ba lta bu'o //
T02D3305:154b-3: sbal pa la rdo rje bla ma khro bo ser po bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa /
T02D3305:154b-4: rdo rje bla ma ma ni rdo rje bla ma lta bu'o //
T02D3305:154b-5: padma la rdo rje ba sangs khro bo dkar po bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:154b-6: rdo rje pa sangs ma ni rdo rje pa sangs lta bu'o //
T02D3305:154b-7: rus sbal la rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo nag
T02D3305:154b-8: po g-yas pa na rdo rje dang g-yon pa na
T02D3305:154b-9: dbyug pa'o // rdo rje dbyug pa ma ni rdo rje dbyug pa lta bu'o //
T02D3305:154b-10: rdo rje sgra gcan khro bo dmar nag g-yas pa
T02D3305:154b-11: dang g-yon pa'i phyag dag na zla ba dang nyi
T02D3305:154b-13: rdo rje lha min mo ni rdo rje sgra gcan lta bu'o //
T02D3305:154b-14: rdo rje mjug rings khro bo nag po ral gri dang klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:154b-15: rdo rje klu mo rdo rje mjug rings lta bu'o //
T02D3305:154b-16: bzhi po 'di dag dang rdo rje zhi ba la
T02D3305:154b-17: sogs pa drug ni rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa ltar
T02D3305:154b-18: bris pa'o // glang po che la rdo rje glang
T02D3305:154b-19: sna dkar po g-yas pa na rdo rje dang g-yon
T02D3305:154b-21: rdo rje 'dul pa ma ni rdo rje glang sna
T02D3305:154b-22: lta bu ste khyad par ni g-yas pas kha tv'am
T02D3305:154b-23: ga'o // khu byug gi shing rta la rdo rje
T02D3305:154b-24: phreng pa can ljang gu g-yas pa na rdo rje
T02D3305:154b-25: ga'o // dang / g-yon ba na me tog gi phreng ba'i //
T02D3305:154b-26: rdo rje gdan ma ni rdo rje phreng ba can
T02D3305:154b-27: lta bu ste khyad par ni phyag g-yon na shakti'o
T02D3305:154b-28: // ne tso'i shing rta la rdo rje dbang can ser po g-yas na rdo rje dang /
T02D3305:154b-29: g-yon na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan no //
T02D3305:154b-30: rdo rje dbang can ma ni rdo rje dbang can
T02D3305:154b-31: lta bu ste khyad par ni sku mdog dmar mo'o
T02D3305:154b-32: // sbal pa'i shing rta la rnam bar rgyal ba'i
T02D3305:154b-33: rdo rje dkar po rdo rje dang ral gri 'dzin
T02D3305:154b-34: // pa'o // rdo rje gdan ma ni rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba lta bu'o //
T02D3305:154b-35: me tog gi shing rta la rdo rje gtun shing
T02D3305:154b-36: ser po g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis rdo
T02D3305:154b-38: rdo rje pho nya mo ni rdo rje gtun shing
T02D3305:154b-39: lta bu ste g-yon pas kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa
T02D3305:154b-41: ra la rdo rje ma dmar mo g-yas pa dag na rdo rje dang go cha /
T02D3305:154b-42: g-yon pas dbyug pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:154b-43: rdo rje 'bar ba ma ni rdo rje me lta bu'o //
T02D3305:154b-44: ma he la rdo rje dus nag po rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:154b-45: ro langs la rdo rje dus ma nag mo rdo rje dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:154b-46: klu lhag ma rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu sngon
T02D3305:154b-47: po phag gi gdong pa can rdo rje dang lcags
T02D3305:155a-0: kyu 'dzin pa'o // skyes bu la rdo rje gdong @155a * //
T02D3305:155a-1: ma sngon mo phag pa'i gdong can ma rdo rje dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:155a-2: chu srin la rdo rje klu dkar po gdengs ka brgyad dang ldan pa g-yas na rdo rje dang /
T02D3305:155a-3: g-yon na klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:155a-4: chu srin la rdo rje chu srin ma dkar mo
T02D3305:155a-5: gdengs ka brgyad dang ldan pa g-yas na rdo rje
T02D3305:155a-6: dang / g-yon na rdo rjes mtshan pa'i chu srin can no //
T02D3305:155a-7: ri dvags la rdo rje rlung sngon po g-yas na rdo rje dang g-yon na rlung ras can no //
T02D3305:155a-8: rdo rje shugs can ma ni rdo rje rlung lta bu'o //
T02D3305:155a-9: ro langs la rdo rje 'jigs byed sngon po rdo rje dang dbyug to 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:155a-10: rdo rje rnam par gtsigs ma ni rdo rje 'jigs byed lta bu'o //
T02D3305:155a-11: g-yon pas zhags pa 'dzin pa na khyad par ro //
T02D3305:155a-12: byi ba la rdo rje legs 'dren dkar po glang
T02D3305:155a-13: po che'i gdong can phyag g-yas pa ngag gis rdo
T02D3305:155a-15: g-yon pa dag gis rtse gsum dang dbyug to 'dzin pa sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can no //
T02D3305:155a-16: byi ba la srul mo sngon mo g-yas pa na rdo rje dang g-yon pas /
T02D3305:155a-18: sdigs ma ljang gu g-yas pa na rdo rje dang g-yon pa na ral gri 'gegs byed 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:155a-19: dpal mo ser mo g-yas pa na rdo rje dang g-yon pa na padma can no //
T02D3305:155a-20: dbyangs can ma dkar mo g-yas pa na rdo rje dang g-yon pa na pi wang can no //
T02D3305:155a-21: seng ge la bgrad dka' ma ljang gu g-yas pa dag na rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang /
T02D3305:155a-22: g-yon pa dag na lda man dang ral gri can no //
T02D3305:155a-23: 'dir mgrin pa sngon po la sogs pa'i lha rnams
T02D3305:155a-24: kyi phyag g-yas pa rnams su ji ltar 'byung ba'i
T02D3305:155a-25: rdo rje rnams ni rtsa mo gsum par rig par
T02D3305:155a-26: bya'o // nub tu rdo rje klu dang nye bar
T02D3305:155a-27: padma la sa'i lha mo gser gyi mdog can phyag
T02D3305:155a-28: dag gis bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:155a-29: lha ma yin rnams ni sna tshogs pa'i mdog can
T02D3305:155a-30: go cha dang bcas pa ral gri 'dzin pa ras
T02D3305:155a-32: klu rnams ni nor bu dang ldan pa'i gdengs ka
T02D3305:155a-33: can btsun mo dang bcas pa thal mo sbyar ba'o
T02D3305:155a-34: // khor yug gi phyi rol mtshams rnams su mer
T02D3305:155a-35: ma nar med la sogs pa'i dmyal ba rnams dang
T02D3305:155a-36: // / bden bral du yi dags kyi 'gro ba rnams dang /
T02D3305:155a-37: rlung du byol song gi 'gro ba rnams dang /
T02D3305:155a-38: dbang ldan du mi'i 'gro ba rnams gnas pa ste /
T02D3305:155a-39: rim pa 'di ni rgyud gzhan las bris pa'o //
T02D3305:155a-40: gzhan dag ni rdo rje 'jigs byed dang nye bar
T02D3305:155b-0: sa'i lha mo dang gnod sbyin rnams @155b dang nye
T02D3305:155b-1: bar lha ma yin rnams so zhes rjod par byed
T02D3305:155b-2: do // 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi thugs gar zla
T02D3305:155b-3: ba la aom mu ne mu ne ma h'a mu
T02D3305:155b-5: zhes pa'i sngags te 'di nyid ni snying pa'o //
T02D3305:155b-6: aom na mo bha ga wa te sarba du rga
T02D3305:155b-7: ti ba ri sho dha na r'a dz'a ya ta
T02D3305:155b-12: aom sho dha ne sho dha ne /
T02D3305:155b-13: sarba p'a pam sho dha ne shuddhe bi shu ddhe /
T02D3305:155b-14: sarba krma a'a ba ra na bi shuddhe sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:155b-15: zhes pa phreng pa'i sngags so //
T02D3305:155b-17: aom sarba bita sarba aa p'a ya gti ha na bi sho dha ni h'um ho: phat /
T02D3305:155b-18: ces pa ste las thams cad pa'o //
T02D3305:155b-19: aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes pa ni gzhan dag go //
T02D3305:155b-20: 'byung bo 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje
T02D3305:155b-21: gur gyi nang ri rab kyi steng sna tshogs chu
T02D3305:155b-22: skyes kyi ze'u 'brul gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i
T02D3305:155b-23: lte ba'i steng du gzhal yas khang gi lte ba
T02D3305:155b-24: la glang po che'i rgyal po'i steng ngam /
T02D3305:155b-25: glang po che dang bral ba yang rung sna tshogs
T02D3305:155b-26: padma dang zla ba la gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i
T02D3305:155b-27: 'byung po chen po dkar po zla ba phyed pas
T02D3305:155b-28: mtshan pa'i ral ba'i thor cog dang /
T02D3305:155b-30: thod pa lnga dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:155b-34: sprul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa dang bcas pa stag gi pags pa'i smad g-yogs can /
T02D3305:155b-35: lag pa bzhi'i g-yas pa dag gis gri gug dang da ma ru 'dzin zhing /
T02D3305:155b-36: g-yon pa dag gis thod pa dang rtse gsum 'dzin pa drag po ste /
T02D3305:155b-37: de g-yon brkyang gis mnan pa'i 'byung po 'dul byed
T02D3305:155b-38: drag po chen po sku mdog sngon po thong pa
T02D3305:155b-39: lngas mtshan pa'i cod pan la de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D3305:155b-40: lnga'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:155b-41: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du bcings pa na bza'
T02D3305:155b-42: sngon po mnabs pa mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal can
T02D3305:155b-43: bzhad pa'i gang rgyangs can spyan gsum dmar la zlum
T02D3305:155b-44: pa / phyag bzhi'i g-yas pas rdo rje sngon po kha gyes pa gsor zhing /
T02D3305:155b-45: g-yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa /
T02D3305:155b-46: gnyis kyis phyag rgya bcings pa ste /
T02D3305:155b-47: phyag rgya ni ming med gnyis bsnol nas mdzub mo
T02D3305:155b-48: gnyis bskum ste mthe'u chung dang gung mo yang mthe
T02D3305:155b-49: bong rgan pas mnan pa'o zhes pa 'di gsungs so
T02D3305:155b-50: // klu'i rgyal po chen po brgyad kyis brgyan pa ste /
T02D3305:155b-51: de'ang stobs kyi rgyu sngon pos spyi bo bcings pa /
T02D3305:156a-1: dang nyer dga' ser pos rna rgyan /
T02D3305:156a-2: mtha' yas dkar pos tshangs skud /
T02D3305:156a-3: nor rgyas dkar pos ska rags /
T02D3305:156a-4: phyag rgya'i phyag dag gi dpung par ni rigs ldan phug ron gyi mdog can /
T02D3305:156a-5: phyag gzhan pa gnyis kyi dpung pa la dung skyong dkar po //
T02D3305:156a-6: rkang gdub dag ni padma dang padma chen po dmar po //
T02D3305:156a-7: re'u mig rnams la shar du glang dang nyi ma
T02D3305:156a-8: la dbang phyug chen po dkar po mtshan ma gyen
T02D3305:156a-9: du langs pa thod pa'i phreng ba can /
T02D3305:156a-10: spyan gsum pa zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa'i ral
T02D3305:156a-11: pa'i thor cog can sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa
T02D3305:156a-12: dang bcas pa / phyag bzhi'i g-yas pa dag gis gri gug dang da ma ru 'dzin zhing /
T02D3305:156a-13: g-yon pa dag gis thod pa dang rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:156a-14: lhor nam mkha' lding dang nyi ma la khyab 'jug
T02D3305:156a-15: nag po rin po che'i con pan can g-yas pa
T02D3305:156a-16: dag gis rnga yab dang dung 'dzin zhing /
T02D3305:156a-17: g-yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang dbyug to 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:156a-18: nub tu ngang pa dang zla pa la tshangs pa dkar po zhal bzhi pa /
T02D3305:156a-20: g-yas pa dag gis bgrang phreng dang gdugs kyi yu ba 'dzin zhing /
T02D3305:156a-21: g-yon pa dag gis padma dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:156a-22: byad du rma bya dang nyi ma la smin drug
T02D3305:156a-23: gi bu dmar po gtsug phud gsum dang ldan pa
T02D3305:156a-26: dbang ldan du byi pa dang zla ba la tshogs
T02D3305:156a-27: bdag dkar po glang po che'i gdod pa can spyan
T02D3305:156a-28: gsum pa spyi bor zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa
T02D3305:156a-29: g-yas pa dag gis la phug dang dgra sta /
T02D3305:156a-30: g-yon pa dag gis rtse gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:156a-31: mer nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la nyi ma dmar po
T02D3305:156a-32: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis padma la gnas
T02D3305:156a-34: bden bral du shing rta la gnas pa'i nyi ma
T02D3305:156a-35: dang zla ba la sgra gcan dbu skra dmar ser
T02D3305:156a-36: gyen du 'bar ba mig dang smin ma dang smin
T02D3305:156a-37: ma dang smar dmar ser 'bar ba /
T02D3305:156a-38: mche ba bzhi pa zhal gdangs pa phyag dag gis
T02D3305:156a-39: nyi ma dang zla bar bcas pas thal mo sbyar
T02D3305:156a-40: ba'o // rlung du zla ba la dga' byed dbang phyug ser po gar byed pa /
T02D3305:156a-41: spyi bor zla ba phyed pa can sprul gyi mchod spyir thogs pa dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:156a-42: g-yas pa dang cig shos dag gis da ma ru dang rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:156a-43: rim pa gnyis pa'i shar phyogs su zla ba la
T02D3305:156a-44: dpal mo dkar mo thugs kar thal mo sbyar bas
T02D3305:156b-1: lho ru zla ba la thig le mchog ma dmar mo spos snod 'dzin zhing gar byed pa'o //
T02D3305:156b-2: nub tu zla ba la ri bong can ma dmar mo mar me 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:156b-3: byang du zla ba la dka' zlog ma ser mo
T02D3305:156b-4: spyi bor gdengs ka'i rnam par byas pa'i lag pa
T02D3305:156b-6: mer zla ba la rin chen dpal mo dmar mo dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:156b-7: bden bral du zla ba la dbyangs can ma ljang gu pi wang sgrogs pa'o //
T02D3305:156b-8: rlung du zla ba la lha mdzes ma nag po rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:156b-9: dbang ldan du zla ba la kun 'byor ma ser
T02D3305:156b-10: mo gar byed cing phyag na rdo rje rtse gsum
T02D3305:156b-11: pa 'dzin pa'o // rim pa gsum pa'i gar dus
T02D3305:156b-12: srung dkar po dang zla ba la brgya byin ser
T02D3305:156b-13: po rin po che'i cod pan can g-yas pas mi
T02D3305:156b-14: 'jigs pa sbyin zhing g-yon pa rdo rje'i mtshon cha
T02D3305:156b-15: pa 'dzin pa'o // can no // lhor ma he
T02D3305:156b-16: dang nyi ma la gshin rje nag po gsus pa
T02D3305:156b-18: spyan dang smin ma dang smar dang ral pa dmar
T02D3305:156b-20: ser can / gos ser po gyon pa g-yas pa
T02D3305:156b-21: thod pas mtshan pa'i dbyug pa 'dzin zhing /
T02D3305:156b-22: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas bas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:156b-23: nub tu lag 'gro dang zla ba la chu lha dkar po gdengs ka bdun dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:156b-24: g-yon pas klu'i zhags pa 'dzin zhing g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa'o //
T02D3305:156b-25: byang du gnod sbyin la gnas pa'i lus ngan ser
T02D3305:156b-26: po sha rgyas shing gsus pa 'phyang ba rin po
T02D3305:156b-28: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis dbyug to dang ne'u le 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:156b-29: mer ra dang nyi ma la me lha dmar po ral pa dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:156b-30: skra dang smar ser zhing 'bar ba /
T02D3305:156b-32: ril ba dang mchod phyir thogs pa can /
T02D3305:156b-33: g-yas pa dag gis mchog sbyin dang bgrang phreng 'dzin zhing /
T02D3305:156b-34: g-yon pa dag gis dbyug gu gsum pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:156b-35: bden bral du ro langs dang nyi ma la srin po nag po smar ser po can /
T02D3305:156b-36: g-yas pas ral gri dang g-yon pas mi shas gang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:156b-37: rlung du ri dags dang zla ba la rlung lha
T02D3305:156b-38: sngon po gtsug phud gsum dang ldan pa phyag dag
T02D3305:156b-40: dbang ldan du ngang pa dang zla ba la zla
T02D3305:156b-41: ba dkar po g-yon pa na ku mu ta na
T02D3305:156b-42: gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D3305:156b-44: dbang ldan du dbang ldan yang dbang phyug chen po lta bu'o //
T02D3305:157a-1: du zla ba la seng ge'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin ma dkar mo seng ge'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:157a-2: lho ru zla ba la rnam par 'byor ma dmar mo lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:157a-3: nub tu padma la ldan ma chen mo dkar mo gzhu dang mda' 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:157a-4: byang du zla ba la chang mchog ma dmar mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:157a-5: dbang ldan du zla ba la mchog 'phrog ma dmar
T02D3305:157a-6: mo thugs kar me tog dang bcas pa'i thal mo
T02D3305:157a-7: sbyar ba'o // mer zla ba la rin chen dbang phyug ma ser mo spos phor 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:157a-8: bden bral du zla ba la rgyal mtshan ma ser mo dri'i dung chos 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:157a-9: rlung du zla ba la 'gro skyod ma ser mo mar me'i mchod sdong 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:157a-10: 'dir gang la khyad par gyi tshig med pa der
T02D3305:157a-11: ni nyi ma dang zla ba thams cad sna tshogs
T02D3305:157a-13: lha thams cad sems dpa'i skyil krung /
T02D3305:157a-14: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po ches brgyan pa'o //
T02D3305:157a-15: 'dir 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi rigs kyi dbang po
T02D3305:157a-16: ni mi bskyod pa ste thugs ka'i sa bon ni
T02D3305:157a-17: h'um ngo // h'um badzra phat ces pa ni snying po ste /
T02D3305:157a-19: aom bh'u ta d'a ma ra bh'u ta aa dhi
T02D3305:157a-20: pa ti aaksha bhya:ki r'i di na sarbba bh'u ta
T02D3305:157a-21: pre ta pi sh'a tsa na s'a dha ya h'um
T02D3305:157a-23: las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang 'di nyid de yang na bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags so //
T02D3305:157a-24: mkha' 'gro lnga'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje'i sa gzhi
T02D3305:157a-25: la sogs pa nas gzhal yas khang gi mthar thug
T02D3305:157a-26: pa sngar gyi 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhin
T02D3305:157a-27: no // de la dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi
T02D3305:157a-28: dbus su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste
T02D3305:157a-29: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su goo r'i la
T02D3305:157a-31: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su pukka s'i la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D3305:157a-32: de yang goo r'i dkar mo g-yas pa lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:157a-33: tsoo r'i ser mo zhags pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:157a-34: be ta l'i dmar mo lcags sgrog 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:157a-35: ghasma r'i ljang gu dril bu 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:157a-36: pukka s'i sngon mo byang chub kyi sems kyi bum pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:157a-37: sha pa r'i dkar mo ri rab 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:157a-38: tsanda l'i sngon mo me thab 'dzin pa dang /
T02D3305:157a-39: dombi n'i sna tshogs mdog can rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:157a-40: shar gyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su zla ba la sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro dkar mo ste /
T02D3305:157b-0: rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po g-yon pa @157b dmar po
T02D3305:157b-1: lhag ma rnams sngon po g-yas pa'i thod pa brgyad
T02D3305:157b-2: po rnams na rma bya dang ma he dang chu
T02D3305:157b-4: glang po che dang rus sbal dang klu lhag ma can dang /
T02D3305:157b-5: dang pa rnams dang g-yon pa'i thod pa brgyad po rnams na dpyid dang /
T02D3305:157b-7: sbrul ha la ha la dang /
T02D3305:157b-8: a'anydza na bho dang byi ba dang g-yag dang dri can dang ts'a ta ka rnams so //
T02D3305:157b-9: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams dang dbang ldan la
T02D3305:157b-10: sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su rim pa ji lta bar
T02D3305:157b-12: de yang skam pa ma sngon mo skam pa 'dzin pa dang /

T02D3305:160b-9: pa'i phyag dag gis sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma ljang

T02D3305:160b-12: gyi dbang phyug dang rnam par snang mdzad dang rdo
T02D3305:160b-13: rje sems dpa' rnams ljang gu ste sna tshogs rdo
T02D3305:160b-14: rje dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i dril bu 'dzin pa'i
T02D3305:160b-15: phyag dag gis shin tu dpa' mo dang stobs chen
T02D3305:160b-16: mo dang 'khor los sgyur ma dang brtson 'grus chen
T02D3305:160b-17: mo du ba ltar sngo skya'i mdog can rnams la
T02D3305:160b-18: 'khyud pa'o // dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni g-yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3305:160b-19: 'dir mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa ni g-yon pas
T02D3305:160b-20: thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang g-yas pas da
T02D3305:160b-22: ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dang rab tu gtum mo
T02D3305:160b-23: la sogs pa bzhi ni phyag g-yas pas rdo rje
T02D3305:160b-24: dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub gdengs pa'o //
T02D3305:160b-25: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma dang dpa' bo'i blo can
T02D3305:160b-26: ma la sogs pa rnams ni 'khor lo dang bcas
T02D3305:160b-28: rin chen mkha' 'gro ma dang sa srung ma la
T02D3305:160b-29: sogs pa rnams ni rin po che dang bcas pa'i
T02D3305:160b-30: sdigs mdzub po // padma'i mkha' 'gro ma dang bsngo
T02D3305:160b-31: bsangs lha mo la sogs pa rnams ni padma dang
T02D3305:160b-33: rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang 'khor lo'i shugs can ma
T02D3305:160b-34: la sogs pa ni rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sdigs
T02D3305:160b-35: mdzub bo // sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma dang shin
T02D3305:160b-36: tu dpa' mo la sogs pa rnams ni sna tshogs
T02D3305:160b-37: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub bo //
T02D3305:160b-38: ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa thams cad
T02D3305:160b-39: kyang 'khyud par byed pa g-yon pa'i phyag dag gis
T02D3305:160b-40: 'dzag pa'i khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa'o
T02D3305:160b-41: // dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo rnams la khva gdong
T02D3305:160b-42: ma dang 'ug gdong ma dad kyi gdong ma dang
T02D3305:160b-43: phag gdong ma rnams ni ming dang rjes su mthun
T02D3305:160b-44: pa'i zhal can te rim pa ji lta bar sngon
T02D3305:160b-45: mo dang ser mo dang dmar mo dang ljang gu'i
T02D3305:161a-1: pa rnams kyis lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang lcags sgrog dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:161a-2: mtshams rnams la gshin rje brtan ma dang shin rje
T02D3305:161a-3: pho nya mo dang gshin rje mche ba ma dang
T02D3305:161a-4: gshin rje 'joms ma rnams ni mi'i gdong can te
