T02D3305:161a-6: phyag g-yas pa rnams kyis me long dang pi wang dang dri'i dung chos dang ro'i snod 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:161a-7: lha mo brgyad po 'di dag kyang g-yon pas thod
T02D3305:161a-8: pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa g-yas brkyang gis
T02D3305:161a-9: gnas pa'o // gzhal yas khang drug po rnams kyi
T02D3305:161a-10: mtshams rnams su byang chub kyi sems la sogs pas
T02D3305:161a-11: gang ba'i thod pa rnams ni sna tshogs chu skyes
T02D3305:161a-12: gnas pa'o // la gnas pa'o // mkha' 'gro ma
T02D3305:161a-13: la sogs pa nas gshin rje 'joms ma'i mthar thug
T02D3305:161a-14: pa rnams ni sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la
T02D3305:161a-15: gnas pa'i ro rnams la bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3305:161a-16: 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyang ro la gnas pa'o zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no //
T02D3305:161a-17: lha pho rnams ni sku rgyab tu 'phyang ba'i stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs dkris pa /
T02D3305:161a-18: mchod phyir thogs pa can mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba mgrin pa la 'phyang ba /
T02D3305:161a-19: ral pa nag po'i thor cog can no //
T02D3305:161a-20: lha mo rnams ni gcer bu dbu skra nag po
T02D3305:161a-21: grol zhing mi mgo skam po'i phreng ba mgrin par
T02D3305:161a-22: 'phyang ba'o // lha mo bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po
T02D3305:161a-23: rnams kyang zhal gcig ma phyag gnyis ma spyan gsum
T02D3305:161a-24: pa rdo rje phreng bas mtshan pa'i dpral ba'i dbyes
T02D3305:161a-25: nas thod pa lngas brgyan pa /
T02D3305:161a-26: dpung rgyan dang g-yer kha la sogs pas mngon par brgyan pa /
T02D3305:161a-27: phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3305:161a-28: 'khor los sgyur ba drug ni mchog gi phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:161a-29: nor bu dang zla ba phyed pa dang sna tshogs
T02D3305:161a-30: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ral pa nag pa'i thor cog
T02D3305:161a-31: can no // lha mo sum cu rtsa bzhi po
T02D3305:161a-32: rnams ni rang rang gi 'khor lo'i dbang po la
T02D3305:161a-34: 'khor los sgyur ba lnga dang khva gdong ma la
T02D3305:161a-35: sogs pa rnams ni dbus kyi 'khor lo'i dbang po
T02D3305:161a-37: dpa' bo rnams ni rang rang gi shes rab ma la mngon par phyogs ba'o //
T02D3305:161a-38: de ltar 'di ni phyogs gcig go //
T02D3305:161a-39: 'khor los sgyur ba drug po 'di dag kyang g-yas
T02D3305:161a-40: brkyang gi zhabs can no zhes pa'i khyad par ni
T02D3305:161b-1: phyogs gnyis po 'di dag la yang ye shes mkha'
T02D3305:161b-2: 'gro dang sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro dang de dag gi
T02D3305:161b-3: 'khor rnams kyang seng ge'i steng du gnas pa dang
T02D3305:161b-4: / rin chen mkha' 'gro dang de'i 'khor rnams kyang rta'i steng du gnas pa dang /
T02D3305:161b-5: padma mkha' 'gro dang de'i 'khor rnams kyang rma bya'i steng du gnas pa dang /
T02D3305:161b-6: rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang de'i 'khor rnams kyang glang po che'i steng du gnas pa dang /
T02D3305:161b-7: sna tshogs mkha' 'gro dang de'i 'khor rnams kyang nam mkha'i lding gi steng du gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:161b-8: ye shes mkha' 'gro la sogs pa 'di dag ni rdo rje'i skyil krung can no //
T02D3305:161b-9: khva gdong ma la sogs pa brgyad po 'di dag
T02D3305:161b-10: phyogs skyong ba brgyad po rnams la g-yas brkyang gis
T02D3305:161b-11: gnas pa'o zhes pa ni phyogs gsum pa'o //
T02D3305:161b-12: phyogs 'di rnams dang phyogs gzhan la yang ye shes
T02D3305:161b-13: mkha' 'gro la sogs pa rnams ni zhal gcig phyag
T02D3305:161b-14: gnyis ma nyid la sogs pa dang /
T02D3305:161b-15: zhal gsum phyag drug ma nyid la sogs pa dang /
T02D3305:161b-16: zhal lnga phyag brgyad ma nyid la sogs pa dang /
T02D3305:161b-17: zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis ma nyid la sogs pa dang /
T02D3305:161b-18: zhal brgyad phyag bcu drug ma nyid la sogs pa
T02D3305:161b-19: yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu spros nas gsungs
T02D3305:161b-20: mod / gzhung rnam par rgyas pas 'jigs nas 'dir ma bstan no//
T02D3305:161b-21: rigs kyi bdag po ni 'khor los sgyur ba drug
T02D3305:161b-22: po rnams rang rang gi dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi
T02D3305:161b-23: ste / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni 'khor los sgyur ba lnga'i'o //
T02D3305:161b-25: khva gdong ma la sogs pa rnams kyi ni sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ste /
T02D3305:161b-26: ye shes mkha' 'gro'o zhes pa ni kha gcig gi'o //
T02D3305:161b-27: thugs ka'i sa bon rnams ni ye shes mkha' 'gro
T02D3305:161b-28: la sogs pa rnams kyi rim pa ji lta bar
T02D3305:161b-29: bam bhr'um a'am hr'im kham ngo //
T02D3305:161b-30: snying po'i sngags rnams ni aom shr'i ma h'a su
T02D3305:161b-31: kha badzra satv'a d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ram
T02D3305:161b-32: h'um a'a h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:161b-33: aom shr'i buddha d'a ka aa la la la bhr'um
T02D3305:161b-34: a'a:d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ram h'um phat sv'a
T02D3305:161b-35: h'a / aom shr'i ratna d'a ka tram aa:h'um d'a
T02D3305:161b-36: ki n'i dz'a la samba ram h'um phat sv'a h'a
T02D3305:161b-37: h'a / / aom shr'i padma d'a ka hr'i:d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ram h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:161b-38: aom shr'i badzra d'a ka a'a:h'um phat d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ram h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:161b-39: aom shr'i bi shva d'a ka ho: kham a'a: h'um
T02D3305:161b-40: d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ram h'um phat sv'a
T02D3305:162a-0: ces pa ni dum skyes ma'i ste @162a * //
T02D3305:162a-1: las thams cad pa'i sngags so //
T02D3305:162a-2: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la ni rdo rje gur
T02D3305:162a-3: gyi nang du srung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa'o
T02D3305:162a-4: // de'i shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi
T02D3305:162a-5: rtsibs rnams la shin tu stobs dang rmugs byed dang
T02D3305:162a-6: // / rengs byed dang khengs byed rnams ni ming
T02D3305:162a-7: gzhan ni bgegs mthar byed dang shes rab mthar byed
T02D3305:162a-8: dang gshin rje mthar byed dang padma mthar byed rnams
T02D3305:162a-9: // / so // me la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams la /
T02D3305:162a-10: dbyug sngon can dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang stobs po che dang mi g-yo ba rnams so //
T02D3305:162a-11: steng gi rtsibs la gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ste 'og gi rtsibs la gnod mdzes rgyal po'o //
T02D3305:162a-12: de skad du'ang bsdus pa'i rgyud las /
T02D3305:162a-13: slar yang 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu la ni phyogs dang
T02D3305:162a-14: phyogs bral du gnas khro bo'i tshogs ni bsgom par
T02D3305:162a-15: bya // zhes pa dang dri ma med pa'i 'od
T02D3305:162a-16: las srung ba'i 'khor lo khro bo la sogs pa
T02D3305:162a-17: spro bar bya ste dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi bsrung
T02D3305:162a-18: ba'i don du'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D3305:162a-19: khro bo 'di rnams ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can no //
T02D3305:162a-20: srung ba'i 'khor lo'i lte ba'i nang du chos kyi 'byung gnas te /
T02D3305:162a-21: gang yang dri ma med pa'i 'od las phyi rol
T02D3305:162a-22: du skye ba'i mtshan ma ni nam mkha'i khams mtha'
T02D3305:162a-23: yas pa ste nang du ni shes rab kyi chos
T02D3305:162a-24: 'byung zur gsum pa'o zhes gsungs pas /
T02D3305:162a-25: phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i khams nyid dkyil 'khor la
T02D3305:162a-26: chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi gzugs su bsgom bar bya'o
T02D3305:162a-27: // chos 'byung gi dbus su rlung dang me dang
T02D3305:162a-28: chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i ri rab
T02D3305:162a-29: dang sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba dang nyi
T02D3305:162a-30: ma dang thig le nag po'i gzugs can sgra gcan
T02D3305:162a-31: gyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gnas shing /
T02D3305:162a-32: phyi rol nas rdo rje'i 'od zer dang nam mkha'
T02D3305:162a-33: dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i khor yug
T02D3305:162a-34: gis yongs su bskor ba'i gzhal yas khang chen po'o
T02D3305:162a-35: // yang na srung ba'i 'khor lo ni bgegs nye
T02D3305:162a-36: bar zhi ba tsam gyi dgos pa'o zhes pas bgegs
T02D3305:162a-37: bcom pa'i rjes nas ma bsams shing /
T02D3305:162a-38: chos 'byung yang ma bsgoms par srung ba'i gur gyi
T02D3305:162a-39: nang du nam mkha' la rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil
T02D3305:162a-40: 'khor dang sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug
T02D3305:162a-41: ba'i steng du gnas shing phyi rol nas 'od zer
T02D3305:162b-0: la sogs pa'i khor yug rnams kyis @162b yongs su
T02D3305:162b-1: bskor ba'i gzhal yas khang chen po'o //
T02D3305:162b-2: de'i phyed du gsung gi 'khor lo dang /
T02D3305:162b-3: de'i phyed du thugs kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02D3305:162b-4: de'i phyed du bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D3305:162b-5: de'i phyed du bcom ldan 'das kyi padma ljang gu ste /
T02D3305:162b-6: padma'i sum cha ni lte ba'o //
T02D3305:162b-7: de'i steng nas steng du gnas pa'i zla ba dang
T02D3305:162b-8: nyi ma la sgra gcan dang dus me'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:162b-9: gyi steng du yan lag med pa dang drag po
T02D3305:162b-10: gan rkyal du bsgyel ba'i snying gar g-yas brkyang gi
T02D3305:162b-11: gar gyis bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor
T02D3305:162b-12: lo ste / sku mdog nag po nor bu dang
T02D3305:162b-13: zla ba phyed pa dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan
T02D3305:162b-14: pa'i ral pa'i thor cog can /
T02D3305:162b-15: rdo rje'i nor bu dang rdo rje'i rna cha dang rdo rje'i mgul rgyan dang /
T02D3305:162b-21: stag gi pags pa 'phyang ba'i sham thabs can /
T02D3305:162b-22: zhal bzhi pa spyan bcu gnyis pa'o ;
T02D3305:162b-23: / de yang rtsa ba'i zhal nag po mche ba gtsigs pa drag po /
T02D3305:162b-24: g-yas pa dmar po chags pa dang bcas pa /
T02D3305:162b-25: rgyab ma ser po ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa /
T02D3305:162b-26: g-yon pa dkar po zhi ba'o //
T02D3305:162b-27: dbus dang g-yas dang g-yon gyi mgrin pa gsum ni
T02D3305:162b-28: sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po ste bcom
T02D3305:162b-29: ldan 'das ni mgrin pa gsum pa'o //
T02D3305:162b-30: g-yas pa'i phrag pa dang po sngon po dang gnyis pa dmar po dang gsum pa dkar po ste /
T02D3305:162b-31: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i yang sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po'o //
T02D3305:162b-32: de ltar na phrag pa drug dang /
T02D3305:162b-33: dpung pa bcu gnyis dang nye ba'i dpung pa nas brtsams te phyag dar nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D3305:162b-34: de la g-yas kyi dpung pa gnyis sngon po dang gnyis dmar po dang gnyis dkar po'o //
T02D3305:162b-35: de bzhin du g-yon gyi'ang ngo //
T02D3305:162b-36: de bzhin du phyag bzhi bzhi nag po dang /
T02D3305:162b-39: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D3305:162b-40: phyag re re 'ang sor mo lnga pa ste /
T02D3305:162b-41: de dag re re zhing yang tshigs gsum pa'o //
T02D3305:162b-42: de'ang mthe bong ser po dang mdzub mo dkar po
T02D3305:162b-43: dang gung mo dmar po dang ming med nag po
T02D3305:162b-44: dang mthe chung ljang gu ste /
T02D3305:162b-45: phyag gi mthil nas sor mo thams cad kyi tshigs
T02D3305:162b-46: kyi phreng ba dang po nag po gnyis pa dmar
T02D3305:163a-0: @163a * // de rnams kyang sor gdub rnams kyi 'od dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3305:163a-1: g-yas pa'i phyag rnams kyi nag po rnams na rdo
T02D3305:163a-2: rje dang ral gri dang rtse gsum dang gri gug
T02D3305:163a-3: dang / dmar po rnams na me'i mda' dang rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang /
T02D3305:163a-6: dkar po rnams na 'khor lo dang /
T02D3305:163a-7: mdung dang dbyug pa dang dgra sta rnams so //
T02D3305:163a-8: g-yon pa'i nag po rnams na dril bu dang /
T02D3305:163a-10: kha tv'am ga dbye ba dang /
T02D3305:163a-11: khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang /
T02D3305:163a-12: dmar po rnams na gzhu dang /
T02D3305:163a-17: dkar po rnams na dung dang /
T02D3305:163a-20: tshangs pa'i mgo bo rnams so //
T02D3305:163a-21: brla nas brtsams nas dmar po'i mdog can gyi zhabs
T02D3305:163a-22: g-yas pa'i mthil dmar pos 'dod pa'i lha dmar po
T02D3305:163a-23: gdong gcig pa lag pa bzhis me tog gi mda'
T02D3305:163a-26: lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i snying gar mnan cing /
T02D3305:163a-27: brla nas brtsams nas dkar po'i zhabs g-yon pa'i mthil
T02D3305:163a-28: gyis drag po dkar po gdong gcig pa mig gsum
T02D3305:163a-29: pa lag pa bzhis rtse gsum dang /
T02D3305:163a-32: kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'i snying gar mnan pa'o //
T02D3305:163a-33: 'dod lha'i gzhogs su dga' ma dang dbang phyug chen
T02D3305:163a-34: po'i gzhogs su dkar mo ste lha mo 'di dag
T02D3305:163a-35: ni dman pa'i bzhin dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das
T02D3305:163a-37: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khyud pa'i sna tshogs yum ni
T02D3305:163a-38: g-yon brkyang gis gnas pa gser gyi mdog can phyag
T02D3305:163a-39: g-yas pa rnams kyis gri gug dang lcags kyu dang
T02D3305:163a-42: g-yon pa rnams kyis thod pa dang zhags pa dang
T02D3305:163a-43: padma dkar po dang rin po che rnams 'dzin pa'o
T02D3305:163a-44: // 'dab ma rnams la shar du nag mo 'bar
T02D3305:163a-45: ma nag mo phyag g-yas pa rnams kyis bdug spos
T02D3305:163a-46: kyi snod dang tsandan gyi snod dang gur gum gyi
T02D3305:163a-47: snod dang gla rtsi dang bcas pa'i ga bur gyi
T02D3305:163a-48: // snod dang / g-yon ba rnams kyis dril bu
T02D3305:163a-49: dang padma dang lha'i ljon pa'i me tog dang sna
T02D3305:163a-50: tshogs pa'i me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:163a-51: lhor dmar mo 'bar ma dmar mo g-yas pa rnams
T02D3305:163a-52: kyis mar me dang do shal dang cod pan dang
T02D3305:163b-0: lag gdub dang / g-yon pa @163b rnams kyis gos
T02D3305:163b-1: dang ska rags dang rin po che'i rna rgyan dang
T02D3305:163b-3: nub tu ser mo 'bar ma ser mo g-yas pa
T02D3305:163b-4: rnams kyis dung dang gling bu dang nor bu dang
T02D3305:163b-6: g-yon pa rnams kyis pi wang dang rnga zlum dang 'khar rnga dang zangs dung 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:163b-7: byang du dkar mo 'bar ma dkar mo g-yas pa
T02D3305:163b-8: rnams kyis 'o ma'i snod dang chu'i snod dang lha'i
T02D3305:163b-9: sman dang chang gi snod dang /
T02D3305:163b-10: g-yon pa rnams kyis bdud rtse'i snod dang grub pa'i
T02D3305:163b-11: bcud kyi snod dang bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu dang bza'
T02D3305:163b-13: me la sogs pa rnams su du ba ma dang
T02D3305:163b-14: smig rgyu ma dang mar me ma dang mkha' snang
T02D3305:163b-16: rim pa ji lta bar nag mo dang dmar mo

T02D3305:164a-18: su padma dmar po dang zla ba la sgrol ma

T02D3305:164a-26: gzhogs brgyang du ni bdud rtsi'i bum pa brgyad do //
T02D3305:164a-27: rim pa gsum pa'i snam bu la shar sgo'i g-yon
T02D3305:164a-28: ngos su kun du bzang po sngon po g-yas pa

T02D3305:164b-9: mtha' yas lta bu la ro rdo rje mas 'khyud

T02D3305:164b-13: bden bral du ro rdo rje ma gos dkar mo

T02D3305:164b-15: // rlung du dri rdo rje ma spyan ma lta bu la nam mkha'i snying pos 'khyud pa'o //
T02D3305:164b-16: dbang ldan du gzugs rdo rje ma m'a ma k'i lta bu la sa'i snying pos 'khyud pa'o //
T02D3305:164b-17: 'dir don yod grub pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /

T02D3305:164b-20: sgo rnams la khro bo shin tu stobs don yod
T02D3305:164b-21: grub pa lta bu la rengs byed mas yang dag
T02D3305:164b-22: par 'khyud pa ste de'ang spyan ma lta bu'o //
T02D3305:164b-23: lhor rmugs byed rin chen dbang po lta bu la

T02D3305:164b-26: nub tu rengs byed rnam par snang mdzad lta bu

T02D3305:164b-29: byang du khengs byed 'od dpag med lta bu la
T02D3305:164b-30: rmugs byed mas yang dag par 'khyud pa ste de
T02D3305:164b-31: yang gos dkar mo lta bu'o //
T02D3305:164b-32: 'on kyang khro bo 'di rnams ni g-yas brkyang gis

T02D3305:164b-35: 'dir lha pho rnams kyi gdan ni padma dkar po dang nyi ma rnams te /

T02D3305:166b-29: / g-yas pa dag na shakti dang dbyug pa /
T02D3305:166b-30: g-yon pa dag na padma dang spyi blugs can te 'dir ni snron gyi tshes rnams so //
T02D3305:166b-31: bden bral du rma bya'i steng du padma'i lte ba la gdong drug dmar po dpal mos 'khyud pa /
T02D3305:166b-32: g-yas pa dag na shakti dang mdung /
T02D3305:166b-33: g-yon pa dag na rin po che dang me long
T02D3305:166b-34: can te 'dir ni chu stod kyi tshes rnams so
T02D3305:166b-35: // nub sgo'i g-yon phyogs su padma'i lte ba la
T02D3305:166b-36: lus ngan po ser po lus ngan mos yang dag
T02D3305:166b-37: // par 'khyud pa / g-yas pa dag na nor bu rin po che dang dbyug to //
T02D3305:166b-38: g-yon pa dag na ne'u le dang padma can te 'dir ni rgyal gyi tshes rnams so //
T02D3305:166b-39: g-yas phyogs su glang po che'i steng du padma'i lte
T02D3305:166b-40: ba la dbang po ser po rlung lha mos 'khyud
T02D3305:166b-41: pa / g-yas pa dag na rdo rje dang me'i mda' dang /
T02D3305:167a-1: dril bu dang gzhu can te 'dir ni tha skar gyi tshes rnams so //
T02D3305:167a-2: rlung du ngang pa'i steng du padma'i lte ba la
T02D3305:167a-3: tshangs pa ser po glog mas yang dag par 'khyud
T02D3305:167a-4: pa / g-yas pa dag na khab dang bgrang phreng /
T02D3305:167a-5: g-yon pa dag na padma dang spyi blugs can te 'dir ni smig drug gi tshes rnams so //
T02D3305:167a-6: byang sgo'i g-yon phyogs su glang gi steng du padma'i
T02D3305:167a-7: lte ba la drag po dkar po goo r'is yang
T02D3305:167a-9: g-yas pa dag na rtse gsum dang mda'/
T02D3305:167a-10: g-yon pa dag na sbrul gyis dkris pa'i kha tv'am ga dang gzhu can te /
T02D3305:167a-12: g-yas phyogs su chu srin gyi steng du padma'i lte
T02D3305:167a-13: ba la rgya mtsho dkar po phag mos yang dag
T02D3305:167a-14: par 'khyud pa / g-yas pa dag na zhags pa dang rin po che /
T02D3305:167a-15: g-yon pa dag na sbrul zhags dang nor bu zla
T02D3305:167a-16: ba chu shel can te 'dir ni gro bzhin gyi
T02D3305:167a-17: tshes rnams so // dbang ldan du byi ba la
T02D3305:167a-18: tshogs bdag dkar po gzhon nu mas yang dag par
T02D3305:167a-19: tshes rnams so // 'khyud pa / g-yas pa dag na dgra sta dang rdo rje /
T02D3305:167a-20: g-yon pa dag na zhags pa dang rin po che
T02D3305:167a-21: can te 'dir ni khrums stod kyi tshes rnams so
T02D3305:167a-22: // shar sgo'i g-yon phyogs su nam mkha' lding gi
T02D3305:167a-23: steng du padma'i lte ba la khyab 'jug nag po
T02D3305:167a-24: dpal mos yang dag par 'khyud pa /
T02D3305:167a-25: g-yas pa dag na 'khor lo dang dbyug to //
T02D3305:167a-26: g-yon pa dag na padma dang dung can te 'dir ni mchu'i tshes rnams so //
T02D3305:167a-27: 'dir lha rnams rdo rje'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas pa ste /
T02D3305:167a-28: nag pa la sogs pa'i tshes kyi lha mo rnams
T02D3305:167a-29: ni rol pa'i rkang stabs kyis gnas pa rang rang
T02D3305:167a-30: gi bdag po bden bral la sogs pa'i sku mdog
T02D3305:167a-31: dang phyag mtshan dang dbyibs rnams dang mtshungs pa de
T02D3305:167a-33: de rnams 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la ste /
T02D3305:167a-34: de rnams kyis 'khyud pa rnams ni de nyid la gzigs pa'o //
T02D3305:167a-35: sgo rnams la shar du phag nag po bdun gyis
T02D3305:167a-36: drangs pa'i shing rta nag po la dbyug sngon can
T02D3305:167a-37: don yod grub pa lta bu ste /
T02D3305:167a-38: 'di la 'khyud pa'i 'od zer can ni ser mo
T02D3305:167a-39: phyag g-yas pa dag gis 'khor lo dang dbyug pa
T02D3305:167a-40: / g-yon pa dag gis dung dang rin po che 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:167a-41: lhor rta dmar po bdun gyis drangs pa'i shing rta
T02D3305:167a-42: dmar po la 'dod pa'i rgyal po rin chen 'byung
T02D3305:167b-0: @167b 'di la 'khyud pa'i tsunda dkar mo g-yas pa dag gis tho ba dang mdung /
T02D3305:167b-1: g-yon pa dag gis padma dang me long 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:167b-2: nub tu glang po che ser po bdun gyis drangs
T02D3305:167b-3: pa'i shing rta ser po la stobs po che rnam
T02D3305:167b-4: par snang mdzad lta bu ste /
T02D3305:167b-5: 'di la 'khyud pa'i rdo rje lcags sgrog ma g-yas pa dag gis ral gri dang rdo rje /
T02D3305:167b-6: g-yon pa dag gis phub dang sprul 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:167b-7: byang du sing ge dkar po bdun gyis drangs pa'i
T02D3305:167b-8: shing rta dkar po la mi g-yo ba snang ba
T02D3305:167b-10: 'di la 'khyud pa'i khro gnyer can dmar mo g-yas pa dag gis mda' dang lcags kyu dang /
T02D3305:167b-11: g-yon pa dag gis gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:167b-12: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi steng gi nam mkha' la
T02D3305:167b-13: mig gsum pa kha dog lnga pa'i nam mkha' lding
T02D3305:167b-14: gis drangs pa'i shing rta ljang gu la gtsug tor
T02D3305:167b-15: 'khor los sgyur ba ljang gu phyag na rdo rje
T02D3305:167b-16: lta bu ste / 'di'i shes rab ma shin tu
T02D3305:167b-17: sngon mo sku mdog sngon mo g-yas pa dag gis
T02D3305:167b-18: gri gug dang rdo rje dang /
T02D3305:167b-19: g-yon pa dag gis thod pa dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:167b-20: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi 'og gis 'og tu rkang
T02D3305:167b-21: pa brgyad pa'i seng ge nag po bdun gyis drangs
T02D3305:167b-22: pa'i shing rta nag po la gnod mdzes rgyal po
T02D3305:167b-23: kun du bzang po lta bu ste /
T02D3305:167b-24: 'di'i shes rab ma drag spyan ma ljang gu phyag
T02D3305:167b-25: g-yas pa dag gis dgra sta dang rtse gsum dang
T02D3305:167b-26: / g-yon pa dag gis sbrul zhags dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:167b-27: 'dir dbyug sngon can la sogs pa'i khro bo rnams
T02D3305:167b-28: ni shing rta'i steng du padma dkar po dang nyi
T02D3305:167b-29: ma rnams la g-yas brkyang gis gnas pa ste ;
T02D3305:167b-30: gtso bo gzhan rnams ni rang rang gi gnas na
T02D3305:167b-31: gnas pa'i phyir 'khor lo'i dbang po la gzigs pa'o
T02D3305:167b-32: // 'od zer can la sogs pa ni g-yon brkyang gis gnas pa'i rjes su gtso mo ste /
T02D3305:167b-33: gzhan gyi gnas su phyin pa'i phyir khro bo rnams la gzigs pa'o //
T02D3305:167b-34: 'dir shing rta rnams ni nag bo la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:167b-35: kha dog nyid ni sgo'i dbus su gnas pa'i shing
T02D3305:167b-36: rta rnams ni rigs kyi dbang gis 'gyur ba yin
T02D3305:167b-38: de'i rjes su 'brangs nas phag pa la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
T02D3305:167b-39: rta babs kyi 'og ka ba'i 'og gi stegs bu'i gnas rnams dang /
T02D3305:168a-2: de la shar gyi sgo'i g-yon dang g-yas dag tu
T02D3305:168a-3: rlung gi dkyil 'khor dag la grangs ji lta bar
T02D3305:168a-4: padma dang stobs rgyu dag ni nag po ste khyi
T02D3305:168a-5: gdong ma dang khva gdong mas 'khyud pa'o //
T02D3305:168a-6: lho'i sgor me'i dkyil 'khor dag la nor rgyas dang
T02D3305:168a-7: dung skyong dag ni dmar po ste ce spyang gdong
T02D3305:168a-8: ma dang mkha' lding gdong mas 'khyud pa'o //
T02D3305:168a-9: nub kyi sgor sa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jog po dang padma ser po //
T02D3305:168a-10: ce spyang gdong ma dang mkha' lding gdeng mas 'khyud pa'o //
T02D3305:168a-11: byang gi sgor chu'i dkyil 'khor dag la mtha' yas
T02D3305:168a-12: dang rigs ldan dag ni dkar po ste stag gdong
T02D3305:168a-14: steng gi nam mkhar stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la rgyal
T02D3305:168a-15: ba ni shin tu ljang gu ste sngon mos 'khyud
T02D3305:168a-16: pa'o // 'og gi sa 'og tu stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la rnam par rgyal ba sngon po ste /
T02D3305:168a-17: rdo rje'i mig can mas yang dag par 'khyud pa'o //
T02D3305:168a-18: klu thams cad kyang rdo rje'i gdan gyis bzhugs pa phyag bzhi pa ;
T02D3305:168a-19: g-yas pa dag gis bdud rtsi'i bum pa dang rdo rje dang /
T02D3305:168a-20: g-yon pa dag gis padma dang rin po che 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:168a-21: sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams su dbang ldan nas zla
T02D3305:168a-22: ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa 'char bzhin pa
T02D3305:168a-23: dang / bden bral du nyi ma nub par 'gro bzhin pa'o //
T02D3305:168a-24: me dang rlung gi 'khor yug gi dbus su dur
T02D3305:168a-25: khrod chen po rnams la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa
T02D3305:168a-26: rnams te / phyogs rnams su dmar po dang mtshams rnams su dkar po'o //
T02D3305:168a-27: de la shar gyi 'khor lor khyi gdong ma nag mo dang lhor phag gdong ma dmar mo dang /
T02D3305:168a-28: nub tu ce spyang gdong ma ser mo dang /
T02D3305:168a-29: byang du stag gdong ma dkar mo'o //
T02D3305:168a-30: me la sogs pa rnams su khva gdong ma dang
T02D3305:168a-31: bya rgod gdong ma dang mkha' lding gdong ma dang
T02D3305:168a-32: 'ug gdong ma rnams ni nag mo dang dmar mo
T02D3305:168a-33: dang ser mo dang dkar mo'o //
T02D3305:168a-34: steng gi nam mkhar shing rta la sngon mo sku
T02D3305:168a-35: mdog sngon mo ste 'di'i shing rta ni shin tu
T02D3305:168a-37: /'og gi sa'i 'og tu shing rta la rdo rje'i mig can ma ljang gu ste /
T02D3305:168a-38: 'di'i shing rta ni drag spyan ma'i lta bu'o //
T02D3305:168a-39: khyi gdong ma la sogs pa 'di dag ni zlum po'i stabs kyis gnas pa /
T02D3305:168a-40: sngar bshad pa'i padma la sogs pas 'khyud pa /
T02D3305:168b-0: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis gri @168b gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02D3305:168b-1: spyan gsum ma gcer bu phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:168b-2: mi mgo'i phreng bas mgul du 'phyang ba'o //
T02D3305:168b-3: sngar gyi 'khor lo brgyad po rnams kyi 'og tu
T02D3305:168b-4: rim pa ji lta bar bse dang dom dang seng
T02D3305:168b-5: ge dang 'bri dang bhe runda dang khrung khrung dang
T02D3305:168b-6: mig sngon dang bya ma byi rnams so //
T02D3305:168b-7: dur khrod 'di dag nyid la rlung gi khor yug
T02D3305:168b-8: gi shar dang me'i mtshams su rlung gi dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:168b-9: dag la gnas pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma'o //
T02D3305:168b-10: lho dang bden bral du me'i dkyil 'khor dag la gnas pa'i gza' lhag dang mig dmar ro //
T02D3305:168b-11: nub dang rlung du sa'i dkyil 'khor dag la gnas pa'i mjug rings dang spen pa'o //
T02D3305:168b-12: byang dang dbang ldan du chu'i dkyil 'khor dag la gnas pa'i ba sangs dang phur bu'o //
T02D3305:168b-13: steng du stong pa'i dkyil 'khor dag la sgra gcan te /
T02D3305:168b-14: 'og tu stong pa'i dkyil 'khor dag la dus me'o //
T02D3305:168b-15: de bzhin du 'dir rlung gi khor yug la brtan pa dang aa gasti dang /
T02D3305:168b-16: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /
T02D3305:168b-19: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang /
T02D3305:168b-20: dga' bo dang nag po chen po dang dril bu'i rna ba can dang bhringgi ni dang /
T02D3305:168b-24: grub pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D3305:168b-25: sna tshogs pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang dbyibs can bye ba phrag phyed dang bzhi'o //
T02D3305:168b-26: 'dir zla ba la sogs pa'i lha rnams ni rdo
T02D3305:168b-27: rje'i gdan gyis gnas pa ste lha mo rnams ni
T02D3305:168b-28: rol pa'i stabs kyis gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:168b-29: gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi stegs bu la 'dod pa'i lha mo rnams so //
T02D3305:168b-30: de yang shar gyi stegs bu la sgo'i g-yas su dbye bar 'dod ma sgrol ma lta bu dang /
T02D3305:168b-31: gos 'dod ma reg bya rdo rje ma lta bu dang /
T02D3305:168b-32: lus 'khrug par 'dod ma tsa mundi lta bu dang /
T02D3305:168b-33: mchil ma 'dod bar 'dod ma lta bu khyab 'jug ma lta bu dang /
T02D3305:168b-34: skrod par 'dod ma shin tu stobs ma lta bu ste /
T02D3305:168b-35: sgo'i g-yon du kun du gdung bar 'dod ma shin tu sngon mo lta bu dang /
T02D3305:168b-36: reg bya 'dod ma rdo rje lcags sgrog lta bu dang /
T02D3305:168b-37: yan lag thams cad bskyod par 'dod ma khyi gdong ma lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-1: khva gdong ma lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-2: sgo'i g-yas su bskyod par 'dod ma gos dkar mo lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-3: zas 'dod ma ro rdo rje ma lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-4: lus kyi dri ma 'dod ma phag gdong ma lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-5: gar 'dod ma gzhon nu ma lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-6: skem par 'dod ma rmugs byed ma lta bu ste /
T02D3305:169a-7: g-yon du 'gugs par 'dod ma khro gnyer can lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-8: rgyug par 'dod ma drag can ma lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-9: bshang gci zag par 'dod ma phag gdong ma lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-10: g-yul ngo 'dod ma bya rgod gdong ma lta bu'o //
T02D3305:169a-11: nub kyi sgo'i g-yas su rengs par 'dod ma spyan ma lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-12: dri 'dod ma dri rdo rje ma lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-13: mal stan la snyes par 'dod ma dbang mo lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-14: chu la rkyal bar 'dod ma tshangs ma lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-15: gnyen 'dod ma rengs byed ma lta bu'o //
T02D3305:169a-16: g-yon du 'khrig pa 'dod ma chos dbyings rdo rje ma lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-17: phur bus 'debs par 'dod ma 'od zer ma lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-18: slu 'dod ma ce spyang gdong ma lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-19: sbrul 'ching bar 'dod ma mkha' lding gdong ma lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-20: byang gi sgo'i g-yas su rgyas 'dod ma m'a ma k'i lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-21: rgyan 'dod ma gzugs rdo rje ma lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-22: mal stan 'dod ma drag mo lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-23: rgyal srid 'dod ma dpal mo lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-24: 'jam par smra 'dod ma khengs byed ma lta bu ste /
T02D3305:169a-25: g-yon du rol mo 'dod ma sgra rdo rje ma lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-26: 'chi bar 'dod ma tsunda lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-27: rtsod pa mang po 'dod ma stag gdong ma lta bu dang /
T02D3305:169a-28: byis pa bsdigs par 'dod pa 'ug gdong ma lta bu'o //
T02D3305:169a-29: lha mo sum cu rtsa drug po 'di rnams bsgom par bya ste /
T02D3305:169a-30: gang yang gsod par 'dod ma ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas bskyed pa dang /
T02D3305:169a-31: bskyed par 'dod ma ni sna tshogs yum gyis bskyed
T02D3305:169a-32: pa'o zhes gsungs pa'i 'dod ma gnyis po de dag
T02D3305:169a-33: ni ji ltar rigs par 'dod ma gzhan dag la
T02D3305:169a-34: 'du ba'i phyir tha dad du bsgom par bya ba
T02D3305:169a-35: ma yin no // gzhan yang gang dang gang 'dod
T02D3305:169a-36: pa de thams cad ni 'dod ma sum cu rtsa
T02D3305:169a-37: drug po 'di dag la ji ltar rigs par bsdu
T02D3305:169a-38: bar bya'o zhes pa'i bsam pa kho na'o //
T02D3305:169a-39: bsdu bar bya ba rnams nye bar mtshon par byed pa la gzhan de dag 'dod ma gcig ste /
T02D3305:169a-40: de ltar na 'dod ma sum cu rtsa bdun zhes gsungs so //
T02D3305:169b-0: de nyid kyi @169b phyir dri ma med pa'i 'od las /
T02D3305:169b-1: gzhan yang gang cung zad sems can rnams kyis bya
T02D3305:169b-2: bar 'dod pa de thams cad ni 'dir rnal 'byor
T02D3305:169b-3: ma rnams kyi bya ba khams kyi dbang gis so
T02D3305:169b-4: zhes gsungs so // de bas na rdul tshon gyi
T02D3305:169b-5: dkyil 'khor la lha sum cu rtsa drug gi sa
T02D3305:169b-6: bon dgod par bya bar bshad de /
T02D3305:169b-7: 'on kyang phur bus 'debs par 'dod ma'i sa bon
T02D3305:169b-8: sa: zhes pa ni shar sgo'i g-yon du dgod par
T02D3305:169b-9: gsungs / slu 'dod ma'i sa bon ka: zhes pa ni lho sgo'i g-yon du'o //
T02D3305:169b-10: sbrul 'ching bar 'dod pa'i sa bon la: zhes pa ni byang sgo'i g-yon du ste /
T02D3305:169b-11: de ltar 'dod ma'i lha mo bsgom pa ni ma yin no //
T02D3305:169b-12: gang yang dri ma med pa'i 'od las 'dod ma
T02D3305:169b-13: sum cu rtsa bdun ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor la
T02D3305:169b-14: rang rang gi rigs kyi dbye bas rang rang gi
T02D3305:169b-15: rigs kyi phyogs su'o zhes gsungs pas /
T02D3305:169b-16: 'di thams cad kyang nges par 'dod par rtogs par bya'o //
T02D3305:169b-17: de lta ma yin na mang du gsungs pa'i 'dod
T02D3305:169b-18: ma sum cu rtsa drug ces pa'i tshig rnams phan
T02D3305:169b-20: 'dod ma 'di rnams la zlog pa'i rang bzhin phyir
T02D3305:169b-21: 'dod ma sum cu rtsa drug ni sku'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:169b-22: gyi stegs bu rnams la snga ma bzhin du rang
T02D3305:169b-23: gi rigs kyi dbang gis rang rang gi phyogs rnams
T02D3305:169b-24: su'o // 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la sogs pa'i de
T02D3305:169b-25: bzhin gshegs pa rnams las gzhan pa'i lha thams cad
T02D3305:169b-26: ni sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i cod pan can
T02D3305:169b-27: su'o // no // 'dir gang gi tshe bcom ldan
T02D3305:169b-28: 'das dus kyi 'khor lo rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo
T02D3305:169b-29: bor rnam par bzhugs pa de'i tshe mi bskyod pa
T02D3305:169b-30: ljang gu'i mdog can gyis rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D3305:169b-31: de bzhin du gang gi tshe sna tshogs yum mi
T02D3305:169b-32: bskyod pa'i rang bzhin yin pa de'i tshe mi bskyod
T02D3305:169b-33: pa sngon po'i gzugs can gyi rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D3305:169b-34: sngon pos so // de bzhin du sna tshogs ni
T02D3305:169b-35: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i rang bzhin te
T02D3305:169b-36: sngon pos so // / de ltar na ye shes
T02D3305:169b-37: dang rnam shes dag phan tshun rgyas btab par 'gyur
T02D3305:169b-38: sngon pos so // / ro // de skad du'ang
T02D3305:169b-39: dri ma med pa'i 'od las mchog gi rgyal ba'i
T02D3305:169b-40: bdag po ni ye shes kyi phung po yin la
T02D3305:169b-41: sna tshogs yum ni rnam par shes pa'i khams te
T02D3305:169b-42: rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha'i khams so zhes
T02D3305:170a-0: sngon pos so // / ro // gsungs so // 'dir ye shes ni stong pa nyid @170a * //
T02D3305:170a-1: dang snying rje ro gcig pa mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po'i ye shes te /
T02D3305:170a-2: gang gi tshe dus kyi 'khor lo rnam par shes
T02D3305:170a-3: pa'i phung po yin pa de'i tshe sna tshogs yum
T02D3305:170a-4: ni nam mkha'i khams rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug
T02D3305:170a-5: ma'i rag bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D3305:170a-6: de nyid kyi phyir 'khyud par gyur pa rdo rje
T02D3305:170a-7: dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ni sna tshogs yum zhes
T02D3305:170a-8: pa dang / rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma
T02D3305:170a-9: dang lhan cig rnam par shes pa padma'i snying po
T02D3305:170a-10: la bde ba chen po zhes gsungs so //
T02D3305:170a-14: snang ba mtha' yas rnams la ni mi bskyod pa ljang gus rgyas btab pa ste /
T02D3305:170a-15: yang don yod grub pa la rin chen dbang po dang /
T02D3305:170a-16: rin chen 'byung ldan la snang ba mtha' yas dang /
T02D3305:170a-17: de la rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D3305:170a-18: de la mi bskyod pa ljang gus so //
T02D3305:170a-20: sgra rdo rje ma dang gnod mdzes rgyal po dang
T02D3305:170a-21: shin tu sngon mo dang sngon mo dang drag mo
T02D3305:170a-22: dang rmugs byed ma dang rnam par rgyal ba'i klu
T02D3305:170a-23: rnams ni mi bskyod pa sngon po'i gzugs can gyi
T02D3305:170a-24: rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pa ste /
T02D3305:170a-25: phyag na rdo rje dang chos dbyings rdo rje ma dang gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang /
T02D3305:170a-26: drag can ma dang khyab 'jug ma dang gshin rje
T02D3305:170a-27: dang rgyal ba'i klu rnams la mi bskyod pa ljang
T02D3305:170a-28: gus so // lha gzhan nag po rnams la don yod grub pa dang /
T02D3305:170a-29: dmar po rnams la rin chen 'byung ldan dang /
T02D3305:170a-30: ser po rnams la rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D3305:170a-31: dkar po rnams la snang ba mtha' yas kyis so //
T02D3305:170a-32: rgyas 'debs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa drug po 'di dag ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs sam /
T02D3305:170a-33: gtsug tor dang bcas shing snam sbyar 'dzin pa gnon la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3305:170a-34: bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi thugs ka'i sa bon ni h'um ste /
T02D3305:170a-35: sngags gzhan ni rnam par rgyas pas 'jigs nas ma brjod do zhes pa /
T02D3305:170a-36: yang dag par bsdus pa'i rim pas dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D3305:170a-37: lha thams cad kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang
T02D3305:170a-38: phyag dang zhabs la sogs pa bsgom pa'i cho ga'o
T02D3305:170b-0: // de nas der rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ram ras ris la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor @170b ram ;
T02D3305:170b-1: yid kyi dkyil 'khor mngon sum du byas par ji
T02D3305:170b-2: ltar bshad pa'i mchod pa la sogs pa sngon du
T02D3305:170b-3: 'gro bas slob ma rab tu gnas pa bzhin du
T02D3305:170b-4: sku gzugs la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa yang
T02D3305:170b-5: bya'o // de la dkyil 'khor gzhan du yang sngar
T02D3305:170b-6: bshad pa'i cho gas dang por bum pa lhag par
T02D3305:170b-7: gnas pa dang dgod pa byas nas sku gzugs la
T02D3305:170b-8: sogs pa stong pa nyid kyi rjes la sa bon
T02D3305:170b-9: la sogs pa las rdzogs pa'am /
T02D3305:170b-10: skad cig gis kyang rung ste dam tshig sems dpa'i
T02D3305:170b-11: ngo bo thugs ka'i sa bon dang bcas pa bsams
T02D3305:170b-12: la gos gsar pa dmar po la sogs pas g-yogs
T02D3305:170b-13: shing me tog dang ldan par bya'o //
T02D3305:170b-14: de nas 'di'i me tog gi phreng ba blangs te
T02D3305:170b-15: sbyin pa'i bdag po dang sku gzugs la sogs pa
T02D3305:170b-16: lhan cig slob ma bzhin du rdul tshon gyi dkyil
T02D3305:170b-17: 'khor la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:170b-19: slob dpon gyis kyang sku gzugs la sogs pa lhag
T02D3305:170b-20: pa'i lha'i mtshan ma 'am de'i rigs kyi bdag po'i
T02D3305:170b-21: mtshan ma la me tog 'bul du gzhug go //
T02D3305:170b-22: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i phyi rol du shar gyi phyogs sam /
T02D3305:170b-23: der skabs med na dbang ldan du ha cang mi
T02D3305:170b-24: ring zhing yid du 'ong ba'i gnas su khrus kyi
T02D3305:170b-25: stegs bu 'od zer dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D3305:170b-26: phyed kyi tshad dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:170b-28: sa sel la sogs pa'i nyes pa dang bral ba'i las byas pa'am /
T02D3305:170b-29: so phag la sogs pa las byas pa 'am /
T02D3305:170b-30: de med na ji ltar rnyed pa 'am ji ltar
T02D3305:170b-31: gnas pa'i gzhir yang rung ste 'bras btags pa'i khu
T02D3305:170b-32: ba la sogs pas bris pa'i stegs bu phyogs dang
T02D3305:170b-33: mtshams su bum pa brgyad gzhag pa shin tu 'jam
T02D3305:170b-34: pa / bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'i ba'i rnam pa lnga la sogs pas byugs pa /
T02D3305:170b-35: bla re dang gdugs dkar po dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang bum pa gang ba /
T02D3305:170b-36: me tog dang gar dang glu dang rol mo la
T02D3305:170b-37: sogs pas sam ji ltar rnyed pas kyang rung yid
T02D3305:170b-39: tshes dang gza' rgyu skar dang yud tsam la sogs
T02D3305:170b-40: pa bzang po la khrus byas shing do shal dang
T02D3305:170b-41: rkang gdub dang dpung rgyan dang rna rgyan dang gdu
T02D3305:170b-42: bu dang sor gdub la sogs pas brgyan pa 'am
T02D3305:171a-1: rnyed pas brgyan pa'i slob dpon rdo rje sems dpa'i sku rig ma dang bcas pas /
T02D3305:171a-2: stegs bu'i dbus su sgo nub tu bstan pa'i re
T02D3305:171a-3: kh'a gru bzhi pa cig gis bskor ba'i sna tshogs
T02D3305:171a-5: 'bras btags pa'i khu ba la sogs pas bri bar bya ste /
T02D3305:171a-6: yang na rim pa gnyis pa gru bzhi pa rta babs med pa'o //
T02D3305:171a-7: shar la sogs pa'i snam bu rnams la 'khor lo
T02D3305:171a-8: dang rin po che dad padma dang ral gri rnams
T02D3305:171a-9: dang / mtshams rnams su spyan dang rdo rje dang
T02D3305:171a-10: padma dang autpala rnams te dbus su sna tshogs chu
T02D3305:171a-12: de'i steng du padma 'dab brgyad bris pa'i shing stan
T02D3305:171a-13: nam zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bris pa'i ras la sogs
T02D3305:171a-14: pas g-yogs pa'i seng ge'i khri la khrus kyi dkyil
T02D3305:171a-15: 'khor gyi padma'i lte pa'i steng du 'jog par mos
T02D3305:171a-16: pa la sogs pas bzhag nas sam /
T02D3305:171a-17: khrus kyi dkyil 'khor med par yang de bzhin nyid de /
T02D3305:171a-18: gzhan du yang shing stan la sogs par sgom pa'i
T02D3305:171a-19: dkyil 'khor la sku gzugs dang ras ris dang glegs
T02D3305:171a-20: bam dang mchod rten la sogs pa shar du mngon
T02D3305:171a-21: par phyogs pa'am / gzhan du mngon par phyogs par yang gzhag par bya'o //
T02D3305:171a-22: gang yang gnas gzhan du bskyod par mi nus pa'i
T02D3305:171a-23: gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten dang dri'i gtsang khang
T02D3305:171a-24: dang sku gzugs la sogs pa de dag ni snga
T02D3305:171a-25: ma bzhin du dam tshig sems dpa'i gzugs su bsgoms
T02D3305:171a-26: la dkyil 'khor brtan par mos par bya ste /
T02D3305:171a-27: de dag la khrus kyi stegs bu ni dgod pa med do //
T02D3305:171a-28: gnyis ka la yang skyon med pa'i dus su sku gzugs la sogs pa mngon du byas te /
T02D3305:171a-29: de la mngon du phyogs pas mchod yon la sogs pa dbul ba sngon du 'gro bas sam /
T02D3305:171a-30: mchod yon la sogs pa ma phul yang rung ste sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D3305:171a-31: de yang aom a'a: bighn'antra krita h'um zhes pa 'khyil
T02D3305:171a-32: pa'i sngags dang h'um yig lan bdun bzlas pa'i don
T02D3305:171a-33: grub g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi khu tshur gyis
T02D3305:171a-34: gzung nas re re zhing g-yon skor du lan gnyis
T02D3305:171a-35: su sarbba p'a pam da ha na badzra satva sya
T02D3305:171a-36: sarbba p'a pa da ha sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:171a-37: zhes brjod cing bya bas la don grub mer dor te g-yas skor gyis kyang de bzhin te /
T02D3305:171a-38: de ltar g-yon dang g-yas su chu yis kyang bya zhing /
T02D3305:171b-0: de bzhin du khan @171b phor dkar po rnams dang /
T02D3305:171b-1: de bzhin du d'ur ba'i myu gu dang bcas pa'i pa'i ba lci'i chad bu rnams dang /
T02D3305:171b-2: de bzhin du mar me dang bcas pa'i zan gyi chad bu rnams dang /
T02D3305:171b-3: de bzhin du ser ras rnams kyis kyang ste 'on
T02D3305:171b-4: kyang kham phor la sogs mer dor ba ni ma
T02D3305:171b-5: yin no // de la la la dag gis sku
T02D3305:171b-6: gzugs la sogs pa la nye reg bya zhing 'khor
T02D3305:171b-7: lo'i dbang phyug gi sngags kyis sku gzugs la sogs
T02D3305:171b-8: pa ji ltar rigs par dngos su'am me long la
T02D3305:171b-9: gzugs brnyan shar ba'i thugs kar dri'i byug pa dang
T02D3305:171b-10: yin no // / dbul me tog gi phreng ba
T02D3305:171b-11: bcing ba dang mdun du mchod yon dbul ba byas
T02D3305:171b-12: nas mar mes yongs su bskor te 'khyil pa dang
T02D3305:171b-13: h'um yig lan bdun bzlas pa'i mar dang bcas pa'i
T02D3305:171b-14: spos dkar gyis bdug par bya'o zhes pa sbyang ba'i
T02D3305:171b-15: yin no // / cho ga'o // de'i rjes la
T02D3305:171b-16: 'khyil pa bzlas pa'i d'ur ba'i chun pos zangs kyi
T02D3305:171b-17: snod na gnas pa'i zho dang 'o ma dang mar
T02D3305:171b-18: dang sbrang rtsi dang kar bsres pa'i ngo bo bdud
T02D3305:171b-19: rtsi lnga dang de'i rjes la ba'i 'o ma dang
T02D3305:171b-20: zho dang mar dang lci ba dang chu ste ba'i
T02D3305:171b-21: rnam pa lngas sku gzugs la sogs pa bkru bar
T02D3305:171b-23: aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa: zhes pa'i sngags kyis byug par bya'o //
T02D3305:171b-24: ras bris dang glegs bam dang sa la sogs pa las byas pa 'am /
T02D3305:171b-25: bris pa'i sku gzugs la sogs pa ni me long la gzugs brnyan shar ba la'o //
T02D3305:171b-26: de nas 'khyil pa bzlas pa'i chu gtsang ma dri
T02D3305:171b-27: zhim pos bkrus nas 'khar ba'i snod du gzhag pa'i
T02D3305:171b-32: gandha munda ste shing lnga'i shun pa'i phye mas rnam par mnyes la /
T02D3305:171b-33: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya bi sho
T02D3305:171b-34: dha ne sv'a h'a zhes pa'i sngags zlos shing 'khar
T02D3305:171b-35: gzhong na gnas pa'i dri zhim po'i til mar gyis
T02D3305:171b-36: byugs la mnyes te 'khar gzhong na gnas pa'i skyu
T02D3305:171b-38: de ltar bkrus nas 'khar gzhong na gnas pa'i yung
T02D3305:171b-39: bas byugs te bkrus la shri khanda dang tsandan dmar
T02D3305:171b-46: ga bur la sogs pa ji ltar rnyed pas kyang rung bas byugs nas /
T02D3305:172a-0: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i @172a * //
T02D3305:172a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha mo rnams kyi bum
T02D3305:172a-2: pas 'khrud bzhin pa dang bkra shis kyi glu dang
T02D3305:172a-3: sna tshogs pa'i rol mo sngon du 'gro bas rnam
T02D3305:172a-4: par rgyal ba la sogs pa bum pa'i chu dang
T02D3305:172a-5: / dung chos sam gzhan du blugs pa rnams kyis /
T02D3305:172a-6: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D3305:172a-7: zhes pa la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba brjod cing sku khrus gsol bar bya'o //
T02D3305:172a-8: de la gos pa'i chu na bza' 'jam pos phyis
T02D3305:172a-9: nas ji ltar nus pa'i na bza' la sogs pas
T02D3305:172a-10: brgyan par bya'o // de nas snying ga'i sngags kyi
T02D3305:172a-11: 'od zer gyis rab tu gnas par bya ba'i ye
T02D3305:172a-12: shes sems dpa' dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D3305:172a-13: dpa' la sogs pa'i lha rnams mdun gyi nam mkhar
T02D3305:172a-14: brgyan par bya'o // spyan drangs la / mchod yon
T02D3305:172a-15: la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas pus mo g-yas
T02D3305:172a-17: g-yon pas dril bu dkrol zhing g-yas pas spos phor gzung ste /
T02D3305:172a-18: lce h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rjer byas la /
T02D3305:172a-19: bcom ldan che ge rdo rje mchog / rig pa'i rgyal po khyod la 'dud //
T02D3305:172a-20: slob ma rnams la brtse don dang //
T02D3305:172a-21: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D3305:172a-22: sems can bsod nams spel don du //
T02D3305:172a-23: byang chub sems ni bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02D3305:172a-24: mgon po thugs rje'i bdag nyid can /
T02D3305:172a-25: khyed kyi rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal //
T02D3305:172a-26: de phyir bcom ldan bdag gus la //
T02D3305:172a-27: bka' drin gnang bar mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02D3305:172a-29: 'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D3305:172a-30: sngags kyi lha gzhan gang lags dang //
T02D3305:172a-31: lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang //
T02D3305:172a-32: 'byung po byang chub brten gnas dang //
T02D3305:172a-33: sems can bstan la mngon dga' ba //
T02D3305:172a-34: gang gzhan rdo rje'i spyan ldan rnams //
T02D3305:172a-35: bdag la yang dag dgongs su gsol //
T02D3305:172a-36: rdo rje can chen che ge dag / che ge'i rab tu gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:172a-37: bgyi'o de phyir khyed rnams kyis //
T02D3305:172a-38: nye bar gnas par mdzad par rigs //
T02D3305:172a-39: zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D3305:172a-40: de ltar 'dir rigs zhes pa'i bar gyis rab gnas pa'i don du lhag par gnas pa dang /
T02D3305:172a-41: lhag ma rnams kyis ni nye bar gnas par gsol ba btab nas /
T02D3305:172a-42: nam mkhar gnas pa'i lha'i 'khor lo yang dag par mchod de phyag 'tshal zhing bstod la /
T02D3305:172b-0: aom badzra @172b pu na r'a ga ma n'a ya mu: zhes pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D3305:172b-1: khrus byas pa'i sku gzungs la sogs pa'i thugs ka
T02D3305:172b-2: dang spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang phyag dang spyi
T02D3305:172b-3: gtsug rnams su yang dag par byugs nas mchod la
T02D3305:172b-4: 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag
T02D3305:172b-5: pa g-yas pas lan gsum reg cing ji ltar rigs
T02D3305:172b-6: par rang nyid kyi sngags sam 'khyil pa'i sngags bzla
T02D3305:172b-7: bar bya ste / phyogs kyi gtor ma yang dbul lo //
T02D3305:172b-8: gang du lha lhag par gnas pa ma byas par
T02D3305:172b-9: rab tu gnas par byed pa la ni lhag par
T02D3305:172b-11: des na lhag par gnas pa ma byas pa nyid lhag par gnas pa'i don du brjod de /
T02D3305:172b-12: rab tu gnas pa'i don du 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshig thams cad nyi ma gcig la bya'o //
T02D3305:172b-13: 'on kyang sbyang ba la sogs pa mthun pa'i cho
T02D3305:172b-14: ga rnams ni lan cig kho na bya'i slar yang
T02D3305:172b-15: ma yin no // de la yang sbyin pa'i bdag
T02D3305:172b-16: po la nus pa yod na ni bsod nams kyi
T02D3305:172b-17: tshogs nye bar bsags pa'i don du lhag par gnas
T02D3305:172b-18: pa bya ba nyid do zhes pa lha lhag par
T02D3305:172b-21: // / de'i rjes su snga bar de bzhin du khrus
T02D3305:172b-22: kyi stegs bu yid du 'od ba byed du bcug
T02D3305:172b-23: nas yung tsam la sogs pa bzang po la //
T02D3305:172b-24: de ltar rgyan dang ldan pa'i slob dpon rdo rje
T02D3305:172b-25: 'chang gi ngo bo shes rab dang bcas pa 'dug
T02D3305:172b-26: ste / gtor ma dang mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D3305:172b-27: sku gzugs la sogs pa de ltar gzhag pa dang /
T02D3305:172b-28: lha khang la sogs pa ji ltar gnas pa rnams dam tshig sems dpa'i gzugs su bskyed par bya'o //
T02D3305:172b-29: de yang rgyud dang mngon par rtogs pa dang sgrub
T02D3305:172b-30: thabs la sogs pa lha'i khyad par bskyed pa'i rim
T02D3305:172b-31: pa rigs pas lha'i khyad par so sor byas pa
T02D3305:172b-32: gang yin pa de stong pa nyid kyi rjes la
T02D3305:172b-33: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin nam cig car yang
T02D3305:172b-34: rung ste / ji lta bu'i dam tshig sems dpa'i gzugs su bsgom par bya'o//
T02D3305:172b-35: glegs bam rnams ni yi ge'i tshogs ma lus pa
T02D3305:172b-36: stod pa nyid kyi rjes su padma dmar po dang
T02D3305:172b-37: nyi ma la hr'i: dmar po las byung ba'i chu
T02D3305:172b-38: skyes dang hr'i: yig yongs su gyur pa las gos
T02D3305:172b-39: dkar mos 'khyud pa'i snang ba mtha' yas te /
T02D3305:173a-0: de yongs su gyur ba las yang dag par byung ba'i yi ge'i rnam pa @173a * //
T02D3305:173a-1: rnams snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzugs brnyan shar ba'i
T02D3305:173a-2: dam tshig sems dpar gnas pa'o zhes bsam bar bya'o
T02D3305:173a-3: // mar me mdzad dang gtsug lag khang la sogs
T02D3305:173a-4: pa rnams ni stong pa nyid kyi rjes su padma
T02D3305:173a-5: dang zla ba la bh'um dkar po las skyes pa'i
T02D3305:173a-7: bh'um las byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad spyan mas
T02D3305:173a-8: 'khyud pa las mar me mdzad kyi rnam pa'am gtsug
T02D3305:173a-10: dri'i gtsang khang gi gzugs sam /
T02D3305:173a-12: 'on kyang gtsug lag khang ni rnam par snang mdzad
T02D3305:173a-13: shes rab dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan shar ba'i dam
T02D3305:173a-14: tshig sems dpa'i gzugs su gnas pa ste /
T02D3305:173a-15: de bzhin du dri'i gtsang khang dang mchod rten yang bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3305:173a-16: de ltar dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed nas mchod yon
T02D3305:173a-17: la sogs pa dbul ba sngon du 'gro bas snga
T02D3305:173a-18: ma bzhin du sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D3305:173a-19: de nas de ma thag tu brjod pa'i cho gas
T02D3305:173a-20: bdud rtsi lngas byug pa la sogs pa dang gur
T02D3305:173a-21: gum la sogs pas byug pa dang bkru ba dang
T02D3305:173a-22: gos pa'i chu phyi ba'i mthar thug pa rnams byas
T02D3305:173a-23: nas dkyil 'khor gyi khang bar gzhug cing dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:173a-24: gyi dbang ldan gyi mtshams sam der skabs med na
T02D3305:173a-26: ha cang yang mi ring bar dkyil 'khor la mngon
T02D3305:173a-27: du phyogs par sku gzugs la sogs pa gzhag par
T02D3305:173a-28: bya'o // gtsug lag khang la sogs pa bskyod par
T02D3305:173a-29: mi nus pa rnams ni rang gi gnas na gnas
T02D3305:173a-30: bya'o // pa kho na'o // ji ltar rigs par
T02D3305:173a-31: de dag gi thugs ka'i sa bon dang mig la
T02D3305:173a-32: sogs pa dang sku la sogs pa rnams byin gyis
T02D3305:173a-33: brlab pa sgom pa sngon du 'gro bas rang gi
T02D3305:173a-34: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams kyis bdag
T02D3305:173a-35: nyid ji lta ba'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs
T02D3305:173a-36: ba la sogs pa de ma thag tu brjod pa
T02D3305:173a-37: bya'o // pa kho na'o // rnams bya ste /

T02D3305:173a-39: bya'o // pa kho na'o // rnams bya ste /

T02D3305:173a-42: bkug nas rang nyid ji lta ba'i dam tshig sems
T02D3305:173a-43: dpa' la gzhug cing ro gcig tu byas te dbang
T02D3305:173a-44: bya'o // pa kho na'o // rnams bya ste /

T02D3305:173a-47: bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang spyan
T02D3305:173a-48: ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams mdun du nam
T02D3305:173b-0: mchod nas sku gzugs la sogs @173b la sogs pa dbang bskur ba'i don du /
T02D3305:173b-1: rdo rje can gyis sangs rgyas la //
T02D3305:173b-2: 'gro ba bskyab pa'i ched du dbang //
T02D3305:173b-3: ji ltar yon tan 'byung gnas stsal //
T02D3305:173b-4: de ltar 'di la stsal du gsol //
T02D3305:173b-5: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad par gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D3305:173b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang shes rab dang snyoms
T02D3305:173b-7: par zhugs pas chags pa chen pos zhu bar gyur
T02D3305:173b-8: nas / rang gi rnam par snang mdzad kyi lam nas zhugs te /
T02D3305:173b-9: rdo rje'i lam nas phyung ba'i khu ba de rnams
T02D3305:173b-10: kyis sku gzugs la sogs pa kha nas padmar zhugs
T02D3305:173b-11: pa la dbang bskur nas slar yang zhal phyag la
T02D3305:173b-12: sogs pa'i gzugs kyis padma las phyir phyung ba la
T02D3305:173b-13: nam mkha' kun nas gang bar bzhugs pa'i spyan ma
T02D3305:173b-14: la sogs pa'i rigs ma rnams dang lhan cig gdugs
T02D3305:173b-15: dang rgyal mtshan dang gar dang glu dang rol mo'i
T02D3305:173b-16: sgra dang me tog dang gur gum la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:173b-18: phyag gis byang chub kyi sems kyi bdud rtsis gang
T02D3305:173b-19: ba'i bum pa dkar po cung zad yo bar bzung
T02D3305:173b-20: bas sku gzugs la sogs pa padma nas phyir phyung
T02D3305:173b-21: ba de la dbang bskur bzhin pa dang /
T02D3305:173b-22: gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pas /
T02D3305:173b-23: bkra shis gang zhig ces pa la sogs pa'i bkra
T02D3305:173b-24: shis kyi glu rnams rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis len
T02D3305:173b-25: bzhin pa dang / bdag nyid kyis kyang de rnams
T02D3305:173b-26: len bzhin bas rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:173b-27: bum pa'i chu gcig tu bsdus pa dud chos su
T02D3305:173b-28: bzhin pa dang / blugs pa'am / rim pa ji
T02D3305:173b-29: lta ba bzhin du re res kyang rung lag pas
T02D3305:173b-30: 'dab ma dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gzung ba'i rtse
T02D3305:173b-31: mo las 'bab pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi bdud
T02D3305:173b-32: bzhin pa dang / blugs pa'am / rtsi'i ngo bos // ji ltar ba ltams ba tsam gyis ni /
T02D3305:173b-33: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
T02D3305:173b-34: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02D3305:173b-35: de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol bgyi /
T02D3305:173b-36: aom a'a: sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sam ya shvi ye h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:173b-37: aom badzra au da ka aa bhi shinytsa h'um zhes brjod cing /
T02D3305:173b-38: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' nyid bla ma
T02D3305:173b-39: dam pa dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i gzugs su 'khrur
T02D3305:173b-40: 'jug pa dang / khrus gsol bar brtan par mos
T02D3305:173b-41: pas dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes pa chu'i dbang ngo
T02D3305:173b-42: 'jug pa dang / // de bzhin gshegs pa lngas
T02D3305:173b-43: byin gyis brlabs pa'i rin po che dang ras la
T02D3305:174a-0: sogs pa las byas pa'i dbu @174a * //

T02D3305:174a-3: dkyil 'khor gyi dbang po'i gzugs can rdo rje 'dzin
T02D3305:174a-4: pa bla ma nyid kyis bskon par mdzod ces brtan
T02D3305:174a-5: par mos par sku gzugs la sogs pa'i lha'i dbu
T02D3305:174a-6: la bskon par bya'o zhes pa cod pan gyi dbang
T02D3305:174a-7: ngo // dpa' bo la ni aom h'um tr'am hr'i:
T02D3305:174a-8: a'a: zhes pa'i sngags kyis dpral bar dar dpyad bcing
T02D3305:174a-9: ngo // bar bya'o // sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yi //
T02D3305:174a-10: dbang gis de ring khyod dbang bskur //
T02D3305:174a-11: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02D3305:174a-12: rab tu grub phyir rdo rje zung //
T02D3305:174a-13: zhes brjod cing rdo rje de bzhin du rdo rje
T02D3305:174a-14: sems dpa' nyid kyis gtod par lhag par mos pas
T02D3305:174a-15: gtad par bya'o // de yang sku gzugs la sogs
T02D3305:174a-16: pa'i lha rnams kyis bzung bar lhag par mos par
T02D3305:174a-17: gtad par bya'o // bya ste / rdo rje'i dbang ngo //
T02D3305:174a-18: aom badzra aa dha ba ti stv'am aa bhi shinyts'a mi tisha badzras ma ya stvam /
T02D3305:174a-19: zhes brjod cing de lta lhag par mes pas dril bu gtad par bya ste /
T02D3305:174a-20: de yang sku gzugs la sogs pa'i lha yis gzung
T02D3305:174a-21: bar mos par bya ba ni dril bu'i dbang ngo
T02D3305:174a-22: // aom badzra satva tv'am aa bhi shinyts'a mi badzra
T02D3305:174a-23: n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta: aom che ge
T02D3305:174a-24: mo badzra satvam zhes brjod cing /
T02D3305:174a-25: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' nyid sku gzugs
T02D3305:174a-26: la sogs pa la rang nyid ji lta ba bzhin
T02D3305:174a-27: du ming 'dogs par lhag par mos pas brjod par
T02D3305:174a-28: bya ste ming gi dbang ngo //
T02D3305:174a-29: sku gzugs la sogs pa'i rdo rje dang dril bur
T02D3305:174a-30: bcas pa'i phyag gis ye shes kyi phyag rgyal 'khyud
T02D3305:174a-31: pa'i tshul bya bar bsgoms la de ma thag tu

T02D3305:174a-33: bskur te rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag pos spyi

T02D3305:174a-38: lha mo gzhan rnams ni de nyid du ye shes sems dpa'i ngo bor bcug nas /

T02D3305:174a-40: zhes pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab bo //

T02D3305:174a-42: hr'i: bhr'um kham badzri bha wa dri dho tishtha bhr'um
T02D3305:174a-43: kham zhes pa sngags kyis te /

T02D3305:174b-5: zhes brjod cing mig sman gyis sku gzugs kyi spyan dbye bar bya'o //

T02D3305:174b-7: long la bsgoms pa'i gzugs brnyan la ste zhi ba

T02D3305:174b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs rig ma dang bcas pa
T02D3305:174b-16: rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas bcug cing zhu
T02D3305:174b-17: bar gyur pas bde ba chen po nyams su myong
T02D3305:174b-18: nas / rdo rje padma dag gis kha nas spros
T02D3305:174b-19: pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo sku gzugs
T02D3305:174b-20: la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi zhal du rab tu
T02D3305:174b-21: 'bebs par bsam par bya'o zhes pa gsang ba'i dbang

T02D3305:174b-25: pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin du mos par bya'o zhes
T02D3305:174b-26: pa shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo //

T02D3305:174b-38: a'om a'a: badzra dh'u pe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:174b-39: aom a'a: badzra dhi pe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:174b-40: aom a'a: badzra nee bi tye h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:174b-41: aom a'a: badzra gandha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:174b-42: aom sarba a'a ba ra na bi bhya sha ne h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:174b-43: zhes pa'i sngags 'di rnams kyis so //

T02D3305:175a-2: aom badzram sv'a h'a 'bras bu dbul ba'i sngags so //
T02D3305:175a-3: de'i rjes su 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho gas zhi
T02D3305:175a-4: ba'i sbyin sreg gis tshim par byas nas sbyin sreg
T02D3305:175a-6: de med na yang me gzhan la yang ts'a ru'i bza' ba bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D3305:175a-7: phyi nas 'o thug dang dam tshig gi rdzas dang gi wang yang dbul te /

T02D3305:175a-9: zhes pa'i sngags brjod cing sku gzugs dang glegs bam
T02D3305:175a-10: la sogs pa la bsgoms pa'i gzugs brnyan shar ba'i
T02D3305:175a-11: lha rnams gsol du gzhug par bya'o//

T02D3305:175a-14: de nas snang ba mtha' yas shes rab dang bcas pa /
T02D3305:175a-15: glegs bam gyi yi ge rnams la bcug nas yi ge'i gzugs dang /
T02D3305:175a-16: rnam par snang mdzad rig ma dang bcas pa gtsug
T02D3305:175a-17: lag khang ngam mchod rten rnams la bcug nas gtsug
T02D3305:175a-18: lag khang gi gzugs ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang
T02D3305:175a-19: de'i chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D3305:175a-20: nyan thos la sogs pa'i rten dang /
T02D3305:175a-21: ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs pa'i gzhi dang /
T02D3305:175a-22: mchod rten gyi phyi gzugs ni 'khor ba ji srid
T02D3305:175a-23: du 'gro ba'i don bya ba'i phyir rdo rje sems
T02D3305:175a-24: dpa' la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs par bsam par
T02D3305:175a-25: bya'o // de nas me tog la sogs pa phul te thal mo sbyar nas /
T02D3305:175a-26: ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun //
T02D3305:175a-27: dga' ldan du ni rab bzhugs nas //
T02D3305:175a-28: lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums zhugs ltar //
T02D3305:175a-29: de bzhin sku gzugs 'dir bzhugs mdzod //
T02D3305:175a-30: 'dir ni mgon po rtag bzhugs nas //
T02D3305:175a-31: me tog la sogs mchod pa 'di //
T02D3305:175a-32: byang chub sems ni rnam spel phyir //
T02D3305:175a-33: che ge'i don du bzhes su gsol //

T02D3305:175a-35: gsol ba btab nas 'khyil ba'i sngags bzlas shing sku
T02D3305:175a-36: gzugs la sogs pa'i 'og dang bar dang steng gi
T02D3305:175a-37: cha rnams la lag pa g-yas pas rdo rje gsor
T02D3305:175a-38: pa lan gsum skor na brtan par bya ste /
T02D3305:175a-39: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
T02D3305:175a-40: rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po //
T02D3305:175a-41: rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum //
T02D3305:175b-0: rdo @175b rje dbyings khyod phyag 'tshal lo //

T02D3305:175b-2: rdo rje zhi ba dga' chen po //
T02D3305:175b-3: rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog //
T02D3305:175b-4: ston pa rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D3305:175b-5: rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab //
T02D3305:175b-6: rdo rje nam mkha' dri med mkha' //
T02D3305:175b-7: rang bzhin dag pa gos pa med //
T02D3305:175b-8: rdo rje sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3305:175b-9: rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che //
T02D3305:175b-10: mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D3305:175b-11: 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes //
T02D3305:175b-12: rdo rje'i gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3305:175b-13: don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D3305:175b-14: bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad //
T02D3305:175b-15: dag pa ngo bo nyid las byung //
T02D3305:175b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D3305:175b-17: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis bstod pa bya'o //
T02D3305:175b-18: cho ga ma tshang ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i don du /
T02D3305:175b-19: aom badzra sa tva sa ma ya ma nu p'a
T02D3305:175b-20: la ya zhes pa la sogs pa'i yi ge brgya
T02D3305:175b-21: pa'i sngags lan gsum brjod nas /
T02D3305:175b-22: ma rnyed yongs su ma shes dang //
T02D3305:175b-23: ma nus pa yis chad pa dang //
T02D3305:175b-24: gzhan yang nongs pa gang ba gyis pa //
T02D3305:175b-25: de kun thugs rjes bzod mdzad rigs //
T02D3305:175b-26: zhes pas bzod par gsol te //
T02D3305:175b-27: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lha mo dang //
T02D3305:175b-28: de sras rnams dang tshangs la sogs //
T02D3305:175b-29: lha klu rnams kyi cho ga gang //
T02D3305:175b-30: ma tshang la sogs bzod mdzad rigs //
T02D3305:175b-31: me chu sa dang rlung rnams dang //
T02D3305:175b-32: sku gzugs yun ring bsrung du gsol //
T02D3305:175b-33: sbyin bdag rnams dang de sras sogs //
T02D3305:175b-34: slob ma rnams dang bdag la yang //
T02D3305:175b-35: de rnams ma nyes nas thams cad du //
T02D3305:175b-36: zhi rgyas bde legs mdzad du gsol //
T02D3305:175b-37: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D3305:175b-38: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02D3305:175b-39: zhes pas lan gsum gsol ba gdab cing phyogs kyi gtor ma rnams dang /
T02D3305:175b-40: 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma yang dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3305:175b-41: sbyin pa'i bdag pos kyang sku gzugs la sogs pa

T02D3305:176a-0: mi bskyod pa gtso bo 'am rdo rje sems dpa' @176a * //

T02D3305:176a-2: mi shes pa rnams kyang rab tu gnas par bya'o
