T02D3305:176a-4: rigs de'i de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor du'o //
T02D3305:176a-5: 'ga' zhig tu ni sku gang rab tu gnas bya bar //
T02D3305:176a-6: rgyud gang las ni rnam gzhag pa //
T02D3305:176a-7: der ni de yi dkyil 'khor bya //
T02D3305:176a-8: yang na rang gi lhag pa'i lha //
T02D3305:176a-9: slob dpon rang gi gang yin pa //
T02D3305:176a-10: de la dbye ba mthong bar bya //
T02D3305:176a-12: 'dir de yi zhes pa ni sku gzugs kyi ste
T02D3305:176a-13: de nyid dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po nyid kyis so
T02D3305:176a-14: // rang gi lhag pa'i lha ni sku de'i rigs
T02D3305:176a-15: kyi bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa ste 'dir ni
T02D3305:176a-17: yang na slob dpon rang gis ni bdag nyid kyi
T02D3305:176a-18: dkyil 'khor bya ste 'dis gang bsgom pa de nyid
T02D3305:176a-19: 'di'o zhes pa phyogs gsum du brjod do //
T02D3305:176a-20: 'dis ni rgyud gzhan gang yang rung bar gsungs pa'i cho ga de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor du yang /
T02D3305:176a-21: rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa'i lha rnams kyi rab tu gnas pa rigs te /
T02D3305:176a-22: ji ltar gsungs pa'i gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyis
T02D3305:176a-23: de'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams bsdus pa'i phyir ro
T02D3305:176a-24: // mdor bsdus pa rab tu gnas pa ni /
T02D3305:176a-25: sku gzugs la sogs pa stong pa nyid kyi rjes
T02D3305:176a-26: su skad cig gis de dang de'i dam tshig sems
T02D3305:176a-27: dpa'i spyan dang sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab
T02D3305:176a-28: pa bskyed nas / de la de'i ye shes sems
T02D3305:176a-29: dpa' rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer
T02D3305:176a-31: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis
T02D3305:176a-32: bkug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pas dbang
T02D3305:176a-33: bskur zhing rang gis kyang bum pa'i chus mngon par
T02D3305:176a-34: dbang bskur te mchod nas de'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D3305:176a-36: sku gzugs la sogs pa rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D3305:176a-37: gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la bkur
T02D3305:176a-38: sti'i khyad par bya bar 'dod na de'i tshe sgrub
T02D3305:176a-39: pa'i dus nyid du sku gzugs dbu 'am rgyab tu
T02D3305:176a-40: mchod rten gyi nang stong ba byas te /
T02D3305:176a-41: grub na gro ga la gur kum dang gi wang dag gis /
T02D3305:176a-42: na mo bha ga wa te sh'akya mu na ye
T02D3305:176a-43: ta th'a ga ta ya aarha te sa myaksam buddh'a
T02D3305:176a-45: aom mu ni mu ni mu h'a mu na ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:176a-46: ye dharm'a he tu pra bha b'a he tunte sh'anta th'a ga to hya ba data /
T02D3305:176a-47: te sh'anytsa yo ni ro dha ae bam b'a d'i ma h'a shra ma na:/
T02D3305:176b-0: zhes pa'i gzungs kyi khyad par @176b bris nas de khrus byas pa'i gdung la dkris te /
T02D3305:176b-1: aom mantra dh'a tu garbh'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:176b-2: zhes brjod cing stong par gzhug go //
T02D3305:176b-3: aom badzra dh'a tu garbh'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:176b-4: zhes brjod cing rdo rje'i dgag pas stong pa'i sgo
T02D3305:176b-5: bkag nas snga ma bzhin du rab tu gnas par
T02D3305:176b-6: bya'o // gzhan dag tu ni kye'i rdo rje dang
T02D3305:176b-7: bde mchog la sogs pa'i sku gzugs la yang 'dus
T02D3305:176b-8: pa'i dam tshig bskyed pa dang /
T02D3305:176b-9: ye shes pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhug pa dang mngon par
T02D3305:176b-10: dbang bskur ba byas pas rab tu gnas par 'gyur
T02D3305:176b-11: ba nyid de / 'dus pa ni bla na med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3305:176b-12: de'i rjes la de ma thag tu 'dus pa'i dam
T02D3305:176b-13: tshig pa dang ye shes pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang
T02D3305:176b-14: phyug ni bde mchog la sogs pa'i gzugs su gsal
T02D3305:176b-16: de'i sku gzugs kyang de'i gzugs nyid du ci ltar 'gal zhes gsungs so //
T02D3305:176b-17: rig ma rab tu gnas pa ni slob dpon rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs sam /
T02D3305:176b-18: rig ma bdag po'i gzugs su byas te rig ma
T02D3305:176b-19: la rig ma'i bdag po dang de'i ye shes sems
T02D3305:176b-20: dpa' gzhug pa la sogs pa cho ga ji lta
T02D3305:176b-21: ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3305:176b-22: de bzhin du ji ltar rigs par bsgrub bya'i khyad par rnams kyang ngo //
T02D3305:176b-23: de nas rig ma'i bdag po ni sngags rnams dang /
T02D3305:176b-24: bsgrub bya rnams ni rang gi ming la bcug nas
T02D3305:176b-25: rig ma'i spyi bo'i bu ga 'am kha nas bcug
T02D3305:176b-26: ste rdo rje'i lam nas phyung ba lha mo'i padmar
T02D3305:176b-27: zhugs pa la snying ga'i 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i
T02D3305:176b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar zhugs pa rnams kyis
T02D3305:176b-29: dbang bskur zhing phyir phyung ba rnams kyis phyir phyung
T02D3305:176b-30: ba rnams la dbang bskur ba'i tshe bum pa'i chus
T02D3305:176b-31: mngon par dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D3305:176b-32: yang dag par mchod nas rig ma'i bdag po'i snying
T02D3305:176b-33: po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o zhes pa rig
T02D3305:176b-34: ma rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:176b-36: // / slob dpon rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs kyis lag
T02D3305:176b-37: pa g-yas pa'i sor mo rnams rdo rje 'chang gi
T02D3305:176b-38: gzugs kyis lag pa g-yas pa'i sor mo rnams rdo
T02D3305:176b-39: rje rtse lnga pa'i ngo bor skad cig gis bsgom
T02D3305:176b-40: pa la aa: yig las skyes pa'i nyi ma aa:
T02D3305:176b-41: yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D3305:176b-42: lag pa g-yon pa'i sor mo rnams padma'i 'dab ma
T02D3305:176b-43: skad cig gis bsam pa la aa yig las skyes
T02D3305:176b-44: pa'i zla ba des byin gyis brlabs par rnam par
T02D3305:177a-0: bsgoms nas / de dag gi bar du gzung ba'i phreng thag gi skud pa dbus @177a * //
T02D3305:177a-1: ma rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D3305:177a-2: phyogs dang phyogs bral gyi skud pa rnams phyag na
T02D3305:177a-3: padma dang byams pa dang nam mkha'i mdzod dang kun
T02D3305:177a-4: du bzang po dang phyag na rdo rje dang 'jam
T02D3305:177a-5: dpal dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba
T02D3305:177a-6: dang sa'i snying po rnams kyi rang bzhin dang /
T02D3305:177a-7: phreng rdog rnams rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D3305:177a-8: mdo 'dzin ni stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs
T02D3305:177a-9: pa'i chos kyi mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du skad
T02D3305:177a-10: cig gis lhag par mos nas snying ga'i sa bon
T02D3305:177a-11: gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D3305:177a-12: la sogs pa rnams rang nyid ji lta ba la
T02D3305:177a-13: bcug ste / aakkha ru k'a ra na r'u aa
T02D3305:177a-14: so hi aa manta bi s'a ru ga ni aa
T02D3305:177a-15: bcug ste / / aa sam kha aa likka sirdza au tatta bi s'a ru /
T02D3305:177a-16: aom pa de pa de ma h'a dzny'a nam sarba
T02D3305:177a-17: buddha ma ham bha we h'um h'um ho ho aa
T02D3305:177a-18: kham sv'a h'a / zhes pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab cing /
T02D3305:177a-19: bum pa'i chus mngon par dbang bskur nas mchod par bya'o zhes pa phreng ba rab tu gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:177a-20: mdor bsdus pa ni bgrang phreng gsung rdo rjer rnam
T02D3305:177a-21: par bsgoms nas ye shes sems dpa' dang gcig tu
T02D3305:177a-22: byas te / de yongs su gyur pa las bgrang
T02D3305:177a-23: phreng gi rnam par bsams la bum pa'i chus mngon
T02D3305:177a-24: par dbang bskur zhing mchod nas gsung rdo rje'i snying
T02D3305:177a-25: po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so zhes pa /
T02D3305:177a-26: mdor bsdus pas bgrang phreng rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:177a-28: // / da ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las gsungs
T02D3305:177a-29: pa'i bgrang phreng gi cho ga bri bar bya ste
T02D3305:177a-30: / zhi rgyas de bzhin dbang dang ni //
T02D3305:177a-31: mngon spyod dang ni las kun la //
T02D3305:177a-32: rdo rje 'dzin pas mnyam bshad pa //
T02D3305:177a-33: bo dhi tsi ni rab tu bstan //
T02D3305:177a-34: shel dang nya phyis dag dang ni //
T02D3305:177a-35: mu tig dang ni khams kun skyes //
T02D3305:177a-36: de bzhin dung gi mi dag rnams //
T02D3305:177a-37: tshe dang lang tsho 'phel bar byed //
T02D3305:177a-38: gser dang de bzhin dngul dang ni //
T02D3305:177a-39: padma'i sa bon de bzhin mchog /'di yi sbyor ba'i sngags kyis ni //
T02D3305:177a-41: gur gum la sogs dri bzangs dang //
T02D3305:177a-42: khyad par du ni byi ru dang //
T02D3305:177a-43: tsandan dmar po dag dang ni //
T02D3305:177a-44: de bzhin dmar po gzhan la yang //
T02D3305:177a-45: sgrub pa po yis ril bu bya //
T02D3305:177a-46: sngags kyi rgyal po'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D3305:177b-0: dbang dang rjes su chags pa mchog / sgrub pa po la 'bras rab @177b ster //
T02D3305:177b-1: ru tr'aksha dang de bzhin du //
T02D3305:177b-2: lung tang sa bon mi rus te //
T02D3305:177b-3: 'di yi bzlas pas drag po dang //
T02D3305:177b-4: mngon spyod la ni 'bras rab ster //
T02D3305:177b-5: zhi ba la ni brgya phrag gcig / rgyas la de bzhin lhag pa brgyad //
T02D3305:177b-6: dbang la nyi shu rtsa lnga ste //
T02D3305:177b-7: sngags bsgrub pa la brgya phrag phyad //
T02D3305:177b-8: ril bu drug cu'i sbyor ba yi //
T02D3305:177b-9: drag po mngon spyod las la'o //
T02D3305:177b-11: snying rje'i bdag nyid sngags pas so //
T02D3305:177b-12: ril bu thams cad dgra bcom ste //
T02D3305:177b-13: steng du mchod rten yongs su brtag / mchod rten chos kyi spang po'i phyir //
T02D3305:177b-14: chos kyi dbyings ni dbus su'o //
T02D3305:177b-15: dngos grub kun byed zhi ba la //
T02D3305:177b-16: gser gyi skud pas brgyu bar bya //
T02D3305:177b-17: yang na ras ba la skud pa ni //
T02D3305:177b-18: gzhon nu ma yis bkal bas so //
T02D3305:177b-19: bya rog sgro yi skud pa yis //
T02D3305:177b-20: bskrad pa'o bong bu rnams dang ni //
T02D3305:177b-21: de bzhin rnga mo'i skra yis kyang //
T02D3305:177b-22: mkhas pa yis ni bskrad par bya //
T02D3305:177b-23: ma he'i skra yi skud pa yis //
T02D3305:177b-24: rnam par btang pa'o rta yi kyang //
T02D3305:177b-25: dur khrod skra yi skud pa dang //
T02D3305:177b-26: khyi yi spu ni bsres pa yis //
T02D3305:177b-27: ril bu brgyus nas yang dag par //
T02D3305:177b-28: khro ba'i las ni mnyam par spyad //
T02D3305:177b-29: las gang la ni skud pa gang //
T02D3305:177b-30: bshad pa yang ni mdor bsdus pa'o //
T02D3305:177b-31: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //
T02D3305:177b-32: dbang dang mngon spyod las la yang //
T02D3305:177b-33: sor mo sogs la mnyam gzhag nas //
T02D3305:177b-34: mkhas pas rim pa ji bzhin bya //
T02D3305:177b-35: de bzhin mthe bong mnyam sbyar nas //
T02D3305:177b-36: thams cad 'gugs pa'i rang bzhin du //
T02D3305:177b-37: mnyam par gzhag ste gnas byas nas //
T02D3305:177b-39: zhes pa sna tshogs pa'i las kyi bgrang phreng gi cho ga'o /
T02D3305:177b-41: // / legs par grub pa lha yi gnas dang spos khang dang //
T02D3305:177b-42: gtsug lag khang dang khang bzangs khang mig 'dun khang rnams //
T02D3305:177b-43: mnyam par bltas nas dam pa'i sgo yi dbus kyi rtser //
T02D3305:177b-44: rgyal mtshan rnams ni nges par rab tu gzugs par bya //
T02D3305:177b-45: gser dang nor bu nyi ma'i shel dang dngul dang ni //
T02D3305:177b-46: 'jim pa mchog dang shing las byas pa nyid kyang ste //
T02D3305:177b-47: legs par gnas pa drang zhing brtan pa rab 'bar ba //
T02D3305:177b-48: cha gsum mnyam pa legs par dgod par bya //
T02D3305:177b-49: rgyal ba'i dbang po'i khang brtsegs rnams dang khang mig dang //
T02D3305:177b-50: 'dun khang rnams kyi tshad la sgo ni ring ba'i tshad //
T02D3305:178a-0: de phyed tshad ni spong khang rnams @178a * //
T02D3305:178a-2: legs par 'jug ste rgyal la yang ni de bzhin nyid //
T02D3305:178a-3: rgyal mtshan ji snyed bum pa dang ni mtshungs pa ste //
T02D3305:178a-4: thub pa'i dbang po'i ye shes bdud rtsis gang ba nyid //
T02D3305:178a-5: bdud rtsi'i 'od can dam pa'i dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis //
T02D3305:178a-6: legs par bkrus nas gtsug lag khang gi lus su'o //
T02D3305:178a-7: de bslang ba ni bhr'um las byung ba'i mchod rten gzugs //
T02D3305:178a-8: rnam par bsams nas gdugs dang gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D3305:178a-9: me tog gos dang skud pa lngas bcings bzlas bya ste //
T02D3305:178a-10: mnyam par gzugs bya rdo rje dang ni bcas pas so //
T02D3305:178a-11: shar du gnas pas rgyal ba'i dbang po'i gsang sngags dang //
T02D3305:178a-12: lho ru gnas pas rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i gsang sngags ni //
T02D3305:178a-13: nub tu gnas byas 'od dpag med pa'i gsang sngags dang //
T02D3305:178a-14: byang nas kyang ni thub pa rgyan gyi yid kyis te //
T02D3305:178a-15: g-yas skor du ni kun nas rab tu bskor 'gro zhing //
T02D3305:178a-16: me tog gos dang skud par byas pa'i lag pa yis //
T02D3305:178a-17: rab tu gnas bya me tog mchod yon 'bras sogs kyi //
T02D3305:178a-18: bum pas mngon par dbang bskur bya ste 'bad pas so //
T02D3305:178a-19: rol mo dang bcas dud dang zangs dung rnams kyi ni //
T02D3305:178a-20: sgra dang bcas shing bum pa rnams dang mnyam ldan pas //
T02D3305:178a-21: bud med rnams kyi bkra shis glu dbyangs dang //
T02D3305:178a-22: lhan cig pa yi rdo rje slob dpon rnams kyis so //
T02D3305:178a-23: rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngags ni //
T02D3305:178a-24: aom sukshme sukshme sa me sa ma ye sh'ante sh'ante /
T02D3305:178a-27: ni r'a lam bhe ni r'a ku le ni rb'a ne /
T02D3305:178a-29: ma h'a te dze sarba buddh'a dhishth'a na aa dhishthi te sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:178a-30: shar nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig go //
T02D3305:178a-31: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi sngags chen po ni /
T02D3305:178a-32: aom dhva dza aa gra ke y'u ri dza ya dza ya /
T02D3305:178a-33: bi dza ya bi dza ya /
T02D3305:178a-38: bha ga wa ti dza ya b'a hi ni /
T02D3305:178a-41: pra ma tha pra ma tha /
T02D3305:178a-51: aa si mu kha la tsakra tri sh'u la badzra ka ba tsa dh'a ri ni /
T02D3305:178a-58: bi dhu na bi dhu na /
T02D3305:178a-59: spho ta ya spho ta ya /
T02D3305:178b-3: sarba sha tr'um tru ta tru ta /
T02D3305:178b-7: tree lo kya ma tha ni /
T02D3305:178b-16: aa ta da h'a sam bhra ma ya sam bhra ma ya /
T02D3305:178b-17: tr'a sha ya bu ddh'a sa tya na dharma sa tya na sam gha sa tya na /
T02D3305:178b-19: sa tya na buddha sa tyam na m'a ti kra
T02D3305:178b-20: ma satya b'a d'i nam satya m'a ti kra ma
T02D3305:178b-21: lambo da ri / ku ta ku ta /
T02D3305:178b-22: ru ta ya ku ta ya /
T02D3305:178b-24: bishnu m'a na ya tsandha s'u rya m'a na ya
T02D3305:178b-25: tree lo kya aa dhi pa ti m'a na ya
T02D3305:178b-26: / sarba yaksha raksha sa kum bh'anda ma ho ra ga aa d'i n'am ma na ya m'am /
T02D3305:178b-28: raksha sa ya raksha sa ya /
T02D3305:178b-29: tsu lu tsu lu pushpa m'i li ni /
T02D3305:178b-34: bhri ku ti mu khi pa ra see n+ye ku lo tstsha da na ka ri /
T02D3305:178b-39: kr'u na ma ti dzambu dhva dze buddha aa pa lo ki ti /
T02D3305:178b-40: raksha raksha sam sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki te sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:178b-41: gu na r'a dzi pra bh'a sa au tta me sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:178b-42: tsandra aarka pi mi ne sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:178b-43: sarba gra ha na ksha tra dh'a mi ka ra ni sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:178b-44: raksha raksha ai mam stha nam sarba bha ye bhya:sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:178b-46: 'od dpag med kyi sngags kyi rgyal po ni /
T02D3305:178b-47: aom aa mi te aa mi ta aa mi to dbha we /
T02D3305:178b-48: aa mi ta sam bha we aa mi ta bi
T02D3305:178b-49: kra'nte g'a mi ni aa mi ta a'a yurda te
T02D3305:178b-50: dharma dh'a tudzny'a na ga ga na pa ri k'irta
T02D3305:178b-51: te sarbba karma kle sha ksha yam ka r'i ye
T02D3305:178b-52: sv'a h'a / nub nas lan bdun no //
T02D3305:178b-53: rdo rje snying po brgyan gyi gzungs kyi sngags ni /
T02D3305:178b-54: aom bo dhi bo dhi sarbba bo dhi sarbba ta
T02D3305:178b-55: th'a ga ta go tsa ri dha ra tsa ri
T02D3305:178b-56: dha ra / ha ra ha ra /
T02D3305:178b-57: pra ha ra phra ha ra ma h'a bo dhi tsitta dha ra /
T02D3305:178b-58: tsu lu tsu lu rasmi sanytso di te sarba ta
T02D3305:178b-59: th'a ga ta aa bhi shi kte gu na ga
T02D3305:178b-60: ga ne shuddha / gu na aa ba bh'a se mi li mi li /
T02D3305:178b-61: ga ga na ta la pra tishthi te sha ma sha ma /
T02D3305:178b-62: pra sha ma pra sha ma /
T02D3305:178b-63: sarba p'a pa pra sha ma ne sarba p'a pa bi sho dha ni hu lu hu lu /
T02D3305:178b-64: ma h'a bo dhi m'a rga sam prasthi te /
T02D3305:178b-65: sarba ta th'a ga ta mu dre sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:178b-67: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma ni shapta dipte
T02D3305:178b-68: dzv'a la dzv'a la dharma dh'a tu garbhe sv'a h'a
T02D3305:178b-69: / ye dharm'a he tu pra bha b'a he tunte sh'anta th'a ga to hye ba da ta /
T02D3305:178b-70: te sh'anytsa yo ni ro dha ae bam b'a d'i
T02D3305:178b-71: ma h'a shra ma na: shar nyid nas so zhes
T02D3305:179a-0: @179a * // rdo rje aa ba dhu t'i brtan pa'i yu bar gnas /
T02D3305:179a-1: sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dab ma nges par 'ching byed pa //
T02D3305:179a-2: ham yig las skyes padma rnam par dag pa'i gdugs //
T02D3305:179a-3: kun nas mdzes pa 'bar ba'i mtha' dang ldan pa nyid //
T02D3305:179a-4: dpal ldan chos kyi dbyings kyis mtshan zhing mdzes pa'i gzugs //
T02D3305:179a-5: rin chen dra ba phyed pa'i phreng ba skyes pas mdzes //
T02D3305:179a-6: sems kyi mthon po 'phrog par byed pa'i rgyal bas mtshan //
T02D3305:179a-7: gdugs la gnas zhes sbyor ba rig pa yin //
T02D3305:179a-8: aom na ma:samanta buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am a'a tsandra tstsha tra a'a ba li sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:179a-9: brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o zhes pa gdugs kyi'o //
T02D3305:179a-10: ye shes me long chen po rab 'bar zhing //
T02D3305:179a-11: rdo rje'i bdag nyid mdzes pa'i yu bar gnas //
T02D3305:179a-12: ri rab padma'i gdan dang seng ge la //
T02D3305:179a-13: sogs pa'i rgyal mtshan chen po dga' ba che //
T02D3305:179a-14: aa ga ma ga sa yi sa bon las byung ba'i //
T02D3305:179a-15: gzhan gyis mi thub bum pa mkha' lding chu srin sogs //
T02D3305:179a-16: nya dang rma bya ri dags nor bu seng ges mtshan //
T02D3305:179a-17: zla ba'i thig le padma'i gzugs dang ldan pa nyid //
T02D3305:179a-18: aom a'a:badzra dhva dza ba ti tsa yo tta ri sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:179a-19: zhes pas te rgyal mtshan gyi'o //
T02D3305:179a-20: shes rab las byung dam pa'i grags dang yon tan mchog gi phun tshogs can //
T02D3305:179a-21: pam gyi sa bon las byung rnam pa sna tshogs ldan pa'i bdan rnams //
T02D3305:179a-22: aom a'a:badzra ke tu badzra pa t'a ke aa dhi tishtha pam sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:179a-23: zhes pa ste ba dan gyi'o //
T02D3305:179a-24: dam pa'i gser dang rin po che dang mu tig 'bar ba sna tshogs pa'i //
T02D3305:179a-25: yu bar sgeg cing bkra shis chen po 'byung ba'i rnga yab rnams kyang ngo //
T02D3305:179a-26: tsam gyi sa bon las rnga yab rnams su ste /
T02D3305:179a-27: aom tsu ru ts'a ma ri sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:179a-28: zhes pa ni rnga yab kyi'o //
T02D3305:179a-29: gtor ma sbyin sreg la sogs cho ga yis //
T02D3305:179a-30: rgyas pa'i yid kyis mtha' dag lha yi tshogs //
T02D3305:179a-31: grong khyer gnas sogs nor las skyes rnams kyis //
T02D3305:179a-32: mnyes par bya ste bsod nams don du'o //
T02D3305:179a-33: rgyal mtshan la sogs pa gzugs pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:179a-35: // / sbyin pa'i bdag po la nus pa yod na
T02D3305:179a-36: chu'i 'gram du rnam par snang mdzad gtso bor gyur
T02D3305:179a-37: pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa ste 'khor lo'i dbang phyug
T02D3305:179a-38: gi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas rdzing la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:179a-39: phyogs su gtor ma btang nas chu stong par gyur
T02D3305:179b-0: par bsams la / @179b bhr'um las skyes pa'i 'khor
T02D3305:179b-1: lo dang bhr'um las rdzogs shing spyan ma dang snyoms
T02D3305:179b-2: par 'jug pa'i rnam par snang mdzad yongs su gyur
T02D3305:179b-3: pa las rdo rje chu lha dkar po mi'i gdong
T02D3305:179b-4: pa la gdengs ka bdun dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:179b-5: phyag g-yon pa klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa mdzes ma la 'khyud cing snyoms par zhugs pa /
T02D3305:179b-6: g-yas pa 'gying ba dang bcas pas autpala sngon po 'dzin pa /
T02D3305:179b-7: lte ba'i 'og nas sprul gyi rnam pa can gyi dam tshig sems dpa' rnam par bsgoms nas /
T02D3305:179b-8: de la rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od
T02D3305:179b-9: zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D3305:179b-10: mchod yon la sogs pa dbul ba sngon du 'gro
T02D3305:179b-11: bas aom badzra sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod pas
T02D3305:179b-13: mngon par dbang bskur ba la me tog la sogs
T02D3305:179b-14: pas yang dag par mchod cing de yongs su gyur
T02D3305:179b-15: pa'i gzugs brnyan dang ldan pas ye shes bdud rtsi'i
T02D3305:179b-16: rang bzhin dri bzang ba dang ro zhim pa dang
T02D3305:179b-17: yang ba dang dri ma med pa dang 'jam pa
T02D3305:179b-18: dang bsil ba dag mgrin pa dang lto ba la
T02D3305:179b-19: mi gnod pa ste yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i
T02D3305:179b-20: chu dbang chen gyi mthil la thug par klu rigs
T02D3305:179b-21: brgyad kyi gnas dang rlabs kyi phreng ba dang ldan
T02D3305:179b-22: par kun nas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3305:179b-23: de la yang chu'i mthil du bzo byas pa'i klu
T02D3305:179b-24: brgyad 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can skad cig gis
T02D3305:179b-25: dam tshig sems dpa'i gzugs su byas pa snying ga'i
T02D3305:179b-26: sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i ye shes
T02D3305:179b-27: sems dpa' dang dbyer med pa rnams gzhag par bya
T02D3305:179b-28: zhing / de yang ku mu da dang autpala dang
T02D3305:179b-29: padma dang ldan pa'i rdzing ngam 'bab chu 'am khron
T02D3305:179b-30: pa la sogs pa rnams su ni /
T02D3305:179b-31: de yi zabs su nyis 'gyur du ni bslang ba yi //
T02D3305:179b-32: zlum por gyur ba chu lha'i bdag nyid can gyi shing //
T02D3305:179b-33: gdengs ka bdun gyis mtshan pa'i rtse mo dang ldan pa //
T02D3305:179b-34: chu yi dbus su gzhag par bya ste shing chen po //
T02D3305:179b-35: phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams su yang nam klu rnams te //
T02D3305:179b-36: gdengs ka dgu dang ldan pa rnams ni rim pas so //
T02D3305:179b-37: shing gi dngos po med na dbus su shel las ni //
T02D3305:179b-38: legs par byas pa'i chu lha yi ni rgyal po ste //
T02D3305:179b-39: de yi chu ni dkar po'i mdog can zhim pa yi //
T02D3305:179b-40: ro dang ldan zhing bsil la dri ma med pa'o //
T02D3305:179b-41: de yi phyi rol shar du mtha' yas gser gyi ni //
T02D3305:179b-42: rang bzhin padma'i mtshan ma spyi bor ldan pa ste //
T02D3305:180a-0: chu ni mig sman phye ma'i mdog can tshab @180a * //
T02D3305:180a-2: kha zhing dug dang mtshungs pa 'jigs su rung ba'o //
T02D3305:180a-3: lho ru ra gan mnyam pa'i rang bzhin padma ni //
T02D3305:180a-4: dpal gyi be'u mtshan ma spyi bor ldan pa ste //
T02D3305:180a-5: de yi chu ni kunda zla ba pad rtsa dang //
T02D3305:180a-6: mtshungs shing mdar la kha ba dang yang ldan pa'o //
T02D3305:180a-7: nub tu zangs kyi rang bzhin 'jog po 'jigs rung ba //
T02D3305:180a-8: spyi bor dga' ba 'khyil pa dang ni ldan pa ste //
T02D3305:180a-9: de yi chu ni gur gum dang mtshungs bska ba dang //
T02D3305:180a-10: tsha ba shin tu kha ba dang yang ldan pa'o //
T02D3305:180a-11: nor sbyin phyogs su dngul las sprul pa klu yi ni //
T02D3305:180a-12: mnga' bdag nor rgyas gdengs ka'i spyi bor autpala //
T02D3305:180a-13: sngon pos mtshan pa'o de yi chu ni ljang gu dang //
T02D3305:180a-14: ser po tsha zhing kha ba dang yang ldan pa'o //
T02D3305:180a-15: dbang ldan du ni zha nye dkar po las byas pa'i //
T02D3305:180a-16: padma chen po spyi bor rtse gsum mtshan pa ste //
T02D3305:180a-17: de yi chu ni gser gyi 'od can rlabs med pa //
T02D3305:180a-18: zhim pa dang ni tsha zhing dro bar gyur pa'o //
T02D3305:180a-19: me yi mtshams su zha nye nag po las byung ba'i //
T02D3305:180a-20: klu dbang dung skyong spyi bor bkra shis kyis mtshan pa //
T02D3305:180a-21: chu ni gur gum yung ba dag dang mtshungs pa ste //
T02D3305:180a-22: dmar ba dad ni bska ba'i ro can tshim byed pa'o //
T02D3305:180a-23: bden bral du ni 'khar ba dag las byas pa yi //
T02D3305:180a-24: klu yi dbang po stobs kyi rgyu ni mgrin pa la //
T02D3305:180a-25: ri mo rnam pa gsum gyis gyen du mtshan pa ste //
T02D3305:180a-26: chu ni dkar po zhim zhing bsil la dga' ba'o //
T02D3305:180a-27: rlung gi phyogs su lcags las sprul pa'i rigs ldan che //
T02D3305:180a-28: mgrin par zla ba'i cha shas rnams kyis mtshan pa ste //
T02D3305:180a-29: chu ni dmar zhing ser po'i mdog can ro mngar zhing //
T02D3305:180a-30: bska ba dang ldan bsil zhing dri ma med pa'o //
T02D3305:180a-31: chu ni kha dog dbye ba dag dang ro yi ni //
T02D3305:180a-32: dbye ba'i khyad par rtags las rjes su shes bya ste //
T02D3305:180a-33: klu rnams kyi ni rigs rnams dag dang gnas rnams la //
T02D3305:180a-34: kun nas bya ba'i don rnams yang dag 'grub pa'o //
T02D3305:180a-35: gang yang thang sogs gnas rnams la ni dpang byed pa //
T02D3305:180a-36: klu yi mnga' bdag rnams ni ji ltar 'dod bzhin gsungs //
T02D3305:180a-37: zhing rnams su ni chu mig la gnas mtha' yas te //
T02D3305:180a-38: lha yi gnas la klu yi rgyal po nor rgyas so //
T02D3305:180a-39: sangs rgyas gnas kyi rdzing dang rdzing bur dga' bo dang //
T02D3305:180a-40: nyer dga' bo ste yur ba yi ni chu rnams la //
T02D3305:180a-41: ri yi rtse dang ri shod rnams su dung skyong ste //
T02D3305:180b-0: stobs kyi @180b rgyu ni rgya mtsho rnams dang 'bab chu la'o //
T02D3305:180b-1: gling gi chu klung ldeng ka'i sa la rab gnas shing //
T02D3305:180b-2: byas pa'i nags tshal dga' ba la gnas 'jog po'i dbang //
T02D3305:180b-3: skyes tshal me tog rgyas pas dga' ba'i cha dang ni //
T02D3305:180b-4: mtsho rnam dang ni mtsho la klu rgyal nag po ste //
T02D3305:180b-5: padma chen po chu skyes dum bu la shes bya //
T02D3305:180b-6: khron pa dang ni khron chu rnams la rigs ldan klu //
T02D3305:180b-7: chu mig mnyam pa'i chu yi ro yi khyad par la'o //
T02D3305:180b-8: klu rgyal padma autpala nags tshal sogs la ste //
T02D3305:180b-9: 'o ma mar dang dkar rnams dang sbrang rtsi dang //
T02D3305:180b-10: dngul chu chu rgyun rnams kyis yang dag mngon par mchod //
T02D3305:180b-11: d'ur ba rnams dang kunda dang ni til sogs kyis //
T02D3305:180b-12: chu yi 'gram du sbyin sreg la sogs bya ba nyid //
T02D3305:180b-13: bdud rtsi lnga rnams sbrang rtsi dang ni ldan pa dang //
T02D3305:180b-14: 'o ma mar gyi chang dang bral ba'i gtor ma sbyin //
T02D3305:180b-15: 'di dag rnams kyi sngags rnams kyi ni cho ga yis //
T02D3305:180b-16: slob dpon dbang po rnams kyis mtha' yas yang dag 'phags//
T02D3305:180b-17: aom a'a: ba ru n'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:180b-18: aom a'a: aa nant'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:180b-19: aom a'a: padm'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:180b-20: aom a'a: taksha k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:180b-21: aom a'a: b'a su ki ye h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:180b-22: aom a'a: ma h'a padm'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:180b-23: aom a'a: sham kha p'a l'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:180b-24: aom a'a: karko ta k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:180b-25: aom a'a: ku li k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:180b-26: zhes pa snying po'i sngags rnams so //

T02D3305:180b-29: g-yas pa mchog sbyin gyi tshul du brkyang la /
T02D3305:180b-30: aom a'a nanta b'a su ki taksha ka karko ta ka /
T02D3305:180b-31: padma ma h'a padma shadkha p'a la ku li ka /
T02D3305:180b-32: ba ru na p'a la de be ti ma h'a de ba ti /

T02D3305:180b-34: aa pa l'a la hu lu hu lu nanto pa nanta /
T02D3305:180b-35: s'a ga ra ma h'a s'a ga ra aa na tapta ma h'a tapta /
T02D3305:180b-37: su r'u pa ma h'a su r'u pa /
T02D3305:180b-38: bha dra hi ka/ ma ho da ra /
T02D3305:180b-39: si li ma h'a si li a'a gatstsha ta a'a
T02D3305:180b-40: gatstsha ta ma h'a n'a ga aa dhi pa ta
T02D3305:180b-41: ye bhu rbhu wa h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:180b-42: zhes pa klu'i gtor ma'i sngags brjod cing 'o ma'i gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D3305:180b-43: de nas yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i don du gsol ba btab la /
T02D3305:180b-44: yi ge brgya pa brjod nas bzod par gsol te
T02D3305:180b-45: byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'o ma'i gtor ma de rnams
T02D3305:181a-1: su dbul zhing de'i phyi rol du'ang gtor bar bya'o //
T02D3305:181a-2: gzhon nu ma rnams kyang tshim par bya'o zhes pa
T02D3305:181a-3: rdzing dang chu mig dang khron pa rab tu gnas
T02D3305:181a-5: / aa mra'i skyed mos tshal la sogs pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ni /
T02D3305:181a-6: phyogs kyi gtor ma phul nas rnam par snang mdzad
T02D3305:181a-7: kyi bdag nyid kyis shing gi gtso bo stong pa
T02D3305:181a-8: nyid kyi rjes la rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs
T02D3305:181a-9: su bsams te / de las ye shes sems dpa'
T02D3305:181a-10: rnam par snang mdzad mchod yon la sogs pa sngon
T02D3305:181a-12: bum pa'i chus mngon par dbang bskur la de yongs su gyur pa'i shing de dang /
T02D3305:181a-13: de nyid kyi tshe shing gzhan rnams kyang de yongs su gyur par lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02D3305:181a-14: shing gi gtso bo de dang de dag la byin
T02D3305:181a-15: gyis brlabs pa'i lha'i me tog la sogs pas yang
T02D3305:181a-17: 'bras bu la sogs pa rnams kyis gzhan gyi don

T02D3305:181a-19: du gnas par gsol ba btab nas phyogs kyi gtor
T02D3305:181a-20: ma rnams dbul bar bya'o zhes pa nags tshal la
T02D3305:181a-21: sogs pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:181a-23: // / brjod pa'i cho ga 'di rnams thams cad la
T02D3305:181a-24: las gang la sngags ma brjod pa der ni las
T02D3305:181a-25: thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas so zhes yongs su bshad
T02D3305:181a-26: par bya'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa //
T02D3305:181a-27: gal te bde gshegs bstan pa la //
T02D3305:181a-28: dad pa'i rigs kyi bu yong na //
T02D3305:181a-29: dad por gsum la skyabs 'gro sbyin //
T02D3305:181a-30: phyi nas byang chub kyi ni sems //
T02D3305:181a-31: de nas bslab pa'i gnas lnga dang //
T02D3305:181a-32: gso sbyong la sogs mnyam par ldan //
T02D3305:181a-33: mi dge bcu ni yongs spong ba //
T02D3305:181a-34: byin nas dge bsnyen du ni bya //
T02D3305:181a-35: 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba brjod par bya ste /
T02D3305:181a-36: de la dang por rim pa 'dis bla ma'i mandala bya'o //
T02D3305:181a-37: aom bam badzra au da ke h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:181a-39: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D3305:181a-40: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
T02D3305:181a-41: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis//
T02D3305:181a-42: de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo //
T02D3305:181a-43: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02D3305:181a-46: lag pa dang rkang pa bkru ba dang zhabs bsil ba'i sngags so //
T02D3305:181a-47: na mo bha ga wa te pushpa ke tu r'a dz'a ya /
T02D3305:181a-49: aadha te samyaksa mbu ddh'a ya /
T02D3305:181b-0: @181b aom pushpe pushpe ma h'a pushpe su pushpe pushpa audbha we /
T02D3305:181b-2: pushpa aa wa k'i rne sv'a h'a /

T02D3305:181b-4: aom badzra bh'u mi h'um phat /
T02D3305:181b-5: 'dis sa la chus mngon par gtor bar bya'o //
T02D3305:181b-6: aom badzra satva sarba bighn'a nutp'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02D3305:181b-8: sbyin pa lci ba chu dang bcas pa tshul khrims yang dag byug pa yin //
T02D3305:181b-9: bzod ba grog sbur phra mo sel ba brtson 'grus bya ba lags gnas pa //
T02D3305:181b-10: bsam gtan 'phral du rtse gcig sems pa shes rab ri mo legs 'bar ba //
T02D3305:181b-11: pha rol phyin drug 'di rnams thub pa'i mandala byas pas thob par 'gyur //
T02D3305:181b-12: bde gshegs pho brang mchog 'dir lus kyi las rnams byas ba yis //
T02D3305:181b-13: nad rnams kun las rnam par grol zhing gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur //
T02D3305:181b-14: lha mi khyad 'phags zla ba bzhin du gsal zhing mdzes pa dang //
T02D3305:181b-15: nor dang gser sogs phun tshogs rgyal po'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur //
T02D3305:181b-17: aom su re khe badzra khe /
T02D3305:181b-18: aa dhi tishtha ntu sarba ta th'a ga t'a: sv'a h'a /

T02D3305:181b-25: sv'a h'a / 'dis me tog gcig spyi bor sbyin no //
T02D3305:181b-26: aom a'a sa na badzre h'um /
T02D3305:181b-27: 'dis gdan la me tog gcig sbyin no //
T02D3305:181b-28: aom sum su me ra wa na ma: 'dis mandal gyi dbus su me tog gcig dbul lo //
T02D3305:181b-29: aom h'um autta me ra we na ma: aom h'um

T02D3305:181b-33: // aom yam p'urba bi de ha ya na ma:

T02D3305:181b-41: au pa dv'i p'a ya na ma: 'dis me la sogs pa'i zur rnams su me tog dbul lo //

T02D3305:181b-43: shvo ratn'a yan ma: aom lam pu ru sha ratn'a
T02D3305:181b-44: yan ma: aom wam str'i ratn'a yan ma: shar lus
T02D3305:182a-0: @182a * // 'phags po la sogs pa'i nang du me tog dbul lo //
T02D3305:182a-1: aom ya: tsa kra ratn'a ya na ma: aom ya:
T02D3305:182a-2: khadga ratn'a ya na ma: aom l'a: ma ni ratn'a
T02D3305:182a-3: ya na ma: aom w'a: sarba ni dha ne bhyo
T02D3305:182a-4: na ma: me la sogs pa'i zur rnams kyi nang
T02D3305:182a-6: aom a'a: badzra gu ra we ai dam badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:182a-7: 'dis ri rab kyi dbus kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i
T02D3305:182a-8: nang sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba'i steng du
T02D3305:182a-9: bla ma rdo rje sems dpar bsams ba la me
T02D3305:182a-10: tog snyim pa gsum spyi bor dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3305:182a-11: aom a'a: badzra gu ra we badzra dh'u pe h'um
T02D3305:182a-12: aom a'a: badzra gu ra we badzra d'i pa h'um
T02D3305:182a-13: / aom a'a: badzra gur we badzra gandhe h'um /
T02D3305:182a-14: aom a'a: badzra gur we badzra nee wi tya h'um /
T02D3305:182a-15: aom a'a: badzra gu ra we badzr'a darsha na ph'a l'a ya h'um /
T02D3305:182a-16: rim pa 'di nyid kyis gzhan du yang gang cung
T02D3305:182a-17: zad de thams cad cho ga 'dis dbul bar bya'o
T02D3305:182a-19: slar yang me tog gi snyim pas phul te //
T02D3305:182a-20: sangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3305:182a-21: skyob ba chos la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3305:182a-23: gsum rnams la yang rtag phyag 'tshal //
T02D3305:182a-24: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs 'chi //
T02D3305:182a-25: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02D3305:182a-26: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02D3305:182a-27: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D3305:182a-28: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la //
T02D3305:182a-29: byang chub par du skyabs su mchi //
T02D3305:182a-30: rang gzhan don ni rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D3305:182a-31: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed bgyi'o //
T02D3305:182a-32: byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed bgyis nas //
T02D3305:182a-33: sems can thams cad bdag gis mgron du gnyer //
T02D3305:182a-34: byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi //
T02D3305:182a-35: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'gyur bar shog //
T02D3305:182a-36: sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi //
T02D3305:182a-37: bsod nams la yang rjes yi rang //
T02D3305:182a-38: byas nas bsnyen gnas spyad par bgyi //
T02D3305:182a-39: 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad gso sbyong //
T02D3305:182a-40: zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis dkon mchog gsum gyi ngo bo bla ma la bstod pa bya'o //
T02D3305:182a-42: bla ma byang chub sems rnams la //
T02D3305:182a-43: rin chen mandala yongs rdzogs pas //
T02D3305:182a-44: dngos po thams cad dbul bgyi ste //
T02D3305:182a-45: 'gro bas kun mkhyen thob phyed du'o //
T02D3305:182a-46: lcog brgyad ldan pa'i ri rab ni //
T02D3305:182a-47: gling dang nye gling mdzes pa dang //
T02D3305:182a-48: rin chen brgyad dang yang dag ldan //
T02D3305:182b-0: bla med ster ba bo la @182b dbul //
T02D3305:182b-2: gang gi bka' drin 'od kyis gsal byas bdag nyid kyi //
T02D3305:182b-3: de nyid rin chen 'od kyi tshogs kyis mun bcom ste //
T02D3305:182b-4: mig skyon med rnams rol bar bcas te steng du ni //
T02D3305:182b-5: lta gyur bla ma nyi ma de la phyag 'di bgyid //
T02D3305:182b-6: ces pas me tog rab tu gtor ste phyag 'tshal bar bya'o //
T02D3305:182b-7: zhes pa bla ma'i mandala lo //
T02D3305:182b-8: de nas sbyin ba lci ba zhes pa'i tshigs su
T02D3305:182b-9: bcad pa brjod nas sngar gyi mandala gsum bya ste
T02D3305:182b-10: / de la rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen
T02D3305:182b-11: 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod
T02D3305:182b-12: grub pa rnams 'khor dang mi bskyod pa gtsor byas
T02D3305:182b-13: pa'i mandala ni sangs rgyas kyi mandala lo //
T02D3305:182b-14: bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams 'khor dang /
T02D3305:182b-15: rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud gtso bor byas pa'i mandala chos kyi'o //
T02D3305:182b-20: 'jam dbyangs dang sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang
T02D3305:182b-21: sa'i snying po dang ye shes bla ma rnams 'khor
T02D3305:182b-22: dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug gtsor byas pa ni dge 'dun gyi mandala lo //
T02D3305:182b-23: mandala gsum po 'di rnams su shar la sogs pa nas g-yas skor gyis te /
T02D3305:182b-24: aom gyi yi ge dang po dang /
T02D3305:182b-25: na ma:'i sgra mthar bcug nas so so rang rang
T02D3305:182b-26: gi mtshan brjod nas sngar gyi mandala du me tog
T02D3305:182b-27: dbul bar bya'o // de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas mandala bzhi po byas nas /
T02D3305:182b-28: dad pas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dge
T02D3305:182b-29: ba'i tshes dang gza' dang dus sbyor la sogs pa
T02D3305:182b-30: la / gtsang zhing gtsang ba'i gos bgos te /
T02D3305:182b-31: yid du 'ong ba rab tu ston pa de bzhin
T02D3305:182b-32: gshegs pa'i gzugs la mchod pa de'i mchog ji lta
T02D3305:182b-34: me tog la sogs pa dbul ba sngon du 'gro
T02D3305:182b-35: bas dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal pa sngon du
T02D3305:182b-36: 'gro bar bya'o // de bzhin du ji ltar nus pa'i mchod ba dang yon phul nas /
T02D3305:182b-37: thugs rje dang rnam mkhyen dang ldan pa'i bla ma
T02D3305:182b-38: la me tog gi snyim pa sngon du 'gro bas
T02D3305:182b-39: zhabs dag la phyag bya zhing /
T02D3305:182b-40: bus mo'i lha ngas la btsugs pa'am /
T02D3305:182b-41: tsog tsog por 'dug la thal mo sbyar te gnas
T02D3305:182b-42: pas 'di skad ces gsol ba gdab pa lan gsum
T02D3305:183a-0: bya'o // dge ba'i bshes gnyen bdag la @183a * //
T02D3305:183a-1: sdig pa bshags pa dang skyabs su 'gro ba'i byang
T02D3305:183a-2: chub tu sems bskyed pa stsal du gsol zhes pas
T02D3305:183a-3: so // de nas bla mas lhag pa'i bsam pa
T02D3305:183a-4: rab tu 'phel bas slob ma bltas te ji ltar
T02D3305:183a-5: nus pa sbyin par bya'o zhes khas blang ba sngon
T02D3305:183a-6: du 'gro bas 'di ltar sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3305:183a-7: cho dang ldan pa khyod 'di skad ces smros shig
T02D3305:183a-8: / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na
T02D3305:183a-9: yang dag par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
T02D3305:183a-10: rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T02D3305:183a-12: bdag mid 'di zhes bgyi bas gang cung zad lus dang ngag dang yid kyis /
T02D3305:183a-13: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02D3305:183a-15: de las gzhan pa'i sems can yang dag par 'ongs
T02D3305:183a-16: pa rnams la skye ba 'di'am skye ba gzhan mtha'
T02D3305:183a-17: yas ba rnams su bdag gis sdig pa'i las bgyis
T02D3305:183a-19: bgyid pa la rjes su yid rang ba de thams
T02D3305:183a-20: cad gcig tu bsdus shing bsdoms te bzlums la mnyam
T02D3305:183a-21: par byas nas / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02D3305:183a-22: slob dpon gyi spyan sngar ma lus pa rab tu bshags shing so sor bshags par bgyi'o //
T02D3305:183a-23: shes pa dang dran pa rnams la 'chab par mi bgyid do //
T02D3305:183a-24: de bzhin du lan gsum mo //
T02D3305:183a-25: de nas bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de ltar
T02D3305:183a-26: sdig pa bshags te nyi ma 'di nas nye bar
T02D3305:183a-27: bzung nas ji srid byang chub snying bo la mchis
T02D3305:183a-28: kyi bar du / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs
T02D3305:183a-29: rje chen po thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs
T02D3305:183a-30: kyi bar du / pa / thams cad du dgra'i 'jigs pa med pa /
T02D3305:183a-35: rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D3305:183a-36: de nas bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba de ltar sdig pa bshags te /
T02D3305:183a-37: nyi ma 'di nas nye bar bzung nas ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du /
T02D3305:183a-38: chos rnams kyi rab mchog bla na med pa theg pa chen po'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D3305:183a-39: de nas bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de ltar
T02D3305:183a-40: sdig pa bshags te nyi ma 'di nas nye bar
T02D3305:183a-41: gzung nas ji srid byang chub snying bo la mchis
T02D3305:183b-0: kyi bar du / @183b dul ba'i tshogs rnams kyi
T02D3305:183b-1: mchog phyir mi ldog pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge
T02D3305:183b-3: de bzhin du lan gsum mo //
T02D3305:183b-4: de nas bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di ltar
T02D3305:183b-5: bstan pa las ma 'das par nyi ma 'di nas
T02D3305:183b-6: nye bar bzung ste ji srid byang chub snying po
T02D3305:183b-8: gsum la skyabs su 'gro bas mtha' yas ba'i sems
T02D3305:183b-9: can gyi khams rnams nges par bsgral ba'i phyir dang
T02D3305:183b-10: / mngon par bsgral ba'i phyir dang /
T02D3305:183b-11: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir dang /
T02D3305:183b-12: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la so sor dgod pa'i phyir du /
T02D3305:183b-13: ji ltar 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da
T02D3305:183b-14: ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang
T02D3305:183b-15: / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa dang /
T02D3305:183b-16: sangs rgyas kyi don du lhag par gshegs par gyur pa dang /
T02D3305:183b-18: lhag par gshegs par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D3305:183b-19: ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams thams cad
T02D3305:183b-20: kyis sgrib pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
T02D3305:183b-21: dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis mkhyen pas gzigs pa dang /
T02D3305:183b-22: ji ltar chos rnams kyi chos nyid mkhyen nas mngon
T02D3305:183b-23: par rjes su mkhyen pa ltar cho ga de nyid
T02D3305:183b-24: kyis bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba slob dpon gyi
T02D3305:183b-25: drung dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D3305:183b-26: thams cad kyi spyan sngar bla na med pa yang
T02D3305:183b-27: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par
T02D3305:183b-28: drung dang / bgyi'o // de bzhin du lan gsum mo //
T02D3305:183b-29: de ring bdag byang chub sems dpar sangs rgyas dang
T02D3305:183b-30: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang slob dpon gyis
T02D3305:183b-32: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bas sngon du byang chub sems bskyed pa'o //
T02D3305:183b-33: bslab pa'i gnas lnga 'dzin pa'i dge bsnyen gyi sngom
T02D3305:183b-34: pa de yang gsol ba 'debs par gyur na slob
T02D3305:183b-35: ma'i ched du 'di ltar sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3305:183b-36: tshe dang ldan pa khyod 'di skad smros shig / slob dpon dgongs su gsol //
T02D3305:183b-37: ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gis
T02D3305:183b-38: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te
T02D3305:183b-39: srog gcod pa las slar log pa de bzhin du
T02D3305:184a-0: / bdag che ge mo zhes bgyi bas kyang dus 'di nas nye bar bzung ste @184a * //
T02D3305:184a-1: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te srog gcod pa las slar log par bgyi'o //
T02D3305:184a-3: bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su bslab po //
T02D3305:184a-6: gzhan yang slob dpon dgongs su gsol /
T02D3305:184a-7: ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gis
T02D3305:184a-8: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ma byin par len pa
T02D3305:184a-9: dang / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
T02D3305:184a-12: bcos pa'i chang myos bar 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te ma byin par len pa dang /
T02D3305:184a-13: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
T02D3305:184a-16: bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar log pa de bzhin du /
T02D3305:184a-17: bdag che ge mo zhes bgyi bas kyang nyin par 'di nas nye bar bzung ste /
T02D3305:184a-18: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ma byin par len pa dang /
T02D3305:184a-19: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
T02D3305:184a-22: bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar ldog par bgyi'o//
T02D3305:184a-23: yan lag lnga pa 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom
T02D3305:184a-24: pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su slob
T02D3305:184a-27: dge bsnyen du yang bdag slob dpon gyis gzung du gsol /
T02D3305:184a-28: de bzhin du lan gnyis dang gsum du yang ngo //
T02D3305:184a-29: 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong
T02D3305:184a-30: bya bar 'dod pas de'i tshe sngar bzhin du gsol
T02D3305:184a-31: ba btab bar gyur ba dang /
T02D3305:184a-32: slob ma'i ched du gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba
T02D3305:184a-33: byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas brgyad po 'di ltar sbyin
T02D3305:184a-34: par bya'o // tshe dang ldan pa khyod 'di smros shig / slob dpon dgongs su gsol /
T02D3305:184a-35: bdag che ge mo zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas nye bar bzung ste /
T02D3305:184a-36: ji srid mtshan mo song ba dang ji srid nyi
T02D3305:184a-37: ma shar ba'i mthar thug par srog gcod pa thams
T02D3305:184a-38: cad dang / gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang /
T02D3305:184b-0: @184b mi tshangs par sbyong pa dang /
T02D3305:184b-1: ngag gi dbye ba las brdzun du smra ba dang /
T02D3305:184b-2: myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba dang /
T02D3305:184b-3: dus ma yin pa'i kha zas dang /
T02D3305:184b-6: gar dang glu dang rol sgeg dang mal stan mthon
T02D3305:184b-7: po rnams la de ring nas bdag dga' ba dang
T02D3305:184b-8: bral bar bgyi ste dgra bcom pa'i yon tan brgyad
T02D3305:184b-10: de bzhin du lan gsum ste bdag gis gso sbyong
T02D3305:184b-11: gi tshul khrims kyi sngom pa yang dag par blangs
T02D3305:184b-12: pa 'di ni sems kyi rgyan dang /
T02D3305:184b-14: sems can thams cad kyis bla na med pa'i ye
T02D3305:184b-15: shes kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ched du'o
T02D3305:184b-16: zhes pa'o // de nas bla mas thabs yin no
T02D3305:184b-17: zhes brjod par bya zhing slob mas legs so zhes
T02D3305:184b-18: zhes pa'o // so // gang phyir dge ba ma lus gso ba dang //
T02D3305:184b-19: bsags pa'i sdig pa 'dir ni sbyong byed pa //
T02D3305:184b-20: de bzhin gso dang rnam par sbyong byed pa //
T02D3305:184b-21: de bzhin gshegs pas gso sbyong zhes su gsungs //
T02D3305:184b-22: zhes pa gso sbyong gi cho ga'o /
T02D3305:184b-24: // /'di nyid kyi sngom pa go mi'o zhes so //
T02D3305:184b-25: de nas rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ram dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:184b-26: gzhan du yang rung ste sngar brjod pa'i cho gas
T02D3305:184b-27: dang por bum pa lhag par gnas pa dang dgod
T02D3305:184b-28: pa dang nye bar spyod pa lnga la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:184b-30: legs bar yongs su brtags pa'i slob ma nga rgyal la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba /
T02D3305:184b-31: dge bsnyen la sogs pa'i bslab pa la gnas pa
T02D3305:184b-32: yongs su thob pa la sogs pa legs par yongs
T02D3305:184b-33: su byang zhing gus pa dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:184b-34: rdo rje sems dpa'i sngom pa gzung ba'i nus pa dang ldan na /
T02D3305:184b-35: rigs gzugs kyi yon tan dang bral ba rnams kyang lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02D3305:184b-36: gal te de dag kyang dad pas rdo rje sems dpa'i sngom pa shin tu don du gnyer zhing /
T02D3305:184b-37: rdo rje theg pa la ston pa gzhan mi tshol bar gyur na'o //
T02D3305:184b-38: de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis phyed dang bzhi brgya pa las gsungs te /
T02D3305:184b-39: gzugs ngan yon tan med pa dang //
T02D3305:184b-40: dman pa'ang lhag par gnas par bya //
T02D3305:185a-0: @185a * // 'khor ni bzhi po rnams la yang //
T02D3305:185a-1: dkyil 'khor dag tu cho ga gnang //
T02D3305:185a-2: rang rang bslab pa legs par ldan //
T02D3305:185a-3: theg chen la dga'i bsam pa can //
T02D3305:185a-9: cho ga ni gzhug pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D3305:185a-11: theg chen la dga' ba'i bsam pa can 'dis ni
T02D3305:185a-12: theg pa 'di la yid kyi las gtso bor ston
T02D3305:185a-13: par byed do / 'gal ba spang ba'i don du'o //
T02D3305:185a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis rang bzhin gyis kha na mtho
T02D3305:185a-15: ba'i las nyid la yang kun slong gi khyad par
T02D3305:185a-16: las lhung bar mi 'gyur ba mang po rab tu
T02D3305:185a-18: gdol ba smig ma mkhan la sogs /
T02D3305:185a-19: gsod don don du sems pa po //
T02D3305:185a-20: de rnams kye rdo rje shes nas //
T02D3305:185a-24: sems dge ba la ltung med de //
T02D3305:185a-25: snying rjer ldan zhing byams phyir ro //
T02D3305:185a-27: snying rje ldan zhing don mthong la //
T02D3305:185a-28: bkag pa yang ni gnang ba yin //
T02D3305:185a-29: zhes pa ltar gang zhig slar yang bsod nams nye
T02D3305:185a-30: bar bsags pa mang du thos ba la sogs pa'o
T02D3305:185a-31: // chos thams cad sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu
T02D3305:185a-32: dang stong pa nyid du ro gcig par shin tu
T02D3305:185a-33: brtan par mos pa byed pa de la ni dge
T02D3305:185a-34: slong rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sngom pa dag la 'gal
T02D3305:185a-35: ba'i dri ma ga la yod /
T02D3305:185a-36: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02D3305:185a-37: dge slong rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya //
T02D3305:185a-39: de ni nges par khas blangs dgos te /
T02D3305:185a-40: gzhan du na dus mtshungs par gnyi ga ci ltar 'gyur /
T02D3305:185a-41: bag chags rab tu sad pa las dge slong gis

T02D3305:185b-21: la ni 'jig rten 'di nyid kyi mngon par mtho

T02D3305:185b-24: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum gyi phun
T02D3305:185b-25: sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor
T02D3305:185b-27: de lta na ni mngon par mtho ba gnyis kyang thob par 'gyur ro zhes bsgrags nas /
T02D3305:185b-28: slob ma rnams rang gi lus la kha nas bcug ste /
T02D3305:185b-29: rang gi rdo rje'i lam nas 'thon pa rang 'od

T02D3305:185b-31: ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i de

T02D3305:185b-33: zhugs shing zhu bar gyur pa rnams kyis mngon par

T02D3305:185b-41: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D3305:185b-42: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02D3305:185b-43: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D3305:186a-0: @186a * // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //

T02D3305:186a-6: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga rnams //

T02D3305:186a-9: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02D3305:186a-10: dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D3305:186a-11: rdo rje sngags kyi mthu yis ni //

T02D3305:186a-13: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med pa //
T02D3305:186a-14: gang gis sh'akya seng ge sogs //
T02D3305:186a-15: mchog rnams kyis ni bdud kyi sde //
T02D3305:186a-16: mi bzad chen po'i stobs chen bcom //

T02D3305:186a-23: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //

T02D3305:186a-28: dam pa bdag la mgon pos stsol //
T02D3305:186a-29: 'khor lo lha yi de nyid dang //
T02D3305:186a-30: slob dpon gyi ni phrin las dang //

T02D3305:186a-34: rtag tu bdag ni slob dpon pa gying//

T02D3305:186a-38: slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T02D3305:186a-39: bdag che ge mo zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas nye bar bzung ste /
T02D3305:186a-40: ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du /

T02D3305:186a-45: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //

T02D3305:186b-0: sems can don byed tshul @186b khrims gsum //

T02D3305:186b-6: rdo rje rin chen bsdus pa la //

T02D3305:186b-8: de nyid kyis ni rab tu gzung //
T02D3305:186b-9: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D3305:186b-10: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //

T02D3305:186b-23: byang chub sems ni bla na med//

T02D3305:186b-25: sdom pa ma lus gzung bgyis nas //

T02D3305:186b-27: ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol //
T02D3305:186b-28: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing //

T02D3305:186b-36: po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams bsams te

T02D3305:188a-27: shin tu rnam dag chos kyi mchog / gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
T02D3305:188a-28: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D3305:188a-29: byang chub sems dpar bdag bsgrub mdzod //
T02D3305:188a-30: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug mchog gi phyag rgya can //
T02D3305:188a-31: grub pa'i rdo rje cher gsal ba //
T02D3305:188a-32: rdo rje snyems dag bdag bsgrub mdzod //
T02D3305:188a-33: sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa //
T02D3305:188a-34: sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
T02D3305:188a-35: sems can kun gyi yab kyang nyid //
T02D3305:188a-36: 'dod pa mchog gi dam tshig mchog / shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02D3305:188a-37: bden pa de yis mgon po khyod //
T02D3305:188a-38: bdag la 'dod pa yongs rdzogs mdzod //
T02D3305:188a-39: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D3305:188a-40: gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med //
T02D3305:188a-41: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D3305:188a-42: rgyu dang las las yang dag byung //
T02D3305:188a-43: bden pa de yis dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D3305:188a-44: gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma rnams //
T02D3305:188b-0: kun @188b gyis sgrib bral mthong bar shog / ces brjod pas so //
T02D3305:188b-3: // / de nas lhag par gnas pa byas shing sdom
T02D3305:188b-4: pa gnyis dang ldan pa'i slob ma shar gyi sgor
T02D3305:188b-5: yol bas bcad par bzhag nas /
T02D3305:188b-6: dri zhim po la sogs pas yang dag par byas
T02D3305:188b-7: pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs sam 'khor lo'i
T02D3305:188b-8: dbang phyug gi gzugs su dmigs te /
T02D3305:188b-9: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa nutta ra bodhi
T02D3305:188b-10: aa langk'a ra wastra p'u dza me gha sa mu
T02D3305:188b-11: dra sphar na sa ma ye h'um /
T02D3305:188b-12: zhes pa'i sngags kyis gos dmar po'am gzhan yang rung bas smad g-yogs byas la /
T02D3305:188b-13: aom badzra raksha ham zhes pas stod g-yogs bya zhing /
T02D3305:188b-14: aom badzra aushn'i sha h'um phat ces pas gtsug tor bya'o //
T02D3305:188b-15: aom tsa kshu badha bar m'a na ya h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis mig bcing zhing /
T02D3305:188b-16: a'a kham b'i ra h'um zhes pas me tog gi phreng bzung nas yon phul ba /
T02D3305:188b-17: las thams cad pa'i sngags chus bsangs te /
T02D3305:188b-18: rnal 'byor ma'am las kyi rdo rje can gyis bzung la /
T02D3305:188b-19: de nas rang gi slob ma la dri bar bya ste /
T02D3305:188b-20: dga' ba la dga' khyod su kye //
T02D3305:188b-21: slob ma de dag rnams kyis kyang //
T02D3305:188b-22: skal bzang bdag ni bde chen la'o //
T02D3305:188b-24: aom sarba yo ga tsitta audp'a da y'a mi /
T02D3305:188b-25: zhes brjod cing byang chub tu sems bskyed la /
T02D3305:188b-26: snying gar rdo rje me tog dang bcas pa bzung nas /
T02D3305:188b-27: aom su ra ta sa ma ya stvam ho: siddhya badzra ya th'a su kham /
T02D3305:188b-29: deng khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
T02D3305:188b-30: byin gyis rlob par 'gyur gyi khyod kyis kyang de
T02D3305:188b-31: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i
T02D3305:188b-32: dkyil 'khor 'di dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams
T02D3305:188b-33: la smra bar mi bya zhing ma dad par yang
T02D3305:188b-34: mi bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D3305:188b-35: aom ya m'anta kri ta h'um zhes brjod cing khrid la /
T02D3305:188b-36: a'a kham b'i ra h'um zhes pa 'dis yol ba'i nang du bcug nas /
T02D3305:188b-37: ma h'a ra ta su dri dhya su toshya su
T02D3305:188b-38: su kho badzra satva a'a dya siddhya mam zhes brjod
T02D3305:188b-39: pas g-yas skor bya zhing thal mo sbyar la dkyil
T02D3305:188b-40: 'khor gyi shar sgo'i phyi rol du phyin nas phyag
T02D3305:188b-43: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dzo pa sth'a n'a ya /
T02D3305:188b-44: a'atma n'am n'i rya ta y'a mi sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am /
T02D3305:189a-0: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza au pasth'a n'a ya a'atma n'am @189a * //
T02D3305:189a-2: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra bee ro tsa na aa dhi tishtha mam /
T02D3305:189a-3: lhor snying gar thal mo sbyar te /
T02D3305:189a-4: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza aa bhi
T02D3305:189a-5: she ka ya a'atma n'am n'i rya ta ya mi
T02D3305:189a-6: / sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02D3305:189a-7: nub tu dpral bar thal mo sbyar te /
T02D3305:189a-8: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza pra wa
T02D3305:189a-9: rta n'a ya a'atma n'am n'i rya ta y'a mi
T02D3305:189a-10: / sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dharm'a bra warta ya m'am /
T02D3305:189a-11: byang du snying gar thal mo sbyar te /
T02D3305:189a-12: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza karma ne a'atma ne a'atma n'am n'i rya ta y'a mi /
T02D3305:189a-13: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra karma ku ru m'am /
T02D3305:189a-14: zhes pa'i rigs lngas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:189a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag byed du bcug
T02D3305:189a-16: ste / slar yang shar sgo'i phyi rol nas rab tu dang bas /
T02D3305:189a-17: aom gu ru tsa ra no pa stha n'a ya a'atma n'am ni rya ta y'a mi /
T02D3305:189a-18: aom sarba satva pa ri dra narth'a ya a'atma n'am n'i rya ta y'a mi /
T02D3305:189a-19: zhes pa rnams don go ba sngon du 'gro bas 'don du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D3305:189a-20: de nas deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyi /
T02D3305:189a-21: de'i phyir ngas khyod la rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya ste /
T02D3305:189a-22: ye shes gang gis khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D3305:189a-23: cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'grub na dngos
T02D3305:189a-24: grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T02D3305:189a-25: khyod kyis 'di dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi
T02D3305:189a-26: mdun du smra bar mi bya ste khyod dam tshig
T02D3305:189a-27: nyams par gyur te re zhes brjod nas mgo bor
T02D3305:189a-28: rdo rje gzung zhing dril bu dkrol nas /
T02D3305:189a-29: khyod kyi dam tshig rdo rje 'dis //
T02D3305:189a-30: gal te khyod kyis 'ga' zhig la //
T02D3305:189a-33: slar yang snying gar rdo rje gzung ste /
T02D3305:189a-34: de ring rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
T02D3305:189a-35: khyod kyi snying la yang dag gnas //
T02D3305:189a-36: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D3305:189a-37: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02D3305:189a-39: bdud rtsi lnga padma'i snod du gnas pa la yi
T02D3305:189a-40: ge gsum gyis bsngags pa rnam rgyal bum pa'i steng
T02D3305:189a-41: du bzhag pa / aom badzra aa mri ta au
T02D3305:189a-42: da ka tha: zhes pa bdun bzlas te ming med
T02D3305:189a-43: dang mthe bong gis bzung ba'i snod kyi kha nas
T02D3305:189a-45: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D3305:189a-46: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02D3305:189a-47: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ste //
T02D3305:189a-48: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thung shig / ces brjod pas ma na'i btung ba byed du bcug la /
T02D3305:189a-49: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyi //
T02D3305:189b-0: ngas 'di gyis shig ces gang @189b bsgo ba de khyod kyis bya dgos so //
T02D3305:189b-1: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par yang mi bya ste /
T02D3305:189b-2: khyod yang ba ma spangs par dus byas nas dmyal
T02D3305:189b-3: bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes brjod par bya'o
T02D3305:189b-4: zhes pa dam tshig gi chu sbyin pa'o //
T02D3305:189b-5: de rjes slob mas 'di brjod de /
T02D3305:189b-6: rang nyid mnyam par gzhag pas dbab /
T02D3305:189b-7: slob dpon gyis bskul tshig gis ni /
T02D3305:189b-8: dngos grub thams cad rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D3305:189b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
T02D3305:189b-10: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig ces so //
T02D3305:189b-12: rkang pa'i mthil nas steng kun du //
T02D3305:189b-13: lus la bug pa rnams bsam zhing //
T02D3305:189b-14: de yi rkang pa'i 'og tu ni //
T02D3305:189b-16: de yi steng du dzheem yig ni //
T02D3305:189b-17: dmar mo'i mdog can rnam bsams te //
T02D3305:189b-18: de las byung ba'i me 'od kyis //
T02D3305:189b-19: brtul zhugs can gyis lus rnams sbyang //
T02D3305:189b-20: de bzhin 'od ni gsal bya zhing //
T02D3305:189b-21: mkhas pas blang ba byas nas slar //
T02D3305:189b-22: slob ma'i snying mgrin mgo bo la //
T02D3305:189b-23: h'um ha: a'a: zhes rnam par dgod //
T02D3305:189b-24: dril bu sgra ni sgrogs ldan pa //
T02D3305:189b-25: 'dzin pa yis ni dbab par bya //
T02D3305:189b-26: de bzhin gshegs rnams dbab pa yi //
T02D3305:189b-27: don du sngags 'di brjod par bya //
T02D3305:189b-28: 'di de dam tshig rdo rje ste //
T02D3305:189b-29: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su brjod //
T02D3305:189b-30: rdo rje ye shes bla med 'di //
T02D3305:189b-31: de ring nyid du 'bab par shog //
T02D3305:189b-32: aom badzra a'a be sha aa: aa: aa: aa:/
T02D3305:189b-33: gal te phebs pa nyid min na //
T02D3305:189b-34: sngags 'di yang ni brtan par brjod //
T02D3305:189b-35: de nas a'a: yig 'od zer gyis //
T02D3305:189b-36: ye shes sems dpa' rab bskul bya //
T02D3305:189b-37: a'a be sha ya stambha ya ra rar ra tsa la ya tsal ya h'um ha: a'a: dzheem /
T02D3305:189b-39: brgyal ba'am gang gis gar byed pa //
T02D3305:189b-40: de dag steng du 'phar ba yang //
T02D3305:189b-41: phebs pa'i mtshan nyid rig par bya //
T02D3305:189b-42: dga' zhing lta bas zhugs pa yi //
T02D3305:189b-43: slob ma'i lce la aa: yig dgod //
T02D3305:189b-44: yi ge brgya pas brtan byas te //
T02D3305:189b-45: mkhas pas dge dang mi dge dri //
T02D3305:189b-46: phebs pa gtong bar byed pa ni //
T02D3305:189b-47: sngags kyi rim pa 'di yis rig / nges par
T02D3305:189b-48: zhugs pa'i lha rnams snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od
T02D3305:189b-49: zer gyis bkug nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon
T02D3305:189b-50: la bstim zhing slob ma'i mgo bor rdo rje gzung
T02D3305:189b-51: la / aom khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D3305:190a-0: ces pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i h'um ha: aa: dzheem mum zhes @190a * //
T02D3305:190a-1: pas gshegs su gsol bar bya ste /
T02D3305:190a-4: // / de nas slob ma dkyil 'khor du mngon par
T02D3305:190a-5: phyogs pa la khyod kyi mig gis bltas pa la
T02D3305:190a-6: ji ltar snang zhes dris te /
T02D3305:190a-7: de na re dkar po dang ser po dang dmar
T02D3305:190a-8: po dang ljang gu dang nag por snang ngo zhes
T02D3305:190a-9: zer na / rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhi ba dang /
T02D3305:190a-12: mngon spyod kyi dngos grub la skal ba dang ldan par go bar bya zhing /
T02D3305:190a-13: 'di'i mthe bong gnyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa g-yas pas gzung la /
T02D3305:190a-14: rdo rje'i rkang stabs kyi gar gyi tshul gyis 'khyil
T02D3305:190a-15: pa'i sngags brjod cing skor ba gsum byed du bcug
T02D3305:190a-16: nas bden pa'i byin gyis brlab pa 'di bya ste
T02D3305:190a-18: bdag gis slob ma gzhug pa 'di //
T02D3305:190a-19: lha rnams rigs kyi rim pa ni //
T02D3305:190a-20: bsod nams rim pa de bzhin shog /'di yi dngos grub ci 'drar 'gyur //
T02D3305:190a-21: rigs ni gang gi snod du rung //
T02D3305:190a-22: bsod nams mthu yang ci 'dra ba //
T02D3305:190a-23: de 'drar dkyil 'khor du gyur cig / ces pa 'di brjod pas so //
T02D3305:190a-24: de nas sngar bzung pa'i me tog gi phreng ba
T02D3305:190a-25: yi ge tram gis bsngags pa las yang zhing ma
T02D3305:190a-26: rnying pa'i me tog cig bton la /
T02D3305:190a-27: de'i lag pa thal mo sbyar bar sbyin par bya
T02D3305:190a-28: zhing des de'i tshe me tog gi phreng bar lhag
T02D3305:190a-29: par mos te / bdag nyid kyang yi ge gsum
T02D3305:190a-30: gyis 'od gsal zhing sdig pa dang bral bar mos
T02D3305:190a-31: par mos te / la / bla mas de ltar
T02D3305:190a-32: byin gyis brlabs pa dang gus pa sngon du 'gro
T02D3305:190a-33: bas dkyil 'khor ba dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D3305:190a-34: dbang phyug mdun na gnas bzhin par dmigs pa'i dkyil
T02D3305:190a-35: 'khor der yid kyis zhugs nas de'i dbu la me
T02D3305:190a-37: aom tishtha badzra dri dho me bha wa /
T02D3305:190a-38: sh'a shva to me bha wa /
T02D3305:190a-40: aa dhi tishtha sarba siddhi me pra yatstsha h'um ha
T02D3305:190a-41: ha ha ha ho: a'a kham b'ir h'um pra t'i
T02D3305:190a-42: tstsha ku su m'a nydza li n'a tha ho: zhes
T02D3305:190a-44: re kh'a lnga'i nang du me tog lhung ba dang
T02D3305:190a-45: rjes su mthun par 'di'i rigs la sogs pa bstan
T02D3305:190a-46: par bya zhing / de'i rnal 'byor kyang sbyin no //
T02D3305:190a-47: dngos grub mtshon par bya ste /
T02D3305:190a-48: gal te sangs rgyas kyi dbu'am gtsug tor ram /
T02D3305:190a-49: mdzod spu la me tog lhung na de'i tshe phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bo //
T02D3305:190a-50: spyan nam zhal la lhung na de'i tshe sngags kyi dngos grub bo /
T02D3305:190b-0: @190b sku'i stod la ni mchog ste /
T02D3305:190b-2: 'og gi cha la ni dman pa'o //
T02D3305:190b-3: sku las shin tu ring bar gyur pa la ni yun ring bos te /
T02D3305:190b-4: nye ba la ni myur bar rab tu 'grub bo //
T02D3305:190b-5: lha rnams kyi rang gi gnas ni re'u mig la
T02D3305:190b-6: sogs pas rnam par bcad pa las shes par bya
T02D3305:190b-7: ste / gal te lha gnyis kyi bar du lhung
T02D3305:190b-8: na de'i tshe me tog gang la nye bar gyur
T02D3305:190b-10: mnyam ba nyid la ni gnyi ga'i chog 'grub ste
T02D3305:190b-11: de'i tshe de rnams gang dad pa de'i rigs su
T02D3305:190b-12: 'gyur ro // re kh'a lnga'i phyi rol du lhung
T02D3305:190b-13: na slar yang lan gsum gyi bar du dor bar
T02D3305:190b-14: 'gyur ro // bya ste / de la yang phyi rol du lhung na ni dngos grub phra mo'o //
T02D3305:190b-15: phyi'i re kh'a zlum po rnams dang rdo rje phreng
T02D3305:190b-16: ba'i phyi rol du lhung na ni dngos grub med
T02D3305:190b-17: de 'di la dkyil 'khor yang bstan par mi bya'o
T02D3305:190b-18: // sngags bzlas pa la sogs pas skal ba dang
T02D3305:190b-19: ldan pa nyid du bsgrubs nas skabs gzhan du de
T02D3305:190b-20: // gzhug par bya'o // de nas me tog de
T02D3305:190b-21: bzung nas aom pra ti grihna stvam ai mam satva
T02D3305:190b-23: zhes brjod de slob ma'i mgo bo la bcing /
T02D3305:190b-24: 'di ni phreng ba'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:190b-26: // /'dir phebs par gyur pa na dge ba la sogs
T02D3305:190b-27: pa smras pa'i mthar aom tishtha badzra zhes pa 'dis
T02D3305:190b-28: phebs pa brtan par bya zhing mig gi snang ba
T02D3305:190b-29: dri ba la sogs pa nas mgo bor bcing ba'i
T02D3305:190b-31: nges par zhugs pa'i lha gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D3305:190b-32: mi nus pas ni 'bebs pa'i cho ga ma byas
T02D3305:190b-33: par dam tshig gi chu byin pa'i mjug thogs su
T02D3305:190b-34: mig ni snang ba dri ba la sogs pa bya'o
T02D3305:190b-35: zhes 'chad do // de'i rjes su slob ma'i mig
T02D3305:190b-36: gnyis la 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i aom gnyis rnam
T02D3305:190b-37: zhes 'chad do // par bsgoms te / de ring rdo rje sems dpa' rang //
T02D3305:190b-38: khyod kyi mig ni 'byed par brtson //
T02D3305:190b-39: rdo rje mig ni bla na med //
T02D3305:190b-40: thams cad mig ni dbye bar mdzod //
T02D3305:190b-41: aom dzny'a na tsakshu h'um aa: zhes brjod cing gdod g-yogs bsal bar bya'o //
T02D3305:190b-42: de nas kye rdo rje ltos shig ces smras nas /
T02D3305:190b-43: da ni dad pa'i shugs kyis su //
T02D3305:190b-45: khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02D3305:190b-46: gsang sngags rnams la bsgrub par bgyis //
T02D3305:190b-48: de nas rim bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02D3305:190b-49: de nyid rab tu bsal bar bya //
T02D3305:191a-2: ngo bo 'ang nye bar bstan par bya //
T02D3305:191a-4: tshangs pa'i gnas pas zur rnams te //
T02D3305:191a-5: sgo rnams bsdu ba'i dngos por brjod //
T02D3305:191a-6: so sor bzhir ni yang dag shes //
T02D3305:191a-7: dad dbang la sogs sems gang yin //
T02D3305:191a-8: ra ba lngar ni yang dag byung //
T02D3305:191a-9: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po ni //
T02D3305:191a-10: sgo khyud rnam bzhi de rnams so //
T02D3305:191a-11: de yi dbus su 'khor lo gang //
T02D3305:191a-12: dkyil 'khor brgyad la mtshungs pa ste //
T02D3305:191a-13: rnam par thar pa brgyad po 'dis //
T02D3305:191a-14: dngos grub thams cad rab tu bsgrub //
T02D3305:191a-15: dngos grub chen po'i phung po kun //
T02D3305:191a-16: ka ba lta bur rtag tu 'gyur //
T02D3305:191a-18: ka ba brgyad ces bya bar bshad //
T02D3305:191a-19: chos kyi dbyings kyi don gyi brdar //
T02D3305:191a-22: thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog //
T02D3305:191a-23: bsam gtan rnams ni rta babs 'dir //
T02D3305:191a-24: ba dan rang bzhin de bzhin te //
T02D3305:191a-25: byang chub 'bras bu ra ba ni //
T02D3305:191a-26: sgo rnams su ni dpag bsam shing //
T02D3305:191a-27: phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis //
T02D3305:191a-28: sangs rgyas lnga ni rab tu bstan //
T02D3305:191a-29: spyan ma la sogs lha mo bzhi //
