T02D3305:194b-2: rdo rje gos dkar mo dang /
T02D3305:194b-4: don yod grub pa'i rdo rje snyems ma dang /
T02D3305:194b-7: rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang /
T02D3305:194b-8: dam tshig rdo rje ma dang /
T02D3305:194b-9: rdo rje dga' ma zhes pa'o //
T02D3305:194b-10: ming gi dbang bskur ba ste /
T02D3305:194b-11: shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
T02D3305:194b-12: sngar bshad pa'i dbang bskur ba 'di rnams la so sor /
T02D3305:194b-13: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02D3305:194b-14: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba gdab cing /
T02D3305:194b-15: dbang bskur chen po rdo rje ni //
T02D3305:194b-16: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas kyang bkru bar bya'o //
T02D3305:194b-17: phreng ba dang chu la sogs pa'i dbang bskur drug po 'di rnams ni /
T02D3305:194b-18: ma rig pa'i gnyen po nus pa nyid du sgrub
T02D3305:194b-19: par byed pa'i rig pa'i dbang bskur ba zhes brjod
T02D3305:194b-20: do // dbang 'di rnams bskur ba'i rim pa ni /
T02D3305:194b-21: bya ba dang spyod pa'i rgyud nyan pa dang 'chad
T02D3305:194b-22: pa dang sngags bsgrub pa la dbang bskur bar 'gyur
T02D3305:194b-23: ro // slar yang rnal 'byor ba dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyang ngo zhes /
T02D3305:194b-24: slob dpon gyi dbang du rlom pa 'dod pa ni lung dang mi ldan te /
T02D3305:194b-25: lhan cig skyes dbang dang sngom pa bral ba rnams
T02D3305:194b-26: la de'i rang gi ngo bo mngon par brjod par
T02D3305:194b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud gang du yang ma bstan
T02D3305:194b-28: cing rigs pa yang ma yin no //
T02D3305:194b-29: dbang 'di rnams slob dpon gyi dbang don du mi
T02D3305:194b-30: gnyer ba la ni thun mong gi sngom ba sbyin
T02D3305:194b-31: pa sngon du 'gro bas bskur bar bya'o //
T02D3305:194b-32: don du gnyer pa la ni gnyis ka'i sngom pa sbyin pa sngon du 'gro bas so //
T02D3305:194b-33: de nas slob mas yon phul la thal mo sbyar te /
T02D3305:194b-34: gang gis bdag ni khyod drin las //
T02D3305:194b-35: rang dang gzhan don nus gyur pa //
T02D3305:194b-36: rdo rje slob dpon gyi ni dbang //
T02D3305:194b-37: thugs rje'i gter gyis bdag la stsol du gsol //
T02D3305:194b-38: zhes brjod cing bla ma la gsol ba btab pa de la /
T02D3305:194b-39: rdo rje h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su bsams nas /
T02D3305:194b-40: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D3305:194b-41: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D3305:194b-42: kun du bzang bo kun bdag nyid //
T02D3305:194b-43: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po'i bdag //
T02D3305:194b-44: bcom ldan 'das mchog gi dang po'i skyes bu zhes
T02D3305:194b-45: brjod cing lag pa g-yas par rdo rje sbyin par
T02D3305:194b-46: bya ste rdo rje'i dam tshig go //
T02D3305:194b-47: de nas dril bu aa las skyes par bsams nas //
T02D3305:194b-48: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D3305:195a-2: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung //
T02D3305:195a-3: byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed //
T02D3305:195a-4: ces brjod cing lag pa g-yon par dril bu sbyin par bya ste dril bu'i dam tshig go //
T02D3305:195a-5: slob mas kyang dril bu de /
T02D3305:195a-6: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
T02D3305:195a-7: rang bzhin dag mchog sems dpa' yi //
T02D3305:195a-8: dam pa'i srid pa byed par 'gyur //
T02D3305:195a-9: zhes brjod cing dkrol bar bya'o //
T02D3305:195a-10: de nas gzhan yang phyag rgya'i dam tshig gsungs pa /
T02D3305:195a-11: yid kyi lus ni brtan pa nyid //
T02D3305:195a-12: phyag rgya'i dam tshig rab tu brjod //
T02D3305:195a-13: gang gis lus 'di thams cad brtan //
T02D3305:195a-14: des na phyag rgyar rab tu bsgrags //
T02D3305:195a-15: 'dis ni lhag pa'i bdag nyid ye shes kyi phyag
T02D3305:195a-16: rgyar byin gyis brlabs pa la lag pas 'khyud pa'i
T02D3305:195a-17: tshul bya'o zhes pa phyag rgya'i dam tshig go //
T02D3305:195a-18: mchog gi dang po las gang gsungs pa /
T02D3305:195a-19: rdo rje de nyid kyis ni gzung //
T02D3305:195a-20: dril bu chos kyis dkrol nas ni //
T02D3305:195a-21: dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya che //
T02D3305:195a-22: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas /
T02D3305:195a-23: zhes so dam tshig gsum sbyin pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:195a-25: // / de nas dam tshig gsum gzung ba ni /
T02D3305:195a-26: slob ma rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su bsgoms te /
T02D3305:195a-27: snying ga'i sa bon gyis bskul ba'i lha mo rnams
T02D3305:195a-28: dang de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkhar bzhugs pa rnams
T02D3305:195a-29: kyis mngon par dbang bskur bzhin par rnam par bsams
T02D3305:195a-30: la / dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni //
T02D3305:195a-31: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa //
T02D3305:195a-32: gsang gsum yang dag 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02D3305:195a-33: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya //
T02D3305:195a-34: aom a'a: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02D3305:195a-35: zhes brjod pas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D3305:195a-36: de nas mi bskyod pa cod pan du bsams te /
T02D3305:195a-37: gzhan de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang lha mo rnams ye shes sems dpa'i ngo bos bcug la /
T02D3305:195a-38: aom su pra tishtha badzre sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:195a-39: zhes pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab cing /
T02D3305:195a-40: de rnams la me tog la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3305:195a-42: shes rab bcu drug lon pa la //
T02D3305:195a-43: lag pa dag gis yang dag 'khyud //
T02D3305:195a-44: rdo rje dril bu mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D3305:195a-45: slob dpon gyi ni dbang du 'dod //
T02D3305:195a-47: de'i rjes su mdor bsdus pas dkyil 'khor gyi de
T02D3305:195b-0: kho na nyid dkyil 'khor gyi @195b rnam par dag
T02D3305:195b-2: phung po dri med nyid ni dkyil 'khor te //
T02D3305:195b-3: mtha' dag lha mo'i chogs kyi rnam par nges //
T02D3305:195b-4: he ru ka dang dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs //
T02D3305:195b-5: der yang lus dang ro yi rgyun las rtogs //
T02D3305:195b-6: zhes pa phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba ste //
T02D3305:195b-7: ming gzhan slob dpon gyi dbang gi cho ga'o /
T02D3305:195b-9: // / de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam par bltas nas /
T02D3305:195b-10: me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod cing bstod de /
T02D3305:195b-11: sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i me tog gcig gis slob ma la bsnun nas 'di rnams brjod par bya'o //
T02D3305:195b-12: deng nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D3305:195b-13: srog dang bcas pa rnam rol phyir//
T02D3305:195b-14: rdo rje bsnyems ma'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D3305:195b-15: dga' mchog bde ba'i mchod pa gyis //
T02D3305:195b-17: a'a:/ sgeg dang bcas pas phreng ba 'phang //
T02D3305:195b-18: sangs rgyas thams cad chod par bya //
T02D3305:195b-20: phreng ba 'di ni rgyan yin no //
T02D3305:195b-22: lus can kun la dam chos kyi //
T02D3305:195b-23: glu ni khyod kyis blang par gyis //
T02D3305:195b-24: de yis bde gshegs dngos grub ni //
T02D3305:195b-25: shin tu bde ba thob par 'gyur //
T02D3305:195b-27: de nyid thal mo'i gar gyis ni //
T02D3305:195b-28: rdzogs sangs rgyas la rjes chags pa'i //
T02D3305:195b-29: sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i phrin las kyis //
T02D3305:195b-30: gar mkhan tshul du bsgyur bar gyis //
T02D3305:195b-32: rdzogs sangs rgyas la spos phul bas //
T02D3305:195b-33: dam tshig brtul zhugs legs bsgos pa'i //
T02D3305:195b-34: lus can bde gshegs cha lugs su //
T02D3305:195b-35: ye shes kyi ni tshul du bgyis //
T02D3305:195b-37: a'a:/ sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dor //
T02D3305:195b-38: byang chub yan lag tshogs gyur pas //
T02D3305:195b-39: mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa yi //
T02D3305:195b-40: bde gshegs sku ni thob par gyis //
T02D3305:195b-42: chos kyi me ni legs spar bas //
T02D3305:195b-43: rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar dang //
T02D3305:195b-44: sems can ma rig ljongs rnams las /
T02D3305:195b-45: ye shes snang bas gsal bar gyis //
T02D3305:195b-47: rgyal ba rnams la dri phul bas //
T02D3305:195b-48: tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang //
T02D3305:195b-49: rnam grol ye shes gzigs pa yis //
T02D3305:195b-50: byang chub lus can rnams la bskor //
T02D3305:195b-52: ga:/ de nas rang gi snying po la sogs pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dam lan gsum du bzlas te /
T02D3305:195b-53: bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sbyin lags kyis //
T02D3305:195b-54: 'di la nye bar mdzad du gsol //
T02D3305:195b-55: zhes brjod cing slob ma la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3305:195b-57: bcom ldan bdag gis bzung lags kyis //
T02D3305:196a-2: zhes 'dis gzungs lan gsum bzlas so //
T02D3305:196a-5: // /'di'i rjes su gser ram dngul gyi snod du bzhag
T02D3305:196a-6: pa'i sbrang rtsi dang mig sman thur mas blangs nas
T02D3305:196a-7: de dag nyid kyis bsku zhing sngags kyi de kho
T02D3305:196a-9: aom badzra nee tra aa pa ha ra pa ta lam hr'i:/
T02D3305:196a-10: thur ldan sman pa'i rgyal po yis //
T02D3305:196a-11: ji ltar 'jig rten rab rib bzhin //
T02D3305:196a-12: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02D3305:196a-13: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02D3305:196a-14: zhes brjod par bya ste mig sman gyi cho ga'o /
T02D3305:196a-16: // / de nas me long blangs la /
T02D3305:196a-17: aa:yig gis mngon par bsngags nas slob ma'i gdong la
T02D3305:196a-18: bstan zhing tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod par bya
T02D3305:196a-19: ste / chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D3305:196a-20: gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med //
T02D3305:196a-21: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D3305:196a-22: rgyu dang las las yang dag byung //
T02D3305:196a-23: rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin //
T02D3305:196a-24: de ni dag gos la rnyog pa med //
T02D3305:196a-25: sangs rgyas kun bdag bdag nyid ni //
T02D3305:196a-26: bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs //
T02D3305:196a-27: rang bzhin med cing gnas med par //
T02D3305:196a-28: chos rnams de ltar shes nas khyod //
T02D3305:196a-29: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02D3305:196a-30: skyob pa rnams kyi sras su skye //
T02D3305:196a-32: me long bstan pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:196a-34: // / de nas ho: yig las byung ba'i gzhu ho:zhes brjod cing /
T02D3305:196a-35: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga ya
T02D3305:196a-36: sva zhes pas byin nas mnga' 'phang ba'i tshe yang
T02D3305:196a-37: slob mas / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga ya nas /
T02D3305:196a-38: bgegs la phyigs pa'i bsam pas phyogs ba zhir mda'
T02D3305:196a-39: 'phang mnga' 'phang bar bya ste steng du gcig dang
T02D3305:196a-40: 'og tu gzhan no zhes ba mda' 'phang ba'i cho
T02D3305:196a-42: / dbang bskur ba 'di rnams thams cad du /
T02D3305:196a-43: aom sarba ta th'a ga ga aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:196a-44: zhes brjod pas dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes slob dpon gyi dbang bskur te lus rnam par spyod ba'o //
T02D3305:196a-45: de nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dam tshig 'khor lo'i
T02D3305:196a-46: tshogs dam tshig byas nas yol bas bcad pa la
T02D3305:196a-47: sogs pa dben par byas nas slob ma la rab
T02D3305:196a-48: tu bstan pa'i ched du gzugs dang tsho la sogs
T02D3305:196a-49: pas brgyan cing / dam tshig dang sngom pa dang
T02D3305:196b-0: skal bar ldan pa'am ma rnyed na gzhan @196b yang
T02D3305:196b-1: rung ba'i shes rab ma bla ma la gsang ba'i
T02D3305:196b-3: de la bla ma rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bor lhag par mos pas thal mo sbyar te /
T02D3305:196b-4: khyod kyi zhabs kyi bka' drin las //
T02D3305:196b-5: bdag gis bla med bya ba thob //
T02D3305:196b-6: de phyir gsang ba'i dbang gis ni //
T02D3305:196b-7: mgon po rjes su gzung bar mdzod //
T02D3305:196b-8: ces pa lan gsum gyis gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D3305:196b-9: de nas rim pas dam tshig la nye bar bzhag ste /
T02D3305:196b-10: de la ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis dge ba'i bla mas /
T02D3305:196b-11: tha mal ba'i bud med kyi gzugs stong pa nyid
T02D3305:196b-12: kyi rjes la lha mo'i gzugs su bskyed pa de
T02D3305:196b-13: dang / rdo rje dang padma 'du bya ba sngon du 'gro bas snyoms par 'jug par bya zhing /
T02D3305:196b-14: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atmako& ham /
T02D3305:196b-15: zhes brjod nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer
T02D3305:196b-16: gyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin
T02D3305:196b-17: gshegs pas spyan ma la sogs pa dang snyoms par
T02D3305:196b-19: rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas bdag nyid la
T02D3305:196b-20: bcug pa rnams 'dod chags chen pos zhu bar gyur
T02D3305:196b-21: pa aa wa dh'u t'i nas 'gro bar bsams la
T02D3305:196b-22: / rdo rje nor bur lhan cig skyes pa bstan par bya zhing /
T02D3305:196b-23: mthe bong dang ming med dag gis rdo rje nor
T02D3305:196b-24: bu btsir nas padma las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D3305:196b-25: ba zhu ba de rnams rang gi byang chub kyi
T02D3305:196b-26: sems dang dbyer med par mos par bya ste /
T02D3305:196b-27: gsung rdo rje'i ngo bos slob ma rnams la'o //
T02D3305:196b-28: thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba mthong nas ma dad par dogs par gdong g-yogs bcings la /
T02D3305:196b-29: der 'jug pa rnams rnal 'byor ma'i las kyi rdo rje can gyis bzung nas gzhug par bya /
T02D3305:196b-30: pus mo btsugs nas me tog dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar zhing /
T02D3305:196b-31: bcom ldan zhi ba chen po kye //
T02D3305:196b-32: rdo rje rnal 'byor gcig bzhed pa //
T02D3305:196b-33: mi phyed phyag rgya sgrub pa po //
T02D3305:196b-34: rdo rje'i sbyor las yang dag byung //
T02D3305:196b-35: ji ltar khyod ni bdag nyid che //
T02D3305:196b-36: khyab bdag bdag kyang de 'drar mdzod //
T02D3305:196b-38: bying pa skyabs med bdag la skyobs //
T02D3305:196b-39: zhes pas bla ma la bstod pa bya'o //
T02D3305:196b-40: de nas bla mas langs te /
T02D3305:196b-42: ji ltar sangs rgyas sras dbang bskur //
T02D3305:196b-43: byang chub sems ni bzang po yis //
T02D3305:196b-44: de bzhin bu khyod dbang bskur bgyi /
T02D3305:197a-0: zhes pa'i tshigs bcad brjod pa sngon @197a * //
T02D3305:197a-2: aom a'a:badzra dhri ka h'um zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D3305:197a-3: dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug gi sngags rnams ji lta
T02D3305:197a-4: ba bzhin du brjod pas slob ma'i khar dbab par
T02D3305:197a-5: bya'o // des kyang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
T02D3305:197a-6: pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i slob
T02D3305:197a-7: ma aam ho ma h'a su kham zhes brjod cing
T02D3305:197a-8: bya'o // btung bar bya'o // shes rab kyis kyang
T02D3305:197a-9: langs nas gos med pa nyid du lhung ba'i chu
T02D3305:197a-10: skyes na gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdud rtsi'i
T02D3305:197a-11: thig le rnams de'i khar gzhug par bya ste /
T02D3305:197a-12: des kyang de bzhin du btung bar bya'o zhes pa /
T02D3305:197a-13: gsang ba'i mngon par dbang bskur ba ste ngag rnam par sbyong ba'o //
T02D3305:197a-14: de'i rjes la de'am gzhan yang rung ba'i shes rab ma dam tshig dang sngom pa la gnas pa'am /
T02D3305:197a-15: gzhan yang rung ste gzugs dang lang tsho can la sogs pa dang ldan zhing /
T02D3305:197a-16: khyod kyi zhabs kyi bka' drin las /
T02D3305:197a-17: gsang ba'i dbang bskur bla med thob //
T02D3305:197a-18: shes rab ye shes dbang bskur gyis //
T02D3305:197a-19: mgon po rjes su gzung bar mdzod //
T02D3305:197a-20: ces pa'i tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba btab ba can gyis slob ma la /
T02D3305:197a-22: bstan byar sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan //
T02D3305:197a-23: 'khor lo'i rim pa sbyor ba yis //
T02D3305:197a-24: dam pa'i bde pa myong bar gyis //
T02D3305:197a-25: dga' sbyin gnas sbyin lha mo 'di//
T02D3305:197a-26: sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'ong ma //
T02D3305:197a-27: zung zhig zung zhig sems dpa' che //
T02D3305:197a-28: zhes go bar byas nas gtad par bya'o //
T02D3305:197a-29: de nas rig mas kyang 'dod lha bzhin du sgrub pa po la rnam par blta zhing /
T02D3305:197a-30: gos dang bral ba la me tog gi rgyan rnams
T02D3305:197a-31: kyis brgyan te langs nas g-yon brkyang la sogs pa
T02D3305:197a-32: rnams kyis sgeg par byas la g-yas brkyang gi rkang
T02D3305:197a-35: tsog pu rnams kyang bya zhing /
T02D3305:197a-36: bzhi mnyam la sogs pa rnams kyis dri zhim par byas te /
T02D3305:197a-37: chu skyes gsal por nye bar bstan nas dga' bas 'di nyid brjod par bya'o //
T02D3305:197a-39: bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas //
T02D3305:197a-40: gang zhig cho gas sten byed pa //
T02D3305:197a-41: de yi mdun na nga gnas so //
T02D3305:197a-42: sangs rgyas bstan pa la sogs pa //
T02D3305:197a-43: bya ba padmar ji bzhin gyis //
T02D3305:197a-44: bde chen rgyal po rang nyid kyang //
T02D3305:197a-45: 'di nyid du ni rtag tu zhugs //
T02D3305:197b-1: des kyang langs nas 'o byas la yang dag par 'khyud de gnas par bya'o //
T02D3305:197b-2: de la bla mas dga' pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba bshad par bya ste /
T02D3305:197b-3: rdo rje padmar rab bzhag nas //
T02D3305:197b-4: byang chub sems ni spro mi bya //
T02D3305:197b-5: bskyod byas de ni dga' ba yi //
T02D3305:197b-6: sems ni bskyed cing bsgom par bya //

T02D3305:203b-11: mchog tu gsang ba dam pa yi //
T02D3305:203b-12: dkyil 'khor mthong bzhin rab zhugs pas //
T02D3305:203b-13: sdig pa kun las rnam par grol //
T02D3305:203b-14: de ring khyod rnams bde bar gnas //
T02D3305:203b-15: bde chen thog pa 'di la ni //
T02D3305:203b-16: phyin chad 'chi ba yod med de //
T02D3305:203b-17: srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das //
T02D3305:203b-18: srid pa shin tu mtha' grub po //
T02D3305:203b-19: sangs rgyas rdo rje can kun gyis //
T02D3305:203b-20: de ring tshe ldan dpang bskur te //
T02D3305:203b-21: khams gsum gyi ni rgyal srid che //
T02D3305:203b-22: rje bo nyid du khyod nges so //
T02D3305:203b-23: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig / khams gsum na ni gzhan med de //
T02D3305:203b-24: de bas 'dod la chags bral nyid //
T02D3305:203b-25: khyod kyis nam yang mi bya'o //
T02D3305:203b-26: 'dod pa kun la spyod pas khyod //
T02D3305:203b-27: gang la 'jigs pa med par gyis //
T02D3305:203b-28: sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga bza' bya //
T02D3305:203b-29: de las gzhan yang dam tshig bsrung //
T02D3305:203b-30: srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing //
T02D3305:203b-31: bud med rin chen spang mi bya //
T02D3305:203b-32: slob dpon spang bar mi bya ste //
T02D3305:203b-33: sdom pa las ni 'da' mi bya //
T02D3305:203b-34: shes rab thabs kyi bsam pa yis //
T02D3305:203b-35: mi bya cung zad yod ma yin //
T02D3305:203b-36: ma 'jigs khyod la sdig pa med //
T02D3305:203b-37: rdo rje sems dpa'i gsung ji bzhin //
T02D3305:203b-39: dbugs dbyung ba sbyin pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:203b-41: // / dbyugs dbyung sbyin nas slob ma la //
T02D3305:203b-42: bla mas dam tshig spyod rigs bya //
T02D3305:203b-43: rigs lnga las ni yang dag byung //
T02D3305:203b-44: dam tshig lnga ni mnyan par gyis //
T02D3305:203b-45: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D3305:203b-46: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song //
T02D3305:203b-47: 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dge ba'i //
T02D3305:203b-48: dam tshig sdom pa yin par 'dod //
T02D3305:203b-49: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang //
T02D3305:203b-50: blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar bya //
T02D3305:203b-51: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
T02D3305:203b-52: shes rab dril bu zhes byar brjod //
T02D3305:203b-53: slob dpon brnyas par mi bya ste //
T02D3305:204a-0: @204a * // bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
T02D3305:204a-1: 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs dag pa'i //
T02D3305:204a-2: dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs //
T02D3305:204a-3: rin chen rigs la de bzhin du //
T02D3305:204a-4: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02D3305:204a-5: zang zing chos dang mi 'jigs byams //
T02D3305:204a-6: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin //
T02D3305:204a-7: phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum /
T02D3305:204a-8: dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya //
T02D3305:204a-10: dam tshig sdom pa mchog yin no //
T02D3305:204a-11: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D3305:204a-12: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02D3305:204a-13: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya //
T02D3305:204a-14: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyis //
T02D3305:204a-15: 'di las gzhan du'ang bcu bzhi ni //
T02D3305:204a-16: rdo rje'i thag la pham par bshad //
T02D3305:204a-17: nyin lan gsum dang mtshan lan gsum //
T02D3305:204a-18: nyin re zhing ni bzlas par bya //
T02D3305:204a-19: bshes gnyen rdo rje'i spun zla dang //
T02D3305:204a-20: rnal 'byor ma rnams bsnyen bkur bya //
T02D3305:204a-21: spang bar mi bya dor mi bya //
T02D3305:204a-22: ji ltar nus bzhin yang dag spyad //
T02D3305:204a-23: theg pa dman pa 'dod mi bya //
T02D3305:204a-24: sems can don la rgyab phyogs min //
T02D3305:204a-25: 'khor ba yongs su mi spong zhing //
T02D3305:204a-26: mya ngan 'das la rtag dga' min //
T02D3305:204a-27: lha rnams dang ni gsang ba pa //
T02D3305:204a-28: khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing //
T02D3305:204a-29: phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang //
T02D3305:204a-31: khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya //
T02D3305:204a-32: ma byin par yang mo blang ngo //
T02D3305:204a-33: 'dod pa log par mi spyad cing //
T02D3305:204a-34: brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o //
T02D3305:204a-35: sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs pa //
T02D3305:204a-36: bya ba ma yin pa thams cad spangs //
T02D3305:204a-37: dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing //
T02D3305:204a-38: rnal 'byor ma kun bsnyen bkur bya //
T02D3305:204a-39: lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang //
T02D3305:204a-40: ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang //
T02D3305:204a-41: yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni //
T02D3305:204a-42: ci nus par ni rjes su skyongs //
T02D3305:204a-43: 'di dag dam tshig yin par gsungs //
T02D3305:204a-44: da ni khyod kyis bsrung bar bya //
T02D3305:204a-45: de bzhin des kyang brjod par bya //
T02D3305:204a-46: slob dpon bdag nyid chen po ste /
T02D3305:204a-47: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa //
T02D3305:204a-48: de bzhin du ni bdag gis bgyi //
T02D3305:204a-49: de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis //
T02D3305:204a-50: rang gi dam tshig mi zad pa de ster snod du gyis //
T02D3305:204a-51: 'gro ba bde ba nyung las rdo rje sems dpa' dang //
T02D3305:204a-52: mtshungs pa'i rtag pa nyid du phyin par 'gyur //
T02D3305:204b-0: @204b gzhan yang gang dag cho ga ji lta ba
T02D3305:204b-1: bzhin du mngon par dbang bskur ba la dge ba
T02D3305:204b-2: nyid kyi phyir / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D3305:204b-3: dpa' thams cad kyis sdug pa'i bud na 'dra bar
T02D3305:204b-4: thugs dang bas gsang sngags par dgongs par mdzad pa
T02D3305:204b-5: 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid yin no zhes
T02D3305:204b-6: nyid kyi phyir / so // dam tshig bsgrag pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:204b-8: // / de ltar mngon par dbang bskur ba thob cing dbugs phyung bas dga' ba'i slob mas kyang /
T02D3305:204b-9: de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes pa dang /
T02D3305:204b-10: deng bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas //
T02D3305:204b-11: bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas //
T02D3305:204b-12: de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02D3305:204b-13: sangs rgyas sras su dang bdag gyur //
T02D3305:204b-15: de nas rjes su mthun pa'i yin //
T02D3305:204b-16: slob ma las ni blang bya ste //
T02D3305:204b-17: des kyang dkyil 'khor de nyid ni /
T02D3305:204b-18: mngon du byas nas slar yang dbul //
T02D3305:204b-19: rgyal srid sa bzhi chung ma dga' ba'i bu dang bram mo de ni de bzhin bram bzang dang //
T02D3305:204b-20: glang po rta dang nor dang so ba gser dang shing rta gos dang mtshon cha de bzhin du //
T02D3305:204b-21: phun tshogs ma he rnams dang khyim sogs mchog de rnams dang dam pa rnams kyang bsten pa ste //
T02D3305:204b-22: bdag nyid kyang ni nges par shes bya gzhan ci'ang slob ma rnams kyis rig pa'i bla ma la'o //
T02D3305:204b-23: de ma byas na bsod nams ci //
T02D3305:204b-24: smyur gnas dang ni dka' thub gang //
T02D3305:204b-25: bla na med mdzad slob dpon ni //
T02D3305:204b-26: rdo rje sems dpa' mchod par bya //
T02D3305:204b-27: de la phul bas sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D3305:204b-28: kun la rtag tu phul bar 'gyur //
T02D3305:204b-29: de la byin bas bsod nams tshogs //
T02D3305:204b-30: tshogs las dngos grub bla na med //
T02D3305:204b-31: mdor na de 'dra'i bya ba rnams //
T02D3305:204b-32: bla ma dam pa mnyes bzhin bya //
T02D3305:204b-33: bla ma mnyes na dngos grub las //
T02D3305:204b-34: gzhan mon zhes ni thub pas gsungs //
T02D3305:204b-36: da ni dbang gi dag pa bshad de //
T02D3305:204b-37: 'dir me tog lhung bas nye bar mtshon pa'i de
T02D3305:204b-38: bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa
T02D3305:204b-39: res par gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D3305:204b-40: mgo bo'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'am //
T02D3305:204b-41: ma rig pa'i dri ma 'khrud par nus pa nyid
T02D3305:204b-42: du bsgrub pa'i phyir chu'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'o
T02D3305:204b-43: // rgyas 'debs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus bya ba bskyed pa dang /
T02D3305:205a-0: gtsug tor bskyed par nus pa nyid kyi chen du cod pan gyi @205a * //
T02D3305:205a-2: nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i dgra rtsa ba nas
T02D3305:205a-3: 'don pa nyid kyi phyir dpa' bo'i dar dbyangs 'ching
T02D3305:205a-4: ba ni cod pan gyi dbang gi 'khor yin te
T02D3305:205a-5: / kha cig tu ni dbang bskur ba tha dad par brjod do //
T02D3305:205a-6: dbyer med pa'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur bar nus
T02D3305:205a-7: pa nyid du bsgrub pa'i phyir rdo rje'i mngon par
T02D3305:205a-8: dbang bskur ba'o // stong pa nyid dang snying rje
T02D3305:205a-9: dbyer med pa bla na med pa'i ye shes 'byung
T02D3305:205a-10: ba'i mnga' bdag chos 'byung rtogs par bya ba'i ched
T02D3305:205a-11: du chos 'byung mtshon par byed pa dril bu sgra
T02D3305:205a-12: dang bcas pas mngon par dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D3305:205a-13: bdag po'i ched du mngon par dbang bskur ba ni bdag po'i dbang du yang brjod do //
T02D3305:205a-14: 'byung bar 'gyur ba na thub pa'i dbang po'i go
T02D3305:205a-15: 'phang gi ming du 'os pa'i sa bon bsgrub pa'i
T02D3305:205a-16: ched du ming gi mngon par dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D3305:205a-17: 'di nas brtsams te rnam par dag pa zung 'jug
T02D3305:205a-18: gi byang chub rtogs par bya ba'i ched du brtson
T02D3305:205a-19: par gyis shig ces nges par bya bar dgongs nas
T02D3305:205a-20: de'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'dzin pa la sbyor
T02D3305:205a-21: ba ni rdo rje'i dam tshig go //
T02D3305:205a-22: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ston pa'i
T02D3305:205a-23: nges pa ster ba'i de bzhin nyid rtogs pa la
T02D3305:205a-24: sbyar ba'i ched du sgra dang bcas pa'i dril bu'i
T02D3305:205a-25: dam tshig go / shes rab dang thabs kyi rang
T02D3305:205a-26: bzhin bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs
T02D3305:205a-27: rgyas kyi rang bzhin shin tu brtan par nus pa
T02D3305:205a-28: nyid du bsgrub pa'i phyir phyag rgya'i dam tshig go
T02D3305:205a-29: // de nyid kyi phyir mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur las /
T02D3305:205a-30: dam tshig gnyis kyi 'khor can phyag rgya'i dam tshig
T02D3305:205a-31: kho na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbang du gsungs
T02D3305:205a-32: so // rgyud gzhan du ni dam tshig gsum slob dpon gyi dbang gi don du gsungs te /
T02D3305:205a-33: de ltar yang sngar shes rab bcu drug ces pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D3305:205a-34: dri ma 'khrud par nus pa nyid ni dam tshig
T02D3305:205a-35: gsum gyi rnam par gzhag ba gnyi ga la mi
T02D3305:205a-36: 'gal lo // ji ltar sa bcu pa la phyir
T02D3305:205a-37: mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams
T02D3305:205a-38: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mngon par
T02D3305:205a-39: dbang bskur ba de bzhin du /
T02D3305:205a-40: dam tshig gsum dang bcas pa 'di yang de rnams
T02D3305:205b-0: dang bla mas dpag tu @205b med pa'i sems can
T02D3305:205b-1: gyi phung po la gzhal du med pa'i chas ston
T02D3305:205b-2: pa la sogs pa'i slob dpon du bya ba'i ched
T02D3305:205b-3: du khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal srid la dbang
T02D3305:205b-4: bas na / slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba ni
T02D3305:205b-5: phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang 'dra bas na phyir
T02D3305:205b-6: mi ldog pa'i dbang ste phyir mi ldog pa nyid
T02D3305:205b-7: kyi sa bon nyid kyang bskrun par byed pa'o //
T02D3305:205b-8: de'i phyir de la ltos nas phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i ched du dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D3305:205b-9: phyir mi ldog par bye dpa'i dbang bskur ba ni /
T02D3305:205b-10: phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa'i dbang dang phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang du brjod do //
T02D3305:205b-12: rdo rje gsang ba ye shes kyis //
T02D3305:205b-13: slob dpon zhes bya gsum du 'dod //
T02D3305:205b-14: ces pa'i lugs ni blo gros ngan pa rnams kho na'i yin no //
T02D3305:205b-15: 'di dag la sogs pas ni nyan thos kyi dam
T02D3305:205b-16: tshig gis rtse ba spang bar bya'o zhes pa'i nges
T02D3305:205b-17: pa'i ched du / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje
T02D3305:205b-18: 'dzin pas rdo rje ldan cig rab tu sbyor bas
T02D3305:205b-19: rtse bar bya ba'i don du gang gis me tog
T02D3305:205b-20: pa'i ched du / 'thor ba'o // rdzogs pa'i sangs
T02D3305:205b-21: rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pas rtag tu rang gi dam
T02D3305:205b-22: tshig la mchod par bya'o zhes pa ni /
T02D3305:205b-24: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba
T02D3305:205b-25: bzhin du dam pa'i chos yang dag par brjod pa'i
T02D3305:205b-26: don du aom gyi yi ge dang sv'a'i yi ge
T02D3305:205b-27: klog pa'o // sangs rgyas kyi gar rab tu bskor
T02D3305:205b-28: zhing gar gyi rjes su chags pas skye bo rnams
T02D3305:205b-29: gdul ba'i ched du ting ting shags 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:205b-30: sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
T02D3305:205b-31: 'jug pa'i don du spos kyi kun du bskyod pa'o
T02D3305:205b-32: // byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis yang dag par 'byor zhing //
T02D3305:205b-33: mtshan sum cu so gnyis dang dpe byad brgyad cus
T02D3305:205b-34: rnam par mdzes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thob
T02D3305:205b-35: pa'i ched du me tog nges par 'grems pa'o //
T02D3305:205b-36: ma rig pa'i mun par mun pa'i sems can rnams
T02D3305:205b-37: ye shes kyi sgron mes yang dag par snang bar
T02D3305:205b-38: bya ba'i ched du snang gsal dbul ba'o //
T02D3305:205b-39: 'byung bar 'gyur ba na thub pa'i dbang po'i sems
T02D3305:205b-40: dang tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab
T02D3305:205b-41: dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i
T02D3305:205b-42: ye shes thob par bya ba'i byed du dril bu
T02D3305:205b-43: dbul ba'o // bgegs med pa nyid dang zhi ba
T02D3305:205b-44: la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi sa bon dgod pa
T02D3305:206a-0: dbul ba'o // dang / don dam pa'i sngags @206a * //
T02D3305:206a-1: kyis dngos grub kyi zhing dag par bya ba'i ched du sngags brjod pa'o //
T02D3305:206a-2: mi shes pa'i rab rib bsal nas lha'i mig mngon
T02D3305:206a-3: par shes pa bskyed pa'i ched du mig sman no
T02D3305:206a-4: // de bzhin du yang gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar
T02D3305:206a-5: sna tshogs par lta ba 'du bya ba'i ched du
T02D3305:206a-7: bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal nas /
T02D3305:206a-8: shin tu pha pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi 'ben la
T02D3305:206a-9: sleb pa'i sa bon dgod pa'i ched du mda' 'phang
T02D3305:206a-10: ba'o // dad pa dang shes rab kyi zhing du bya ba'i don dang /
T02D3305:206a-11: dam tshig bsrung ba'i don dang /
T02D3305:206a-12: ngag dag pa'i don du gsang ba'i mngon par dbang bskur pa'o //
T02D3305:206a-13: phul du phyin pa'i ye shes 'di la yod pas
T02D3305:206a-14: shes rab ni phyi rol gyi gzhon nu ma yin
T02D3305:206a-15: la / de las ye shes ni sems rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba ste /
T02D3305:206a-16: rnam par dag pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga'
T02D3305:206a-17: ba ni shes rab ye shes kyi mngon par dbang
T02D3305:206a-18: bskur ba'o // ye shes de nyid dri ma dang
T02D3305:206a-19: bral zhing yongs su dag par rtogs pa ni bzhi
T02D3305:206a-20: pa'i mngon par dbang bskur pa'o //
T02D3305:206a-21: 'di dag ni bde ba chen po'i ros yid 'khrud par byed pa'i phyir na dbang ngo //
T02D3305:206a-22: 'di dang 'brel ba kho nar shes rab nyid zag
T02D3305:206a-23: pa med pa'i bde ba dam pa 'phel zhing mngon
T02D3305:206a-24: sum du byed pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir /
T02D3305:206a-25: las dang po la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su yang
T02D3305:206a-26: spang bar mi bya'o zhes pa ni rig ma'i brtul
T02D3305:206a-27: zhugs so // gang tshe rnam par mi rtog pas //
T02D3305:206a-28: las kun thabs dang bcas par spyod //
T02D3305:206a-29: rnam par mi rtog sgom pa ni //
T02D3305:206a-30: brtul zhugs rnams kyi bla ma'i bla //
T02D3305:206a-31: zhes sogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas gsungs pa'i phyir brtul zhugs can gyis ci bya /
T02D3305:206a-32: des na ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi byang chub
T02D3305:206a-33: kyi sems kyi brtul zhugs kho na la sbyin du
T02D3305:206a-34: sbyor ba'i phyir rdo rje'i brtul zhugs so //
T02D3305:206a-35: spyod pa dang bral na yang byang chub kyi sems
T02D3305:206a-36: mi rtog go zhes bslab pa'i don du spyod pa'i
T02D3305:206a-37: brtul zhugs te de ni rnam pa gsum mo //
T02D3305:206a-38: de la dang po nang gi bdag nyid kyi phyag rgya gsum dang sbyor ba ni mchog ste /
T02D3305:206a-40: kha tv'am ga ni lha yi sku //
T02D3305:206a-41: cang te'u shes rab dang ni rtags //
T02D3305:206a-43: sngags ni thod pa'i btung ba'o //
T02D3305:206a-45: lha'i sku dang gzhom du med pa'i gtum mo sgra
T02D3305:206b-0: tsam dang gnyis su med pa'i @206b bde ba chen
T02D3305:206b-1: po nyams su myong pa'i rten ni kun rdzob byang
T02D3305:206b-3: de ltar gsum ni mtshon par byed pa'o //
T02D3305:206b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnam par dag pa chos
T02D3305:206b-6: kyi dbyings kyi ye shes la sogs pa bskyed pa
T02D3305:206b-7: la sbyor ba lhur byed pa ste rnal 'byor ma
T02D3305:206b-8: dang spyod pa'i rtul zhugs so //
T02D3305:206b-9: gsum pa ni lta stangs bzhi dang mngon par shes
T02D3305:206b-10: pa lnga la sogs pa'i nus pa thob par gyur
T02D3305:206b-11: pa na sems can gyi don sgrub pa lhur pa
T02D3305:206b-12: ste / 'jig rten las phyir rol pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D3305:206b-13: pa'am rnam 'byor ma nang gi bdag nyid kyi rgyan
T02D3305:206b-14: ma lus pa'i don gyi mthu mchog tu byed pa
T02D3305:206b-15: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i rang
T02D3305:206b-16: bzhin byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba la nges par
T02D3305:206b-17: ste / sbyor ba'o // de ltar yang rnal 'byor ma kun du spyod pa'i rgyud las /
T02D3305:206b-18: dang po mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas //
T02D3305:206b-19: 'bad de nus pa bskyed par bya //
T02D3305:206b-20: nus pa bskyed pa'i rjes la ni //
T02D3305:206b-21: brtul zhugs spyod pa yid 'ong ba //
T02D3305:206b-22: rigs lnga mnyam par kun spyod pa //
T02D3305:206b-23: rigs gcig tu ni yang dag brtag / mi rtog sems gcig bdag nyid kyis //
T02D3305:206b-24: 'dod pa lnga la spyad par bya //
T02D3305:206b-25: de ltar dpal ldan he ru ka'i //
T02D3305:206b-26: ye shes bsam pa kun rdzogs mdzad //
T02D3305:206b-27: shes rab che ldan de yi ni //
T02D3305:206b-28: gnyis med ye shes brtul zhugs bzang //
T02D3305:206b-29: spyod pa'i brtul zhugs la zhugs pa'i //
T02D3305:206b-30: rnal 'byor rab nges shes par bya //
T02D3305:206b-32: 'byung bar 'gyur ba na thub pa'i dbang po'i go
T02D3305:206b-33: 'phang du 'os pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
T02D3305:206b-34: 'das pa'i dbang phyug thob pa'i ched du glegs bam
T02D3305:206b-35: dang thod lo kor dang sam bor 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:206b-36: rgyal srid la sogs pa'i bde ba la ltos pa
T02D3305:206b-37: med par bya ba'i ched du bsod snyoms la brten
T02D3305:206b-38: par gyur pa'o // mi chod pa'i bsam gtan dang
T02D3305:206b-39: bzlas pa bya ba'i ched du gyo mo'i snod dang
T02D3305:206b-41: ma rig pa thams cad gcad par bya ba'i ched du gri gug 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:206b-42: 'di dag thams cad kyang spyod pa'i brtul zhugs nyid kyi 'khor yin no //
T02D3305:206b-43: khams gsum dang dbyer med pa'i chos nyid rtogs pa'i
T02D3305:206b-44: rim pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa 'di khyod yin
T02D3305:206b-45: no zhes gzengs bstod pa'i don du lung bstan pa'o
T02D3305:207a-0: // de ltar yang bhur zhes pa steng gi 'jig @207a * //
T02D3305:207a-2: bhu wa zhes pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i sa 'og go //
T02D3305:207a-3: sv'a: zhes pa ni mtho ris te 'du shes med min skye mched kyi mthar thug pa'o //
T02D3305:207a-4: de gsum char yang khyod yin te /
T02D3305:207a-5: gang gi phyir de rnams kyi rang bzhin te de
T02D3305:207a-6: kho na nyid kyi dam tshig ste rab tu dga'
T02D3305:207a-7: ba'i sa la sogs pa rim gyis rtogs par nus
T02D3305:207a-8: pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa ni /
T02D3305:207a-9: sa ma ya stvam bhu rghu wa sva: zhes pa 'di'i don to //
T02D3305:207a-10: cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du dngos grub bsgrubs
T02D3305:207a-11: te chos bstan pa la sogs pa rnams kyis sems
T02D3305:207a-12: can gyi don gyis shig ces pa ni rjes su
T02D3305:207a-13: gnang ba'o // khyod kyis 'dod pa rnams la nye
T02D3305:207a-14: bar longs spyod kyang sgrib pa thams cad las nges
T02D3305:207a-15: par grol pa'i sangs rgyas nyid de rang ngo zhes
T02D3305:207a-16: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa byas pas
T02D3305:207a-17: rgyas par 'os pa la mngon par sbyor ba rtogs
T02D3305:207a-18: par bya ba'i ched du dbugs dbyung ba'o //
T02D3305:207a-19: phyi dang gsang ba dang de kho nyid kyi dam
T02D3305:207a-20: tshig gsum bsrung ba'i don du dam tshig bsgrag pa'i
T02D3305:207a-21: cho ga'o // rdo rje'i brtul zhugs la sogs pa
T02D3305:207a-22: lnga po 'di rnams kyang slob dpon gyi dbang gi
T02D3305:207a-23: cho ga'o // rjes dang / rig pa'i dbang gi
T02D3305:207a-24: rjes la de dang de tsam gyis tshim pa rnams
T02D3305:207a-25: la shes par bya'o zhes pa ni kha cig tu'o
T02D3305:207a-26: cho ga'o // rjes dang / // sngags dang mig
T02D3305:207a-27: sman dang me long dang mda' 'phang pa rnams ni
T02D3305:207a-28: rig pa'i dbang gi rjes la'o //
T02D3305:207a-29: rig ma'i brtul zhugs ni shes rab dang ye shes
T02D3305:207a-30: kyi dbang bskur ba'i rjes la yang kha cig tu'o
T02D3305:207a-31: // kha cig tu ni slar yang sngags la sogs pa dang spyod pa'i brtul zhugs dang /
T02D3305:207a-32: spyir rjes su gnang ba dang dam tshig gsum ni
T02D3305:207a-33: skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la'ang ma bshad de
T02D3305:207a-34: / ji ltar rigs par dbang gzhan rnams su de
T02D3305:207a-35: dang de'i don yod pa rnams la dgongs pas so
T02D3305:207a-36: / // kha cig rjes su gnang ba dang dbugs
T02D3305:207a-37: dbyung ba dag gi phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang du
T02D3305:207a-38: / // bsdus te / 'dir ni thams cad tha dad bu brjod do //
T02D3305:207a-39: gang yang mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje'i gur las /
T02D3305:207a-40: dang po chu yi dbang yin te //
T02D3305:207a-41: gnyis pa cod ban gyi ni dbang //
T02D3305:207a-42: gsum pa rdo rje'i dbang yin te //
T02D3305:207a-43: bzhi pa rang gi bdag po yin //
T02D3305:207a-44: lnga ba ming gi dbang yin te //
T02D3305:207a-45: drug pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang //
T02D3305:207a-46: bum pa'i dbang ni bdun pa ste //
T02D3305:207b-0: brgyad pa @207b gsang ba'i dbang yin no //
T02D3305:207b-1: dgu pa shes rab dbang bskur te //
T02D3305:207b-2: de nyid rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D3305:207b-3: kun du rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin //
T02D3305:207b-4: rang nyid ston pas lung ston te //
T02D3305:207b-6: zhes gsungs shing 'di nyid brtag pa'i rgyal po gnyis par yang //
T02D3305:207b-7: slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang //
T02D3305:207b-8: bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no //
T02D3305:207b-10: de la chu dang cod pa na dang rdo rje
T02D3305:207b-11: dang bdag po dang ming dang slob dpon gyi dbyer
T02D3305:207b-12: pa drug ni bum pa'i dbang ste /
T02D3305:207b-13: thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang spyan
T02D3305:207b-14: ma la sogs pa'i rim pa rnams kyis bum pas
T02D3305:207b-15: mngon par dbang bskur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D3305:207b-16: slob dpon gyi dbang ni mchog tu nye bar blang
T02D3305:207b-17: bar bya ba nyid kyis phul du byung ba dang
T02D3305:207b-18: bcas par dbang bskur pa'i phyir /
T02D3305:207b-19: bum pa'i dbang ni bdun ba ste //
T02D3305:207b-21: slob dpon gyi dbang de 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pas
T02D3305:207b-22: chu'i dbang la sogs pa lnga yang slob dpon gyi
T02D3305:207b-24: des na thams cad la 'gal ba med do zhes pa 'di ni gzhan dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:207b-26: // / rang nyid kyang dam tshig nyams na 'di lta
T02D3305:207b-27: bu'i dbang bskur ba nyid ji ltar slob dpon 'jug
T02D3305:207b-28: pa'i cho gar gzung zhing bshad pa de bzhin du
T02D3305:207b-29: blang bar bya'o // 'on kyang gal te bla ma
T02D3305:207b-30: dam pa dang shin tu ring ba dang lam bgrod
T02D3305:207b-31: dka' ba la sogs pa'i nye bar 'tsho bas bgrod
T02D3305:207b-32: mi nus pa'i phyogs na gnas pa ste gzhan du
T02D3305:207b-33: blang bar bya'o // ma yin no // rtag tu
T02D3305:207b-34: yi dam byed pa ni shes rab dang thabs ro
T02D3305:207b-35: gcig par rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyi
T02D3305:207b-36: yid kyis rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas dkyil
T02D3305:207b-37: 'khor gyi dbang phyug las chu'i dbang la sogs pa
T02D3305:207b-38: dang gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes dang bzhi
T02D3305:207b-39: pa'i mthar thug pa rnams dang dbugs dbyung ba'i mthar
T02D3305:207b-40: thug pa blang bar bya'o zhes pa rang dbang bskur
T02D3305:207b-41: blang bar bya'o // ma yin no // ba'i cho ga'o / //
T02D3305:207b-42: / rdo rje sems dpa'i sdom pa dang ldan pa
T02D3305:207b-43: 'di'i yang ltung ba ni rigs rnam pa gnyis te
T02D3305:207b-44: / rtsa ba'i ltung ba dang spom po'i ltung ba'o //
T02D3305:207b-46: bla ma dam pa'i thugs dkrugs pa //
T02D3305:207b-47: rtsa ba'i ltung ba dang por gsungs //
T02D3305:207b-48: bde gshegs bka' las 'das pa ni //
T02D3305:207b-49: ltung ba gnyis par brjod pa yin //
T02D3305:207b-50: rdo rje spun la khros pa yis //
T02D3305:208a-2: sems can rnams la byams pa spong //
T02D3305:208a-3: bzhi pa yin par rgyal bas gsungs //
T02D3305:208a-4: chos kyi rtsa ba byang chub sems //
T02D3305:208a-5: de spong ba ni lnga pa ste //
T02D3305:208a-6: rang dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha'i //
T02D3305:208a-7: chos la smod pa drug pa yin //
T02D3305:208a-8: yongs su ma smin sems can la //
T02D3305:208a-9: gsang ba sgrogs pa bdun pa ste //
T02D3305:208a-10: phung po lnga bdag sangs rgyas nyid //

T02D3305:208a-12: rang bzhin dag pa'i chos rnams la //
T02D3305:208a-13: som nyi za ba dgu pa ste //
T02D3305:208a-14: gdug la rtag tu byams ldan par //
T02D3305:208a-15: byed pa de ni bcu pa'o //
T02D3305:208a-16: thog mtha' bral ba'i chos rnams la //

T02D3305:208a-19: sems sun 'byin pa bcu gnyis pa //
T02D3305:208a-20: dam tshig rdzas ni ji bzhin rnyed //
T02D3305:208a-21: mi bsten pa ni bcu gsum pa //
T02D3305:208a-22: shes rab rang bzhin bud med la //
T02D3305:208a-23: smod par byed pa bcu bzhi pa //
T02D3305:208a-24: zhes pa ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba'o //
T02D3305:208a-26: rnal 'byor pa gang stobs kyis gtso //
T02D3305:208a-27: sbom po'i ltung ba dang por bshad //
T02D3305:208a-28: de la mtho btsams pa yang ngo //
T02D3305:208a-29: rgyud las gsungs pa'i rjes 'brangs nas //
T02D3305:208a-30: byin rlabs med pa'i bdud rtsi yang //
T02D3305:208a-31: de yi sbom po'i ltung pa ni //
T02D3305:208a-32: gnyis pa rab tu skye bar byed //
T02D3305:208a-33: tshogs kyi 'khor lor rtsod pa dang //
T02D3305:208a-34: dam tshig la ni dmod pa dag / rnal 'byor pa de'i sbom po yi //
T02D3305:208a-35: ltung ba gsum par bshad pa yin //
T02D3305:208a-36: gang cho gsang ba'i chos mthong la //
T02D3305:208a-37: g-yo sgyu'i blo yis mi sbed par //
T02D3305:208a-38: rab tu gsal bar bya na de'i //
T02D3305:208a-39: sbom po'i ltung ba bzhi par 'gyur //
T02D3305:208a-40: gang zhig dad pa'i sems can ni //
T02D3305:208a-41: gsang ba'i chos la dga' ba yi //
T02D3305:208a-42: phyin ci log ni 'chad byed pa //
T02D3305:208a-43: sbom po'i ltung ba lnga par 'gyur //
T02D3305:208a-44: nyan thos theg pa dman pa rnams //
T02D3305:208a-45: zhag bdun lhan cig gnas pa dang //
T02D3305:208a-46: de la sbom po'i ltung ba ni //
T02D3305:208a-47: shin tu lci ba drug pa skye //
T02D3305:208a-48: rnal 'byor nges par mi shes par //
T02D3305:208a-49: rnal 'byor mngon pa'i nga rgyal sems //
T02D3305:208a-50: de yi sbom po'i ltung ba ni //
T02D3305:208a-51: bdun par 'gyur bar the tshom med //
T02D3305:208a-52: snod du gyur pa'i sems can gang //
T02D3305:208a-53: phyi yi chos la dga' ba la //
T02D3305:208a-54: gsang pa'i chos rnams yang dag 'chad //
T02D3305:208a-55: de yi sbom po'i ltung ba ni //
T02D3305:208a-56: brgyad pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin //
T02D3305:208b-0: zhes pa ni sbom @208b po'i ltung ba'o //
T02D3305:208b-1: de'i phyir ltung ba gnyis kyis gzung bas dam tshig
T02D3305:208b-2: med na ji ltar nus pa'i ston mo sbyin pa
T02D3305:208b-3: sngon du 'gro ba'i 'bul ba byas nas bla ma
T02D3305:208b-4: dam pa'i ma dun du sdig pa bshags pa dang
T02D3305:208b-5: sngar gyi gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs

T02D3305:208b-7: sngom pa gzung bar bya'o zhes pa /

T02D3305:208b-12: dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang bral ba'i //

T02D3305:208b-15: sbyin sreg cho ga yang dag bya //
T02D3305:208b-16: sems can dbye bas mtha' yas te //
T02D3305:208b-17: rigs kyi dbye bas rnam pa lnga //
T02D3305:208b-18: las kyi dbye bas rnam pa bzhi //
T02D3305:208b-19: thab khung zhes bya'i mtshan nyid 'di //
T02D3305:208b-20: rnam mang brjod pa yongs sngangs nas //
T02D3305:208b-21: de ni bdag gis legs bsdus te //

T02D3305:208b-26: dbus su chu skyes 'dab brgyad dang //
T02D3305:208b-27: sor brgyad pa yi 'khor lo dgod //

T02D3305:208b-29: sor bzhi yang dag spangs ba'o //
T02D3305:208b-30: kha khyer la ni sor bzhi ste //
T02D3305:208b-31: rgya ni dpangs kyi tshad yin no //
T02D3305:208b-32: rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi 'am //
T02D3305:208b-33: gang yang zur brgyad khru do pa /
T02D3305:208b-34: kun nas sor brgyad spangs par te //
T02D3305:208b-35: dbus su chu skyes 'dab brgyad la //
T02D3305:208b-36: sor drug pa yi rin po che //
T02D3305:208b-37: rgyar ni dpangs kyi tshad ldan pa'i //
T02D3305:208b-38: sor mo brgyad pa'i kha khyer gyis //
T02D3305:208b-40: dbang la zhi rgyas thab de bzhin //
T02D3305:208b-41: cung zad kha ni rgyas pa'o //
T02D3305:208b-42: stegs bu la sogs zhi ba yi //
T02D3305:208b-43: thab khung bzhin du bshad par bya //
T02D3305:208b-44: dgug pa la yang de bzhin 'dod //
T02D3305:208b-45: padma'i dbus su dbang la ni //

T02D3305:208b-47: dgug pa'i dbus su lcags kyu dgod //
T02D3305:208b-48: rdo rje rtse gcig rnam pa can //

T02D3305:208b-54: rgya dang dpangs ni tshad mnyam pa //
T02D3305:209a-1: rol kha phyir gzhol gyur ba'i //
T02D3305:209a-2: kha khyer sor mo gsum pa'o //
T02D3305:209a-3: mthil dbus rtse gsum la gnas pa'i //
T02D3305:209a-4: rdo rje rnon po sor brgyad pa'i //
T02D3305:209a-5: rtse mo byang du phyogs pa ste //
T02D3305:209a-6: ro bsregs thal ba rnga mo'i brun //

T02D3305:209a-11: kha khyer rdo rje phreng bas bskor //
T02D3305:209a-12: dbus su mnyam par gnas pa ni //
T02D3305:209a-13: rdo rje rin chen chu skyes dang //
T02D3305:209a-14: sna tshogs rdo rje yongs bskor dag //
T02D3305:209a-16: zhi dang dbang gi thab ni shar //

T02D3305:209a-22: byug pa 'jim pa me tog dri //
T02D3305:209a-23: dkar ser dmar po nag po'o //
T02D3305:209a-24: rgya yi cha yi tshad gang yin //
T02D3305:209a-25: da yi phyed na zabs su 'dod //
T02D3305:209a-26: rang rang thab dbyibs kha khyer te //

T02D3305:209a-34: // / dgang gzar gser dang zangs las byas //

T02D3305:209a-52: blugs gzar yu ba dag gzar bzhin //
T02D3305:209a-53: rtsa bar rdo rje'i byug pa nyid //
T02D3305:209a-54: blugs gzar kun du khru gang tsam //
T02D3305:209a-55: rtse mor kun nas sor gnyis pa'i //
T02D3305:209a-56: chu skyes 'dab ma'i rnam pa ste //
T02D3305:209b-0: dbus su rdo rje dgod @209b par bya //
T02D3305:209b-1: dgang gzar blugs gzar mid gyur na //
T02D3305:209b-2: sor mo lnga dang gsum po yang //
T02D3305:209b-3: rab tu sbyar ba dag gis ni //
T02D3305:209b-4: bde legs rdzogs par gzhan dag gsungs //
T02D3305:209b-5: zhes ba dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyi cho ga'o /
T02D3305:209b-7: // / aa shv'a dhta dad pla ksha sogs //
T02D3305:209b-8: 'o ma can shing lo mar bcas //
T02D3305:209b-9: rtse mo mnyam bcad mtho gang tsam //
T02D3305:209b-10: rlan bcas rma med rtse mo dag /'o ma sprang ci mar la bsnyugs //
T02D3305:209b-11: rtse gcig dkar po'i dri yis bran //
T02D3305:209b-12: zung dag mnyam par gyur pa yi //
T02D3305:209b-13: yam shing rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya //
T02D3305:209b-14: chags pa gas pa phra dang sbom //
T02D3305:209b-15: rtse mo nyams dang rtse gnyis pa //
T02D3305:209b-16: skam po sgur po mi 'dod par //
T02D3305:209b-17: shes bya bsreg bya gzhan bshad bya //
T02D3305:209b-18: zho dang 'o ma zas mchog dang //
T02D3305:209b-20: ku sha tsu ta'i 'dab ma dang //
T02D3305:209b-21: me tog dkar po'i ge sar dang //
T02D3305:209b-22: tsandan pri yang ku dang ni //
T02D3305:209b-23: me tog thang chu'i sreg rdzas gsungs //
T02D3305:209b-24: ji ltar rnyed pas sbyin sreg bya //
T02D3305:209b-25: sbrang dang mar bsres zhi ba la'o //
T02D3305:209b-26: rgyas par ya shing de rnams nyid //
T02D3305:209b-27: tshad ni gang zhig khru gang ste //
T02D3305:209b-28: 'o ma zho dang mar bsres pa //
T02D3305:209b-29: lag gzungs ser po dri yis bran //
T02D3305:209b-30: zas mchog gong bu zho zan dang //
T02D3305:209b-31: ka rni ka ra ti la chen po //
T02D3305:209b-34: de bzhin n'a ga ge sar dang //
T02D3305:209b-35: me tog brgya pa lhan cig tu //
T02D3305:209b-36: kun nas mngar gsum bsres pa yi //
T02D3305:209b-37: sreg rdzas rgyas la ji bzhin 'dod //
T02D3305:209b-38: rtsam ba ka dang aa sho ka //
T02D3305:209b-39: ba ku la dang pri yang ku //
T02D3305:209b-40: la gu tsa dad aa mra sogs //
T02D3305:209b-41: sor lnga'i n'a ga ge sar gyi //
T02D3305:209b-42: gser rnams dan dmar po yi //
T02D3305:209b-43: 'bras bu rnams dang me tog gi / sreg rdzas rnams ni dbang la'o //
T02D3305:209b-44: dgug pa la yang de bzhin nyid //
T02D3305:209b-45: 'on kyang tsher ldan lcags kyu'i dbyibs //
T02D3305:209b-46: las kun pa la 'dab ldan pa'i //
T02D3305:209b-47: au du mba'a ra b'a la sha /
T02D3305:209b-48: p'a ksha aa shva dtha seng ldeng //
T02D3305:209b-49: sa m'a aa ba marga dang /
T02D3305:209b-50: aa karka ka shma aa mra //
T02D3305:209b-51: bee kam ka ta nya gro dha //
T02D3305:209b-52: gsar ba'i yam shing 'di rnams gzung //
T02D3305:209b-53: mdzub gang rtse gcig sbyin sreg 'gyur //
T02D3305:209b-54: mngon spyod la ni yungs kar dang //
T02D3305:209b-55: tsha ba'i til mar khrag dang ni //
T02D3305:209b-56: ni ma pa'i 'dab ma ke che dang //
T02D3305:209b-57: rnga mo la sogs brun rnams dang //
T02D3305:210a-2: skra dang tsher ma khva sogs kyi //
T02D3305:210a-3: gshog pa rus pa rkang ba'i rdul //
T02D3305:210a-4: sha chen tshil bu la sogs pa'i //
T02D3305:210a-5: rdzas 'di rnams dang dgra yi lus //
T02D3305:210a-6: byas nas dum bur bcad pa la //
T02D3305:210a-7: re re dug dang khrag lan tshva //
T02D3305:210a-8: mngon par bsreg pa'i sreg rdzas 'gyur //
T02D3305:210a-9: gang zhig zhi dang rgyas pa'i rdzas //
T02D3305:210a-10: gang yin bdag nyid bza' ba yang //
T02D3305:210a-11: mar dang bsres pa'i gu gul dang //
T02D3305:210a-12: sbos skar de kun rtag tu sbyar //
T02D3305:210a-13: sv'a h'a'i bdag nyid sngags kyis ni //
T02D3305:210a-14: dbye bas sbyin sreg mang du bya //
T02D3305:210a-15: dri dang me tog nyer spyod rnams //
T02D3305:210a-16: las kyi sbyor bas bya ba nyid //
T02D3305:210a-17: ces pa sreg rdzas kyi cho ga'o /
T02D3305:210a-19: // / zhi pa'i bud shing thab khung las //
T02D3305:210a-20: cung zad thung ba'i mchod sbyin shing //
T02D3305:210a-21: 'brog dgon pa lang lci bdag / srog chags med pa lhan cig 'dod //
T02D3305:210a-22: rgyas pa'i bud shing 'brog dgon pa'i //
T02D3305:210a-23: ba lang lci ba ma gtogs pa //
T02D3305:210a-24: ji skad gsungs bzhin bstan pa ste /
T02D3305:210a-25: rang gi thab mnyam 'bras bur bcas //
T02D3305:210a-26: dbang la ni ma pa skyur ba'i shing /
T02D3305:210a-27: me tog ldan pa'i bud shing ste //
T02D3305:210a-28: dgug par tsher ma can zhes bya //
T02D3305:210a-29: mngon spyod la ni skam po dang //
T02D3305:210a-30: tsha ba tsher ldan dri dan dang //
T02D3305:210a-31: de bzhin dur khrod skyes pa'i shing //
T02D3305:210a-32: bod bu rnga mo la sogs spangs //
T02D3305:210a-33: las kun la yang de rnams kun //
T02D3305:210a-34: zhes pa bud shing gi cho ga'o /
T02D3305:210a-36: // / zhi bar dkar po'i tshes gcig nas //
T02D3305:210a-37: brtsams te dkar po'i gos sogs can //
T02D3305:210a-38: srod la shar du kha bltas nas //
T02D3305:210a-39: stan bzang padma'i gdan gyis 'dug / las dang rjes mthun bsam gtan bsgrub //
T02D3305:210a-40: byams dang snying rje dang ldan pas /
T02D3305:210a-41: las dang mthun pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D3305:210a-42: zhi ba'i yid kyis yang dag sbyang //
T02D3305:210a-43: rgyas par zla ba gang ba nas //
T02D3305:210a-44: brtsams te ser po'i gos sogs can //
T02D3305:210a-45: snga dro shar du kha bltas nas //
T02D3305:210a-46: bzang po'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas brtsams //
T02D3305:210a-47: dbang la dmar po'i gos sogs can//
T02D3305:210a-48: nub tu kha bltas mthon po yi /
T02D3305:210a-49: gdan la rdo rje'i skyil krung gnas //
T02D3305:210a-50: bde zhin dga' bas bya bar gsungs //
T02D3305:210a-51: dgug pa la ni thams cad mtshungs //
T02D3305:210a-53: lhan rnams mnyes par byed pa la'ang //
T02D3305:210a-54: nub tu ba ltas yang dag spyad //
T02D3305:210b-0: mngon spyod sngon @210b po'i gos sogs sam //
T02D3305:210b-1: gang yang khro zhing khrag ldan gos //
T02D3305:210b-2: kha ni gshin rjer bltas te 'dug / sra ba'i stan nam rtsub mo'i sa //
T02D3305:210b-3: bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyas brang la ni //
T02D3305:210b-4: brtan par kun nas gnas pa 'am //
T02D3305:210b-5: yang na stan ni med par yang //
T02D3305:210b-6: rkang bas rkang ba mnan te bsdad //
T02D3305:210b-7: nag po yi ni tshes gcig gi //
T02D3305:210b-8: nyi ma gung ngam mtshan phyed la //
T02D3305:210b-9: so rnams 'cha' zhing smin ma dag /
T02D3305:210b-10: khro gnyer bsdus te sbyang par bya //
T02D3305:210b-11: rengs dang rmongs pa dbang ldan blta //
T02D3305:210b-12: de bzhin rdo rje skyil krung ste //
T02D3305:210b-13: poo shat sngags kyi mthar ldan pas //
T02D3305:210b-14: thab khung gru bzhir byas pa la //
T02D3305:210b-15: ser dang dkar ba'i rgyan gyis spras //
T02D3305:210b-16: rgyas mtshungs chogs gang dag gnas //
T02D3305:210b-17: bskrad la de bzhin mer phyogs te //
T02D3305:210b-18: rnga mo la sogs sngags kyis byug / dkar gnag gis brgyan dug gis bri //
T02D3305:210b-19: rdzas dang sngags ni 'di dag ste //
T02D3305:210b-20: khva ta la sogs gshog pa mchog / spel tshig dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02D3305:210b-21: 'dir ni khva sogs gshog pa dang //
T02D3305:210b-22: che ge mo au tstsha ta ya //
T02D3305:210b-23: h'um phat ces pa'i sngags rnams ni //
T02D3305:210b-24: bris pa dag dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3305:210b-25: dbye ba de bzhin bden bral du //
T02D3305:210b-26: phyogs der rkang pa bzlog pas 'dug / ser po nag pos rnam par brgyan //
T02D3305:210b-27: tsha ba'i til mar dug gis bri //
T02D3305:210b-28: thams cad du phyogs dang phyogs bral gang du kha
T02D3305:210b-29: bltas pa'i thad ka'i phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas
T02D3305:210b-30: pas so // yang don dam par phyogs ran rgyud
T02D3305:210b-31: pa ma yin pa'i phyir ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D3305:210b-32: nges par gnas pa de'i nga rgyal chen po'i yid
T02D3305:210b-33: kyis ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas de kho na
T02D3305:210b-35: gser dngul rdo dang zangs dang shing //
T02D3305:210b-36: sas byas nya phyis dung dang ni /
T02D3305:210b-37: 'dab ma'i kyong bu zhabs bsil dang //
T02D3305:210b-38: bsang gtor zhal ba sil mchod yon snod //
T02D3305:210b-39: zhi bar der gnas 'o ma dang //
T02D3305:210b-40: dkar po'i dri sogs 'dus byas te //
T02D3305:210b-41: sngags rig bdag nyid sngags pa yis //
T02D3305:210b-42: chu la sv'a h'a'i mtha' can bzlas //
T02D3305:210b-43: rgyas par der ni til zho bsre //
T02D3305:210b-44: ser po'i dri sogs 'dus byas te //
T02D3305:210b-45: chu la aom yig mtha' can te //
T02D3305:210b-46: rang gi sngags kyi bzlas pa bya //
T02D3305:210b-47: dbang la dmar po'i dri la sogs //
T02D3305:210b-48: 'dus bya chu la ho: yig gi /
T02D3305:210b-49: mtha' can sngags kyi bzlas pa bya //
T02D3305:211a-2: mngon spyod la ni khrag dang bcas //
T02D3305:211a-3: ba lang chu dang ko ta ba //
T02D3305:211a-4: nag dang ngan pa'i dri sogs ldan //
T02D3305:211a-5: chu la phat mtha'i sngags bzlas bya //
T02D3305:211a-6: kun du dri dang me tog dang //
T02D3305:211a-7: ku sha 'bras yos ti la dang ldan //
T02D3305:211a-8: las dang rjes mthun chu la ni //
T02D3305:211a-9: ji ltar rnyed pa rab tu gzhug / mchod yon snod dang de bzhin du //
T02D3305:211a-10: las kun pa yi chu yi snod //
T02D3305:211a-11: las kun pa yi chu sngags ni //
T02D3305:211a-12: rang gi sngags kyis bsngags par bya //
T02D3305:211a-13: padma'i snod gnyis g-yon logs su //
T02D3305:211a-14: rnam par bkod par gyur pa'i chu //
T02D3305:211a-15: lag pa g-yas pas bzung ba yis //
T02D3305:211a-16: yam shing sogs la bsang gtor bya //
T02D3305:211a-17: bsreg par bya ba'i rdzas rnams gzhan //
T02D3305:211a-18: rang gi g-yas su gzhag bya ste //
T02D3305:211a-19: bsad dang bskrad dang dgug pa la //
T02D3305:211a-20: bsang gtor dgod pa bzlog ste bya //
T02D3305:211a-21: zhi bar 'o ma can gyi shing //
T02D3305:211a-22: gtsubs pa'am gang yang dgon pa'i me //
T02D3305:211a-23: rgyas par nags chen tshig pa'am //
T02D3305:211a-24: rgyal po la sogs khyim byung ste //
T02D3305:211a-25: dbang la smad 'tshong rje'u rigs khyim //
T02D3305:211a-26: dgug par gar mkhan 'gron sogs las //
T02D3305:211a-27: drag por ro bsregs rus pa'am rdo //
T02D3305:211a-28: gdol ba'i khyim nas byung ba'i me //
T02D3305:211a-29: drag po'i dgug par yang 'di nyid //
T02D3305:211a-30: ji bzhin rang rang las kun la'o //
T02D3305:211a-31: zhes pa me'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'o /
T02D3305:211a-33: // / de nas me rnams blang bya ste//
T02D3305:211a-34: gtsang ma'i snod du yang dag gzhag / gtor ma sbyin zhing bsrung ba bya //
T02D3305:211a-35: sngon du dril bu dkrol ba nyid //
T02D3305:211a-36: bgegs mthar byed pa'i sngags dang ni //
T02D3305:211a-37: de nas slar yang yi ge gsum //
T02D3305:211a-38: mchod yon zhabs bsil la sogs dbul //
T02D3305:211a-39: de dag dang ni bzlas pa'i chu //
T02D3305:211a-40: ku sha'i rtse mos bzung ba yis //
T02D3305:211a-41: lan gsum g-yas skor gtor bar bya //
T02D3305:211a-42: mngon spyod la ni g-yon pa yis //
T02D3305:211a-43: mchod yon la sogs thams cad bya //
T02D3305:211a-44: skam po'i rtsva dang lhan cig me //
T02D3305:211a-45: thab khung du ni rab tu gzhug / aom dzva la dzva la h'um brjod de //
T02D3305:211a-46: rlung yab las byung rlung dang ni //
T02D3305:211a-47: rigs kyi snying po bdun bzlas pa'i //
T02D3305:211a-48: blugs gzar gnas pa'i mar gyis sbar //
T02D3305:211a-49: de yis yang dag 'bar ba'i mer //
T02D3305:211a-50: gsang la tsha ba'i til mar ro //
T02D3305:211a-51: ku sha gsar pa ma grugs pa //
T02D3305:211a-52: ljang gu ba lang rna ba tsam //
T02D3305:211a-53: aom badzra satva a'a: zhes pa //
T02D3305:211a-54: sngags kyis yongs su bzlas pa rnams//
T02D3305:211b-0: @211b sgrub pos dang por ku sha gnyis //
T02D3305:211b-1: g-yon nas so sor kha khyer la //
T02D3305:211b-2: rtse mo shar du bstan pa dang //
T02D3305:211b-3: gshin rjer phyogs dang nub tu bstan //
T02D3305:211b-4: rtse mo byang dang de nas shar //
T02D3305:211b-5: thab la ku shas g-yogs par bya //
T02D3305:211b-6: rgyas dang dbang dang mngon spyod kyi //
T02D3305:211b-7: thab la rim pa ji bzhin du //
T02D3305:211b-8: rtse mo byang dang rtse mo nub //
T02D3305:211b-9: rtse mo lho ru de bzhin nyid //
T02D3305:211b-10: dang por ku sha gnyis g-yon nas //
T02D3305:211b-11: de ltar kha khyer la yang dgod //
T02D3305:211b-12: 'dir yang sgrub pa po gang du mngon par phyogs
T02D3305:211b-13: pa de la ltos nas shar la sogs pa'i phyogs
T02D3305:211b-15: don dam par na phyogs dngos por med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3305:211b-17: sngags rig rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i //
T02D3305:211b-18: sa bon las ni thab khung bskyed //
T02D3305:211b-19: me rnams 'bar ba shes gyur nas //
T02D3305:211b-20: de dbus bdag med bsgom par bya //
T02D3305:211b-21: de nas ram yig las skyes pa'i //
T02D3305:211b-22: gru gsum me ni bskyed pa'i dbus //
T02D3305:211b-23: padma nyi ma la gnas pa'i //
T02D3305:211b-24: ram yig sa bon las byung ba'i //
T02D3305:211b-25: bong thung lto ba 'phyang sha rgyas //
T02D3305:211b-26: zhal gsum phyag drug 'bar ba ste //
T02D3305:211b-27: spyan gsum ral pa'i cod pan can //
T02D3305:211b-28: smar mchod phyir thogs dang ldan //
T02D3305:211b-29: las dang rjes mthun sku mdog dang //
T02D3305:211b-30: gos dang rgyan rnams dag gis brgyan //
T02D3305:211b-31: dang po'i phyag gnyis rol pa yis //
T02D3305:211b-33: g-yon na dbyug pa spyi blugs te //
T02D3305:211b-34: g-yas na bgrang phreng mi 'jigs sbyin //
T02D3305:211b-35: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i 'od zer gyi
T02D3305:211b-36: phreng ba dang rgyas 'debs kyi dbang po dang yang
T02D3305:211b-37: dag par ldan pa me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i
T02D3305:211b-38: sa bon ram de nyid dang snying gar me lha
T02D3305:211b-40: dam tshig sems dpa'i snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od
T02D3305:211b-41: zer gyi lcags kyus nam mkhar dam tshig sems dpa'
T02D3305:211b-42: dang 'dra ba'i me lha ye shes sems dpa' me'i
T02D3305:211b-43: mtshams nas byon pa drang srong gi tshogs kyis yongs
T02D3305:211b-44: su bskor ba rtsa ba'i zhal ni sku mdog dang
T02D3305:211b-45: mthun pa ste / de nyid dkar po yin na
T02D3305:211b-46: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal nag po dang dmar
T02D3305:211b-47: mthun pa ste / po dag dang / ser po
T02D3305:211b-48: dang dmar po dang ljang gu nyid la ni sngon
T02D3305:211b-49: po dang dkar po dag dang /
T02D3305:211b-50: sngon po nyid la ni dkar po dang dmar po
T02D3305:211b-51: dag rnam par bltas nas g-yas pa'i mthe bo mi
T02D3305:212a-2: aom ae hye hi mah'a bh'u ta de ba ri shi dvi dza sa ta ma /
T02D3305:212a-4: ma h'a ra aa smin sanni hi tva bha wa /
T02D3305:212a-5: zhes pas spyan drangs pa de dang lhan cig 'ongs
T02D3305:212a-6: pa'i bgegs gshin rje gshed la sogs pas bskrad nas
T02D3305:212a-7: de nyid dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02D3305:212a-8: zhes brjod pas rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D3305:212a-9: dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang mnyes
T02D3305:212a-10: par bya'o // de nas aom a'a: h'um aargham pra
T02D3305:212a-11: t'i tstsha h'um zhes pa 'dis mchod yon dbul zhing
T02D3305:212a-12: aargham gyi sgra'i gnas su p'a tyam zhes pa la
T02D3305:212a-13: sogs pa bcug pas zhabs bsil dang zhal bsil dang
T02D3305:212a-14: bsang gtor rnams kyang phul nas las dang rjes su
T02D3305:212a-15: mthun pa'i me tog la sogs pa rnams dang gsang
T02D3305:212a-16: ba'i mchod pas kyang mchod par bya'o //
T02D3305:212a-17: de la 'di'i mchod yon la sogs pa'i rim pa ni /
T02D3305:212a-18: ku sha yi ni chun po yis //
T02D3305:212a-19: dang po'i snod du bsang gtor gsum //
T02D3305:212a-20: kun du bzlas byas chu yis ni //
T02D3305:212a-21: de nyid du ni zhabs bsil dbul //
T02D3305:212a-22: khu tshur 'og tu phyogs pa yi //
T02D3305:212a-23: mdzub mos me tog gzung byas nas //
T02D3305:212a-24: mthe chung ming med gung mo dang //
T02D3305:212a-25: mdzub mo rim gyis bkrol bas so //
T02D3305:212a-26: gnyis pa dung gi mchod yon te //
T02D3305:212a-27: gnyis pa nyid du so sor dbul //
T02D3305:212a-28: rdo rje snyim pa phye bas so //
T02D3305:212a-29: gsum par zhal bsil dbul bya ste //
T02D3305:212a-30: khu tshur mdzub mo mthe bong gi //
T02D3305:212a-31: skam pas gzung ba'i me tog rnams //
T02D3305:212a-32: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan snga ru //
T02D3305:212a-33: sor mo rim gyis lan gsum bskor //
T02D3305:212a-34: mdzub mo gung mo ming med dang //
T02D3305:212a-35: mthe chung rnams ni bkrol bas so //
