T02D3305:215a-35: par 'dod pa rnams rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes pas
T02D3305:215a-36: / phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams la ltos pa med par ni yid kyis sbyin sreg go //
T02D3305:215a-37: rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas de'i ngo bo'am /
T02D3305:215a-38: rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs sam ma rim pa ji
T02D3305:215a-39: lta ba bzhin du rang rang gi rang bzhin rnam
T02D3305:215a-40: par dag pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:215a-41: ngo bos gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod pa lnga ji
T02D3305:215a-42: ltar rnyed pa the tshom med par longs spyod par
T02D3305:215a-43: bya ste / za ba'i dus su ni rang gi
T02D3305:215b-0: bza' ba thams cad mnyam @215b pa nyid du rnam
T02D3305:215b-1: par dag pa'i bdud rtsir byas nas lte ba'i thab
T02D3305:215b-2: khung gi mes 'khyud cing snying gar gnas pa'i rnag
T02D3305:215b-3: gi 'dod pa'i lha'i 'khor lo lag pa'i dgang gzar
T02D3305:215b-4: la sogs pas cho ga bzhin du yang dag par
T02D3305:215b-5: mnyes par bya'o zhes pa phyi'i rdzas kyis nang gi
T02D3305:215b-8: // / de nas cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D3305:215b-9: zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg byas te rang
T02D3305:215b-10: nyid kyis dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod nas thams
T02D3305:215b-11: cad du ji ltar nus pas de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D3305:215b-12: la sogs pa rnams la mchod pa gyis shig ces
T02D3305:215b-13: slob ma la sogs pa rnams mchod pa byed du
T02D3305:215b-14: bcug la der zhugs pa rnams kyang dam tshig gi
T02D3305:215b-15: kun du spyod pas tshim par bya'o //
T02D3305:215b-16: de la 'di ni dam tshig gi cho ga ste /
T02D3305:215b-17: dang por rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D3305:215b-18: chos ston de bzhin dpa' bo dang //
T02D3305:215b-19: dpa' mo'i dbang phyug la btud nas //
T02D3305:215b-20: tshogs kyi ston mo bdag gis bshad //
T02D3305:215b-21: ston mo de bzhin ston mo che //
T02D3305:215b-23: mtshan mo'i 'khor lo mtshan mor bshad //
T02D3305:215b-25: dge 'dun ston mo ston mo che //
T02D3305:215b-26: gand'i brdungs pa ston mo che //
T02D3305:215b-27: tshogs pa lhan cig 'khor lo ste //
T02D3305:215b-28: de bas lhag pa 'khor lo che //
T02D3305:215b-29: nyin re'am zla ba so so 'am //
T02D3305:215b-30: de bzhin du ni lo re'am //
T02D3305:215b-31: brgyad dang bcu bzhi gzhan yang 'dir //
T02D3305:215b-32: rgyas pa yi ni tshes rnams la //
T02D3305:215b-33: mchod rten rnams ni nges par ya //
T02D3305:215b-34: dam tshig bsrung ba'i don du ste //
T02D3305:215b-36: byang chub 'grub pa'i ched du bya //
T02D3305:215b-37: bza' bca' de bzhin 'gam bya dang//
T02D3305:215b-38: gzhi ba dang bldag ba myang bya rnams //
T02D3305:215b-39: btung ba la sogs mnyam ldan pa'i //
T02D3305:215b-40: ro drug ldan pa ston mor 'dod //
T02D3305:215b-41: yo byad thams cad bsgrubs nas ni //
T02D3305:215b-42: khyad par dus la spyan drang bya //
T02D3305:215b-43: dang po mandala byas nas ni //
T02D3305:215b-44: me tog rnams dag so rtsi spyan //
T02D3305:215b-45: sangs rgyas dge 'dun yo byad rnams //
T02D3305:215b-46: snga mor nye bar dbul bya ste //
T02D3305:215b-47: glu gar de bzhin rol mo yis //
T02D3305:215b-48: de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyen bkur bya //
T02D3305:215b-49: der yang smon lam byas nas ni //
T02D3305:215b-50: dge 'dun ston mo brtsam par bya //
T02D3305:215b-51: ba byung byugs pa'i sa yi char //
T02D3305:215b-52: me tog de bzhin bdug spos ldan //
T02D3305:216a-2: gdan rnams rab tu brtag par bya //
T02D3305:216a-3: sangs rgyas rjes su rim pa yis //
T02D3305:216a-4: kun la phyag sogs byas nas kyang //
T02D3305:216a-5: ji bzhin gdan la yang dag 'dug / lus ngag sems ni yang dag bsdam //
T02D3305:216a-6: nag po chen por gtor ma sbyin //
T02D3305:216a-7: de bzhin du yang nor bu'i zas //
T02D3305:216a-8: khang par za bar 'dod rnams kyang //
T02D3305:216a-9: de ltar 'dod bzhin yang dag gzhag / so rtsi de bzhin snod rnams dang //
T02D3305:216a-10: 'dag chal dang ni so shing dang //
T02D3305:216a-11: dri yi chu rnams de bzhin sbyin //
T02D3305:216a-12: sbyin pa 'dus pas longs spyod de //
T02D3305:216a-13: slar yang zhal bsil la sogs dbul //
T02D3305:216a-14: 'dus pa rnams la yon phul te //
T02D3305:216a-15: de kun bsod nams thun mong du //
T02D3305:216a-16: blo ldan mkhas pa rnams kyis bya //
T02D3305:216a-17: phyag 'tshal bzod par gsol nas ni //
T02D3305:216a-18: dge 'dun ston mo gshegs su gsol //
T02D3305:216a-21: // / chos sgrogs nyid dang de bzhin du //
T02D3305:216a-22: gnas brtan nye bar spyan 'dren dang //
T02D3305:216a-23: khyad par dus kyi spyan 'dren la'ang //
T02D3305:216a-24: gand'i kun nas brdung bar bya //
T02D3305:216a-25: sngar bzhin bde gshegs spyan drangs te //
T02D3305:216a-26: bla na med pa'i mchod pa dang //
T02D3305:216a-27: nyer spyod lnga yi mchod pa rnams //
T02D3305:216a-28: de nyid yid kyis mchod par bya //
T02D3305:216a-29: lhag ma'i rdo rje 'khor lo dang bcas pa spyan
T02D3305:216a-30: drangs te zhi ba la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis btung
T02D3305:216a-31: ba'i don du lag pa gnyis rab tu brkyang bar
T02D3305:216a-32: bltas la 'khor lo bskor ba'i mdun du bzlas pa'i
T02D3305:216a-33: khyad par rnams blangs nas der gzhug par bya zhing
T02D3305:216a-34: dam tshig gi spos la sogs pa sbyin par bya'o
T02D3305:216a-35: // de nas sngags brjod cing lag pa gnyis kha dang nye bar rab tu brkyang ste /
T02D3305:216a-36: kha bdud rtsis gang bas gtor na lhag ma'i rdo
T02D3305:216a-37: rje 'khor dang bcas pa des mgu bar 'gyur ro
T02D3305:216a-38: // 'khor dang bcas pa rmi lam du mthong zhing bya ba yang byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3305:216a-39: de la sngags ni 'di yin te //
T02D3305:216a-40: aom ku ru ku ru batta li batta li ma h'a batta li siddhi mu khe /
T02D3305:216a-41: sma sh'a na b'a si ni pre ta mu khe /
T02D3305:216a-42: sma sh'a na b'a si ni pre ta mu khe /
T02D3305:216a-43: tsanda k'a ra li ru dhi ra pri ye /
T02D3305:216a-47: r'a be pi tri ba na ma dhyer /
T02D3305:216a-48: bhu dza ha bha ka kha ha /
T02D3305:216a-49: sa ha ga na r'u dhe /
T02D3305:216a-52: tishtha svi ku ru ku ru h'um /
T02D3305:216a-53: grihna grihna sarba dusht'a na bhaksha bhaksha ho:peem pheem che
T02D3305:216a-54: ge mo'i sarba bighn'a na sh'intam ku ru ku ru
T02D3305:216b-0: phat sv'a h'a / zhes pa ni thams cad du lhag @216b ma'i gtor ma'i sngags so /
T02D3305:216b-2: // / de nas der ni dri bzangs chu //
T02D3305:216b-3: zhal bsil rnams ni sbyin par bya //
T02D3305:216b-4: dri dang me tog so rtsi rnams //
T02D3305:216b-5: byin nas slob dpon sngon 'gro bas //
T02D3305:216b-6: sbyin pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod //
T02D3305:216b-7: de yi 'bras bu yongs su bsngo //
T02D3305:216b-8: nus pa yis ni yon phul nas //
T02D3305:216b-9: tshogs kyi 'khor lo gshegs su gsol //
T02D3305:216b-10: de la sbyin pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ni /
T02D3305:216b-11: dung 'gro'i skye gnas rnams la yon ni brgya 'gyur sdig pa can gyi mi la'ang stong phrag ste //
T02D3305:216b-12: tshul khrims ldan pa rnams la stong phrag brgya 'gyur du ni gsung gi dbang phyug gis rab gsungs //
T02D3305:216b-13: phyi rol 'dod pa rnams la chags bral nye bar gnas pa la ni bye ba brgya phrag brgya //
T02D3305:216b-14: lam la gnas pa rnams la slar yang tshad med 'bras bu ster bar yon las yang dag 'byung //
T02D3305:216b-15: bsod nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa yi //
T02D3305:216b-16: go 'phang thob nas skyon gyi dgra bcom ste //
T02D3305:216b-17: rga nang 'chi ba'i rlabs chen 'khrugs pa yi //
T02D3305:216b-18: srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba 'don par shog /
T02D3305:216b-19: ces pas bsod nams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o zhes
T02D3305:216b-22: // /'di nyid phyi rol du song nas //
T02D3305:216b-23: dur khrod du ni byed pa na //
T02D3305:216b-24: skal ba dang ldan slob dpon gyis //
T02D3305:216b-25: 'khor lo chen por de brjod bya //
T02D3305:216b-26: me tog bdug spos snang gsal dang //
T02D3305:216b-27: de bzhin dri dang phreng ba spos //
T02D3305:216b-28: ji ltar yod bzhin btung ba dang //
T02D3305:216b-29: bza' ba rnams kyang rig par bya //
T02D3305:216b-30: dbus su btung ba yi ni snod //
T02D3305:216b-31: der ni g-yo ba med par gzhag //
T02D3305:216b-32: lhag ma'i 'khor lo spyan drangs la //
T02D3305:216b-33: bsnyen bkur byas te rab tu gzhag / de yi steng du thod pa ni //
T02D3305:216b-34: mtshan nyid dang ldan dgod par bya //
T02D3305:216b-35: me tog spos sogs mchod pa rnams //
T02D3305:216b-36: las kyi rdo rje can gyis dbul //
T02D3305:216b-37: bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga rnams //
T02D3305:216b-38: sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs nas slar //
T02D3305:216b-39: yo byad thams cad rab tu gzhug / lha yi rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D3305:216b-40: sna tshogs bshes gnyen sogs thod par //
T02D3305:216b-41: btung ba'i snod rnams rab tu brtag / bza' dang btung ba la sogs kun //
T02D3305:216b-42: ji ltar sngar gyi de bzhin 'dir //
T02D3305:216b-43: sngags kyi khu ba'i rang bzhin phyir //
T02D3305:217a-0: sngags kyi btung ba zhes par @217a * //
T02D3305:217a-2: sngags kyi lha yi rnal 'byor bdag //
T02D3305:217a-3: sngags kyi btung ba yang dag spyod //
T02D3305:217a-4: tshogs kyi 'khor lo gshegs gsol bya //
T02D3305:217a-5: go yu la sogs 'bras bu dbul //
T02D3305:217a-6: bla mar gus pas phyag byas nas //
T02D3305:217a-7: gnas ji lta bar byon par gsol //
T02D3305:217a-8: zhes pa ni 'khor lo chen po'o /
T02D3305:217a-11: // / ri yi phug dang sman ljongs dang //
T02D3305:217a-12: rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang skyed mos tshal //
T02D3305:217a-13: nags tshal ngag gam rdzing bur yang //
T02D3305:217a-14: mtshan mo'i 'khor lo yang dag brtsam //
T02D3305:217a-15: bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga rnams //
T02D3305:217a-16: sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin dge / stan lnga la ni mnyam par 'dug //
T02D3305:217a-17: rigs lnga dag tu rnam par gnas /
T02D3305:217a-18: brda dang dgongs par nan tan bya //
T02D3305:217a-20: de la sngon du gdan byin te //
T02D3305:217a-21: mtshan mo'i 'khor lo kun nas brtsam //
T02D3305:217a-22: sgo bzhi rnams su khro bo bzhi //
T02D3305:217a-23: gnod mdzes gtsug tor las byed pa //
T02D3305:217a-24: gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs //
T02D3305:217a-25: rnal 'byor ma rnams rang sar dgod //
T02D3305:217a-26: slob dpon mi yi pags pa la //
T02D3305:217a-27: ba lang sogs la gzhan rnams kyang //
T02D3305:217a-28: mtshan mo dag pa'i blo yis ni //
T02D3305:217a-29: sangs rgyas lnga rnams mchod par bya //
T02D3305:217a-30: khri la sogs par mnyam gnas pa'i //
T02D3305:217a-31: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug mnyam //
T02D3305:217a-32: de nas 'khor lo byin gyis brlab //
T02D3305:217a-33: mnyam par snying rje brtan pas so //
T02D3305:217a-34: tshigs bcad lan gsum brjod pa yis //
T02D3305:217a-35: steng du me tog sogs gtor te //
T02D3305:217a-36: de tshe lha rnams spyan drang bya //
T02D3305:217a-37: yang dang yang du phyag rgya'o //
T02D3305:217a-38: mtshan mo'i 'khor lo gsal byas nas //
T02D3305:217a-39: ye shes 'khor lo rab tu gzhug //
T02D3305:217a-40: 'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag nyid kyi //
T02D3305:217a-43: ji ltar dga' ba mi spang ste //
T02D3305:217a-44: g-yas dang g-yas min sbyor ba yis //
T02D3305:217a-45: kun spyod der ni brtag par bya //
T02D3305:217a-47: gang gsungs tshogs kyi 'dus pa rnams //
T02D3305:217a-48: tshogs de mchod cing dam tshig gi / kun spyod rig pa'i bla mas so //
T02D3305:217a-49: rnam pa lnga ni rnam dag pa'i //
T02D3305:217a-50: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod par bya //
T02D3305:217a-51: snying rjer zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D3305:217a-52: sems can don byed nges par ro //
T02D3305:217b-0: rdo rje padmar rang @217b gnas pas //
T02D3305:217b-1: byang chub sems ni spro mi bya //
T02D3305:217b-2: der ni dga' ba sogs dbye ba'i //
T02D3305:217b-3: de bzhin nyid las de bzhin rtogs //
T02D3305:217b-4: bsam pa thams cad yongs spangs te //
T02D3305:217b-5: lha yi gzugs su sems pa'am //
T02D3305:217b-6: rnam par mi rtog rang bzhin las //
T02D3305:217b-7: der ni rnal 'byor pas gnas bya //
T02D3305:217b-8: mtshan mo'i 'khor lo'i cho ga las //
T02D3305:217b-9: 'ga' yang dor ba nyid min te //
T02D3305:217b-10: ma ma sring mo nyid dang ni //
T02D3305:217b-11: bu mo dang ni tsha mo dang //
T02D3305:217b-12: bdag can de bzhin chung ma dang //
T02D3305:217b-13: sgyug mo dang ni de bzhin yang //
T02D3305:217b-14: pha yi srid mo ma rnams te //
T02D3305:217b-15: shes rab brgyad rnams grub mchog ster //
T02D3305:217b-16: de rnams mchod pa'i bya ba ni //
T02D3305:217b-17: bo la kakko la sbyar nas //
T02D3305:217b-18: sangs rgyas nyid ni sangs rgyas kun //
T02D3305:217b-19: rang gis yang yang rtogs par bya //
T02D3305:217b-20: sngags kyi bzlas med dka' thub med cing sbyin sreg med //
T02D3305:217b-21: dkyil 'khor can yang med cing dkyil 'khor yang ni med //
T02D3305:217b-22: de ni sngags bzlas dka' thub de sbyin sreg //
T02D3305:217b-23: de ni dkyil 'khor can dang dkyil 'khor yang //
T02D3305:217b-24: mdor bsdus nas ni sems ni 'dus pa'i gzugs can nyid //
T02D3305:217b-25: yid ni brtan nam g-yo 'am ci //
T02D3305:217b-26: rang gi sems la so sor brtag //
T02D3305:217b-27: gang bshad 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gyi //
T02D3305:217b-28: spyod pa longs spyod phyi ram gsungs //
T02D3305:217b-29: de lta'i cho gas mtshan mo yi //
T02D3305:217b-30: 'khor lor blo bzang dbang bskur slar //
T02D3305:217b-31: bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis dngos grub ni //
T02D3305:217b-32: 'di nyid kyi ni srid par skye //
T02D3305:217b-33: bsgom pa la sogs de bzhin 'dir //
T02D3305:217b-34: nyung ba'am byas pa med na yang //
T02D3305:217b-35: gal te ltung ba med gyur na //
T02D3305:217b-36: bdun par de yi dngos grub 'gyur //
T02D3305:217b-37: ae ma thabs dang nus pa yis //
T02D3305:217b-38: theg pa chen por legs 'ongs nas //
T02D3305:217b-40: 'dod pa'i lha ni bsten par bya //
T02D3305:217b-41: sngar bzhin gtor ma mchod pa sogs //
T02D3305:217b-42: byas nas 'khor lo gshegs su gsol //
T02D3305:217b-43: 'khor lo'i dbang po'i phyag byas nas //
T02D3305:217b-44: ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya //
T02D3305:217b-45: zhes pa ni mtshan mo'i 'khor lo'o /
T02D3305:217b-47: // /'thung gcod kyi ni dam tshig bya //
T02D3305:217b-48: de yang grong gi dbus rnams sam //
T02D3305:217b-49: dkyil 'khor khang pa'i phyi rol du'ang //
T02D3305:217b-50: mkhas pa sa phyogs phreng sbyin par bya //
T02D3305:217b-51: gdong ni 'ga' yang mi blta ste//
T02D3305:218a-0: @218a * // yongs su dri nyid 'ga' yang min //
T02D3305:218a-1: sna tshogs gzugs kyis sems can rnams //
T02D3305:218a-2: nges par der ni 'ongs gyur na //
T02D3305:218a-3: byon nas byon la legs shes bya //
T02D3305:218a-4: 'dab ma'am snod rnams rab tu brtag / gza' btung la sogs de rnams sbyin //
T02D3305:218a-5: thams cad ji ltar 'dod bzhin bya //
T02D3305:218a-6: dang po bar dang mtha' rnams su //
T02D3305:218a-7: gtor ma gsum ni mkhas pas sbyin //
T02D3305:218a-8: so rtsi dri dang me tog sogs //
T02D3305:218a-9: phul nas 'khor lo gshegs su gsol //
T02D3305:218a-10: zhes pa ni phyogs phreng 'khor lo'o /
T02D3305:218a-12: // / dam tshig gang la thams cad rnal 'byor mar
T02D3305:218a-13: gyur cing bde ba'i don du 'khor lo'i dbang phyug
T02D3305:218a-14: ma'i g-yon phyogs su thabs gcig yod par gyur na
T02D3305:218a-15: ni dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D3305:218a-16: gang du thams cad dpa' bor gyur cing bde ba'i
T02D3305:218a-17: don du 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi g-yon du rnal
T02D3305:218a-18: 'byor ma gcig yod par gyur pa ni dpa' bo'i
T02D3305:218a-19: 'khor lo'o // 'khor lo 'di gnyis nyin par yang
T02D3305:218a-20: dga' ba na bug pa med pa'i khang par thun
T02D3305:218a-21: gnyis yan chad bya bar shes par bya'o //
T02D3305:218a-22: de'i phyir dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug gi
T02D3305:218a-23: 'khor lo dag la gal te shes rab gcig dang
T02D3305:218a-24: thabs gcig kyang med par gyur na de'i tshe sbyin
T02D3305:218a-25: pa'i bdag po'i bsod nams las bzlog par 'gyur ro
T02D3305:218a-26: // shes rab thabs kyi bde ba dag //
T02D3305:218a-28: gang zhig shes rab kyis dman pa'i //
T02D3305:218a-29: 'khor lo de ni rtsod med dang //
T02D3305:218a-31: zhes pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung ngo //
T02D3305:218a-34: // / de gsungs pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho gas
T02D3305:218a-35: dkyil 'khor gyi khang par bza' ba dang btung ba
T02D3305:218a-36: la sogs pa rnams 'khor lo la phul te //
T02D3305:218a-37: der zhugs pa rnams yang dag par tshim par bya'o //
T02D3305:218a-38: de rnam dang lhan cig mtshan mo mi nyal bar
T02D3305:218a-39: gar dang glu la sogs pa dang byang chub sems
T02D3305:218a-40: kyi rtog pas yang dag par mchod nas khyed rnams
T02D3305:218a-41: kyis 'jug pa 'di su la'ang smra bar mi bya'o
T02D3305:218a-43: de nas slob ma rnams gzhag ste phyi rol du
T02D3305:218a-44: phyogs kyi gtor ma dang mchod pa la sogs pa
T02D3305:218a-45: byas la nang du zhugs nas 'khor lo la phyag
T02D3305:218a-46: 'tshal te / mchod yon la sogs pa 'khor lo'i
T02D3305:218b-0: dbang po la phul nas dge @218b ba rnams yongs
T02D3305:218b-1: 'tshal te / su bsdos te / dkyil 'khor la lan gsum g-yas skor byas la /
T02D3305:218b-2: bcom ldan 'das la mngon par phyogs pas shar sgor
T02D3305:218b-3: 'dug ste yi ge brgya pa lan gsum brjod nas
T02D3305:218b-4: ma rnyed ba zhes pa la sogs pas bzod par
T02D3305:218b-5: gsol zhing / khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D3305:218b-6: ces pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D3305:218b-7: aom a'a:h'um badzra mu:zhes pas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol nas /
T02D3305:218b-8: rang gi sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bdag nyid la bstim ste /
T02D3305:218b-9: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am aa dya nutpanna trv'a ta aom a'a:h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:218b-10: aom a'a:h'um mu:zhes 'don cing chos thams cad skye ba
T02D3305:218b-11: med par mos pas dril bu dkrol zhing lag par
T02D3305:218b-12: gnas pa'i rdo rjes shar gyi sgo nas brtsams te
T02D3305:218b-13: tshangs pa'i thig gi lam nas gtso bo'i gnas kyi
T02D3305:218b-14: bar du dbye zhing mgo bo la rdul tshon cung
T02D3305:218b-15: zad blugs nas padma la sogs pa dbyi bar bya'o
T02D3305:218b-16: // de nas sgo rnams dang zur rnams kyang lag
T02D3305:218b-17: pa na gnas pa'i rdo rje'i rtse mos mngon par
T02D3305:218b-18: // gzhig par bya'o // de'i rjes su aom badzra
T02D3305:218b-19: k'i la autk'i la ya sarba k'i lan badzra dhar
T02D3305:218b-20: a'a dzny'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat ho:zhes pa h'um
T02D3305:218b-21: bzhi pas g-yon brkyang dang skam pa'i phyag rgyas phur
T02D3305:218b-23: aom ru ru sphu ru dzva la tishthasiddhi lo tsa ne sarba aartha s'a dha ne sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:218b-24: zhes pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i 'o mas bkru bar bya'o //
T02D3305:218b-25: phur bu'i lha rnams kyang gshegs su gsol zhing phur bu'i khung bu rnams kyang dgang bar bya'o //
T02D3305:218b-26: zhi ba la sogs pa don du gnyer ba rnams la rdul tshon cung zad sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3305:218b-27: de bzhin dkyil 'khor khang pa nyid du skye bo med par byas nas rdul tshon yang dag bsdus //
T02D3305:218b-28: phyi nas ba las byung ba rnams kyis 'di ltar mtha' dag 'khor lo la ni mkhas pas gtor //
T02D3305:218b-29: de nas ba byung rnams kyis byug pa rab tu bya ste ri mo rnams kyang byug par bya //
T02D3305:218b-30: me tog rnams ni nges par dgram zhing phyag byas nas ni sa yi lha mo mnyes par bya //
T02D3305:218b-31: phyi nas dpal ldan rnam rgyal rdul tshon rnams kyis rab tu bkang ste thab kyi thal ba sogs //
T02D3305:218b-32: bgegs dgra'i bum par de bzhin nyid de cho gas dam pa'i gos rnams 'di dag mgrin pa la'o //
T02D3305:218b-33: rnal 'byor ma yis bzung nas glang chen steng du de ltar mthon por spro bas khyer nas ni //
T02D3305:219a-1: ma byas nas chu klung rnams sam mtsho rnams su ni blugs par bya //
T02D3305:219a-2: cho ga 'di ni sbyin bdag gis byin pa'i ras
T02D3305:219a-3: kyis brgyan pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis bzung la
T02D3305:219a-4: 'od li la gnas pa'i slob dpon nam slob mas
T02D3305:219a-5: dril bu'i sgra dag bkra shis kyi glu dang rol
T02D3305:219a-6: mo'i sgra dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan
T02D3305:219a-7: la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams dang ldan pas khyer
T02D3305:219a-8: nas chu klung chen po dang mtsho chen po dang
T02D3305:219a-9: chu zab mo'i 'gram tu 'dug la ba byung gis
T02D3305:219a-10: byugs pa'i sa'i char dkar po'i dris mandala byas te
T02D3305:219a-11: / de'i dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad bris te /
T02D3305:219a-12: lte bar rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dab ma brgyad
T02D3305:219a-13: la klu rnams snga ma bzhin du mchod cing klu
T02D3305:219a-14: gtor gyi sngags kyis 'o thug gi gtor ma phul
T02D3305:219a-15: nas mchod de klu rnams la byin gyis brlabs pa'i
T02D3305:219a-16: rdul tshon gtor nas chu la bskur bar bya'o //
T02D3305:219a-17: klu rnams kyis bkur sti chen pos sa 'og gi gzhi la khyer bar bsam par bya'o //
T02D3305:219a-18: gang rdul tshon khyer ba'i bum pa de dag chus
T02D3305:219a-19: bkang nas de kho na nyid du khyer te de
T02D3305:219a-20: dag gis zhi ba'i don du dkyil 'khor khang pa
T02D3305:219a-21: la sogs par gtor bar bya'o //
T02D3305:219a-22: phyi nas de yi chen po'i bsam pa yis ni mtha' dag gnyen dang bcas pa'i rigs rnams kyis //
T02D3305:219a-23: spro ba chen pos cho ga bzhin du gzhon nu ma yi ston mo bde ba chen po bya //
T02D3305:219a-24: sdug bsngal can la'ang 'byor ba'i rjes su mthun pa'i sbyin pa dri med mkhas pas sbyin par bya //
T02D3305:219a-25: dge 'dun rnams la yang ni ston mi gos dang bcas shing yon dang bcas pa gus pas so //
T02D3305:219a-26: de la 'di ni gzhon nu ma mchod pa'i cho ga ste /
T02D3305:219a-27: gzhon nu ma rnams lha mo'i gzugs //
T02D3305:219a-28: yang dag gnas pa cho gas mchod //
T02D3305:219a-29: dkyil 'khor yang dag byas nas ni //
T02D3305:219a-30: sa der nus pas spyad par bya //
T02D3305:219a-31: dkyil 'khor gang du lha mo ji snyad yod pa
T02D3305:219a-32: de snyed kyi gzhon nu ma rnams nyi ma sngon
T02D3305:219a-33: ma la mandala la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas
T02D3305:219a-34: snyan gsan dbab par bya zhing /
T02D3305:219a-35: de nas gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi la
T02D3305:219a-36: sogs pa sbyin bdag gi nus pa'i dbang gis mchod
T02D3305:219a-37: par bya'o // de yang rdul tshon dor ba'i rjes
T02D3305:219a-38: su dri bzangs la sogs pas khrus bya zhing gos
T02D3305:219a-39: dmar pos brgyan par byas nas gus pa dang bcas
T02D3305:219b-0: te spyan drangs pa rnams bcom ldan @219b 'das ma
T02D3305:219b-1: nyin du yongs su brtags la /
T02D3305:219b-3: zhal bsil la sogs pa phul nas dkyil 'khor gyi khang par gzhug par bya'o //
T02D3305:219b-4: shar du mngon par phyogs par byas nas ku sha'i
T02D3305:219b-5: chun po rnams gdan gyi 'og tu byin la de'i
T02D3305:219b-7: de'i rjes su slob dpon gyis ji lta bar dkyil
T02D3305:219b-8: 'khor du sa bon dang mtshan ma yongs su gyur
T02D3305:219b-9: pa las skad cig gis dkyil 'khor dbang phyug rnam
T02D3305:219b-10: par bsgoms te / ye shes sems dpa' dang dbyer
T02D3305:219b-11: med pa la mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas
T02D3305:219b-12: mgo bor sindhu ra dang mgrin par skud pa'i phreng
T02D3305:219b-13: ba dang mig la thur mas mig sman dang me
T02D3305:219b-14: tog dmar po'i rgyan rnams kyang sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3305:219b-15: de nas bzhi mnyam la sogs pa ji ltar rnyed
T02D3305:219b-16: pa'am dri bzangs kyis dpral ba dang snying ga dang
T02D3305:219b-17: lag pa dang rkang pa dag la byug par bya'o
T02D3305:219b-18: // gtor ma byin te de nas ni //
T02D3305:219b-19: sngags pas bza' ba de dag dbul //
T02D3305:219b-20: bza' dang bca' dang de bzhin 'gam //
T02D3305:219b-21: myang dang gzhib dang bldag pa dang //
T02D3305:219b-22: ts'a ru sgron ma chang bcas kun //
T02D3305:219b-23: yang dag sbyangs te dbul bar bya //
T02D3305:219b-24: bstod dang mchod pa yang dag ldan //
T02D3305:219b-25: sngags kyi bzlas par rtag tu brtson //
T02D3305:219b-26: phyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod pa'o //
T02D3305:219b-27: mkhas pas gzhon nu ma rnams mchod //
T02D3305:219b-29: chang dang sha rnams kyis kyang rdo rje'i lha mo rnams //
T02D3305:219b-30: myur bar rab tu 'bad pas so sor mchod byed na //
T02D3305:219b-31: gus dang ldan pas de rnams mchod sbyin skye bo ni //
T02D3305:219b-32: dpal ldan rdo rje'i theg par gnas dgar gnas de la //
T02D3305:219b-33: yang dag tshim par sems la mchog ni ster bar 'gyur //
T02D3305:219b-34: de yi lag par mchog rnams nges par gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:219b-35: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal sdom pa 'byung ba las gsungs so //
T02D3305:219b-36: dge dang mi dge'i mtshan ma rnams //
T02D3305:219b-37: rgyas par de nyid shes bya ste //
T02D3305:219b-38: yang dag bsdus phyir 'dir ma brjod //
T02D3305:219b-39: bdag ni mngas pas 'jigs phyir ro //
T02D3305:219b-40: de nas zhabs bsil phul nas ni //
T02D3305:219b-41: dri bzangs rnams kyis lag pa byug / so rtsi rnams dang yon phul nas //
T02D3305:219b-42: lag par me tog rab tu dbul //
T02D3305:219b-43: shis pa brjod pa de thob nas //
T02D3305:219b-44: bsod nams yongs su bsngo bar bya //
T02D3305:219b-45: thams cad gshegs gsol byas nas ni //
T02D3305:219b-46: phyag bya rang khyim byon par gsol //
T02D3305:220a-0: @220a * // zhes pas dkyil 'khor du gzhon nu ma'i mchod pa byas nas /
T02D3305:220a-1: de yi rjes su bza' dang bca' dang 'gam pa
T02D3305:220a-2: rnams dang sna tshogs ro mchog rnams dang btung ba
T02D3305:220a-3: dang // gzhi ba dang bldag dang me tog so
T02D3305:220a-4: rtsi rnams dang de'i gos rnams dang g-yon rnams rab
T02D3305:220a-6: 'khor lo'i khang par 'khor lo 'o de rjes 'byor
T02D3305:220a-7: pas bzo bo 'dus pa rnams kyang tshim par bya
T02D3305:220a-8: // phyi nas rab tu gnas pa'i lha dang de
T02D3305:220a-9: rjes ljongs kyi skye bo mchod par bya zhing tshim
T02D3305:220a-10: // par bya // khang pa rnams dang sgo dang
T02D3305:220a-11: stegs bu lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga dang ni
T02D3305:220a-13: gang gang dngos po rab phul de dang de rnams
T02D3305:220a-14: mtha' dag 'dir ni slob dpon rgyal bo nyid kyis
T02D3305:220a-15: te // 'di rnams slob dpon las ni gzhan gyis
T02D3305:220a-16: ma yin de bzhin bzo rnams la yang cung zad
T02D3305:220a-17: te // nyid mi 'gyur // de rnams thams cad
T02D3305:220a-18: sbyin pa dang ni bsod nams la yang bla ma'i
T02D3305:220a-19: rang nyid 'dod pas sbyar bar bya //
T02D3305:220a-20: sbyin bdag rnams kyis rab tu gnas pa byas pas sku gzugs la sogs skyed du rung ba rnams //
T02D3305:220a-21: rol mo la sogs pa yi mchod pas rang gi gnas su khyer la mchod pa bya'o //
T02D3305:220a-22: man ngag rnams kyis yongs su sbyangs pa'i dge ba mchod sbyin rnams kyis 'bras bur gyur pa ni /
T02D3305:220a-23: gnyis kas sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu thob cing phan par byed pa'i sbyin pas sbyin bdag bde //
T02D3305:220a-24: slob dpon gyis kyang sems can kun la bde ba sbyin pa thob cing rab gnas bdag nyid kyi //
T02D3305:220a-25: rgyal po gnas kyi bdag po rnams dang skye bo rnams la nges par kun du dge ba ste //
T02D3305:220a-26: zhes pa dkyil 'khor nye bar bsdu ba'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:220a-28: // / de ltar 'di ni bris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ste //
T02D3305:220a-29: yid kyis rjes su bsgrub pa'i cho ga nyid 'bras
T02D3305:220a-30: bu dang ldan no zhes pa yid kyi cho ga
T02D3305:220a-32: de'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi mnga' bdag gi gzugs kyis
T02D3305:220a-33: sa yongs su gzung ba la sogs pa dang sku
T02D3305:220a-34: gzugs la sogs pa'i rab gnas dang /
T02D3305:220a-35: slob ma la mngon par dbang bskur ba dang gshegs
T02D3305:220a-36: su gsol ba dang zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi mthar
T02D3305:220a-37: thug pa thams cad yid kyis bya'o //
T02D3305:220a-38: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ltar gang gi tshe 'di
T02D3305:220a-39: dag thams cad yo byad 'ga' zhig dang bral bas
T02D3305:220a-41: mi rigs pa'am ma rnyed pa de'i tshe bsam pas thams cad bya'o //
T02D3305:220b-0: @220b phyi rol gyi dngos po yod pa la yang bsam gtan kho na gtso bo yin no //
T02D3305:220b-1: 'jig rten pas mthong bas na sbyin pa la mngon
T02D3305:220b-2: par dad pa la sogs pas bsod nams 'phel bar
T02D3305:220b-3: bya ba'i chad 'ba' zhig tu phyi'i cho ga 'dod
T02D3305:220b-4: do // yo byad dang bral bas ni bsam pa kho nas cho ga thams cad bsgrub par bya'o//
T02D3305:220b-6: dngos po thams cad med gyur na //
T02D3305:220b-7: bsam pa nyid kyis yongs su brtag / ces gsungs so //
T02D3305:220b-8: de'i phyir las dang po pas kyang sems brtan pos
T02D3305:220b-9: yid kyis sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor du rab tu gnas
T02D3305:220b-10: pa la sogs pa bya zhing skal ba dang ldan
T02D3305:220b-11: pa'i skye bo rnams kyang mngon par dbang bskur bar
T02D3305:220b-12: bya'o // de ltar dpal ldan sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud du /
T02D3305:220b-13: shes rab padma'i nang du ni //
T02D3305:220b-14: dpag tshad bye ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D3305:220b-15: rigs gsum dkyil 'khor de dbus su //
T02D3305:220b-16: mkhas pas slob ma dbang bskur bya //
T02D3305:220b-18: yid kyis 'ga' zhig nyid du ni //
T02D3305:220b-19: rgyal bas dkyil 'khor bya bar bzhed //
T02D3305:220b-20: zhes gsungs te yid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o /
T02D3305:220b-22: // /'dir brjod pa'i cho ga rnams kyang bya ba gzhan
T02D3305:220b-23: rnams la yang dang po dang mthar bgegs thams cad
T02D3305:220b-24: nye bar zhi ba'i ched du gtor ma sbyin par
T02D3305:220b-25: bya'o // de la 'di ni cho ga ste re
T02D3305:220b-26: zhig dang por slob dpon ji ltar rnyed pa'i cod
T02D3305:220b-27: pan la sogs pas rnam par brgyan pa dpal rdo
T02D3305:220b-28: rje sems dpa'i mdun du sha ka ta dang pi
T02D3305:220b-29: ta ka la sogs pa'i snod chen po rnams su
T02D3305:220b-30: zan dang khur ba dang la du dang dzambu ti
T02D3305:220b-31: la sogs pa dang nya sha dang btsod dang sgog
T02D3305:220b-32: skya dang chang dang chu dang 'o ma la sogs
T02D3305:220b-33: pa dang me tog dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:220b-34: bla re la sogs pas brgyan cing rol mo mkhan
T02D3305:220b-35: gyi mdun du bstar ba 'am zan dang chu la
T02D3305:220b-36: sogs pa tsam yang rung ji ltar rnyed pa yang
T02D3305:220b-37: dag par bkod nas bza' ba dang bca' ba dang
T02D3305:220b-38: bldag pa dang btung ba la sogs pa rnams sngar
T02D3305:220b-39: tshogs kyi 'khor lor bshad pa'i bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i
T02D3305:220b-40: cho gas bdud rtsir bskyed par bya'o //
T02D3305:220b-41: de nas bsdus pa'i rim pa'i cho ga'am yan lag
T02D3305:220b-42: bzhi pa'i cho ga 'am sa bon la sogs pa
T02D3305:220b-43: las sam skad cig gis kyang rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D3305:220b-44: gzugs kyi mdun du dri bzangs la sogs pas mandala
T02D3305:220b-45: byas par rang gi 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la sogs
T02D3305:220b-46: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad
T02D3305:221a-2: mi bskyod rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs
T02D3305:221a-3: su bcad pa dril bu 'khrol ba sngon du 'gro
T02D3305:221a-4: bas bstod de / rang gi snying ga'i sa bon
T02D3305:221a-5: gyi 'od zer gyis khro bo dang bcas pa'i srung
T02D3305:221a-6: ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa'i lte ba la gnas
T02D3305:221a-7: pa'i gzhal yas khang gi nang na bzhugs pa'i dkyil
T02D3305:221a-8: 'khor dang dbang po la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas
T02D3305:221a-9: pa dang klu rnams dang sems can thams cad kyang
T02D3305:221a-10: bkug nas dbang po la sogs pa skad cig gis
T02D3305:221a-11: 'od gsal bar rab tu zhugs pa'i rjes la 'dus
T02D3305:221a-12: pa'i lha shes rab dang bcas pa'i ngo bor rnam
T02D3305:221a-13: bas bstod de / par bsams te / mdun du
T02D3305:221a-14: zhabs bsil la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas dril
T02D3305:221a-15: bu dkrol zhing rdo rje gser te stong pa nyid
T02D3305:221a-16: dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i byang chub kyi sems
T02D3305:221a-17: su lhag par mos pa dang 'khor gsum yongs su
T02D3305:221a-19: aom a'a:h'um che ge mo badzra zhes rang gi 'khor
T02D3305:221a-20: lo'i dbang po la sogs pa nas gnod mdzes kyi
T02D3305:221a-21: bar gyi lha rnams re re nas ming nas spros
T02D3305:221a-22: shing de dag gi sa bon yang brjod de /
T02D3305:221a-23: sarba du shta sa ma ya mu dra pra bha
T02D3305:221a-24: nydza ka ma ma sh'antim rakshanytsa ku ru sv'a h'a
T02D3305:221a-25: h'um / aom sarba tya dhva dza da sha di ka /
T02D3305:221a-26: lo ka dh'a tva nantag ga na /
T02D3305:221a-27: sa mu dra me gha by'u ha pra sa ra /
T02D3305:221a-28: pa ra m'a nu ra dzo manda la /
T02D3305:221a-29: pa ram pa ra aa nanta rga ta /
T02D3305:221a-30: sa m'a pattya pa sthi t'a /
T02D3305:221a-31: dharma dh'a tu sa ma ba sa ra n'a /
T02D3305:221a-32: a'a k'a sha dh'a tu parya ba s'a nam /
T02D3305:221a-33: sarba tya dhva dza da sha di ka / lo ka dh'a tu aa nanta me gha bhy'u ha /
T02D3305:221a-34: pra sa ra ga ga na sa m'a /
T02D3305:221a-35: sarba lo ka p'a l'a: sarba satvanytsa /
T02D3305:221a-37: badzra yu dha m'a ya badzra /
T02D3305:221a-38: badzr'a na la badzra k'a la badzra mu sa la n'a ga badzra /
T02D3305:221a-42: badzra kunda li badzra pra bh'a /
T02D3305:221a-43: mon badzra be ma tsi tri//
T02D3305:221a-44: pri thi b'i de wa t'a sa pa ri w'a r'a:/
T02D3305:221a-45: ai mam pu shpam dh'u pa d'i pa gandha nee
T02D3305:221a-46: wi dyam a'a di sam yu kta ba li au
T02D3305:221a-47: pa ha ram / pra t'i tstsha au pa bhu dzya /
T02D3305:221a-48: ma ma hi ra nya su wa rna /
T02D3305:221a-49: dha na dhya na a'a yu: yoo wan aa ro gya satshu kha /
T02D3305:221a-50: pr'a h'a ra k'a na sarba bi ghn'am bi n'a ya k'a na /
T02D3305:221a-51: sarba du sht'a na pra du sht'a na /
T02D3305:221a-52: ma nu shya aa ma nu shy'a /

T02D3305:224a-11: gnod mdzes kyi mthar thug pa zhes pa la sogs

T02D3305:224a-13: shes par bya'o // 'dir yang khro bo'i sngags rnams kyi h'um yig rnams dang /
T02D3305:224a-14: aa: yig sngon du ai mam ba lim gri hna gri hna zhes brjod par bya ste /
T02D3305:224a-15: khro bo rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan la
T02D3305:224a-16: sogs pa ni sngar bshad pa'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D3305:224a-17: dkyil 'khor bzhin no zhes pa ni /
T02D3305:224a-18: kye'i rdo rje'i 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:224a-20: // / de bzhin du khyim dang gtsug lag khang la
T02D3305:224a-21: sogs pa bsrung ba dang bde legs su bya ba'i
T02D3305:224a-22: don du dpal ldan dpung pa bzang pos yongs su
T02D3305:224a-23: zhus pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud chen por gsungs pa'i
T02D3305:224a-24: sngags kyi tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis cho ga
T02D3305:224a-25: bzhin du gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3305:224a-26: de la 'di ni cho ga ste /
T02D3305:224a-27: zho dang 'o ma dang mar dang sbrang rtsi dang
T02D3305:224a-28: ka ra dang sha med pa'i tshod ma dang bza'
T02D3305:224a-29: pa dang dri bzang po'i chu dang dri bzang po
T02D3305:224a-30: can gyi me tog dkar po dang /
T02D3305:224a-31: rtse mor me tog gi phreng ba dang me tog sil ma dang /
T02D3305:224a-32: tsandan dkar po la sogs pa dri bzang po'i rdzas rnams dang /
T02D3305:224a-33: aa ka ru dang gu gu la dang /
T02D3305:224a-34: yan lag bcu pa'i bdug spos dang snang gsal la
T02D3305:224a-35: sogs pa ji ltar rnyed pa dang ji ltar nus
T02D3305:224a-36: pas bde legs su 'gyur ba'i don rnams nye bar
T02D3305:224a-38: grong khyer la sogs pa'i bgegs zhi ba'i ched du
T02D3305:224a-39: sha ka ta la sogs pa'i snod chen po zhes
T02D3305:224a-40: pa ni rnam par rgyas pa nyid de /
T02D3305:224a-41: khur ba dang til dang 'bras yos dang /
T02D3305:224a-44: nges pa nyid du 'byor pa dang rjes su mthun
T02D3305:224a-45: pa rnams sbyin bdag las nye bar blang bar bya
T02D3305:224a-46: zhing 'di rnams thams cad cha gnyis su yongs su
T02D3305:224a-47: brtags pa dri bzang pos rnam par bsgos pa rnams
T02D3305:224a-48: chu shing gi 'dab ma 'am zhib ma sar ba
T02D3305:224a-49: la sogs par so sor gzhag par bya'o //
T02D3305:224b-0: slob dpon @224b gyis khrus dang gtsang sbra dang yan
T02D3305:224b-1: lag dri zhim po dang ldan pas lus la gos
T02D3305:224b-2: gtsang ma bgos te ji ltar rnyed pa'i cod pan
T02D3305:224b-3: la sogs pas brgyan nas snying rje dang byams pa
T02D3305:224b-4: la yongs su gnas pa'i yid kyis pus mo g-yas
T02D3305:224b-5: pa'i lha nga sa'i gzhi la btsugs te lag pa
T02D3305:224b-6: thal mo sbyar ba byas la /
T02D3305:224b-7: shar ram byang du kha bltas nas cha gcig gis
T02D3305:224b-8: gdon rnams mchod pa'i ched du tshigs su bcad pa
T02D3305:224b-10: lha dang lha min klu dang grub pa kun //
T02D3305:224b-11: 'dab bzangs nam mkha' lding dang lus srul po //
T02D3305:224b-12: dri za gnod sbyin gdon gyi rigs rnams dang //
T02D3305:224b-13: gang yang sa la gnas pa'i lha rnams ni //
T02D3305:224b-14: bu smad bcas shing g-yog 'khor bcas pa la //
T02D3305:224b-15: bdag gi pus mo sa la btsugs nas ni //
T02D3305:224b-16: thal mo sbyar te khyed la gsol 'debs kyis //
T02D3305:224b-17: gsan nas phan gdags slang du 'dir gshegs shig //
T02D3305:224b-18: 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang //
T02D3305:224b-19: dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas khang dang //
T02D3305:224b-20: shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang //
T02D3305:224b-21: ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang //
T02D3305:224b-22: chu bo kun dang chu bo 'dus rnams dang //
T02D3305:224b-23: rin chen gnas na lhag par gang gnas dang //
T02D3305:224b-24: mtsho dang rdzing bu lteng ka khron pa dang //
T02D3305:224b-25: khrus kyi chu dang ri yi chu rnams dang //
T02D3305:224b-26: grong dang phyugs lhas rnams dang bas mtha' dang //
T02D3305:224b-27: khang stong dag dang lha yi khyim rnams dang //
T02D3305:224b-28: dka' thub gnas dang tshogs khang glang chen bres //
T02D3305:224b-29: 'byung po sna tshogs phug gnas gang dag dang //
T02D3305:224b-30: lam srang rnams dang tshong 'dus gzhi mdo dang //
T02D3305:224b-31: gang dag shing gcig drung dang lam bo che //
T02D3305:224b-32: dung khrod chen po nags tshal chen po dang //
T02D3305:224b-33: seng ge dred dang glang chen gnas rnams dang //
T02D3305:224b-34: 'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang //
T02D3305:224b-35: gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang //
T02D3305:224b-36: lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams //
T02D3305:224b-37: de rnams rab tu dge bar gyur nas su //
T02D3305:224b-38: me tog dri dang phreng ba bdug spos dang //
T02D3305:224b-39: gtor ma snang gsal chogs gus 'bul gyis //
T02D3305:224b-40: 'di rnams bzhes nas gsol zhing btung bar mdzod //
T02D3305:224b-41: 'dir yang las kyi 'bras bu ldan par mdzod //
T02D3305:224b-42: de ltar gdon rnams la mchod pa byas nas phyogs
T02D3305:224b-43: kyi mchod pa gcig pa'i yid kyis rab tu bya'o
T02D3305:225a-0: zhes pa / cha gzhan gyis phyogs kyi bdag @225a * //
T02D3305:225a-1: po rnams mchod pa'i ched du tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams brjod par bya'o //
T02D3305:225a-2: dbang po can gyi lta tshogs 'khor dang bcas //
T02D3305:225a-3: khyad 'phags gtor ma 'di ni bzhes su gsol //
T02D3305:225a-4: me dang gshin rje bden bral sa yi bdag //
T02D3305:225a-5: chu bdag rlung dang nor gyi bdag po dang //
T02D3305:225a-6: dbang dang ldan pa 'byung po'i lha rnams dang //
T02D3305:225a-7: steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang //
T02D3305:225a-8: lha rnams kun dang gang dag sa steng klu //
T02D3305:225a-9: sa 'dzin lha dang gtsang ba'i tshogs bcas la //
T02D3305:225a-10: so so so sor re res phul ba rnams //
T02D3305:225a-11: tshim zhing thob pas bzhes par mdzad nas su //
T02D3305:225a-12: rang rang phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas kyang //
T02D3305:225a-13: rang rigs sde dang sras bcas grogs su bcas //
T02D3305:225a-14: spos dang gtor ma me tog zhal zas rnams //
T02D3305:225a-15: 'di dag gsol zhing bsnams te btung mdzad nas //
T02D3305:225a-16: 'dir yang las kyi 'bras bu ldan par mdzod //
T02D3305:225a-17: de nas khyim dang gtsug lag khang dang grong khyer
T02D3305:225a-18: la sogs pa'i dbang ldan gyi mtshams su yo byad
T02D3305:225a-19: de rnams thams cad nyid bzhag par bya'o //
T02D3305:225a-20: zho dang zan dang dzambu ti ka rnams snod gcig
T02D3305:225a-21: tu bsres nas pi da ka la sogs par bya
T02D3305:225a-22: zhing / til dang 'bras yos ni snod so sor
T02D3305:225a-23: byas nas g-yas skor gyis khyim la sogs pa'i phyi
T02D3305:225a-24: rol nas zhugs te gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3305:225a-25: snang gsal la sogs pa'i yo byang gzhan rnams ni
T02D3305:225a-26: dbang ldan gyi mtshams nyid du gzhag par bya zhing
T02D3305:225a-27: spos dang chu ni dor bar bya'o //
T02D3305:225a-28: de ltar yang gtor ma byin pa'i zan la sogs
T02D3305:225a-29: pa ji ltar dbang ldan gyi mtshams ji srid par
T02D3305:225a-30: ro zhes so / snga dro'am dus khyad par can
T02D3305:225a-31: gyi dus su gtor ma dbul bar bya zhing snga
T02D3305:225a-32: dro'i nyi ma la gtor ma byin pa'i phyi nas
T02D3305:225a-33: slob dpon gyis kha na ma tho pa med pa'i
T02D3305:225a-34: bza' ba rnams chu tshod bdun na bza' bar bya
T02D3305:225a-35: ro zhes so / ste / nyi ma nub pa
T02D3305:225a-36: na yang gtor ma mang du dbul ba nyid do
T02D3305:225a-37: ro zhes so / ste / // slob dpon la
T02D3305:225a-38: yang ji ltar nus pa'i yon dbul par bya ste
T02D3305:225a-40: ni bgegs nye bar zhi ba'i don dang gzhan yang
T02D3305:225a-41: 'dod pa'i bya ba'i don dang bsod nams kyi ngon
T02D3305:225a-42: du yang rjes su gnas pa'o zhes pa ni dpung
T02D3305:225a-43: pa bzang pos yongs su zhus pa'i mdo rgyud chen
T02D3305:225a-44: por gsungs pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:225b-0: // / gtor ma bzhi po 'di dag ni bskyed pa'i @225b rim pa la'o //
T02D3305:225b-1: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la ni shes rab dang thabs
T02D3305:225b-2: las g-yo ba med pa'i sems kyis dgongs par gsol
T02D3305:225b-3: ba tsam gyis spyan drangs pa'i shes rab dang thabs
T02D3305:225b-4: kyi rang bzhin nyid dang 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D3305:225b-5: dbang phyug la sogs pa'i lha dang bcas pa'i dbang
T02D3305:225b-6: po la sogs pa rnams la ye shes kyi ro
T02D3305:225b-7: dang tha mi dad pa'i gtor ma dbul ba ni
T02D3305:225b-10: // / gdon sogs nyes pa nye bar zhi ba'i ched nyid dang //
T02D3305:225b-11: dbul ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu nyams par bya phyir dang //
T02D3305:225b-12: tshe thung ba rnams tshe ni 'phel ba'i rgyu yi phyir //
T02D3305:225b-13: dkyil 'khor gsum gyis bde legs byed pa rab tu bstan//
T02D3305:225b-14: de phyir mi rnams rang la phan pa'i bsam pa yis //
T02D3305:225b-15: gdon gyi nyes pa nye bar zhi ba nyid bya ste //
T02D3305:225b-16: cho ga 'di ni shin tu rnam dag thugs ldan pa'i //
T02D3305:225b-17: sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'gro ba'i don gyi rgyur gsungs phyir ro //
T02D3305:225b-18: gza' yum gyi ni dkyil 'khor la //
T02D3305:225b-19: thig rnams bri bar bya ste slar //
T02D3305:225b-20: rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du ni //
T02D3305:225b-21: cha chung bzhi ni spangs byas nas //
T02D3305:225b-22: sngags pas der ni sbyin bya ste //
T02D3305:225b-23: zur thig gnyis kyi bar du'o //
T02D3305:225b-24: de yi nang du zlum po ni //
T02D3305:225b-25: de yi mthar thug bar du bya //
T02D3305:225b-26: cha chung gcig nas slar yang bskor //
T02D3305:225b-27: de la rdo rje phreng ba bya //
T02D3305:225b-28: lhag ma de yang cha gsum la //
T02D3305:225b-30: de la zur thig la sogs rnams //
T02D3305:225b-31: gsang sngags rig pas dbye bar bya //
T02D3305:225b-32: rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du ni //
T02D3305:225b-33: sgo yi bar ni spangs pa dang //
T02D3305:225b-34: de yang nang du thig bya ste //
T02D3305:225b-35: cha chung bzhi yi bar de bzhin //
T02D3305:225b-37: 'di las lhag dang chad pa min //
T02D3305:225b-38: nor rgyun ma yi dkyil 'khor te //
T02D3305:225b-39: chog rig pa rnams kyis bya //
T02D3305:225b-40: tshangs las cha chung rig byed mthar //
T02D3305:225b-41: zlum po gcig ni bskor bar bya //
T02D3305:225b-42: de nas cha chung phyed spangs te //
T02D3305:225b-43: zlum po gnyis pa'i thig yin no //
T02D3305:225b-44: de nas cha chung bzhi spangs par //
T02D3305:225b-45: rtsibs kyi zlum po gsum pa ste //
T02D3305:225b-46: de nas cha chung yongs dor bar //
T02D3305:225b-47: mu khyud zlum po bzhi pa'o //
T02D3305:225b-48: de nas cha chung gnyis spangs nas //
T02D3305:225b-49: zlum po ge sar thig yin te //
T02D3305:225b-50: cha chung rig byed spangs nas ni //
T02D3305:225b-52: de yi phye rol zlum po gsum //
T02D3305:225b-53: cha chung gnyis par du'o slar //
T02D3305:226a-2: rnam par rgyal ba'i 'khor lo ni //
T02D3305:226a-3: don kun grub par byed pa ste //
T02D3305:226a-4: sems can kun la phan bltas nas //
T02D3305:226a-5: 'di ni ye shes rdo rjes bya /
T02D3305:226a-7: // / de la dang por gza' yum gyi cho ga bri bar bya'o //
T02D3305:226a-8: dbus kyi lte bar padma dkar po'i steng du gur
T02D3305:226a-9: gum gyi dri'i mandala la lha nyi ma bsam par
T02D3305:226a-10: bya ste // dka' thub can gyi gzugs 'dzin pa
T02D3305:226a-11: sku mdog dmar po phyag dag gis chu skyes dkar
T02D3305:226a-12: bya ste // po bsnams pa // nyi ma bye ba'i 'dod dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D3305:226a-13: 'di la ni 'o thug gi bza' ba dang //
T02D3305:226a-14: kun du ru'i bdug spos kyang dbul bar bya ste /
T02D3305:226a-15: aom a'a: me gha au la k'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:226a-16: zhes pa snying po'i sngags kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02D3305:226a-17: shar gyi 'dab mar chu skyes dmar po'i steng du
T02D3305:226a-18: pri yang ku'i dri'i mandala la zla ba bram ze'i
T02D3305:226a-19: gzugs 'dzin pa sku mdog dkar po ral pa'i cod
T02D3305:226a-20: pan can // phyag gis bgrang phreng dang me tog ku mu dal gnas pa'i spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o//
T02D3305:226a-21: 'di la ni mar gyi bza' ba dang sihla'i bdug spos dbul bar bya ste /
T02D3305:226a-22: aom tsandra aa mri ta bi kra m'a ya sh'i ta aam sha be a'a: sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:226a-23: lho'i 'dab mar padma dkar po'i steng du tsandan gyi
T02D3305:226a-24: dri'i mandala la bkra shis ni dge slong gi gzugs
T02D3305:226a-25: 'dzin pa / sku mdog dmar po gos dmar po dang cod pan can /
T02D3305:226a-26: g-yon pas shakti 'dzin cing g-yas pas mchog sbyin mdzad pa'o //
T02D3305:226a-27: 'di la ni sran ma nag po'i zan nam bu ram gyi zan gyi bza' ba dang /
T02D3305:226a-28: gu gul gyi bdug spos kyang dbul bar bya ste /
T02D3305:226a-29: na mo rakta aadga ra dzva la ku m'a r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:226a-30: nub kyi 'dab mar chu skyes dmar po'i steng du
T02D3305:226a-31: aa ka ru nag po'i dri'i mandala la gza' lhag
T02D3305:226a-32: tu grags pa ni tshangs par spyod pa'i gzugs can
T02D3305:226a-33: sku mdog ser po smar dmar po can /
T02D3305:226a-34: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:226a-35: 'di la ni sran mungga dang rgya sran sbyar pa'i bza' ba dang gandha ra sa'i bdug spos te /
T02D3305:226a-36: r'a dza su tra buddha su p'i ta warn'a ya nam: aom buddh'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:226a-37: byang gi 'dab mar chu skyes dkar po'i lte bar
T02D3305:226a-38: de ba d'a ru'i dri'i mandala la phur bu dge
T02D3305:226a-39: slong gi rnam pa gser bco ma'i 'od can /
T02D3305:226a-40: sma ra dmar po dang ldan pa bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:226a-41: 'di la ni zho zan nam 'o thug gi bza'
T02D3305:226b-0: ba dang sbang dang mar gyi @226b bdug spos te
T02D3305:226b-1: / lo ti ta warna nir ga m'a ya bri
T02D3305:226b-2: ha sa b'a da ye aom na mo bho ga
T02D3305:226b-4: me'i 'dab mar tsandan gyi dri'i mandala ba sangs ni
T02D3305:226b-5: phyugs bdag gi brtul zhugs 'dzin pa sku mdog dkar
T02D3305:226b-6: po ral ba'i cod pan can /
T02D3305:226b-7: bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:226b-8: 'di la ni 'o thug gi bza' ba dang ga bur gyi bdug spos kyang dbul bar bya ste /
T02D3305:226b-9: aom na ma: sh'akra aa dhi pa ta ye aa
T02D3305:226b-10: su ra autta m'a ya shuddhe bi ra dze sv'a
T02D3305:226b-11: h'a / bden bral gyi 'dab mar 'dam skyes dkar
T02D3305:226b-12: po'i steng du sngon po dang tsandan gyi dri'i mandala
T02D3305:226b-13: la spen pa ni nag po phyogs kyi gos can
T02D3305:226b-15: ral pa seng skya'i cod pan can sma ra tsan bgrang phreng dang 'khar gsil 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:226b-16: 'di la ni sran nag las sbyar ba'i zan gyi
T02D3305:226b-17: bza' ba dang gandha ra sa'i bdug spos dbul bar
T02D3305:226b-18: bya ste / aom sha na n'i la aa pa su krishn'a ya krishn'a barna bhu ga sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:226b-19: rlung gi 'dab mar chu skyes dmar po'i steng du
T02D3305:226b-20: pandi ta ka ri'i dri'i mandala la sgra gcan ni
T02D3305:226b-21: thod pa dang ldan pa lus phyed nyi ma'i shing
T02D3305:226b-22: rta la gnas shing 'jigs su rung ba'i spyan gnyis
T02D3305:226b-23: dang ldan pa / mche ba rnam par gtsigs shing
T02D3305:226b-24: smin ma'i khro gnyer dpral bar bsdus pa kha dog
T02D3305:226b-25: lnga pa'i sprin gyi gseb na gnas ba /
T02D3305:226b-26: phyag gis nyi ma dang zla ba za ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:226b-27: 'di la ni nya dang sha 'am til las sbyar ba'i bza' ba dang bil ba'i bdug spos te /
T02D3305:226b-28: aom na mo pi kri ta pa kva ru dhi
T02D3305:226b-29: ra r'a ho bhidga aanydza sinn'a bh'a ya aa mri
T02D3305:226b-30: ta pri y'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:226b-31: dbang ldan gyi 'dab mar padma dmar po'i steng du
T02D3305:226b-32: sbyar spos kyi dri'i mandala la gtum po'i gzugs can
T02D3305:226b-33: mjug rings ni du ba'i mdog can thal mo sbyar
T02D3305:226b-34: ba klu'i rnam pa can gyi mjug ma 'khyil ba'o
T02D3305:226b-35: // 'di la ni snum khur gyi bza' ba dang spos dkar gyi bdug spos kyang dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3305:226b-36: aom na mo dh'u mra a'a bha wa rna sanni bh'a ya dzyo ti ka ta be sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:226b-37: dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi sgor sangs rgyas bcom ldan
T02D3305:226b-38: 'das gser gyi mdog can ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag
T02D3305:226b-39: rgya mdzad pa'o // lho'i sgor phyag na rdo rje
T02D3305:226b-40: sngo bsangs phyag g-yas pas rdo rje thugs kar 'dzin
T02D3305:226b-41: zhing phyag g-yon pa sa la gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:226b-42: nub kyi sgor 'jig rten dbang phyug dmar po g-yas
T02D3305:227a-0: pas mchog sbyin dang g-yon pas mi 'jigs @227a *
T02D3305:227a-2: byang gi sgor 'jam dpal gzhon nu gur gum gyi mdog can chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya mdzad pa'o //
T02D3305:227a-3: dbang ldan du ni gza' thams cad de sna tshogs pa'i mdog dang /
T02D3305:227a-4: sna tshogs pa'i dbyibs dang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can no //

T02D3305:230a-9: padma'i phyi rol phyogs bzhir chus gang ba'i bum pa bzhi gzhag par bya'o //
T02D3305:230a-10: yal 'dab dang bcas pa dang gdugs dang ba dan gyis nye bar mdzes par byas nas /
T02D3305:230a-11: slar yang shar du bgegs rab tu zhi par byed pa'i lha mo rnam par rgyal ma dang /
T02D3305:230a-12: lhor 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i lha mo rnam par rgyal ma dang /
T02D3305:230a-13: nub tu nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i lha mo rnam par rgyal ma dang /
T02D3305:230a-14: byang du phung po'i nang zhi bar byed pa'i lha mo rnam par rgyal ma dang /
T02D3305:230a-15: mer rdo rje'i phreng ba tshe sbyin ma dang /
T02D3305:230a-16: bden bral du sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang /
T02D3305:230a-17: rlung du gser gyi 'od can ma dang /
T02D3305:230a-18: dbang ldan du tshe ster bar byed pa gser gyi phreng ba ma rnams te /
T02D3305:230a-19: snod bzhi chus yongs su bkang nas dri bzang po
T02D3305:230a-20: dang bsres te me tog gi phreng ba 'phyang ba
T02D3305:230a-22: rngul tshon gyi ba'i re kh'a gsum gyi nang ma'i
T02D3305:230a-23: nang ma la s'a lu'i zan nam 'jim pa las
T02D3305:230a-25: gal te ma 'byor na brgya gzhag par bya'o //
T02D3305:230a-26: phyogs bzhir bsnyen bkur ba'i phyir mchod pa rgya chen po bya ste /
T02D3305:230a-27: d'ur ba dang kunda gzung ste chos klog pa pos gzungs 'di bklag par bya zhing /
T02D3305:230a-28: mchod rten so so'i dbu la mchod par byas la rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02D3305:230a-29: 'bras ma nyams pa dang d'u ra ba dang kunda
T02D3305:230a-30: stong gis dbus kyi mchod rten gyi dbu la dor
T02D3305:230a-32: me tog dang bdug spos dang snang gsal dang dri
T02D3305:230a-33: dang gtor ma dang zhal zas dang gdugs dang ba
T02D3305:230a-34: dan la sogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad re re
T02D3305:230a-35: zhing nges par stong stong gi phreng ba byas nas
T02D3305:230a-36: yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D3305:230a-37: yongs su rdzogs pa ji srid par mar me'i phreng ba ma chad par bya zhing /
T02D3305:230a-38: reng ba ma chad par bya zhing /
T02D3305:230b-0: chos ston pa po slob dpon dang @230b las kyi
T02D3305:230b-1: rdo rje rnams kyis dri bzang po'i chus khrus byas
T02D3305:230b-2: te / dkar po'i rang bzhin gyi gos dang rgyan
T02D3305:230b-3: gyis brgyan te sngom ba dang ldan pas shar du
T02D3305:230b-4: mngon par phyogs te bklag bar bya'o //
T02D3305:230b-5: de ltar byas na zhag bdun gyi tshe ni lo bdun gyi tsher 'gyur la /
T02D3305:230b-6: lo bdun gyi tshe ni lo bdun cur 'tsho bar
T02D3305:230b-7: 'gyur la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'ang mi 'byung
T02D3305:230b-8: bar 'gyur ro // zhes pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma bklag pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:230b-10: // /'dir rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bris pa la sogs
T02D3305:230b-11: pa na gal te sa 'og nas chu rdol ba
T02D3305:230b-13: sprin dang thog dang mi dang lha'i sde dang glang
T02D3305:230b-14: po la sogs pa bgegs kyi nye bar 'tshe ba
T02D3305:230b-15: lhas byas pa'am / mi la sogs pas byas pa 'byung ba srid de /
T02D3305:230b-16: de'i tshe chog ga ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi dang /
T02D3305:230b-18: gur dang mda'i dra ba dang /
T02D3305:230b-19: bla re rnams kyi nang gi bar snang la gnas
T02D3305:230b-20: pa'i rtsibs kyi rtse mo la brtan par bzhugs pa'i
T02D3305:230b-21: shin tu 'jigs su rung ba'i khro bo bcur byin
T02D3305:230b-22: gyis brlabs pa'i rtsibs bcu pa'i 'khor lo ser po
T02D3305:230b-23: g-yas su bskor ba'i lte ba'i dbus su gnas pa'i
T02D3305:230b-24: gzhal yas khang gi rnam par dkyil 'khor khang par
T02D3305:230b-25: shin tu brtan par skad cig gis lhag par mos
T02D3305:230b-26: par bya ste / rdo rje'i rang bzhin nyid la
T02D3305:230b-27: sogs pas bgegs thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro zhes
T02D3305:230b-28: par bya ste / so // gang yang rgyun mi
T02D3305:230b-29: 'chad par snying rje chen po dang ro gcig pa'i
T02D3305:230b-30: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin goms par byed
T02D3305:230b-31: pa de la ni dpag tu med pa'i bgegs rnams
T02D3305:230b-32: kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te de'i phyed du
T02D3305:230b-33: ni rim pa 'di dag ma yin no zhes pa
T02D3305:230b-36: // / sangs rgyas rnam pa byas pa'i 'bras //
T02D3305:230b-37: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs te /
T02D3305:230b-38: des na sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku'i //
T02D3305:230b-39: mtshan nyid 'dir yang bri bar bya //
T02D3305:230b-40: sku gzugs mtshan nyid thams cad ni //
T02D3305:230b-41: rab rdzogs bde ba ster ba'o //
T02D3305:230b-42: gang tshe de nyid rnam nyams 'gyur //
T02D3305:230b-43: de tshe sdug bsngal rab sbyin byed //
T02D3305:230b-44: bde ba ci zhen de bshad pa //
T02D3305:230b-45: bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod rten rnams dang sku gzugs la yang phra rab rdul ni ji snyed pa //
T02D3305:231a-1: byed pa po ni lha yi sa gzhir nges pa nyid du rgyal srid dang //
T02D3305:231a-2: gzugs dang gzugs med ting nge 'dzin gyi phun sum tshogs pa mtha' dag spyad par gyur nas kyang //
T02D3305:231a-3: bde ba kun rdzogs mthar ni skye rgar lhung ba bral nas sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par 'gyur //
T02D3305:231a-4: de'i phyir gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya'o //
T02D3305:231a-5: de la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /
T02D3305:231a-6: rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyi sku'i ring bar dpung
T02D3305:231a-7: ba gnyis ngos su rab tu brkyang ba ste zhing
T02D3305:231a-8: du yang ngo // tshad rnams ci zhe na /
T02D3305:231a-9: rang gi sor gyi sor phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gnyis ni mtho'o //
T02D3305:231a-10: mtho de nyid bcu la ni sor nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i brgya'o //
T02D3305:231a-11: spyan ma la sogs pa lha mo rnams kyi ni sor bcu gnyis la mtho'o //
T02D3305:231a-12: mtho de nyid dgu la sor brgya dang brgyad de zheng du yang ngo //
T02D3305:231a-13: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang sor bcu gnyis pa'i mtho bcu pa nyid do //
T02D3305:231a-14: thung zhing lto ba 'phyang ba rnams dang /
T02D3305:231a-15: khro bo rnams kyi yang mtho brgyad ba ste sor dgu bcu rtsa drug go //
T02D3305:231a-16: rol pa'i khro bo rnams kyi ni mtho bcu pa dang /
T02D3305:231a-17: sor brgyad dang nyi shu pa ste dpangs dang zheng du yang ngo //
T02D3305:231a-18: yan lag dang nye ba'i yan lag thams cad kyang shes par bya'o //
T02D3305:231a-19: ston pa chos 'chad pa la byon pa'i dus su //
T02D3305:231a-20: sh'a ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02D3305:231a-21: bcom ldan 'das mi bzhugs pa na dad pa'i rigs
T02D3305:231a-22: kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis ci ltar
T02D3305:231a-23: bsgrub par bgyi / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D3305:231a-24: sh'a ri'i bu nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das
T02D3305:231a-25: par gshegs pa na'ang mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya
T02D3305:231a-26: ba'i don du sku gzugs bya'o //
T02D3305:231a-27: nya gro dha'i dkyil 'khor ni ji snyed pa'i zheng de snyed pa'i lus te /
T02D3305:231a-28: ji snyed pa'i sku yang de snyed pa'i zheng ngo //
T02D3305:231a-29: thams cad du yan lag dang nye ba'i yan lag
T02D3305:231a-30: ste lus kyi cha shas rnams spom zhing snum pa
T02D3305:231a-31: dang / rol pa dang sgeg pa dang bdun mtho ba dang 'gram pa che ba nyid dang /
T02D3305:231a-32: spyi bo gdugs kyi rnam pa dang phrag pa legs par gnas pa dang /
T02D3305:231a-33: gtsug tor la sogs pa shin tu legs par gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:231a-34: de yang dpangs dang zheng dang mtho dang tshigs bskum pa dang /
T02D3305:231b-0: brkyang @231b ba rnams kyi tshad ni sangs rgyas kyi
T02D3305:231b-1: sku rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang
T02D3305:231b-2: ngo zhes pa'i gsung las so //
T02D3305:231b-3: de la snum pa ni pags pa snum pa'o //
T02D3305:231b-5: sgeg pa ni gsum du 'khyog pa nyid la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis so //
T02D3305:231b-6: bdun mtho ba zhes pa la bdun ni lus kyi
T02D3305:231b-7: cha shas yin zhing mtho ba ni nges par mtho
T02D3305:231b-8: ba dang shin tu mtho ba zhes pa'i rnam grangs
T02D3305:231b-9: so // de dag gang zhe na /
T02D3305:231b-14: gzhan ni rab tu grags te cung zad mtho ba yang mtho ba zhes bya'o //
T02D3305:231b-15: de la gtsug tor ni sor bzhi ste skra'i gnas kyang ngo //
T02D3305:231b-16: de bzhin nyid du dpral ba dang shangs la'o //
T02D3305:231b-17: shangs kyi 'og nas ko sko'i mthar ni nas bzhi lhag pa'i sor bzhi'o //
T02D3305:231b-18: 'di nyid ni cha chung phyed dang bcu gsum ste zhal gyi cha'o //
T02D3305:231b-19: ko sko ni sor gnyis su 'gyur pa dpangs la
T02D3305:231b-20: ste rgya la yang de bzhin du sor bzhir 'dod
T02D3305:231b-21: do // 'gram pa dag la sor bzhi ste rna ba'i rtsa bar son pa la'o //
T02D3305:231b-22: spyan gyi 'og gi pags pa dag las 'og gi cha ni 'khur bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3305:231b-23: de dag ni sor gnyis su mtho ba dang rgyar yang de dag sor gnyis pa ste /
T02D3305:231b-24: byang chub sems la ltos pa'i'o //
T02D3305:231b-25: lhag pa dang bcas shing yongs su rdzogs par gyur
T02D3305:231b-26: pas seng ge chen po'i 'gram pa ji lta ba
T02D3305:231b-27: ni sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyi
T02D3305:231b-28: ste cung zad mtho ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D3305:231b-29: khro bo rnams kyi ni leb mor rnam par rgyas shing lhag pa'o //
T02D3305:231b-30: ma mchu'i rgya la sor gnyis te dpangs la ni cha chung gsum mo //
T02D3305:231b-31: sor sum cha la ni cha chung zhes bya'o //
T02D3305:231b-32: mchu'i dbus su ni bim pa'i 'bras bu lta bu'o //
T02D3305:231b-33: sor gcig ni zhal gyi gru ste zhal gyi zheng la sor bzhi'o //
T02D3305:231b-34: ji lta bar skyes shing bkod pa'i tshems bzhi bcu
T02D3305:231b-35: ni rgyal po'i tshems la sogs pa'i rim pas so
T02D3305:231b-36: // ya mchu dag la sor phyed dang nas bzhi ni rgya dang dpangs dag la'o //
T02D3305:231b-37: shangs kyi rtse mo'i 'og tu mchu la sor sum
T02D3305:231b-38: cha pad 'dab kyi rnam pa bya ste sma ra'i
T02D3305:231b-40: shangs kyi zheng la ni sor gnyis te de'i phyed sor ni dpangs la'o //
T02D3305:231b-41: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni cung zad lhag pa'o //
T02D3305:232a-0: shin tu khos pa rnams kyi @232a * //
T02D3305:232a-1: cung zad leb cing ngos su son pa'o //
T02D3305:232a-2: sor phyed par mnyam zhing zlum pa ni shangs kyi bug pa'o //
T02D3305:232a-3: de'i shangs kyi ka pa dang shangs kyi rtse mo'i 'khyog ba rgya la sor phyed do //
T02D3305:232a-4: spyan gyi sbubs la sor bzhi'o //
T02D3305:232a-5: de'i dbus la sor gcig gi rgya'o //
T02D3305:232a-7: 'og gi mthar thug pa la sor gsum mo //
T02D3305:232a-8: spyan dag gi bar du shangs kyi rtsa ba sor gcig go //
T02D3305:232a-9: smin ma ni sor bzhi ste de ni gzhu'i rnam pa'o //
T02D3305:232a-10: dbus kyi zheng la sor gnyis te rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D3305:232a-11: khro bo rnams kyi ni 'khyog po'o //
T02D3305:232a-12: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi gzigs stangs
T02D3305:232a-13: la nas gnyis te rgyar sor gnyis dang nas drug
T02D3305:232a-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni zheng la nas
T02D3305:232a-16: bzhi dang ring bar nas nyi shu ste autpala'i rnam
T02D3305:232a-17: pa'o // thams cad bud med sgeg mo rnams kyi
T02D3305:232a-18: ni ring bar nas bco brgyad dang zheng la nas
T02D3305:232a-19: drug ste nya'i lto ba'i rnam pa'o ;
T02D3305:232a-20: / shangs dang nye ba'i spyan gyi mtha' ste nang zur la nas bzhi'o //
T02D3305:232a-21: pha rol gyi mtha' ste phyi zur la nas bzhi'o //
T02D3305:232a-22: spyan gyi nor bu la sor gsum mo //
T02D3305:232a-23: 'bur por nas gnyis su mtho ba'o //
T02D3305:232a-24: nag po la ni mnyam par nas lnga'i tshad de zhal grva'i thig dang mnyam pa'o //
T02D3305:232a-25: spyan gyi dbus su pu ta li ga ni song
T02D3305:232a-26: phyed dang gnyis kyi lnga cha'i zheng ste sor gcig
T02D3305:232a-28: sor gsum gyi bzhi cha ni rab tu gsal pa spyan gyi bu'o //
T02D3305:232a-29: padma'i 'dab ma'i rnam pa spyan gyi sbubs ni sor gsum mo //
T02D3305:232a-30: nang zur gyi cha ni shangs kyi bu ga'i thig dang mnyam pa'o //
T02D3305:232a-31: spyan 'bras dang mnyam par kosko dang zhal gyi grva zur yang de bzhin no //
T02D3305:232a-32: smin ma dag gi bar la ni sor phyed dang gnyis so //
T02D3305:232a-33: de nyid du mdzod spu ni sor gcig pa ste zla ba gang ba lta bu'o //
T02D3305:232a-34: shangs dang mdzod spu dang gtsug tor rnams kyi thig ni mtshungs pa'o //
T02D3305:232a-35: smin ma dag ni ri mo dang mnyam par snyan dag ste /
T02D3305:232a-36: dpangs su sor gzhi dang zheng du sor gnyis so //
T02D3305:232a-38: de dag gi steng gi 'dab ma'ang nas bzhi ste de'i dpangs su ni sor gcig go //
T02D3305:232a-40: 'gram pa dang snyan gyi bug pa'i bar du snyan
T02D3305:232b-0: gyi 'khyil pa ni gdengs ka'i @232b rnam pa ste
T02D3305:232b-1: nas gnyis so // snyan shal dag ni sor bzhir
T02D3305:232b-2: ring ba ste sboms su ni ji ltar mdzes pa'o
T02D3305:232b-3: nas gnyis so // // sngar gyi gtsug tor la
T02D3305:232b-4: sogs pa nas mgrin pa'i mthar thug pa la ni
T02D3305:232b-5: nas bzhi lhag pa'i sor nyi shur bshad do //
T02D3305:232b-6: da ni mgrin pa la sogs pa nas long bu'i
T02D3305:232b-7: 'og gi mthar thug pa'i cha dbye bar bya ste
T02D3305:232b-8: mgrin pa la ni sor bzhi'o //
T02D3305:232b-9: mgrin pa nas thugs ka la sor phyed dang bcu gsum mo //
T02D3305:232b-10: thugs ka nas lte ba'i mthar thug pa la yang de bzhin no //
T02D3305:232b-11: lte ba nas gsang gnas kyi mthar thug pa la yang sor phyed dang bcu gsum mo //
T02D3305:232b-12: brla la ni sor nyi shu rtsa lnga ste byin pa la yang de bzhin no //
T02D3305:232b-13: pus mo la sor drug go //
T02D3305:232b-14: long bu la sor gnyis so //
T02D3305:232b-16: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang rdo rje
T02D3305:232b-17: 'dzin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mtho bcu
T02D3305:232b-18: par bshad pa'i rnam par dbye ba ste /
T02D3305:232b-19: gzhan rnams ni ji ltar rigs par shes par bya'o //
T02D3305:232b-20: spyi'i nor bu ni ji ltar mdzes shing dri ma med pa bya'o //
T02D3305:232b-21: rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyi nor bu ni gtsug
T02D3305:232b-22: tor gyi dbus su ral pa'i cod pan sor bcu
T02D3305:232b-24: dpa' bo rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
T02D3305:232b-25: yang ral pa'i cod pan sor brgyad pa'o zhes pa
T02D3305:232b-26: khyad par te / sor bcu pa'o zhes pa ni 'ga' zhig gi'o //
T02D3305:232b-27: gtsug tor gyi 'og tu bskor ba la sor bcu gnyis so //
T02D3305:232b-28: dpral ba'i steng du ni gdugs kyi rnam pa ste
T02D3305:232b-29: sngon po g-yas su 'khyil pa ni steng du yang
T02D3305:232b-30: ngo // spyi bo ni mtho ba ste snyan gyi
T02D3305:232b-31: mdun dang rgyab tu bskor ba la sor sum cu
T02D3305:232b-32: so gnyis ni spyi bo'i rgya'o //
T02D3305:232b-33: mgrin pa'i zheng la sor brgyad de de'i mtha' skor la sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D3305:232b-34: mgrin pa'i sor brgyad spangs nas snyan dang nye ba'i
T02D3305:232b-35: sor bzhi dang bcas pa'i sor bcu gnyis ni phrag
T02D3305:232b-36: pa'i zlum po la 'gyur te mtshan nyid dang ldan
T02D3305:232b-37: pa rnams la'o // phra ba'i gnas dang bral ba'i
T02D3305:232b-38: phrag pa nas gru mo'i bar la sor nyi shu
T02D3305:232b-39: pa rnams la'o // ni dpung pa'o // gru mo la ni sor gcig go //
T02D3305:232b-40: gru mo'i 'og nas nor bu 'ching ba'i steng ni phyag ngar te sor bcu drug go //
T02D3305:232b-41: nor bu 'ching ba la ni sor gcig go //
T02D3305:233a-1: nas sor mo gung mo'i rtse mo'i mthar thug pa la ni sor bcu gnyis te phyag lag go //
T02D3305:233a-3: dpung pa'i dbus nas bskor ba la sor nyi shu ste /
T02D3305:233a-4: nye ba'i dpung pa'i dbus nas bskor ba la sor bcu drug go //
T02D3305:233a-5: nor bu 'ching ba'i mtha' skor la ni sor bcu gnyis te ;
T02D3305:233a-6: nor bu 'ching ba nas phyag gi mthil la sor bdun no //
T02D3305:233a-7: sor mo gung mo la cha chung lnga'o //
T02D3305:233a-8: de'i tshigs phyed kyis thung ba ni mdzub mo ste ming med ni de dang mnyam pa'o //
T02D3305:233a-9: tshigs gcig gis thung ba ni mthe'u chung ste sor mo thams cad ni tshigs gsum pa'o //
T02D3305:233a-10: de rnams kyi tshigs phyed kyis sen mo'o //
T02D3305:233a-11: nor bu 'ching ba las sor bzhi spangs nas sen
T02D3305:233a-12: mo'i rtse mo ji srid pa la sor bzhi ni
T02D3305:233a-13: mthe bong ste tshig gnyis pa'o //
T02D3305:233a-14: nas phyed ni sor mo'i rtsa ba'o //
T02D3305:233a-15: mthe bong gi mtha' skor la ni sor bzhi'o //
T02D3305:233a-16: mthe bong nas mdzub mo la ni sor bzhi'am gsum mo //
T02D3305:233a-17: nor bu 'ching ba nas mthe chung gi rtsa ba'i mthar thug pa la ni sor lnga'o //
T02D3305:233a-18: phrag pa nas mchan khung gi mthar thug pa la
T02D3305:233a-19: sor dgu ste mchan khung nas nu ma ji srid
T02D3305:233a-20: pa la sor bcu drug go //
T02D3305:233a-21: brang nas rgyab dag gi mtha' skor la sor lnga bcu drug ste /
T02D3305:233a-22: nu ma dag gi bar la sor phyed dang bcu gsum mo //
T02D3305:233a-23: nu ma nas lte ba'i bar la sor bcu drug go //
T02D3305:233a-24: lte ba nas brtsams te rgyab dang lhan cig lte
T02D3305:233a-25: ha ji srid pa la sor bzhi bcu drug go
