T02D3305:236a-31: de yang gcig dang gsum dang lnga dang bcu gsum
T02D3305:236a-32: ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'dzin pa
T02D3305:236a-33: rnams kyi'o // dgu dang bdun ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi'o //
T02D3305:236a-34: 'dod chags kyi khams dang ma bral ba rnams kyi
T02D3305:236a-35: mchod rten la ni padma zlum pa lta bu ste
T02D3305:236a-37: de ltar na sku gzugs kyi dbye bas srog shing gzugs par bya'o //
T02D3305:236a-38: sangs rgyas bzhi'i khri dang slar yang rnam par snang
T02D3305:236a-39: mdzad ni gtso bor bya zhing bum pa'i phyi rol
T02D3305:236a-40: bzang po bzhi las sangs rgyas bzhis rnam par mdzes
T02D3305:236a-41: pa'o // zur la ka bas bteg pa bya zhing byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pas brgyan pa'o //
T02D3305:236a-42: gdugs kyi rnam pa ni srog shing gi steng du ste char khebs kyi ming can no //
T02D3305:236a-43: do shal dang do shal phyed pa dang dril bu
T02D3305:236a-44: la sogs pa dang g-yer kha'i dra bas brgyan pa'o
T02D3305:236a-45: // de'i steng du nor bu bya ste padma zlum
T02D3305:236a-46: pa ni mthar ro zhes pa ni kha cig gi'o
T02D3305:236b-0: // // cho ga mtshan @236b nyid dang ldan pa
T02D3305:236b-1: bya ste cho ga rim pa rnams kyis so zhes
T02D3305:236b-2: pa mchod rten gyi mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'o //
T02D3305:236b-3: da ni rdo rje dang dril bu la sogs pa phyag mtshan rnams kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya'o //
T02D3305:236b-4: mtho gang gi dpangs dang zheng la cha chung gnyis pa'i sa ste de'i dpangs ni sum 'gyur ro //
T02D3305:236b-5: snga ma dang phyi ma'i cha dag gis zur bzhi
T02D3305:236b-6: po rnams su phyed dang bcas pa'i re'u mig bskor
T02D3305:236b-7: nas tshangs pa'i thig gi dbus kyi g-yon dang g-yas
T02D3305:236b-8: dag gi re'u mig gnyis yongs su dor te snga
T02D3305:236b-9: ma dang phyi ma'i re'u mig gi dbus kyi tshangs
T02D3305:236b-10: thig gi mthar thig bzhi btab pa las dbus kyi
T02D3305:236b-11: rtse mo'o // rtse mo'i gnyis ka'i ngos dag tu
T02D3305:236b-12: cha gnyis phyis pa las cha gnyis gnyis kyis rtse
T02D3305:236b-13: rtse mo'o // mo bzhi'o // cha gnyis kyi dpangs ni chu srin gyi kha nas byung ba'o //
T02D3305:236b-14: cha gnyis kyi rtsa ba ni seng ge'i sna shin tu mdzes pa'o //
T02D3305:236b-15: ngos su cha gnyis kyi dpangs dang cha bzhi pa'i
T02D3305:236b-16: du ma bu ni zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa'o
T02D3305:236b-17: // cha brgyad du mtho zhing 'khyog pa ni gsum
T02D3305:236b-18: du 'khyog pa ste 'od zer 'phro ba gsum gyis
T02D3305:236b-20: dbus kyi chal ni tshangs thig gi dbus nas phyogs
T02D3305:236b-21: bzhir thig gnyis dor te zlum por bskor bas lte
T02D3305:236b-22: ba'o // de'i steng du cha phyed pa'i rked chings
T02D3305:236b-23: dor nas cha gnyis pa dag gis rnam par rgyas
T02D3305:236b-24: ba'o // pa'i padma'o // rked chings kyi khyud mo'i
T02D3305:236b-25: steng dang 'og tu khyud mo phra mo gnyis dang
T02D3305:236b-26: ba'o // pa'i padma'o // sbyar te bya'o // rked chings la ni rin po che'i phreng ba bya'o //
T02D3305:236b-27: cha phyed kyis ni ge sar ro //
T02D3305:236b-28: cha gcig gis ni zla ba rdzogs pa ste lhag
T02D3305:236b-29: ma rnams phyis pa na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D3305:236b-30: dam tshig gi rdo rjer 'gyur ro //
T02D3305:236b-31: sor bzhi nas brtsams te sor nyi shu'i bar gyis
T02D3305:236b-32: rdo rje byas te sor nyi shu la sogs su
T02D3305:236b-33: ni mi bya'o // zhes pa lung las so //
T02D3305:236b-34: khro bo'i ni zur rnams su cha re dor nas kha gyes pa'o //
T02D3305:236b-35: rtse mo gnyis dor ba las ni rtse gcig pa ste klu kun nas skyod par byed pa'o //
T02D3305:236b-36: rtse dgu pa ni zur rnams su rtse mo bzhi
T02D3305:236b-37: byas pa ste 'on kyang dbus kyi rtse mo ni
T02D3305:236b-38: zlum po'o // rtse mo bcu gnyis pa'i sna tshogs
T02D3305:236b-39: rdo rje ni lte ba'i phyogs bzhir rtse mo gsum
T02D3305:236b-40: zlum po'o // byas pa'o // de nyid rtse mo
T02D3305:236b-41: lnga par byas pas rtse mo nyi shu pa'i sna
T02D3305:236b-42: zlum po'o // byas pa'o // tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D3305:236b-43: slar yang de nyid la steng dang 'og tu rtse
T02D3305:236b-44: mo lnga lnga byin pa las rtse mo sum cu
T02D3305:236b-45: pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'o zhes so //
T02D3305:237a-0: dril bu ni sngar gyi cha rnams @237a * //
T02D3305:237a-2: dbus kyi cha phyed kyis zla ba'o //
T02D3305:237a-3: cha phyed kyis ge sar ro //
T02D3305:237a-5: cha bzhi las shes rab kyi zhal lo //
T02D3305:237a-7: cha gnyis kyis bum pa'i gdan no //
T02D3305:237a-8: cha gzhan dag gi zur dag las cha bzhi spangs
T02D3305:237a-9: nas 'dab ma brgyad pa'i padma ste lte ba dang
T02D3305:237a-11: lte ba'i steng gdan gyi 'og tu ri mo gsum pa mgrin pa'i gzugs can bya'o //
T02D3305:237a-12: cha phyed byas pa'i rked chings gnyis kyi dbus su
T02D3305:237a-13: rdo rje'i phreng ba rnams par mdzes pa cha gcig
T02D3305:237a-14: go // dbus su do shal dang do shal phyed pa rnams par gnas pa cha bzhi'o //
T02D3305:237a-15: snga ma bzhin du 'og tu rdo rje'i phreng ba rnam par mdzes pa cha gcig go //
T02D3305:237a-16: kun nas nges par song ba'i mu khyud la cha gcig ste rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i'o //
T02D3305:237a-17: mi bskyod pa'i ni cung zad kha gyes pa'o //
T02D3305:237a-18: do shal dang do shal phyed pas brgyan pa'i dbus
T02D3305:237a-19: su do shal gyi snying por phyogs su 'khor lo
T02D3305:237a-20: dang rin po che dang padma dang sna tshogs rdo
T02D3305:237a-21: rje'o // yang na sna tshogs rdo rje'i gnas su
T02D3305:237a-22: ral gri ste rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
T02D3305:237a-23: rje'o // rnams kyi'o // phyogs bral rnams su spyan
T02D3305:237a-24: dang rdo rje dang yu ba dang bcas pa'i padma
T02D3305:237a-25: dang autpala rnams te spyan ma la sogs pa'i'o //
T02D3305:237a-26: 'og dang steng du rdo rje phreng ba'i gnas la
T02D3305:237a-27: 'khor lo dang rin po che dang padma dang sna
T02D3305:237a-28: tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'o zhes pa ni /
T02D3305:237a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbye bas rtogs par bya ste /
T02D3305:237a-30: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gnas su mi
T02D3305:237a-31: bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid do
T02D3305:237a-32: // 'dir dril bu'i mgrin pa nas brtsam pa te 'khar ba dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D3305:237a-33: de'i steng du cha gnyis ni gser la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje yang ngo //
T02D3305:237a-34: dril bu kha cig ni chu skyes cung zad kha bye ba can no //
T02D3305:237a-35: kha cig ni ba lang gi gdong lta bu'o //
T02D3305:237a-36: kha cig ni padma'i rnam pa yang ngo zhes pa ni khyad par ro //
T02D3305:237a-37: 'dir rdo rje'i dbus dang shar la sogs pa'i rtse
T02D3305:237a-38: mo dang lte ba'i mthar thug pa rnams la mi
T02D3305:237a-39: bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
T02D3305:237a-40: bsams par bya'o // yang na dbus su rnam par
T02D3305:237a-41: snang mdzad de shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams
T02D3305:237a-42: la byams pa dang sa'i snying po dang phyag na
T02D3305:237a-43: rdo rje dang nam mkha' mdzod dang 'jig rten dbang
T02D3305:237a-44: phyug dang 'jam dpal dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam
T02D3305:237b-0: par @237b sel ba dang kun du bzang po dang
T02D3305:237b-1: cha brgyad pa la rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D3305:237b-2: padma gzhan gyi shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams
T02D3305:237b-3: la rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang rdo rje zhags
T02D3305:237b-4: pa ma dang rdo rje 'phro ba ma dang rdo
T02D3305:237b-6: me la sogs pa rnams su skul byed ma dang
T02D3305:237b-7: rin chen skar mda' ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog
T02D3305:237b-8: ma dang gzhan gyis mi thub ma rnams so //
T02D3305:237b-9: phyogs gzhan gyi rtse mo rnams la ni dbus su ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02D3305:237b-10: shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02D3305:237b-11: byang du rdo rje dag mo mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02D3305:237b-12: nub tu ro langs ma dang /
T02D3305:237b-14: dril bu de'i steng du kha 'og tu phyogs pa'i
T02D3305:237b-15: padma rnams la g-yas skor gyis phyogs su spyan ma
T02D3305:237b-16: dang m'a ma k'i dang gos dkar mo dang sgrol
T02D3305:237b-17: ba rnams dang / phyogs bral du nor 'dzin ma
T02D3305:237b-18: dang skul byed ma dang khro gnyer can ma dang
T02D3305:237b-19: rdo rje phreng ba ma rnams so //
T02D3305:237b-20: bum pa'i steng gi zhal ni shes rab rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sku'o //
T02D3305:237b-21: de'i steng du padma dang zla ba dang rdo rje rnams kyang snga ma bzhin no //
T02D3305:237b-22: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa lta 'di rnams kyi sku mdog la sogs pa ni sngar bshad pa'o //
T02D3305:237b-23: de nas dam tshig sems dpa'i lha rnams bskyed de
T02D3305:237b-24: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes
T02D3305:237b-25: sems dpa' spyan drangs pa la mchod yon la sogs
T02D3305:237b-26: pa dbul ba sngon du 'gro bas de rnams la
T02D3305:237b-27: rab tu gzhug cing cho ga bzhin du rab gnas
T02D3305:237b-28: byas nas mchod pa la sogs pa byas la lha
T02D3305:237b-29: rnams yongs su gyur ba las rtse mo la sogs
T02D3305:237b-30: pa'i gzugs su yang dag par gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:237b-31: rdo rje thabs kyi rang bzhin dang dril bu shes rab kyi bdag nyid dang /
T02D3305:237b-32: gnyis ka yang don dam pa byang chub kyi sems
T02D3305:237b-33: kyi rang bzhin no zhes shin tu brtan par mos
T02D3305:237b-34: pa byas nas / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta
T02D3305:237b-35: siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha: ae sha stvam dha
T02D3305:237b-36: ra ya mi h'i: hi hi hi hi h'um h'um
T02D3305:237b-37: pa byas nas / phat sv'a h'a / zhes brjod
T02D3305:237b-38: cing rdo rje g-yas pa'i rgan po ming med dag
T02D3305:237b-39: pa byas nas / phat sv'a h'a / gis dang
T02D3305:237b-40: / aom badzra ghanta h'um zhes brjod cing dril bu
T02D3305:237b-41: yang g-yon pa dag gis bzung nas g-yon pa'i dkur
T02D3305:237b-42: pa byas nas / phat sv'a h'a / gis dang
T02D3305:237b-43: / bzhag ste / rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D3305:237b-44: mnyes par bya'o zhes lhag par mos la //
T02D3305:237b-45: so hi ai badzdza mull'a lu t'a ri aatva bi
T02D3305:237b-46: mokkha dha ram bi mo kbem b'a dzdzdza tu h'um
T02D3305:238a-0: b'adzdza @238a * // bya'o // de nas rdo rje g-yas pa'i dkur gnas pa 'am gsor zhing /
T02D3305:238a-1: aom badzra dha rma ra ni ta pra ra ni ta /
T02D3305:238a-2: sampra ra ni ta sarba budddha kshe tra pra tstsha li te /
T02D3305:238a-3: pradznya b'a ra mi ta n'a da sambha we /
T02D3305:238a-4: badzra satva hri da ya santo sha ni h'um h'um h'um ho ho ho: sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:238a-5: zhes brjod la dpung pa'i dbyug pa bskyod pas dril bu dang por /
T02D3305:238a-6: lte ba snying ga de nas mgrin /
T02D3305:238a-7: kha dang sna yi bu ga gnyis rnam ba dag dang mig dag dang //
T02D3305:238a-8: de bzhi spyi bor dril bu dkrol //
T02D3305:238a-10: slar yang rdo rje gsor ba sngon du 'gro bas
T02D3305:238a-11: rgyud las ji ltar gsungs pa'i sngags brjod cing dril
T02D3305:238a-12: bu dkrol bar bya'o zhes te /
T02D3305:238a-13: pad kor rnam pa gsum mam rnam pa lnga pus
T02D3305:238a-14: mo'i khongs su bya'o zhes pa rdo rje dang rdo
T02D3305:238a-15: rje dril bu'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa'i cho ga'o
T02D3305:238a-17: / // /da ma ru la ni kha'i tshad grub zhi ba'i
T02D3305:238a-18: sa la cha bcu gnyis te tshangs thig gnyis btab
T02D3305:238a-19: nas tshangs pa'i thig nas bzung ste lte ba nas
T02D3305:238a-20: g-yas dang g-yon gyi zur ji srid par bskor zhing
T02D3305:238a-21: tshangs pa dang zur gyi thig gi mtha' rnams phyis
T02D3305:238a-22: pa las da ma rur 'gyur ro //
T02D3305:238a-23: changs pas gzung bar rang pa'i sbom pa dang rna
T02D3305:238a-24: ba'i mthar thug par ring ba ni yu ba ste
T02D3305:238a-25: gdong gi tshad kyi grub zhi'i sa la snga ma
T02D3305:238a-26: bzhin du rtse mo gsum pa'i rdo rje yul re
T02D3305:238a-27: rer steng du brkyang ba las rtse mo gsum du
T02D3305:238a-28: 'gyur ro // de nas kha tv'am ga ni dam
T02D3305:238a-29: tshig gi rdo rje lta bu'i rdo rjes rtse mor
T02D3305:238a-30: rnam par mdzes pa ste de'i 'og tu mi mog
T02D3305:238a-31: skam po gsum gyis mdzes shing sna tshogs rdo rje
T02D3305:238a-33: rtse mo gcig pa'i rdo rje gcig ni rtsa ba'i gnas su'o zhes kha cig go //
T02D3305:238a-34: dbyug pa'i steng du skam po dang rlon pa'i mi
T02D3305:238a-35: mgo gnyis dang de'i spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje
T02D3305:238a-36: dang / de'i lte bar bum pa zlum po 'dab ma la sogs pas kha brgyan pa dang /
T02D3305:238a-37: kha'i steng du dam tshig gi rdo rje ba dang
T02D3305:238a-38: ltar rab tu 'phyang ba'o zhes pa ni gnyis ba'o
T02D3305:238a-39: // gnyis ka yang yu ba'i steng sbom zhing dbus
T02D3305:238a-40: nas phra ba ste dril chung la sogs pas brgyan
T02D3305:238a-41: // pa'o // mgo bo la sogs pa rnams ji ltar mdzes par bya'o zhes /
T02D3305:238a-42: mtho'i tshad gru bzhi pa cha bcu gnyis kyis la chang gzungs cha bzhi ni dbus su'o //
T02D3305:238b-0: de bzhin du cha bzhi ni 'khyog @238b pa ste rtse mo'i rnam pa'o //
T02D3305:238b-1: cha brgyad kyi zur nas cha dgu'i zur ji srid
T02D3305:238b-2: par 'khyog pa ni gri gug ste chang gzugs kyi
T02D3305:238b-3: steng du rdo rje phyed pas brgyan pa'o //
T02D3305:238b-5: gser gyi sgo dang yang dag ldan //
T02D3305:238b-6: rnam par shes bya mi yi mgo //
T02D3305:238b-7: bram ze la sogs las byas pa //
T02D3305:238b-9: kha dog dman gyur thod pa dang //
T02D3305:238b-10: rna ba'i steng du bug pa dang //
T02D3305:238b-11: rgyab tu bug pa dum bu can //
T02D3305:238b-12: bud med rnams kyi rtag tu yang //
T02D3305:238b-13: mkhas pas rnam shes dang ldan pa'i //
T02D3305:238b-14: sngags pas de bzhin mgo zhes bya //
T02D3305:238b-15: dpral ba rna ba'i dung dag la /
T02D3305:238b-16: mu tig phreng 'dra'i ri mor gyur //
T02D3305:238b-17: gcig gnyis gsum bzhi'i dum bu dang /
T02D3305:238b-18: bcu drug bcu gnyis ri bong can /
T02D3305:238b-19: ba lang gdong dang dkar dmar gyur //
T02D3305:238b-20: cung zad ring zhing mdzes pa dang /
T02D3305:238b-22: ser dmar dkar po de lta bu'i //
T02D3305:238b-23: thod pa rab tu bstan pa ste //
T02D3305:238b-24: lhag ma rnams ni rab tu spang //
T02D3305:238b-26: rang gi 'dod pas 'khyil pa byas te sor gnyis
T02D3305:238b-27: su sbom pa mtha' gnyis la rdo rjes brgyan pa
T02D3305:238b-28: ni zhags pa'o // mgrin pa gnas khrag 'dzag pa'i gdong bzhi pa ni tshang pa'i mgo bo'o //
T02D3305:238b-29: dgra sta'i kha ni zhal gyi tshad de yu ba
T02D3305:238b-30: ni khu do pa mtha' skor du sor drug pa
T02D3305:238b-31: ste steng du rdo rjes brgyan pa'o //
T02D3305:238b-32: de dang 'dra pa la lcags kyu ni mtho gang pa'i rtse mo gug pa'o //
T02D3305:238b-33: glang po che'i pags ba ni rna ba'i bar du 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:238b-34: tho ba ni sna tshogs dang 'dra ste 'og kyang
T02D3305:238b-35: phyogs gcig gi rtse mo rnams gcig pa zlum po'i
T02D3305:238b-37: gzhu ni mtho bcu pa ste zheng la sor bzhi
T02D3305:238b-38: pa chang gzungs kyi cha ring par sor bcu drug
T02D3305:238b-39: pa 'khyog po'i dbus la sor brgyad pa mtha' skor
T02D3305:238b-40: gyi zlum la sor dgu pa /
T02D3305:238b-41: mchog ma rnam par rgyas shing rgyud pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3305:238b-42: phrag pa brtan par byas nas dbung pa g-yon pa brkyang ba'i khu tshur gyis dbus nas bzung ste /
T02D3305:238b-43: g-yas pa'i mig mda' ji lta ba bzhin du blta
T02D3305:238b-44: ba'i dbang gis mde'u'i bar du rdo rje khu tshur
T02D3305:238b-45: gyis khru do ba'i mda' sna dang mchu'i thad nas
T02D3305:238b-46: rna ba'i bar ji srid par 'then nas cung zad
T02D3305:238b-47: g-yo ba dang bcas pas yongs su 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3305:238b-48: ring par sor sum cu sor drug pa 'khrul 'khor
T02D3305:238b-49: gyi zheng la sor bzhi pa sor bzhir ring ba'i
T02D3305:239a-0: skam @239a * // pas dbus nas bzung ba /
T02D3305:239a-1: sor bzhi bzhi ngos su gyes pa //
T02D3305:239a-2: klu'i gdengs ka'i rnam pas mdzes pa de dag gi
T02D3305:239a-3: dbus su ko sko lta bu sor gang du rnam
T02D3305:239a-4: pa rgyas pa / dpangs kyi mthar sor bzhi ba'i yu ba mdzes pa dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:239a-5: las dang rjes su mthun par sor brgyad pa'i tshad
T02D3305:239a-6: la sor gcig pa'i 'dab ma can gru bzhi dang
T02D3305:239a-7: gdugs dang zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa can gyi
T02D3305:239a-8: sgo skyong byed dang ldan pa /
T02D3305:239a-9: sor gnyis pa'i snying pos rnam par mdzes par byas pa ni ral gri'o //
T02D3305:239a-10: 'khor lo la ni cha gcig gis lte ba zlum
T02D3305:239a-11: bo dang de'i phyi rol du cha phyed kyis snying
T02D3305:239a-12: po'i mu khyud zlum po dang /
T02D3305:239a-13: slar yang de'i phyi rol du rkang pa dang bcas pa'i cha gcig gis rtsibs kyi zlum po dang /
T02D3305:239a-14: de'i phyi rol du yang cha phyed kyis snying po'i
T02D3305:239a-15: mu khyud zlum po dang zhes pa ste rtsibs bzhi
T02D3305:239a-16: pa la sogs pa 'khor lo thams cad kyi tshad
T02D3305:239a-17: do // lcags sgrog gis rtse mor bcings pa'i lcags kyi bil ba can ni ka na ya'o //
T02D3305:239a-18: mnga' lta bu sgro gsum dang ldan zhing gdong gi tshad can ni 'phang mdud ngo //
T02D3305:239a-19: de dang 'dra ba la sgro dang ldan zhing ring
T02D3305:239a-20: ba kha tv'am ga'i rnam pa can ni mda' bo
T02D3305:239a-21: che'o // mdung dang rdo rje la sogs pa rnams
T02D3305:239a-22: kyi tshad ni rab tu grags pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D3305:239a-23: che'o // ma bris so// mtshon cha thams cad 'dzin
T02D3305:239a-24: pa na rna ba'i steng du bstan to zhes pa
T02D3305:239a-25: mtshon cha'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'o /
T02D3305:239a-27: // mchod rten dang mgron khang dang gtsug lag khang la
T02D3305:239a-28: sogs pa rab tu brtsams pa yang dag par gnas
T02D3305:239a-29: pa la mchog tu 'bad ba na /
T02D3305:239a-30: gand'i dang srog shing dang rtse mor gnas ba dang /
T02D3305:239a-31: sgo la sos pa ka ba dang bskyed pa'i shing
T02D3305:239a-32: gi dpangs dang zheng dang kho lag dang zlum rnams
T02D3305:239a-33: dang gnas kyi bdag po dang thig 'dzin pa la
T02D3305:239a-34: sogs pa mtha' dag gis de dag gi tshad yongs
T02D3305:239a-35: su gros byas nas slob don dag shig mkhan rnams
T02D3305:239a-36: dang lhan cig nags tshal gyi ltad mo la 'gro
T02D3305:239a-37: bar bya'o // tshogs ba na phun sum tshogs pa'i
T02D3305:239a-38: skar ma dang gza' dang nyi ma bzang po brtags
T02D3305:239a-39: te sngags pas bgegs mthar byed kyi gzugs kyis dus
T02D3305:239a-40: yongs su brtags la shar dang byang gi phyogs su
T02D3305:239a-43: // / nags tshal dang ri dang dga' ba'i sa gzhi
T02D3305:239b-0: mchog gi tsha la rab tu 'jug @239b par bya'o
T02D3305:239b-1: // bzang po'i gnas su skyes la sdug cing snum pa /
T02D3305:239b-2: sngo bsangs dang dmar po dang ser po'i mdog can
T02D3305:239b-3: 'bras bu zhim po dang ldan zhing dri bzang ba
T02D3305:239b-5: yal ga dang lo ma yongs su rdzogs shing yon
T02D3305:239b-6: tan dang rigs dang bzhon pa dang ldan pa drangs
T02D3305:239b-7: so // shing skyes nas lo brgya lhag cing nyis
T02D3305:239b-8: brgya'i bar dang ldan pa dar la bab pa rnams
T02D3305:239b-9: so // te / shing s'u ma n'a ga dang /
T02D3305:239b-36: pa t'i rigs te khang bzangs la sogs pa'i las la 'os pa rnams so ;
T02D3305:239b-37: / gzhon pa dang rgas pa dang yan lag 'khyog pa rnam ni ma yin te /
T02D3305:239b-38: gzhon pa ni lo brgya ma lon pa dang /
T02D3305:239b-39: rgas pa ni lo gnyis brgya lhag pa'o //
T02D3305:239b-40: skam po dang gcig tu dang yal ga chag pa dang tshig pa dang 'dab ma nyil ba dang /
T02D3305:239b-42: dur khrod dang khung bu dang bya skyibs dang lha'i
T02D3305:239b-43: gnas dang lam du skyes pa dang tsha ba dang
T02D3305:239b-44: kha ba dang grong gi mi gtang ba'i yul du
T02D3305:239b-45: gnas pa dang / mtshe 'u dang chu klung gi dogs su skyes pa la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D3305:239b-46: bya dang lag 'gro'i tshad bcas pa dang /
T02D3305:239b-47: rdo rjes bsnun pas dum bur song ba rnams spangs te /
T02D3305:239b-48: de rnams kyi nang nas rigs shing kun du bzang ba rnams 'dir brtag par bya'o //
T02D3305:239b-49: de la yang thun mtshams kyi dus su bzo bo
T02D3305:239b-50: dang bcas pa'i shing mkhan rnams yang dag par bsrung
T02D3305:239b-51: bar bya zhing bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i rnal 'byor dang
T02D3305:239b-52: ldan zhing spro ba dang bcas pas bde bar gshegs
T02D3305:239b-53: pa sras dang bcas pa dang /
T02D3305:239b-54: phyogs kyi lha rnams dang nags tshal gyi shing gi
T02D3305:239b-55: lha rnams nye bar spyod pa lngas yang dag par
T02D3305:239b-56: mchod do // phyogs kyi gtor ma byas nas bzo
T02D3305:239b-57: bo dang bcas pa'i sngags pa rnams bza' ba dang
T02D3305:239b-58: btung bas yongs su tshim par byas la bde bar
T02D3305:240a-0: gshegs pa dang lha rnams la bcom @240a * //
T02D3305:240a-1: ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D3305:240a-2: lhan cig tu rab tu dga' ba'i sems dang zhi
T02D3305:240a-3: ba'i yid dang gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyis
T02D3305:240a-5: rmi lam bzang na yang dag par 'grub cing rmi
T02D3305:240a-6: lam ngan na las thams cad pa'i bzlas pa bya'o
T02D3305:240a-7: // nad par snga bar do ldan rnam par snang
T02D3305:240a-8: mdzad kyi rnal 'byor gyis mchod pa thams cad yang
T02D3305:240a-9: dag par ldan pas shing gi rgyal po de la
T02D3305:240a-10: gnas pa'i phyogs kyi lha'i gzugs can rnams yang dag
T02D3305:240a-12: s'a la dang thang shing dang til se'i shing rnams
T02D3305:240a-13: la yang dag par gnas pa'i lha mo ni 'jig
T02D3305:240a-14: rten gyi ma mo dang de la gnas pa'i zhing
T02D3305:240a-15: skyod ni ri rab chen po zhes bya ba 'di'o
T02D3305:240a-16: // s'u ma n'a ga dang n'a ga ge sar
T02D3305:240a-17: dang tsam ba dang mya ngan med pa rnams kyis
T02D3305:240a-18: lha mo ni gsang ba ma dang /
T02D3305:240a-19: de rnams srung ba'i zhing skyod ni stobs po che zhes bya'o //
T02D3305:240a-20: aa ru ra'i shing dang ha r'i ti dang pa
T02D3305:240a-21: ta'i shing la karna mo ti ka dang he tu'o
T02D3305:240a-22: // tsu ta'i shing la aambi ka dang pha na la'o //
T02D3305:240a-23: t'a la'i shing la shanka ri ka dang skra gyen du brdzes pa'o //
T02D3305:240a-24: ka dampa'i shing la lha mo bzhin bzang mo dang /
T02D3305:240a-25: 'jam 'bras kyi shing la lha mo 'jam 'bras la
T02D3305:240a-26: gnas ma ste zhing gi bdag po dag ni dril
T02D3305:240a-27: bu chen po'o // sbrang gi shing la skyes bu'i dbang phyug dang sha sh'a'o //
T02D3305:240a-28: gser gyi shing la lha mo gtum mo dang zhing skyong skye ba bzang po'o //
T02D3305:240a-29: shal ma li'i shing la lha mo chen mo me zhal dang /
T02D3305:240a-30: star ka'i shing la 'dod ma ste zhing skyong dag ni 'jigs pa'o //
T02D3305:240a-31: shridga'i shing la phun tshogs chen mo dang zhing skyod mi gdong zhes bya ba rnams so //
T02D3305:240a-32: gnas la sogs pa'i dbye ba rigs pa 'di lta
T02D3305:240a-33: ste mngas pas 'jigs nas ma bshad pa'i phyag dag
T02D3305:240a-34: sku mdog dang mtshon cha dang sngags ni rgyud kyi
T02D3305:240a-35: nad nas 'bad pas nges par gzung bar bya'o //
T02D3305:240a-36: gtsug lag khang sogs rgyu ru ni //
T02D3305:240a-37: de ring shing gcod bdag spro bas /
T02D3305:240a-38: khyed rnams da ni bzod mdzad nas //
T02D3305:240a-39: shing gzhan la ni gnas par mdzod //
T02D3305:240a-40: shing gzhan rgan po la song ba'i lha rnams mtha'
T02D3305:240a-41: dag la gtor ma dang mchod pa la sogs pa'i
T02D3305:240a-42: khyad par rnams kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o
T02D3305:240b-0: // shing mkhan bgegs @240b mthar byed kyi gzugs can
T02D3305:240b-1: btung ba dang bza' ba dang so rtsi dang phreng
T02D3305:240b-2: ba dang tsandan dang gos dang gser rnams kyis yang
T02D3305:240b-3: dag par mnyes par byas la sta re'i so la
T02D3305:240b-4: rdo rje'i sbrang rtsi yang dag par byugs nas lag
T02D3305:240b-6: dge ba'i yid kyi shar dang byang du phyogs bas nyi ma la blta zhing gcad par bya'o //
T02D3305:240b-7: lhan cig pa'i gtso bo rnams bsrung ba'i ched du dpal ldan rma bya chen mo bklag par bya'o //
T02D3305:240b-8: chog dang mchog ma yin pa'i mtshan ma rnams sngags pa chen pos kun nas blta bar bya ste /
T02D3305:240b-9: mchog ma yin na ni de rnams spang bar bya zhing /
T02D3305:240b-10: mchog yin na mkhas pas thams cad yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D3305:240b-11: byang gi phyogs su 'gyel na sbyin pa po la
T02D3305:240b-12: nor dang las 'grub pa la sogs pa ston pa'o
T02D3305:240b-13: // dbang ldan gyi phyogs su 'gyel na rig pa
T02D3305:240b-14: dang ye shes yang dag pa la sogs pa ston
T02D3305:240b-15: // pa'o // dbang po'i phyogs su shing 'gyel na
T02D3305:240b-16: rgyal ba dang 'byor ba'i khyad par yang dag pa
T02D3305:240b-18: gzhan gyi bar du ma reg par 'gyel ba na bde ba dang mchog go //
T02D3305:240b-19: me'i mtshams su ni me'i 'jigs pa'o //
T02D3305:240b-20: yi dags kyi bdag po'i phyogs su song na 'chi ba ston no //
T02D3305:240b-21: bde bral du ni nad kyi 'jigs pa'o //
T02D3305:240b-22: chu dang rlung du song na chu dang rlung gi 'jigs pa'o //
T02D3305:240b-23: shing gzhan la nyed pa dang bcas shing song na rje'i 'jigs pa ston pa'o //
T02D3305:240b-24: 'dar zhing du bas ring por lhung na sbyin pa bo la sdug bsngal 'thob po //
T02D3305:240b-25: gcod pa'i dus su khyi dang /
T02D3305:240b-33: gdug ba can rnams mthong na /
T02D3305:240b-34: 'ching ba'i 'jigs pa dang bgegs mad bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3305:240b-35: gal te bcad pa na shing las khrag 'dzag na
T02D3305:240b-36: sbyin pa po 'chi ba la sogs pa ston pa'o
T02D3305:240b-37: // zho dang mar dang sbrang dang 'o ma byung na gsod pa dang /
T02D3305:240b-38: 'ching ba'i 'jigs pa la sogs pa ston pa'o //
T02D3305:240b-40: bska ba'i ro la sogs pa dang /
T02D3305:240b-43: dri bzang po mnam pa dang /
T02D3305:240b-44: ro'i rgyun snum pa dang bcas pa 'bab pa ni rang bzhin par bsten to //
T02D3305:240b-45: gcod pa'i shing gang gzung ba'i kha dog gi rnam
T02D3305:240b-46: par dbye ba mthong ba gang yin pa de'i kha
T02D3305:241a-1: rnam pa'i dbye ba las snying po'i rnam pa rgyu mtshan shes pas bstan te /
T02D3305:241a-9: btsod kyi kha dog gi rtags las ni sbal pa
T02D3305:241a-10: rjes su shes par bya ste de ni med do
T02D3305:241a-11: // ser skya las ni nang na byi ba ste
T02D3305:241a-12: des ni chom rkun dang glo'i nad skyed par byed
T02D3305:241a-13: // de / ser po las ni dbyig ste des kyang nor nyams pa skyed par byed do //
T02D3305:241a-14: phug ron gyi mdog las ni khyim gyi dbyig ste des kyang rgyal po dbul por byed do //
T02D3305:241a-15: skya rings kyi mdog las ni rtsangs pa yod pa ste /
T02D3305:241a-16: des ni 'dir sna tshogs pa'i nad du 'gyur ro //
T02D3305:241a-17: sngo bsangs las ni sprul 'byung ste des kyang sbyin bdag chen po'i nor zad pa'o //
T02D3305:241a-18: ral gri'i kha dog gi dbye ba las ni chu ste de'i 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
T02D3305:241a-26: rnga yab rnams ni chen po'i mtshan mar bstan to //
T02D3305:241a-27: de lta bu sogs dge dang mi dge ba //
T02D3305:241a-28: mtha' dag slob dpon chen pos legs brtags nas //
T02D3305:241a-29: bcad pa dang ni gshog pa de snyed pa //
T02D3305:241a-30: shing gi mchog la blo dang ldan pas bya //
T02D3305:241a-31: rtsa ba dang ni rtse mo dbus kyi char //
T02D3305:241a-32: mdzer pa can rnams kun du bltas la yang //
T02D3305:241a-33: kun la bcu yi cha ni lhag pa ste //
T02D3305:241a-34: tshad la sogs pa thams cad du ni bya //
T02D3305:241a-35: de nas mchod rten la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i ched
T02D3305:241a-36: du rdo'i khyad par dam par gnas pa rnams yongs
T02D3305:241a-38: ri'i shod dang chu klung gi 'gram dang /
T02D3305:241a-39: bzang po'i 'jug dogs dang lha nye bar longs spyod pa'i shing dang /
T02D3305:241a-40: phug dang lha'i dbang po dang nor sbyin dang phyugs
T02D3305:241a-41: bdag dang tshangs pa rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs pa'i
T02D3305:241a-42: steng nas lhung ba dang shar dang byar dang steng
T02D3305:241a-43: gi phyogs su kha bltas pa'i rdo rnams ni bsngags
T02D3305:241a-44: so // shar du phyogs pa ni rang 'dod pa ster zhing /
T02D3305:241a-45: lus ngan du phyogs pas bu dang bu mo dang rigs skyed par byed do //
T02D3305:241a-46: dbang ldan du phyogs pas grol ba'i 'bras bu ster zhing /
T02D3305:241a-47: steng nas phyogs pas thams cad du mkha' la spyod pa 'grub bo //
T02D3305:241b-1: dur khrod dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /
T02D3305:241b-2: dmar po dang myur du bros pa dang /
T02D3305:241b-3: grog ma'i shing dang 'byar ba dang /
T02D3305:241b-4: kha dog mang po dang gzhan gyi las byas pa'i rdo rnams dor bar bya'o //
T02D3305:241b-5: 'khar ba dri ma med pa lta bus ni sbyin
T02D3305:241b-6: pa po la 'chi ba ster bar byed pa ste
T02D3305:241b-10: dmar po'i kha dog rnams las /
T02D3305:241b-11: skyon byed pa ni ri mo nag po dang mnyam par ldan pa yin pas /
T02D3305:241b-12: gang gis snying por mtshan ma mthong ba na spang bar bya ste skyon mang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D3305:241b-13: byis pa dang lang tsho dang /
T02D3305:241b-14: bar ma dang rgan po ste /
T02D3305:241b-15: rnam pa bzhi ni rdo rje'i rigs rnams so //
T02D3305:241b-16: byis pa ni shin tu 'jam zhing /
T02D3305:241b-17: bzod bsnun pa dang lhan cig pha gu lta bur 'gyur ba'o //
T02D3305:241b-18: rgan po ni rtsub cing kha dog ngan pa dbyangs
T02D3305:241b-19: dang bral ba sbal pa lta bu ste dman pa'o
T02D3305:241b-20: // bar ma ni phra ba'i yon tan dang ldan zhing dri zhim pa dang /
T02D3305:241b-21: sgra zab pa dang bsil ba dang mkhregs pa'o//
T02D3305:241b-22: brtan pa dang mnyen pa dang shin tu snum pa
T02D3305:241b-23: ni lang tsho ste 'dod pa ster bas mchog go
T02D3305:241b-24: // dkar po dang ser po dang ljang gu dang
T02D3305:241b-25: dmar po dang sngo bsangs kyi kha dog dang 'od
T02D3305:241b-26: dang ldan pa yang lang tsho can no //
T02D3305:241b-27: rigs la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba shes par byas nas /
T02D3305:241b-28: sngags la sogs pas kyang bsngags bar bya'o //
T02D3305:241b-29: rdo ba bzang po nag po yin yang gal te
T02D3305:241b-30: ri mo dkar po phra mo dang thig le rnams
T02D3305:241b-31: dang yang dag par ldan na blo dang gnyen dang
T02D3305:241b-32: ldan par 'gyur ro zhes pa nags tshal gyi cho
T02D3305:241b-34: / gand'i rnam pa bzhi ni sku'i mtshan nyid kyi rab tu dbye bas shes par bya'o //
T02D3305:241b-35: thams cad du bla na med pa'i dag pas nyi
T02D3305:241b-36: shu lhag pa'i cha brgya ni srid du ste 'jig
T02D3305:241b-37: tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu rnam
T02D3305:241b-39: rgyar ni bzhi lhag pa'i cha nyi shur yang dag par blta'o //
T02D3305:241b-40: bden pa'i rnam pa bcu drug gis de ni cha bcu drug par bshad do //
T02D3305:241b-41: dbus kyi cha lnga'i gcig ni kha zlum po'i cha ste /
T02D3305:241b-42: tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang
T02D3305:241b-43: rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye
T02D3305:241b-45: 'di dag ni 'jig tshogs rnam par dag pa ste
T02D3305:241b-46: des na 'dir cha shas lnga pa'i char bkod pa'o
T02D3305:242a-0: // ring bar sor brgya dang bcu pa ni rab tu sbyor ba'i @242a * //
T02D3305:242a-1: rnam par shes pa'i rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D3305:242a-2: de'i rgyar ni nyi shu rtsa gnyis te sems bskyed
T02D3305:242a-3: pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi rnam par dag pa'o
T02D3305:242a-4: // zur bcu gnyis dang mnyam par ldan pa ni
T02D3305:242a-5: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos nyid kyi rnam
T02D3305:242a-6: // pa'o // nyon mongs pa dgu bcu rtsa brgyad
T02D3305:242a-7: rab tu nyams pa'i lam bsgoms pa'i rnam pas de'i
T02D3305:242a-8: tshad ni de snyeng du ring ba'o //
T02D3305:242a-9: stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa nyi shu ni khor yug tu'o //
T02D3305:242a-10: rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pas zur brgyad kyis brgyan pa'i gand'i'o //
T02D3305:242a-11: sor mo bzhi dang mnyam ldan pa'i //
T02D3305:242a-12: sor mo brgyad cu srid du bstan //
T02D3305:242a-13: srid ni chos kyi phung po'o //
T02D3305:242a-14: ma 'dres chos kyi rnam pa yis //
T02D3305:242a-15: yongs su bskor ba bco brgyad de //
T02D3305:242a-16: lag pa'i 'dab mas de tshad shes //
T02D3305:242a-17: 'di rnams kyi ni tshad bshad pa //
T02D3305:242a-18: rgya dang dpangs kyi rim pa'o //
T02D3305:242a-19: de nyid bcu drug rnam pa yis //
T02D3305:242a-20: de tshad zlum po gzhan ni dbus //
T02D3305:242a-21: bden pa bcu gnyis khyad par las //
T02D3305:242a-23: nor bu'i rtsa bar 'od zer gnas //
T02D3305:242a-24: khams gsum sems can dbyangs rnam pa //
T02D3305:242a-25: brtsam par bya zhes tshigs bcad gnyis //
T02D3305:242a-26: yongs su dag pa'i dril bu zung //
T02D3305:242a-27: rtse mor sor bzhi sor gsum dang //
T02D3305:242a-28: sor mo phyed dang gsum dang gnyis //
T02D3305:242a-29: sbal pa'i gdong dang 'dra ba ni //
T02D3305:242a-30: sangs rgyas ye shes rnam pa mchog / gsum gcig lnga dang bdun gyi nas //
T02D3305:242a-31: dman pa tshad rnams kun la bzang //
T02D3305:242a-32: 'dir ni tshad rnams bshad las gad //
T02D3305:242a-33: yid la 'thad pa de rnams bya //
T02D3305:242a-34: sna tshogs tshon rnams kyis ni legs par byugs //
T02D3305:242a-35: gang yang tshad ldan tshon gyi phreng ba 'bar //
T02D3305:242a-36: dmar po'i tshon gyis 'bar zhing sa bzang skyes //
T02D3305:242a-37: brdungs na dbyangs bzang ba ni gand'i'o //
T02D3305:242a-38: rnam pa mang po'i yon tan tshogs dang ldan //
T02D3305:242a-39: khrus sogs cho ga rig pa'i sngags pa yis //
T02D3305:242a-40: dbang ldan zur gyi cha la gser dang ni //
T02D3305:242a-41: rin chen la sogs khri la chu skyes gnas //
T02D3305:242a-42: the'u dang legs par mnyam par ldan pa yi //
T02D3305:242a-43: gand'i dang por rab tu gnas pa ste //
T02D3305:242a-44: dh'i:yig gi sa bon las skyes pa'i gand'i chen po

T02D3305:243a-11: byang gi phyogs kyi char gnas pa ni dpa' po'i rgyal po bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags kyis so //

T02D3305:243a-13: sgo rnams chog bzhin du legs par mchod par bya'o
T02D3305:243a-14: zhes pa sgo glegs bslang ba'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:243a-16: // / rin chen dang bcas rdo rje'i steng du gnas //
T02D3305:243a-17: zlum dang srid kyi tshad rnams yang dag ldan //

T02D3305:243a-24: phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams su legs par gzugs //

T02D3305:243b-23: tshad dang ldan pa bya 'dab chen po'o //

T02D3305:243b-28: bum pa'i chu yis mngon par dbang bskur zhing //
T02D3305:243b-29: gdugs dang gos dang 'dab mas brgyan par bya //

T02D3305:243b-33: ma h'a bhu ba nam bandha /

T02D3305:243b-42: mi ri mi ri h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:243b-43: gtsug lag khang la sogs pa'i steng du shing dgod pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:243b-45: // / da ni sku gzugs la sogs pa'i //

T02D3305:243b-53: legs pa'i tshad ldan skyes bu yi //

T02D3305:243b-65: tshogs par gyur pa 'ba' zhig der //

T02D3305:244a-3: phyi rol re'u mig rtsig pa rnams //

T02D3305:244a-7: lhag pa yang ni bya ba ste //

T02D3305:244a-17: bzhengs pa nyid kyang yang dag 'dod //

T02D3305:244a-21: ring ba'i sgo ni bshad pa yin //
T02D3305:244a-22: shin tu chung rnams mi 'gal bas //

T02D3305:244a-27: snying po'i khang ba'i srid du bya //
T02D3305:244a-28: 'degs pa'i rgya dang mnyam pa'i dpangs //

T02D3305:244a-31: mdzes pa'i mdzes su mthun pa bya //
T02D3305:244a-32: sgo la sogs pa'i rnam 'jug pa //

T02D3305:244a-35: chung du la sogs grags rnams la //

T02D3305:244a-37: rtsig par gsungs te rnam gzhan min //

T02D3305:244a-40: bzhi pa'i cha shas nyid kyis cha //

T02D3305:244a-44: khru do gsungs pa'i gcig gi chas //
T02D3305:244a-45: mnyam pa cha gsum grags pa la //
T02D3305:244a-46: bcu la sogs pa'i sgo bya 'dir //
T02D3305:244a-47: cung zad lhag pa lhag pa'o //
T02D3305:244a-48: drug gi cha shas nyid kyis ni //

T02D3305:244a-53: sgo dang 'gram logs la sogs bya //

T02D3305:244b-18: khang chung bgrod pa'i skabs dang ldan //

T02D3305:244b-26: khang chung gnyis gnyis ldan par bya //

T02D3305:244b-33: 'dir ni de nyid snying po'i steng //
T02D3305:244b-34: dri yi gtsang khang brtan pa che //
T02D3305:244b-35: khang pa brtsegs ma'am de las gzhan //

T02D3305:244b-38: khang chung ngos su rtsig pa ste //
T02D3305:244b-39: 'degs pa'i rtsig pa mnyam par bya //
T02D3305:244b-40: las dang gnas la 'jug pas so //
T02D3305:244b-41: 'khor sa rnams dang khang chung rnams //
T02D3305:244b-42: mtho dman rjes su mthun pa dag //
T02D3305:244b-43: 'dir ni ji ltar rigs par bya //

T02D3305:244b-45: brtan pa'i don du 'degs pa dang //
T02D3305:244b-46: rmang la sogs pa'i las la yang //
T02D3305:244b-47: rtsig pa'i cha yi rkang pa yi //
T02D3305:244b-49: 'degs pa'i dpangs ni rnam gzung ba //

T02D3305:245a-0: chung bar bzo bo yang dag @245a * //

T02D3305:245a-36: dpung par bzo bo rnams kyis 'dod //

T02D3305:245a-49: yang na gru bzhi'i las can te //
T02D3305:245a-50: phung po'i rjes mthun dag pa nyid//
T02D3305:245a-51: gang zhig da ni cha rnams dbye //
T02D3305:245a-52: cha shas brgyad kyis yan lag brgyad //
T02D3305:245a-53: ji ltar mthong ba'i las rnams kyis //
T02D3305:245a-54: cha shas bcu gnyis par yang 'gyur //
T02D3305:245a-55: dri yi gtsang khang lhag par yang //
T02D3305:245a-56: ji snyed sum cu rtsa drug pa'i //
T02D3305:245a-57: shin tu zlum po'i gzugs can bya //
T02D3305:245a-58: gang yang dri yi gtsang khang 'di //
T02D3305:245b-0: gru bzhi pa yang @245b blta bar bya //
T02D3305:245b-1: de lta'i gzugs rnams mngon 'dod pas //
T02D3305:245b-2: de snyed cha shas rnams kyang bya //
T02D3305:245b-3: lha yi rigs las rnam sprul pa'i //
T02D3305:245b-4: rim pa nyid de gzhan du min //
T02D3305:245b-5: bar bar la sogs snam bu rnams //
T02D3305:245b-6: dri gtsang khang sogs lus la ni //
T02D3305:245b-7: 'phel ba dang ni thung ba yang //
T02D3305:245b-8: rkang pa ji ltar mdzes par bya //
T02D3305:245b-9: snam bu gzhung shing sogs pa rnams //
T02D3305:245b-10: nye bar bstan pa ji bzhin bya //
T02D3305:245b-11: gzhan dang gzhan gyi las rnams kyang //
T02D3305:245b-12: ji lta ji ltar bzhin du bya //
T02D3305:245b-13: mgrin pa'i dpangs cha rkang pas dman //
T02D3305:245b-14: gzhan yang chung sogs grags rnams la //
T02D3305:245b-15: yongs su rdzogs pa'i cha nyid kyis //
T02D3305:245b-17: phung por byas pa de nas lnga'i //
T02D3305:245b-18: cha 'di rnams kyi nang la gsum//
T02D3305:245b-19: de ni mgrin pa'i zlum la bya //
T02D3305:245b-20: mgrin pa nye ba'i mthar gnas pa'o //
T02D3305:245b-23: phung po cha yis phyed kyi cha //
T02D3305:245b-24: sngon gyi bzo bo rnams kyi lugs //
T02D3305:245b-25: chen po yi ni phyed kyi chas //
T02D3305:245b-26: mgrin pa'i dpangs dag lhag pa min //
T02D3305:245b-27: rkang pas dman pa'am gzhan yang phyed //
T02D3305:245b-28: spyi bo yi na dpangs la 'dod //
T02D3305:245b-29: spyi bor gang zhig 'chi med gnas / skyu ru ra gnas lta bur 'gyur //
T02D3305:245b-30: rgya dang phung po'i tshad kyis ni //
T02D3305:245b-31: cung zad de ni lhag pa yang //
T02D3305:245b-32: spyi bo'i gsum gyi cha yis ni //
T02D3305:245b-33: steng gi spyi bor 'dod pa yin //
T02D3305:245b-34: dpangs 'dir ji ltar mdzes pa ste //
T02D3305:245b-35: mtho dang dma' ba de bzhin no //
T02D3305:245b-36: mchod rten rgya ni gcig gis dman //
T02D3305:245b-37: mchod rten dpangs ni gnyis kyi cha //
T02D3305:245b-39: mchod rten spyi bo'i steng du'o //
T02D3305:245b-40: mgrin mtha' ji srid re re zhing //
T02D3305:245b-41: bya ste de yi steng du'o //
T02D3305:245b-42: brtan pa'i gdugs dang snam bur bcas //
T02D3305:245b-43: gdugs la dril bu me long ngo //
T02D3305:245b-44: zhes pa dri'i gtsang khang la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'o /
T02D3305:245b-47: der ni lnga yi cha ldan bya //
T02D3305:245b-48: 'dir gang gsum gyi cha ldan pa //
T02D3305:245b-49: de yi dpangs can khang brtsegs so //
T02D3305:245b-51: de bzhin du yang khang brtsegs 'gyur //
T02D3305:245b-52: legs par dpangs su gnas pa 'dir //
T02D3305:245b-53: mthong ba'ang gzhan dang ldan par 'gyur //
T02D3305:245b-54: sngar bzhin phung po rnam gnas pas //
T02D3305:245b-55: 'dir yang brtsegs mar rnam gnas nyid //
T02D3305:245b-56: gzhan dang gzhan gyi las rnams ni //
T02D3305:245b-57: shes pa rnams kyis mdzes par bya //
T02D3305:245b-58: khang brtsegs nyid ni ring ba dang //
T02D3305:245b-60: gang du mgrin sogs rnam dbye ba //
T02D3305:245b-61: des slar 'dir yang snga ma bzhin //
T02D3305:245b-62: zhes pa khang pa brtsegs ma'i cho ga'o /
T02D3305:246a-0: // / @246a * // gsum gyi lha rnams gnas pa'i phyir //
T02D3305:246a-1: rgya phubs 'ga' yang blta bya ste //
T02D3305:246a-3: nye bar bstan pa ji bzhin bya //
T02D3305:246a-4: lnga yi cha'am drug gi cha //
T02D3305:246a-5: rgya phubs yang dag gnas par 'dod //
T02D3305:246a-6: 'degs pa'i cha dad mnyam pa'i dpangs //
T02D3305:246a-8: rgya phubs dbus kyi lus la ni //
T02D3305:246a-9: d'a bi da ba dum bu gnyis //
T02D3305:246a-10: dum bu gcig pa'i rgya phubs ni //
T02D3305:246a-11: b'a rendra dang goo da'i lugs //
T02D3305:246a-12: rgyab kyi rtse mo yang dag bsdus //
T02D3305:246a-13: ngos rnams rnam rgyas mkhas pa yis //
T02D3305:246a-14: dbus su gzhung shing snam bu rnams //
T02D3305:246a-15: mthong na mdzes par 'gyur ba bya //
T02D3305:246a-16: rnga zlum mtshungs pa dbus kyi steng //
T02D3305:246a-17: ngos gnyis gzhung shing mtho ba ste //
T02D3305:246a-18: d'a bi da ba gzhung phyed kyis //
T02D3305:246a-19: bum pa seng ge rab mdzes 'dod //
T02D3305:246a-20: b'a rendra ba'i rgya phubs kyi //
T02D3305:246a-21: las ni yul rnams kun du mthong //
T02D3305:246a-22: d'a bi da ba'i rgya phubs ni //
T02D3305:246a-23: gang du cha shas sogs la mthong //
T02D3305:246a-24: slar yang khang bzangs chen po gzhan yang ste //
T02D3305:246a-25: ri rab manda ra dang phun tshogs mthar //
T02D3305:246a-26: gnas khang bgrod pa'i khang brtsegs bzang po dang//
T02D3305:246a-27: glang po seng ge ngang pa bu ldan mkha' lding rig byed gnas rnams la ni rgya phubs bshad //
T02D3305:246a-28: rig byed zhal gyi nyis 'gyur zhal rnams dang ni rgyal po'i khang pa rnams la'ang de nyid de //
T02D3305:246a-29: zlum po nyid dang drug dang bzhi yis dbye bas rgyan la'ang ji bzhin 'jug pa shes par bya //
T02D3305:246a-30: shes nas bzang po shin tu bzang po dga' ba padma bzang po gsum dang lnga pa dang //
T02D3305:246a-31: dpal be'u phyed dang dum bu med cing bya ba ldan ba de ni 'phel ldan bdag nyid de /
T02D3305:246a-32: khyim gang rgyal po'i bde ba ldan pa bshad cing gzhan yang khang pa brtsegs ma rnams la'ang dran //
T02D3305:246a-33: bum pa'i steng du zla ba dra go rnams kyi go yu'i shing las phun tshogs 'jug pa nyid //
T02D3305:246a-34: 'di dag dbye bzhis brgyan pa rnams dang de la sogs pa rnams ni grong khyer te /
T02D3305:246a-35: l'a d'a ksha dang de nas par da ka rab gsal zhes bya de bzhin d'a bi da //
T02D3305:246a-36: bsam pa'i dbang gis chung du'i gnas dang chen po'ang sems can rnams la rnam par bstan //
T02D3305:246a-37: ma bshad pa rnams thos las rnam par rgyas pa'ang cho ga shes pa rnams kyis de bzhin bya //
T02D3305:246a-38: gtsug lag khang rnams dang ni rkang pa'i dbye bas ming rnams shes par bya ba ste //
T02D3305:246a-39: rgya'i gnas kyi steng du ni mi bya'o zhes pa
T02D3305:246a-40: rgya phubs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'o
T02D3305:246a-42: / // / bsam gtan don dam lha rnams kyi //
T02D3305:246a-43: khang pa la ni thog gcig ste //
T02D3305:246a-44: sangs rgyas gnas pa'i don du yang //
T02D3305:246b-0: sangs rgyas bzhi yi gdan @246b rim bzhin //
T02D3305:246b-1: gnas pa 'am dga' ba bstan pa yi //
T02D3305:246b-2: rtag tu rnal 'byor rgyal po yis //
T02D3305:246b-3: yid sogs dang mthun khang pa nyid //
T02D3305:246b-4: bsam gtan la sogs bsgrub phyir bya //
T02D3305:246b-5: dkyil 'khor lta bu cha bzhi pa'i //
T02D3305:246b-6: khang pa brtsegs pa yang bya ste //
T02D3305:246b-7: khang brtsegs la ni khang chung 'gyur //
T02D3305:246b-8: de ni rta babs dang bcas bya //
T02D3305:246b-9: ji snyeng pa la ka ba'i cha //
T02D3305:246b-10: slar yang rnam par gnas gyur pa //
T02D3305:246b-11: de snyed 'dun khang steng gi dpangs //
T02D3305:246b-12: nyung ba min pa gzhan yang 'dod //
T02D3305:246b-13: khang pa brtsegs ma la sogs cha //
T02D3305:246b-14: de rnams sngar bzhin rab tu grags //
T02D3305:246b-15: slar yang brjod par 'gyur ba rnams //
T02D3305:246b-16: 'dir ni de rnams bya ba ste //
T02D3305:246b-17: de dag steng du mgrin pa dang //
T02D3305:246b-18: dri med snying po mdzes pa ste /
T02D3305:246b-19: khang brtsegs la 'dod mchod rten dang //
T02D3305:246b-20: 'dun khang la yang slar de nyid //
T02D3305:246b-21: gtsug lag khang dang tshogs khang ngam //
T02D3305:246b-22: de bzhin khang pa gzhan la yang //
T02D3305:246b-23: dra go rnams ni mi 'gal bar //
T02D3305:246b-24: bya ste de las gzhan du min //
T02D3305:246b-25: gzugs rnams ji lta ba yi gnas //
T02D3305:246b-26: mchog gi las kyi grogs po yis //
T02D3305:246b-27: bya ste slar yang khang pa nyid //
T02D3305:246b-29: khang pa bzhi dang bsam gtan gyi khang pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'o /
T02D3305:246b-31: // / da ni rdo rje slob dpon rnams kyis yongs
T02D3305:246b-32: su 'das pa tha ma dga' bar byed pa'i cho
T02D3305:246b-34: gzhan don la dgyes shi ba 'tsho mdzad ma //
T02D3305:246b-35: spyan mar grags pa'i lha mo phyag 'tshal te //
T02D3305:246b-36: shi ba yang dag 'tsho byed sbyor ba yi //
T02D3305:246b-37: shi ba bde 'gror nges sbyor bshad par bya //
T02D3305:246b-38: shi ba'i khang pa shin tu dben par ni //
T02D3305:246b-39: nyer spyod kun dang ldan pas rnal 'byor pa //
T02D3305:246b-40: me tog dkar po'i phreng bas gtsug tor bcings //
T02D3305:246b-41: zhi zhing dkar po'i dri yis rnam par byugs //
T02D3305:246b-42: dkar po'i gos dang rgyan ldan shar du zhal//
T02D3305:246b-43: bltas pa'am yang na de ru mos pa yis //
T02D3305:246b-44: rdo rje dang ni rdo rje dril bu gzung //
T02D3305:246b-45: 'jam zhing yangs pa mtho ba'i stan la 'dug / tsandan dkar po la sogs dri rnams dang //
T02D3305:246b-46: bdud rtsi lnga sbyar chu yis mdun du ni //
T02D3305:246b-47: mandala nye bar byugs te dkar po yi //
T02D3305:246b-48: me tog rnams kyis nye bar mdzes pa bya //
T02D3305:246b-49: aargha la sogs rang gi sngags rnams na //
T02D3305:246b-50: sv'a h'a'i mtha' can legs bzlas bskul tshig dang //
T02D3305:246b-51: snying ga'i zla bar rang gi sa bon rnams //
T02D3305:246b-52: bltas nas gnas la sogs pa bsrung bar bya //
T02D3305:246b-53: de la gnas bdag rnal 'byor bsrung ba'i sngags //
T02D3305:247a-0: cho ga bzhin du bsgrub shes @247a * //
T02D3305:247a-2: spyan ma'i rnal 'byor rab tu rnam bsgrubs nas //
T02D3305:247a-3: snying ga'i sa bon rtse las legs grub 'dod //
T02D3305:247a-4: 'khor los mtshan ba'i lcags kyu spro bar bya //
T02D3305:247a-5: de yis 'jig rten pha rol song ba'i sems //
T02D3305:247a-6: shin tu dmar zhing gsal ba dgug bya ste //
T02D3305:247a-7: chos kyi sgo yi gzugs sam yang na ni //
T02D3305:247a-8: rlung med mi g-yo'i mar me lta bu yis //
T02D3305:247a-9: shi bde yi shes pa 'ongs nas ni //
T02D3305:247a-10: spyi bo nas ni snying gar gzhug par bya //
T02D3305:247a-11: de rjes de ni shes par ldan pa yis //
T02D3305:247a-12: yang dag langs nas 'dug bar blta bar bya //
T02D3305:247a-13: de yi snying gar mo ha ra ti zhes //
T02D3305:247a-14: bkod nas de yi 'od zer phreng 'bar bas //
T02D3305:247a-15: de yi lus ni stong par byas nas su //
T02D3305:247a-16: lhag ma rnam par rig byed tsam du blta //
T02D3305:247a-17: de yi rjes su mo ha ra ti zhes //
T02D3305:247a-18: rab brjod de ni spyan ma'i gzugs su bsam //
T02D3305:247a-19: de yi mig dang lus la sogs pa rnams //
T02D3305:247a-20: thams cad du ni byin gyis brlab par bya //
T02D3305:247a-21: snying po ye shes lha yi thugs ka yi //
T02D3305:247a-22: zla ba la gnas rtsa sngags 'od zer dang //
T02D3305:247a-23: lha mo'i sprin gyi bdud rtsi'i 'od can gyi //
T02D3305:247a-24: ro ldan bum ba rnams kyis dbang bskur bya //
T02D3305:247a-25: rang gi lus las nges par spros nas ni //
T02D3305:247a-26: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor khyab par 'phros pa yi //
T02D3305:247a-27: 'od zer gong bur gyur ba'i tshogs rnams kyis //
T02D3305:247a-28: de rjes spyan ma'i sprin gyis dbang bskur bya //
T02D3305:247a-29: de yi sngags bzlas chu yis gang ba yi //
T02D3305:247a-30: bum pa yis kyang de bzhin dbang bskur bya //
T02D3305:247a-31: mgo bo la ni cod pan sbyin bya ste //
T02D3305:247a-32: lag pa dag la rdo rje dril bu yang //
T02D3305:247a-33: rdo rje'i sngags pas ku sha'i rtse mo la //
T02D3305:247a-34: rdo rje rtse gcig rnon bo rnam bsgoms nas //
T02D3305:247a-35: de ni me dang mtshungs par bsam par bya //
T02D3305:247a-36: de rjes mnyam gzhag sems kyis de yi ni //
T02D3305:247a-37: snying gar bkod pa'i shes pa rnam 'phro ba //
T02D3305:247a-38: yang dag bskul nas 'bar bar gyur pa rnams //
T02D3305:247a-39: rdo rje'i rtse nas rlung gis bskyod par bya //
T02D3305:247a-40: me yi 'od zer rnams kyis reg pa yis //
T02D3305:247a-41: de ni dngul chu bzhin du 'bar bar bsam //
T02D3305:247a-42: steng gi lam nas rnam par dgrol ba'am //
T02D3305:247a-43: yang na rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing du'o //
T02D3305:247a-44: gal te shes pa lam gzhan nas thon na //
T02D3305:247a-45: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho ru ni ltung bar 'gyur //
T02D3305:247a-46: de yi phyir na steng gi lam nas su //
T02D3305:247a-47: de ni nges par 'pho ba bya ba yin //
T02D3305:247a-48: spyi bo nas ni gzugs med 'gro ba ste //
T02D3305:247a-49: mdzod spu nas ni gzugs kyi khams su grags //
T02D3305:247a-50: mig dag las ni mi yi 'gro ba nyid //
T02D3305:247a-51: rna ba dag nas grub pa'i lha ru 'gro //
T02D3305:247a-52: sna bug dag nas gnod sbyin nyid du ste //
T02D3305:247a-53: kha nas dri za nyid du nges par 'gro //
T02D3305:247a-54: lte ba nas ni 'dod pa'i lta ru ste//
T02D3305:247b-0: @247b khu ba'i lam nas yi dag sa 'gro bar ro //
T02D3305:247b-1: chu yi lam nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas te //
T02D3305:247b-2: bshang ba'i lam nas dmyal ba'i 'gro ba ru //
T02D3305:247b-3: nges bar 'gro bar shes bya de yi phyir //
T02D3305:247b-4: lam de dag ni rnam par spang bar bya //
T02D3305:247b-5: de nas thar pa'i grong khyer du gzhug ba'i phyir
T02D3305:247b-6: mdun du zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gsungs pa las yongs
T02D3305:247b-7: su rdzogs pa'i cho ga 'am rdzas gcig pa'i sbyin
T02D3305:247b-8: sreg gi phyogs gsungs pa'i phyir sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D3305:247b-9: de la ji srid de'i rus pa ma 'ongs pa
T02D3305:247b-10: de srid du de'i gos la de'i ming smos pa
T02D3305:247b-12: 'ongs nas ni de'i rus pa dang gos la yang bya ste nyin zhag brgyad ji srid par ro //
T02D3305:247b-13: yang na lho yi phyogs kyi cha la ni //
T02D3305:247b-14: khru gang tsam gyi stegs bu gru bzhi bya //
T02D3305:247b-15: ba yi lci ba sar ma lhung bas byug / ba yi rnam lnga mnyam bas mngon par gtor //
T02D3305:247b-16: der yang dkyil 'khor ma la ya yi ni //
T02D3305:247b-17: tsandan dkar pos byugs shing me tog gis //
T02D3305:247b-18: mdzes byas de steng bu ma pa rnam par dgod //
T02D3305:247b-19: mtshan nyid dang ldan sman dang yal gang dang //
T02D3305:247b-20: nor bu dri bzangs 'bru lnga rnams dang ldan //
T02D3305:247b-21: gdugs dang ba dan rnams kyis nye bar mdzes //
T02D3305:247b-22: mgrin par sngon po'i gos kyis rnam par dkris //
T02D3305:247b-23: nye bar spyod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02D3305:247b-24: ku sha'i gdan la yang dag gzhag bya ste //
T02D3305:247b-25: rgya chen rigs bdag rang gi mtshan mas mtshan //
T02D3305:247b-26: yi ge gsum ldan rtsa ba'i sa bon gyis //
T02D3305:247b-27: de ni lhag par gnas par bya ba yin //
T02D3305:247b-28: sngags pas yang na khrus kyi sngags rnams ni //
T02D3305:247b-29: lan grangs brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas pas so //
T02D3305:247b-30: de nas mdun du dkar po'i rdul tshon gyis //
T02D3305:247b-31: lte bar bcas shing mu khyud 'bar bar bcas //
T02D3305:247b-32: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bris nas me tog ni //
T02D3305:247b-33: dkar po mdzes pas rnam par spras byas nas //
T02D3305:247b-34: de yi steng du bum pa stong pa yi //
T02D3305:247b-35: steng du bug pa dang bcas kham skyogs gzhag / de rjes de yi rus bu kham skyogs der //
T02D3305:247b-36: lhag ma med par yang dag dgod bar bya //
T02D3305:247b-37: ting 'dzin gsum dang rnam par ldan pa yi //
T02D3305:247b-38: de yi phyir bzlog cho ga yang dag bya //
T02D3305:247b-39: yungs kar me tog snyoms bar ldan pa rnams //
T02D3305:247b-40: rim pa bzhin du gsang sngags rab brjod pas //
T02D3305:247b-41: de yi rus pa'am yang na gos dag gam //
T02D3305:247b-42: de yi ming la yang dag bsnun par bya //
T02D3305:247b-43: de nas sngags kyi tshig tu 'gyur ba ni //
T02D3305:247b-44: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra h'um phat /
T02D3305:247b-45: aom sarba p'a pam bi sho dha na badzra h'um phat /
T02D3305:247b-46: aom sarba karma a'a ba ra na bha smi ku ru h'um phat /
T02D3305:247b-47: aom bhr'um bi n'a sha ya a'a ba ra n'a ni dzum h'um phat /
T02D3305:247b-48: aom dhr'um bi sho dha ya a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D3305:248a-1: a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D3305:248a-2: aom dzva la dzva la dha dha ka ha na ha na a'a bar n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D3305:248a-3: aom srum sar sa ra bra sa ra pra sa ra a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D3305:248a-4: aom h'um ha ra ha ra sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D3305:248a-5: aom h'um sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D3305:248a-6: aom sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni bi spo ta ya h'um phat /
T02D3305:248a-7: aom pri ta pri ta sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D3305:248a-8: aom tr'a ta tr'a ta sarba a'a ba ran'a ni h'um phat /
T02D3305:248a-9: aom tshindha tshinda sarba a'a bar n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D3305:248a-10: aom da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga te he tu na h'um phat /
T02D3305:248a-11: aom pa tsa pa tsa sarba phre ta ga te he tun h'um phat /
T02D3305:248a-12: aom ma tha ma tha sarba ti rya ka ga ti he tun h'um phat /
T02D3305:248a-13: ces pa ni rus pa la sogs pa la bsnun pa'i sngags so //
T02D3305:248a-14: de nas lhag par gnas pa byas pa'i chus de'i
T02D3305:248a-15: rus pa la sogs bkru bar bya ste sngags rnams
T02D3305:248a-18: aom na mo bha ga wa te /
T02D3305:248a-19: sarba du rga ti pa ri sho dha ni r'a dz'a ya /
T02D3305:248a-20: ta th'a ga t'a ya aarha te samyksam buddh'a ya /
T02D3305:248a-22: aom sho dha ne shodha ne /
T02D3305:248a-23: sarba b'a pam bi shodha ne shuddhe ne shuddhe bi
T02D3305:248a-24: shuddhe sarba karma a'a ba ra na bi sho dha
T02D3305:248a-25: ne sv'a h'a / zhes pa ni rus pa la sogs pa bkur ba'i sbags so //
T02D3305:248a-26: de nas me tog gtor zhing sngags bzlas pas lam yang dag par bstan par bya ste /
T02D3305:248a-28: aom ratne ratne ratna sambha we /
T02D3305:248a-29: ratna ki ra ne ratna m'a la bi shuddha /
T02D3305:248a-30: shodha ya sarba p'a pam h'um phat /
T02D3305:248a-32: de nas me tog de rnams chu la gtor zhing lam rnam par sbyang bar bya ste sngags ni /
T02D3305:248a-33: aom padme padme padma audbha we su kha ba tim gatstsha ntu sv'a h'a /
T02D3305:248a-34: zhes pa ni lam sbyang ba'i sngags so //
T02D3305:248a-35: sngags tshig de dang de rnams la //
T02D3305:248a-36: bskul ba'i tshig rnams spel bar bya //
T02D3305:248a-37: lam sbyang ba yi sngags rnams kyis //
T02D3305:248a-38: me tog char ba rab tu dbab //
T02D3305:248a-39: bkra shis tshigs bcad 'don pa la //
T02D3305:248a-40: mnyam gzhag don du gzhug par bya //
T02D3305:248a-41: thun gsum yang na thun gcig la /
T02D3305:248a-42: nyi ma so sor de bzhin bya //
T02D3305:248a-43: cho ga ji ltar bshad de ltar //
T02D3305:248a-44: yang dag mchod cing thams cad bsdu //
T02D3305:248a-45: de la bkra shis kyi tshigs su ba cad pa ni /
T02D3305:248a-46: bkra shis gang zhig sems can kun la phan par dgyes //
T02D3305:248a-47: sangs rgyas skyon bral rnam par dag pa'i blo ldan pa //
T02D3305:248a-48: shes rab yan lag 'dus pas mdzes pa bde ba'i
T02D3305:248a-49: bdag / des ni khyed rnams dbang bskur mchog la
T02D3305:248a-50: bkra shis shog // bkra shis gang zhig lha dang lha min mis mchod pa //
T02D3305:248a-51: chos ni de yi bstan pa bla na med pa nyid //
T02D3305:248a-52: 'jig rten gsum du rab tu gsal zhing bdag med pa //
T02D3305:248a-53: des ni khyed rnams dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis
T02D3305:248a-54: shog / bkra shis gang zhig rab mchog chos rnams
T02D3305:248b-1: dam pa'i sar zhugs rgyal ba'i sras po'i tshogs kyi
T02D3305:248b-2: mchog / sems can rnams la phan par mkhas shing
T02D3305:248b-3: shin tu mdzes // des ni khyed rnams dbang bskur
T02D3305:248b-4: mchog la bkra shis shog / ces ba'i bkra shis
T02D3305:248b-5: kyi tshigs su bcad pa de rnams kyang rus pa
T02D3305:248b-6: 'khrud pa'i dus su 'don nam 'don du gzhug par
T02D3305:248b-7: shin tu mdzes // bya'o // de nas gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags ni //
T02D3305:248b-8: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D3305:248b-9: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D3305:248b-10: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D3305:248b-11: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02D3305:248b-13: de nas mtshan mo tshogs kyi 'khor lo byas te thams cad yang dag par bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D3305:248b-14: 'byor pa yod nang na song yongs su spyong ba'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bzhengs te /
T02D3305:248b-15: ji ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D3305:248b-16: slar yang rdo rje slob dpon gyis sbyin bdag las yon blang bar bya ste /
T02D3305:248b-17: des kyang 'byor ba dang rjes su mthun par rab tu dbul bar bya zhing /
T02D3305:248b-18: bkrus ba'i gos kyang slob dpon nyid la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3305:248b-20: shi ba la dmigs gang yin rnams //
T02D3305:248b-21: rang gi gnyen gyis slob dpon dbul //
T02D3305:248b-22: da ni mtho ris lam chas su //
T02D3305:248b-23: de la byin zhes shes par bya //
T02D3305:248b-24: gang zhig cung zad zhi don gyis //
T02D3305:248b-25: sbyin pa des 'dir nges par ni //
T02D3305:248b-26: bde ba can gyi sar 'gro ba //
T02D3305:248b-27: zhag bdun snga bar rab sbyin byed //
T02D3305:248b-28: de ltar gang yin kun byas te //
T02D3305:248b-29: cho gas lus can steng byas na //
T02D3305:248b-30: sdig pa thams cad spangs nas ni //
T02D3305:248b-31: bde ba can du nges par 'gro //
T02D3305:248b-32: de rjes de rus rnam sbyang bya //
T02D3305:248b-33: zhib mor rngo bas btags nas ni //
T02D3305:248b-34: chu klung shin tu rgya chen la //
T02D3305:248b-35: mchod pa byas te dor bar bya //
T02D3305:248b-37: mthon po'i rtse mo'i mthar 'dzegs nas //
T02D3305:248b-38: shin tu shugs drag rjes mthun pa'i //
T02D3305:248b-39: rlung la de ni bskur bar bya //
T02D3305:248b-40: shin tu drag po'i las kyi dbang du gyur pa yis //
T02D3305:248b-41: gal te bde ster bde ba can du ma song na //
T02D3305:248b-42: 'di ni nges par dran pa'i 'gro ba spangs nas su //
T02D3305:248b-43: sum cu rtsa gsum pa yi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur //
T02D3305:248b-44: zhes pa rdo rje slob dpon rnams kyis 'das pa
T02D3305:248b-45: tha ma dga' bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho
T02D3305:248b-47: / de ltar slob dpon rnams kyi bya ba bsdus
T02D3305:248b-48: pa dngos grub chen po'i rgyur ni rab tu 'bad
T02D3305:248b-49: pa las // sna tshogs gzhung las 'ongs pa la
T02D3305:248b-50: sogs mang bo'i me tog tshul ni bdud rtsi'i gzugs
T02D3305:248b-51: pa las // can te // gang zhig byas las
T02D3305:248b-52: skyes pa'i bsod nams rgyal sras rnams kyi chen po'i
T02D3305:249a-2: de yis 'jig rten gsum gyi 'jig rten rgyal mchog kun dga' dang ldan khang bzangs rab 'jug shog //
T02D3305:249a-3: ces pa slob dpon gyi bya ba kun las btus
T02D3305:249a-4: ba rnam par grags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon
T02D3305:249a-5: chan po pandi ta aa badh'u t'i pa dpal ldan
T02D3305:249a-6: 'gro ba'i me long gis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D3305:249a-8: // / rdo rje slob dpon rnams la nye bar mkho
T02D3305:249a-9: ba'i tshog mtha' yas pa phyogs gcig tu bsdus pa'i
T02D3305:249a-10: bstan bcos chen po 'di nyid ni /
T02D3305:249a-11: dpal ldan bla ma dam pa dharma k'irti shr'i bha dra'i thugs dgongs rnam bar dag pa'i sgo nas /
T02D3305:249a-12: bka' lung snyan pas bskul zhing mthun rkyen phun sum tshogs pa bsgrubs pa la brten nas /
T02D3305:249a-13: bi kra ma sh'i la'i pandi ta chen po manydzu shr'i dang /
T02D3305:249a-14: bod kyi lo ts'a ba blo gros rgyal mtshan dpal
T02D3305:249a-15: bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
T02D3305:249a-17: / // / bstan pa rin po che dang 'gro ba mang
T02D3305:249a-18: po la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur
T02D3305:249a-19: cig / dpal dharma k'i rti'i ga sung gi bdud
T02D3305:249a-20: rtsis bskul bar gyur pa las /
T02D3305:249a-21: 'jig rten phan par nges par dga' ba'i pandi ta dang ma ti yis //
T02D3305:249a-22: cho ga kun las btus ba'i rin chen phung po rnam par gsal byas ba'i //
T02D3305:249a-23: dge bas 'jig rten rnams ni bde ba chen po
T02D3305:249a-24: nyid dang ldan gyur cig / phun sum tshogs pa
T02D3305:249a-25: kun nas 'bar zhing grags pa gsal bar ldan pas
T02D3305:249a-26: 'di ni rtag tu gnas gyur cig / nad dang
T02D3305:249a-27: mu ge las grol dgra mi lhag ma med pa'i
T02D3305:249a-28: sa skyong yun ring phyogs rnams srung gyur cig /
T02D3305:249a-29: tshul khrims sogs ldan yon gnas rnams ni gsung rab
T02D3305:249a-30: mdzod rnams kun nas 'phel ba nyid gyur cig /
T02D3305:249a-31: nyi ma zla ba ji bzhin nyid dang mtshan du
T02D3305:249a-32: dpal ldan dharma k'irti dge zhing shis gyur cig /
T02D3305:249a-33: ces pa dag kyang pandi tas mdzad pa'i smon lam
T02D3305:249a-34: bsgyur ba ste ji lta ba bzhin du 'grub par
T02D3305:249a-35: gyur cig / slar yang dpal ldan byang chub rtse
T02D3305:249a-36: mo'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len zhing gsung gi bdud
T02D3305:249a-37: rtsi 'thungs pa dge slong badzra shr'is kyang cung zad
T02D3305:249a-38: bcos shing dag par bgyis so //
T02D3305:249a-39: de yis mtshon pa dge tshogs bdud rtsi'i 'od ldan pa //
T02D3305:249a-40: dpag yas phan pa de'i 'od dkar brgyad ldan pas //
T02D3305:249a-41: lus can snying la gnas pa'i mun bsal zhing //
